
 agan mec se ælmihta god , 
 helpan min|ic se halig|halgian|halga|haleg dryhten ! þu gesceope heofon and eorþe|eorþ 
 and wundor eall|eal , min|ic wundorcyning , 
 þu|þe|se þær on|an wesan|nesan , ece dryhten , 
 micel and manigfealdan|manigfeald . ic þu|þe|se , mære|mæran god , 
 min sawol|sawel bebeodan and min sylfes liс|lic , 
 and min|ic word and min|ic weorc , witig dryhten , 
 and eal min|ic leoþo , sunnan|leoht hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 and þu|þa|se manigfealdan|manigfeald min geþoht . 
 getacnian me|ic , tungol hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 þær selast su sawol|sawel minre|min 
 toh|to gemearcenne meotudes willan|willa , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|se geþeon þingian|þing gehwylc , 
 and on|an me|ic self , soþfæst cyning , 
 rædan|ræd aræran . regnþeof nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan 
 on|an sceadan|scead sceþþan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic scyppendum 
 wuldorcyning waccor hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 rice dryhten , þonne|se min|ic rædan|ræd wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 forgif me|ic toh|to lisse , lifgende god , 
 bitter|bitor|biter bealodæde . ic þu|þa|se bot gemunan , 
 cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , cuman|ancuman toh|to , gif ic motan|mot . 
 forgif þu me|ic , min|ic frea , feortan and ondgiet 
 and geþyld and gemynd þingian|þing gehwilc 
 þær|se þu me|ic , soþfæst cyning , sendan wylle 
 toh|to cunnunge . nu þu const on|an mec 
 firendæd fela , feormian|feorm mec hwæþre , 
 meotod , for|faran þinne|þin milts , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic micel fremman|fremede 
 grimm|grim gylta þonne|se me|ic god lifan ; 
 habban ic þonne|se þearf þæt|se ic þin seþeah , 
 halig|haleg heofoncyninges , hyldo getilge 
 leorendum dæg|dah|dag , lif æfter oþrum|oþer|oðer 
 geseon and gesece , þæt|se me|ic siððan þær 
 unnan arfæst god ecan dream , 
 lif alyfan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se lætlicor 
 betan bealodæde þonne|se bibodu wesan|seon|beon 
 halig|halga|haleg heofonmægnes . hwæt#2 , þu me|ic heran|her fela 
 . . . . . . forgifan|forgiefan . gesette|gesettan min hyht on|an þec , 
 forht foreþoncas , þæt|se hio fæstlice 
 stonde gestaðelad . onstep min hige , 
 gæsta god cyning , in gearu rædan|ræd . 
 nu ic fundian toh|to þu|þe|se , fæder moncynnes , 
 of þes weorold , nu ic witan þæt|se ic sculan , 
 ful unfyr fæc|facian ; feormian|feorm me|ic þonne|se , 
 wyrd waldend , in þinne|þin wuldordream , 
 and mec geleoran lætan|læt|lædan , leof dryhten , 
 geoc min gæstes . þonne|se wesan|seon|is gromra toh|to fela 
 æfest eaden|eadan , habban ic þonne|se 
 æt|etan frea frofor , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic ær on|an fyrst|first lutan 
 earnian arna . forlætan|forlædan mec engel seþeah 
 geniman on|an þinne|þin neawest , nergende cyning , 
 meotud , for|faran þinne|þin milts . þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe ic manian fela 
 æfter dogrum dydan|don , nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu mec næfre deofol seþeah 
 þu|þin lim lædan on|an laðne sið , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan hi|heo on|an se foreþonc gefeon motan 
 þywan|þy|þe|se þu|þe|se hi him|hi|he self sellan þynсan|þyncan 
 engel oferhydige þonne|se ece crist . 
 gelugon hi him|hi|he æt|etan þæm|þam|se geleafa ; forðam hi long|lange scul . . . , 
 werig wiht , wræc|wrecan þrowian . 
 forstond þu mec and gestyr him|hi|he , þonne|se storm cyme 
 minum|min gæstan ongegn ; geoc þonne|se , 
 mihtig dryhten , minre|min sawol|sawel , 
 gefreoþa hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo and gefeorma hi , fæder moncynnes , 
 hædre gehogode , hælan|helan , ece god , 
 meotod meahtum swiþan|swiþ . min|ic wesan|seon|is nu þu|þa|se 
 sefa synn fah , and ic ymb sawol|sawel wesan|seon|eoh 
 feam siþ forht , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu me|ic fela sellan 
 arna on|an þes eorþe|eorþ . þu|þe|se wesan|seon|nesan eall|eal þonc 
 meorda and miltsian|milts , þær|se þu me|ic sellan . 
 no se earninga ænig wesan|seon|beon mid ; 
 hwæþre ic me|ic eall|eal se ellen wylle 
 habban and hlyhhan and me|ic hyhtan toh|to , 
 frætwian mec on|an ferðweg and fundian 
 self toh|to þæm|þam|se siþ þu|þe|se ic asettan sculan , 
 gæstan|gan gearwian , and me|ic þæt|se eal for|faran god þolian 
 bliþe mod , nu ic gebunden|gebindan|bindan wesan|seon|eoh 
 fæstan|fæst in minum|min ferþe . huru me|ic frea witeð 
 sum þær|se synn|syn þu|þe|se ic me|ic self nesan|neh|ne conn 
 ongietan gleawlice . god ic habban 
 abelgan , breogo|brego moncynnes ; forðam ic þus bittre wearð 
 gewitnad for|faran þes weorold , swa min|ic gewyrhto wesan|seon|beon 
 micel for|faran mann , þæt|se ic martirdom 
 deop adreogan . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|eoh ic dema gleaw , 
 wis for|faran weorude ; forðam ic þes word sprecan 
 fus on|an ferþe , swa me|ic on|an frymþ gelomp 
 yrmþu ofer eorþe|eorþ , þæt|se ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þolade 
 gear gehwylc ( god eall|eal þonc ! ) 
 modearfoþa micel þonne|se on|an oþrum|oþer|oðer , 
 fyrhto in folc ; forðam ic afysed wesan|seon|eoh 
 earm of minum|min eþel . nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan se anhoga , 
 leodwynn leas , lengan|leng|lange drohtian , 
 wineleas wræcca , ( wesan|seon|is him|hi|he wrað meotud ) , 
 gnornað on|an hit|his|he geoguþ , 
 and him|hi|he ælc mælan|mæl mann fullestað , 
 ycað hit|his|he yrmþu , and he þæt|se eal þolað , 
 sarcwide secg , and him|hi|he bið wifcynn|hosp|flet|a sefa geomor , 
 mod morgenseoc . ic bi|be me|ic tylgust 
 secg þes sarspel and ymb siþ sprecan , 
 longunge fus , and on|an lah|lagu þence , 
 nytan min|ic 
 hwy ic gebycge bitan|bat on|an sæwe , 
 fleotan on|an faroðe ; nagan ic fela gold 
 nesan|neh|ne huru se freond , þu|þe|se me|ic gefylste 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se siðfate , nu ic me|ic self nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 for|faran minum|min wonæhtum willan|willa adreogan . 
 wudu motan|mot him|hi|he weaxan , wyrdan|wyrd bidan , 
 tan lædan ; ic for|faran tælan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 ænig moncynnes mod gelufian 
 eorl on|an eþel . eala dryhten min|ic , 
 meahtig mundbora ! þæt|se ic wesan|seon|eoh mod seoc , 
 bittre abelgan , wesan|seon|is seon|seo|se bot æt|etan þu|þe|se 
 gelong æfter lif . ic on|an sunnan|leoht nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 butan earfoþe ænge þingian|þing 
 feasceaft hæle|hælan|helan folde . . .unian ; 
 þonne|se ic me|ic toh|to fremþum freogan|freod habban , 
 cyðþu gecwe . . . me|ic wesan|seon|beon wifcynn|hosp|flet|a cearu simble 
 lufe toh|to lean , swa ic alibban nu . 
 git|gietan|geotan beon þæt|se selast , þonne|se mann|man him|hi|he self nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 wyrdan|wyrd onwendan , þæt|se he þonne|se wel þolian . 
 
 huru , se behofað hæleða æghwylc 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he sawol|sawel sið self geþencan , 
 hu þæt|se bið deoplic þonne|se se deað cymeð , 
 asyndreð þu|þa|se sybbe þu|þe|se ær samod wesan|seon|beon , 
 liс|lic and sawol|sawel ! lang bið siððan 
 þæt|se se gast nimeð æt|etan god self 
 swa wite|witan swa wuldor|seolh|bearm , swa him|hi|he on|an weorold ær 
 efne|efnan|efen þæt|se eorðfæt ær gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . 
 sculan se gast cuman|cuma geohðum hremig , 
 simble ymbe|ymb seofon niht|neaht sawol|sawel findan 
 se lichoman þu|þe|se hi|heo ær lange|lang wegan , 
 þri hund|1000 wintra|winter , butan ær þeodcyning , 
 ælmihtig god , ende weorold 
 wyrcan willan , weoruda dryhten . 
 cleopað þonne|se swa cearful cealdan rædan|reord , 
 spreceð grimlice se gast toh|to þæm|þam|se dust : 
 " hwæt#2 , druh þu dreorega , toh|to hwinan dreссan þu me|ic , 
 eorþ|eorðe fulnes eal forwisnad , 
 lames gelicnes ! lutan þu gemunan 
 toh|to hwinan þinne|þin sawol|sawel þingan|þing siðþan weorþan , 
 siððan of lichoman lædan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ! 
 hwæt#2 , wite|witan þu me|ic , werig ! hwæt#2 , þu huru wyrm gyfl 
 lutan geþenсan|geþencan , þu|þa|se þu lustgryrum eall|eal 
 ful geeodest , hu þu on|an eorþ|eorðe sculan 
 wyrm toh|to witan|wist ! hwæt#2 , þu on|an weorold ær 
 lutan geþenсan|geþencan hu þes wesan|seon|is þus lang hider ! 
 hwæt#2 , þu|þe|se la engel ufan of roderum 
 sawol|sawel onsendan þurh hit|his|he sylfes hand , 
 meotod ælmihtig , of hit|his|he mægenþrymme , 
 and þu|þe|se gebycgan blod þywan|þy|þe|se halig|halga|haleg , 
 and þu me|ic mid þywan|þy|þe|se heard hungor gebindan 
 and gehæftnedest hell|hel wite|wita ! 
 eardian ic þu|þe|se on|an innan . nesan|neh|ne magan ic þu|þe|ðe of cuman|cuma , 
 flæsc befon , and me|ic fyrenlustas 
 þin geþringan . þæt|se me|ic þynсan|þyncan ful oft 
 þæt|se hit wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon xxx þusend wintra|winter 
 toh|to þin deaðdæge . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic uncres gedal onbidan 
 earfoþlice|earfoðlice . nesan nu huru se ende toh|to god ! 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þu þu|þe|se witan|wist wlanc and wine|win sæd , 
 þrymful þunedest , and ic ofþyrsted wesan|seon|beon 
 god lichoman , gast drynces . 
 forðam þu nesan|neh|ne hycgan heran|her on|an lif , 
 siððan ic þu|þe|ðe on|an weorold wunian sculan , 
 þæt|se þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þurh flæsc and þurh fyrenlustas 
 strang gestryned and gestaðolod þurh me|ic , 
 and ic wesan|seon|beon gast on|an þu|þe|ðe fram god sendan . 
 næfre þu me|ic wiþ|wið swa heard hell|hel wite|wita 
 nesan|neh|ne generian þurh þinne|þin nied lust . 
 sculan þu min gesynta sceame þrowian 
 on|an ðam|se myclan dæge|dæg þonne|se eall|eal mannian|mann cynn 
 se ancenned ealle|eall|eal gesamnað . 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon þu þon|se leof nænig lifigendra 
 mann toh|to gemæcca , nesan|neh|ne modor nesan|neh|ne fæder 
 nesan|neh|ne nænig gesybban , þonne|se se sweartian|sweart hrefen , 
 siððan ic ana|an of þu|þe|ðe ut siðode 
 þurh se sylfes hand þu|þe|se ic ær onsendan wesan|seon|beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan þu|þe|se nu heonan adon hyrsta þu|þa|se reada|read 
 nesan|neh|ne gold nesan|neh|ne seolfor nesan|neh|ne þinne|þin god nan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þinne|þin bryd bugan|beah|beag nesan|neh|ne þu|þin boldwela , 
 nesan|neh|ne nan þær|se god þu|þe|se þu iu agan , 
 acan|ac heran|her sceolon onbidan ban bereafian , 
 besliten synum , and þu|þe|se þu|þin sawel sculan 
 minum|min unwillum oft gesecan , 
 wemman þu|þe|se mid word , swa þu wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan toh|to me|ic . 
 wesan|seon þu nu dumb and dufan|deaf , nesan|neh|ne synt þin dream awiht . 
 sculan ic þu|þe|ðe niht swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah nede gesecan , 
 synn gesargod , and eft sona fram þu|þe|se 
 hweorfan on|an hancred , þonne|se halig mann 
 lifiendum god lofsang doð , 
 sec þu|þa|se ham þu|þe|se þu me|ic heran|her scrife , 
 and þu|þa|se arleas eardungstowe , 
 and þu|þe|se sculan heran|her moldwyrmas manig|manian ceowan , 
 slitan sarlice sweart wiht , 
 gifre and grædig . nesan|neh|ne synt þin æht awihte 
 þu|þe|se þu heran|her on|an molde mann eowan . 
 forðam þu|þe|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon sel swiðe|swiðan mycle 
 þonne|se þu|þe|se wesan|seon|beon ealle|eall|eal eorþ|eorðe sped , 
 ( butan þu hi|heo gedælan dryhten self ) , 
 þær þu weorþan æt|etan frymþ fugel oððe fisc on|an sæ , 
 oððe on|an eorþ|eorðe neotan|neat ætes tilian , 
 feldgangende feoh butan snytro , 
 oððe on|an westen|westan wilde deore|deor 
 þæt|se wyrreste , þær swa god willan , 
 ge þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon wyrm cynn 
 þæt|se grimmeste , þær swa god willan , 
 þonne|se þu æfre on|an molde munan|mann|man geweorþan 
 oððe æfre fulwihtan|fulwiht onfon sculan . 
 þonne|se þu for|faran wit begen andwyrdan sculan 
 on|an ðam|se micel dæge|dæg , þonne|se mann beoð 
 wundian|wund onwrigene , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe on|an weorold ær 
 fyrenfulle mann fyrn gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 þonne wyle dryhten self dæd gehyran 
 hæleða gehwilc , heofena scippend , 
 æt|etan eall|eal mannian|mann gehwæs muðes rædan|reord 
 wund|windan wiðerlean . acan|ac hwæt#2 wylt þu þær 
 on|an þæm|þam|se domdæge dryhten secgan gewinnan|geblandan 
 þonne|se nesan|neh|ne bið nan na toh|to se lytel lið on|an lim aweaxan , 
 þæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne sculan for|faran an gehwylc onsundrum 
 rihtan|riht agildan , þonne|se reðe bið 
 dryhten æt|etan þæm|þam|se dom . acan|ac hwæt#2 don wit wit gewinnan|geblandan 
 sculan witan þonne|se eft ætsomne siððan brucan 
 swylcra yrmða , swa þu wit heran|her ær scrife ! " 
 fyrnað þus þæt|se flæschord , sceall þonne|se feran onweg , 
 sec hellegrund , nallæs heofondreamas , 
 dæd gedrefan|drefan . ligeð dust þær hit wesan|seon|beon , 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan him|hi|he ondsware ænig gehatan , 
 geomor gast , geoc oððe frofor . 
 bið þæt|se heafod tohliden , hand toliðode , 
 geaglas toginene , goma toslitene , 
 sin beoð asocene , swyra becowen , 
 finger tohrorene . 
 rib reafiað reðe wyrm , 
 beoð hira|hi tunge totogenne on|an tynan|tin healf 
 hungregum toh|to frofor ; forðam hi|heo nesan|neh|ne magan huxlicum 
 word wrixlian wiþ|wið se werian gast . 
 gifer hatan se wyrm , þu|þe|se þu|þa|se eaglas beoð 
 nædl scearpran . se genedan toh|to 
 ærest|ær eall on|an þæm|þam|se eorðscræfe , 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se tunge totyhð and þu|þa|se teð þurhsmyhð 
 and þu|þa|se eage þurheteð ufan on|an þæt|se heafod 
 and toh|to ætwelan oðer gerymeð , 
 wyrm toh|to witan|wist , þonne|se þæt|se werian 
 liс|lic acolod bið þæt|se he lange|lang ær 
 werian|weorod mid wædum . bið þonne|se wyrm gifel , 
 æt|etan on|an eorþe|eorþ . þæt|se mæg|magan æghwylcum 
 mann toh|to gemynd , modsnotra gehwa ! 
 þonne bið hyhtlicre þæt|se se halig sawel 
 færeð toh|to ðam|se flæsc , frofor bewindan . 
 bið þæt|se ærende|ærend eadiglicre 
 findan on|an ferhðe . mid gefea seceð 
 lust þæt|se lamfæt þæt|se hi|heo ær lange|lang wegan . 
 þonne|se þu|þa|se gast god word sprecað , 
 snottre , sigefæst , and þus soþlice|soðlice 
 se lichoman lust gretan : 
 " wine|win leofesta , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe wyrm git 
 gifre gretan , nu wesan|seon|is þu|þin gast cuman , 
 fæger gefrætewod , of min fæder romana , 
 are|ar bewindan . eala , min|ic dryhten , 
 þær ic þu|þe|se motan mid me|ic lædan , 
 þæt|se wit engel ealle|eall|eal geseon , 
 heofon wuldor|seolh|bearm , swylc swa þu me|ic ær heran|her scrife ! 
 fæstan þu on|an folde and gefyllan me|ic 
 god lichoman , gast drynces . 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þu on|an wædle , sellan me|ic wilnian geniht . 
 forðam þu nesan|neh|ne þurfan sceamian , þonne|se sceadene beon 
 þu|þa|se synful and þu|þa|se soðfæstan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se mære|mæran dæge|dæg , se þu me|ic giefan|gefan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|ðe hreowan|hreow þurfan|þearf heran|her on|an lif 
 eall|eal swa mycles swa þu me|ic sellan 
 on|an gemotstede mannian|mann and engel . 
 bygan þu þu|þe|se for|faran hæleðum and ahebban me|ic on|an eсe dream . 
 forðam me|ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a langian , leofost mannian|mann , 
 on|an minum|min hige heard , se þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se on|an þes hynðum witan 
 wyrm toh|to witan|wist , acan|ac þæt|se willan god , 
 þæt|se þu æfre þus laðlic legerbed сeosan|ceosan . 
 willan ic þu|þe|se þonne secgan þæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne sorgian , 
 forðam wit bioð gegæderode æt|etan god dom . 
 motan wit þonne|se ætsomne syþan brucan 
 and wit on|an heofon heahþungene beon|beo|bannan . 
 nesan|neh|ne þurfan wit beon|beo|bannan cearie æt|etan cyme dryhten , 
 nesan|neh|ne þære|se andswaru yfele|yfel habban 
 sorh|sorg in hreðre , acan|ac wit self magan 
 æt|etan ðam|se dom þær dæd agilpan , 
 hwilc earnunga uncre wesan|seon|beon . 
 witan ic þæt|se þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon on|an woruldrice 
 þeon|geþingan|geþeon þrymlice þysses " 
 
 monge wesan|nesan geond middangeard 
 unrimu cynn , þu|þe|se we æþelu|æþele nesan|neh|ne magan 
 ryhte areccan nesan|neh|ne riman|rim witan|wita ; 
 se wid wesan|nesan geond world innan 
 fugol and deore|deor foldhrerendra 
 wornas widsceope , swa wæter bibugeð 
 þes beorht bosm , brim grymetende , 
 sealtyþ geswing . we bi|be sum hyrdan|hyran 
 wrætlice gecynd wilde secgan 
 firas freamærne feorlondum on|an 
 eard weardian , eðles neotan 
 æfter dunscrafum . wesan|seon|is þæt|se deor pandher 
 bi|be noman hatan , se þu|þe|se niþþe|niþþas birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 wisfæste wer on|an gewrit cyþað 
 bi|be þæm|þam|se anstapan . se wesan|seon|is æghwam freond , 
 duguða estig , butan draca an , 
 þæm|þam|se he in ealle|eall|eal tidan|tid ondwrað libban 
 þurh yfel gehwylc þu|þe|se he geæfnan mæg|magan . 
 þæt|ðæt|se wesan|seon|is wrætlic deor , wundor scyne 
 hiwian|hiw gehwilc ; swa hæleð secgað , 
 gæsthalge guma , se iosephes 
 tunece wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon telga|telg gehwilc 
 bleo bregdan , þær|se beorht gehwylc 
 æghwæs ænliс oþrum|oþer|oðer lixan 
 dryht bearn , swa se deore|deor hiw , 
 blæc brigda gehwæs , beorht and scynra 
 wundor lixeð , se wrætliс 
 æghwylc oþrum|oþer|oðer , ænliс gien 
 and fægerra|fæger frætwum bliceð , 
 simble selliс . he hafað sundorgecynd , 
 milde , gemetfæst . he wesan|seon|is monþwære , 
 lufsum and leoftæl , nele laþ wiht 
 ængum geæfnan butan þæm|þam|se attorsceaþan , 
 hit|his|he fyrngeflitan , þu|þe|se ic ær for|faran sægan|seсgan|secgan . 
 simble fyllu|fyllan fægen|fægan , þonne|se foddor þigeð , 
 æfter þæm|þam|se gereordum ræste seceð 
 dygle stow under dunscrafum ; 
 þær se þeodwiga þreonihta fæc 
 swifeð on|an swefote , slæpan|slæp gebiesgad . 
 þonne|se ellenrof up astondeð , 
 þrymm gewelgad , on|an se þridda dæg , 
 sneome of slæpan|slæp . sweghleoþor cymeð , 
 woþa wynsumast þurh se wildres muð . 
 æfter þære|se stefn stenc ut cymeð 
 of þæm|þam|se wongstede , wynsum steam , 
 swettra and swiþra|swiþ swæcca gehwylc , 
 wyrtian|wyrt blostma|blostm and wudubledum , 
 eall|eal æþelicra eorþe|eorþ frætwum . 
 þonne|se of ceastrum and cynestolum 
 and of burgsalum beornþreat manig 
 farað foldwegum folc þryþum , 
 eoredcystum , ofestum gefysde , 
 dareðlacende ; deor efne|efnan|efen swa some 
 æfter þære|se stefn on|an se stenc farað . 
 swa wesan|seon|is dryhten god , dream rædend , 
 eall|eal eaðmede oþrum|oþer|oðer gesceaftum , 
 duguða gehwylcre , butan draca an , 
 attres ordfruman . þæt|se wesan|seon|is se eald feond , 
 se he gesælan in susl grund , 
 and gefetrade fyrn|fyren teag , 
 biþeahte þreanyd , and þywan|þy|þe|se þridda dæge|dæg 
 of digol arisan|ar , se þu|þe|se he deað for|faran we|us 
 þri niht|neaht þolade , þeon|þeodan engel , 
 sigorian|sigor sellend . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon swete stenc , 
 wlitig and wynsum geond weorold ealle|eall|eal . 
 siððan toh|to þæm|þam|se swicce soþfæst mann 
 on|an healf gehwone heap þringan 
 geond eall|eal ymbhwyrft eorþe|eorþ sceat . 
 swa se snottra cweðan sanctus paulus : 
 " monigfealde wesan|nesan geond middangeard 
 god ungnyðe þu|þe|se we|us toh|to giefu|giefan dæleð 
 and toh|to feorhnere fæder ælmihtig , 
 and se ange hyht eall|eal gesceafta , 
 uppe ge niþre . " þæt|se wesan|seon|is æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele stenc . 
 
 oft daedlata domæ forældit , 
 sigisitha gahuem , suuyltit thi ana|an . 
 
 feoh buan frofur firas gehwylc . 
 sculan þeah mannian|mann gehwylc miclun hydan|hit dælan 
 gif he willan|wil for|faran drihten dom hleotan . 
 ur buan anmod and oferhyrned , 
 felafrecne deor , feohteþ mid horn , 
 mære|mæran morstapa ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is modig wuht . 
 ðorn buan ðearle scearp ; ðegna gehwylc 
 anfeng ys yfyl , ungemetun reþe|reðe 
 mannian|mann gehwylcun þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he mid resteð . 
 os buan ordfruma ælс|ælc sprecan , 
 wisdom wraþu and wita frofur , 
 and eorl gehwa eadnys and tohiht . 
 ridan|rad buan on|an recyde rinc gehwylc 
 sefte , and swiþhwæt ðam|se þu|þe|ðe sitteþ on|an ufan 
 mearh mægenheardum ofer milpaþas . 
 cen buan cwicera gehwa cuþ|cunnan on|an fyr , 
 blican|blac and beorhtlic , byrneþ oftust 
 þær hi|heo æþeling inne restan . 
 gifu guma buan glengan|gleng and herenys , 
 wraþu and wyrþscype , and wræcna gehwa 
 ar and ætwist þu|þe|ðe buan oþer leas . 
 wennan|wenn brucan þu|þe|ðe сinan|cunnan wea lutan , 
 sar and sorh|sorg , and him|hi|he self habban 
 blæd and blis and eacan|eac byrga geniht . 
 hægl buan hwitust corn ; hwyrft hit of heofon lyft , 
 wealcian|wealcan hit wind scuras , weorþeþ hit toh|to wæter siððan . 
 nyd buan nearu|nearo on|an breostan , weorþeþ hi|heo þeah oft niþ bearn 
 toh|to helpan and toh|to hæle|hælan|helan gehwæðer , gif hi|heo hit|his|he hlystan æror . 
 wesan|seon|is buan oferceald , ungemetum slidor , 
 glisnian glæshluttur , gimm gelicust , 
 flor forst geworuht , fæger ansyn . 
 gear buan guma hyht , se god læteþ , 
 halig heofon cyning , hruse syllan 
 beorht bled beorn and ðearfum . 
 eoh buan utan unsmeþe treow , 
 heard , hruse fæstan|fæst , hyrdan|hyran|hirde fyr , 
 wyrtrumun underwreþyd , wyn on|an eþel . 
 peorð buan simble plegian and hlehter 
 wlanc þær wigan|wiga sittan 
 on|an beorsele bliþe ætsomne . 
 eolhx secg eard habban oftust on|an fenn , 
 wexeð on|an wature , wundian grimman|grimm|grim , 
 blod breneð beorn gehwylcne 
 þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he ænig onfon gedeð . 
 sigel semannum simble beon on|an hihte , 
 ðonn hi|heo he ferian ofer fisc beþ , 
 oþ hi|heo brimhengest bringan toh|to land|finna . 
 tir beon tacnian|tacn|tacen sum|su , healdeð trywa wel 
 wiþ æþeling , wifcynn|hosp|flet|a beon on|an færylde , 
 ofer nihtian|niht|neaht genip næfre swican . 
 beorcan|beorc buan bled leas , bereþ efne|efnan|efen swa þeah 
 tan butan tudder , beon on|an telga|telg wlitig , 
 heah on|an helm hrysted fæger , 
 leodan leaf , lyft getenge . 
 eh buan for|faran eorlum æþeling wyn , 
 hors hofe|hof wlanc , þær him|hi|he hæleþ|hæle|hælan ymbe|ymb , 
 welege on|an wicgum , wrixlan sprecan , 
 and beon unstyllum æfre frofur . 
 munan|mann|man buan on|an myrgþe hit|his|he magan|maga leof ; 
 sculan þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah an gehwylc oðer swican|swica , 
 for|faran ðam|se dryhten wyle dom sinnan|sin 
 þæt|se earm flæsc eorþe|eorþ betæcan . 
 lah|lagu buan leode|leoda|leod langsum þynсan|geþyncan , 
 gif hi|heo sculun neþan on|an naca tealtum , 
 and hi|heo sæyþ swyþ|swyðe|swiðe bregaþ , 
 and se brimhengest bridles nesan|neh|ne gymeð . 
 ing wesan|seon|beon ærest|ær mid eastdenum 
 seon|geseon secgun , oþ he siððan eft 
 ofer wegan gewitan , wæn æfter ran|ra ; 
 þus hearding se hæle|hælan|helan nemdun . 
 eðel buan oferleof æghwylcum mann , 
 gif he motan|mot þær riht and gerysena on|an 
 brucan on|an bold bleadum oftast . 
 dæg buan drihten sond , deore|deor mann , 
 mære|mæran metod sunnan|leoht , myrgþ and tohiht 
 eadig and earm , eall|eal bryce . 
 acan|ac buan on|an eorþe|eorþ elda bearn 
 flæsces fodor , ferian|feran gelome|gelom 
 ofer ganot bæþ ; garsecg fandian 
 hwæðer acan|ac habban æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele treowe|treow . 
 æsc beon oferheah , eldum dyre , 
 stiþ on|an staþule , stede rihte|rihtan|riht hylt , 
 þeah him|hi|he feohtan on|an firas manig . 
 yr buan æþeling and eorl gehwæs 
 wyn and wyrþmynd , buan on|an wicge fæger , 
 fæstlic on|an færeld , fyrdgeatewa sum|su . 
 ior buan eafix , and þeah wifcynn|hosp|flet|a brucan 
 fodres on|an folde , hafian|habban fæger eard , 
 wæter|wæt beweorpan , þær he wynn libban . 
 ear buan egle|eglan eorl gehwylcun , 
 ðonn fæstlice flæsc onginneþ , 
 hraw colian , hruse ceosan 
 blican|blac toh|to gebedda ; bled gedreosaþ , 
 wynn gewitan , wer geswican . 
 
 nu ic onsundrum|onsundran þu|þe|se secgan willan 
 . . . . . . treocyn ic tudor aweox ; 
 in mec æld . . . sculan ellor land 
 settan . . . . . . sealtan|sealt stream 
 . . .sse ful oft ic on|an bat 
 . . . . . . geseсan|gesecan 
 þær mec mondryhten min|ic . . . . . . 
 ofer heah hafu . wesan|seon|eoh nu heran|her cuman 
 on|an ceolþele , and nu cunnan sculan 
 hu þu ymb modlufan min frea 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hycge . ic gehatan durran 
 þæt|se þu þær tirfæste treowe|treow findan . 
 hwæt#2 , þec þonne|se biddan hettan|het|hedan|hatan se þes beam agrof 
 þæt|se þu sinchroden self gemunan 
 on|an gewitlocan wordbeotunga , 
 þu|þe|se git|gietan on|an ærdagum oft gesprecan , 
 þenden git|gietan motan on|an meoduburgum 
 eard weardigan , on|an land bugan , 
 freondscype fremman . he fæhþo adrifan 
 of sigeþeode . hatan nu self þu|þe|se 
 lust læran þæt|se þu lah|lagu drefan , 
 siððan þu gehyrdan|gehyran on|an hliþ ora 
 galan|gal geomor geac on|an bearwe . 
 nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu þec siððan siþ getwæfan , 
 lad gelettan lifgendne monn . 
 ongin merian|mere sec , mæw eþel , 
 onsittan sænacan , þæt|se þu suþ heonan 
 ofer merelade monnan findan , 
 þær se þeon|þeodan wesan|seon|is þu|þin on|an wena|wen . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan him|hi|he weorold willian|willa mara 
 on|an gemynd , se þu|þe|se he me|ic sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 þonne|se git geunnan alwaldend god 
 . . . . . . ætsomne siððan motan 
 secg and gesiþ s . . . 
 næglan beah|beag ; he genoh hafað 
 fædan gold . . . 
 . . . . .d elþeod eþel healdan|heald , 
 fæger|fæge folde . . . . . . . 
 . . . . . . .ra hæleþ|hæle , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se heran|her min|ic wine|win . . . . . . . 
 nyde bædan , naca ut aþrong , 
 and on|an yþian|yþ geong|gangan . . . . . . sculan 
 faran on|an flotweg , forðsiþes geornan|georn , 
 mengan merestreamas . nu se mann|man hafað 
 wea oferwinnan ; nesan him|hi|he wilnian gad , 
 nesan|neh|ne mearh nesan|neh|ne maðma nesan|neh|ne meododreama , 
 ænges ofer eorþe|eorþ eorlgestreona , 
 þeodnes dohtor , gif he þu|þin beneah 
 ofer eald gebeot incer twega . 
 gehyran ic ætsomne ( run sigel ) ( run ridan|rad ) geador 
 ( run ear ) ( run wenan|wen ) and ( run mann ) aþ benemnan , 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon and þu|þa|se winetreowe 
 be him|hi|he lifgendum læstan|læst willan , 
 þu|þe|se git|gietan on|an ærdagum oft gespræconn . 
 
 þus me|ic gesette|gesettan sanctus etan|et iustus 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan bocian|boc gleaw , bonus auctor , 
 ealdelm , æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele sceop , etiam fuit 
 ipselos on|an æðele angolsexna , 
 byscop on|an bretene . biblos ic nu sculan , 
 ponus etan|et pondus pleno cuman sensu , 
 geong geanoðe geomor iamiamque , 
 secgan soð , nalles leas , þæt|se him|hi|he simble wesan|seon|beon 
 euthenia oft on|an fylste , 
 æne on|an eðle ec se þu|þe|ðe se wesan|seon|is 
 yfel on|an gesecgan . etiam nusquam 
 nesan|neh|ne sculan ladigan labor quem tenet 
 encratea , acan|ac he ealneg sculan 
 boethia biddan georne|geornan|georn 
 þurh hit|his|he mod gemind micro in cosmo , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he drihten gyfe dinams on|an eorþ|eorðe , 
 fortis factor , þæt|se he forþ|forð simble 
 
 heran|her eadmund cyning , engel þeon|þeodan , 
 mæcgea mundbora , myrce gegan , 
 dyre dædfruma , swa dor scadeþ , 
 hwitanwyllesgeat and humbra ea , 
 brad brimstream . burh|burg fife , 
 ligoraceaster and lincylene 
 and snotingaham , swilce stanford eacan|eac 
 and deoraby . dæne wær æror 
 under norðmannum nyde gebegan 
 on|an hæþen hæfteclommum 
 lange|lang þrage , oþ hi|heo alysan eft 
 for|faran hit|his|he weorþscipe wiggendra hleo , 
 afera eadweardes , eadmund cyning . 
 
 se bið gefea fægrast þonne|se hi æt|etan frymþ gemetað , 
 engel and seon|seo|se eadig sawel ! ofgiefan hio þes eorþe|eorþ wynn , 
 forlæteð þes lænan dream , and hio wiþ þæm|þam|se lice gedæleð . 
 þonne cweðan se engel , ( hafað yldran had ) , 
 greteð gæstan|gan oþer|oðer , abeodeð him|hi|he god ærende|ærend : 
 " nu þu motan feran þider þu fundadest 
 long|lange and gelome|gelom . ic þec lædan sculan . 
 weg þu|þe|se wesan|nesan weþe , and wuldor sunnan|leoht 
 torht ontynan . wesan|seon nu tidfara 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg ham . " þær næfre hreowan|hreow cymeð , 
 edergong for|faran yrmþum , acan|ac þær beon engel dream , 
 sib and gesælignes , and sawol|sawlian|sawel ræst , 
 and þær wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to feorh gefeon motun , 
 dryman mid dryhten , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se hit|his|he dom heran|her 
 æfnað on|an eorþe|eorþ . he him|hi|he ece lean 
 healdeð on|an heofon , þær se hyhsta 
 eall|eal cyning cyning ceastrum wealdeð . 
 þæt|ðæt|se wesan|nesan þu|þa|se getimbru þu|þe|se no tydriað , 
 nesan|neh|ne þæm|þam|se for|faran yrmþum þu|þe|se þær in wuniað 
 lif aspringeð , acan|ac him|hi|he bið lengan hu sel ; 
 geoguþ brucað and god miltsian|milts . 
 þider soðfæstra sawol|sawlian|sawel motun 
 cuman|cuma æfter cwealm , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se heran|her cristes æ 
 lærað and læstað , and hit|his|he lof rærað ; 
 oferwinnað þu|þa|se awyrgdan gæstas , bigytað him|hi|he wuldor ræste , 
 hwider sculan se monnes mod astigan , 
 ær oþþe|oððe æfter , þonne|se he hit|his|he an heran|her 
 gæstan|gan bigonge , þæt|se se god motan|mot , 
 womm clæne , in geweald cuman|cuma . 
 monge wesan|nesan geond middangeard 
 had under heofon , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se in halig 
 riman|rim arisan . we se ryht magun 
 æt|etan æghwylcum an gehyran , 
 gif we halig bebod healdan|heald willað ; 
 mæg|magan nu snottor guma sælan|sæl brucan 
 god tid , and hit|his|he gæstan forþ|forð 
 weg willian . weorold wesan|seon|is onhreran , 
 colian cristes lufu , sindan costinga 
 geond middangeard monge arisene , 
 swa þæt|se gear iu god spelbodan 
 word sægan|seсgan|secgan and þurh witedom 
 eal anemnan , swa hit nu gongeð . 
 ealdað eorþe|eorþ blæd æþelu|æþelian|æþele|æþel|æðele gehwylcre 
 and of wlite|wlitan wendað wæstmian|wæstm gecynde|gecynd ; 
 bið seon|seo|se siþ tidan|tid sæd gehwilc 
 mætre in mægen . forðam se mann|man nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 toh|to þes weorold wyrp gehycgan , 
 þæt|se he we|us fæger gefea bringan 
 ofer þu|þa|se niþ þu|þe|se we nu dreogað , 
 ærþon endian ealle|eall|eal gesceafte 
 þe|þa|ða|se he gesette|gesettan on|an six dæg|dah|dag , 
 þe|þa|ða|se nu under heofon had cennað , 
 micel and mætan|metan . wesan|seon|is þes middangeard 
 dæl gedælan|dælan . dryhten sceawað 
 hwær þu|þa|se eardian þu|þe|se hit|his|he æ healdan ; 
 gesiht he þu|þa|se dom dogra gehwylc 
 wonian and wendan of woruldryhte 
 þe|þa|ða|se he gesette|gesettan þurh hit|his|he sylfes word . 
 he fela findeð , fea beoð gecorene . 
 sum him|hi|he se had hlisa willað 
 wegan on|an word and þu|þa|se weorc nesan|neh|ne doð . 
 bið him|hi|he eorðwela ofer þæt|se ece lif 
 hyht hyhst , se gehwylc sculan 
 foldbuend fremde geweorþan . 
 forðam hi nu hyrwað halig mod , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he toh|to heofon hyсgan|hyg|hycgan staþeliað , 
 witan þæt|se se eðel ece bideð 
 eall|eal þære|se mengu þu|þe|se geond middangeard 
 dryhten þeowiað and se deore ham 
 wilniað bi|be gewyrhtum . swa þes woruldgestreon 
 on|an þu|þa|se mære|mæran god bimutad weorþað , 
 þonne þæt|se gegyrnað þu|þa|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he god egsian 
 hleonian ofer heafod . hi þywan|þy|þe|se hyhstan beoð 
 þrymm geþreade , þes lifes|lif 
 þurh bibodu brucað and se betran forþ|forð 
 wyscað and wenian|wenan . wuldor bycgað , 
 sellað ælmesse , earm frefrað , 
 beoð rummode ryhtra gestreona , 
 lufiað mid lacu|lac þu|þa|se þu|þe|se læs|lesan agun , 
 dæghwam dryhten þeowian . he hyra|hyr|hira|hi dæd sceawað . 
 sum þu|þa|se wuniað on|an westen , 
 secað and gesittað sylfra willum 
 ham on|an heolstrum . hi se heofoncundan 
 bold bidað . oft him|hi|he broga toh|to 
 laðne gelædeð , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he lifes|lif ofonn , 
 eaweð him|hi|he egsan , hwilum|hwil idel wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 brægdwis bona hafað began cræftan|cræft , 
 eahteð anbuendra . for|faran him|hi|he engel stondað , 
 gearu mid gæsta wæpn|wæpen , beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi geoc gemyndig , 
 healdað halig feorh , witan hyra|hyr|hira|hi hyht mid dryhten . 
 þæt|se synd þu|þa|se gecostan cempa þu|þa|se þæm|þam|se cyninge|cyning þeowað , 
 se næfre þu|þa|se lean alegeð þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hit|his|he lufu|lufe adreogeð . 
 magun we nu nemnan þæt|se we|us neah gewearð 
 þurh halig had gecyþan|cyþan , 
 hu guðlac hit|his|he in god willan|willa 
 mod gereссan , munan|mann|man eall|eal forseon , 
 eorðlic æþelu|æþele , upp gemunan 
 ham in heofon . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon hyht toh|to þæm|þam|se , 
 siððan he inlyhte se þu|þe|se lifes|lif wegan|weg 
 gæstum gearwað , and him|hi|he giefu|giefan sellan 
 engelcunde , þæt|se he ana|an onginnan 
 beorgseþel bugan , and hit|his|he blæd god 
 þurh eaðmedu eall|eal gesellan , 
 se þu|þe|se he on|an geoguþ bigan sculan 
 weorold wynn . he weard biheold 
 halig of heofon , se þæt|se hluttre mod 
 in se gæstes god georne|geornan|georn trymman . 
 hwæt#2 , we hyrdan|hyran oft þæt|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer 
 in þu|þa|se ær ældu gelufade 
 frecnessa fela ! fyrst wesan|seon|beon swa þeana 
 in god dom , hwonne guðlace 
 on|an hit|his|he ondgietan engel sellan 
 þæt|se him|hi|he sweðraden synn|syn lust . 
 tidan|tid wesan|seon|beon toweard ; he twegen ymb 
 weard wacedon , þu|þa|se gewin dreogan , 
 engel dryhten and se atela gæstan|gan . 
 nalæs hi him|hi|he gelice lar beran 
 in hit|his|he mod gemynd mongum tid . 
 oþer|oðer him|hi|he þes eorþe|eorþ ealle|eall|eal sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 lænan|læn under lyft , and þu|þa|se long god 
 herian on|an heofon , þær halig 
 sawol|sawlian|sawel gesittað in sigorwuldor 
 dryhten dream ; he him|hi|he dæd lean 
 georne|geornan|georn gieldeð , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hit|his|he giefu|giefan willað 
 þicgan toh|to þonce and him|hi|he þes weorold 
 uttor lætan þonne|se þæt|se ece lif . 
 oþer|oðer he scyhte , þæt|se he sceaþa gemot 
 niht sœ̄сan|seсan|secan and þurh neþinge 
 winnan æfter weorold , swa doð wræcmæcgas 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se nesan|neh|ne bimurnað monnes feorh 
 se þu|þe|se him|hi|he toh|to honda huþu gelædeð , 
 butan hi þywan|þy|þe|se reaf ræde|rædan motan . 
 swa hi he trymman on|an twegen|twa healf 
 oþþæt se gewinn weoroda dryhten 
 on|an se engel don|dom ende gereссan . 
 feond wesan|seon|beon geflymed ; siþ þæm|þam|se frofor gæstan|gan 
 in guðlaces geoc gewunade , 
 lufade he and læran lengan hu geornor , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he leofedan land wynn , 
 bold on|an beorhge . oft þær broga cuman 
 egeslic and uncuþ , ealdfeonda nið , 
 searocræftum swiþan|swiþ ; hi him|hi|he self hyra|hyr|hira|hi 
 onsyn ywdon , and þær ær fela 
 setl gesittan . þanan sið teon 
 wid waðe , wuldor byscyrede , 
 lyftlacende . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se land stow 
 bimiþen for|faran mann , oþþæt meotud onwreon 
 beorgan|beorg on|an bearwe , þu|þa|se se bytla cuman 
 se þær halig ham aræran , 
 nales þywan|þy|þe|se he gieman þurh gitsunga 
 læn lifwelan , acan|ac þæt|se land god 
 fæger|fæge gefreoþode , siððan feond oferwon 
 cristes cempa . he gecostad wearð 
 in gemyndig mann tid , 
 se þu|þe|se nu gena þurh gæstlicu 
 wundor he weorðiað and hit|his|he wisdom 
 hlisa healdað , þæt|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg þeowan|þeow 
 ellen gegan , þu|þa|se he ana|an gesittan 
 dygle stow . þær he dryhten lof 
 reссan|reccan and ræran ; oft þurh rædan|reord abeodan , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se þrowera þeaw lufedon , 
 god ærende , þu|þa|se him|hi|he gæstan|gan onwreon 
 lifes|lif snyttru , þæt|se he hit|his|he lichoman 
 wynn forwyrnan and woruldblissa , 
 sefte setl and symbeldaga , 
 swilce eacan|eac idel eage wynn , 
 gierelan gielplices . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon god egsian 
 mara in gemynd þonne|se he menniscum 
 þrymm æfter þonce þegan willan . 
 god wesan|seon|beon guðlac ! he in gæstan bær|beran 
 heofoncundne hyht , hælu geræhte 
 ecan lifes|lif . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon engel neah , 
 fæle|feolan freoðuweard , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se fearh sum|su 
 mearclond gesittan . þær he mongum wearð 
 bysen on|an brytene , siððan biorg gestigan 
 eadig oretta , ondwiges heard . 
 gyrwan he georne|geornan|georn mid gæstlicum 
 wæpn|wæpen wong bletsade , 
 him|hi|he toh|to ætstælle ærest|ær aræran 
 cristes rode|rod , þær se cempa oferwon 
 frecnessa fela . from wurdun monge 
 god þrowera ; we se guðlaces 
 deorwyrðne dælan|dæl dryhten cennað . 
 he him|hi|he sige|sigan|seon sellan and snyttrucræft , 
 mundbyrd meahta , þonne|se mengu cuman 
 feond færscytum fæhðe ræran . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hi æfest anforlætan , 
 acan|ac toh|to guðlaces gæstan gelæddun 
 frasung fela . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon fultuman|fultum neah , 
 engel he ellen trymman , þonne|se hi him|hi|he yrre|irre hweopan , 
 frecne|frecen|frec fyr wylme . stodan him|hi|he on|an feðehwearfum , 
 cweþan|cweðan þæt|se he on|an þæm|þam|se beorgan|beorg byrnan sculan 
 and hit|his|he lichoman lig forswelgan , 
 þæt|se hit|his|he earfeþu eal gelimpan 
 modcearu mæg , gif he mann dream 
 of þæm|þam|se orlege eft nesan|neh|ne willan 
 self gesecan , and hit|his|he sibb|sib ryht 
 mid moncynne micel|mare|mara cræftan|cræft 
 willum bewitigan , lætan wræc|wrecan stille|stillan . 
 swa him|hi|he yrsade , se for|faran ealle|eall|eal sprecan 
 feond mengu . no þywan|þy|þe|se forhtra wesan|seon|beon 
 guðlaces gæstan|gan , acan|ac him|hi|he god sellan 
 ellen wiþ þæm|þam|se egsan þæt|se se ealdfeondes 
 scyldigra scolu scome þrowedon ; 
 wesan|seon|beon teonsmiðas torn full|ful , 
 cweþan|cweðan þæt|se him|hi|he guðlac eacan|eac god self 
 earfeþa micel ana|an gefremian , 
 siððan he for|faran wlencu|wlencan on|an westen|westan 
 beorg brecan , þær hi bidinge , 
 earm ondsacan , æror mostun 
 æfter tintergum tid brucan , 
 þonne hi of waþ werig cwoman 
 restan ryneþragum , rowan|row gefegon ; 
 wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he seon|seo|se gelyfan þurh lytel fæc . 
 standan seon|seo|se dygle stow dryhten in gemynd 
 idel and æmen , eþelriehte feor , 
 bidan bisæce betran hyrdes . 
 toh|to þon|se ealdfeondas ondan noman , 
 swa hi|heo singal sorh|sorg dreogað . 
 nesan|neh|ne motun hi|heo on|an eorþe|eorþ eardes brucan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hi lyft swefeð in leoma ræstum , 
 acan|ac hi hleolease ham þoliað , 
 in cearu cwiþað , cwealm wiscað , 
 willan þæt|se him|hi|he dryhten þurh deaðes cwealm 
 toh|to hyra|hyr|hira|hi earfeða ende geryme . 
 nesan|neh|ne mostun hi guðlaces gæstan sceþþan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þurh sarslege sawol|sawel gedælan 
 wiþ|wið lichoman , acan|ac hi ligesearwum 
 ahofun hearmstafas , hleahtor aleсgan|alecgan , 
 sorh|sorg seofedon , þu|þa|se hi|heo swiðra oferstag 
 weard on|an wonge . sculan wræcmæcgas 
 ofgiefan gnornende grene beorg . 
 hwæþre hi þu|þa|se gena , god ondsacan , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan sarstafum , swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe gehatan , 
 þæt|se he deaþ gedal dreogan sculan , 
 gif he lengan|leng|lange biddan|bidan laþran gemotes , 
 hwonne hi mid mengu micel|mare|mara cuman , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se for|faran hit|his|he lif lutan sorgedon . 
 guðlac him|hi|he ongeagn þingian , cweðan þæt|se hi gielpan nesan|neh|ne þorftan 
 dæd wiþ|wið dryhten meahtum . " þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ge me|ic deað hatan|gehatan , 
 mec willan|wil wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se niþ genergan se þu|þe|se eowrum nydum wealdeð . 
 on|an wesan|seon|is ælmihtig god , se mec mæg|magan eaðe gescyldan ; 
 he min|ic feorg freoþað . ic ge|eowan|eow fela willan 
 soþian|soþ gesecgan . mæg|magan ic þes setl on|an ge|eowan|eow 
 butan earfeðum ana|an geðringan . 
 nesan|neh|ne eam|ea ic swa fealog , swa ic ge|eowan|eow for|faran stonde , 
 mann weorudes , acan|ac me|ic mara dælan|dæl 
 in godcund gæstgerynum 
 wunað and weaxeð , se me|ic wraþ healdeð . 
 ic me|ic an heran|her eaðe getimbre 
 hus and hleonað ; me|ic on|an heofon wesan|nesan 
 lar gelonge . mec se lutan tweogan 
 þæt|se me|ic engel toh|to ealle|eall|eal gelædeð 
 spowan spedan|sped spreca and dæd . 
 gewitað nu , awyrgan , werigmode , 
 from|fram þes eard þu|þe|se ge heran|her on|an stondað , 
 fleoð on|an feorweg . ic me|ic frið willan 
 æt|etan god gegyrnan ; nesan|neh|ne sculan min|ic gæstan|gan mid ge|eowan|eow 
 gedwola|gedwol dreogan , acan|ac mec dryhten hond 
 mundað mid mægen . heran|her sculan min|ic wese|wesan 
 eorðlic eþel , nales ge|eower lengan|leng|lange . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð breahtm hæfen . beorgan|beorg ymbstodan 
 hwearfum wræcmæcgas . woð up astag , 
 cearfulra cirm . cleopedon manig , 
 feond foresprecan , firen gielpan|gelpan : 
 " oft we ofersegon bi|be sæ tweonum 
 þeod þeaw , þræce modig , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se in gelimpan|gelimp lif wealdan . 
 no we oferhygdu an monnes 
 geond middangeard micel|mare|mara findan . 
 þu þæt|se gehatest þæt|se þu ham on|an we|us 
 gegan|gan willan , þu|þe|ðe wesan|seon god yrming . 
 bi|be hwon sculan þu lifgan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu land agan gewinnan|geblandan 
 nesan|neh|ne þec mann|man hider mos fedeð ; 
 beoð þu|þe|se hungor and þurst heard gewinnan , 
 gif þu gewitan swa wilde deor 
 ana|an from|fram eþele . nesan þæt|se onginnan wiht ! 
 geswican þes setl ! nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þec sellan rædan|ræd 
 mann|man gelæran|gelær þonne|se þes|þeoh|se mengu eall|eal . 
 we þu|þe|se beoð hold gif þu we|us hyran willan , 
 oþþe|oððe þec ungearo eft gesecað 
 micel|mare|mara mægen , þæt|se þu|þe|se mann|man nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 hondum hrinan , nesan|neh|ne þu|þin hra fealle|feallan 
 wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen wund . we þes wiс|wican|wic magun 
 fot afyllan ; folc in ðriceð 
 mearh þreatum and monfarum . 
 beoð þu|þa|se gebolgne , þu|þa|se þec breodwiað , 
 tredað þec and tergað , and hyra|hyr|hira|hi torn wrecað , 
 toberað þec blodig last ; gif þu ure|ur bidan þencest , 
 we þec niþ genægað . ongin þu|þe|se gener wilnian , 
 faran þær þu freond wennan|wenan|wen , gif þu þin feorh recce . " 
 gearu|gearo wesan|seon|beon guðlac , he god fremman|fremede 
 on|an ondsware and on|an ellen strong . 
 nesan|neh|ne wond he for|faran word , acan|ac hit|his|he wiþerbreocum 
 sorh|sorg gesægde , cuðe him|hi|he soð genog : 
 " wid wesan|seon|is þes westen|westan , wræcsetla fela , 
 eardas onhæle earm gæsta . 
 wesan|nesan wærloga þu|þe|se þu|þa|se wiс|wican|wic bugað . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ge þu|þa|se ealle|eall|eal ut abanne , 
 and ge|eowan|eow eacan|eac gewyrce widor sæce , 
 ge heran|her ateoð in þu|þa|se tornwræce 
 sigeleasne sið . no ic ge|eowan|eow sweord ongeagn 
 mid gebolgne hond oðberan þence , 
 weorold wæpen , nesan|neh|ne sculan þes wong god 
 þurh blodgyte gebuen weorðan , 
 acan|ac ic minum|min criste cweme|cweman þence 
 leofran lacu|lacan|lac . nu ic þes land gestigan , 
 fela ge me|ic eardian þurh idel word 
 abeodan habbað . nesan min|ic breostsefa 
 forht nesan|neh|ne fæge|fægan , acan|ac me|ic friðe healdeð 
 ofer mann cyn se þu|þe|se mægen gehwæs 
 weorc wealdeð . nesan me|ic wiht æt|etan ge|eowan|eow 
 leof gelong , nesan|neh|ne ge me|ic laþ wiht 
 gedon|gedo|don motun . ic wesan|seon|eoh dryhten þeowan|þeow , 
 he mec þurh engel oft afrefreð . 
 forðam mec longeþas lutan gegretað , 
 sorh|sorg sealdun , nu mec sawelcund 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde bihealdeð . wesan|seon|is min|ic hyht mid god , 
 nesan|neh|ne ic me|ic eorðwelan owiht sinnan|sin , 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic mid mod micles gyrne , 
 acan|ac me|ic dogra gehwa dryhten sendeð 
 þurh monnes hond min þearf . " 
 swa modgade , se wiþ|wið mongum standan , 
 awreðed weorðlice wuldor cempa 
 engel mægen . gewitan eal þanan 
 feond mengu . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon se fyrst micel 
 þu|þe|se hi|heo guðlace forgiefan þohtan . 
 he wesan|seon|beon on|an ellen and on|an eaðmedum , 
 bidan on|an beorgan|beorg , ( wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he botles neod ) , 
 forlætan longeþas lænra dream . 
 no he he wiþ|wið mann milts gedælan , 
 acan|ac gesynta bædan|biddan sawol|sawlian|sawel gehwylcre , 
 þonne|se he toh|to eorþ|eorðe on|an þæm|þam|se anade 
 hleor onhylde . him|hi|he of heofon wearð 
 onbryrded breostsefa bliðe gæstan . 
 oft eahtade , ( wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he engel neah ) , 
 hu þes weorold wynn þurfan 
 mid hit|his|he lichoman læsast brucan . 
 no him|hi|he for|faran egsan earm gæsta 
 treow getweode , nesan|neh|ne he tidan|tid forsittan 
 se þu|þe|se he for|faran hit|his|he dryhten dreogan sculan , 
 þæt|se he æreste ellen binoman 
 slæpa sluman oþþe|oððe sæne mod . 
 swa sculan oretta wifcynn|hosp|flet|a in hit|his|he mod 
 god compian , and hit|his|he gæstan|gan beran|bera 
 oft on|an ondan þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se eahta willan|wil 
 sawol|sawlian|sawel gehwylcre þær he gesælan mæg|magan . 
 simble hi guðlac in god willan|willa 
 from findan , þonne|se flygereowe 
 þurh nihtian|niht|neaht genip neosan cwoman , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se onhæle eardas werian , 
 hwæþre him|hi|he se wonges wyn sweðrade ; 
 woldun þæt|se him|hi|he toh|to mod for|faran monlufan 
 sorg geseсan|gesecan , þæt|se he siþ teon 
 eft toh|to eþel . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæt|se ongin swylc , 
 þonne he engel on|an þæm|þam|se anade 
 geornian gretan and him|hi|he giefu|giefan sellan , 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne magan meotudes willan|willa 
 longað gelettan , acan|ac he on|an se lareow 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gewunade . oft word bicwæð : 
 " huru , se bihofað , se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he halig gæstan|gan 
 wisað on|an willan|willa and hit|his|he weorc trymað , 
 laþað he liþe|liþ word , gehateð him|hi|he lifes|lif restan , 
 þæt|se he se latteowes lar hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo , 
 nesan|neh|ne lætan|lettan him|hi|he ealdfeond eft oncyrran 
 mod from|fram hit|his|he meotude . hu sculan min|ic cuman|cuma 
 gæstan|gan toh|to geoc , nemnan ic god syll 
 hyrsumne hige , þæt|se him|hi|he heorte geþonc 
 . . . . . . ær oþþe|oððe sið ende geweorðe , 
 þæt|se ge mec toh|to wundor|wund wegan motun . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan min|ic lichoma wiþ|wið þes lænan gesceaft 
 deað gedælan , acan|ac he gedreosan sculan , 
 swa þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe eall|eal þu|þe|se ic heran|her on|an stonde . 
 þeah ge min flæschoman fyr wylme 
 forgripan gromhydge gifre leсgan|lecgan , 
 næfre ge mec of þes word onwendað þendan mec min|ic gewitan gelæsteð . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ge he sar forsacan , nesan|neh|ne motan ge min sawol|sawel gretan , 
 acan|ac ge on|an betran gebringað . forðam ic gebidan willan 
 se þu|þe|se me|ic min|ic dryhten demeð . nesan me|ic se deaþ sorg . 
 þeah min|ic ban and blod buan twegen geweorþan 
 eorþe|eorþ toh|to eacan|eaca , min|ic se eca dælan|dæl 
 in gefea fareð , þær he fæger 
 botles bruceð . nesan þes beorg setl 
 meodumre nesan|neh|ne mara þonne|se hit mann dugan 
 se þu|þe|se in þrowingum þeodnes willan|willa 
 dæghwam dreogeð . nesan|neh|ne sculan se dryhten þeowan|þeow 
 in hit|his|he modsefa micel|mare|mara gelufian 
 eorþe|eorþ æhtwelan þonne|se hit|his|he an gemetan|gemet , 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he lichoman lad habban . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon eft swa ær ealdfeonda nið , 
 wroht onwylled ; woð oþer|oðer 
 nesan|neh|ne lythwon leoðode , þonne|se in lyft astag 
 ceargesta cirm . simble cristes lof 
 in guðlaces god mod 
 weaxan and wunade , and he weoruda god 
 freoðade on|an folde , swa he feorh gehwylc 
 healdeð in hælu , þær se hyra|hyr|hira|hi gæstan|gan 
 þihð in þeaw . he wesan|seon|beon þeara sum|su ; 
 nesan|neh|ne woh he æfter weorold , acan|ac he in wuldor ahebban 
 mod wynn . hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|beon mara þonne|se se gewinnan|geblandan 
 on|an oretta ussum tid 
 cempa gecyðeð þæt|se him|hi|he crist for|faran 
 woruldliс|weoroldlic micel wundrian|wundor|wund gecyðde . 
 he he scyld wiþ|wið sceðþendra 
 egle onfengum earm gæsta ; 
 wesan|seon|beon hi rowan toh|to ræsanne 
 gifre grap . no god willan 
 þæt|se seon|seo|se sawel se sar þrowade 
 in lichoman , lifan seþeana 
 þæt|se hi him|hi|he mid hondum hrinan motan , 
 and þæt|se frið wiþ|wið hi gefreoþad wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 hi he þu|þa|se hofun on|an þu|þa|se hean|heah lyft , 
 sellan him|hi|he magan ofer mann cynn , 
 þæt|se he for|faran eage eall|eal sceawian 
 under halig hyrda geweald 
 in mynsterum mann gebæru , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se hyra|hyr|hira|hi lifes|lif þurh lust brucan , 
 idel æht and oferwlencum , 
 gierelum gielplicum , swa bið geoguþ þeaw , 
 þær se ealdor egsian nesan|neh|ne styreð . 
 no þær þu|þa|se feond gefeon þurfan , 
 acan|ac se blæd hraðe gebrucan|gebrecan|brucan|brecan habban 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he alyfan wesan|seon|beon lytel hwil , 
 þæt|se hi hit|his|he lichoman lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne mostan 
 wite|wita wælan ; nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he wiht gescod 
 se þu|þe|se hi him|hi|he toh|to teonan þurhteon habban . 
 læddun he þu|þa|se of lyft toh|to þæm|þam|se leofestan 
 eard on|an eorþ|eorðe , þæt|se he eft gestigan 
 beorgan|beorg on|an bearwe . bonan gnornedon , 
 mænan murnan þæt|se hi monnes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 þream oferþunge , and swa þearfendlic 
 him|hi|he toh|to earfeðum ana|an cuman , 
 gif hi him|hi|he nesan|neh|ne magan micel|mare|mara sar 
 gyldan gyrnwræce . guðlac settan 
 hyht in heofon , hælu getreowde , 
 habban feond fon feorh gedyged . 
 wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se æreste earm gæsta 
 costung ofercuman . cempa wunade 
 bliþe on|an beorgan|beorg , wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he blæd mid god . 
 ðuhte him|hi|he on|an mod þæt|se se moncynnes 
 eadig wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon se þu|þe|se hit|his|he an heran|her 
 feorh gefreoðade , þæt|se him|hi|he feond hond 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se ytmestan ende nesan|neh|ne scode , 
 þonne|se him|hi|he se dryhten don|dom wisade 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se neah nydgedale . 
 hwæþre him|hi|he þu|þa|se gena gyrna gemyndig 
 edwitsprecan ermþu gehatan 
 torn teoncwidum . treow wesan|seon|beon gecyþan|cyþan , 
 se guðlace god leanode 
 ellen mid are|ar , þæt|se he ana|an gewon . 
 him|hi|he se werig gæstan|gan word sægan|seсgan|secgan : 
 " no we þu|þe|se þus swiðe|swiðan swencan þorftan , 
 þær þu fromlice freond lar 
 hyran willan , þu|þa|se þu hean|heah and earm 
 on|an þes orlege ærest|ær cuman , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu gehatan þæt|se þec halig gæstan|gan 
 wiþ|wið earfeþum eaðe gescilde , 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se myrcelse þu|þe|se þec monnes hond 
 from|fram þinne|þin onsyne æþelu|æþele|æþel ahwyrfde . 
 in þæm|þam|se mægwlite monge lifgað , 
 gyltum forgiefene ; nales god þigað , 
 acan|ac hi lichoman for|faran lufu|lufe cwemað 
 wist wynn . swa ge weorðmyndu 
 in dol dream dryhten gieldað . 
 fela ge for|faran mann miþað se þu|þe|se ge in mod gehycgað ; 
 nesan|neh|ne beoð eowre dæd dyrne , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ge hi in dygle gefremme . 
 we þec in lyft gelæddun , ofteon þu|þe|se land wynn , 
 woldun þu þu|þe|se self geseon|gesawan þæt|se we þec soð onstældun . 
 eall|eal þu se wite|witan awunne ; forðam þu hit onwendan nesan|neh|ne meahtes . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon agongen þæt|se him|hi|he god willan 
 æfter þrowinga þonc gegyldan 
 þæt|se he martyrhad mod gelufade , 
 sellan him|hi|he snyttru on|an sefa gehygd , 
 mægenfæste gemynd . he wiþ|wið mongum standan 
 ealdfeonda , ellen byldan , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan him|hi|he toh|to sorh|sorg þæt|se hi sigelease 
 se grene wong ofgiefan sceoldan : 
 " ge wesan|nesan forscadene , on|an ge|eowan|eow scyld siteð ! 
 nesan|neh|ne cunnan ge dryhten duguþ biddan , 
 nesan|neh|ne mid eaðmedum are|ar sec , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow alyfan lytel hwil , 
 þæt|se ge min|ic onwald aginnan|agan motan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne ge þæt|se geþyldum þicgan woldan , 
 acan|ac mec yrringa up gelædan , 
 þæt|se ic of lyft londa getimbru 
 geseon magan . wesan|seon|beon me|ic swegl|swegel sunnan|leoht 
 torht ontynan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic torn dreogan . 
 settan me|ic in edwit þæt|se ic eaðe forberan 
 rum regulas and reþe|reðe mod 
 geong mann in god templ|tempel ; 
 woldan þywan|þy|þe|se gehyrwan halig lof , 
 sohtun þu|þa|se sæmra , and þu|þa|se sellan no 
 demdan æfter dæd . nesan|neh|ne beoð þu|þa|se dyrne swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah . 
 ic ge|eowan|eow soð siþþon secgan willan . 
 god scieppan geoguþ and guma dream ; 
 nesan|neh|ne magun þu|þa|se æfteryld in þæm|þam|se ær 
 blæd geberan , acan|ac hi blissiað 
 weorold wynn , oððæt wintra|winter riman|rim 
 gegæð in þu|þa|se geoguþ , þæt|se se gæstan|gan lufað 
 onsyn and ætwist yldran had , 
 þu|þe|ðe gemetan|gemet manig geond middangeard 
 þeowiað in þeaw . þeod ywaþ 
 wisdom wer , wlencu forleosað , 
 siððan geoguþ geað gæstan|gan aflihð . 
 þæt|se ge nesan|neh|ne scirað , acan|ac ge scyldigra 
 synn secgað , soþfæstra no 
 mod and monþeaw mære|mæran willað . 
 gefeoð in firen , frofor nesan|neh|ne wenað , 
 þæt|se ge wræcsiða wyrp gebidan|bidan . 
 oft ge in gestalum stondað ; se cymeð steoran|steor of heofon . 
 me|ic þonne|se sige|sigan|seon sendeð se usic semon mæg|magan , 
 se þu|þe|se lifian|lif gehwæs lengu wealdeð . " 
 swa hleoþrade halig cempa ; 
 wesan|seon|beon se martyr from|fram moncynnes 
 synn asundrad . sculan he sar þu|þa|se gen 
 dælan|dæl adreogan , þeah þu|þe|se dryhten hit|his|he 
 wite|wita wealdan . hwæt#2 , þæt|se wundrian|wundor|wund sum|su 
 mann þynсan|þyncan , þæt|se he micel willan 
 afor onfengum earm gæstas 
 hrinan lætan , and þæt|se hwæþre gelomp ! 
 wesan|seon|beon þæt|se gen mara , þæt|se he middangeard 
 self geseсan|gesecan , and hit|his|he swat ageat 
 on|an bonena hond ; agan began geweald , 
 lifes|lif and deaðes , þu|þa|se he lust dreogan 
 eaðmod on|an eorþ|eorðe ehtendra nið . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is nu arlic þæt|se we æfæst 
 dæd deman , secgen dryhten lof 
 eall|eal þær|se bisenian þu|þe|se we|us bec for|faran 
 þurh hit|his|he wundrian|wundor|wund geweorc wisdom cyþað . 
 geofu wesan|seon|beon mid guðlac in godcund 
 mægen metan|gemetan . micel wesan|seon|is toh|to secgan 
 eall|eal æfter ord , þæt|se he on|an ellen adreogan : 
 se foregenga fæder ælmihtig 
 wiþ|wið onhælum ealdorgewinnum 
 self gesette|gesettan , þær hit|his|he sawel wearð 
 clæne and gecostad . cuð wesan|seon|is wid 
 geond middangeard þæt|se hit|his|he mod geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon 
 in god willan|willa ; wesan|seon|is se gen fela 
 toh|to secgenne , se þu|þe|se he self adreogan 
 under nyðgista nearu|nearo clommum . 
 he þu|þa|se sar forseon , wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þære|se sawol|sawel wel 
 se mundbora þu|þe|se þæt|se mod gehealdan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he nesan|neh|ne getweode treow in breost , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he gnornunga gæstan scodun , 
 acan|ac se heardian|heard hyсgan|hyg|hycgan halig wunade , 
 oþþæt he þu|þa|se bysgu oferbidan habban . 
 þrea wesan|seon|beon þearle , þegn|þegen grimman|grimm|grim , 
 ealle|eall|eal hi þæm|þam|se feorh fyllan|fylan gehatan . 
 no hi he toh|to deaðe deman|dema motan , 
 synn|syn hyrdas , acan|ac seon|seo|se sawul bidan 
 in lichoman leofran tidan|tid . 
 georne|geornan|georn hi ongietan þæt|se he god willan 
 nergan wiþ|wið niþ and hyra|hyr|hira|hi nydwræce 
 deop deman|dema . swa dryhten mæg|magan , 
 ana|an ælmihtig , eadig gehwone 
 wiþ|wið earfeþum eaðe gescildan . 
 hwæðre he gebrengan bolgenmod , 
 wrað wræcmæcgas , wuldor cempa , 
 halig husulbearn , æt|etan heldore , 
 þær firenfull fæge|fægan gæstas 
 æfter swyltcwale sec onginnað 
 ingong ærest|ær in þæt|se atule hus , 
 niþer under næssas neol grund . 
 hi he bregdon , buan|beodan orlege , 
 egsan and ondan arleaslice , 
 frecne|frecen|frec for|faran , swa bið feond þeaw , 
 þonne|se hi soðfæstra sawol|sawel willað 
 synn beswican and searocræftum . 
 onginnan gromheorte god orettan 
 in sefa swencan , swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe gehatan 
 þæt|se he in se grimman|grimm|grim gryre gongan sculan , 
 hweorfan gehyned toh|to helwarum , 
 and þær in bend bryne þrowian . 
 woldun hi geteon mid torncwidum 
 earm aglæca in orwennysse , 
 meotudes cempa . hit nesan|neh|ne magan swa ! 
 cweþan|cweðan cearfulle , criste laðe , 
 toh|to guðlace mid grimnysse : 
 " nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon þu gedefe , nesan|neh|ne dryhten þeowan|þeow 
 clæne gecostad , nesan|neh|ne cempa god , 
 word and weorc wel gecyþan|cyþan , 
 halig in heorte . nu þu in hell|hel sculan 
 deop gedufan , nales dryhten sunnan|leoht 
 habban in heofon , heahgetimbru , 
 seld on|an swegl|swegel , forðam þu synn|syn toh|to fela , 
 facn gefremedes in flæschoman . 
 we þu|þe|se nu willað womm gehwilc 
 lean forgieldan , þær þu|þe|se laþian bið 
 in ðam|se grimmestan gæstgewinne . " 
 him|hi|he se eadig wer ondswarode , 
 guðlac in gæstan mid god mægen : 
 " doð efne|efnan|efen swa , gif ge|eowan|eow dryhten crist , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma lyfan wylle , 
 weoruda waldend , þæt|se ge hit|his|he wergengan 
 in se lað leg lædan motan . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is in geweald wuldorcyning , 
 se ge|eowan|eow gehynde and in hæftan bidraf 
 under nearu|nearo clom , nergende crist . 
 wesan|seon|eoh ic eaðmod hit|his|he ombiehthera , 
 þeowan|þeow geþyldig . ic geþafian sculan 
 æghwær eall|eal hit|his|he an don|dom , 
 and him|hi|he geornlice gæstgemyndum 
 willan wideferh wese|wesan underþyded , 
 hyran holdlice minum|min hælend|hælan 
 þeaw and geþyncðum , and him|hi|he þoncian 
 eall|eal þær|se giefa þu|þe|se god gescop 
 engel ærest|ær and eorðwarum ; 
 and ic bletsian bliðe mod 
 lifes|lif leohtfruman , and him|hi|he lof singan 
 þurh gedefe don|dom dæg and niht , 
 here in heorte heofonrices weard . 
 þæt|se ge|eowan|eow æfre nesan|neh|ne bið ufan alyfan 
 sunnan|leoht lissum , þæt|se ge lof motan 
 dryhten secgan , acan|ac ge deaðe sceolon 
 weallendne wea wop besingan , 
 heaf in hell|hel , nales herenisse 
 halig|haleg habban heofoncyninges . 
 ic se deman|dema in dæg|dah|dag minum|min 
 willan weorþian word and dæd , 
 lufian in lif , swa wesan|seon|is lar and ar 
 toh|to spowendre sprecan lædan|gelædan , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se in hit|his|he weorc willan|willa ræfnað . 
 wesan|nesan ge wærloga , swa ge in wræcsiðe 
 long|lange libban , leсgan|lecgan bisencte , 
 sweart beswicene , swegl|swegel beniman , 
 dream bidrorene , deaðe bifolene , 
 firen bifongne , feorh orwenan , 
 þæt|se ge blindnes bot findan . 
 ge þu|þa|se fæger gesceaft in fyrndagum , 
 gæstlicne goddream , gearu|gearo forsegon , 
 þu|þa|se ge wiðhogdun halig|halga|haleg dryhten . 
 nesan|neh|ne mostun ge wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wunian in wyndagum , 
 acan|ac mid scome scyldum scofene wurdon|weorþan 
 for|faran oferhygdum in ece fyr , 
 þær ge sceolon dreogan deað and þystre , 
 wop toh|to wid ealdor|eald ; næfre ge se wyrp gebidað . 
 and ic þæt|se gelyfan in liffruman , 
 eсe onwealdan eall|eal gesceafta , 
 þæt|se he mec for|faran milts and mægenspedum , 
 niðða nergend , næfre willan 
 þurh ellenweorc anforlætan , 
 þæm|þam|se ic long|lange in lichoman 
 and in minum|min gæstan god campian 
 þurh monigfealdra mægen gerynu|geryne . 
 forðam ic getreowe in se torhtestan 
 þrynesse þri , se geþeahtingum 
 hafað in hondum heofon and eorþ|eorðe , 
 þæt|se ge mec mid niþ næfre motan 
 tornmode teon in tintergu , 
 min myrðran and mansceaþan , 
 sweart sigelease . wesan|seon|eoh ic soþlice|soðlice 
 sunnan|leoht geleafa and mid lufu|lufe dryhten 
 fæger|fæge gefyllan|fyllan in minum|min feorhlocan , 
 breost inbryrded toh|to þæm|þam|se betran ham , 
 leoma inlyhted toh|to þæm|þam|se leofestan 
 ecan eard , þær wesan|seon|is eþellond 
 fæger and gefealic in fæder wuldor , 
 þær ge|eowan|eow næfre for|faran nergende 
 sunnan|leoht leoma nesan|neh|ne lifes|lif hyht 
 in god romana agiefan weorþeð , 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se oferhygdum þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow in mod astag 
 þurh idel gylp eall|eal toh|to swiðe|swiðan . 
 wendun ge and woldun , wiþerhycgende , 
 þæt|se ge scyppende sceoldan gelice 
 wese|wesan in wuldor . ge|eowan|eow þær wyrs gelomp , 
 þe|þa|ða|se ge|eowan|eow se waldend wrað bisencte 
 in þæt|se sweart susl , þær ge|eowan|eow siððan wesan|seon|beon 
 ad inæled ator geblonden , 
 þurh deop don|dom dream afyrran , 
 engel gemanian . swa nu awa sculan 
 wese|wesan wideferh , þæt|se ge wærnysse 
 brynewylm habban , nales bletsunga . 
 nesan|neh|ne þurfun ge wenan|wena , wuldor biscyrede , 
 þæt|se ge mec synfull|synful mid searocræftum 
 under scæd sconde scufan motan , 
 nesan|neh|ne in bælblæsan bregdon on|an hinder 
 in hell|hel hus , þær ge|eowan|eow wesan|seon|is ham sceapen , 
 sweart sinnehte , sacu butan ende , 
 grim gæstcwalu . þær ge gnornende 
 deað sceolon dreogan , and ic dream wyn 
 aginnan|agan mid engel in þæm|þam|se uplican 
 rodera romana , þær wesan|seon|is ryht cyning , 
 helpan and hælu hæleþ|hæle cynn , 
 duguð and drohtað . " þe|þa|ða|se cuman dryhten ar , 
 halig of heofon , se þurh hleoþor abeodan 
 ufancundne ege earm gæstum ; 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan eft hraðe unscyldigne 
 of þæm|þam|se wræcsiðe wuldor cempa 
 lædan limhalne , þæt|se se leofesta 
 gæstan|gan gegearwad in god wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an gefea feran . þe|þa|ða|se wearð feond þreotan 
 acol for|faran ðam|se egsan . ofermæcga sprecan , 
 dyre dryhten þegn , dæghluttre scinan . 
 habban guðlaces gæstan|gan in geweald 
 modig mundbora , meahtum spedig , 
 þeostru|þeostrian þegn|þegen þreaniedlum bond , 
 nyd onsettan and geneahhe bibead : 
 " nesan|neh|ne su him|hi|he ban bryce nesan|neh|ne blodig wund , 
 lices læla nesan|neh|ne laþ wiht , 
 se þu|þe|se ge him|hi|he toh|to dare gedon|gedo|don motan , 
 acan|ac ge he gesund asettan þær ge he silf|self genoman . 
 he sculan þywan|þy|þe|se wonge wealdan , nesan|neh|ne magan ge him|hi|he þu|þa|se wiс|wican|wic forstondan . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh se dema , se mec dryhten hatan 
 snude gesecgan , þæt|se ge him|hi|he sar gehwylc 
 hondum gehælan , and him|hi|he hearsume 
 on|an hit|his|he sylfes don|dom siððan wesan|seon|beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne sculan ic min onsyn for|faran eower 
 mengu miþan . ic wesan|seon|eoh meotudes þegn . 
 wesan|seon|eoh ic þær|se twelfa sum|su þu|þe|se he getreoweste 
 under monnes hiw mod gelufade . 
 he mec of heofon hider onsendan , 
 geseon þæt|se ge on|an eorþ|eorðe for|faran æfstum 
 on|an hit|his|he wergengan wite|witan leсgan|lecgan . 
 wesan|seon|is þæt|se min|ic broþor|broðor , mec hit|his|he bysgu gehreaw . 
 ic þæt|se gefremme , þær se freond wunað 
 on|an þære|se socn , þu|þe|se ic þu|þa|se sibb|sib wiþ|wið he 
 healdan|heald willan , nu ic hit|his|he helpan motan|mot , 
 þæt|se ge min|ic onsynn oft sceawiað . 
 nu ic hit|his|he geneahhe neosan willan ; 
 sculan ic hit|his|he word and hit|his|he weorc in gewitnes 
 dryhten lædon . he hit|his|he dæd conn . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon guðlaces gæstan|gan geblissad , 
 siððan bartholomeus abeodan habban 
 god ærende . gearu stodun 
 hæftas hearsume , þu|þa|se se halig|halga|haleg word 
 lutan oferleordun . ongon þu|þa|se leof sið 
 dragan domeadig dryhten cempa 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se onwillan eorþ|eorðe dælan|dæl . 
 hi he beran and him|hi|he bryce healdan , 
 hebban he hondum and him|hi|he hryre burgun . 
 wesan|seon|beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi gongas under god egsan 
 smeþe and gesefte . sigehreðig cuman 
 bytla toh|to þæm|þam|se beorgan|beorg . he bletsadon 
 monge mægwlitas , meaglum reord , 
 treofugla tuddor , tacn|tacen cyðdon 
 eadig eftcyme . oft he him|hi|he etan healdan , 
 þonne|se hi him|hi|he hungrige ymb hond fleon|fleogan 
 grædum gifre , geoc gefegon . 
 swa þæt|se milde mod wiþ|wið moncynnes 
 dream gedælan , dryhten þeowan , 
 geniman him|hi|he toh|to wildeorum wynn , siððan he þes weorold forhyсgan|forhycgan . 
 smolt wesan|seon|beon se sigewong and sellan|sele|sel niwe , 
 fæger fugol rædan|reord , folde geblowan|blowan ; 
 geac gear buan|beodan . guþlac motan 
 eadig and onmod eardes brucan . 
 standan se grenian|grene wong in god wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ; 
 habban se heorde , se þu|þe|se of heofon cuman , 
 feond afyrde . hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|beon fægerra|fæger 
 willian|willa weorþan|geweorþan in wer lif , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se yldran usse gemunan , 
 oþþe|oððe we self siððan cunnan gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwæt#2 we þissa wundrian|wundor|wund gewitan|gewita wesan|nesan ! 
 eall|eal þes gegan in ussera 
 tid tima . forðam se tweogan nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 ænig ofer eorþ|eorðe æled cynn|cyn , 
 acan|ac swilc god wyrceð gæsta lifes|lif 
 toh|to trumnaþe , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þu|þa|se tydre mod 
 þu|þa|se gewitnes wendan þurfan , 
 þonne|se hi in gesihþ soþ brucað . 
 swa se ælmihtig|eallmihtig ealle|eall|eal gesceafte 
 lufað under lyft in lichoman , 
 mann mægþ geond middangeard . 
 willan|wil se waldend þæt|se we wisdom wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 snyttrum swelgan , þæt|se hit|his|he soð for|faran we|us 
 on|an hit|his|he giefa gyldan gengan|gangan weorðe , 
 þe|þa|ða|se he we|us toh|to are|ar and toh|to ondgiete 
 syleð and sendeð , sawol rymeð 
 liþe|liþan|liþ lifwegas sunnan|leoht geræhte . 
 nesan þæt|se huru læsast þæt|se seon|seo|se lufu cyþeð , 
 þonne|se heo in monnes mod getimbreð 
 gæstcunde gifu|gifan , swa he guðlaces 
 dæg|dah|dag and dæd þurh hit|his|he don|dom ahebban . 
 wesan|seon|beon se fruma fæstlic feond on|an ondan , 
 settan|gesettan wiþ|wið synn , þær he siððan lutan 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gewonade , oft hit|his|he word god 
 þurh eaðmedu up onsendan , 
 lætan|lettan hit|his|he ben cuman|cuma in þu|þa|se beorht gesceaft , 
 þoncade þeodne se þu|þe|se he in þrowingum 
 bidan motan , hwonne him|hi|he betre lif 
 þurh god willan|willa agyfen weorþan . 
 swa wesan|seon|beon guðlaces gæstan|gan lædan|gelædan 
 engel fæðmum in uprodor , 
 for|faran onsyne ece deman|dema 
 lædan leoflice . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon lean sellan|gesellan|geseald , 
 setl on|an swegl|swegel , þær he simble motan|mot 
 awo toh|to ealdor|eald eardfæst wese|wesan , 
 bliðe bidan . wesan|seon|is him|hi|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god 
 milde mundbora , meahtig dryhten , 
 halig hyrdan|hyran|hirde , heofonrices weard . 
 swa soðfæstra sawol|sawlian|sawel motun 
 in eсe geard up gestigan 
 rodera romana , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ræfnað heran|her 
 word and weorc wuldorcyning 
 lar longsum , on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi lifes|lif tidan|tid 
 earniað on|an eorþ|eorðe ecan lifes|lif , 
 ham in heahþu . þæt|se beoð husulweras , 
 cempa gecorene , criste leof , 
 berað in breost beorht geleafa , 
 halig hyht , heorte clæne 
 weorðiað waldend , habbað wis þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan , 
 fus on|an forðweg toh|to fæder eðle , 
 gearwian gæstes hus , and mid gleawnes 
 feond oferfeohtað and firenlust 
 forberað in breost , broþorsibbe 
 georne|geornan|georn bigongað , in god willan|willa 
 swencað hi|heo self , sawol|sawel frætwað 
 halig|halga|haleg gehygd , heofoncyninges bibod 
 fremmað on|an folde . fæsten|fæstan lufiað , 
 beorgað him|hi|he bealoniþ and gebed secað , 
 swincað wiþ|wið synn , healdað soð and ryht . 
 him|hi|he þæt|se nesan|neh|ne hreoweð æfter hingonge , 
 þonne hi hweorfað in þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg cantwara|burg , 
 gongað gegnunga toh|to hierusalem , 
 þær hi|heo toh|to weorold wynn motun 
 god onsyne georne|geornan|georn bihealdan , 
 sibb|sib and gesiht , þær heo soð wunað , 
 wlitig , wuldorfæst , eall|eal wid ferh 
 on|an lifgendra land wynn . 
 þæt|ðæt|se wesan|seon|is wid cuð wer cneoris , 
 folc gefræge , se frymþa god 
 se ær æled cynn|cyn 
 of þære|se clænestan , cyning ælmihtig , 
 folde gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon fruma niwe 
 elda tudor , onstæl wynlic , 
 fæger and gefealic . fæder wesan|seon|beon acennan 
 adam ærest|ær þurh est god 
 on|an neorxnawong , þær him|hi|he nænig wesan|seon|beon 
 willan|willa onsyn , nesan|neh|ne wela brosnung , 
 nesan|neh|ne lifes|lif lyre nesan|neh|ne lices hryre , 
 nesan|neh|ne dream dryre nesan|neh|ne deaðes cyme , 
 acan|ac he on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna lifgan motan 
 eall|eal leahtra leas , long|lange neotan 
 niwe gefea . þær he no þurfan 
 lifes|lif nesan|neh|ne lissa in þæm|þam|se leoht ham 
 þurh æled tidan|tid ende gebidan , 
 acan|ac æfter fyrst|first toh|to þæm|þam|se færestan 
 heofonrices gefea hweorfan mostan , 
 leomu liс|lic somud and lifes|lif gæstan|gan , 
 and þær siððan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a in sindreamum 
 toh|to wid feorh wunian mostun 
 dryhten on|an gesiht , butan deaðe forþ|forð , 
 gif hi halig|haleg word healdan|heald woldun 
 beorht in breost , and hit|his|he bebod læstan|læst , 
 æfnan on|an eðle . hi toh|to ær aþreotan 
 þæt|se hi waldendes willan|willa læstan , 
 acan|ac hit|his|he wif geniman wyrm lar 
 bledan|bled forboden , and of beam ahneop 
 wæstm biweredne ofer word god , 
 wuldorcyning , and hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo werian|wer sellan 
 þurh deofol searo deaðberende gyfl 
 þæt|se þe|þa|ða|se sinhiwan toh|to swylte geteon . 
 siððan se eþel uðgenge wearð 
 adame and euan , eardwica cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan 
 beorht oðbroden , and hyra|hyr|hira|hi bearn swa , 
 eaferum æfter , þu|þa|se hi on|an uncyððu , 
 scomum scudende , scofene wurdon|weorþan 
 on|an gewinworuld . weorc onguldon , 
 deop firenian|firen , þurh deaðes cwealm , 
 þu|þe|se hi unsnyttrum ær gefremedon . 
 þære|se synwræce siððan sculan 
 mægþ and mæcgas morþor ongyldon , 
 godscyldge gyrn þurh gæstgedal , 
 deop firenian|firen . deað in geþrong 
 firas cynn , feond rixade 
 geond middangeard . nænig mann wesan|seon|beon 
 of þæm|þam|se sigetudre siððan æfre 
 god willan|willa se geornan|georn , nesan|neh|ne gynnwised , 
 þæt|se he bibugan mæge|mæg|magan se bitter|bitor|biter drync 
 se eue fyrn adame gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 byrelade bryd geong|gangan ; þæt|se him|hi|he begen gescod 
 in þæm|þam|se deore ham . deað ricsade 
 ofer foldbuend , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se fela wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 gæsthaligra , þær hi|heo god willan|willa 
 on|an mislicum mann gebihþum 
 æfter stedewonga stow fremman ; 
 sum ær , sum sið , sum in urra 
 æfter tælmearc tid gemynd 
 sigorlean sohtun . we|us secgað bec 
 hu guðlac wearð þurh god willan|willa 
 eadig on|an engel . he him|hi|he ece geceosan 
 magan and mundbyrd . mære|mæran wurdon|weorþan 
 hit|his|he wundrian|wundor|wund geweorc wid and side|sid , 
 breme æfter burh|burg geond bryten innan , 
 hu he monge oft þurh magan god 
 gehælan hygegeomre hefig wite|wita , 
 þu|þe|se he unsofte , adl gebundne , 
 sarig gesohtun of siðwegum , 
 freorigmode . simble frofor þær 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se god cempa gearu findan , 
 helpan and hælu . nænig hæleþ|hæle wesan|seon|is 
 þu|þe|se areccan mæge|mæg|magan oþþe|oððe riman|rim wite|witan 
 eall|eal þær|se wundrian|wundor|wund þu|þe|se he in weorold heran|her 
 þurh dryhten giefu|giefan dugeþum gefremian . 
 oft toh|to þæm|þam|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic weorude cwomun 
 deofol deaðmægen duguþ byscyrede 
 hloþ þringan , þær se halig|halgian|halga|haleg þeowan|þeow 
 ellen anhydig eard weardade . 
 þær hi mislice mongum reord 
 on|an þæm|þam|se westen|westan woðe hofun 
 hlud herecirm , hiw binotene , 
 dream bidrorene . dryhten cempa , 
 from|fram folctoga , feond þreatum 
 wiðstod stronglice . næs|nesan seon|seo|se stund læt 
 earm gæsta , nesan|neh|ne þæt|se onbidan long , 
 þæt|se þu|þa|se wrohtsmiðas wop ahofun , 
 hreopun hreðlease , hleoþor bregdan . 
 hwilum|hwil wedan swa wilde deor 
 cirmdon on|an corðre , hwilum|hwil cyrdon eft 
 min mansceaþan on|an mennisc hiw 
 breahtm micel , hwilum|hwil bregdan eft 
 awyrgan wærloga on|an wyrm bleo , 
 earm adloman ator spiowdon . 
 simble hi guðlac gearene findan , 
 þanc gleaw . he geþyldum bidan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah him|hi|he feond hloð feorhcwealm buan|beodan . 
 hwilum|hwil him|hi|he toh|to honda hungor geþreatad 
 fleogan fugol cyn , þær hi feorhnere 
 witude findan and he weorðedon 
 meaglum stefn . hwilum|hwil mennisce 
 arisan|ar eaðmedum eft neosedon , 
 and þær siðfrome on|an þæm|þam|se sigewonge 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg þeowan|þeow helpan gemetan , 
 ferðþes frofor . nænig forþum wesan|seon|beon , 
 þæt|se he æwiscmod eft siðade , 
 hean|heah , hyht leas , acan|ac se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer 
 æled gehwilc þurh þu|þa|se æþele magan , 
 þu|þe|se he seoslig sohtun on|an ðearfe , 
 hæleð hygegeomre , hælan buan twegen 
 liс|lic and sawol|sawel , þenden lifes|lif weard , 
 ece ælmihtig , unnan willan 
 þæt|se he blæd heran|her brucan motan , 
 weorold lifes|lif . wesan|seon|beon gewinn þu|þa|se 
 yrmþa for|faran eorþ|eorðe endedogor 
 þurh nydgedal neah þringan|geþringan , 
 siððan he on|an westen|westan wiceard geceosan , 
 fiftynu gear , þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon frofor gæstan|gan 
 eadig æbodan ufan onsendan , 
 halig of heahþu . hreþer innan birnan|biernan , 
 afysed on|an forðsið . him|hi|he færinga 
 adl in gewadan . he on|an ellen swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 ungeblyged bidan beorht gehat 
 bliþe in burh|burg . wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se bancofan 
 æfter nihtglome neah þringan|geþringan , 
 breosthord onboren . wesan|seon|beon se bliþe gæstan|gan 
 fus on|an forðweg . nyllan|nillan fæder engel 
 in þes wonsælgan weorold lif 
 leahtra leas longfyrst ofer þæt|se 
 wunian lætan , þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an weorc heran|her 
 on|an hit|his|he dagena tidan|tid dæd gecweman 
 ellen unslawe . þe|þa|ða|se se ælmihtig|eallmihtig 
 lætan|lettan hit|his|he hond cuman|cuma þær se halig|halgian|halga|haleg þeowan|þeow , 
 deormod on|an degle domeadig bidan , 
 heard and hygerof . hyht wesan|seon|beon geniwad , 
 blis in breost . wesan|seon|beon se bancofa 
 adl onælan , inbendum fæstan|fæst , 
 lichord onlucan . leomu hefegedon , 
 sar geseсan|gesecan . he þæt|se soð gecnawan 
 þæt|se he ælmihtig ufan neosade , 
 meotud for|faran milts . he hit|his|he modsefa 
 wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se færhagan fæstan|fæst trymman 
 feond gewinn . næs|nesan he forht seþeah , 
 nesan|neh|ne seon|seo|se adlþracu egle|eglan on|an mod , 
 nesan|neh|ne deaðgedal , acan|ac him|hi|he dryhten lof 
 birnan|biernan in breost , brondhat lufu 
 sigorfæst in sefa , seon|seo|se him|hi|he sar gehwylc 
 simble forswiðde . næs|nesan him|hi|he sorgcearu 
 on|an þes lænan tidan|tid , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hit|his|he liс|lic and gæstan|gan 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi somwiste , sinhiwan twegen , 
 deore|deor gedælan . dæg|dah|dag forþ|forð scridun , 
 nihthelma genip . wesan|seon|beon neah seon|seo|se tidan|tid 
 þæt|se he fyrngewyrht fyllan sculan 
 þurh deaðes cyme , dom hleotan , 
 efne|efnan|efen se ilca þu|þe|se usse yldran fyrn 
 frecne|frecen|frec onfon , swa him|hi|he biforan wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan 
 þu|þa|se ær æled cynn|cyn . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon guðlace on|an þu|þa|se geocran tidan|tid 
 mægen|magan gemeðgad , mod swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe heard , 
 ellen anhydig . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se adl þearl , 
 hatan|hat and heorogrim . hreþer innan weol , 
 birnan|biernan banloca . bryþen wesan|seon|beon onginnan 
 se adame eue gebyrmde 
 æt|etan fruma weorold . feond byrlade 
 ærest|ær þære|se ides , and heo adame , 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo swæs werian|wer , siððan scencte 
 bittor bædeweg . se þu|þa|se byre siððan 
 grimman|grimm|grim onguldon gafulrædenne 
 þurh ærgewyrht , se ænig nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 fyr cynn|cyn from|fram fruma siððan 
 mann|man on|an molde , se magan him|hi|he 
 gebeorgan and bibugan se bleat drync , 
 deop deaðweges , acan|ac him|hi|he duru self 
 on|an þu|þa|se sliðnan tidan|tid sona ontyneð , 
 ingong geopenað . nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ænig þæm|þam|se 
 flæsc bifongen feorh wiðstondan , 
 riсe nesan|neh|ne hean , acan|ac he ræseð on|an 
 gifre grap . swa wesan|seon|beon guðlace 
 enge anhoga ætryhte þu|þa|se 
 æfter nihtscuan neah geþyded , 
 wiga|wig wælgifre . he wunade mid 
 on|an ombehtþegn , se he æghwylce 
 dæg|dah|dagian|dag neosade . onginnan þe|þa|ða|se deophydig , 
 gleawmod gongan toh|to god templ|tempel , 
 þær he eþelboda inne witan|wist , 
 se leofestan lareow gecorenne , 
 and þu|þa|se in gan|eadan eadig toh|to sprecan , 
 willan hyrcnigan halig|haleg lar , 
 milde meþelcwida . fon þu|þa|se hit|his|he mondryhten 
 adlwerigne ; him|hi|he þæt|ðæt|se in gefeallan 
 hefig æt|etan heorte . hygesorge wegan , 
 micel modceare . onginnan þe|þa|ða|se hit|his|he magu frignan : 
 " hu gewearð þu|þe|se þus , winedryhten min|ic , 
 fæder , freond hleo , ferð gebysgad , 
 nearu|nearo geneged gewinnan|geblandan ic næfre þu|þe|se , 
 þeon|þeodan leofesta , þyslicne ær 
 gemetan þus meðne . magan þu meðelcwidum 
 word gewealdan gewinnan|geblandan wesan|seon|is me|ic on|an wennan|wenan|wen þynсan|geþyncan , 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se untrymnes adl gongum 
 on|an þes neah niht|neaht bysgade , 
 sarbennum sœ̄сan|seсan|secan|geseсan . þæt|se me|ic sorgna wesan|seon|is 
 hatost on|an hreþer , ær þu hyсgan|hyg|hycgan min 
 ferð afrefre . witan þu , freodryhten , 
 hu þes|þeoh|se adl sculan ende gesettan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se sið oncwæð , sona nesan|neh|ne magan 
 oroð up geteon ; wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he in bugan 
 bittor bancoþa . beald reordade 
 eadig on|an ellen , ondcwis agifan|agiefan : 
 " ic willan secgan þæt|se me|ic sar gehrinan , 
 wærc in gewadan in ðisse wonnan niht|neaht , 
 lichord onlucan . leomu hefegiað , 
 sar geseсan|gesecan . sculan þes sawelhus , 
 fæge|fægan flæschoma , foldærne biþeaht , 
 leomu lames geþacan , legerbedde fæstan|fæst 
 wunian wælræste . wiga|wig nealæceð , 
 unlæt lac . nesan|neh|ne bið se lengra swican 
 sawelgedal þonne|se seofon niht|neaht 
 fyrstgemearces , þæt|se min|ic feorh heonan 
 on|an þes eahteþan ende geseceð 
 dæg scriþan . þonne|se dogor beoð 
 on|an moldwege min|ic forþ|forð scriþan , 
 sorg gesweðrad , and ic siððan motan|mot 
 for|faran meotudes cneow|cneo meorda hleotan , 
 gingra geafena , and god lomber 
 in sindreamum siððan awo 
 forþ|forð folgian ; wesan|seon|is nu fus þider 
 gæstan|gan siþ geornan|georn . nu þu gearu const 
 leoma lifgedal ; long wesan|seon|is þes onbidan 
 weorold lifes|lif . " þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon wop and heaf , 
 geonga|geong geocor sefa , geomrende hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , 
 siððan he gehyrdan|gehyran þæt|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wesan|seon|beon 
 forðsiþes fus . he se færspelles 
 for|faran hit|his|he mondryhtne modsorge wegan , 
 hefig æt|etan heorte . hreþer innan sweorcan , 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hreowcearig , se þu|þe|se hit|his|he hlaford geseon 
 ellorfusne . he se onbæru 
 habban nesan|neh|ne magan , acan|ac he hatan|hat lætan|lettan 
 torn þolian tear geotan , 
 weallan wægdropan . wyrdan|wyrd nesan|neh|ne magan 
 in fæge lengan|leng|lange feorg gehealdan , 
 deore|deor frætwe , þonne|se him|hi|he deman wesan|seon|beon . 
 ongitan|ongietan gæsta halig geomormodes 
 drusendne hyсgan|hyg|hycgan . onginnan þu|þa|se duguþ hleo , 
 glædmod god leof , geongran retan , 
 wine|win leofestan word negan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne beon|beo þu unrot , þeah þes|þeoh|se adl me|ic 
 innan ælan|æl . nesan me|ic earfeðe 
 toh|to geþolianne þeodnes willan|willa , 
 dryhten min , nesan|neh|ne ic se deaðes hafu 
 on|an þes seocnan tidan|tid sorh|sorg on|an mod , 
 nesan|neh|ne ic me|ic herehloðe hell|hel þegnian|þegn|þegen 
 swiðe|swiðan onsittan , nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan synn on|an me|ic 
 facn frumbearn fyren gestælan , 
 lices leahtor , acan|ac in liсgan|leon sceolon 
 sorgwylmum seoþan sar wanian , 
 wræcsið wepan , wilnian biscirede 
 in þæm|þam|se deaðsele duguða gehwylcre , 
 lufe and lissa . min|ic þæt|se leof birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 nesan|neh|ne beon|beo þu on|an sefa toh|to seoc . ic wesan|seon|eoh siþ fus 
 upeard niman edleana geornan|georn 
 in þæm|þam|se ecan gefea , ærgewyrhtum 
 geseon sigorian|sigor frea , min|ic þæt|se swæs birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 nesan me|ic wræc|wracu nesan|neh|ne gewin , þæt|se ic wuldor god 
 sec swegelcyning , þær wesan|seon|is sib and blis , 
 domfæstra dream , dryhten ondweard , 
 þæm|þam|se ic georne|geornan|georn gæstgerynum , 
 in þes dreorig tidan|tid dæd cweman , 
 mod and mægen . ic þu|þa|se meorde witan 
 leahtorlease , lean unhwilen , 
 halig on|an heahþu . þær min|ic hyht myneð 
 toh|to gesecenne , sawul fundað 
 of licfate toh|to þæm|þam|se long gefea 
 in eadwelan . nesan þes eþel me|ic 
 nesan|neh|ne sar nesan|neh|ne sorg . ic me|ic self witan 
 æfter lices hryre lean unhwilen . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se se wuldormaga word gestillan , 
 rof runwita ; wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he ræste neod , 
 reonigmodum . rodor swamode 
 ofer niðða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , nihtrim scriþan , 
 deorc ofer dugeðum . þu|þa|se se dæg bicwom 
 on|an þæm|þam|se se lifgenda in lichoman , 
 ece ælmihtig ærist gefremian , 
 dryhten mid dream , þe|þa|ða|se he of deaðe arisan|ar 
 onwald of eorþ|eorðe in þu|þa|se eastortid , 
 eall|eal þrymm þri , ðreata mæstne 
 toh|to heofon ahebban , þe|þa|ða|se he from|fram hell|hel astag . 
 swa se eadig wer in þu|þa|se æþele tidan|tid 
 on|an se beorht dæg bliss hremig , 
 milde and gemetfæst , mægen|magan unsofte 
 ellen geæfnde . arisan|ar þe|þa|ða|se eorl wynn , 
 heard hygesnottor , swa he hraþost magan , 
 meðe for|faran ðam|se micel bysgum . ongon þu|þa|se hit|his|he mod staþelian 
 sunnan|leoht geleafa , lacan|lac onsægde 
 deophycgende dryhten toh|to willan|willa 
 gæstgerynum in god templ|tempel , 
 and hit|his|he þegn|þegen ongon , swa þæm|þam|se þeodne geras , 
 þurh gæstes giefu|giefan godspell|godspel bodian , 
 secgan sigortacen , and hit|his|he sefa trymman 
 wundor toh|to wuldor in þu|þa|se wlitig gesceaft 
 toh|to eadwelan , swa he ær nesan|neh|ne sið 
 æfre toh|to ealdor|eald oðer swilce 
 on|an þes lænan tidan|tid lar gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 nesan|neh|ne swa deoplice dryhten geryne 
 þurh menniscne muð areccan 
 on|an sidu|side|sid sefa . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon soþ þynсan|geþyncan 
 þæt|se hit ufancundes engel wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 of swegldreamum , swiðe micel 
 mægenþegnes word , þonne|se ænig monnes lar , 
 wer ofer eorþ|eorðe . him|hi|he þæt|se wundrian|wundor|wund micel
