 seon|geseon þynсan|þyncan , þæt|se swylc snyttrucræft 
 ænges hæleða heran|her hreþer weardade , 
 dryht bearn , wesan|seon|beon se deoplic eall|eal 
 word and wisdom , and se wer stihtung , 
 mod and mægencræft , þu|þe|se him|hi|he meotud engel , 
 gæsta geocend forgiefan habban . 
 wesan|seon|beon feowere þe|þa|ða|se forþ|forð gewitene 
 dæg|dah|dag on|an riman|rim , se se dryhten þegn 
 on|an ellen bidan , adl gebysgad , 
 sar geswenced . nesan|neh|ne he sorh|sorg wegan 
 geocorne sefa gæstgedales , 
 dreorig hyсgan|hyg|hycgan . deað nealæcte , 
 stæppan|steppan stalgongum , strong and hreðe 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan sawelhus . cuman se seofeða dæg 
 æled ondweard , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he in gesonc , 
 hatan|hat , heorte neah , hildescurum 
 flacor flanþracu , feorhhord onlucan , 
 searocægum sœ̄сan|seсan|secan|geseсan . ongon þe|þa|ða|se snottor hæle|hælan|helan , 
 ar , onbehtþegn , æþele|æþel neosan 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg hofe|hof|hebban , fond þu|þa|se hlingendne 
 fus on|an forðsiþ frea unwenne , 
 gæsthaligne in god templ|tempel 
 seoþan sarwylmum . wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se sihste tidan|tid 
 on|an midd dæg , wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he mondryhtne 
 endedogor ætryhte þu|þa|se . 
 nearu|nearo genæged nydcostingum , 
 awrecan wælpilum , wlo nesan|neh|ne magan 
 oroð up geteon , ellenspræce 
 hleoþor ahebban . ongon þe|þa|ða|se hygegeomor , 
 freorig and ferðwerig , fus gretan , 
 meðne modglædne , bædan|biddan he þurh miht|meaht scyppend , 
 gif he hit|his|he wordcwida wealdan magan , 
 sprecan ahebban , þæt|se him|hi|he on|an spell|spel gecyðde , 
 onwreon word gongum , hu he hit|his|he wisna truwade , 
 drohtes on|an se dimm adl , ærðon he deað onsægde . 
 him|hi|he se eadig wer agifan|agiefan ondsware , 
 leof mann|man leof , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he læt|late magan , 
 eorl ellenheard , oreþe gebredan : 
 " min|ic þæt|se swæs birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , nesan nu swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe feor 
 þæm|þam|se ytemestan endedogor 
 nydgedales , þæt|se þu þu|þa|se neah sculan 
 in woruldlife word min , 
 næfre lean biloren , lar gehyran , 
 noht long|lange ofer þes . læstan|læst ealle|eall|eal well|wel 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon and winescype , word þu|þa|se witan sprecan , 
 libban mannian|mann . " " næfre ic lufu|lufe sibb|sib , 
 þeon|þeodan , æt|etan þearf þin forlætan 
 asanian ! " " beon|beo þu on|an sið gearu , 
 siððan liс|lic and leomu and þes lifes|lif gæstan|gan 
 asundrian somwist hyra|hyr|hira|hi 
 þurh feorggedal . fysan æfter þon|se 
 þæt|se þu gesecge sweostor minre|min , 
 þære|se leofestan , on|an long wegan|weg 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se fæger gefea forðsið min , 
 on|an eсe eard , and hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo eacan|eac gecyð 
 word minum|min , þæt|se ic me|ic warnade 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo onsyne ealle|eall|eal þrage 
 in woruldlife , for|faran se ic wilnian 
 þæt|se witan wit eft in þæm|þam|se ecan gefea 
 on|an sweglwuldre geseon mostun 
 for|faran onsyne ece deman|dema 
 leahtra leas . þær sculan lufu uncer 
 wærfæst wunian , þær witan wilnian wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 in se beorht burh|burg brucan motun , 
 ead mid engel . þu hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo eacan|eac secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan 
 þæt|se heo þes banfæt beorgan|beorg bifæste , 
 lama biluce , liс|lic orsawle 
 in þeostorcofan , þær hit þrage sculan 
 in sondhofe siððan wunian . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð modgeþanc micel gebisgad , 
 þream forþrycced , þurh se þeodnes word , 
 ombehtþegne , þu|þa|se he ædre oncnawan 
 frea feorhgedal , þæt|se hit feor nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon , 
 endedogor . ongon þu|þa|se ofostlice 
 toh|to hit|his|he winedryhtne word mæðlan : 
 " ic þec halsian , hæleþ|hæle leofost 
 guma cynn|cyn , þurh gæsta weard , 
 þæt|se þu hygesorge heorte minre|min 
 geeþe , eorl wyn . nesan þu|þe|se ende feor , 
 se þu|þe|se ic on|an galdre|galdor ongietan habban . 
 oft mec geomor sefa gehþa gemanian , 
 hatan|hat æt|etan heorte , hyсgan|hyg|hycgan gnornende 
 niht nearu|nearo , and ic næfre þu|þe|se , 
 fæder , frofor min|ic , frignan durran . 
 simble ic gehyrdan|gehyran , þonne|se heofon gim , 
 wyncondel wer , westan|west|wesan onhylde , 
 sweglbeorht sunne|sinnan setlgonges fus 
 on|an æfentid , oþer|oðer mid þec , 
 þegn æt|etan geþeaht . ic se þeodnes word , 
 ar uncuþ oft neosendes , 
 dægwoman bitweon and þære|se deorc niht|neaht , 
 meþelcwide mæcges , and on|an morgen swa , 
 ongitan|ongietan geomormod , gæstes sprecan , 
 gleaw in geard . huru , ic git|gietan|geotan nesan|neh|ne witan , 
 ær þu me|ic , frea min|ic , furþor cyþan 
 þurh cwide þinne|þin , hwonan hit|his|he cyme wesan|nesan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se se eadig wer agifan|agiefan ondsware 
 leof æfter long hwil , swa he læt|late magan , 
 ellen oncyðig , oreþe gewealdan : 
 " hwæt#2 , þu me|ic , wine|win min|ic , word nægest , 
 fus frignan|fregnan , se þu|þe|se ic furþum ær 
 æfre on|an ealdor|eald ængum nesan|neh|ne willan 
 mann ofer molde meldian|melda weorðan , 
 þegn|þegen on|an þeon|þeodan|þeod , butan þu|þe|se nu þe|þa|ða|se , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þæt|se wundredan wer and ides , 
 and on|an geað gutan , giedd mænan 
 bi|be me|ic lifgendum . huru , ic nyllan|nillan self 
 þurh gielpcwide gæstes min 
 frofor gelettan , nesan|neh|ne fæder min 
 æfre geæfnan , æbylgan god . 
 simble me|ic onsendan sigedryhten min|ic , 
 folc feorhgiefa , siððan ic furþum ongon 
 on|an se æfteran anseld bugan 
 geargemearces , gæstan|gan halig , 
 engel ufancundne , se mec efen gehwa , 
 meahtig meotudes þegn , and on|an morgen eft , 
 sigorfæst geseсan|gesecan , and me|ic sar gehwylc 
 gehælan hygesorge , and me|ic in hreþer bileac 
 wuldor wilboda wisdom giefu|giefan 
 micel monigfealdran þonne|se ænig mann|man wite|witan 
 in lif heran|her , þu|þe|se me|ic alyfan nesan 
 toh|to gecyþan cwic ængum 
 on|an foldwege firas cynn|cyn , 
 þæt|se me|ic nesan|neh|ne magan mann ænig 
 bideaglian hwæt#2 he dearninga 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hyсgan heorte geþoncum , 
 siððan he me|ic for|faran eage onsyne wearð . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic on|an mod mað mann gehwylcne 
 þeodnes þrymcyme oþ|oð þes dæg . 
 libban mann , nu ic for|faran lufu|lufe þinne|þin , 
 and geferscype þæt|se witan fyrn mid wit 
 long|lange læstan|læst , nelle ic lætan þu|þe|se 
 æfre unrotne æfter ealdorlege 
 meðne modseocne minre|min geweorðan , 
 seoþan sorgwælmum . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic sibb|sib wiþ þu|þe|se 
 healdan|heald willan . nu of hreþerlocan 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se soþ gefea sawel fundað . 
 nesan seon|seo|se tidan|tid læt , tydrað þes banfæt , 
 greothord gnornað , gæstan|gan he fyseð 
 on|an eсe geard , utsiþes geornan|georn 
 on|an sellan gesetu . nu ic swiðe|swiðan wesan|seon|eoh 
 weorc gewergad . " þe|þa|ða|se toh|to þæm|þam|se wegan|wag gesag , 
 heafelan onhylde , hyrdan|hyran|hirde þu|þa|se gena 
 ellen on|an innan . oroð stundum teon 
 mægen modig , him|hi|he of muðe cuman 
 swecca swetast . swilce on|an sumer tidan|tid 
 stincað on|an stow staþelum fæstan|fæst 
 wynn æfter wongum wyrtian|wyrt geblowene , 
 hunigflowende , swa se halig|halga|haleg wesan|seon|beon 
 ondlongne dæg oþ æfen forþ|forð 
 oroð up hlæden . þu|þa|se se æþelu|æþelian|æþele|æþel|æðele glæm 
 setlgong sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , sweorcan norðrodor 
 woh under wolcn|wolcen , weorold mist|missan oferteon , 
 þystru|þystre biþeahte , þrong niht|neaht ofer tiht 
 land frætwa . þe|þa|ða|se cuman leoht micel , 
 halig of heofon hædre scinan , 
 beorht ofer burgsalu . bidan se þu|þe|se sculan 
 eadig on|an ellen endedogor , 
 awrecan wælstrælum . wuldor scima , 
 æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele ymb æþele , ondlonge niht|neaht 
 scinan scirwered . scadu sweþredon , 
 tolysan under lyft . wesan|seon|beon se leoht glæm 
 ymb þæt|se halig|haleg hus , heofonlic condel , 
 from|fram æfenglome oþþæt eastan|east cuman 
 ofer deop gelad dægredwoma , 
 wedertacen wearm . arisan|ar se wuldormago , 
 eadig ellen gemyndig , sprecan toh|to hit|his|he onbehtþegne , 
 torht toh|to hit|his|he treowe|treow gesiþ : " tidan|tid wesan|seon|is þæt|se þu ferian|feran , 
 and þu|þa|se ærende eal biþence , 
 ofestum lædan , swa ic þu|þe|se ær bibead , 
 lacan|lac toh|to leof . nu of lice wesan|seon|is , 
 goddreama geornan|georn , gæstan|gan swiðe|swiðan fus . " 
 ahebban þu|þa|se hit|his|he honda , husl gereorded , 
 eaðmod þywan|þy|þe|se æþele gyfle , swilce he hit|his|he eage ontynan , 
 halig|haleg heafod gimm , biseah þu|þa|se toh|to heofon romana , 
 glædmod toh|to geofon lean , and þu|þa|se hit|his|he gæstan|gan onsendan 
 weorc wlitig in wuldor dream . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon guðlaces gæstan|gan lædan|gelædan 
 eadig on|an upweg . engel feredun 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se long gefea , liс|lic colian , 
 belifd under lyft . þe|þa|ða|se þær sunnan|leoht æsсe , 
 beam beorhtian . eal þæt|se beacen wesan|seon|beon 
 ymb þæt|se halig|haleg hus , heofonlic leoma , 
 from|fram folde up swilce fyren tor 
 ryht aræran oþ|oð rodera hrof , 
 seon|geseon under swegl|swegel , sunne|sunnan|sunna beorht , 
 æþeltungla wlite|wlitan . engel þreatas 
 sigeleoð singan , swegan|sweg wesan|seon|beon on|an lyft 
 hyrian|hyran|gehyran under heofon , halig dream . 
 swa se burgstede wesan|seon|beon bliss gefyllan|fyllan , 
 swete stencum and sweglwundrum , 
 eadig yrfestol , engel hleoðres , 
 eal innanweard . þær wesan|seon|beon ænliс 
 and wynsum þonne|se hit in weorold mæge|mæg|magan 
 stefn areccan , hu se stenc and se swegan|sweg , 
 heofonlic hleoþor and se halig|halgian|halga|haleg song , 
 hyrian|hyran|gehyran wesan|seon|beon , heahþrym god , 
 breahtem æfter breahtm . beofode þæt|se ealond , 
 foldwong onþrong . þe|þa|ða|se afyrhted wearð 
 ar , ellen biloren , gewitan þu|þa|se ofestlice 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan unhyðig , þæt|se he bitan|bat gestigan , 
 wæghengest wræc|wrecan , wæterþisa for|faran , 
 snel under sorh|sorg . swegl hatan|hat scinan , 
 blican|blac ofer burgsalo . brimwudu scynde , 
 sunnan|leoht , lad fus . lagumearg snyrede , 
 gehlæsted toh|to hyðe , þæt|se se hærnflota 
 æfter sundplegan sondlond gespearn , 
 grond wiþ|wið greotan . gnornsorge wegan 
 hatan|hat æt|etan heorte , hyсgan|hyg|hycgan geomurne , 
 meðne modsefa , se þu|þe|se hit|his|he mondryhten , 
 lif bilidenne , last weardian 
 witan|wist , wine|win leof . him|hi|he se wop hringan|hring 
 torn gemonade . teagor yðum weol , 
 hatan|hat hleordropan , and on|an hreþer wegan 
 micel modceare . he þære|se mægeð sculan 
 lacu|lacan|lac gelædan laðspel toh|to soð . 
 cuman þu|þa|se freorigferð þær seon|seo|se fæmne wesan|seon|beon , 
 wuldor wynmæg . he þu|þa|se wyrdan|wyrd nesan|neh|ne mað , 
 fæge forðsið . fusleoð agalan 
 wineþearfende , and þæt|se word acwæð : 
 " ellen beon selast þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se oftost sculan 
 dreogan dryhtenbealu , deop behycgan 
 þroht þeodengedal , þonne|se seon|seo|se þrag cymeð , 
 wefan wyrdstæf . þæt|se witan se þu|þe|se sculan 
 aswæman sarigferð , witan hit|his|he sincgiefa 
 hold biheledne . he sculan hean|heah þanan 
 geomor hweorfan . þæm|þam|se bið gomenes wanian|wana 
 þu|þe|ðe þu|þa|se earfeða oftost dreogeð 
 on|an sarig sefa . huru , ic swiðe|swiðan nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 hinsiþ behlehhan . wesan|seon|is hlaford min|ic , 
 beorn bealdor , and broþor|broðor þu|þin , 
 se selesta bi|be sæ tweonum 
 þær|se þu|þe|se we on|an engel æfre frinan 
 acennedne þurh cildes had 
 guma cynn|cyn , toh|to god dom , 
 werig wraþu , worulddreamum of , 
 winemæga wyn , in wuldor þri , 
 witan|gewitan , winiga hleo , wiс|wicu neosan 
 eardes on|an upweg . nu se eorþ|eorðe dælan|dæl , 
 banhus abrecan burh|burg in innan 
 wunað wælræste , and se wuldor dælan|dæl 
 of licfæte in sunnan|leoht god 
 sigorlean sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , and þu|þe|se secgan hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 þæt|se git|gietan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a motan in þæm|þam|se ecan gefea 
 mid þu|þa|se sibgedryht somudeard niman , 
 weorc wuldorlean , willum neotan 
 blæd and blissian|bliss . eacan|eac þu|þe|se abeodan hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 sigedryhten min|ic , þu|þa|se he wesan|seon|beon siþ fus , 
 þæt|se þu hit|his|he lichoman , libban mægða , 
 eorþ|eorðe biðeahte . nu þu ædre const 
 siþfæt min . ic sculan sarigferð , 
 heanmod hweorfan , hyсgan|hyg|hycgan drusendne . " 
 
 hwæt#2 ! we feor and neah friсgan habað 
 ofer middangeard moyses dom , 
 wræclico wordriht , wer cneoris ,-- 
 in uprodor eadig gehwa 
 æfter bealusiðe bot lifes|lif , 
 lifigendra gehwa langsum rædan|ræd ,-- 
 hæleðum secgan . gehyran se þu|þe|ðe willan ! 
 se on|an westen|westan werod drihten , 
 soþfæst cyning , mid hit|his|he sylfes miht 
 gewyrðode , and him|hi|he wundrian|wundor|wund fela , 
 ece alwalda , in æht forgifan|forgiefan . 
 he wesan|seon|beon leof god , leode|leoda|leod aldor , 
 horsc and hreðergleaw , here wisian|wis , 
 freoh|freo folctoga . faraones cyn , 
 god andsaca , gyrdwite bindan , 
 þær him|hi|he gesellan sigorian|sigor waldend , 
 modig magoræswan , hit|his|he mæg|mecgan|magian|maga feorh , 
 onwist eðles , abrahames sunu . 
 heah wesan|seon|beon þæt|se handlean and him|hi|he hold frea , 
 gesellan wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen geweald wiþ|wið wrað gryre , 
 ofercuman|ofercom mid þywan|þy|þe|se camp cneomaga fela , 
 feond folcriht . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon forma sið 
 þæt|se he werod god word nægde , 
 þær he him|hi|he gesægde soðwundra fela , 
 hu þes weorold wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan witig drihten , 
 eorþ|eorðe ymbhwyrft and uprodor , 
 gesette|gesettan sigerice , and hit|his|he sylfes naman|nama , 
 se ieldo birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ær nesan|neh|ne cuðon , 
 frod fædera|fæder cyn , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi|heo fela witan . 
 habban he þu|þa|se swiðan soð cræft 
 and gewurðodne werod aldor , 
 faraones feond , on|an forðwegas . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon ingere eald wite|wita 
 deaðe gedrenced drihtfolca micel ; 
 hordwearda hryre heaf wesan|seon|beon geniwad , 
 swefan seledreamas , sincan|sinc berofene . 
 habban mansceaðan æt|etan middere niht|neaht 
 frecne|frecen|frec gefyllan|fyllan , frumbearna fela , 
 abrocene burhweardas . bana|ban wid scrað , 
 lað leodhata , land|finna drysmyde 
 dead hræw , dugoð forþ|forð gewitan , 
 wop wesan|seon|beon wid , worulddreama lutan . 
 wesan|seon|beon hleahtorsmiðum hand belucan , 
 alyfan laðsið leode|leodan|leod gretan ; 
 folc feran , feond wesan|seon|beon bereafian , 
 here on|an hell|hel . heofung þider becuman , 
 dreosan deofolgyld . dæg wesan|seon|beon mære|mæran 
 ofer middangeard þu|þa|se seon|seo|se mengeo for|faran . 
 swa se fæsten|fæstan dreogan fela missere , 
 ealdwerige , egypta folc , 
 se þu|þe|se hi|heo wideferð wyrnan þenсean|þenсan|þencan 
 moyses mæg|maga , gif hi|heo metod lætan|lettan , 
 on|an lang lust leof siðes . 
 fyrd wesan|seon|beon fysan , from|fram se þu|þe|ðe lædan , 
 modig magoræswa , mægburh hira|hi|heore . 
 oferfaran he mid þywan|þy|þe|se folc fæsten|fæst worn , 
 land|finna and leodweard laðra mannian|mann , 
 enge anpaðas , uncuþ gelad , 
 oðþæt hi|heo on|an guðmyrce gearu beran , 
 ( wesan|seon|beon land|finna hira|hi|heore lyfthelme beþeссan|beþeccan ) , 
 mearchofu morheald . moyses ofer þu|þa|se , 
 fela meoringa , fyrd gelædan . 
 hatan þu|þa|se ymb twegen|twa niht|neaht tirfæste hæleð , 
 siððan hi|heo feond oðfaren habban , 
 ymbwicigean werod bearhtme 
 mid ælfere æthanes burh|burg , 
 mægen micel mearclandum on|an . 
 nearu|nearo genidan on|an norðwegas , 
 witan him|hi|he be suðan sigelwara land|finna , 
 forbærnan burhhleoðu , brun leode|leodan|leod , 
 hat heofoncolum . þær halig god 
 wiþ|wið færbryne folc gescylde , 
 bælce oferbrædde byrnendne heofon , 
 halig|halga|haleg nette hatwendne lyft . 
 habban wederwolcen wid fæðmum 
 eorþ|eorðe and uprodor efne|efnan|efen gedælan|dælan , 
 lædan leodwerod , ligfyr adrincan , 
 hatan|hat heofontorht . hæleð wafedon , 
 drihta gedrymost . dægsceades hleo 
 windan|wand ofer wolcn|wolcen ; habban witig god 
 sunne|sunnan|sunna siþfæt segl ofertolden , 
 swa þu|þa|se mæstrapas mann nesan|neh|ne cuðon , 
 nesan|neh|ne þe|þa|ða|se seglrode geseon magan , 
 eorðbuende ealle|eall|eal cræftan|cræft , 
 hu afæstnod wesan|seon|beon feldhusa micel , 
 siððan he mid wuldor geweorðode 
 þeodenholde . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon þridda wiс|wican|wic 
 folc toh|to frofor . fyrd eall|eal geseon 
 hu þær hlifedon halig segl , 
 lyftwundor sunnan|leoht ; leode|leodan|leod ongeton , 
 dugoð israhela , þæt|se þær drihten cuman 
 werod drihten , wicsteal metan . 
 him|hi|he beforan foran fyr and wolcen 
 in beorhtrodor , beam twegen , 
 þær|se æghwæðer efngedælde 
 heahþegnunga halig gast , 
 deormodra sið dæg|dah|dag and niht|neaht . 
 þu|þa|se ic on|an morgen gefrignan mod rof 
 hebban herebyman hlud stefn , 
 wuldor woma . werod eall|eal arisan|ar , 
 modig mægen|magan , swa him|hi|he moyses bebeodan , 
 mære|mæran magoræswa , metod folc , 
 fus fyrdgetrum . forþ|forð geseon 
 lifes|lif latþeow lifweg metan ; 
 swegl siþ wealdan , sæmen æfter 
 faran flodwege . folc wesan|seon|beon on|an sal , 
 hlud here cyrm . heofonbeacen astigan 
 æfena gehwa , oðer wundor , 
 syllic æfter sunne|sunnan|sunna setlrade behealdan , 
 ofer leodwerum liсgan|leon scinan , 
 beornan beam . blæc|blac standan 
 ofer sceotend scir leoma ; 
 scinan scyldhreoðan , sceado swiðredon , 
 neowle nihtscuwan neah nesan|neh|ne mihton 
 heolstor ahydan ; heofoncandel birnan|biernan|beornan . 
 niwe nihtweard nyde sculan 
 wician ofer weredum , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan him|hi|he westengryre , 
 har hæðbroga , holmegum wederum 
 on|an ferclamme ferhð getwæfan . 
 habban foregenga fyren loccas , 
 blæc|blac beam ; bellegsan hwopan 
 in þæm|þam|se hereþreate , hatan|hat liсgan|leon , 
 þæt|se he on|an westen|westan werod forbærnan , 
 nymðe hi|heo modhwate moyses hyrdan|hyran|hirde . 
 scean scir|defena werod , scyldas lixan , 
 geseon randwigan rihte|rihtan|riht stræte|stræt , 
 segn ofer sweoton , oðþæt sæfæsten 
 land|finna æt|etan ende leodmægen forstandan , 
 fus on|an forðweg . fyrdwic arisan|ar ; 
 wyrpton hi|heo werig|werian , witan|wist genægdon 
 modig meteþegn , hyra|hyr|hira|hi mægen|magan beton . 
 brædan æfter beorg , siððan byme singan|sang , 
 flota feldhusum . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon feorþa wiс|wican|wic , 
 randwigena ræst , be þan|se reada|read sæ . 
 þær on|an fyrd hyra|hyr|hira|hi færspell becuman , 
 oht inlende . egsan stodan , 
 wælgryre werod ; wræcmon gebidan 
 laðne lastweard , se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he lange|lang ær 
 eðelleasum onnied gescraf , 
 wea wite|wita fæstan|fæst . wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon nesan|neh|ne gyman , 
 þeah þu|þe|se se yldra cyning ær ge . . . 
 þu|þa|se wearð yrfeweard ingefolca , 
 mannian|mann æfter maðmum , þæt|se he swa miceles geðah . 
 eall|eal se forgeton siððan gram wurdon|weorþan 
 egypta cyn ymbe|ymb antwig ; 
 þe|þa|ða|se heo hit|his|he mægwinum morðor fremman , 
 wroht berenedon , wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon fretan . 
 wesan|seon|beon heaðowylmas heorte getenge , 
 mihtmod wer ; manum treowe|treow 
 willan hi|heo þæt|se feorhlean facn|facen gyldan , 
 se hi|heo þæt|se dægweorc dreor gebycgan , 
 moyses leode|leodan|leod , þær him|hi|he mihtig god 
 on|an ðam|se spildsiðe spedan|sped forgifan . 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he eorl mod ortrywe wearð 
 siððan hi|heo geseon of suðwegum 
 fyrd faraonis forþ|forð ongangan , 
 eoferholt wegan , eored lixan , 
 ( gar trymman , guð hwearfian , 
 blican bordhreoðan , byme singan ) , 
 þufas þunian , þeodan|þeod mearc tredan . 
 on|an wæl|wel hropan herefugolas , 
 hildegrædige , 
 deawigfeðere ofer drihtneum , 
 winnan wælceasega . wulf singan 
 atol æfenleoð ætes on|an wenan|wena , 
 carleas deor , cwyldrof beodan 
 on|an laðra last leodmægen fyllan|fylan . 
 hropan mearcweardas midde|midd niht|neaht , 
 fleon|fleogan|flean fæge|fægan gast , folc wesan|seon|beon hnægan . 
 hwilum|hwil of þæm|þam|se werod|weorod wlanc þegn|þegen 
 metan milpaðas mearh boga|bog . 
 him|hi|he þær segncyning wiþ|wið se segn foran , 
 mannian|mann þengel , mearcþreate ridan|rad ; 
 guðweard guma grimhelm gespannan , 
 cyning cinberge , ( cumbol lixan ) , 
 wig on|an wena|wen , wælhlencan sceoc , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan hit|his|he hereciste healdan|heald georne|geornan|georn 
 fæstan|fæst fyrdgetrum . freond onsegon 
 laðum eage landmanna cyme . 
 ymb he wegan wigend unforht , 
 har heorawulfas hild gretan , 
 þurstige þræcwiges , þeodenholde . 
 habban him|hi|he alesen leode|leoda|leod dugeðe 
 tireadigra twegen|twa þusend , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon cyning and cneowmagas , 
 on|an þæt|se eald rihtan|riht , æðele deore|deor . 
 forðam an gehwilc ut alædan 
 wæpnedcynnes , wigan|wiga æghwilс 
 þær|se þu|þe|se he on|an ðam|se fyrst|first findan miht|meaht|magan . 
 wesan|seon|beon ingemen ealle|eall|eal ætgædere , 
 cyning on|an corðre . cuð oft gebidan 
 horn on|an heap toh|to hwæt|hwæs|hwa hægstealdmen , 
 guðþreat guma , gearu beran . 
 swa þær eorp werod , ecan lædan , 
 lað æfter laðum , leodmægen worn , 
 þusendmælum ; þider wesan|seon|beon fus . 
 habban hi|heo myntan|gemyntan toh|to þæm|þam|se mægenheapum 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se ærdæge israhela cynn 
 bil abreotan on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi broðorgyld . 
 forðam wesan|seon|beon in wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wop up ahebban , 
 atol æfenleoð , egesa standan . 
 werian wælnet , þu|þa|se se woma|wom cuman ; 
 fleon|fleogan frecne|frecen|frec spel . feond wesan|seon|beon anmod , 
 werud wesan|seon|beon wigblac , oðþæt wlanc forsceaf 
 mihtig engel , se þe|þa|ða|se menigu behealdan , 
 þæt|se þær gelaðe mid him|hi|he lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne mihton 
 geseon tosamne ; sið wesan|seon|beon gedælan|dælan . 
 habban nydfara nihtlangne fyrst , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he on|an healf gehwa hettend seomedon . 
 mægen|magan oððe merestream : nagan micel|mare|mara hwyrft . 
 wesan|seon|beon orwenan eðelrihtes , 
 sittan æfter beorg in blæc|blac reaf , 
 wea on|an wena|wen ; wæccende bidan 
 eall|eal seon|seo|se sibgedriht somod ætgædere 
 micel|mare|mara mægenes , oþ|oð moyses bebeodan 
 eorl on|an uhttid ærnum bemum 
 folc somnigean , frec arisan , 
 habban hira|hi|heore hlencan , hycgan on|an ellen , 
 beran|bera beorht searo , beacn|beacen cigean 
 sweot sande near . snelle gemunan 
 weard wigleoð , werod wesan|seon|beon fysan , 
 brudon ofer burh|burg , ( byme gehyrdan|gehyran ) , 
 flota feldhusum , fyrd wesan|seon|beon on|an ofost . 
 siððan hi|heo getellan wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se teonhete 
 on|an þæm|þam|se forðherge feþa twelfe|twelf 
 mod rof ; mægen|magan wesan|seon|beon onhreran . 
 wesan|seon|beon on|an an gehwa æðele cynn|cyn 
 alesen under lindum leode|leoda|leod duguðe 
 on|an folcgetæl fiftig cista ; 
 habban cista gehwilc cuðes werod 
 garberendra , guðfremmendra , 
 x hund|1000 geteled , tireadigra . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon wiglic werod . wacan|wac nesan|neh|ne gretan 
 in þæt|se rincgetæl ræswan|ræswa here , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se for|faran geoguþ git nesan|neh|ne mihton 
 under bordhreoðan breostnet wer 
 wiþ|wið flan feond folm werigean , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he bealubenne gebidan|bidan habban 
 ofer linde lærig , licwunde spor , 
 gylpplegan gar . gamele nesan|neh|ne motan , 
 har heaðorincas , hild onþeon , 
 gif him|hi|he modheapum mægen|magan swiðrade , 
 acan|ac hi|heo be wæstm wigheap сeosan|ceosan , 
 hu in leodscipe læstan|læst willan 
 mod mid are , eacan|eac þan|se mægen cræftan|cræft , 
 garbeames fon gretan miht|meaht|magan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon handrofra herian|here|heran ætgædere , 
 fus forðwegas . fanu|fana|fah up geridan|gerad , 
 beam beorhtost ; bidan ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se gen 
 hwonne siðboda sæstreamum neah 
 sunnan|leoht ofer lindum lyftedoras brecan . 
 ahleop þu|þa|se for|faran hæleðum hildecalla , 
 bald beadohata , bord up ahebban , 
 hatan þu|þa|se folctogan fyrd gestillan , 
 þenden modig meðel manig gehyrdan|gehyran . 
 willan reordigean rices hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 ofer hereciste halig|halga|haleg stefn , 
 werod wisian|wis wurðmyndum sprecan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne beoð ge þywan|þy|þe|se forhtran , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se faraon bringan|brengan 
 sweordwigendra side|sid here , 
 eorl unrim ! him|hi|he eall|eal willan|wil 
 mihtig drihten þurh min hand 
 toh|to dæge|dæg þes dædlean gyfan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo lifian lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne motan 
 ægnian mid yrmðum israhela cyn . 
 nesan|neh|ne willað ge|eowan|eow andrædan dead feþa , 
 fæge|fægan ferhðlocan . fyrst wesan|seon|is æt|etan ende 
 læn lifes|lif . ge|eowan|eow wesan|seon|is lar god 
 abroden of breost . ic on|an betera rædan|ræd , 
 þæt|se ge gewurðien wuldor aldor , 
 and ge|eowan|eow liffrea lissa biddan , 
 sigorian|sigor gesynto , þær ge siðien . 
 þes wesan|seon|is se ecea abrahames god , 
 frumsceafta frea , se þes|se fyrd wereð , 
 modig and mægenrof , mid þære|se micel hand . " 
 hof|hebban þe|þa|ða|se for|faran here hlud stefn 
 lifigendra þeon|þeodan , þu|þa|se he toh|to leode|leoda|leod sprecan : 
 " hwæt#2 , ge nu eage toh|to on|an lociað , 
 folc leofost , færwundra sum|su , 
 hu ic self slean and þes|þeoh|se swiðre hand 
 grene tacn|tacen garsecges deop . 
 yð up færeð , ofost wyrceð 
 wæter wealfæsten weg syndon dryge|drygan , 
 hasu herestræta , holm ryman , 
 eald staðolas , þu|þa|se ic ær nesan|neh|ne gefrignan 
 ofer middangeard mann gefere|gefera . 
 fah feld , þu|þa|se forþ|forð heonan 
 in ece tidan|tid yðe þeссean|þeссan|þeccan , 
 sælan sægrund . suðwind forniman , 
 bæðweges blæst . brim wesan|seon|is areafod , 
 sand sæcir span . ic witan soð gear 
 þæt|se ge|eowan|eow mihtig god milts gecyðde , 
 eorl ærglade . ofest wesan|seon|is selost 
 þæt|se ge of feond fæðme weorðen , 
 nu se agend up aræran 
 read stream in randgebeorh . 
 syndon þu|þa|se foreweallas fæger|fæge gestepte , 
 wrætlicu wægfaru , oþ|oð wolcn|wolcen hrof . " 
 æfter þæm|þam|se word werod eall|eal arisan|ar , 
 modig mægen|magan . merian|mere stille|stillan bidan . 
 hebban herecyste hwit linde , 
 segnas on|an sande . sæweall astigan , 
 uplang gestandan wiþ|wið israhelum 
 andægne fyrst . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se eorl gedriht 
 an mod , 
 fæst fæðmum freoðowære healdan . 
 nalles hige gehyrdan|gehyran halig lar , 
 siððan leof leoþ|leon læstan|læst near 
 swegan|sweg swiðrode and sances blandan . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se feorþa cyn fyrmest|forma gan|eadan , 
 wod|wadan on|an wægstream , wigan|wiga on|an heap , 
 ofer grene grund , iudisc feða 
 on|an orette on|an uncuþ gelad 
 for|faran hit|his|he mægwinum . swa him|hi|he mihtig god 
 se dægweorc deop lean forgieldan , 
 siððan him|hi|he gesælan sigorworca hreð , 
 þæt|se he ealdordom aginnan|agan sculan 
 ofer cynerice , cneowmaga blæd . 
 habban him|hi|he toh|to segne , þu|þa|se hi|heo on|an sund stigan , 
 ofer bordhreoðan beacen aræran 
 in þæm|þam|se garheape , gylden|gyldan leon|leo , 
 drihtfolca micel , deore|deor cenost . 
 be þæm|þam|se herewisan hynðo nesan|neh|ne willan 
 be him|hi|he lifigendum lange|lang þolian , 
 þonne|se hi|heo toh|to guðe garwudu ræran 
 ðeoda ænigre . þracu wesan|seon|beon on|an ore , 
 heard handplega , hægsteald modig 
 wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen wælslihtes , wigend unforht , 
 bilswaðu blodig , beadumægnes ræs , 
 grimhelm gegrind , þær iudas for|faran . 
 æfter þære|se fyrd flotian|flota modgade , 
 rubenes sunu . randas beran 
 sæwicingas ofer sealten|sealt mersc , 
 mannian|mann menio ; micel angetrum 
 gan|eadan unforht . he hit|his|he ealdordom 
 synn aswebban , þæt|se he siðor for|faran 
 on|an leof last . him|hi|he on|an leodsceare 
 frumbearnes rihtan|riht freobroðor oðþah , 
 eadan|ead and æðele ; he wesan|seon|beon gearu swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah . 
 þær forþ|forð æfter him|hi|he folc þryðum 
 sunu simeones sweota cuman ; 
 þridde þeodmægen ( þufas windan 
 ofer garfare ) guðcyste onþrang 
 deawig sceaftum . dægwoma becuman 
 ofer garsecge , god beacnian|beacn|beacen sum|su , 
 morgen mæretorht ; mægen|magan forþ|forð gewitan . 
 þu|þa|se þær folcmægen for|faran æfter oðer , 
 isernhergum . on|an wisian 
 mægenþrymmum micel , þywan|þy|þe|se he mære|mæran wearð , 
 on|an forðwegas folc æfter wolcn|wolcen , 
 cynn æfter cynn . cuðe æghwilc 
 mægburga rihtan|riht , swa him|hi|he moises beodan , 
 eorl æðele . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon on|an fæder , 
 leof leodfruma , landriht geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon , 
 frod on|an ferhðe , freomagum leof . 
 cennan cneowsibbe cene mannian|mann 
 heahfæder sum|su , halig þeon|þeodan|þeod , 
 israela cyn , onriht god , 
 swa þæt|se orþanc eald reccað 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se mægburge micel gefrunon , 
 frumcyn feorh , fæderæðelo gehwæs . 
 niwe flod noe oferlað , 
 þrymfæst þeon|þeodan , mid hit|his|he þri sunu , 
 se deopestan drencefloda 
 þær|se þu|þe|ðe geweorþan on|an woruldrice . 
 habban him|hi|he on|an hreðre halig treowe|treow ; 
 forðam he gelædan ofer lagustreamas 
 maðmhorda micel , min gefræge . 
 on|an feorhgebeorh folde habban 
 eall|eal eorðcynne ece laf , 
 frumcneow gehwæs , fæder and moder 
 tuddorteondra , geteled riman|rim 
 mismicelra þonne|se mann cunnan , 
 snottor sæleoda . eacan|eac þon|se sæd gehwilc 
 on|an bearm scip beorn ferian , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se under heofon hæleð bryttigað . 
 swa þæt|se wise|wis mann word secgað 
 þæt|se from|fram noe nigoða wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 fæder abrahames on|an folctale . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is se abraham se him|hi|he engel god 
 naman|nama niwe asceop ; eacan|eac þon|se neah and feor 
 halig heap in gehyld bebeodan , 
 werþeoda geweald ; he on|an wræc|wrecan libban . 
 siððan he gelædan leofost feorh 
 halig hæs ; heahlond stigan 
 sibgemagas , on|an seone beorgan . 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon hi|heo þær findan , wuldor|seolh|bearm geseon , 
 halig heahtreowe , swa hæleð gefrunon . 
 þær eft se snottra sunu dauides , 
 wuldorfæst cyning , wittig lar 
 getimbrede templ|tempel god , 
 alh halig , eorðcyninga 
 se wisesta on|an woruldrice , 
 heahst and haligost , hæleðum gefrægost , 
 micel and mærost , þær|se þu|þe|se mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 firas æfter folde , folm gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se meðelstede magan|maga gelædan 
 abraham isaac . adfyr onbran ; 
 fyrst ferhðbana no þywan|þy|þe|se fægen wesan|seon|beon . 
 willan se lastweard liсgan|leon gesyllan , 
 in bælblyse beorn selost , 
 hit|his|he swæs sunu toh|to sigetibre , 
 ange ofer eorþ|eorðe yrfelafe , 
 feorh frofor , þe|þa|ða|se he swa forþ|forð gebidan , 
 leode|leoda|leod toh|to laf , langsum hyht . 
 he þæt|se gecyðde , þu|þa|se he se cniht geniman 
 fæstan|fæst mid folm , folccuð geteag 
 eald laf , ( ecg grymetode ) , 
 þæt|se he him|hi|he lifdagas leofran nesan|neh|ne witan 
 þonne|se he hyrdan|hyran|hirde heofoncyninge . 
 up aræmde abraham þu|þa|se ; 
 se eorl willan slean eaferan sinnan|sin 
 unweaxenne , ecgum reodan|reod 
 magan|maga mid mece , gif he metod lætan|lettan . 
 nesan|neh|ne willan him|hi|he beorht fæder birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ætniman , 
 halig tiber , acan|ac mid hand befon . 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he styran cuman stefn of heofon , 
 wuldor hleoðor , word æfter sprecan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne slean þu , abraham , þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 sunu mid sweord ! soð wesan|seon|is gecyðed , 
 nu þu|þin cunnian cyning alwihta , 
 þæt|se þu wiþ|wið waldend wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon healdan , 
 fæstan|fæst treowe|treow , seon|seo|se þu|þe|se freoðo sculan 
 in lifdagum lengest|lengan|lange weorðan , 
 awa toh|to ald unswiciendo . 
 hu þurfan|þearf mann sunu micel|mare|mara treowe|treow gewinnan|geblandan 
 nesan|neh|ne behwylfan mæg|magan heofon and eorþ|eorðe 
 hit|his|he wuldor word , widdra and siddra 
 þonne|se befæðman mæge|mæg|magan folde sceatt , 
 eorþ|eorðe ymbhwyrft and uprodor , 
 garsecges gin and þes|þeoh|se geomor lyft . 
 he að swereð , engel þeon|þeodan , 
 wyrd waldend and wereda god , 
 soþfæst sigorian|sigor , þurh hit|his|he sylfes lif , 
 þæt|se þin cynn|cyn and cneowmaga , 
 randwiggendra , riman|rim nesan|neh|ne cunnan , 
 ieldo ofer eorþ|eorðe , ealle|eall|eal cræftan|cræft 
 toh|to gesecgenne soð word , 
 nymðe hwylc|hwilc se snottor in sefa weorðe 
 þæt|se he ana|an mæge|mæg|magan ealle|eall|eal geriman 
 stan on|an eorþ|eorðe , steorra on|an heofon , 
 sæbeorga sand , sealtan|sealt yða ; 
 acan|ac hi|heo gesittað be sæ tweonum 
 oþ|oð egipte incaðeode 
 land|finna cananea , leode|leodan|leod þin , 
 freobearn fæder , folc selost . " 
 folc wesan|seon|beon afæran , flodegsa becuman 
 gast geomor , geofon deaðe hwopan . 
 wesan|seon|beon beorhhliðu blod besteman , 
 holm heolfre spiwan , hream wesan|seon|beon on|an yðum , 
 wæter wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen ful , wælmist astigan . 
 wesan|seon|beon egypte eft oncyrde , 
 fleon|fleogan forhtian , fær ongeton , 
 willan herebleaðe ham findan , 
 gylp wearð gnornra . him|hi|he ongeagn genap 
 atol yða gewealcan|gewealc , nesan|neh|ne þær ænig becuman 
 here toh|to ham , acan|ac behindan belucan 
 wyrdan|wyrd mid wegan . þær ær weg liсgan , 
 merian|mere modgode , mægen|magan wesan|seon|beon adrenced . 
 stream standan , storm up gewitan 
 heah toh|to heofon , herewopa micel . 
 laðe cyrmdon , ( lyft up geswearc ) , 
 fæge stæfnum , flod blod gewadan . 
 randbyrig wesan|seon|beon rofene , rodor swipode 
 meredeaða micel , modig sweltan , 
 cyning on|an corðre , cyre swiðrode 
 sæ æt|etan ende . wigbord scinan 
 heah ofer hæleðum , holmweall astigan , 
 merestream modig . mægen|magan wesan|seon|beon on|an cwealm 
 fæstan|fæst gefeterod , forðganges wegan|weg 
 searu æsæled , sand basnian , 
 witod fyrd , hwonne waðema stream , 
 sincalda sæ , sealt yðum 
 æflastum gewunian|gewuna ece staðulas , 
 nacud nydboda , neosan cuman|come , 
 fah feðegast , se þu|þe|ðe feond geneop . 
 wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se hæwene lyft heolfre geblandan|blandan , 
 brim berstan blodegesan hwopan , 
 sæmann sið , oðþæt soð metod 
 þurh moyses hand modig ryman , 
 wid wæðde , wælfæðmum swapan . 
 flod famgode , fæge|fægan crinсgan|cringan|crincgan , 
 lah|lagu land|finna gefeallan , lyft wesan|seon|beon onhreran , 
 wican weallfæsten , wægas berstan , 
 meltan meretorras , þu|þa|se se mihtig slean 
 mid halig hand , heofonrices weard , 
 on|an werbeamas . wlanc ðeode 
 nesan|neh|ne mihton forhabban helpendra pað , 
 merestreames mod , acan|ac he manig gesceod 
 gyllende gryre . garsecg wedd|wedan , 
 up ateon , on|an slupan . egesa standan , 
 weallan wælbenna . witrod gefeallan 
 heah of heofon handweorc god , 
 famigbosma flodwearde slean , 
 unhleowan wegan , ald mece , 
 þæt|se se deaðdrepe drihte swefan , 
 synfullra sweot . sawol linnan 
 fæstan|fæst befarene , flodblac herian|here|heran , 
 siððan hi|heo on|an bugan brun ypping , 
 modewæga micel . mægen|magan eall|eal gedreas 
 þe|þa|ða|se gedrencte wesan|seon|beon dugoð egypta , 
 faraon mid hit|his|he folc . he onfond hraðe , 
 siððan grund gestigan god andsaca , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon mihtig mereflodes weard ; 
 willan heorufæðmum hild gesceadan , 
 yrre|irre and egesfull . egyptum wearð 
 se dægweorc deop lean gesceod , 
 forðam se here ham eft nesan|neh|ne cuman 
 eall|eal ungrundes ænig toh|to laf , 
 se sið hira|hi|heore secgan motan , 
 bodigean æfter burh|burg bealospella micel , 
 hordwearda hryre , hæleða cwene|cwen , 
 acan|ac þu|þa|se mægenþreatas meredeað geswealh , 
 spelbodan eacan|eac . se þu|þe|ðe spedan|sped agan , 
 ageat gylp wer . hi|heo wiþ|wið god winnan ! 
 þanan israhelum ece ræd 
 on|an merehwearfe moyses sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 heahþungen wer , halig sprecan , 
 deop ærende|ærend . dægword nemnað 
 swa git werðeode , on|an gewrit findað 
 dom gehwylc , þær|se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he drihten bebeodan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se siðfate soð word , 
 gif onlucan willan|wil lifes|lif wealhstod , 
 beorht in breost , banhuses weard , 
 ginfæsten god gast cægon . 
 run bið recenian|gerecenian , rædan|ræd forþ|forð gæð , 
 hafað wislicu word on|an fæðme , 
 willan|wil meagollice mod tæcan 
 þæt|se we gesne nesan|neh|ne syn god þeodscipes , 
 metod miltsian|milts . he we|us micel onlyhð , 
 nu we|us boh|bocere betera secgað 
 lengra lifwynna . þes wesan|seon|is lænan|læn dream , 
 womm awyrgan , wreccum alyfan , 
 earm anbid . eðellease 
 þes gystsele gihðum healdað , 
 murnað on|an mod , manhus witan 
 fæstan|fæst under folde , þær bið fyr and wyrm , 
 open ece scræf . yfel gehwilc 
 swa nu regnþeofas romana dælað , 
 ieldo oððe ærdeað . eftwyrd cymð , 
 mægenþrymma micel ofer middangeard , 
 dæg dæd fah . drihten self 
 on|an þæm|þam|se meðelstede manig demeð , 
 þonne|se he soðfæstra sawol|sawlian|sawel lædeð , 
 eadig gast , on|an uprodor , 
 þær wesan|seon|is sunnan|leoht and lif , eacan|eac þon|se lissa blæd ; 
 dugoð on|an dream drihten herigað , 
 werod wuldorcyning , toh|to wid feorh . 
 swa reordian ræde|ræd gemyndig 
 mannian|mann mildost , miht swiðed , 
 hlud stefn ; herian|here|heran stille|stillan bidan 
 witod willan|willa , wundor ongeton , 
 modig muðhæl ; he toh|to mænegum sprecan : 
 " micel wesan|seon|is þes|þeoh|se menigu , mægenwisa trum , 
 fullesta micel , se þes|se faru|faran|fah lædeð ; 
 hafað we|us on|an cananea cyn gelyfan 
 burh and beah|beag , brad romana ; 
 willan|wil nu gelæstan þæt|se he lange|lang hettan|gehatan 
 mid aðsware , engel drihten , 
 in fyrndagum fæderyncynne , 
 gif ge gehealdað halig lar , 
 þæt|se ge feond gehwone forþ|forð ofergangað , 
 gesittað sigerice be sæ tweonum , 
 beorsele beorn . bið ge|eower blæd micel ! " 
 æfter þæm|þam|se word werod wesan|seon|beon on|an sal , 
 singan sigebyman , ( segnas standan ) , 
 on|an fæger swegan|sweg ; folc wesan|seon|beon on|an land|finna , 
 habban wuldor beam werud lædan|gelædan , 
 halig heap , on|an hild god . 
 lif gefegon þu|þa|se hi|heo oðlæded habban 
 feorh of feond dom , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe hi|heo hit frecne|frecen|frec geneðdon , 
 wer under wæterian|wæter hrofas . geseon hi|heo þær weall standan , 
 ealle|eall|eal him|hi|he brim blodig þynсan|þyncan , þurh þu|þa|se hira|hi|heore beadosearo wegan . 
 hreðdon hildespelle , siððan hi|heo þæm|þam|se here wiðforon ; 
 hebban hereþreatas hlud stefn , 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se dædweorce drihten herian|heredon , 
 wer wuldor singan|sang ; wif on|an oðer , 
 folcsweota micel , fyrdleoð golan 
 acol stefn , eallwundra fela . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eðfynde afrisc meowle 
 on|an geofon staðe gold geweorðod . 
 hand hebban halswurðunge , 
 bliðe wesan|seon|beon , bot geseon , 
 hedan herereafes , hæftan wesan|seon|beon onsæled . 
 onginnan sælafe segnum dælan 
 on|an yðlafe , eald madmas , 
 reofan|reaf and randas . heo on|an rihtan|riht sceþþan|sceon|sceadan 
 gold and godweb , iosepes gestreon , 
 wer wuldorgesteald . werigend liсgan 
 on|an deaðstede , drihtfolca micel . 
 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se nedfere næni wyrþeþ 
 þances snotera , þonne|se him|hi|he þurfan|þearf su 
 toh|to gehicgenne ær hit|his|he heonengange 
 hwæt#2 hit|his|he gast god oþþe|oððe yfel 
 æfter deaþ heonan deman weorþan|weorþ . 
 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh halgungboc ; healdan|heald he dryhten 
 þu|þe|se me|ic fæger þus frætewum beleсgan|belecgan . 
 þureð toh|to þance þus hettan|het|hedan|hatan me|ic wyrcean , 
 toh|to loue and toh|to weorþ , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se sunnan|leoht gesceppan . 
 gemyndi wesan|seon|is he miht|meaht gehwylcre 
 se þu|þe|se he on|an folde gefremian mæg|magan , 
 and him|hi|he geþancie þeod waldend 
 se þu|þe|se he on|an gemynd madma manig|manega 
 wyle gemearcian metod toh|to lacu|lacan|lac ; 
 and he sculan æce lean ealle|eall|eal findan 
 se þu|þe|se he on|an folde fremaþ toh|to ryhte . 
 
 þonne gemiltsað þu|þe|se , næs|ne . , mund qui regit , 
 ðeoda þrymcyningc thronum sedentem 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a butan ende 
 saule þinne|þin 
 geunnan þu|þe|se on|an lif auctor pacis 
 sibb|sib gesælða , salus mundi , 
 metod se mære magna uirtute , 
 and se soðfæsta summi filius 
 fon on|an fultuman|fultum , factor cosmi , 
 se of æþele wesan|seon|beon uirginis partu 
 clæne acennan christus in orbem , 
 metod þurh marian , mundi redemptor , 
 and þurh se halig|halga|haleg gast . uoca frequenter 
 biddan|bidan helpes he , clemens deus , 
 se onsendan wesan|seon|beon summo de throno 
 and þære|se clæne clara uoce 
 þu|þa|se gebyrd bodade bona uoluntate 
 þæt|se heo sculan cennan christum regem , 
 eall|eal cyning cyningc , casta uiuendo . 
 and þu þu|þa|se soðfæstan supplex rogo , 
 fultum biddan friclo uirginem almum , 
 and þær æfter toh|to omnes sancti 
 bliðmod biddan , beatus etan|et iustus , 
 þæt|se hi|heo ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se unica uoce 
 þingian toh|to þeodne thronum regentem , 
 æcum drihten , alta polorum , 
 þæt|se he þin saule , summus iudex , 
 onfon freolice , factor aeternus , 
 and he gelædan lucan perhennem , 
 þær eadig animæ sanctæ 
 romana restað regnian|regn caelorum . 
 
 hwæt#2 ! ic swefnian|swefn cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan secgan wylle , 
 hwæt#2 me|ic gemætan toh|to midd niht|neaht 
 siððan reordberend restan wunedon . 
 þynсan|þyncan me|ic þæt|se ic geseon|gesawan sylliс treow 
 on|an lyft lædan , sunnan|leoht bewindan , 
 beam beorhtost . eall|eal þæt|se beacen wesan|seon|beon 
 begeotan mid gold . gimm standan 
 fæger æt|etan folde sceat , swilce þær fife wesan|seon|beon 
 uppe on|an þæm|þam|se eaxlgespanne . behealdan þær engel dryhten ealle|eall|eal 
 fæger þurh forðgesceaft . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þær huru fracodes gealga , 
 acan|ac he þær behealdan halig gast , 
 mann ofer molde , and eall|eal þes|þeoh|se mære|mæran gesceaft . 
 syllic wesan|seon|beon se sigebeam , and ic synn fah , 
 forwunded mid womm . geseon ic wuldor treow , 
 wædum geweorðode , wynn scinan , 
 gyrwan|gegyrwan mid gold ; gimm habban 
 bewrigene weorðlice wealdende treow . 
 hwæðre ic þurh þæt|se gold ongytan magan 
 earm ærgewin , þæt|se hit ærest|ær onginnan 
 swætan on|an þu|þa|se swiðran healf . eall|eal ic wesan|seon|beon mid sorh|sorg gedrefan|drefan , 
 forht ic wesan|seon|beon for|faran þære|se fæger gesiht . geseon ic þæt|se fus beacen 
 wendan wædum and bleo : hwilum|hwil hit wesan|seon|beon mid wæt besteman , 
 beswyled mid swat gangan|gang , hwilum|hwil mid sincan|sinc gyrwan|gegyrwan . 
 hwæðre ic þær licgan lange|lang hwil 
 behealdan hreowcearig hælend treow , 
 oððæt ic gehyrdan|gehyran þæt|se hit hleoðrode . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se word sprecan wudu selesta : 
 " þæt|se wesan|seon|beon gear iu ( ic þæt|se gyte gemunan ) 
 þæt|se ic wesan|seon|beon aheawan holtes on|an ende , 
 astyrian of stefn minum|min . genaman me|ic þær strang feond , 
 gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan him|hi|he þær toh|to wæfersyne , hatan me|ic hira|hi|heore wergas hebban . 
 beran me|ic þær beorn on|an eaxl , oððæt hi|heo me|ic on|an beorgan|beorg asettan . 
 gefæstnian me|ic þær feond genoh|genog . geseon ic þu|þa|se frea mancynn 
 efstan ellen mycle— þæt|se he me|ic willan on|an gestigan . 
 þær ic þu|þa|se nesan|neh|ne durran ofer dryhten word 
 bugan oððe berstan , þu|þa|se ic bifian geseon 
 eorþ|eorðe sceat . ealle|eall|eal ic miht|meaht|magan 
 feond gefyllan , hwæðre ic fæstan|fæst standan . 
 ongyrede he þu|þa|se geong|gangan hæleð— þæt|se wesan|seon|beon god ælmihtig— 
 strang and stiðmod . gestigan he on|an gealga hean|heah , 
 modig on|an manig gesiht , þu|þa|se he willan mancyn lysan . 
 bifian ic þu|þa|se me|ic se beornan|beorn|beirnan ymbclypte . nesan|neh|ne durran ic hwæðre bugan toh|to eorþ|eorðe , 
 fealle|feallan toh|to folde sceat , acan|ac ic sculan fæstan|fæst standan . 
 rod wesan|seon|beon ic aræran . ahebban ic riсe cyning , 
 heofon hlaford . hyldan me|ic nesan|neh|ne durran . 
 þurhdrifan hi|heo me|ic mid deorc næglum— on|an me|ic syndon þu|þa|se dolg gesiene , 
 open inwidhlemmas . nesan|neh|ne durran ic hira|hi nænig sceððan . 
 bysmeredon hi|heo wit butu ætgædere . eall|eal ic wesan|seon|beon mid blod besteman , 
 begeotan of se guma side|sid , siððan he habban hit|his|he gast onsendan . 
 feala ic on|an þæm|þam|se beorgan|beorg gebidan|bidan habban 
 wrað wyrd . geseon ic weruda god 
 þearle þenian . þystre habban 
 bewrigen mid wolcn|wolcen wealdende hræw , 
 scirne sciman , sceadu forþ|forð gan|eadan , 
 winnan|wann under wolcn|wolcen . wepan eal gesceaft , 
 cwiðdon cyning fyllan . crist wesan|seon|beon on|an rode|rod . 
 hwæðere þær fus feorran|feorr|feor cwoman 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se æðelinge . ic þæt|se eall|eal behealdan . 
 sar ic wesan|seon|beon mid sorh|sorg gedrefan|drefan , hnigan ic hwæðre þæm|þam|se secg toh|to hand , 
 eaðmod ellen mycle . geniman hi|heo þær ælmihtig god , 
 ahebban he of ðam|se hefian wite|witan . forlætan me|ic þu|þa|se hilderincas 
 standan steame bedrifan ; eall|eal ic wesan|seon|beon mid strælum forwundian . 
 aledon hi|heo þær limwerigne , gestandan him|hi|he æt|etan hit|his|he lices heafod , 
 behealdan hi|heo þær heofenes dryhten , and he he þær hwil restan , 
 meðe æfter ðam|se micel gewinnan|gewinn . onginnan him|hi|he þu|þa|se moldern wyrcan 
 beorn on|an bana gesiht ; сeorfan|ceorfan hi|heo þæt|ðæt|se of beorht stane|stan , 
 gesettan hi|heo ðæron sigorian|sigor wealdend . onginnan him|hi|he þu|þa|se sorhleoð galan|gal 
 earm on|an þu|þa|se æfentid . þu|þa|se hi|heo willan eft siðian , 
 meðe fram þæm|þam|se mære|mæran þeodne . restan he þær mætan|metan weorod . 
 hwæðere we þær greotan god hwil 
 standan on|an staðole , siððan stefn up gewitan 
 hilderinca . hræw colian , 
 fæger feorgbold . þu|þa|se we|us munan|mann|man fyllan onginnan 
 ealle|eall|eal toh|to eorþ|eorðe . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon egeslic wyrdan|wyrd ! 
 bedelfan we|us munan|mann|man on|an deop seaþe . hwæðre me|ic þær dryhten þegn|þegen , 
 freond gefrunon , 
 gyrwan me|ic gold and seolfor . 
 nu þu miht gehyran , hæleð min|ic se libban|leof , 
 þæt|se ic bealuwara weorc gebidan|bidan habban , 
 sar sorh|sorgian|sorg . wesan|seon|is nu sælan|sæl cuman 
 þæt|se me|ic weorðiað wid and side|sid 
 mann ofer molde , and eall|eal þes|þeoh|se mære|mæran gesceaft , 
 gebiddan him|hi|he toh|to þes beacn|beacen . on|an me|ic birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god 
 þrowian hwil . forðam ic þrymfæst nu 
 hlifian under heofenum , and ic hælan mæg|magan 
 æghwylс an , þær|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he bið egesian|egesa toh|to me|ic . 
 iu ic wesan|seon|beon weorþan|geweorþan wite|wita heardost , 
 leode|leoda|leod laðost , ærþan ic him|hi|he lifes|lif wegan|weg 
 riht gerymde , reordberend . 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic þu|þa|se geweorðode wuldor ealdor 
 ofer holtwudu , heofonrices weard , 
 swilce swa he hit|his|he modor eacan|eac , marian self , 
 ælmihtig god for|faran ealle|eall|eal mann 
 geweorðode ofer eall|eal wifian|wif cynn . 
 nu ic þu|þe|se hatan|hat , hæleð min|ic se libban|leof , 
 þæt|se þu þes gesiht secg mann , 
 onwreon word þæt|se hit wesan|seon|is wuldor beam , 
 se þu|þe|ðe ælmihtig god on|an þrowian 
 for|faran mancynn manig synn 
 and adomes ealdgewyrhtum . 
 deað he þær byrigde , hwæðere eft dryhten arisan|ar 
 mid hit|his|he micel miht|meaht|magan mann toh|to helpan . 
 he þe|þa|ða|se on|an heofenas astag . hider eft fundian 
 on|an þes middangeard mancynn sec 
 on|an domdæge dryhten self , 
 ælmihtig god , and hit|his|he engel mid , 
 þæt|se he þonne|se willan|wil deman|dema , se agan|ac dom geweald , 
 an gehwylc swa he him|hi|he ærur heran|her 
 on|an þes læn lif geearnaþ . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þær ænig unforht wese|wesan 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se word þu|þe|se se wealdend cwyð . 
 frineð he for|faran þære|se mænige hwær se munan|mann|man wesan|seon|nesan , 
 se þu|þe|ðe for|faran dryhten naman|nama deaðes willan 
 biter onbyrigan , swa he ær on|an ðam|se beam dydan|don . 
 acan|ac hi|heo þonne|se forhtiað , and fea þencaþ 
 hwæt#2 hi|heo toh|to criste cweðan onginnan . 
 nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf þær þonne|se ænig anforht wese|wesan 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he ær in breost bereð beacnian|beacn|beacen sellan , 
 acan|ac þurh|ðurh þe|þa|ða|se rode|rod sculan romana gesecan 
 of eorðwege æghwylc sawel , 
 seon|seo|se þu|þe|se mid wealdende|wealdan wunian þenceð . " 
 gebiddan ic me|ic þu|þa|se toh|to þan|se beam bliðe mod , 
 ellen mycle , þær ic ana|an wesan|seon|beon 
 mætan|metan werian|weorod . wesan|seon|beon modsefa 
 afysed on|an forðwege , feala eall|eal gebidan 
 langunghwila . wesan|seon|is me|ic nu lifes|lif hyht 
 þæt|se ic se sigebeam sec motan|mot 
 ana|an oft þonne|se ealle|eall|eal mann , 
 well|wel weorþian . me|ic wesan|seon|is willian|willa toh|to ðam|se 
 micel on|an mod , and min|ic mundbyrd wesan|seon|is 
 gerihtan|geriht toh|to þære|se rode|rod . nagan ic riсe feala 
 freond on|an folde , acan|ac hi|heo forþ|forð heonan 
 gewitan of weorold dream , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan him|hi|he wuldor cyning , 
 lifian nu on|an heofenum mid heahfæder , 
 wunian on|an wuldor , and ic wennan|wenan|wen me|ic 
 dæg|dah|dagian|dag gehwylc hwanne me|ic dryhten rod , 
 þu|þe|se ic heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe ær sceawian , 
 on|an þysson lænan lif gefetige 
 and me|ic þonne|se gebringan þær wesan|seon|is blis micel , 
 dream on|an heofon , þær wesan|seon|is dryhten folc 
 settan|gesettan toh|to simble , þær wesan|seon|is singal blis , 
 and me|ic þonne|se asettan þær ic siððan motan|mot 
 wunian on|an wuldor , well|wel mid þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg 
 dream brucan . seon me|ic dryhten freond , 
 se þu|þe|ðe heran|her on|an eorþe|eorþ ær þrowian 
 on|an þæm|þam|se gealgtreowe for|faran guma synn . 
 he we|us onlysan and we|us lif forgifan|forgiefan , 
 heofonliс ham . hyht wesan|seon|beon geniwad 
 mid bled and mid bliss|blis þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se þær bryne þolodan . 
 se sunu wesan|seon|beon sigorfæst on|an þæm|þam|se siðfate , 
 mihtig and spedig , þu|þa|se he mid manigeo cuman , 
 gast weorod , on|an god romana , 
 anweald ælmihtig , engel toh|to bliss|blis 
 and eall|eal ðam|se halig|halga|haleg þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se on|an heofon ær 
 wunedon on|an wuldor , þu|þa|se hira|hi|heore wealdend cuman , 
 ælmihtig god , þær hit|his|he eðel wesan|seon|beon . 
 
 sorh cymeð 
 manig and mislic in mannian|mann dream . 
 eorl oðer mid æfþancum 
 and mid teonwordum tæleð behindan , 
 spreceð fæger beforan , and þæt|se facen swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 hafað in hit|his|he heorte , hord unclæne . 
 byð þonne|se se womm gewita weoruda dryhten . 
 forðam se witiga cweðan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne syl|sellan þu me|ic ætsomne mid þæm|þam|se synfull|synful 
 in wite|wita forwyrd , weoruda dryhten , 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic on|an lif forleosan mid þæm|þam|se ligewyrhtum , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ful smeðe sprecan habbað , 
 and in gastcofan grimman|grimm|grim geþoht , 
 gehatað holdlice , swa hyra|hyr|hira|hi hyht nesan|neh|ne gæð , 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon mid weler . " wea bið in mod , 
 siofa synn fah , sar geblonden , 
 gefyllan|fyllan mid facn|facen , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he fæger word 
 utan ætywe . ænlice beoð , 
 swa þe|þa|ða|se beon|beo|bannan berað buta ætsomne 
 arlicne anleofan , and ætterne tægel 
 hafað on|an hindan , hunig on|an muðe , 
 wynsum wist . hwilum|hwil wundian 
 sar mid stingan , þonne|se se sælan|sæl cymeð . 
 swa bioð gelice þu|þa|se leas mann , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe mid tunge treowe|treow gehatan 
 fæger word , facenlice þencaþ , 
 þonne|se hi|heo æt|etan nihsta nearu|nearo beswican , 
 hafað on|an gehat hunigsmæc , 
 smeðne sybcwide , and in siofan innan 
 þurh deofol cræftan|cræft dyrne wund|windan . 
 swa wesan|seon|is nu þes middangeard mane geblonden , 
 wanað and weaxeð . wacað se eald , 
 dweleð and drefeð dæg and niht 
 milts mid mane , mægene getryweð , 
 ehteð æfest , inwit saweð , 
 nið mid geneahe . nænig oðer 
 freoð in fyrhðe nimþe fearh hwylc|hwilc , 
 þæt|se he soþlice|soðlice sybbe healdan|heald , 
 gastlice lufu|lufe , swa him|hi|he god bebeodan . 
 forðam eallunga hyht geceoseð , 
 weorold wynsum , se þu|þe|ðe wis nesan|neh|ne bið , 
 snottor , searocræftig sawol|sawel ræde|ræd . 
 witon toh|to þæm|þam|se betera , nu we bot cunnan , 
 hycgan and hyhtan , þæt|se we heofon sunnan|leoht 
 uppe mid engel aginnan|agan motan 
 gast toh|to geoc , þonne|se god willan|wil 
 eorþ|eorðe lifes|lif ende gewyrcan ! 
 
 pater noster qui es in cælis . 
 fæder manncynn , frofor ic þu|þe|se biddan , 
 halig drihten , þu þu|þe|ðe on|an heofon wesan|seon . 
 sanctificetur niman tuum . 
 þæt|se su halgian , hygecræftum fæstan|fæst , 
 þu|þin nama nu þe|þa|ða|se , nerian crist , 
 in ure|ur ferhðlocan fæstan|fæst gestaðelod . 
 adueniat regn tuum . 
 cuman|ancuman nu toh|to mann , miht|meaht wealdend , 
 þu|þin romana toh|to we|us , rihtwis dema , 
 and þin geleafa in lifdæge 
 fiat uolontas twiwa sicut in cælo etan|et in terra . 
 on|an ure|ur mod mære|mæran þurhwunian . 
 and þu|þin willian|willa mid we|us weorðe læstan|gelæstan 
 on|an eardung eorþ|eorðe rices , 
 swa hluttor wesan|seon|is in heofonwuldor , 
 wynn gewlitegod wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to weorold forþ|forð . 
 panem nostrum cotidianum da nobis hodie . 
 syl|sellan we|us nu toh|to dæge|dæg , drihten guma , 
 heofena heahcyning , hlaf yrnan|ure|irnan|iernan , 
 se þu onsendan sawol toh|to hæle|hælan|helan 
 on|an middaneard mannian|mann cynn|cyn ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is se clæne crist , drihten god . 
 etan|et dimitte nobis debita nostra . 
 forgyf we|us , guma weard , gyltas and synn|syn , 
 and ure|ur leahtras alet , lices wundian|wund 
 and mandæde , swa we milde wiþ|wið þu|þe|ðe , 
 ælmihtig god , oft abylgeað , 
 sicut etan|et nos dimittimus debitoribus nostris . 
 swa swa we forlætað leahtras on|an eorþe|eorþ 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se wiþ|wið we|us oft agyltað , 
 and him|hi|he womdæde witan|wita nesan|neh|ne þencað 
 for|faran earnunge ecan lifes|lif . 
 etan|et no nos inducas in temptationem . 
 nesan|neh|ne lædan þu we|us toh|to wite|witan in wea sorh|sorg 
 nesan|neh|ne in costunge , crist nerigende , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan we arleas eall|eal þinne|þin mildsa 
 þurh feondscipe fremde weorðan . 
 sed libera nos wifcynn|hosp|flet|a malo . 
 and wiþ|wið yfele|yfel gefreo we|us eacan|eac nu þe|þa|ða|se 
 feond gehwilc ; we in ferhðlocan , 
 þeon|þeodan engel , ðanc and wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 soð sigedrihten , secgað georne|geornan|georn , 
 se þu|þe|ðe þu we|us milde miht alysan 
 fram hæftnyde hellewite . 
 amen . 
 weorðe þæt|se . 
 
 wesan|seon|is ðeos burch breome geond breotenrice , 
 steppa gestaðolad , stan ymbutan 
 wundor gewæxen . weor ymbeornad , 
 ea yðum stronge , and ðer inne wunað 
 feola fisс|fiscian|fisc kyn on|an flod gemonge . 
 and þær gewexen wesan|seon|is wudafæstern micel ; 
 wuniad in ðem wycum wilde deor manig , 
 in deop dæl deore|deor ungerim . 
 wesan|seon|is in ðere byri eacan|eac bearn gecyðed 
 þu|þe|ðe arfesta eadig cudberch 
 and þes clene cyning heafud , 
 osuualdes , engel leon|leo , and aidan bisceop , 
 eadberch and eadfrið , æðele gefere|gefer . 
 wesan|seon|is ðer inne midd hi æðelwold bisceop 
 and breoma bocere bedu , and boisil abbot , 
 þu|þe|ðe clene cudberte on|an gecheðe 
 lerde lust , and he hit|his|he lar wel geniman . 
 eardiæð æt|etan ðem eadig in in ðem minstre 
 unarimeda reliquia , 
 þær monia wundor gewurðað , þes þu|þe|ðe writan|writ seggeð , 
 midd ðene drihnes wer dom bideð . 
 
 wesan|seon|beon on|an ealddagum israheala folc 
 þurh moysen , mære lareow , 
 anlyht and gelared , swa he lifes|lif frea , 
 heofna heahcyning , heran|her on|an lif 
 þurh hit|his|he sylfes word settan for|faran leode|leoda|leod , 
 rinc toh|to ræde|rædan|ræd , and him|hi|he runian|run gescead 
 self asecgan , hu he se soþ wegan|weg 
 leof leodscipe læran sculan . 
 þu|þa|se se leode|leoda|leod fruma lar fylgean 
 heofena heahcyninges , and þu|þa|se hæleþ|hæle|hælan samod , 
 swa hi|heo on|an leodscipe lærede wesan|seon|beon ; 
 gif hi|heo wancule weorc onginnan , 
 hi se of heofon hearm toh|to lean 
 asendan sigorian|sigor god , and hi|heo sona toh|to him|hi|he 
 fryþa wilnodan and þær findan raþe , 
 gif hi|heo leohtras hira|hi|heore letan gewyrpan . 
 feala wesan|seon|is mægena þu|þe|se se mære|mæran þeodan|þeod 
 on|an þæm|þam|se herescype healdan and wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 þendan hi|heo lifes|lif frea lufian willan ; 
 acan|ac him|hi|he se ende wearð earm and þrealic , 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo besyrwan silf|self dryhten , 
 on|an beam settan and toh|to byrgenn|byrgen|byrgan 
 gedemdon ; he þær bedigled wesan|seon|beon , 
 and þywan|þy|þe|se þryddan dæge|dæg þeod ætywan . 
 we þæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran hæleþ|hæle mænige 
 on|an bocstæf breme and writan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo fæsten feower healdan 
 and þonne|se offredan unmæne neotan|neat , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is lamb oþþe|oððe styrc , leof toh|to tacn|tacen 
 þu|þe|se for|faran weorold wesan|seon|beon womm bedælan . 
 acan|ac arisan onginnan rices ealdor 
 of byrgenn|byrgen|byrgan , blæd gefyllan|fyllan , 
 and mid heofenwarum ham geseсan|gesecan , 
 eard mid engel , and we|us eall|eal se 
 hyht and gehateð , gif we hit|his|he willian|willan 
 þurh riht sefa ræde|ræd fyligan . 
 na þær in cumeð atele gefyllan|fyllan , 
 womm wesan , acan|ac scal on|an wyrdan|wyrd sceacan . 
 nu we herian sceolan heran|her for|faran lif 
 deoren|deore dædfruman , and him|hi|he gear geriman|gerim 
 ælmesdædum ure|ur gefyllan , 
 and on|an fæsten , swa se frod iu 
 moyses mælan , and we þu|þa|se mearc sceolan 
 heoldan higefæste mid anglum , 
 swa hi|heo gebrefde we|us beornan|beorn|beirnan on|an rome , 
 gregorius , guma papa . 
 we þæt|se forma sceolan fæsten|fæstan heowan 
 on|an þære|se ær wucan lengtenes , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se monaþ þu|þe|se munan|mann|man martius 
 geond romwara romana nemneð , 
 and þær twelfe|twelf sceolan torht dihtan 
 runian|run geræde|gerædan in se rican hofe|hof|hebban , 
 heofon heahcyninges , herian mid sang , 
 wlanc weorþian wuldor brytta . 
 ofer þu|þa|se eastertid oþer|oðer fæsten|fæstan 
 ys toh|to bremenne brytena leode|leoda|leod 
 mid gelica lof , þu|þe|se gelesen hafað 
 on|an þære|se wucan þu|þe|se æfter cumeð 
 þæm|þam|se sunnandæg þu|þe|se geond sid wang 
 pentecostenes dæg preost nemnað , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se monaþ , se þu|þe|se me|ic þinceð , 
 þu|þe|se munan|mann|man iunius gear nemnan . 
 þonne wesan|seon|is þæt|se þrydde þingian|þing gehwelces 
 fæsten|fæstan on|an folde fyr bearn 
 dihtan gelica on|an þæm|þam|se deore hofe|hof|hebban 
 toh|to brymenne beorht sang 
 on|an þære|se wucan þu|þe|se ærur byð 
 emnihtes dæge|dæg æled beorn , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se monaþ , min gefræge , 
 þu|þe|se munan|mann|man september genemneð . 
 we þæt|se feorþe sceolen fæsten|fæstan gelæstan 
 on|an þære|se wucan þu|þe|se bið ærur full 
 dryhten gebyrde|gebyrd , and we mid deoren scylan 
 word and weorc wuldor cyninge|cyning 
 in þu|þa|se ilca tidan|tid eall|eal gemynd 
 þeodne deman|dema þingian|þing gehwilc , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa swa ær , and se arwesan 
 leof leode|leoda|leod frea lifes|lif biddan . 
 on|an þes fæsten wesan|seon|is se feorþa dæg 
 and sixta samod seofoþa getinge 
 toh|to gelæstanne lifes|lif ealdor|eald 
 and toh|to bremenne bocian|boc geryne 
 emb þu|þa|se nigoþan tyd ; nan wesan|seon|is on|an eorþe|eorþ , 
 butan he unhæl on|an geþreatige , 
 þu|þe|se motan|mot , hætan|hatan , oþþe|oððe wæt|wadan ærur þingan , 
 se þu|þe|se we|us bocian|boc don|dom þeodlic demeð . 
 gif þu|þe|se þonne|se secgan suþan|suþ cymen 
 brytta franca , þæt|se þu gebannan sceole 
 heran|her on|an eorþe|eorþ ænig healdan|heald , 
 se þu|þe|se moyses iu mælan toh|to leode|leoda|leod , 
 na þu se andfeng æfre gewyrþe , 
 acan|ac þu þæt|se self healdan|heald þæt|se þu|þe|se suþan|suþ cuman 
 from|fram romana rices hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 gregoriæ , guma papa . 
 þus he gesette|gesettan self and dyhte 
 þu|þa|se þenung , þeodlareow , 
 fæstendtida ; we þæm|þam|se forþ nu git 
 geond engel land|finna est filiað . 
 swa he æt|etan þæm|se setl self gedemde , 
 sanct petres preost siððan 
 lange|lang lifes|lif tyd leordun þæt|se self , 
 þæt|se þu oþrum|oþer|oðer nesan|neh|ne sculan æfre filian . 
 eacan|eac we feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag fæsten|fæstan healdan 
 ær þæm|se ærist ure|ur dryhten , 
 þæt|se nu lengtentid leode|leoda|leod nemnað , 
 and hit ærest|ær onginnan eorl se god , 
 mære|mæran moyses , ær he on|an munt styge ; 
 he þæt|se fæsten|fæstan healdan feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag 
 and nyhta samod , swa he nahtes anbat 
 ær he þu|þa|se deore æ dryhten anfenge . 
 him|hi|he þær gesellan self dryhten 
 breme bocian|boc cræftan|cræft , bæle behlæned , 
 of hit|his|he halig hand gescrifene , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan he leode|leoda|leod se leoran and tæcan 
 elda orþanc eall|eal toh|to tacn|tacen , 
 þæt|se we mid fæsten magan freogan|freod gewinnan 
 and þu|þa|se deop dryhten gerynu|geryne , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se leoran sceolan leode|leoda|leod gehwylc , 
 gif we|us þære|se duguþ hwæt#2 dryhten sylleð . 
 eft helias , eorl se mære , 
 him|hi|he on|an westen witan|wist geþigede , 
 þær him|hi|he symbelbread somod mid wæter 
 dryhten engel sum|su dihtan togeanes , 
 and se gestrangud wearð styþum gyfle 
 toh|to gefæstenne feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag 
 and nihtian|niht|neaht samod , swa he nahtes anbat 
 ær he on|an horeb dun hali feran . 
 witon þæt|se gerine rihte|rihtan|riht gehicgan , 
 þæt|se se mære þicgan|þegen|geþicgan miht|meaht nesan|neh|ne habban 
 toh|to astigenne stæppon on|an ypplen 
 ær him|hi|he þæt|se symbel weorþan sellan fram engel . 
 we wesan|seon on|an westen wuldor bliss|blis 
 on|an þæm|se ænete eall|eal gefea ; 
 nu wesan|seon|is helpes tidan|tid , halig dryhten , 
 hu we munt þinne|þin mære gestygan . 
 wesan|seon for|faran engel tellan|getellan eorþbugendum 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se dryhten word dæd lærað . 
 we þu|þa|se andlifene ofost þycgen 
 and se deore wist , dryhten lar ; 
 witon fæstan|fæst swa fyren dæd 
 on|an forhæfenesse heran|her for|faran lif , 
 þæt|se we se munt mægen|magan mærþa gestigan 
 swa se eald dydan|don elias iu . 
 wesan|seon|is toh|to hicganne hu se halig|halgian|halga|haleg gewitan 
 of þes wangstede wuldor neosian ; 
 he fyren scryd feower mære 
 wlangum wicgum on|an wegan|weg ferian 
 on|an neorxnawong , þær we|us nergend crist 
 hatan|gehatan hafað ham mid bliss|blis , 
 gif we þæt|se fæsten|fæstan heran|her fyren gelæstað 
 and se uplican æþel secað . 
 nu wesan|seon|beon æt|etan nihsta þæt|se we|us nergend crist , 
 halig heofenes weord , heolp and læran . 
 he he dyppan lætan|lettan deore|deor þweal , 
 fulwiht bæðe , fyren bedælan , 
 and he feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag firsude mettas , 
 eacan|eac nihtian|niht|neaht swa feala nanuht gyltig , 
 leode|leoda|leod toh|to lar , þæt|se hi|heo on|an lengten sceolan 
 efen feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag fæsten|fæstan hewan . 
 he costude þær cristes gewinn 
 on|an þæm|se ænete eald and fretan , 
 geseon mære frea mann geliс 
 and þu|þa|se wenan|wena onginnan , womm gemyndig , 
 þæt|se he stræla hit|his|he stellan miht|meaht|magan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se lichoman ; næs|nesan se leahtra nan , 
 acan|ac on|an hinder gewitan hearmes brytta , 
 and þær engel hyra|hyr|hira|hi ealdor sohtan . 
 higesynnig munan|mann|man , gif þu|þe|se susl weard 
 costian durran , þonne|se he crist dydan|don , 
 wereda wulderfrean , womm leas , 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan he se inne ahwæt scotian 
 gif he myrcels nabban manes æt|etan ege , 
 acan|ac he on|an hinder scriþan , and þu|þe|se halig 
 engel ærfæste æghwær helpað , 
 gif þu dryhten heran|her dæd fylgan . 
 habban we nu mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian hu þu|þa|se mære|mæran iu 
 feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag fæsten|fæstan hewdon , 
 and we bebeodað þurh beornan|beorn|beirnan god 
 þæt|se mannian|mann gehwilc þu|þe|se for|faran molde wunað 
 ær þæm|þam|se æreste ure|ur dryhten 
 efen feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag fæsten|fæstan hewe 
 oþ þu|þa|se nigoþan tidan|tid , and he na brucan 
 flæsces oþþe|oððe fyrn|fyren , þæ læs|lesan þu|þe|se he fah wese|wesan . 
 sceolan sacerd singan mæsse , 
 dæghwamlice dryhten biddan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan þæt|se he freond wese|wesan 
 folc gynd folde , and þu|þa|se fyrn|fyren sceolan 
 þæm|þam|se sacerdan secgan gehwilce 
 and þu|þa|se dymnissa dæd betan 
 word and weorc , wuldor ealdor 
 þurh ælmesdæde eall|eal gegladian . 
 þonne|se wesan|seon|is þurfan|þearf micel þeod mænium 
 þæt|se þu|þa|se sacerdos self nesan|neh|ne gyltan , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an leahtrum hira|hi ligegen toh|to fæstan|fæst . 
 hwæt|hwa mæg|magan þyngian þreale hwilc 
 wiþ hit|his|he arwesan , gif he him|hi|he ærur hæfð 
 biter onbolgen , and se bot nesan|neh|ne deð , 
 acan|ac þu|þa|se æbyligþe ealdere wroht , 
 dæghwamlice dæd niwað gewinnan|geblandan 
 gif se sacerd he silf|self nesan|neh|ne cunnan 
 þurh dryhten ege dugeþum healdan|heald , 
 nu þu|þa|se , folc mann , fyrn|fyren nesan|neh|ne gyme|gyman 
 þu|þe|se halgian mann heran|her gefremme , 
 acan|ac þu lar sculan lust fremman 
 ryhthicgennde þu|þe|se he toh|to ræde|rædan|ræd tæchð , 
 drincan he him|hi|he þæt|se drof oððe þæt|se dæghluttre 
 wæter of weсgan|wegan|weg , þæt|se wesan|seon|is wuldor lar . 
 acan|ac ic secgan mæg|magan , sorh|sorg hremig , 
 hu þu|þa|se sacerd sacu|sacan niwiað , 
 dæghwamlice dryhten gremiað 
 and mid æfest ælс|ælc forlædað 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he fylian wyle folc mannian|mann ; 
 sona hi|heo on|an mergan mæsse syngað 
 and forþegide , þurste bædan , 
 æfter tæppere teon geond stræt . 
 hwæt#2 ! hi|heo leaslice leogan ongynnað 
 and se tæppere tyhtan gelome|gelom , 
 secgaþ þæt|se he synleas syllan motan|mot 
 ostre toh|to etan and æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele wyn 
 emb morgentyd , se þu|þe|se me|ic þingeð 
 þæt|se hund|1000 and wulf healdað þu|þa|se ilca 
 wise|wis on|an weorold and nesan|neh|ne wigliað 
 hwæne hi|heo toh|to mos fon , mæða bedælan . 
 hi|heo þonne|se sittan sadian aginnað , 
 sinnan|sin semað , syllað gelome|gelom , 
 cweðað goddlife guma gehwilcum 
 þæt|se wine|win dreng welhwa motan|mot , 
 siððan he mæsse hafað , meþig þicgan , 
 etan ostre eacan|eac and oþer|oðer 
 fisc of flod 
 
 welund him|hi|he be wurma wræc cunnade . 
 anhydig eorl earfoþe dreogan , 
 habban him|hi|he toh|to gesiþþe sorh|sorg and longaþ , 
 wintercealde wræc|wrecan , wea oft onfond , 
 siððan he niðhad on|an nede leсgan|lecgan 
 swoncre seonobende on|an syllan monn . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg|magan ! 
 beadohilde nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo broþor deaþ 
 on|an sefa swa sar swa hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo sylfre þingan|þing : 
 þæt|se heo gearolice ongietan habban 
 þæt|se heo eacen|eacan wæs— æfre nesan|neh|ne magan 
 þriste geþencan , hu ymb þæt|se sculan . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg|magan ! 
 we þæt|se mæðhilde monge gefrignan 
 wurdon|weorþan grundleas geat friсgan|frig|fricgan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo seon|seo|se sorglufu slæpan ealle|eall|eal binom . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg|magan ! 
 ðeodric agan þritig wintra|winter 
 mæringa burg— þæt|se wesan|seon|beon monegum cuþ|cunnan . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg|magan ! 
 we geascodan eormanrices 
 wylfen þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan ; agan wid folc 
 gotena rices . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon grim cyning . 
 sæt|sittan secg manig sorh|sorg gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 wea on|an wenan|wena , wyscan geneahhe 
 þæt|se se cynerice ofercuman wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg|magan ! 
 siteð sorgcearig sæl bidæled , 
 on|an sefa sweorceð , self þinceð 
 þæt|se su endeleas earfoða dælan|dæl . 
 mæg|magan þonne|se geþencan þæt|se geond þes weorold 
 witig dryhten wendan geneahhe , 
 eorle monegum are|ar gesceawað , 
 wislicne blæd , sum wea dælan|dæl . 
 þæt|se ic bi|be me|ic self secgan willan , 
 þæt|se ic hwil wesan|seon|beon heodeninga scieppan , 
 dryhten dyre . me|ic wesan|seon|beon deor noma . 
 agan ic fela wintra|winter folgað til , 
 hold hlaford , oþþæt heorrenda nu , 
 leoðcræftig monn londryht geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon , 
 þæt|se me|ic eorl hleo ær gesellan . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg|magan ! 
 
 mildheortness|mildheortnes and don|dom mihtig drihten 
 singan and secg , and soð ongitan 
 on|an unwemme weсgan|wegan|weg , hwanne þu me|ic wylle toh|to . 
 ic mid unbealuwe eall|eal heorte 
 þurh þin hus midde|midd halig gan|eadan . 
 nesan|neh|ne settan ic me|ic for|faran eage yfele|yfel wise|wis ; 
 ealle|eall|eal ic feogean|feogan facn wyrcend , 
 næs|nesan me|ic wyngesið wiþerweard heorte . 
 ic awyrgan fram me|ic wendan|wenan and cyrde ; 
 nyllan|nillan ic hira|hi andgit ænig habban , 
 þu|þe|se tælnessa teonan geneahhige 
 wiþ|wið hira|hi|heore þæm|þam|se nihsta nið ahofan ; 
 þær|se ic ehtan eall|eal mid niðe . 
 oferhydegum eage , unsædre heorte , 
 nyllan|nillan ic mid þæm|se mann min mete|metan|met ðicgean . 
 ofer geleaffull eorðbugende 
 eage min georne|geornan|georn sceawedun , 
 hwær ic tirfæste treowe|treow findan , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic simble mid sittan and gan|eadan ; 
 he me|ic holdlice heran|her ðegnade . 
 nesan|neh|ne eardað on|an midle min hus , 
 þu|þe|se oferhygd up ahebban 
 oþþe|oððe unriht cweþan ellen willan . 
 ic on|an morgenne ofslean manes wyrhta 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se unriht ellen worhtan 
 and fyren fela fremman habbað ; 
 ealle|eall|eal ic þu|þa|se of drihten drifan ceaster . ## þu min|ic gebed , mære|mæran drihten , 
 gehyran , heofenes weard , and gehlyde min|ic 
 toh|to þu|þe|ðe becuman , þeod reccend . 
 na þu andwlitan|andwlita æfre þinne|þin 
 awendan fram me|ic , wuldor ealdor ; 
 gif ic geswenced su , þu swæs toh|to me|ic 
 þu|þin eare|ear onhyld and me|ic ofestlice 
 gehyran , heofenes weard , helpys bena . 
 forðam dæg|dah|dag min dreosan syndan 
 smece gelice , and forspyrcende synd 
 min mearhcofan , se þu|þe|se me|ic þinceð , 
 swilce hi|heo on|an cocerpannan coc gehyrstan . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh hege gelic , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hraðe weornað , 
 þonne hit byð amawyn mann folm ; 
 wesan|seon|is min|ic heorte eacan|eac heard geswenced , 
 forðam ic ær forgitan|forgietan , þæt|se ic etan sculan 
 min swete hlaf ; forðam me|ic wesan|seon|is swære stefn 
 hefig gnornian heorte getenge , 
 ætfeolen eacan|eac min|ic ban flæsc minum|min . 
 ic weorþan|geweorþan wesan|seon|eoh pellicane gelic , 
 se on|an westen wunað ; witan ic eacan|eac swiðe|swiðan geare|gear , 
 þæt|se ic nemnan|genemnan eam|ea nihthrefne gelic , 
 þu|þe|se on|an scræf eardað , and ic spearuwan swa some 
 gelice gewearð , anlicum fugele . 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic eall|eal dæg edwitspræce on|an 
 min feond fæstan|fæst brohtan , 
 and þe|þa|ða|se me|ic heredan ; hi|heo me|ic hræþ æfter 
 full swyþ|swyðe|swiðe eft swerigean onginnan . 
 forðam ic anlic ætt æscean hlaf , 
 and ic min drincan|drinc menсgan|mengan wiþ|wið tear , 
 for|faran andwlitan|andwlita yrre þin ; 
 feor þu me|ic ahebban and gehnæctest eft . 
 dæg|dah|dag min gedruran swa se deorcian|deorc scua , 
 and ic hege gelic , swa hit hraðe weornað . 
 þu on|an ecnes wunian awa , drihten ; 
 wunað þu|þin gemynd , þenden weorold standeð . 
 arisan nu , mihtig god , miltsian|milts sione ; 
 nu wesan|seon|is hire|heo helpan heahsæl cuman . 
 forðam se þancunga þin scealcas 
 ambyhtmæcgas ealle|eall|eal hæfdan , 
 forðam þu|þe|se þu stiðlice stan and eorþ|eorðe 
 eall|eal ætgædere ær miltsadest . 
 forðam neodlice on|an naman|nama þin 
 ealle|eall|eal eorðbuend egsan habbað , 
 and þu|þin wuldor|seolh|bearm ongitað wise|wis cyning . 
 eft timbrade ece drihten 
 and gesette|gesettan sion þurh hit|his|he sylfes miht , 
 þær wesan|seon|beon gesyne hit|his|he seon|seo|se soð spedan|sped . 
 oft he þearfendra ben ðance gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 and he nesan|neh|ne forhogode hira|hi|heore hold gebed . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wislice awriten|awritan standað 
 and on|an cneoressum cyðed syndan , 
 þæt|se he folc gesceppan ; fæger drihten 
 herað holdlice hror geþanc . 
 forðam he fæstlice forþ|forð locade 
 of hit|his|he þæm|þam|se hean|heah halig|halga|haleg setl ; 
 drihten geseon of heofenum heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 he þu|þa|se gehyrdan|gehyran heahgnornunge 
 se þu|þe|ðe gebindan biter wesan|seon|beon , 
 and þe|þa|ða|se bealdlice birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn alysan 
 þær|se þu|þe|ðe ofslegene sliþe wær . 
 þonne|se byð on|an sione secgan soð nama drihten , 
 and hit|his|he lof swilce , leode|leoda|leod bearn , 
 on|an hierusalem gleawast and mærust . 
 cumað folc siððan feorran|feorr|feor togædere 
 and rice eacan|eac , þæt|se hraðe drihten 
 ful holdlice hyran siððan . 
 he him|hi|he andwyrdeð eall|eal sona 
 on|an weсgan|wegan|weg weorold , þær hit|his|he gewis mægen|magan 
 fæstan|fæst standeð : " ic þu|þe|se feaw dæg|dah|dag 
 min mættra mod secg , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic magan on|an midle min dagena 
 sona gecigean , gif þu self wylt . " 
 wesan|seon þin an gear awa toh|to feorh . 
 æt|etan fruma þu , drihten , gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan 
 eorþe|eorþ frætwe and upheofen ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is heahgeweorc hand þinne|þin . 
 sweotule þu|þa|se forweorðað and þu self wunian ; 
 eall|eal forwisnað wædum anlice , 
 and þu hi|heo onwendan , swa munan|mann|man wrigels deð , 
 and hi|heo beoð toh|to weorold wendan siððan . 
 þu þonne|se buan se ilca , se þu ær wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ; 
 nesan|neh|ne beoð winter þu|þin wiht þu|þe|ðe sæmra . 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn þinne|þin scealca heran|her buan niman , 
 and þær eardedan ealle|eall|eal þrage , 
 and hira|hi|heore sylfra cynn siððan toh|to feorh 
 on|an weorold weorold well|wel gereссan . ## bletsian , min sawol|sawel , bliðe drihten , 
 and eall|eal min|ic innera hit|his|he se ecean naman|nama . 
 bletsian , min sawol|sawel , beald dryhten , 
 nesan|neh|ne wylt þu ofergeottul æfre weorðan 
 eall|eal god , þu|þe|se he þu|þe|se ær dydan|don . 
 he þin mandæde miltsade eall|eal 
 and þin adl ealle|eall|eal gehælan . 
 he alysan þu|þin lif leof of forwyrde , 
 fyllan|fyld|fylan þinne|þin willan|willa fæger mid god . 
 he þu|þe|se gesigefæste soð milts 
 and þu|þe|ðe mildheort mod getrymede ; 
 wesan|seon þu edneowe earn gelician 
 on|an geogoðe nu gleaw weorþan|geweorþan . 
 hafian|habban þu milde mod , miht|meaht strang , 
 drihten , dom eall|eal þu|þe|se deop heran|her 
 and ful treaflice teonan þolian . 
 he hit|his|he weg dydan|don wise|wis and cuðe 
 moyse þæm|þam|se mære|mæran on|an mænige tidan|tid , 
 swilce hit|his|he willan|willa eacan|eac wer israhela . 
 mildheort þu wesan|seon and mihtig , mod geþyldig , 
 ece drihten , swa þu wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ; 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin milde mod mann cyðed . 
 nelle þu oþ|oð ende yrre|irre habban , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an ecnes þu|þe|ðe awa belgan . 
 na þu be gewyrhtum , wealdend , ure|ur 
 womm wyrhta willan we|us don , 
 nesan|neh|ne æfter ure|ur unriht ahwær gyldan . 
 forðam þu æfter heahweorce heofenes þin 
 mildheortnysse , mihtig drihten , 
 lust cyðdest , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se lufedan þu|þe|se . 
 swa þes folde fæðme bewindeð 
 þes eastrodor and æfter westan|west|wesan , 
 he betweonan þæm|þam|se teonan and unriht 
 we|us fram afyrde æghwær simble . 
 swa fæder ðenceð fæger hit|his|he bearn 
 milde weorðan , swa we|us mihtig god , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se he lufiað , liðe weorðeð , 
 forðam he ealle|eall|eal сinan|cunnan ure|ur þearf . 
 gemunan , mihtig god , þæt|se we synt molde and dust ; 
 beoð mann dæg|dah|dag mawenum hege 
 æghwær anlice , eorþ|eorðe blostma , 
 swa hit|his|he lifdagas lænan|læn syndan . 
 þonne|se he gast ofgifeð , siððan he gærsbedd sculan 
 wunian widefyrh , nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he munan|mann|man siððan witan 
 ahwær elles ænig stow . 
 þu|þin mildheortnes , mihtig drihten , 
 þurh eall|eal weorold weorold wislic standeð , 
 deorust and gedefust ofer ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ondrædað him|hi|he . 
 swa hit|his|he soðfæstnyss swilce standeð 
 ofer þær|se bearn birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn þu|þe|se hit|his|he bebod healdað , 
 and se gemynd mycle habbað , 
 þæt|se heo hit|his|he wisfæst word wynn efnan|efen . 
 on|an heofenhame halig drihten 
 hit|his|he heahsetl hror timbrade , 
 þanan he eorðricum eall|eal wealdeð . 
 ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he engel eсe drihten 
 bletsian beald , hira|hi|heore bliðne frea , 
 mægyn and miht|meaht , þu|þa|se hit|his|he mære|mæran word 
 habbað and healdað and hyсgan|hyg|hycgan fremmað . 
 bletsian drihten eall|eal hit|his|he bearn mægen|magan 
 and hit|his|he ðegna ðreat , þu|þe|se þæt|se þence nu , 
 þæt|se hi|heo hit|his|he willan|willa wyrcean georne|geornan|georn . 
 eall|eal hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan geweorc eсe drihten 
 on|an hit|his|he agen stede eacan|eac bletsian , 
 þær him|hi|he hit|his|he egsian , anweald , standeð ; 
 bletsian min|ic sawel bliðe drihten . ## bletsian , min sawol|sawel , bliþe drihten ; 
 þu wesan|seon , min|ic drihten god , dæd swyþ|swyðe|swiðe , 
 meahtum mære|mæran ofer mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 þu þu|þe|se weorðlice wliteandette 
 god gegyrwan ; wesan|seon nu gleawlice 
 swa limwædum sunnan|leoht gyrwan|gegyrwan . 
 heofan þu aðenedest hydan|hyd gelice , 
 se weardiað ufan wæter|wæt ðryðe . 
 he wolcen eacan|eac wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan and settan , 
 þæt|se he miht|meaht|magan eaðe upp astigan , 
 se fot tredeð fiðru wind . 
 he hit|his|he engel deð æðele gast 
 and hit|his|he from ðegnas fyr beornan . 
 he gefæstnude folde staðelas , 
 eorþ|eorðe eardas ; nesan|neh|ne seon|seo|se æfre nu 
 on|an weorold world weorðeð ahylded . 
 he nywolnessa neoðan swa swa ryfte 
 him|hi|he toh|to gewæde woruhte swilce ; 
 standað ofer mann munt on|an wæter . 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he þrea þin þearle ondrædað , 
 fleoð forhtlice þunor broga 
 þinne|þin stefn strang egsan . 
 beorg and feld ba astigan 
 on|an se stede þu|þe|se þu gestaðeludest him|hi|he , 
 and on|an se stow standað fæstan|fæst ; 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hi|heo ofer gemære micel|mare|mara gegangan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo ðysse eorþe|eorþ awyht habban . 
 oft of denu|dene yrnað deop willa , 
 and of midle munt swilce 
 wæter awealleð , wid floweð . 
 of þæm|þam|se eorþ|eorðe deor ealle|eall|eal drincað , 
 bidað assa eacan|eac on|an þurste ; 
 ofer þan|se heofonfugelas healdað eardas , 
 sendað of þæm|þam|se stan stefn mycle . 
 beorg onfoð blæd and wæstm , 
 ufan eorðwæstme ealle|eall|eal growað , 
 swilce of wæstm weorc þinne|þin 
 eall|eal eorþ|eorðe cið ufan byð gefyllan|fyllan . 
 swilce þu of folde fodder neat 
 lætest alædan , on|an þæm|se hi|heo lif healdað ; 
 wyrtian|wyrt þu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan toh|to wrað mannian|mann . 
 eacan|eac þu him|hi|he of eorþe|eorþ ut alædan 
 hlaf toh|to helpan ; heorte mannian|mann 
 must and windrinc micel blissað . 
 elh|ele andwlitan|andwlita eacan|eac gescyrpeð 
 and hlaf trymeð heorte mann . 
 swilce þu gefyllan fæger blæd 
 telga|telg treowwæstme ; tydrað ealle|eall|eal , 
 þu|þa|se on|an libanes lædað on|an beorgan|beorg 
 cwic cederbeam , þu|þa|se þu cuðlice 
 self gesettan ; on|an þæm|þam|se swilce nu 
 mid hira|hi|heore sped spearwa nystlað . 
 uphebbean hus hira|hi ongeagn|agen|agan wesan|seon|is 
 latteow on|an land|finna ; oft laðne beorgan 
 on|an hean|heah munt heortas wuniað ; 
 erinaces fleoð oft on|an stan . 
 spiht|monan|mona he gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan on|an þu|þa|se mære|mæran tidan|tid ; 
 sunne|sinnan hire|heo setlgang sweotule healdeð . 
 þystru|þystre|þeostru þu gesettan on|an þearle niht|neaht , 
 on|an þære|se ealle|eall|eal wildeor wid toeornað . 
 and leon|leo hwelp lange|lang swilce 
 grymetigað gnorne ; georne|geornan|georn secað , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he grædig æt|etan god gedeme . 
 siððan up cumeð æðele sunne|sinnan , 
 hi|heo of siðum eft gesamniað 
 and hi|heo on|an hol hydað hi|heo georne|geornan|georn . 
 mægenweorc on|an morgen munan|mann|man onginneð 
 and þæt|se geendað on|an æfynne . 
 micel wærun þin weorc , mihtig drihten , 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu mid snyteru self wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan ; 
 wesan|seon|is þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe eacan|eac eall|eal gefyllan|fyllan 
 þinne|þin gesceafta , scyppend mære|mæran . 
 hit|his|he wesan|seon|is micel sæ and on|an gemære wid , 
 þær wesan|seon|is unrim on|an eall|eal cwycra 
 mycelra and mætra ; ofer ðæne mægene oft 
 scip scriðende scrinde fleotað . 
 draca þu þes dæd þin 
 geheowadest , hettan|hatan siððan 
 hit|his|he bysmere brad healdan|heald ; 
 ealle|eall|eal toh|to þu|þe|ðe , ece drihten , 
 ætes on|an eorþ|eorðe eacan|eac wilniað . 
 and him|hi|he gesomnadum swilce wylle 
 þin þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg hand ontynan , 
 ealle|eall|eal hi|heo gefyllan fæger god . 
 gif þu þin ansyn fram him|hi|he æfre awendan , 
 þonne|se hi|heo gedrefan deop weorðað , 
 and him|hi|he gast weorðeð georne|geornan|georn afyrran ; 
 swilce teonlice geteoriað , 
 on|an hira|hi|heore ongeagn|agen|agan dust æfter hweorfað .
