 onsendan þin sylfes gast , sona weorþað 
 geedniwad , and þu eacan|eac scyppest 
 eorþ|eorðe ansyn ealle|eall|eal swilce . 
 wuldor|seolh|bearm seon wid weruda drihten 
 and on|an weorold weorold wunian siððan , 
 blissian on|an hit|his|he weorc beald drihten . 
 he on|an þes|se eorþ|eorðe ealle|eall|eal locað , 
 deð hi|heo for|faran hit|his|he egsan ealle|eall|eal beofian ; 
 gif he mid hit|his|he miht|meaht|magan munt hrineð , 
 hi|heo ful ricene reocað sona . 
 ic on|an minum|min lif lust drihten 
 singan soþlice|soðlice and secg eacan|eac , 
 þenden ic wunian on|an worulddreamum . 
 wese|wesan him|hi|he herenes min|ic æt|etan heorte weðe , 
 ic min drihten deoren|deore lufian . 
 and þu|þa|se fyrenfullan frecne|frecen|frec forweorðaþ , 
 þu|þa|se on|an ðysse eorþ|eorðe synt , ealle|eall|eal sniome , 
 þæt|se hio nesan|neh|ne wunian on|an worldlife . 
 bletsian , min sawol|sawel , bliðe drihten . ## andetað drihten and hit|his|he eсe naman|nama 
 cegað cymlice , and cwyce secgeað 
 hit|his|he wundorweorc ofer ealle|eall|eal werðeode . 
 singað him|hi|he swilce and salletað , 
 secgað hit|his|he wundor eall|eal wid mære . 
 hergeað hit|his|he naman|nama niode swilce ; 
 heorte hygeclæne hlutor blissað 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se soþlice|soðlice secað dryhten . 
 secað ge drihten , and ge siððan beoð 
 teonan gehwylc ful trum æghwær ; 
 secað hit|his|he ansyn simble georne|geornan|georn . 
 gemunað ge on|an mod , hu he manig wundor 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan wræclice , wundur unlytel , 
 and hit|his|he muþ eacan|eac mære|mæran dom . 
 hwæt#2 , he abrahames cynn , þu|þe|se hit|his|he esne wesan|seon|beon , 
 geweorðude ofer werþeoda , 
 and iacobes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , se he gear geceosan . 
 he wesan|seon|is ure|ur drihten dæd spedig ; 
 earun hit|his|he dom deore|deor and mære|mæran 
 geond þes eorþ|eorðe æghwylс dælan|dæl . 
 he se on|an weorold wearð gemyndig , 
 þæt|se he word cweðan on|an gewitnes , 
 þæt|se heo on|an þusende þæt|se sceoldan healdan|heald , 
 þære|se cneoris cwyc se þu|þe|se libban . 
 þæt|se he mid aðsware toh|to abrahame 
 and toh|to isaace eacan|eac geseсan|gesecan , 
 and gleawlice iacobe beodan , 
 þæt|se awa toh|to feorh israheles cyn 
 hit|his|he gewitnes wel gehealdan . 
 and him|hi|he þu|þa|se mid soð sægan|seсgan|secgan cweðan : 
 " ic eowrum cynn khananea land|finna 
 on|an agen æht yrfe gesylle . " 
 næs|nesan þæt|se mære|mæran cynn micel on|an riman|rim , 
 acan|ac on|an þæm|þam|se folc feaw wær ænig , 
 oððæt bigenga|bigeng beorn onwocan ; 
 cynn æfter cynn cennan wær , 
 oðþæt hio oðer folc egsan geðiwdan . 
 nesan|neh|ne lætan|lettan he him|hi|he mannian|mann miht|meaht|magan sceððan 
 and he þearle for|faran him|hi|he þrea gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf kyning . 
 nesan|neh|ne sceolon ge min þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg hrinan nesan|neh|ne gretan 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an min witigan wergðe settan . 
 cuman þu|þa|se ofer eorþ|eorðe ermðu and hungor , 
 wurdon|weorþan wid mann wædlan hlaf . 
 he him|hi|he snoterne beforan sendan ærest 
 ful wis wer toh|to scealce , 
 and þu|þa|se bebohtan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn iacobes 
 ioseph on|an geoguþ ; þær he gram ærest 
 habban toh|to hæftan , oþþæt he halig god 
 þurh hit|his|he word wisdom ahebban . 
 sendan him|hi|he soð cyning sweotule are|ar , 
 alysan he lungre and he þæm|þam|se leode|leoda|leod þu|þa|se 
 toh|to ealdorman eall|eal settan . 
 he settan he on|an hit|his|he hus toh|to hlafwearde , 
 eall|eal him|hi|he hit|his|he æht anweald betæсan|betæcan , 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he ealdorman ealle|eall|eal læran , 
 swa he hit|his|he sylfes mod settan|gesettan habban , 
 and þu|þa|se yldestan ealle|eall|eal læran , 
 þæt|se heo wisdom word oncneowan . 
 þær israhel becuman on|an egypta , 
 and se god iacob siððan 
 eft eardude eorþ|eorðe khanaan . 
 he þæt|se eadig folc ehtan swiðe , 
 and hio ofer hira|hi|heore feond fæstan|fæst getrymede . 
 hira|hi heorte he onginnan hwyrfan ærest , 
 þæt|se heo hit|his|he folc feodan swiðe 
 and hit|his|he esnum eacan|eac inwit fremede . 
 þu|þa|se he him|hi|he se mære|mæran moyses sendan , 
 hit|his|he sylfes scealc , samod ætgædere 
 and aaron eacan|eac , se he ær geceosan . 
 he settan on|an hi|heo self soð wisdom 
 word and weorc wundortacen 
 and forebeacna , þæt|se hio fromlice 
 cyðdan cneomagum cyst god , 
 oðþæt heo geforan folc khananea . 
 he hi|heo mid þystru|þystre onginnan þrean æt|etan frymþe , 
 forðam hio word hira|hi|heore wel nesan|neh|ne oncneowan . 
 and hira|hi|heore wæter swilce wendan|wenan toh|to blod , 
 on|an ðam|se hira|hi|heore fisceas frecne|frecen|frec forwurdan . 
 sendan on|an hira|hi|heore eorþe|eorþ ealle|eall|eal swilce 
 toscean teonlice , þu|þa|se teolum hus 
 on|an cyning cofa cwyce eardedan . 
 he self cweðan ; sona cwoman 
 mysci manig|manian , mid wær gnætt , 
 fleohcynnes feala flugan on|an gemære . 
 settan him|hi|he regn reþe|reðe swilce , 
 hatan|hat of heofenum hagol beornan , 
 se liсgan|leon forgifan|forgiefan land|finna egypta . 
 siððan forwurdan hira|hi|heore wingeard 
 and ficbeamas ; furþor nesan|neh|ne mihton 
 blæd bringan nesan|neh|ne bearwa treow . 
 he þu|þa|se siððan cweðan ; sona cwoman 
 gangan gærshoppa and gram ceaferas ; 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan þu|þa|se on|an molde munan|mann|man geriman , 
 þu|þe|se þær on|an folde fretan wæstm . 
 siððan he æfter slean æghwylc frumbearn 
 þu|þe|se on|an egyptum wesan|seon|beon ahwær acennan , 
 and frumcynnes hira|hi|heore frea swilce . 
 and hit|his|he þæt|se god folc gold and seolfor 
 geweorþade and hi|heo wislice 
 leof lædan ; næs|nesan se leode|leoda|leod þe|þa|ða|se 
 ænig untrum yldra nesan|neh|ne gingra . 
 wurdon|weorþan him|hi|he egyptas æfter bliðe , 
 siððan hi|heo on|an for|faran folc sceawedan , 
 forðam him|hi|he þær egesian|egesa angryslic standan . 
 he hi|heo wolcn|wolcen bewreah , wrað ahreddan , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan him|hi|he neod nihtian|niht|neaht gehwylc 
 fyren beam beforan wisian . 
 flæsces hi|heo biddan , fugol coman , 
 of garsecge ganetas fleoge|fleogan , 
 and hi|heo heofonhlafe halig gefyllan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan him|hi|he of stane|stan stream flowan , 
 wæter on|an willan|willa ; na him|hi|he gewættan fot , 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo on|an iordane gengdan æfter . 
 acan|ac he wesan|seon|beon se word wel gemyndig , 
 halig heofenes weard , þu|þe|se he hleoðrade 
 toh|to abrahame , hit|his|he agen hysse . 
 and hit|his|he folc lædan fæger on|an bliss|blis 
 and hit|his|he se geceosan heap clæne on|an wynn . 
 sellan þæm|þam|se leode|leoda|leod land|finna anweald 
 on|an agen æht oðer þeon|þeodan|þeod 
 and hi|heo folc gewinnan|gewinn fremde gesittan . 
 þær hi|heo heoldan halig dom 
 and hit|his|he soþfæst word swilce georne|geornan|georn , 
 and hit|his|he æbebod awa toh|to feorh . ## ic andettan ecum drihten , 
 georne|geornan|georn ðam|se gleaw , forðam ic he god witan ; 
 forðam he hit|his|he mildheortnysse mann cyðde , 
 on|an ðysse weorold wis gestandeð . 
 hwylc|hwilc mæg|magan æfre miht|meaht drihten 
 asprecan and aspyrian , oððe spedlice 
 eall|eal hit|his|he lofmægen leode|leodan|leod gehyran 
 and hit|his|he gehyrnesse heran|her oncnawan gewinnan|geblandan 
 eadig beoð æghwær , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wyllað 
 soð dom self efnan|efen , 
 on|an ealle|eall|eal tidan|tid æghwæs healdan|heald 
 hira|hi|heore soþfæstness simble mid dæd . 
 gemunan we|us , drihten , on|an modsefa 
 forþ|forð hycgende folc þin , 
 and we|us mid hælu heran|her geneosa . 
 and we|us tidlice tela sceawian , 
 ceose mid gecorenum , þenden we cwic lifgen , 
 þæt|se we mid þinne|þin ðeode þær blissian 
 and þæt|se yrfe þu|þin æghwær herian|here . 
 we gefyrnedan mid ure|ur fædera|fæder ær , 
 and we unsoðfæste ealle|eall|eal wesan|seon|beon 
 and unriht æghwær worhtan . 
 fæder ure|ur fæstan|fæst nesan|neh|ne oncneowan 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se wundor þu|þe|se þu on|an egyptum 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan wræclice , wundor unlytel ; 
 nesan hi|heo gemyndig miltsian|milts þinne|þin , 
 þu|þa|se þu him|hi|he on|an se mægþ manig|manian cyðdest . 
 hi|heo bysmredan , þu|þa|se hi|heo on|an brad wæter 
 on|an se reada|read sæ randas beran , 
 þær þu hi|heo alysan , lifes|lif ealdor , 
 and hi|heo generian on|an naman|nama þin , 
 þu|þa|se þu þin miht mycle cyðdest . 
 þær þu read sæ ricene geðywdest , 
 and þær wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se wareðas drige , 
 and hi|heo betweonum wæterian|wæter weall lædan , 
 swa hi|heo on|an westen|westan wesan|seon|beon on|an drigum . 
 swa hi|heo alysan lifes|lif ealdor 
 of hira|hi|heore feond fæcne hand , 
 and of feogendra folm swilce , 
 and hira|hi|heore feond flod adrenсan|adrencan , 
 þæt|se se æfre nesan|neh|ne cuman on|an spellboda . 
 siððan hi|heo hit|his|he wordon wel gelyfdan 
 and him|hi|he lofsangum lust cwemdan , 
 and se eft hraðe ealle|eall|eal forgietan , 
 weorc wræclicra ; na hi|heo wel siððan 
 hit|his|he geæhtunge ahwær heoldan . 
 hi|heo on|an westen|westan wrað ongunnan 
 gitsung beginnan|began and gramlice 
 hira|hi|heore god þær geare|gear costedan . 
 he him|hi|he been sniome bringan|brengan and sellan , 
 sendan on|an hira|hi|heore muþ mete|metan|met toh|to geniht . 
 onginnan hi|heo on|an þæm|þam|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wrað swilce 
 mære moyses micel bysmrian 
 and aaron mid eacan|eac se halig|halga|haleg . 
 þu|þa|se eorþ|eorðe togaan and eall|eal forswelgan 
 on|an deop forwyrd dathanes weorod 
 and abirones eall|eal ætgædere . 
 þær fyr abarn frecne|frecen|frec swilce 
 on|an hira|hi|heore gemetinge , and þær maansceaðan 
 þu|þa|se synful sniome forbærnan . 
 hi|heo on|an choreb swilce cealf ongunnan 
 him|hi|he toh|to godgylde georne|geornan|georn wyrcean , 
 onwendan hira|hi|heore wuldor|seolh|bearm on|an se wyrsa had 
 hæðenstyrces hi|heo|heg etendes . 
 god hi|heo forgietan , þu|þe|se hi|heo of gram ær 
 feond folm frecne|frecen|frec generian , 
 þu|þe|se on|an egyptum æðele wundur 
 and on|an chananea cyme wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan 
 and recen wundur on|an þæm|þam|se reada|read sæ . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo willan toweorpan wuldor aldor , 
 þær hira|hi|heore moyses mægene nesan|neh|ne helpan ; 
 he þæt|se folc forstandan feond mægene ; 
 forðam he him|hi|he hit|his|he yrre|irre of acyrde , 
 þæt|se he hi|heo nesan|neh|ne toweorpan geond werþeoda . 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo for|faran awyht eorþe|eorþ cystan|cyst|cyssan 
 þu|þa|se selestan geseon woldan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he word eacan|eac woldan gelyfan ; 
 acan|ac hi|heo granedan and gram spræcan , 
 noldan hit|his|he word wel gehyran . 
 he hit|his|he hand ahebban and hi|heo hraðe willan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se westen|westan wid todrifan 
 and hira|hi|heore swæs cynn sendan on|an wid land|finna . 
 hi|heo belphegor biddan are|ar , 
 etan dead lacan|lac , swa hit gedefe nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon . 
 and hi|heo bysmredon beald drihten 
 on|an hira|hi|heore gemetincge mægene ealle|eall|eal , 
 and þær healicne on|an hryre gefremedan . 
 hi|heo se feondætes finees awerede , 
 þu|þa|se he on|an þæm|þam|se folc feondgyld gebrecan ; 
 he se hælan|helan gehleat and helpan findan 
 of cynn gehwa and on|an cneoris . 
 eacan|eac hi|heo gefremedan oðer bismer , 
 þær hi|heo wiðercwyde wæter habban ; 
 þær moyses wearð mægene gebysgad 
 for|faran hira|hi|heore yfel , swa he oft wesan|seon|beon , 
 on|an hit|his|he gast gram ; nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan him|hi|he god willan|willa 
 mid hit|his|he weler wis getæcean . 
 noldan hi|heo toworpan wrað þeon|þeodan|þeod , 
 swa him|hi|he drihten ær dema sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 acan|ac hi|heo wiþ|wið manfull mengdan þeon|þeodan|þeod 
 and leornedan lað weorc god 
 and sceuccgyldum swyþ|swyðe|swiðe guldan ; 
 him|hi|he þæt|se eall|eal gewearð toh|to æswyce . 
 ongunnan hira|hi|heore birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn blotan feond , 
 sceuccum onsæcgean sunu and dohter ; 
 agutan blod swilce bearn feala , 
 þu|þa|se unscyldige ealle|eall|eal wærun , 
 siððan hi|heo gecuran chananea god . 
 þanan eorþe wearð eall|eal mid blod 
 mane mengan|gemengan , misdæd fah . 
 eall|eal hi|heo forheoldan heahweorc god ; 
 forðam him|hi|he yrre|irre wearð ece drihten 
 and he hit|his|he yrfe eall|eal forhogode . 
 he hi|heo on|an handgeweald hæðenum sellan 
 and hira|hi|heore weoldan , þu|þa|se him|hi|he wyrrest ær 
 on|an feondscipe fæstan|fæst gestandan . 
 hira|hi|heore costedan cuþ|cunnan feond 
 and under hand hynþu þoledan ; 
 hi|heo alysan oft lifes|lif ealdor . 
 hi|heo he on|an geþeaht oft abylgdan ; 
 wesan|seon|beon on|an unriht oft gehynde . 
 swa he furðum oncnawan , þæt|se hira|hi|heore fynd ehtan , 
 he hira|hi|heore ben beald gehyrdan|gehyran . 
 þonne|se he hit|his|he wordgebeot well|wel gemunan ; 
 hreowan|hreaw he sona , þonne|se hi|heo hynþu drugan , 
 æfter hit|his|he miltsian|milts menigu god . 
 siððan he him|hi|he sellan sona milts , 
 þær hi|heo on|an geseon ealle|eall|eal ætgædere , 
 þu|þe|se ehtend him|hi|he ær gestodan . 
 don we|us hal nu , halig drihten , 
 and we|us , se god god , georne|geornan|georn gesamnian 
 of widwegum , þær we wea dreogað , 
 þæt|se we þinne|þin naman|nama nede motan 
 se halgestan heran|her andettan 
 and we on|an lof þin lungre weorðan 
 ofer werðeode wuldor geherian . 
 wese|wesan israhela god aa gebletsad 
 on|an weorold weorold , wealdend drihten , 
 and þæt|se fæger becweðe folc æghwylc ; 
 wese|wesan swa , wese|wesan swa þurh eall|eal wid ferhð . ## ic andettan eсe drihten , 
 se goodan god , forðam ic he gleaw witan ; 
 wesan|seon|is hit|his|he mildheortnes micel toh|to weorold . 
 secg þæt|se nu þe|þa|ða|se , þæt|se hi|heo self god 
 alysan , lifes|lif weard , laðum of hand , 
 and hi|heo of sidfolcum gesamnade . 
 fram uppgange ærest sunne|sunnan|sunna 
 oþþæt heo gewiteð on|an westrodur 
 and fram sæ norþan swycedan geond westen|westan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne magan ceaster wegan|weg cuþ mitta , 
 þu|þe|se hi|heo eardung on|an genaman . 
 habban hi|heo hungor and þurst heard wyrdan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he frecne|frecen|frec on|an feorh aðolude . 
 and hi|heo þu|þa|se on|an þære|se costunge cleopedan toh|to dryhten , 
 and he hi|heo of þæm|þam|se earfeðum eall|eal alysan . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se gelædan lifes|lif ealdor , 
 þær hi|heo on|an riht wegan|weg ricene eodan , 
 oðþæt hi|heo cuðlice on|an becwoman 
 toh|to hira|hi cestre eardungstowe . 
 forðam hi|heo mildheortness|mildheortnes mihtig drihten 
 ealle|eall|eal andettað , and eacan|eac sæcgeað 
 micel wundur his mannian|mann bearn . 
 forðam he gesedeð sawol|sawel idel , 
 and þu|þa|se hungrian heran|her mid god 
 fæstan|fæst gefylleð toh|to feorh siððan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se heran|her on|an ðystrum þrage sittan 
 and on|an deaðes scua deorc lifdan , 
 gebindan bealuwe feter 
 on|an wædle wracu and on|an isern . 
 forðam hi|heo dydan drihten sprecan 
 æghwæs ægype , and hit|his|he geðeaht swilce 
 se heahstan him|hi|he hæfdan on|an bismer . 
 hira|hi heorte wesan|seon|beon hean|heah on|an gewinn 
 and untrum ealle|eall|eal wær , 
 næfdan þu|þa|se on|an folde fultuman|fultum an . 
 hi|heo on|an costunge cleopedan toh|to drihten , 
 and he hi|heo of þæm|þam|se earfoðum eall|eal alysan . 
 and he hi|heo of þæm|þam|se þystru|þystre þanan alædan 
 and of deaðes scua deorc generian 
 and hira|hi|heore bendas toweorpan bitter|bitor|biter sneome . 
 forðam hi|heo mildheort mod mihtig drihten 
 ealle|eall|eal andettan , and eacan|eac cweþan 
 micel wundur hit|his|he ofer mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 forðam he æren dor eaðe gescæneð 
 and isern steng ana|an gebigeð . 
 he hi|heo of unriht ealle|eall|eal swilce 
 þæm|þam|se wrað weсgan|wegan|weg wis alædeð , 
 þær hi|heo wesan|seon|beon on|an woo ær wrað besmitene . 
 hi|heo onhysctan æghwylс mete|metan|met , 
 mod mægen|magan hira|hi|heore , oþ|oð unmiht , 
 þæt|se hi wiþ|wið deaða duru drencyde wær . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo on|an costunge cleopedan toh|to drihten , 
 and he hi|heo of þæm|þam|se earfoþe eall|eal alysan . 
 he him|hi|he wisfæstlic word onsendan , 
 þurh þæt|se hi|heo hrædlice hælan wesan|seon|beon 
 and of hira|hi|heore forwyrde wurdan generian . 
 forðam hi|heo nu andettan ecum drihten , 
 þæt|se he milde wearð mannian|mann cynn ; 
 micel ys hit|his|he wundur ofer mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 hi|heo him|hi|he sculan lac lof lust bringan , 
 and hit|his|he weorc wynsum wid sæcgean . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se sæ seceað , mid scip liðað , 
 wyrceað weorc manig on|an wæterðryþum . 
 hi|heo drihten weorc digul geseon 
 and hit|his|he wundrian|wundor|wund wearn on|an wætergrundum . 
 gif he self cwyð , sona ætstandað 
 ystige gast ofer egewylmum , 
 beoð hira|hi|heore yþian|yþ up astigene . 
 þu|þa|se toh|to heofenum up heah astigan , 
 niþer gefeallað under neowulne grund ; 
 oft þu|þa|se on|an yfele|yfel eft aþindað . 
 gedrefan þu|þa|se deop syndan , 
 heard onhrerede heran|her anlicast , 
 hu druncen|drincan hwylc|hwilc gedwæs spyrige ; 
 ealle|eall|eal hira|hi|heore snytru beoð yfele|yfel forglendred . 
 hi|heo on|an costunge cleopedan toh|to drihten , 
 and he hi|heo of earfeðum eall|eal alysan . 
 he ystan|yst mæg|magan eaðe oncyrran , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he wind hweoðu weorðeð smylte , 
 and þu|þa|se yðe eft swygiað , 
 bliþe weorðað , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se brim weþað . 
 and he hi|heo on|an hælu hyþe gelædan , 
 swa he hira|hi willan|willa wyste fyrmest|forma , 
 and he hi|heo|heg of earfoðum eall|eal alysan . 
 hi|heo andettan ealle|eall|eal drihten , 
 hu he milde wearð mannian|mann cynn ; 
 mære|mæran synd hit|his|he wundur ofer mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 forðam he on|an circe cristen folc 
 hean|heah ahebbað , and him|hi|he hælu and lof 
 on|an sotelum soðfæstra secgean toh|to weorold . 
 he on|an westen|westan wynn stream 
 soþfæst settan , þær he sarig folc 
 geðewde þurste þu|þa|se blissade . 
 he þe|þa|ða|se weaxendan wendan|wenan eorþ|eorðe 
 on|an sealten|sealt mersc for|faran synndædum 
 þær|se eardendra , þu|þe|se hire|heo on|an lifdan . 
 westen|westan he gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan on|an wid merian|mere , 
 and swilce eorþ|eorðe eacan|eac butan wæter|wæt 
 on|an utgang æþelian burna . 
 þær he hungrium ham staðelude , 
 and þær gesettan swilce ceaster , 
 þær hi|heo eard niman awa siððan . 
 hi|heo wingeard wyrcean onginnan , 
 sæd|secgan seowan , siððan growan 
 lungre land|finna hira|hi|heore aloden wæstm . 
 þu|þa|se he bletsade , and hi|heo brad þu|þa|se 
 weoxan weorðlice , wid greowan ; 
 næs|nesan hira|hi|heore neat nan geyfelad . 
 oft hi|heo fea wurdan feond geswenсan 
 fram þære|se costunge þu|þe|se him|hi|he becuman æfter , 
 sar and yfel , þu|þe|se hi|heo siððan begietan|begeotan . 
 siððan hi|heo forhogedan halig lar ; 
 hira|hi ealdorman ealle|eall|eal wesan|seon|beon 
 sar beswicene , swicedan oftust 
 and on|an weg werig|werian wendan hwilum|hwil of . 
 þær he þearfendra þu|þa|se miltsude , 
 and hi|heo of wædle wea alysan , 
 settan hira|hi|heore staðol sceapum anlice . 
 siððan þæt|se soþfæst geseoð , sniome æfter 
 bliðe weorðað , beatan geþenceað , 
 þæt|se unriht gehwylc eft oncyrreð 
 and hit|his|he sylfes muð simble hemneð . 
 hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|is wis nu wel snotera , 
 þu|þe|se þes mid gehygd healdan|heald cunnan , 
 and milde mod mihtig drihten 
 full gleawlice ongitan siððan gewinnan|geblandan ## ys min|ic heorte gearu , halig drihten , 
 gearu wesan|seon|is min|ic heorte , þæt|se ic god cweme|cweman , 
 sealmas singan soþ drihten . 
 arisan nu , wuldur min|ic , þæt|se ic wynlice 
 on|an psalterio þu|þe|se singan motan|mot , 
 and ic þu|þe|ðe on|an hleoðre hearpe swilce 
 on|an ærmergen eacan|eac gecweme . 
 ic þu|þe|se andettan , ece drihten , 
 on|an folc gehwa fæger word , 
 and ic þu|þe|se on|an ðeodum on|an þanc motan|mot 
 sealmas singan swyþ|swyðe|swiðe geneahhe . 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin mildheort mod micel oþ|oð heofenas 
 ahebban healice ofer hæleða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ; 
 ys þu|þin soðfæstnes settan oþ wolcen . 
 ahebban þu wesan|seon ofer heofenas , halig drihten ; 
 wesan|seon|is wuldur þin wid swilce 
 ofer þes eorþ|eorðe ealle|eall|eal mære|mæran , 
 and þin þu|þa|se geceosan wese|wesan clæne and alysan . 
 don me|ic þu|þin swyðre hand swilce hal 
 and me|ic gehyran , hælynd drihten , 
 þu|þe|se on|an halig|halga|haleg spreceð heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe : 
 " and ic blissian , buan gedælan , 
 þu|þa|se selegesceotu , þu|þa|se on|an sycimam nu 
 and on|an metibor mære|mæran standað . 
 min|ic wesan|seon|is galaad , gearu mannases , 
 wesan|seon|is effrem hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan broður|broðor 
 efne|efnan|efen heah strengðu heafod min . 
 ic me|ic toh|to cyninge|cyning cennan|cene iudas , 
 syndan me|ic moabitingas mæg|maga swilce ; 
 ic idumea ealle|eall|eal cennan|cene 
 and min|ic gescy þider sendan þence ; 
 syndan me|ic fremde cynn fæstan|fæst underþeodan . " 
 hwylc|hwilc gelædeð me|ic on|an lifes|lif burh|burg 
 fæstan|fæst getrymede , þæt|se ic forþ|forð þanan 
 on|an idumea wese|wesan eft lædan|gelædan gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwæt#2 , þu wesan|seon se self god , þu|þe|se we|us synnig iu 
 adrifan fram dom ; nesan|neh|ne don þu æfre swa , 
 þæt|se þu of ure|ur mægene mod acyrre . 
 syl|sellan we|us on|an earfoðum æþele fultuman|fultum ; 
 forðam hælu byð heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe 
 mannian|mann gehwilc mægene idel . 
 we|us sculan mægenes gemetan|gemet mihtig drihten 
 soþfæst syllan , and he sona mæg|magan 
 ure|ur feond gedon|gedo|don fracuþe toh|to nawihte . ## nelle ic lof þin , lifian god , 
 geswigian , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se me|ic synfull|synful 
 inwitfulra muðas on|an ganian . 
 hio þu|þa|se innwit feala ywdan on|an tunge , 
 and me|ic wrað wearn word sprecan , 
 fæcne firenlicu , and afuhtan me|ic 
 ealle|eall|eal earwunga ungemete swiðe . 
 hi|heo me|ic wiþ|wið lufu|lufe laþu|laþ dæd 
 torn telnysse teodan mænige ; 
 ic him|hi|he wifcynn|hosp|flet|a gebiddan ungemete georne|geornan|georn . 
 hi|heo me|ic yfel settan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wiþ|wið goode 
 and feounge for|faran minre|min lufu|lufe . 
 gesettan him|hi|he synnfulle simble toh|to ealdor , 
 standan|stand him|hi|he on|an þu|þa|se swyþeran hand swilce deoful . 
 gangan|gang of dom gehwa deop gehyned , 
 and him|hi|he hit|his|he gebed hweorfan toh|to fyren . 
 gewurðe him|hi|he weste|westan eall|eal hit|his|he onwunung 
 and on|an his eardungstowe næfre gewurþe 
 þæt|se þær on|an gewunian awiht lifigendes . 
 wese|wesan him|hi|he dæg|dah|dag deorc and dimm and feaw , 
 and hit|his|he bisceophad brucan feond . 
 weorðan hit|his|he agen birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ealle|eall|eal steopcild 
 and hit|his|he wif weorþ widuwe hreowlic . 
 syn hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn swilce toboren wid , 
 and he ut weorpan earm þearfa , 
 þonne|se hi|heo toh|to hit|his|he hus hleowes wilnian . 
 ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he æht unholde fynd 
 romana reðemann rycene gedælan , 
 and hit|his|he feoh onfon fremde hand . 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he ahwær wese|wesan ænig fultuman|fultum , 
 nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he steopcildum standan|stand toh|to helpan . 
 gangan ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn on|an ece forwyrd , 
 and on|an an cneow|cneo|cnawan eall|eal gewyrðe 
 hit|his|he nama nyhsta nede adilgad . 
 eall|eal þæt|se unriht þu|þe|se hit|his|he ealdor ær 
 manes gefremedan , on|an gemynd cuman|ancuman 
 and on|an ansyn ure|ur drihten ; 
 nesan|neh|ne adilgian wese|wesan deorc fyren , 
 þu|þa|se hit|his|he modur ær mane fremman|fremede . 
 wese|wesan hi|heo wiþ|wið drihten dæd swilce , 
 and he adilgie dom eall|eal 
 of ðysse eorþ|eorðe awa toh|to feorh . 
 næs|nesan him|hi|he milde gemynd on|an modsefa , 
 and he þearfendra ðriste ehtan ; 
 simble þæt|se on|an heorte hycgan geornust , 
 hu he mid searuwe swilce acwellan . 
 he willan wergðu wyrcean georne|geornan|georn , 
 and he seon|seo|se ylce on|an eft gesette|gesettan ; 
 nyllan|nillan he bletsunge biddan nesan|neh|ne tilian|tilia , 
 forðam hio him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon afyrran of ferhðcofan . 
 he he gegyrwan mid gram wyrgðu , 
 swa he he wædum wræstum geteon , 
 and se hit|his|he innað ywde swilce 
 wan wæter gelic and wynele , 
 se þu|þe|se ban byrst beteð and hæleð . 
 wese|wesan he hrægle gelic þu|þe|se heran|her hraðe ealdað , 
 and gyrdelse , þu|þe|ðe he munan|mann|man gelome|gelom gyrdan . 
 þes wesan|seon|is weorc þær|se þu|þe|se oft wrað me|ic 
 trage tældan ; tynan|tin he dryhten 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se sar sprecan sawol|sawel minre|min . 
 and þu , min|ic drihten god , don me|ic þin nu 
 mycle mildheortness|mildheortnes for|faran þin þæm|þam|se mære|mæran naman|nama , 
 swa þu oft þu|þin milde mod manig cyðdest . 
 alysan me|ic , lifes|lif weard , forðam ic wesan|seon|eoh lama þearfian|þearfa ; 
 wesan|seon|is me|ic heorte on|an heard gedrefan|drefan . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh scua gelic swyþ|swyðe|swiðe ahylded , 
 oðlæded god swa se gærshoppa . 
 me|ic synt cneow swilce cwic unhal 
 for|faran fæsten ; wesan|seon|is min|ic flæsc swilce 
 for|faran fæger elh|ele frecne|frecen|frec onwendan ; 
 wesan|seon|eoh ic toh|to edwitstæfe eall|eal weorþan|geweorþan . 
 swa hi|heo me|ic geseon , sona hi|heo|heg wegdan , 
 hrerdan hira|hi|heore heafod ; helpan min|ic , drihten god , 
 and me|ic hal gedon , hælynde crist , 
 for|faran þinne|þin þære|se myclan mildheortnysse . 
 þæt|se hi|heo soð witan|wita , þæt|se seon þu|þin sylfes hand 
 and þu þes gedon , drihten usser . 
 weorðan þu|þa|se awyrgan , wesan þu gebletsad ; 
 and þu|þa|se þu|þe|se me|ic mid unriht ænig styrian|styria , 
 and hi|heo þær sceand self agan ; 
 wese|wesan þu|þin esne on|an þu|þe|se ungemete bliðe . 
 syn þe|þa|ða|se butan are|ar ealle|eall|eal gegyrwan 
 þu|þe|se me|ic tælnysse teonan ætfæstan , 
 and him|hi|he seon abrogden swa of brechrægle 
 hira|hi sylfra sceamu swyþust eall|eal . 
 ic on|an minum|min muðe miht|meaht drihten 
 ealle|eall|eal andettan , and eacan|eac swilce 
 he on|an midle mannian|mann herian|here . 
 he self gestandan on|an þe|þa|ða|se swyðran hand , 
 þær he þearfendra þingian|þing teolode ; 
 he min sawol|sawel swilce gehealdan 
 wiþ|wið ehtendra egsan grima . ## hefig gefylleð ; 
 heafod he gebreceð hæleða mæniges 
 and swa geweorðeð wid geond eorþ|eorðe . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se on|an weсgan|wegan|weg weorðað , wæter æt|etan hlimme|hlimman 
 deop ondrincað ; beoð þywan|þy|þe|se dædfromran , 
 and forðam hira|hi heafod hebbað siððan . ## ic andytte þu|þe|se , ece drihten , 
 mid hyсgan|hyg|hycgan ealle|eall|eal heorte minre|min 
 for|faran gesamnuncge se soðfæstra 
 and on|an gemetingum micel drihten weorc . 
 swilce ic hit|his|he willan|willa wylle georne|geornan|georn 
 swyþ|swyðe|swiðe secean , samed andettan , 
 hu hit|his|he mægenþrymnes mycellic standeð 
 and hit|his|he soðfæstnyss wunað simble ece . 
 he gemynd dydan|don mære wundrian|wundor|wund ; 
 mildheort he wesan|seon|is and modig ; mihtig drihten 
 syleð eall|eal mete|metan|met þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hit|his|he ege habbað . 
 and he on|an weorold wearð gemyndig 
 hit|his|he gewitnes , þu|þe|se he wel swilce 
 myhtum micel and mærweorcum 
 fæger gefyllan and toh|to hit|his|he folc cweðan , 
 þæt|se he him|hi|he willan yrfe ellþeodigra 
 on|an agen æht eall|eal gesyllan . 
 ys hit|his|he handgeweorc hyсgan|hyg|hycgan soðfæstra , 
 ryhte dom , þu|þa|se he ræran wyle ; 
 wærun hit|his|he bebod ealle|eall|eal treowfæste , 
 on|an eall|eal weorulda weoruld wurdan soþfæst 
 and on|an rihtnysse ræde|ræd getrymede . 
 he alysinge leof folc 
 soð onsendan and him|hi|he swilce bebeodan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an ecnes wifcynn|hosp|flet|a siððan 
 hit|his|he gewitnes well|wel geheoldan 
 and hit|his|he se halig|halga|haleg naman|nama hæfdan mid egsan . 
 þæt|se byð secg gehwa snytru on|an frymþ , 
 þæt|se he god egesa gleaw healdan|heald , 
 and þæt|se byð andgit good eall|eal swilce 
 þu|þe|se he wyllað well|wel wyrcean and healdan|heald . 
 herenes drihten heran|her sculan wunian , 
 on|an weorold weorold wynn standan . ## eadig byð se wer se þu|þe|se him|hi|he ege drihten 
 on|an ferhðcleofan fæstan|fæst gestandeð , 
 and hit|his|he bebod healdeð beald mid willan|willa . 
 he on|an eorþ|eorðe byð eadig and spedig , 
 and hit|his|he cneoris byð cyn gebletsad . 
 him|hi|he wuldur and wela wunað æt|etan hus , 
 byð hit|his|he soþfæstnys swilce mære|mæran , 
 þenden þes weorold wunian ænig dælan|dæl . 
 sunnan|leoht wesan|seon|beon on|an leode|leoda|leod leof acyðed , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se on|an ðystrum þrage lifdan 
 and hira|hi heorte heoldan mid rihte|rihtan|riht ; 
 milde wesan|seon|is on|an mod mihtig dryhten , 
 and he ys soþfæst simble æt|etan þearf . 
 glæd munan|mann|man gleawhydig , god and mildheort , 
 seteð soð don|dom þurh hit|his|he sylfes word , 
 se on|an ecnes eadig standeð . 
 byð on|an eceum gemynd æghwylc se 
 þu|þe|se hit|his|he soð and rihtan|riht simble healdeð , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he on|an hlystan micel ondrædeð 
 awiht on|an ealdor|eald yfel siððan . 
 byð hit|his|he heorte gearu|gearo hyht toh|to drihten 
 trymman and tyhtan , þæt|se him|hi|he teonan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 fæcne ætfæstan feond ænig , 
 acan|ac he ealle|eall|eal forseon æghwær georne|geornan|georn . 
 se þu|þe|se hit|his|he æht ealle|eall|eal tostredeð 
 and þearfendum þu|þa|se gedæleð , 
 hit|his|he soðfæstnyss wunað simble oþ|oð ende ; 
 byð hit|his|he horn wendan heran|her on|an wuldur . 
 swa þæt|se synfull gesyhð , sona yrsað , 
 toþ torn þolað , teon grimetað , 
 þearle þindeð , oþþæt þonne|se byð , 
 þæt|se fyrenfulra lust fæcne forweorðeð . ## herigean nu cniht hælynd drihten , 
 and naman|nama dryhten neod herigan . 
 wese|wesan nama dryhten neod gebletsad 
 of ðyssan forþ|forð awa toh|to weorold . 
 fram upgang ærest sunne|sunnan|sunna 
 oðþæt heo wendan|wenan on|an westrodur 
 ge sculan dryhten naman|nama dæd herigean . 
 he wesan|seon|is ofer ealle|eall|eal ingeþeode 
 se heahsta hæleða cynn|cyn , 
 wesan|seon|is ofer heofenas eacan|eac ahebban hit|his|he wuldur . 
 hwylc|hwilc ys anlic ure|ur dryhten , 
 þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg god , þu|þe|se on|an heofonrice 
 eadig eardað , ofer ealle|eall|eal gesyhð , 
 þu|þa|se eadmedu æghwær begangæð 
 on|an eorðwege , up on|an heofenum gewinnan|geblandan 
 he of eorþ|eorðe mæg|magan se unagan 
 weccan toh|to willan|willa , and of woruftorde 
 se þearfendan þriste areccan , 
 and he on|an ealdordom upp asettan 
 hit|his|he folc fruma on|an fæger lif . 
 se þu|þe|se eard seteð unwæstmbære 
 on|an modor hus manig bearn ; 
 hio ofer hire|heo sunu symblað and blissað . ## þu|þa|se ut gan|eadan israheles cynn 
 and of ægyptum ealle|eall|eal foran 
 iacobes hus of grama|gram folc , 
 þu|þa|se elreordig ealle|eall|eal wesan|seon|beon . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon weorþan|geweorþan werude iudea , 
 þæt|se heo hælan|helan gehlutan halig siððan ; 
 hæfdan ealdurdom ofer israhelas , 
 miht|meaht mære|mæran and micel romana . 
 swa heo sæ geseon , he hio sniome fleon|fleogan|flean , 
 for|faran him|hi|he iordanen gengan on|an hinder . 
 hæfdan þær beorg bliðe sælan|sæl 
 and ramm þu|þa|se restan gelice ; 
 wesan|seon|beon geswyru swiðe on|an bliss|blis , 
 swa on|an sceapum beoð sceone lamb . 
 hwæt#2 wesan|seon|beon þu|þe|se , sæ swiþ gewinnan|geblandan forhwan fleon|fleogan þu swa gewinnan|geblandan 
 oððe þu , iordanen , for|faran hwy|hwi gengan on|an bæcling gewinnan|geblandan 
 beorg wesan|seon|beon bliðe , gebærdon swa ramm ; 
 wurdan gesweoru on|an seledreame , 
 swa on|an sceapum beoð sceone lamb . 
 for|faran ansyn ecan dryhten 
 þes|þeoh|se eorþe sculan eall|eal abifigan 
 and for|faran iacobes god gear forhtigean . 
 he wendeð stan on|an wid merian|mere , 
 and clifu cyrreð on|an cwic swilce 
 wæter wellan mid hit|his|he gewealdendre hand . 
 nalæs we|us , nalæs we|us , nergend dryhten , 
 acan|ac we naman|nama þin neod secgeað 
 wuldur wid geond woruldricu , 
 for|faran þin þære|se myclan mildheortnysse 
 and for|faran þinne|þin soþfæstness samed ætgædere , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þæt|se æfre cweðan oðer þeon|þeodan|þeod : 
 " hwær wesan|seon|is hira|hi|heore ongeagn|agen|agan god ahwær nu þe|þa|ða|se gewinnan|geblandan " 
 ys ure|ur se halig|halgian|halga|haleg god on|an heofondreame 
 uppe mid engel , and he eall|eal gedeð , 
 swa hit|his|he willian|willa byð , on|an woruldrice . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon deofulgild deorc hæþen 
 gold and seolfor , þu|þa|se heran|her gear mann 
 worhtan wigsmiðas wræste mid folm . 
 þu|þa|se muð habbað , and nesan|neh|ne magan hwæþere 
 wiht hleoðrian nesan|neh|ne word sprecan ; 
 beoð onforan eage , nesan|neh|ne magan feor geseon . 
 eare habbað swilce and open nosu , 
 nesan|neh|ne magan eþian , awyht gehyran . 
 hand hi|heo habbað , nesan|neh|ne hio hwæðere magan 
 gegrapian god awiht , 
 and fot|fedan habbað , nesan|neh|ne magan feala gangan . 
 nesan|neh|ne cleopigað hi|heo care , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se hi|heo ceolan habban , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he hluttur gast on|an hracan eardað . 
 acan|ac heo wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se wyrcendum wel gelice 
 and æghwylcum , þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an treowað . 
 israhela hus ærest|ær on|an drihten 
 helpan gehogedan , hold begietan 
 fæle fultuman|fultum ; he hi|heo wiþ|wið feond gehealdan . 
 aarones hus eacan|eac on|an dryhten 
 leof gelyfdan ; he him|hi|he liðe wearð 
 and him|hi|he fultuman|fultum gestandan fæstan|fæst æt|etan þearf . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wegan egsan dryhten , 
 hio hyht hira|hi|heore habban on|an drihten , 
 he him|hi|he fultuman|fultum fæstan|fæst gestandeð 
 and him|hi|he scyldend byð simble æt|etan þearf . 
 weorð þu ure|ur gemyndig , mihtig dryhten , 
 and þin bletsunge bringan ofer we|us ; 
 þu gebletsudest birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn israheles , 
 aarones hus eacan|eac gebletsadest ; 
 þu gebletsadest bliðe mod 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se on|an þu|þe|ðe egsan hæfdan , 
 mycle and mætan|metan ofer middangeard . 
 gemænigfealdige þes mihtig dryhten 
 ofer ge|eowan|eow ealle|eall|eal and ofer agen birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 wesað ge fram god gear gebletsade , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se heofon wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , hruse swilce ; 
 heofon healdeð halig dryhten , 
 sellan þes molde mannian|mann bearn . 
 næfre þu|þe|se , dryhten , dead heriað , 
 nesan|neh|ne ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se heonan hell|hel seceað . 
 acan|ac we lifian leof dryhten 
 bald bletsigað , nesan|neh|ne se blinnað nu 
 of ðyssan forþ|forð awa toh|to weorold . ## ic lufian þu|þe|se , libban|leof drihten , 
 forðam þu min gebed ben gehyrdan|gehyran . 
 and þu þu|þin eare|ear toh|to me|ic eadmodlice 
 hold ahyldest and gehyrdan|gehyran me|ic , 
 þu|þa|se ic þu|þe|se on|an dæg|dah|dag minum|min dyrne cigan . 
 þær me|ic ymbsellan swylde deaðes , 
 and me|ic frecne|frecen|frec ætfeah fyrhtu hell|hel . 
 me|ic costung and sar cnyssedan geneahhe , 
 þonne|se ic naman|nama drihten nyde cigan . 
 eala þu libban|leof god , alysan min nu 
 sawol|sawel on|an gesyntum ; ic toh|to soþ witan , 
 þæt|se þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon mildheort , mihtig dryhten , 
 and ure|ur god æghwæs soþfæst ; 
 miht|meaht we|us þin milde weorðan . 
 drihten gehealdeð dom þu|þa|se lytel ; 
 ic hean|heah gewearð , he me|ic hraðe lysan . 
 gecyr min sawol|sawel clæne on|an þin 
 rædæs restan , romana drihten ; 
 þu me|ic wel dydan|don on|an woruldlife . 
 forðam þu min sawol|sawel self generedyst , 
 and hi|heo|heg of deop deaþ gelædan ; 
 eage min wiþ|wið tear æghwær gehealdan 
 and fot|fedan min wiþ|wið færslide ; 
 ic gelician leof drihten 
 on|an lifigendra land|finna nu þe|þa|ða|se . ## ic þæt|se gelyfan|gelifan , forðam ic lutan sprecan ; 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh eadmede ungemete swiðe|swiðan . 
 swilce ic self cweðan , þu|þa|se me|ic swa ðuhte 
 on|an modseofan minum|min geþanc , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon ealle|eall|eal mann ungemete leas . 
 hwæt#2 mæg|magan ic toh|to god gyldan dryhten 
 for|faran eall|eal þæm|þam|se god þu|þe|se he me|ic ærur dydan|don gewinnan|geblandan 
 ic heran|her hælu calic habban befon , 
 and naman|nama dryhten neod cigan . 
 beorht ys and fæger beacen dryhten 
 on|an hit|his|he gesiht swylt halig . 
 eala , ic wesan|seon|eoh þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan esne , dryhten , 
 and þu|þin swilce wesan|seon|eoh scealc ombehte 
 and þinne|þin þeowan|þeow sunu on|an þu|þe|ðe acennan . 
 þu me|ic tobrecan bendas grimman|grimm|grim , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|se lac lof lust secg . 
 ic min|ic gehatan|gehat halig|halga|haleg dryhten 
 on|an hit|his|he getynum tid gyldan , 
 þu|þe|se ymb dryhten hus deore|deor syndan , 
 þær hit eage folc eall|eal sceawiað , 
 and on|an hierusalem georne|geornan|georn midd . ## ealle|eall|eal þeon|þeodan|þeod eсe drihten 
 mid hygecræfte herigan word , 
 and he eall|eal folc on|an efn æðele herigan . 
 forðam hit|his|he mildheortnyss wesan|seon|is micel ofer we|us 
 torhtlice trymman , til mancynn , 
 and soðfæstnys swilce dryhten 
 wunað ece awa toh|to feorh . ## ic andettan ecum dryhten 
 þæm|þam|se god god ; ic he gleaw witan ; 
 ys hit|his|he mildheortnys micel toh|to weorold . 
 þæt|se israela cwæðan ealle|eall|eal nu þe|þa|ða|se , 
 þu|þe|se he wesan|seon|is se god god , and gearu standeð 
 hit|his|he mildheortnys mære|mæran toh|to weorold . 
 cweðan aarones hus eacan|eac þæt|se self ; 
 he ys se god god , and gearu standeð 
 hit|his|he mildheortnys mære|mæran toh|to weorold . 
 cweðan ealle|eall|eal þæt|se unforcuðe , 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an standeð egsian dryhten ; 
 forðam he ys se god god , and gearu standeð 
 hit|his|he mildheortnys mære|mæran on|an weorold . 
 ic on|an costunge cigan toh|to dryhten , 
 and he me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran on|an heah brædu . 
 nu me|ic fultuman|fultum wesan|seon|is fæle|feolan dryhten , 
 nesan me|ic ege mann for|faran ahwæðer . 
 nu me|ic fultuman|fultum ys fæle|feolan dryhten , 
 ic fracuþe forseon feond min . 
 god ys on|an dryhten georne|geornan|georn toh|to þenceanne , 
 þonne|se on|an mannan wese|wesan mod toh|to treowianne . 
 god ys on|an dryhten georne|geornan|georn toh|to hyhtanne , 
 þonne|se on|an ealdorman ahwær toh|to treowianne . 
 ealle|eall|eal me|ic ymbsellan side|sid þeon|þeodan|þeod , 
 and ic wesan|seon|beon on|an dryhten naman|nama deore|deor hælan|gehælan . 
 me|ic ymbstodan strang manig|manian , 
 and me|ic god nama on|an him|hi|he georne|geornan|georn gehælan . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo me|ic ymbsellan samod anlice 
 swa beon|beo|bannan biter , oððe þu bærnan|bær eacan|eac 
 þorn þyre þicce fyr , 
 þær me|ic nama dryhten neod scylde . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon heard cnyssed and ic me|ic helpan findan , 
 þæt|se ic fæstan|fæst nesan|neh|ne feallan , acan|ac ic me|ic frofor begietan|begeotan , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic dryhten onfon , swa hit gedefe wesan|seon|beon . 
 me|ic wesan|seon|beon strengðu strang stiþ on|an dryhten 
 and herenes heah , and he me|ic eacan|eac 
 ys wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to weorold worden on|an hælu . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a byð bliss|blis stefn beorht hyrian|hyran|gehyran 
 on|an soðfæstra swæs muðe . 
 dydan|don gedefe mægen|magan dryhten swyðre , 
 and me|ic seon|seo|se swyðre swilce drihten 
 ahebban hrædlice æt|etan heahþearfe . 
 nesan|neh|ne sweltan ic mid sar , acan|ac ic gesund lifian 
 and weorc god wid secg . 
 se clænsude , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he clæne wesan|seon|beon ; 
 dryhten ælmihtig nyllan|nillan toh|to deaðe me|ic 
 on|an ecnes æfre gesyllan . 
 undoð me|ic sniome duru soðfæstra eacan|eac , 
 þær ic gangan|gang inn , god andettan ; 
 soþfæst on|an þu|þa|se duru seceað inngang . 
 ic þu|þe|se andettan , ece dryhten , 
 forðam þu me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran æt|etan heahþearfe 
 and me|ic þu|þa|se geweorþan wis on|an hælu . 
 se sylfan stan þu|þe|se he swiðe ær 
 wyrhta awurpan , nu se weorþan|geweorþan wesan|seon|is 
 hwommona heagost ; halig dryhten 
 toh|to weall wrað wis teofrade ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is ure|ur eage eall|eal wundorlic . 
 þes ys se dæg þu|þe|se he drihten we|us 
 wisfæst gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan wer cneoris , 
 eall|eal eorðtudrum eadig toh|to bliss|blis . 
 eala þu dryhten god , don me|ic hal ; 
 eala þu dryhten min|ic , don we|us gesund . 
 gebletsad wesan|seon|is , se þu|þe|se cuman ofer bearn gehwylc 
 on|an dryhten naman|nama dæd mære ; 
 we ge|eowan|eow æt|etan god hus gearu bletsiað , 
 nu we|us drihten god deore|deor onlyhte . 
 wutan we|us toh|to symbeldæge settan georne|geornan|georn , 
 and se gelome|gelom lust healdan|heald 
 oþ|oð wigbedes wræste horn . 
 þu wesan|seon min|ic dryhten god , and ic dæd þu|þe|se 
 eсe andettan ; 
 þu wesan|seon min|ic hælend god , and ic herian|here þu|þe|ðe . 
 ic þu|þe|ðe andettan eсe dryhten , 
 forðam þu me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran æt|etan heahþearfe , 
 and þu|þa|se weorþan me|ic wis toh|to hælu . 
 eacan|eac ic andettan eceum dryhten , 
 forðam he ys se god god , and ic ful geare|gear witan , 
 þæt|se þu|þin mildheortnyss ys micel toh|to weorold . ## eadig beoð on|an weсgan|wegan|weg , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se unwemme 
 on|an hira|hi dryhten æ deore|deor gangað . 
 eadig beoð swilce , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wyllað 
 hit|his|he gewitnes wise|wis smeah|smeagan|smeag , 
 and he mid ealle|eall|eal innancund 
 heorte hordcofan helpan biddað . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan manwyrhtan mægene feran 
 on|an hit|his|he mære wegan|weg , mihtig drihten . 
 þu þin bebod beald hettan|hatan 
 ealle|eall|eal eorðbuend ellen haldan . 
 ic se la wisce , þæt|se weg min 
 on|an þin willan|willa weorþan|weorþ gereссan , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan bebod ellen healdan|heald . 
 nesan|neh|ne beon|beo ic þonne|se on|an ealdor|eald æfre gescynded , 
 gif ic on|an ealle|eall|eal þin bebod ellen locian . 
 ic þu|þe|se andettan , ece dryhten , 
 mid minre|min heorte hold geþanc 
 on|an þan|se þu|þe|se ic geleornian and gelæstan mæg|magan , 
 þæt|se ic þin dom dæd healdan|heald . 
 and ic þin soþfæstness swilce motan|mot 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan healdan|heald , þæt|se þu huru me|ic 
 on|an ðyssum ealdor|eald an nesan|neh|ne forlætan . 
 on|an hwinan mæg|magan se iunga on|an god wegan|weg 
 rihtran þu|þe|se rædran rædan|ræd gemittan , 
 þonne|se he þin wise|wis word gehealdan gewinnan|geblandan 
 ic þu|þe|se mid eall|eal innancund 
 heorte sec ; nesan|neh|ne þu huru me|ic 
 fram þin bebodum feor adrifan . 
 forðam ic on|an minre|min heorte hydan georne|geornan|georn , 
 þæt|se ic þinne|þin sprecan spedan|sped gehealdan , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þu|þe|ðe ic gefremme fyren ænig . 
 þu wesan|seon gebletsud , bliþe dryhten ; 
 læran me|ic mid lufu|lufe , hu ic læstan|læst well|wel 
 and ic þin soþfæstness sweotule cunnan . 
 ic on|an minum|min weler word secg 
 eall|eal þin muðes magan dom . 
 and ic on|an weсgan|wegan|weg swilce wynn gangan|gang , 
 þær ic þin gewitnes witan ful clæne , 
 swa ic eall|eal wela willum brucan . 
 swa ic on|an þin soþfæstness soð getreowe , 
 þæt|se ic nesan|neh|ne weorðe word þinne|þin 
 eall|eal ofergittul awa toh|to feorh . 
 ic on|an þinne|þin soþfæstness simble meteode , 
 þæt|se ic þin wislicu word gehealdan . 
 gild þin esne god dæd ; 
 ic on|an lifdagum lust healdan|heald 
 þinne|þin word wær|waru mid wisdom . 
 onwreon þu min eage , þæt|se ic wel mæge|mæg|magan 
 on|an þinne|þin æ eall|eal sceawian 
 wundur wræclicu , þu|þa|se þu worhtyst ær . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an eorþ|eorðe earm bigenga ; 
 nesan|neh|ne don þu me|ic dyrne þin þu|þa|se deore bebod . 
 þæt|se sawul min|ic simble wilnað , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin soþfæst word gesund motan|mot 
 on|an ealle|eall|eal tidan|tid ellen healdan|heald . 
 þu oferhydige ealle|eall|eal þreadest , 
 þu|þa|se þu awyrgan witan gearuwe 
 and þin bebod efnan|efen noldan . 
 afyr þu fram me|ic facen and edwit , 
 oððe ic oferhydige awiht wylle ; 
 forðam ic þin gewitnes wylle sec . 
 acan|ac nu ealdormann ealle|eall|eal ætgædere 
 sittan on|an seldum , swyþ|swyðe|swiðe sprecan , 
 and wiþ|wið me|ic wrað word scirdan ; 
 hwæþere þu|þin esne ellen teolode , 
 þæt|se he þin soð word snotur began . 
 me|ic wesan|seon|beon þu|þin gewitnys weorþ and getreowe , 
 and ic hi|heo on|an mod metegie georne|geornan|georn 
 and me|ic toh|to frofor witan , þæt|se ic forþ|forð heonun 
 hit|his|he soþfæstness sec georne|geornan|georn . 
 ætfealh min|ic sawul flor geneahhige ; 
 don me|ic æfter þin word wel gecwician . 
 ic þu|þe|se weg min wise|wis secg , 
 and þu me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran hold mod ; 
 læran me|ic on|an lif , hu ic lengest|lengan|lange mæge|mæg|magan 
 þin soþfæstness sellan gehealdan . 
 þu me|ic soþfæstness wegan|weg swilce getacnian , 
 þæt|se ic on|an þin wundor me|ic wel begangan|begang . 
 min|ic sawel aslep , þu|þa|se me|ic sorh begietan|begeotan 
 for|faran langung ; lætan|læt|lædan me|ic nu þu|þa|se 
 on|an þin word weorðan trum . 
 afyr fram me|ic unriht weg , 
 and me|ic on|an þinne|þin æ geweorþan eall|eal milde . 
 ic me|ic wise|wis geceosan weg soþfæst ; 
 nesan|neh|ne weorðe ic þinne|þin dom gedweled æfre . 
 swa ic fæstan|fæst ætfealh , þæt|se ic forþ|forð heonun 
 þin gewitnysse wel gehealdan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne wylt þu me|ic on|an ealdor|eald æfre gescyndan . 
 nu ic on|an wis wegan|weg word þinne|þin 
 reðne rinnan , and þu romana nu 
 min heorte gehealdan on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan brad . 
 æ þu me|ic settan , ece dryhten , 
 þæt|se ic on|an soþfæst weg simble gangan|gang 
 and ic þu|þa|se sec simble motan|mot . 
 syl|sellan me|ic andgit eacan|eac , þæt|se ic æ þin 
 smeah|smeagean|smeagan|smeag mid soð , swilce healdan|heald 
 on|an eall|eal minre|min heorte hold mod . 
 gelædan me|ic on|an stigan|stig , þær ic stæppan|stæp min 
 on|an þin bebodum bryce habban , 
 forðam ic hi mid soð simble willan . 
 ahyld min heorte , þæt|se ic halig nu 
 on|an þin gewitnysse wise|wis gecyrre ; 
 nalæs me|ic gitsung forniman motan|mot . 
 gewendan þu min eage , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan ic weorc idel 
 gese þurh synn , acan|ac me|ic on|an soð wegan|weg 
 þinne|þin se leof lædan cwiculice . 
 settan þin esne oðer swilce , 
 þæt|se he þin sprecan spedan|sped leornian 
 and þu|þa|se on|an ege þin ealle|eall|eal healdan|heald . 
 þu me|ic sculan edwitt min|ic of awyrpan , 
 þæt|se me|ic toh|to inca ahwær gangeð ; 
 forðam ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an þin dom gedefe glæd . 
 efne|efnan|efen ic þin bebod beald willan 
 wis wylle gegan|gan ; wennan|wenan|wen ic swilce , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic on|an riht rædan|ræd gecwycige . 
 and me|ic ofer cuman|ancuman , ece dryhten , 
 þæt|se milde mod , mære|mæran hælu 
 æfter þinne|þin sprecan spowendlice . 
 and ic andwyrde|andwyrdan|andwerdan þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se me|ic edwitstafas 
 word wrað cweþað , þæt|se ic gewene on|an þu|þe|ðe 
 and on|an þin word wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon habban . 
 nesan|neh|ne afyr þu me|ic æfre fæle|feolan sprecan , 
 þu|þa|se ic me|ic on|an muðe mægene habban , 
 and ic soþfæst word on|an sylfan healdan|heald , 
 þæt|se ic on|an ðinra dom dæd getreowige . 
 and ic æ þin efne|efnan|efen and healdan|heald , 
 and toh|to weorold on|an se wunian motan|mot 
 and on|an ecnes efnan|efen and healdan|heald . 
 and ic on|an beald brædu gangan|gang , 
 forðam ic þin gewitnysse wel getrymede . 
 and ic þæt|se for|faran cyninge|cyning cyþan motan|mot , 
 þær hi|heo|heg eage on|an locian , 
 hu me|ic þu|þin gewitnyss ys weorð and getreowe , 
 and on|an ðam|se nesan|neh|ne beon|beo|bannan æfre gescynded . 
 and ic on|an þin bebodum beald motan|mot 
 gemetegian swyþ|swyðe|swiðe mære rædan|ræd , 
 forðam ic hi|heo on|an lufu|lufe minre|min lange|lang habban . 
 and ic min hand hof|hebban gelome|gelom , 
 þær ic þin bebod bryce lufade , 
 þu|þa|se ic mid ðysse þeon|þeodan|þeod þearle begangan|begang , 
 and on|an þin soðcwydas simble ic getreowige . 
 gemunan nu , dryhten , þin word , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se þu me|ic þin þeowan|þeow hyht gesellan . 
 þes ic me|ic on|an frofor fæstan|fæst habban 
 on|an minum|min eaðmedum ungemete swiðe , 
 forðam me|ic þu|þin sprecan sped cwycade . 
 oftust ofermodige unriht fremmað , 
 oþþæt hi|heo on|an eorþ|eorðe ealle|eall|eal forweorðað ; 
 ic þinne|þin æ wifcynn|hosp|flet|a folgian . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon gemyndig mære dom 
 þinne|þin geþancol , ðeoden dryhten , 
 þæt|se ic on|an weorold æt|etan þu|þe|ðe weorþan afrefred . 
 me|ic wearð meltan mod on|an hreðre 
 for|faran fyrenfulra facendædum , 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo æ þin anforlætan . 
 acan|ac me|ic toh|to sang simble habban , 
 hu ic þin soþfæstness sellan healdan , 
 þær ic on|an elelande agan stow . 
 nede ic þæt|se gemunan nihtian|niht|neaht gehwylcre , 
 þæt|se ic naman|nama þinne|þin nemnan , dryhten , 
 and ic æ þin ellen healdan . 
 þes me|ic andweard ealle|eall|eal gewurdan , 
 forðam ic þin soþfæstness sœ̄сan|seсan|secan georne|geornan|georn . 
 me|ic ys on|an dælan|dæl , dryhten user , 
 cwide cynlice , þæt|se ic cwic wylle 
 þin æ healdan|heald ellen mycle . 
 ic biddan þinne|þin ansyn ungemete georne|geornan|georn 
 mid eall|eal gehygd heorte minre|min , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic on|an mod milde weorðe 
 æfter þinne|þin sprecan spowendlice . 
 swa ic weg þin wise|wis þence 
 toh|to feran fot minum|min , 
 þæt|se ic on|an þinne|þin gewitnysse wel gefere|gefer . 
 gearu|gearo ic wesan|seon|eoh simble , nalæs gram mod , 
 þæt|se ic wel|betan cunnan þin bebod healdan|heald . 
 me|ic fyrenfulra fæcne rap 
 ungemet geneahhie oft beclyptan ; 
 næs|nesan ic ofergittul , þæt|se ic æ þin 
 mid hygecræfte healdan and læstan|læst . 
 ic æt|etan midd niht|neaht mæl gehwylc 
 ricene arisan , and hraðe gangan|gang 
 þær ic þu|þe|ðe andettan eall|eal ætgædere , 
 secg þin dom dæd rihte|rihtan|riht . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh dælneomend þu|þe|se hi ondrædað þu|þe|se , 
 and þin halig bebod healdað georne|geornan|georn . 
 þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe wesan|seon|is eall|eal gefyllan|fyllan 
 þinne|þin mildheortness|mildheortnes , mihtig drihten ; 
 þin soðfæstnesse þu me|ic swilce læran . 
 þu ymb þinne|þin esne æghwær dydan|don 
 wel weorðlice ; wennan|wenan|wen ic , drihten , 
 þæt|se þu þu|þin word wylle wis gehealdan . 
 þu me|ic þeodscipe læran þinne|þin til 
 and wisdom word toh|to geniht , 
 forðam ic þu|þin bebod þriste gelyfan|gelifan . 
 ærþon ic gehened hean|heah geweorþan , 
 ic agylte ungemetum swiðe|swiðan ; 
 hwæðere ic þin sprecan gehealdan spedan|sped on|an mod . 
 god þu wesan|seon , drihten , and me|ic god swilce 
 on|an þin til gelæran|gelær , þæt|se ic tela cunnan 
 þu|þin soþfæst weorc simble healdan|heald . 
 ys nu mænigfeald ofer me|ic munan|mann|man and unriht 
 oferhydigra ; ic nu mid eall|eal 
 minre|min heorte hige hycge swiðe|swiðan , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin bebod beorht atredde . 
 ys hira|hi|heore heorte nu heran|her anlicast 
 swa meoluc wese|wesan mægene rinnan|gerinnan ; 
 ic æ þin ungemete georne|geornan|georn 
 on|an modsefa minum|min healdan|heald . 
 sel me|ic wesan|seon|beon and sefte , þæt|se þu self me|ic 
 hean|heah gehnægdest , and ic hraðe siððan 
 þu|þin soþfæst weorc wel leornade . 
 me|ic wesan|seon|is micel god|betera , þæt|se ic bebod healdan|heald , 
 ðines muðes gemetan|gemet , þonne|se mann|man me|ic geofe 
 gear ðusende gold and seolfor . 
 hand me|ic þin hold gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan 
 and gehiwedan mid higecræfte ; 
 syl|sellan me|ic nu andgyt , þæt|se ic eall|eal mæge|mæg|magan 
 þin bliðe bebod beorht leornian . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe on|an feorh forhtigað , þu|þa|se me|ic on|an fæger geseoð 
 and blissiað , buan geðenceað , 
 þæt|se ic þin word wel getreowde . 
 ic þæt|se , dryhten , ongitan|ongietan , dom þin 
 reðe rihtwis , and þu ricene me|ic 
 on|an þin soðfæstnesse dydan|don samed eadmedne . 
 wese|wesan þu|þin milde mod miht swiðan , 
 and me|ic toh|to frofor fæstan|fæst gestandan , 
 swa þu on|an þinne|þin sprecan spedan|sped gehatan 
 þin agen esne æt|etan þearf . 
 cuman me|ic þin miltsian|milts miht geswyþede , 
 and ic lange|lang on|an þæm|þam|se lifian motan|mot ; 
 forðam me|ic wesan|seon|is metegung on|an modsefa , 
 hu ic æ þin efnast healdan|heald . 
 beon|beo|bannan þu|þa|se oferhydegan ealle|eall|eal gescende , 
 þu|þe|se me|ic unriht ahwær gretan ; 
 ic þin bebod beald gegangan|gegang . 
 gehweorfan toh|to me|ic , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se hyldu toh|to þu|þe|ðe 
 egsan ahtan , and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se 
 þu|þe|ðe þin gewitnes wise|wis cuðan . 
 wese|wesan heorte min|ic on|an hige clæne 
 and ic on|an þu|þin soþfæst word simble getreowige , 
 þæt|se ic on|an ealdor|eald nesan|neh|ne wese|wesan æfre gescended . 
 min|ic saul gewearð swancur on|an mod , 
 þær ic on|an þinne|þin hælu hycgan and sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 hu ic on|an þin word wel getrywade . 
 eage me|ic swilce eacan|eac teorian , 
 þær on|an þinne|þin sprecan spedan|sped eodan ; 
 cweþan|cweðan cynlice : " hwæt|hwa cwicenne me|ic 
 on|an þes ealdor|eald eft frefrade gewinnan|geblandan " 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh nu weorþan|geweorþan wer anlicast , 
 swa þu on|an hriman|hrim settan hlance cyll ; 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|eoh ic ofergyttol , þæt|se ic ealle|eall|eal nu 
 þin soþfæst weorc smicer healdan|heald . 
 hwæt#2 synt þin esne eall|eal dagena , 
 þu|þe|se þu min ehtend for|faran me|ic ealle|eall|eal gedeme gewinnan|geblandan 
 me|ic manwyrhtan manig|manian on|an spell|spel 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan soþlice|soðlice ; na ic hit swa oncnawan , 
 swa hit þu|þin æ hafað , ece dryhten . 
 wærun þin ealle|eall|eal gebannan æðele and soþfæst ; 
 min|ic ehtan oft unrihtwyrhtan ; 
 gefultuma me|ic fæger , drihten . 
 hio me|ic lytel læs|lesan laþu|laþ woldan 
 ðisses eorðweges ende gescrifan ; 
 ic þu|þin gebod þu|þa|se nesan|neh|ne willan 
 on|an þes ealdor|eald anforlætan . 
 æfter þin þære|se myclan mildheortness|mildheortnes 
 weorð me|ic , mihtig god , milde and bliðe ; 
 and ic gewitnes wel gehealdan 
 muþ þin , þu|þe|se þu mann læran . 
 on|an ecnes awa , drihten , 
 þu|þin word wunað weorð on|an heofenum . 
 and on|an weorold weorold wunað ece forþ|forð 
 þu|þin soðfæstnes swilce , dryhten . 
 þu þes eorþ|eorðe ealle|eall|eal wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 swa heo nu toh|to weorold wunian ðenceað ; 
 þurh þinne|þin dæd spedan|sped dæg|dah|dag heran|her gewuniað , 
 forðam þu eall|eal anweald hafian|habban . 
 þær me|ic þu|þin æ on|an nesan|neh|ne helpan , 
 þu|þe|ðe ic on|an mod minum|min habban , 
 þonne|se ic wendan|wenan on|an woruldlife , 
 þæt|se ic on|an minum|min eadmedum eall|eal forweorþan . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic se æfre forgytan on|an ecnes , 
 nymðe ic soð word simble gehealdan ; 
 forðam ic cuðlice on|an þæm|se heran|her nu cwic lifian . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh þu|þin hold scealc ; don þu hal me|ic , 
 forðam ic þu|þin soð weorc sec geneahhe . 
 me|ic fyrenfulle fæcne seceað , 
 wyllað me|ic laðe lifes|lif asecean ; 
 ic þin gewitnes witan and sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . 
 ic soð geseon and swilce witan , 
 eall|eal þes weorold wurðeð ende ; 
 brad wesan|seon|is þu|þin gebannan and beorht swiðe . 
 hu ic æ þin , ece drihten , 
 lust lufian ; ic þæt|se lange|lang dydan|don , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þa|se on|an mod metegade georne|geornan|georn . 
 þu me|ic snoterne gedon swilce ofer min 
 feond on|an folde fæcne ealle|eall|eal ; 
 forðam ic beorhtlice þin bebod læstan|læst . 
 ofer ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se me|ic ær læran , 
 ic se habban andgyt æghwær gleawast , 
 þæt|se ic þin gewitnes wise|wis sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . 
 ic þæt|se ofer yldran oncnawan and þæt|se wifcynn|hosp|flet|a gehealdan , 
 þæt|se ic þin bebod bliðe gehealdan . 
 ic minum|min fot fæcne siþ 
 þu|þa|se wraþ weg werian|weorod georne|geornan|georn , 
 þæt|se ic þin word miht|meaht|magan wel gehealdan . 
 na ic fram þin dom dæd swicade , 
 forðam þu me|ic æbebod ærest|ær settan . 
 me|ic wesan|seon|is on|an goma god and swete 
 þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan word , ece drihten ; 
 hit wesan|seon|is halwende , hunige mycle 
 and beobread god|betera and swete . 
 on|an bebodum þin ic me|ic wel|betan oncnawan , 
 þæt|se ic unriht weg ealle|eall|eal ofgan , 
 forðam þu me|ic æ þin ær gesettan . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is fæle|feolan blacern fot minum|min , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin word , drihten , wel gehealdan , 
 and þæt|se ys þæt|se strang sunnan|leoht stigan|stig minre|min . 
 ic aþ swerian and eacan|eac hycge , 
 þæt|se ic soð don|dom simble healdan|heald . 
 and ic eadmedu ungemetum georne|geornan|georn 
 efnan|efen þence ; forgif me|ic , ece god , 
 þæt|se ic æfter þin word weorðe bliðe . 
 min muðes me|ic mod willian|willa 
 on|an heahsælum hraðe gebringan , 
 and me|ic þin dom alær , drihten , swilce . 
 wesan|seon|is sawel min|ic simble on|an þin 
 hold hand , nesan|neh|ne ic þin þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg æ 
 on|an þes ealdor|eald forgitan æfre þence . 
 me|ic firenfull fæcne gyrene 
 awriþan wrað , and nesan|neh|ne willan ic 
 fram þin bebodum feor geswican . 
 ic me|ic eowan begietan|begeotan , æðele habban 
 þin gewitnes wel getreowe 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to feorh ; 
 þæt|se byð heahbliss heorte minre|min . 
 ahylde ic min heorte hold mod , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin soþfæst weorc simble wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan ; 
 forðam ic se ece edlean habban . 
 and ic synfull|synful simble feogean|feogan , 
 and ic æ þin ellen lufade . 
 þu me|ic fultumian sculan , fæle|feolan gestandan 
 and andfenge æghwær æt|etan ðearfe , 
 and ic on|an þu|þin word wel getreowe . 
 gewitað fram me|ic , þu|þe|se awyrgede synt , 
 þenden ic god bebod georne|geornan|georn smeah|smeagean|smeagan|smeag . 
 onfon me|ic freondlice , fæle|feolan drihten , 
 æfter þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se þu self sægan|seсgan|secgan and cweþan|cweðan , 
 þæt|se ic sculan lifigan lange|lang ðrage ; 
 nesan|neh|ne gescend me|ic on|an siþ , nu ic þu|þin swa onbidan . 
 gefultuma me|ic fæstan|fæst ; þonne beon|beo ic fæger hal , 
 and ic þin soþfæstness simble þence . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu forhogodest , þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe unriht 
 wær wyrhta ; witan ic gearewe , 
 þæt|se heo on|an unriht ealle|eall|eal þohtan . 
 ic oferhylmend ealle|eall|eal getellan , 
 þu|þa|se on|an eorþ|eorðe heran|her yfele|yfel wesan|seon|beon , 
 forðam ic þin gewitnes weorþ lufade . 
 gefæstnian þinne|þin egsan flæsc minum|min , 
 þæt|se ic me|ic ondrædan dom þin . 
 ic soð don|dom simble wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne syl|sellan þu me|ic ehtendum æfre minum|min . 
 onfon þu þin esne fæger mid god , 
 þæt|se me|ic oferhydige æfre nesan|neh|ne motan 
 hearmcwyddian ; hyldo nesan|neh|ne gymað . 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic eage min atule gewurdan , 
 þær ic on|an þin hælu hyldo sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 and on|an þinne|þin sprecan spedan|sped soþfæst . 
 don þin agen esne swilce 
 micel milde mod , and me|ic mægene eacan|eac 
 þu|þin soþfæst word self læran|lesan . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh esne þu|þin ; syl|sellan andgit , þæt|se ic 
 þin gewitnes wel leornian . 
 þes wesan|seon|is wynn tidan|tid , þæt|se munan|mann|man eacan|eac wel don , 
 drihten ure|ur ; nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu dol æfre 
 þu|þin æbebod ahwær toweorpan . 
 forðam ic þu|þin bebod beorht lufian , 
 þe|þa|ða|se me|ic georne|geornan|georn synd gold deorran , 
 topazion se tela gimm . 
 forðam ic eall|eal þu|þin bebod ellen healdan|heald , 
 and ic unriht weg ealle|eall|eal feogean|feogan . 
 wundorlic wesan|seon|is þin gewitnes , wealdend dryhten ; 
 forðam heo min|ic sawel smeað and seceð georne|geornan|georn . 
 word me|ic þinne|þin wise|wis onleohteð , 
 beorhtnes blæcern , and þu beald sellan 
 andgit eall|eal eorðbuendum . 
 muð ic ontynan min wid , 
 þæt|se me|ic min|ic oroð ut afæmde , 
 þær ic þin bebod efnan mid willan|willa . 
 beseon þu on|an me|ic , and me|ic siððan hraðe 
 mære|mæran gemiltsian , swa þu manig dydan|don , 
 þu|þe|se naman|nama þinne|þin nyde lufedon . 
 gerec þu me|ic swilce , þæt|se ic on|an riht wegan|weg 
 æfter þinne|þin sprecan sped gangan|gang , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan min|ic ænig unriht ahwær wealdan|weald . 
 ahrede me|ic hearmcwidum hean mannian|mann , 
 þæt|se ic þin bebod beald healdan|heald . 
 don þin ansyn esne þin 
 sunnan|leoht and leof ; læran me|ic siððan , 
 hu ic þin soþfæst word sellan gehealdan . 
 eage min geseon , hu yða gelaac , 
 wid gangan|gang wæterian|wæter , wundor gangeð ; 
 swa ðam|se ilcum byð , þu|þe|se ær nellað 
 þinne|þin æ bebod ellen healdan|heald . 
 drihten wesan|seon|is soþfæst ; synd hit|his|he dom eacan|eac 
 reðe mid ræde|rædan|ræd rihte|rihtan|riht gecyðde . 
 hwæt#2 , þu soþfæst weorc simble hettan|hatan 
 on|an þinne|þin gewitnes wel gehealdan ; 
 eall|eal forgietan , þu|þa|se me|ic gram wesan|seon|beon , 
 word þinne|þin and me|ic wa dydan . 
 me|ic heard ehtnes hus þin 
 on|an bearm me|ic gebrohte oft , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þin word noldan wel gehealdan , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic feond ær fæstan|fæst wesan|seon|beon . 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan sprecan innan fyren , 
 self swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe hatan|hat , and simble þe|þa|ða|se 
 þu|þin esne heran|her ealle|eall|eal lufade . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon on|an geoguþ , gram me|ic forhogedon ; 
 næs|nesan ic ofergittol æfre hwæðere , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin soð weorc simble healdan . 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin soðfæstnes simble , drihten , 
 seon|seo|se soþfæst , and seon|seo|se simble bið 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to feorh ; 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin swilce æðelnes and æ soþfæst . 
 me|ic costunga cnysdan geneahhe , 
 and nearonessa naman|nama gelome|gelom ; 
 acan|ac ic þin bebod efnan and læstan|læst , 
 eacan|eac on|an minum|min mod hi|heo metegade georne|geornan|georn . 
 ys me|ic þu|þin gewitnes weorðast and rihtast , 
 and þe|þa|ða|se me|ic on|an ece andgyt habban ; 
 syl|sellan me|ic þe|þa|ða|se toh|to soð , and ic siððan lifian . 
 ic mid ealle|eall|eal onginnan inngehygde 
 heorte minre|min hige toh|to drihten 
 cearu cleopian ; he me|ic cynlice 
 hraðe gehyrdan|gehyran , hyldo cuðe , 
 þæt|se ic hit|his|he soðfæstnesse sœ̄сan|seсan|secan geneahhe . 
 ic cleopian toh|to þu|þe|ðe ; don me|ic cuðlice 
 hal , heahcyning , heofon wealdend , 
 hælend|hælan crist ; ic þæt|se hicge nu , 
 þæt|se ic þin bebod bliðe gehealdan . 
 and ic þu|þe|ðe on|an ripe|ripan forecuman , and hraðe swilce 
 cearu cleopian ; þu me|ic cynlice 
 wel onfencge , witan gearu , 
 þæt|se ic on|an þin word wel getruwade . 
 þu|þe|se eage min eacan|eac forecoman ; 
 on|an ærmergen ic ellen onginnan 
 þin sprecan spyrian georne|geornan|georn . 
 gehyran min stefn , halig drihten , 
 æfter þin þære|se myclan mildheortness|mildheortnes , 
 and æfter þin dom don me|ic hal . 
 me|ic syndon eahtend ungemete neah aa 
 and þe|þa|ða|se synful ; syndan ealle|eall|eal hi|heo 
 fram æ þinne|þin unneah witan|gewitan . 
 wesan me|ic swiðe|swiðan neah , wuldor drihten ; 
 synt ealle|eall|eal þin weg wise|wis and cuðe . 
 ic gewitnes wise|wis þin 
 ongitan|ongietan gleawlice , þæt|se þu gear hi|heo 
 on|an ecnes ær staþelodest . 
 acan|ac min|ic eaðmedu geseon eall|eal ful georne|geornan|georn , 
 generian|gener niode , nu me|ic ned beliсgan|belicgan ; 
 forðam ic willan æ þin ellen healdan|heald . 
 deman min don|dom and me|ic deore|deor alysan ; 
 for|faran þinne|þin sprecan , don me|ic spedlice 
 and cuðlice cwic nu þe|þa|ða|se . 
 wærun fyrenfulle feor fæle hælu ; 
 forðam hi|heo þin soðfæstnesse secean noldan . 
 miltsian|milts synt þin , mihtig drihten ; 
 æfter þin dom don me|ic cwic . 
 ic manig|manian geseon , þu|þe|se min|ic ehtan ; 
 nyllan|nillan ic cwic æfre swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hwæðere 
 þin gewitnes wræste forlætan . 
 ic manig|manian geseon mann þu|þa|se þu|þe|se noldan 
 hira|hi|heore friðowære fæstan|fæst healdan|heald , 
 and ic þindan wiþ|wið þan|se þu|þe|se hi|heo tela noldan 
 þinne|þin sprecan spedan|sped gehealdan . 
 swilce ic self geseon , þæt|se ic þu|þin soð bebod 
 lust lufian , libban|leof drihten ; 
 on|an þinne|þin mildheortness|mildheortnes me|ic sculan acwician . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is weorðlic fruma word þinne|þin , 
 þæt|se þær byð soð simble metan , 
 and on|an ecnes awa toh|to feorh 
 ealle|eall|eal þin dom synt dæd geseðde . 
 min|ic earwunga ehtan onginnan 
 ealdurmanna gehwylc ungemete swiðe|swiðan ; 
 wearð me|ic heorte forht , þær ic þu|þin halig word 
 on|an þin egesa ærest|ær æðele tredde . 
 ic blissian beald mod 
 ofer þin sprecan spedan|sped þu|þa|se myclan , 
 swa se bið bliðe , se þu|þe|se beorn reofan|reaf 
 manig|manian meteð , þær hit mann losað . 
 and ic unriht gehwylc ellen feogean|feogan 
 and onhyscte æghwær georne|geornan|georn ; 
 willan ic æ þin ellen lufian . 
 swa ic þu|þe|se seofon siþ simble willan 
 leof lustlice lofsang cweðan 
 dæg|dah|dagian|dag æghwylce , forðam ic þin dom witan 
 on|an soð fæstan|fæst smicer gefyllan . 
 þæm|þam|se bið sib micel þu|þe|se him|hi|he þenceð , 
 þæt|se hi|heo naman|nama þinne|þin neod lufian ; 
 nesan|neh|ne bið him|hi|he æswic on|an þon|se æfre toh|to feorh . 
 ic þinne|þin hælu bidan , halig drihten , 
 and þin bebod beald lufian . 
 hafað sawel min|ic soð healdan|gehealdan 
 þinne|þin gewitnes word æghwylc , 
 and ic þu|þa|se lust lufade swiðe|swiðan . 
 healdan ic þin bebod hold mod 
 and þin gewitnes word trymman ; 
 forðam ealle|eall|eal min weg wise|wis syndan 
 on|an þinne|þin gesiht soð , drihten . 
 nu genealæceð neod minum|min 
 gebed beald , þæt|se ic biddan nu 
 on|an þinne|þin gesiht simble , drihten ; 
 æfter þinne|þin sprecan syl|sellan me|ic spedlice , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic generian niða gehwilc . 
 ingangan|ingang min|ic ben , ece drihten , 
 on|an þinne|þin gesiht simble æt|etan þearf ; 
 æfter þinne|þin sprecan don spedlice , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu me|ic generian niða gehwilc . 
 nu min weler þu|þe|ðe word belcettað 
 ymnas ellen , gif þu me|ic ærest|ær wylt 
 þin soðfæstnesse self læran . 
 hwæt#2 , tunge min|ic tela foreseсgan|foresecgan , 
 hu þinne|þin sprecan spedan|sped eodan ; 
 wærun eall|eal þu|þin bebod æghwær rihtwis . 
 syn me|ic þin hand on|an hælu nu , 
 and þæt|se domlice gedon|gedo|don weorðe ; 
 forðam ic þin bebod geceosan beald æt|etan þearf . 
 ic þinne|þin hælu heran|her wilnade , 
 drihten ælmihtig ; don me|ic simble , 
 þæt|se ic æ þin ellen metige . 
 leofað sawel min|ic and þu|þe|se lust hereð , 
 and me|ic þin dom dæd fultumiað . 
 ic gedwelede swa þæt|se dysig sceop , 
 se forweorðan willan huru ; 
 la , sec þinne|þin esne ellen , drihten ; 
 forðam ic þinne|þin bebod nesan|neh|ne forgitan|forgietan beorht æfre . ## ic me|ic toh|to drihten deore|deor cleopian , 
 þonne|se me|ic costunga cnysdon geneahhe , 
 and he me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran hold mod . 
 alysan min sawol|sawel , lifes|lif drihten , 
 of þæm|þam|se weler þu|þe|se wom|woh cweðan , 
 and from|fram þære|se tunge þu|þe|se teosu wylle . 
 hwæt#2 bið þu|þe|se eall|eal sellan oþþe|oððe eced swa 
 from|fram þære|se inwitfullan yfel tunge gewinnan|geblandan 
 strele beoð scearpe , strang and mihtig , 
 siððan of gledon wesað gearu ahyrdan . 
 wa me|ic þære|se wyrdan|wyrd , þæt|se min|ic wynn alæg 
 and min|ic bigengea gewitan bryce on|an feorweg ; 
 sculan ic eard niman , swa me|ic eðe nesan , 
 mid cedaringum ; nesan min|ic cyðan þær , 
 þu|þe|se min sawol|sawel swiðe|swiðan began . 
 mid þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hi|heo sibb|sib swyþost feodan , 
 ic sibb|sib mid him|hi|he soð habban ; 
 þonne|se ic him|hi|he spedlice toh|to sprecan and hi|heo læran , 
 þonne me|ic earwunga ealle|eall|eal onfuhtan . ## hof|hebban ic min eage toh|to þæm|þam|se hean|heah beorgan|beorg , 
 þær ic fultuman|fultum findan fæle æt|etan þearf . 
 wesan|seon|is min|ic fultuman|fultum eacan|eac fæger æt|etan drihten , 
 se þu|þe|ðe heofon wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , hruse swilce . 
 nesan|neh|ne syll he þinne|þin fot on|an feond geweald , 
 nesan|neh|ne hycge toh|to slæpan|slæp se þu|þe|ðe healdeð þu|þe|se . 
 efne|efnan|efen se on|an hygde huru nesan|neh|ne slæpeð 
 nesan|neh|ne swefeð swiðe , se þu|þe|se sculan healdan|heald nu 
 israela folc utan wiþ|wið feond . 
 gehealdan þu|þe|se halig drihten , 
 and þu|þin mundbora mihtig weorðe 
 ofer þu|þa|se swiðran hand simble æt|etan þearf . 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|se sunne|sinnan on|an dæge|dæg sol nesan|neh|ne gebærne 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|se mona on|an niht|neaht min|ic nesan|neh|ne geweorðe , 
 acan|ac þu|þe|se gehealdan halig drihten 
 wyð yfel gehwa æghwær georne|geornan|georn 
 and þin sawol|sawel swilce gehealdan . 
 utgang þinne|þin and ingangan|ingang ece drihten , 
 sawol|sawlian|sawel soðcynincg , simble gehealdan 
 of þisson forþ|forð awa toh|to weorold . ## ic on|an ðyssum wesan|seon|eoh eall|eal bliðe , 
 þæt|se me|ic cuðlice toh|to acweþan syndon , 
 and on|an god hus gangan|gang siððan . 
 wesan|seon|beon fæststealle fotas min 
 on|an þin cafertunum , þær ure|ur cyðð wesan|seon|beon , 
 on|an hierusalem gear ærest|ær . 
 hierusalem , gear þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 swa swa cymlic ceaster getimbran , 
 þær syndon dæl on|an sylfre hire|heo . 
 þær cneoris cennan wesan|seon|beon 
 cynn æfter cynn ; cuðan þu|þa|se drihten 
 and on|an þære|se gewitnes wær israelas , 
 þu|þe|se hit|his|he naman|nama neod sculan 
 him|hi|he andetnes æghwær habban . 
 oft hi|heo þær on|an seldon sittan æt|etan dom ; 
 þu wesan|seon þonne dema , dauides hus , 
 þæt|se on|an heofenum siteþ heah gestaðelod . 
 biddað ge|eowan|eow beald beorhtere sibb|sib , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe on|an hierusalem god syndan ; 
 and geniht agun , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se neod þu|þe|se 
 on|an hira|hi|heore lufun lust healdað . 
 seon þu|þe|se on|an þin mægene sib micel and fyrmest|forma , 
 and on|an þin torr wese|wesan tid genihtsum . 
 for|faran min broðor ic biddan nu , 
 and min þu|þa|se neahstan nemnan swilce , 
 þæt|se we sibb|sib on|an þu|þe|ðe simble habbon . 
 and ic for|faran min god hus georne|geornan|georn þingian , 
 and toh|to minum|min drihten deore|deor sec , 
 þæt|se ic god æt|etan him|hi|he begitan motan|mot . ## toh|to þu|þe|se ic min eage hof|hebban , ece drihten , 
 þu þu|þe|se heofonhamas healdest and wealdest . 
 efne|efnan|efen min eage synt eall|eal gelician 
 þonne|se esne bið , þonne|se ondrysnum 
 hit|his|he hlaford hereð and cwemeð . 
 and swa eage gað earm þeowenan , 
 þonne|se heo on|an hire|heo hlæfdigean hand locað , 
 swa we|us synt eage toh|to þu|þe|ðe , ece drihten , 
 ure|ur þæm|þam|se god god ; geare|gear lociað , 
 oþþæt we|us miltsian miht|meaht wealdend . 
 miltsian|milts we|us nu þe|þa|ða|se , mihtig drihten , 
 miltsian|milts we|us swilce , forðam we manig synt 
 forhogednessum heard gefyllan . 
 and we manig synd mannian|mann word 
 ure|ur sawel swiðe|swiðan gefyllan|fyllan 
 mid edwite , oft and geneahhe , 
 and we|us oferhydige forseoð oft and gelome|gelom . ## nymþe we|us on|an wese|wesan ece drihten , 
 cweþað israhelas ealle|eall|eal nu þe|þa|ða|se , 
 nymþe we|us eardian on|an awa drihten , 
 þonne|se we|us manfull mann onginnað ; 
 wenan|wen wesan|seon|is , þæt|se hi|heo we|us lifian lungre wyllen 
 sniome forsweolgan , gif hi|heo swa magan . 
 þonne|se we|us se mannian|mann mod yrsade , 
 and we|us wiðerwearde wesan|seon|beon geneahhe ; 
 wenan|wen wesan|seon|is , þæt|se hi|heo we|us woldan wæter|wæt gelice 
 sona gesupan , gif hit swa willan . 
 oft ure|ur sawel swyþ|swyðe|swiðe frecne|frecen|frec 
 hlimme|hlimman gedegde hlud wæter ; 
 wennan|wenan|wen ic forðam , þæt|se heo wel mæge|mæg|magan 
 þæt|se swyðre mægen|magan , sawel usser , 
 wæter wenan|wena se wel gedegean . 
 drihten seon gebletsad , þu|þe|se þæt|se nesan|neh|ne dydan|don æfre , 
 þæt|se we|us on|an heard hæftnyd sellan 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se we|us mid toðum toteon woldan . 
 wærun ure|ur sawol|sawlian|sawel samod anlice 
 niþ generian , swa swa neodspearuwa 
 of gram hunta gryne losian . 
 grin bið on|an sæd gram torænded , 
 and we synd alysan lifes|lif weorþ ; 
 we we|us naman|nama drihten neod habbað 
 on|an fultuman|fultum fæst and strang , 
 se þu|þe|se heofon wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , hruse swilce . ## þu|þa|se þu|þe|se on|an drihten hira|hi|heore dæd getreowað , 
 hi|heo beoð on|an sionbeorge swyþ|swyðe|swiðe gelice ; 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan he on|an ealdor|eald ænig onhreran 
 þu|þe|se eardfæst byð on|an hierusalem . 
 hi|heo synd mundbeorgas micel ymbutan ; 
 haldeð hira|hi|heore ymbhwyrft ece drihten 
 of ðisson nu awa toh|to weorold . 
 næfre forlæteð lifes|lif drihten 
 firenfull tan|ta furðor gangan , 
 þonne|se he soðfæstra settan wylle . 
 nesan|neh|ne he soþfæst swilce læteð , 
 þæt|se hi|heo toh|to unriht ahwær willan 
 hand ræcean , acan|ac he him|hi|he hræþ gyldeð ; 
 don þu , drihten , wel þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se gedefe heran|her 
 hira|hi heorte rihtan|riht healdað mid god . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe gearu beoð toh|to grama|gram bend , 
 eft hi|heo gelædeð ece drihten 
 mid þæm|se þu|þe|se unriht æghwær wyrceað ; 
 sibb seon israhelum simble ofer ealle|eall|eal . ## þonne|se drihten wyle gedon|gedo|don æfter , 
 þæt|se he of sione swære ahweorfan 
 hæftned hefig , siððan we hraðe weorðað 
 afrefrede fæger ealle|eall|eal . 
 sona beoð gefyllan mid gefea siððan 
 muðas ure|ur , and we micel sprecað , 
 beoð ure|ur tunge tela wynsum . 
 þonne|se hi|heo geond þeon|þeodan|þeod cweðað þriste ; 
 æghwær hi|heo gemiclade mihtig drihten , 
 þu|þa|se he him|hi|he wundur mid wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan seldlic ; 
 gemicla þu|þe|ðe swilce , mihtig drihten , 
 þæt|se þu wundur mid we|us wyrce mære|mæran , 
 and we beald on|an þæm|þam|se bliðe weorðan . 
 gehweorfan ure|ur hæftned , halig drihten , 
 swa suðhealde swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe hlimme|hlimman . 
 þu|þa|se heran|her on|an tornlicum tear sawað , 
 hi|heo eft fæger gefea sniðað ; 
 gangan|gan and feran georne|geornan|georn wepan 
 and hira|hi|heore sylfra sæd sniðað æfter . 
 cumað þonne|se mid cumendum cuðe mid bliss|blis 
 and on|an hira|hi|heore sceafas berað , swa hi|heo gesamnedon . ## nymþe hus timbrian halig drihten , 
 on|an idel gylp oðer winnað 
 þu|þe|se se hus hrof staðeliað . 
 nymðe gehealdan eacan|eac halig drihten 
 ceaster mid cynn , nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan hi|heo cynlice 
 wæccende weard gehealdan . 
 forhwan ge mid idelnes ealle|eall|eal arisan , 
 ærðon sunnan|leoht cuman|ancuman leode|leoda|leod bearn gewinnan|geblandan 
 arisan nu ricene , and hraðe sittað , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe sar hlaf swiðe|swiðan etan . 
 þonne|se he slæpan syleð swiðe|swiðan leof ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is yrfe eacan|eac ecean drihten 
 and heran birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , þu|þa|se heran|her mann beoð 
 of innaðe ærest|ær cennan . 
 swa seon|seo|se stræle byð strang and mihtig 
 hror on|an hand heard ascyrped , 
 swa lyðra birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn lungre gewitað . 
 þæt|se bið eadig wer , se þu|þe|ðe wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þenceð , 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he lust on|an se leof gefyllan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne bið he on|an ealdor|eald eall|eal æfre gescended , 
 þonne|se he on|an gaton greteð hit|his|he gram feond . ## eadig syndon ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se him|hi|he eсe god 
 drihten ondrædað , and hit|his|he gedefe wegan|weg 
 on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi lifes|lif tidan|tid lust gangað . 
 þonne|se þu þin gewinn wæstm byrgan , 
 etest oretes , and þu eadig libban , 
 and þu|þe|se wel weorðeð on|an wynburgum . 
 beoð þin wif wela gelice , 
 swa on|an wingeard weaxan berigean , 
 and on|an þin hus hwommum genihtsum . 
 synd þin birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn swilce samed anlicast , 
 swa elebeam æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele weaxan , 
 ymb þinne|þin beodan|beod utan blæd standan . 
 efne|efnan|efen swa bið gebletsad beorn æghwylc 
 mann on|an molde þu|þe|se him|hi|he metod ege 
 on|an hit|his|he dæd drihten forhtað . 
 þu|þe|se of sionbeorge swilce drihten 
 beald bletsian , and þu brucan eacan|eac 
 on|an hierusalem god gehwilc 
 ealle|eall|eal lange|lang dæg|dah|dag lifes|lif þin . 
 and þu þinne|þin bearn birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn sceawian , 
 geseon samed gangan sibb ofer israhel . ## oft me|ic fuht toh|to fynd on|an geoguþ , 
 cweðan israhelas nu eacan|eac þæt|se self ; 
 oft me|ic fuht toh|to fynd on|an geoguþ , 
 nesan|neh|ne mihton hi|heo awiht æt|etan me|ic æfre gewyrcean . 
 ofer minum|min bæc biter onginnan 
 þu|þa|se firenfull facen timbrian , 
 and hira|hi|heore unriht eft gelengdon . 
 drihten wesan|seon|is soþfæst , and gedeð sniome , 
 þæt|se he firenfullra fæcne geðancas 
 wis toweorpeð ; weorðað gescende 
 and hira|hi scamiað swiðe eall|eal , 
 þu|þa|se toh|to sione hettan|hatan swiðe habban . 
 wesan hi|heo hige heran|her gelician 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se on|an hus þæc heah aweaxeð , 
 þæt|se bið forwisnad wrað sona , 
 ær hit afohten folde losian . 
 of þæm|þam|se he nesan|neh|ne gefylleð folm æfre , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he hit mawan micel ellen ; 
 nesan|neh|ne mid hit|his|he sceafe nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan sceotan|sceat afyllan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he samnian swiðe|swiðan georne|geornan|georn . 
 and þæt|se nesan|neh|ne cweðan , þu|þa|se hit|his|he cwide weoldan 
 on|an ofergeate æghwær habban : 
 " we|us gebletsige beald drihten 
 and ofer ge|eowan|eow wese|wesan eacan|eac hit|his|he bletsung ; 
 we ge|eowan|eow neodlice on|an naman|nama drihten 
 swilce bletsiað bliðe mod . " ## ic of grund toh|to þu|þe|se geomur cleopian ; 
 drihten , drihten , don þu nu þe|þa|ða|se , 
 þæt|se þu min gebed ben gehyran . 
 wese|wesan þin eare eacan|eac gehyran 
 and beheldende mid hige swilce 
 on|an eall|eal gebedd esnes þin . 
 gif þu ure|ur unriht willan eall|eal behealdan , 
 drihten , drihten , hwæt|hwa gedeð æfre , 
 þæt|se he þæt|se geefne eall|eal mid rihte|rihtan|riht gewinnan|geblandan 
 ys seon|seo|se mildheortnes mid þu|þe|se , miht|meaht wealdend , 
 and ic for|faran þin æ , ece drihten , 
 þes oþer|oðer eall|eal eaðe aræfnige . 
 hwæt#2 , þæt|se sawel min|ic simble aræfnede , 
 þæt|se ic on|an þin word me|ic wel getreowde ; 
 forðam min|ic sawel on|an þu|þe|se simble getreoweð . 
 fram þære|se mære|mæran mergentide 
 oðþæt æfen cuman|ancuman yld bearn , 
 israhelas on|an drihten wifcynn|hosp|flet|a getreowen . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is mildheortness|mildheortnes miht on|an drihten 
 and he alyseð lust ealle|eall|eal , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe hyht on|an he habbað fæstan|fæst . 
 he israhelas ealle|eall|eal alyseð 
 of unriht æghwær simble . ## nesan min|ic heorte wiþ|wið þu|þe|se ahebban , drihten , 
 nesan|neh|ne min eage wiþ|wið þu|þe|se on|an oferhygde . 
 nesan|neh|ne ic on|an mægene micel gangan|gang 
 nesan|neh|ne wundur ofer me|ic wuniað ænig . 
 acan|ac ic mid eaðmedum eall|eal geþafige ; 
 wesan|seon|is min|ic sawel on|an se swyþ|swyðe|swiðe gefeon . 
 swa munan|mann|man æt|etan modor bið micel fedan , 
 swa þu minre|min sawol|sawel simble gyldest . 
 israhelas on|an drihten wifcynn|hosp|flet|a getreowigen 
 of ðyssum nu awa toh|to weorold . ## gemunan þu , drihten , mære dauid 
 and ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he mannþwærnesse micel and goode . 
 swa ic æt|etan frymþ geswerian ferhðe wiþ|wið drihten 
 and gehatan|gehat hettan|gehatan , he gehealdan tela 
 wiþ|wið iacobes god se mære|mæran . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic on|an min hus hyld gegangan|gegang 
 oþþe|oððe selegesceot þonne swæs wese|wesan 
 oððe on|an min|ic restbedd ricene gestigan , 
 gif ic minum|min eage unnan slæpes , 
 oþþe|oððe minum|min breawum beodan|beod|bebeodan hnappunga , 
 oþþe|oððe ic on|an þunwange þriste gereste , 
 oþþæt ic gemetan|gemet mære|mæran stow 
 drihten gecorene , dyre selegesceot 
 iacobes god georne|geornan|georn gecweme . 
 efne|efnan|efen we þes eall|eal on|an eufraten 
 sæcgean gehyrdan|gehyran , siððan gemittan 
 forwel manegu on|an wudufeldum . 
 we on|an hit|his|he selegesceot swilce gangað , 
 and þære|se stow stede ariað 
 þær hit|his|he fotas ær fæstan|fæst gestodan . 
 arisan on|an þinne|þin restan recen , drihten ; 
 þu earce wesan|seon eallhaligra . 
 synd þin sacerd on|an soðfæstnesse 
 god gegierwan , and gleaw nu 
 þin þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg heran|her blissiað . 
 for|faran þin agen esne swilce , 
 deore|deor dauide , þu nesan|neh|ne don æfre , 
 þæt|se þu andwlitan|andwlita ut oncyrre 
 þin se halig|halga|haleg heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 se deop að drihten aswor 
 and se mid soð swilce getrymede , 
 þæt|se he he for|faran hol ær nesan|neh|ne aswore , 
 hettan|gehatan dauide , swa he him|hi|he dydan|don siððan , 
 þæt|se he weorðlicne wæstm gesette|gesettan 
 þu|þe|se of hit|his|he innaðe agen cuman , 
 ofer þu|þin heahsetl ; gif nu healdað well|wel 
 þin sylfes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn soð treowe|treow 
 and þu|þa|se gewitnes , þu|þe|se ic hi|heo|heg wel læran|lesan , 
 þonne|se hira|hi sunu swilce motan 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þes weorold wynn brucan 
 and on|an þin setl sittan geneahhe . 
 forðam him|hi|he sione geceosan self drihten , 
 and him|hi|he toh|to eard geceosan ærest|ær æt|etan frymþ . 
 þes wesan|seon|is min|ic restan , þu|þe|se ic recen nu
