 on|an weorold weorold wunian þence , 
 þær ic eard niman , forðam ic hi|heo ær geceosan . 
 hit|his|he wuduan ic word bletsian 
 and gesegnade , syll geneahhe 
 hira|hi|heore hungrium hlaf toh|to fyllu|fyllan . 
 ec hit|his|he sacerd swilce mid hælu 
 georne|geornan|georn gegyrwan , and god eacan|eac 
 hit|his|he þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg heran|her habbað bliss|blis . 
 þær ic dauides horn deoren|deore bringan , 
 forþ|forð gelædan , fæger|fæge gearuwe 
 beornan blacern , bere|beran|ber for|faran minum|min 
 criste gecorenum , þu|þe|se ic he cuþ witan . 
 ic hit|his|he feond eacan|eac facn|facen gegyrwan 
 mid sceamu|scamu swiðust ; ofer he scir|defena cymeð 
 min segnunga soþfæst blostmian|blostma|blostm . ## efne|efnan|efen hu glædlic bið and god swilce , 
 se broður|broðor on|an on|an begen hicgen , 
 þær hi|heo|heg an sculan eard weardian . 
 swa unguentum mæg|magan æðele wyrtcynn 
 heafod healdan|heald hror stence , 
 mid þywan|þy|þe|se aaron hit|his|he beard oftast smyrede . 
 seon|seo|se niðer astigan on|an hit|his|he reafæs fnæd 
 swa æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele deaw on|an hermone , 
 se ofer sionbeorge sneome astigeð . 
 forðam heran|her bebeodan halig drihten 
 lifes|lif bletsunga lange|lang toh|to feorh 
 of þisson nu awa toh|to weorold . ## efne|efnan|efen bletsian nu bliðe drihten 
 ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he agen onbyhtscealcas . 
 ge þu|þe|se on|an god hus gearu standað , 
 and on|an cafertunum cristes hus 
 ure|ur se halig|halga|haleg god held begangað . 
 hebbað neodlice nihtian|niht|neaht gehwylcere 
 eowre hand on|an halig lof 
 and bletsiað bald drihten . 
 ge bletsian bliðe drihten 
 of sionbeorge simble æt|etan þearf , 
 se þu|þe|se heofon wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , hruse swilce . ## heriað naman|nama drihtenes , neod swilce 
 herigen he hit|his|he scealcas swiðe|swiðan ealle|eall|eal . 
 ge þu|þe|se on|an god hus gleaw standað 
 and on|an cafertunum cristes hus 
 se god god gearu syndan , 
 lofiað ge drihten , forðam he lungre wesan|seon|is 
 fæstræd and fremsum firas æghwam ; 
 weorðiað hit|his|he naman|nama , forðam he weorþ wesan|seon|is . 
 forðam him|hi|he god geceosan iacob drihten 
 and on|an agen æht israeles cynn . 
 ic þæt|se gearu ongitan|ongietan , þæt|se wesan|seon|is god and micel 
 drihten ure|ur ; forðam him|hi|he don|dom standeð 
 ofer ealle|eall|eal god eorðbuendra . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se willan , wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan drihten 
 on|an heofonrice and heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe , 
 on|an sidu|side|sid sæ swilce on|an eall|eal , 
 þær he dyrne witan deorc grund . 
 and he fram þes eorþ|eorðe ende lædeð 
 wolcen wræclicu , windan|wind and liget , 
 and þu|þa|se toh|to regn recen wyrceð , 
 þu|þe|se forþ|forð lædeð fæger wind 
 of hit|his|he goldhord god manig ; 
 se ægipta slean æðele frumbearn 
 æghwylc eall|eal oþ|oð þu|þa|se nyten . 
 he sigetacen sendan manig 
 forebeacn fæle|feolan folc ægipta , 
 and þu|þa|se pharaones folc gecyðde 
 and hit|his|he scealcum samed ætgædere . 
 se slean þeon|þeodan|þeod folc þearle manig|manian , 
 and eacan|eac acwellan cyning strang . 
 wesan|seon|beon seon|seo efne|efnan|efen sum|su þær|se kynincga , 
 and og kyning , se þu|þe|se æror wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an basane breme and mære|mæran . 
 sellan hira|hi|heore eardland eall|eal israhelum 
 and hira|hi|heore yrfe eacan|eac hit|his|he folc . 
 ys þu|þin nama , drihten , nemnan ece , 
 and þu|þin gemynd , mihtig drihten , 
 on|an eall|eal weorold weorold wynn standeð . 
 forðam hit|his|he folc demeð fæger drihten , 
 and he bið on|an hit|his|he esnum agen frefriend . 
 beoð deofolgyld dysig þeod 
 gold and seolfur , þu|þe|se heran|her geotað mann , 
 and mid hira|hi|heore folm fæger wyrceað . 
 þu|þa|se muð habbað , and nesan|neh|ne meldiað wiht , 
 fæger eage , nesan|neh|ne magan feor geseon . 
 eare habbað , nesan|neh|ne hi|heo awiht magan 
 hold gehyran , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he hleoðrige , 
 and nosu habbað , nawiht gestincað . 
 hand hi|heo habbað , nesan|neh|ne hi|heo hwæðere magan 
 gegrapian god awiht ; 
 habbað fot|fedan swilce , nesan|neh|ne magan feala gangan . 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo on|an hracan awiht hlud nesan|neh|ne cleopiað , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he gast warað goma on|an muðe . 
 synt anlice þæm|se þu|þe|se hi|heo ær worhtan , 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe on|an hi|heo æfre getreowað . 
 hus israela hold drihten 
 bletsian beald , biddan swilce 
 þæt|se aarones hus eсe drihten 
 bliðe bletsian ; beorn ealle|eall|eal , 
 þu|þa|se on|an lifes|lif hus leof eardiað , 
 bletsian drihten bliðe mod . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he ondrædan drihten egsan , 
 bletsian drihten beorn ealle|eall|eal ; 
 se drihten wesan|seon|is deore|deor gebletsad 
 of sion sniome , þu|þe|se soþfæst ær 
 on|an hierusalem god eardian . 
 ic andettan ecum drihten , 
 forðam he god wesan|seon|is , and ic ful gearu witan , 
 þæt|se he toh|to weorold byð wis and mildheort . ## eacan|eac ic andettan þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ece wesan|seon|is 
 eall|eal god god , forðam ic he god witan . 
 andettan ic swilce þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se eall|eal wesan|seon|is 
 drihten drihten dæd spedigast , 
 forðam he god wesan|seon|is , and ic gearu witan , 
 þæt|se hit|his|he mildheortnes wesan|seon|is micel toh|to weorold . 
 he wundur dydan|don weorþlic ana|an . 
 se heofon wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , hæleða andgit . 
 he eorþ|eorðe æfter wæter ærest|ær settan . 
 he leohtfæt leode|leoda|leod ana|an 
 micel gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan mannian|mann bearn , 
 settan on|an miht dæg mære|mæran sunne|sunnan|sunna , 
 on|an miht niht|neaht spiht|monan|mona and steorra . 
 he ægyptas slean and eall|eal hira|hi|heore frumbearn , 
 and he israhelas ealle|eall|eal oðlædde 
 of ægyptum ealle|eall|eal gesund , 
 on|an mihtig mære|mæran hand 
 and on|an eallmihte earm swilce . 
 he read sæ recen todælan , 
 lædan israhelas ealle|eall|eal þurh midd . 
 þær pharaon gefeallan , and hit|his|he fæge|fægan werud 
 on|an þæm|þam|se reada|read sæ recen forwurdan . 
 he gewealdendlice þurh westen|westan eft 
 hit|his|he þæt|se leof folc lædan swilce . 
 he of stanclife stearc burna 
 leode|leoda|leod lædan on|an leof þanc . 
 swilce he acwellan cyning mycle . 
 and he eacan|eac ofslean æðele cyning , 
 wer wræclice , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se weoruld heoldan . 
 þær seon|seo cyning swylt dreorig forniman , 
 þu|þe|se amorrea anweald habban , 
 and og swilce , þu|þe|se æror wesan|seon|beon 
 swyþ|swyðe|swiðe breme cyning on|an basane . 
 sellan hira|hi|heore eorþe|eorþ on|an yrfeland , 
 and þæt|se yrfe on|an israele , 
 þu|þe|se hit|his|he esnas agen wesan|seon|beon . 
 forðam ure|ur eaðmedu ece drihten 
 gemyndgade , and we|us micel sellan . 
 and he we|us aferede feond of hand , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe wrað wesan|seon|beon ealle|eall|eal . 
 he eacan|eac afedeð flæscea æghwylc . 
 andetað nu ealle|eall|eal þæm|þam|se ecean god , 
 þu|þe|se on|an heofon wesan|seon|is heah eardiend|eardian . 
 and ge eall|eal god god gear andettað , 
 forðam hit|his|he mildheortnes wesan|seon|is micel toh|to weorold . ## ofer babilone brad stream , 
 þær we sittað and sar wepan , 
 þonne|se we sion gemunan swiðe|swiðan georne|geornan|georn . 
 on|an salig we sarig swiðe|swiðan gelome|gelom 
 ure|ur organan up ahengan . 
 forðam we|us þær frinan fæcne word , 
 woh meldedan , þe|þa|ða|se we|us on|an wegan|weg læddan : 
 " singað we|us ymnum ealdor|eald sang 
 þu|þe|se ge on|an sione sungan geneahhige . " 
 hu magan we singan sang drihten 
 on|an þære|se folde þu|þe|se we|us fremde wesan|seon|is gewinnan|geblandan 
 gif ic þu|þin , hierusalem , forgyten habban , 
 forgyte min|ic seon|seo|se swyðre simble æt|etan þearf ; 
 ætfeole min|ic tunge fæstan|fæst goma , 
 gif ic ofergittol þu|þin æfre weorðe , 
 gif ic nesan|neh|ne forsettan þu|þe|se simble æt|etan frymþ ; 
 acan|ac ic on|an hierusalem georne|geornan|georn blissian . 
 gemunan þu , drihten , manig bearn , 
 þu|þe|se on|an edom synt eal lifian , 
 þonne|se þu hierusalem gegodie ; 
 þu|þa|se nu oft cweðað : " wutun hi|heo idel gedon|gedo|don , 
 oðþæt hi|heo hira|hi|heore eard geceosan . " 
 hwæt#2 , þu wesan|seon babilone biter ætfæsted 
 ænge and yfele|yfel , hire|heo earm dohter ; 
 eadig byð hwæðere se þu|þe|se eft gyldeð 
 þu|þa|se þu him|hi|he on|an ealdor|eald ær forgifan|forgiefan 
 and we|us eall|eal eacan|eac gesellan . 
 eadig byð se þu|þe|se nimeð and eacan|eac seteð 
 hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn on|an se æþele stan . ## ic þu|þe|se andettan , eсe drihten , 
 on|an minre|min gehygd heorte eall|eal ; 
 forðam þu ealle|eall|eal min word eare gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 þu|þa|se ic mid muðe and mid mod cweðan , 
 and on|an þinne|þin engel eall|eal gesiht 
 ic þu|þe|se singan swiðe|swiðan geneahhige . 
 eacan|eac ic þu|þin templ|tempel tid weorðige , 
 þæt|se halig hus , hold mod , 
 and þær þinne|þin naman|nama on|an neod secg . 
 ofer þin þu|þa|se micel mildheortness|mildheortnes 
 and soðfæstnesse samed ætgædere , 
 þu þinne|þin se halig|halga|haleg naman|nama neod gedon , 
 ofer we|us ealle|eall|eal æghwær micelne|micel . 
 swa hwilc dæg|dah|dagian|dag ic þu|þe|se deoren|deore cigan , 
 gehyran me|ic hwætlice , and me|ic hraðe gedon 
 micel min sawol|sawel on|an þin mægenes spedan|sped . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se andettan eorþ|eorðe kyning , 
 forðam þu|þe|se hi|heo gehyrdan|gehyran hlud rædan|reord 
 þin muðes þu|þa|se mære|mæran word ; 
 þu|þa|se on|an sang singan drihten . 
 forðam þu|þin wuldur wesan|seon|is wid geond eorþ|eorðe 
 micel and mære|mæran , ofer middaneard 
 wesan|seon þu healice ahebban , drihten ; 
 þu eadmodra eall|eal locian 
 on|an heofonhame heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic on|an midle manes gangan|gang , 
 þær me|ic costunga cnysdan geneahhe , 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þu me|ic werian wraþ feond 
 þu|þe|se me|ic woldan yrre|irre on|an acyðan ; 
 þu me|ic geræhtest recen mid hand 
 and me|ic þu|þin swyðre sneome hælan . 
 drihten for|faran me|ic dom gyldan , 
 wesan|seon|is hit|his|he mildheortnes micel on|an weorold ; 
 nesan|neh|ne forseon æfre , þæt|se þu self ær 
 mid þin hand heran|her gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . ## þu min|ic costadest cynn , drihten , 
 and me|ic ongietan gleaw mod ; 
 þu min|ic setl swilce oncneowe , 
 and min ærist æfter gecyðdest . 
 and min geðohtas eacan|eac þriste oncneowe , 
 feorran|feorr|feor ongietan for|faran min , 
 and min gang gearu atreddest 
 and ealle|eall|eal min weg wel foreseon , 
 forðam me|ic inwit næs|nesan ahwær on|an tunge . 
 efne|efnan|efen þu , drihten , eall|eal oncneowe 
 þu|þa|se ær , eacan|eac þu|þa|se nihsta ; 
 þu me|ic gehiwadest hand þinne|þin , 
 me|ic ofer heafod hold gesettan . 
 wundorlic wesan|seon|is weorþan|geweorþan þu|þin wisdom eall|eal , 
 se wesan|seon|is beutan me|ic eacan|eac gestrangod ; 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic him|hi|he on|an neod wifcynn|hosp|flet|a neah cuman|cuma . 
 hwider mæg|magan ic fram þin gast gangan ahwær , 
 oþþe|oððe þinne|þin andwlitan|andwlita befleon eorþ|eorðe dæl gewinnan|geblandan 
 gif ic on|an heofenas up heah astigan , 
 þu me|ic þær on|an efn andweard sittan ; 
 gif ic on|an hell|hel gedon hwyrft ænig , 
 þu me|ic æt|etan buan efne|efnan|efen rihte|rihtan|riht . 
 gif ic min fiðeru gefon , fleoge|fleogan ær sunnan|leoht , 
 oþþæt ic beutan wese|wesan eall|eal sæ , 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic þu|þin hand þider ofer holm begangan|begang 
 lædeð lust , and me|ic lungre eft 
 þu|þin seon|seo|se swiðre þær gehendeð . 
 ic on|an mod cweðan minum|min swilce : 
 " wenan|wen wesan|seon|is , þæt|se me|ic þystru|þystre|þeostru ðearle forgripan 
 and me|ic on|an niht|neaht neod onlihtan , 
 þæt|se ic minum|min bleo bregdan neahhige . " 
 nesan|neh|ne beoð þeostru deorc butan þinne|þin miht ; 
 þurh þu|þa|se onlihtan niht|neaht , þæt|se heo byð dæge|dæg gelic . 
 swa þragum gæð þeostru wiþ|wið sunnan|leoht , 
 forðam þu hi|heo settan swilce , drihten ; 
 cunnan min ædre ealle|eall|eal gearuwe , 
 onfon me|ic fæger , swa ic furðum wesan|seon|beon 
 of modur hrife minre|min acennan . 
 ic þu|þe|se andettan , ece drihten , 
 forðam þu mid egesa wesan|seon eall|eal gewuldrad , 
 and þin weorc wesan|seon|beon wræclice swyþ|swyðe|swiðe , 
 þu|þa|se min|ic saul oncnawan sona georne|geornan|georn . 
 nesan min|ic ban wiþ|wið þu|þe|se deop behydan , 
 þæt|se þu wislice wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan on|an digol , 
 þeah min|ic lichama lytel ðrage 
 on|an niðerdælum eorþ|eorðe wunian . 
 eage þin geseon þæt|se ic eall|eal wesan|seon|beon 
 unfrom on|an ferhþ ; eall|eal þæt|se forþ|forð heonan 
 on|an þin wisbocum awriten|awritan standeð . 
 dæg|dah|dag syndon trymman , swa hi|heo drihten gesceppan , 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ænig on|an þæm|þam|se awa lifigean ; 
 me|ic synd arwyrðe ealle|eall|eal swiðe|swiðan , 
 þu|þe|se þin frynd wærun fæstan|fæst , drihten , 
 wesan|seon|is hira|hi|heore ealdordom ungemete swiðe|swiðan 
 on|an cneoris cuð gestrangod . 
 gif ic hi|heo recen nu riman|rima onginnan , 
 hi|heo beoð ofer sandcorn sniome manig|manian ; 
 siððan ic arisan and recen nu git 
 mid þu|þe|se self wesan|seon|eoh , gif þu siððan wylt 
 þu|þa|se firenfull fyllan mid deaðe . 
 blodhreowe wer , ge bebugað me|ic , 
 þu|þe|se þæt|se on|an geþohtum þenceað cweðan : 
 " wutun þurh idel searu ealle|eall|eal tilia , 
 þæt|se we hira|hi|heore burh tobrecan motan . " 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se feodan þurh facen god , 
 ic hi|heo feogean|feogan nu fæstan|fæst mid niðe , 
 and ofer þin feond beon|beo facn|facen gebelgan|belgan . 
 swa ic hi|heo mid rihte|rihtan|riht recen feogean|feogan , 
 forðam hi|heo me|ic feond fæcne wurdan . 
 costian|cost min|ic , god , swa hit cyn wese|wesan , 
 and minre|min heorte gehygd heran|her gesceawa , 
 se fæle geþanc ; frinan me|ic siððan 
 and min stigan|stig ongit gestaðelode . 
 and þu self geseon , gif ic on|an swiculne wegan|weg 
 oþþe|oððe on|an unriht ahwær gan|eadan ; 
 gelædan me|ic þonne|se , lifes|lif ealdor , 
 þæt|se ic on|an eсe wegan|weg æghwær gangan|gang . ## generian|gener me|ic wiþ|wið niþ on|an naman|nama þin 
 fram yfel mann , ece drihten , 
 and fram þæm|þam|se werian|wer , þu|þe|se wom|woh fremman . 
 þu|þa|se eall|eal dæg inwit and facen 
 hycgeað on|an heorte þurh hearme þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan , 
 hi|heo þæt|se toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht georne|geornan|georn fremman habbað . 
 and hira|hi|heore tunge torncwidum 
 neod serwað , swa oft nædre doð , 
 and him|hi|he aspidas , ætren wyrm , 
 under weler wesan|seon|is gewunad fæstan|fæst . 
 gehealdan þu me|ic , drihten , wiþ|wið heteniðas 
 and wiþ|wið firenfull folm swilce , 
 and fram þæm|þam|se mann þu|þe|se munan|mann|man fremman , 
 alysan þu me|ic lungre , lifes|lif ealdur . 
 þu|þa|se on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan þohtan , þæt|se hi|heo ahyltan me|ic 
 and min gangan|gang georne|geornan|georn swilce , 
 forhyddan oferhygde me|ic inwitgyrene , 
 wrað wealsadan wundnum rap ; 
 woldan min fotas gefæstnian , 
 settan me|ic swyce , þær ic siþade . 
 ic þu|þa|se toh|to drihten cweðan : " þu me|ic wesan|seon dyre god ; 
 gehyran min|ic gebed , halig drihten , 
 nu ic stefn toh|to þu|þe|se styrman hlud . " 
 drihten , drihten , þu wesan|seon gedefe mægen|magan 
 hælu minre|min , and þu min|ic heafod sculan 
 on|an gefeohtdæg feond awergean . 
 nesan|neh|ne alyfan þu me|ic æfre ofer lust min 
 on|an fyrenfulra fæcne geðancas , 
 þu|þa|se wiðerwearde me|ic wrað hycgeað ; 
 nesan|neh|ne forlætan|forlædan þu me|ic on|an lifdagum , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan hi|heo ahafene ofer me|ic hwil weorðen . 
 him|hi|he ymb heafod hefegast gewinn , 
 þæt|se hi|heo mid weler wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan habbað , 
 him|hi|he þæt|se ilca sculan on|an gesittan . 
 eacan|eac hi|heo feallað on|an fyr glede , 
 and þu hi|heo mid fyr facn gehnegest , 
 þæt|se hi|heo þæm|þam|se yrmðum wifcynn|hosp|flet|a nesan|neh|ne wiðstanden . 
 se getynga wer on|an teosuspræce , 
 nesan|neh|ne bið se ofer eorþe|eorþ reссan|reccan|gereссan ahwær ; 
 unsoðfæstne wer yfel gecnysseð , 
 oþþe|oððe he on|an eorþ|eorðe eall|eal forweorðeð . 
 ic þæt|se gearuwe ongitan|ongietan , þæt|se god deð 
 drihten dom , þu|þe|se on|an dæg|dah|dag þes 
 wædla weorðað , wreceð þearfendra . 
 soð wesan|seon|is hwæðere , soþfæst nu 
 þinne|þin naman|nama willað þurh neod herigean ; 
 scylan eard niman on|an þinne|þin ansyn , 
 þu|þa|se mid ræde|rædan|ræd heran|her rihte|rihtan|riht lifigeað . ## ic þu|þe|se , drihten , toh|to dyrum clypige ; 
 gehyran me|ic hrædlice hold stefn , 
 þonne|se ic ben toh|to þu|þe|se biddan cearu full . 
 su on|an þinne|þin gesihþ min sylfes gebed 
 ful recen reссan|gereссan|gereccan , swa ricels byð , 
 þonne|se hit gifre gleda bærnað . 
 swilce wesan|seon|is ahafenes hand min , 
 þonne|se ic þu|þe|se æfenlac est secg . 
 settan swæs gehealdan swilce , drihten , 
 muðe minum|min , nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan munan|mann|man sprecan , 
 and æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele dor ymbstandend|ymbstandan , 
 þæt|se on|an weler wisdom healdan|heald . 
 nesan|neh|ne hyld þu min heorte , þæt|se ic hearme word 
 þurh inwitstæf ut forlætan , 
 and ic lædend wese|wesan laðra firenian|firen . 
 nesan|neh|ne ic æfre mid mann manfremmendum 
 gemænnesse micel habban , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an hira|hi|heore gecorenesse becuman æfre . 
 acan|ac me|ic soþfæst simble gerecce 
 and mildheort mod þreagan ; 
 elh|ele synfull|synful æfre nesan|neh|ne motan|mot 
 heafod minum|min hrinan ahwær . 
 forðam min|ic gebed nu git becnum standeð , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he on|an wise|wis wesan|seon|is wel lycendlice ; 
 syndon hi|heo æt|etan strang stane|stan forswolgene ; 
 noldan hira|hi|heore deman|dema min gedefe word 
 eare gehyran , eft nesan|neh|ne mihton . 
 swa unefne wesan|seon|is eorþe þicce , 
 syndon þes mor micel asprotene , 
 swa ure|ur ban syndon biter toworpene 
 be helwarena hæfteneodum . 
 forðam ic , drihten , on|an þu|þe|se dæd minum|min 
 eage and mod æghwær gelyfan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne ascuf þu fram me|ic sawol|sawel min . 
 gehealdan me|ic wiþ|wið se gryne þu|þe|se me|ic gram settan , 
 þæt|se me|ic nesan|neh|ne beswican synwyrcende , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se unriht æghwær þenceað . 
 feallað firenfull on|an hira|hi|heore fengnettum ; 
 ic me|ic syndrig wesan|seon|eoh , oþþæt ic swa ferian|feran . ## min|ic stefn toh|to þu|þe|se styrmeð , drihten , 
 and ic mid strangere stefn swilce 
 eam|ea biddan beald drihten . 
 ic min ben beald swilce 
 on|an hit|his|he gesiht simble ageote , 
 and min earfeþu ealle|eall|eal full georne|geornan|georn 
 for|faran him|hi|he self sæcge geneahhe , 
 gif min gram þenceað gast teorian , 
 and þu min stigan|stig strang ongietan . 
 on|an þes grene weсgan|wegan|weg , þu|þe|se ic gangan|gang on|an , 
 me|ic oferhydige æghwær settan 
 gearu grin ; gear ic sceawade , 
 geseon on|an þu|þa|se swyðran , nesan|neh|ne me|ic silf|self þær 
 ænig mid god ongitan willan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se me|ic eacan|eac frecne|frecen|frec fram fleam gedydan , 
 næs|nesan þu|þa|se þu|þe|se min sawol|sawel secean willan , 
 þu|þa|se ic toh|to þu|þe|se , drihten , digol cleopian 
 and sona cweðan : " þu wesan|seon min|ic se soð hyht ; 
 wesan|seon þu on|an lifigendra land|finna swilce 
 se gedefe dælan|dæl , drihten , æghwær . " 
 behealdan min sawol|sawel , hæleþ|hæle wealdend , 
 forðam ic geeadmeded wesan|seon|eoh ungemete swiðe|swiðan . 
 alysan me|ic fram laþu|laþ ; hi|heo me|ic lungre synt 
 ealle|eall|eal ofer me|ic ungemete strang . 
 alædan me|ic of carcern clus swilce 
 min sawol|sawel , þæt|se ic siððan forþ|forð 
 þinne|þin naman|nama motan|mot neod sæcgean . 
 min|ic soþfæst snotere bidað , 
 oþþæt þu me|ic edlean eft forgylde . ## drihten , min|ic gebed deore|deor gehyran , 
 and mid eare onfon ungemetum georne|geornan|georn 
 min halsunge ; healdan|heald me|ic siððan 
 on|an þinne|þin soðfæstnesse and me|ic on|an soð gehyran . 
 nesan|neh|ne gan þu mid þin esne in toh|to dom , 
 forðam on|an þinne|þin gesiht nesan|neh|ne bið soþfæst ænig 
 þu|þe|se on|an ðisse folde feorhlif bereð . 
 forðam min sawol|sawel swiðe|swiðan feond 
 ealle|eall|eal ehtan ungemete strang , 
 habbað me|ic hnægan hean|heah toh|to eorþ|eorðe 
 and min|ic lif swilce gelytlad wesan|seon|is . 
 hi|heo me|ic on|an digol deorc stow 
 settan sarlice samed anlice , 
 swa þu worulddeade wreon mid folde ; 
 wesan|seon|is me|ic ænge gast innan hreðres , 
 and me|ic wesan|seon|is heorte on|an heard gedrefan|drefan . 
 þonne|se ic on|an mod gemyndgade , 
 hu me|ic ær dæg|dah|dag oft alumpan , 
 metegade on|an mod ealle|eall|eal þin mære|mæran weorc 
 and ymbe|ymb þin handgeweorc hycgan georne|geornan|georn . 
 þonne|se ic min hand toh|to þu|þe|se hold þennan|þenian 
 and min sawol|sawel settan mid mod , 
 swa eorþ|eorðe bið ansyn wæter ; 
 gehyran me|ic hrædlice , hælan|helan me|ic siððan . 
 nu me|ic deop wesan|seon|is , drihten libban|leof , 
 min|ic sylfes gast swær weorþan|geweorþan , 
 nesan|neh|ne awendan fram me|ic , wuldor ealdur , 
 þin ansyn ; wese|wesan ic earm gelic 
 þu|þe|se on|an sweart grund siððan astigan . 
 gedon þæt|se ic gehyran hold on|an morgene 
 þin mildheortness|mildheortnes , mihtig drihten , 
 forðam ic hycge toh|to þu|þe|ðe , helpan gelyfan . 
 don me|ic weg wise|wis , þæt|se ic wite|witan gearu 
 on|an hwilc ic gangan|gang gleaw mod ; 
 nu ic toh|to drihten dom willan 
 min sawol|sawel settan geornian . 
 afyrr me|ic , frea drihten , feond minum|min ; 
 nu ic helpan toh|to þu|þe|se hold gelyfan ; 
 læran me|ic , hu ic þinne|þin willan|willa wyrce and fremman , 
 forðam þu min|ic god wesan|seon , þu me|ic god dydan|don . 
 me|ic þu|þin se god gast gleaw lædan , 
 þæt|se ic on|an riht wegan|weg reðne feran ; 
 for|faran naman|nama þin neodweorðunge , 
 drihten usser , don me|ic hal , 
 þæt|se ic on|an þin rihte|rihtan|riht rædfæst lifian . 
 and þu of costunge clæne alædan 
 sawol|sawel min , þær heo siððan forþ|forð 
 on|an þinne|þin mildheortness|mildheortnes motan|mot wunian ; 
 and þu min feond fæcne todrifan , 
 and eacan|eac forleosan laðra gehwylcne 
 þu|þe|se min sawol|sawel synn ætfæsten , 
 forðam ic þu|þin esne wesan|seon|eoh ongeagn|agen|agan simble . ## drihten wesan|seon|is gebletsad , min|ic se deore|deor god , 
 þu|þe|se min hand toh|to hild teon 
 and min finger toh|to gefeohtan . 
 he wesan|seon|is mildheortnes min|ic æt|etan þearf , 
 frið and fultuman|fultum , fæstan|fæst andfengea 
 and alysend wesan|seon|is lifes|lif min . 
 min|ic þu mære|mæran wesan|seon mihtig scyldend ; 
 ic hyht on|an þu|þe|ðe habban fæstan|fæst , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic folc manig fæger underþeodan . 
 hwæt#2 wesan|seon|is se mannian|mann , mihtig drihten , 
 þu|þe|se þu him|hi|he cuðlice cyþan willan , 
 oððe mann sunu , þæt|se hit gemetan|gemet wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 þæt|se þu him|hi|he aht|agan wiþ|wið æfre habban gewinnan|geblandan 
 munan|mann|man byð merwe gesceaft , miht idel ; 
 beoð hit|his|he dæg|dah|dag swilce deman gelice , 
 swa þu on|an scimiendre sceadan|scead locian . 
 ahyld þin heofenas , halig drihten , 
 onhrin þes munt , and hi|heo hraðe reocað . 
 þin ligetta leohtað and beorhtað , 
 and þu hi|heo toweorpest wid æfter ; 
 synd þin strele strang swilce , 
 and þu hi|heo gedrefan|drefan hafian|habban deop siððan . 
 onsendan þin hand of heanessum , 
 alysan me|ic and generian|gener wiþ|wið lagustreamum 
 manig wæter and wiþ|wið manfolmum 
 fremde bearn and frecne . 
 þær|se muðas sprecað manidel word , 
 bið hyra|hyr|hira|hi seon|seo|se swiðre simble abysgod , 
 þæt|se hi|heo unriht ellen tiligeað . 
 ic niwlice niwe cantic 
 þæm|þam|se god god gleaw singan 
 on|an psalterio , þu|þe|se him|hi|he swynsað oft 
 mid tynan|tin streng teon|geteon hearpe , 
 on|an þære|se þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se singan swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe geneahhe . 
 þu healdest and sellan hælu cyninge|cyning ; 
 þu alysan eacan|eac leof dauid , 
 þinne|þin agen|agan ombihtmæcg , 
 of þæm|þam|se awyrgedan wrað sweord . 
 alysan me|ic and oðlæd laþu|laþ wæter , 
 manig merestreamum , mære hand , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic fremde birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn fæcne syndan . 
 þær|se muðas sprecað manidel word , 
 byð hyra|hyr|hira|hi seon|seo|se swiðre simble abysgad , 
 þæt|se hi|heo unriht awa tilia . 
 þær|se birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn swilce boga|bog æþelu|æþele|æþel 
 settum beam samed anlice , 
 standað on|an staðule stiðe wiþ|wið geoguþ . 
 wærun hira|hi|heore dohtor deore|deor gesette|gesettan 
 and ymb frætwum utan gegyrwan , 
 efne|efnan|efen anlicast æþelu|æþele|æþel templ|tempel . 
 hira|hi|heore frumwæstme full|ful syndon , 
 þæt|se hi|heo rumlice roccettað swiðe|swiðan , 
 of þissan on|an þæt|se þonne|se wendað . 
 hira|hi|heore sceap wærun swilce tydred 
 and on|an siðfatum swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe genihtsum , 
 hira|hi|heore oxa eacan|eac ungemete fætt . 
 nesan|neh|ne hreosað hi|heo toh|to hruse heard gebiged , 
 nesan|neh|ne þær fernes wesan|seon|is folc mænegum , 
 nesan|neh|ne care micel cleopiað on|an worðum . 
 eadig bið þæt|se folc , oðer hatað , 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he swa on|an folde fæger|fæge limpeð ; 
 eadig bið þæt|se folc þu|þe|se ælmihtig willan|wil 
 drihten god dema weorðan . ## ic me|ic heahne god habban toh|to kyning , 
 and ic naman|nama þinne|þin neod herian|here 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to weorold . 
 þurh syndrig|syndrian dæg|dah|dag simble ic þu|þe|ðe bletsian , 
 and naman|nama þinne|þin neod herian|here 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to weorold . 
 micel wesan|seon|is drihten , he munan|mann|man mægene sculan 
 hold mod herian swiðe|swiðan ; 
 nesan hit|his|he micelmodes mægenes ende . 
 cneoris kynn cwide simble 
 þu|þin weorc herigen word georne|geornan|georn , 
 and þin miht|meaht|magan eacan|eac micel sæcgeon . 
 micel mod and strang þin mægenðrymmes 
 and þin halignes hold mod 
 wise|wis word sprecað , weredum secggeað 
 eall|eal þu|þin wundur wid mære|mæran . 
 and hi|heo mægen|magan swilce mære|mæran and egeslic 
 þinne|þin wundrian|wundor|wund wislic sæcgen 
 and þin mægenstrengðu mærsien wid . 
 gemunan þin mod þu|þa|se micel geniht , 
 þinne|þin weðnesse wise|wis sæcgenum 
 roccette and rædan|ræd sprecan , 
 and þin soðfæstnesse sæcge geneahhe . 
 mildheort wesan|seon|is drihten and mannþwære 
 and geþyldig eacan|eac , þearle mildheort . 
 swilce eall|eal wesan|seon|is ure|ur drihten 
 mannian|mann cynn milde and bliðe ; 
 syndan hit|his|he miltsian|milts ofer we|us mære|mæran weorc 
 eall|eal yld cuð awa toh|to feorh . 
 andettan þu|þe|se , drihten , ealle|eall|eal þin weorc 
 and þu|þe|se þin þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg heran|her bletsian . 
 and hi|heo þin miht|meaht|magan mannian|mann bearn 
 cyþan mid cynn and mid cneoris , 
 þin mægenþrymmes mære|mæran wuldur 
 rihtan|riht and reðe rices þin . 
 þæt|se þu cuð gedon ofer cneoris , 
 þær synd mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn manig ætsomne , 
 and þæt|se þu|þin miht wesan|seon|is ofer middaneard 
 and þin rices rædfæst wuldur . 
 romana wesan|seon|is þu|þin , drihten , ræde|rædan|ræd gefæstnian|fæstnian , 
 and þu woruldricum wealdest eall|eal ; 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin anweald eacan|eac ofer eorðware 
 of cynn on|an cynn and on|an cneoris . 
 drihten wesan|seon|is on|an word dæd getreowe 
 and on|an eall|eal hit|his|he weorc wis and halig . 
 ahefeð halig god þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe hreosað ær , 
 and he ealle|eall|eal areceð earm gebrocene . 
 eage on|an þu|þe|se eall|eal , drihten , 
 wis gewenað witan|wist toh|to geniht , 
 and þu him|hi|he mete|metan|met sellan mæl gehwylc 
 and se tidlice tidan|tid gemearcian . 
 onhlidest þu þin hand and hi|heo hraðe fyllan , 
 eall|eal wiht gehwa wis bletsunga . 
 soþfæst wesan|seon|is drihten on|an hit|his|he sylfes weg 
 eall|eal on|an eorþ|eorðe , and he æfter þan|se 
 on|an hit|his|he weorc wesan|seon|is wis and halig . 
 neah wesan|seon|is drihten niþ eall|eal 
 þu|þe|se he mid soð hige seceað and ciegað 
 and hit|his|he willan|willa heran|her wyrceað georne|geornan|georn 
 and hit|his|he ege swilce ellen ræfnað ; 
 he hira|hi|heore ben beald gehyreð 
 and hi|heo hrædlice gedeð hal sona . 
 ealle|eall|eal gehealdeð halig drihten 
 þu|þe|se lufu|lufe wiþ|wið he lust healdeð , 
 and he synfull|synful swilce todrifeð 
 geond widwegas wearn ealle|eall|eal . 
 sculan lof drihten on|an lust sprecan 
 min|ic muð mann mæl gehwylc , 
 and flæsca gehwylc þurh fæle|feolan word 
 hit|his|he se halig naman|nama heran|her bletsian 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to feorh . ## herian|here min|ic sawel hælend drihten , 
 and ic on|an minum|min lif lust drihten 
 herian|here halig and hold god 
 sealmas singan , þenden ic self lifian . 
 nelle ge on|an ealdurmenn an getreowian , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ; nesan þær micel hælu . 
 hira|hi|heore gast gangeð , gearu onwendeð 
 on|an þu|þa|se eorþ|eorðe þu|þe|se hi|heo of cuman ; 
 of þæm|þam|se sylfan dæge|dæg siððan forweorðað 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se geþoht þu|þe|se hi|heo þohtan ær . 
 þonne|se bið eadig þu|þe|se him|hi|he æror wesan|seon|beon 
 iacobes god gear fultumiend , 
 and ær hit|his|he hyht on|an god habban fæstan|fæst , 
 se þu|þe|se heofon wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , hruse swilce 
 and sid sæ samed ætgædere , 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an ahwær syndon . 
 he hit|his|he soþfæst word swilce gehealdeð , 
 and on|an weorold hit|his|he wise|wis dom 
 deð gedefe þu|þe|se heran|her deorc ær 
 teonan manig|manian torn geþoledan ; 
 syleð mete|metan|met swilce þu|þe|se heran|her murcne ær 
 hungur heaðugrimne heard geþoledan . 
 wreceð toh|to ræde|rædan|ræd romana drihten 
 þær|se mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn þu|þe|se ær munan|mann|man gebrecan , 
 swilce þu|þa|se gefetredan fæger|fæge drihten 
 lungre alyseð and him|hi|he lif geofeð , 
 and blind eacan|eac beald drihten 
 on|an hira|hi|heore eage eft onleohteð ; 
 soþfæst drihten swilce lufade . 
 þu|þa|se elðeodigan ealle|eall|eal drihten 
 lust healdeð , and lif geofeð 
 weodewum wencelum ; he hiom wel onfehð , 
 fyrenfulra wegan|weg frecne|frecen|frec toweorpeð . 
 rixað mid ræde|rædan|ræd romana drihten 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to feorh , 
 and þu|þin , sione , god simble toh|to weorold . ## heriað drihten , he wesan|seon|is heah and good ; 
 singað him|hi|he sealmas swiðe|swiðan geneahhe 
 and he wlitegum word herigeað . 
 eft hierusalem georne|geornan|georn drihten 
 timbreð tid , and toh|to somnað 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ut gewitan|gewita of israhelum . 
 se hæleð eacan|eac heorte geðræste 
 and hira|hi|heore unrotnesse ealle|eall|eal gewriðeð . 
 he recen mæg|magan riman|rima steorra 
 and þu|þa|se neodlice be naman|nama sona 
 full cuðlice cigean ealle|eall|eal . 
 micel wesan|seon|is ure|ur mihtig drihten , 
 and hit|his|he mægen|magan wesan|seon|is micel and miht strang ; 
 nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he snytru mæg|magan secgean ænig , 
 on|an þes ealdor|eald æfre ariman . 
 milde mod and manþwære 
 he onfehð fæger , and fyrenfulle 
 wiþ|wið eorþ|eorðe niþer ealle|eall|eal gehnegeð . 
 onginnað ge drihten geare|gear andettan , 
 singað god ure|ur gleaw be hearpe , 
 se þu|þe|se heofan þeceð hadrum wolcn|wolcen 
 and regn þanan recen sendeð 
 þu|þe|se þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe fram æfter groweð . 
 he of beorg ut blæd lædeð , 
 hi|heo|heg toh|to helpan hæleða bearn , 
 se þu|þe|se mete|metan|met syleð manig neat , 
 hrefnes bridd , þonne|se heo hropan 
 him|hi|he cigeað toh|to , cuðes æs . 
 nabban þu toh|to mannian|mann mægene willan|willa , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|se on|an þin selegescotum swiðe|swiðan lican , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se wer wyrcean wræþan on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 acan|ac wel lican wuldor drihten , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se he him|hi|he ondrædað dæd and word , 
 and on|an hit|his|he milde mod mægene gewenað . ## herian|here hierusalem georne|geornan|georn drihten , 
 herian|here|heran þu , sion , swilce þinne|þin soð god . 
 forðam he getrymede wiþ|wið teonhete , 
 þæt|se þu þin dor mihtest bedon fæstan|fæst , 
 and gebletsade bearn æghwylc 
 þu|þe|se on|an innan þu|þe|se ahwær wesan|seon|beon . 
 he þin gemære gemiclade , 
 þu on|an utlandum agan sibb|sib , 
 and þu|þe|se gesadade mid þywan|þy|þe|se selestan 
 hwætecynnes hold lynde . 
 he hit|his|he sprecan hider spowendlice 
 on|an þes eorþ|eorðe ærest|ær sendeð , 
 and hit|his|he word yrneð wundor sniome . 
 he snaw sendeð samed anlice 
 swa þu wull flys wolcn|wolcen bringan , 
 and se toweorpeð wid swa æscean . 
 he hit|his|he cristallum cynn sendeð 
 swylc swa hlafgebrece of heofonwolcnum ; 
 for|faran andwlitan|andwlita cele þær ænig nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 him|hi|he standan stiðe mod . 
 he hit|his|he word sendeð þurh wind gast ; 
 blaweð beorhtlice , burna floweð 
 and toh|to wæter weorðeð sniome . 
 he hit|his|he word eacan|eac ær mid wisdom 
 god iacobe gear foreseсgan|foresecgan , 
 and israhele eacan|eac hit|his|he dom . 
 nesan|neh|ne dydan|don he ahwær swa eldra cynn , 
 þæt|se he him|hi|he hit|his|he dom digol gecydde . ## heriað ge on|an heofenum hælend drihten , 
 heriað hlud on|an heanessum . 
 heriað he ealle|eall|eal engel ðreatas , 
 lofian he swilce eall|eal hit|his|he leodmægen . 
 herigen he swilce sunna and mona , 
 æghwylc steorra and þæt|se æðele sunnan|leoht . 
 heofenas he heofena herian georne|geornan|georn , 
 and þu|þa|se wæter swilce þu|þe|ðe ofer wolcn|wolcen synt 
 on|an heofenhame , herigen drihten . 
 forðam he self cweðan , sona wærun 
 wræclice wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan wæterian|wæter ðryþe , 
 and gesceapene wærun , þu|þa|se he self hettan|het|hedan|hatan . 
 þu|þa|se he on|an ecnes eall|eal staðelade 
 and on|an weorold weorold willan healdan|heald ; 
 he settan bebod , siððan heo þæt|se healdan . 
 herigen draca swilce drihten of eorþ|eorðe , 
 and ealle|eall|eal neowelnes herian naman|nama drihten . 
 fyr , forst , hægel and gefeallan|feallan snaw , 
 wesan|seon|is and ystan|yst , eall|eal gast 
 þu|þe|se hit|his|he word willað wyrcean georne|geornan|georn , 
 munt and geswyru , micel beam , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se micel and wæstm mann bringað , 
 and on|an eall|eal ceder ciið alædan , 
 deor and neotan|neat , don þæt|se sniome ; 
 nifle nædre cynn be naman|nama ealle|eall|eal , 
 and fugol cynn fiðerum gescyrped , 
 eorðcyningas eacan|eac ealle|eall|eal swilce 
 þu|þe|se folc heran|her for|faran wisian 
 and ealdorman ahwær syndan , 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se þes eorþe|eorþ ahwær demeð . 
 beon|beo|bannan ge , hægestealdas and glæd fæmne , 
 eald and geong|gangan ealle|eall|eal ætsamne ; 
 herian naman|nama drihten mid neodlofe . 
 forðam hit|his|he an nama ofer ealle|eall|eal wesan|seon|is 
 ahebban healice hæleða eall|eal ; 
 wesan|seon|is upp ahebban hit|his|he andetness 
 heah ofer micel heofon and eorþ|eorðe . 
 he horn hefeð hold folc , 
 he lof leohteð leof þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg ; 
 wese|wesan awa frið on|an israhela 
 fæle folc , and hi|heo forþ|forð heonan 
 on|an hit|his|he neahwest neod wunian . ## singað samheorte sang drihten 
 and him|hi|he neowe singan|sang nu þe|þa|ða|se singað ; 
 wese|wesan hit|his|he herenes on|an halig 
 clæne cyricean cyðed geneahhe . 
 israhelas on|an he eacan|eac blissian , 
 and sione birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn simble hihtan 
 swiðust eall|eal . 
 herigen hit|his|he naman|nama neod on|an ðreatum , 
 on|an timpano tid heriað 
 and on|an psalterio singað georne|geornan|georn . 
 forðam on|an hit|his|he folc wesan|seon|is fæger drihten 
 wel licendlic , and he wynlice 
 þæm|þam|se manþwærum syleð mære|mæran hælu . 
 þonne|se on|an wuldor gefeoð wel þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg , 
 beoð on|an hira|hi|heore hus bliðe gedreme . 
 him|hi|he on|an goma bið god oft gemynd ; 
 heo se wislice wynn brucað , 
 and sweord habban swilce on|an folm . 
 mid þywan|þy|þe|se hi|heo wrecan þenceað wrað cynn 
 and ðrea þearle þeod eawan . 
 and hio bindan bald þenceað 
 cyning on|an camp , and cuðlice 
 hira|hi|heore æðelingas don on|an isen bendas , 
 þæt|se hio don|dom on|an him|hi|he deop gecyðan 
 and þæt|se mid wuldor awriten|awritan standan|stand : 
 þes wesan|seon|is halig wuldor|seolh|bearm heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe . ## heriað on|an þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg hit|his|he hold drihten , 
 heriað he on|an hit|his|he mægenes mære|mæran hælu . 
 heriað he swilce on|an hit|his|he heahmihtum , 
 heriað he æfter mod hit|his|he mægenþrymmes . 
 heriað he on|an hleoðre hold beman ## for|faran ænigre egesa nabban , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he fultuman|fultum þær fæst gelyfan|gelifan ; 
 acan|ac he on|an hit|his|he wela spedan|sped wræste getruwian , 
 and on|an idel gylp eall|eal geornost . 
 ic þonne|se swa elebeam up weaxan 
 on|an god hus ece gewene , 
 and on|an milde mod min drihten , 
 and me|ic þæt|se toh|to weorold witan toh|to helpan . 
 ic þu|þe|se andettan awa toh|to feorh 
 on|an þære|se weorold þu|þe|ðe þu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan heran|her ; 
 forðam þu wesan|seon se gooda , gleaw on|an gesiht , 
 þu|þe|se þinne|þin held curan , þær|se halig . ## on|an hit|his|he heorte cweðan unhydig sum|su , 
 ungleawlice , se god nesan ; 
 heo onsceoniendlice syndon gewordene 
 and hira|hi|heore willan|willa wrað besmitene . 
 næs|nesan þu|þa|se goddoend se þu|þe|se god witan|wist , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an furðum eall|eal wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 þu|þa|se of heofenum beseon halig drihten 
 ofer mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , hwæðer hit|his|he miht|meaht þe|þa|ða|se 
 andgyt ænig eall|eal habban , 
 oððe god willan georne|geornan|georn sec . 
 ealle|eall|eal heo on|an an idelnes 
 simble besegan ; þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon soð nan mann 
 þu|þe|se god willan georne|geornan|georn wyrcan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an furþum eall|eal wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 acan|ac ge se ealle|eall|eal nesan|neh|ne magan andgyt habban 
 þu|þe|se unriht ellen wyrceað 
 and min|ic folc fretað swa fæle hlaf , 
 nesan|neh|ne hio god wyllað georne|geornan|georn ciegan ; 
 þær hio forhtigað , frecne|frecen egesa 
 ænig nesan|neh|ne þurfan . 
 forðam mannian|mann ban mihtig drihten 
 list tosceadeð , þu|þa|se him|hi|he liciað ; 
 beoð þu|þa|se gehyrwede þu|þe|se forhycggeað god . 
 hwylc|hwilc israela ece hælu 
 syleð of sione nymðe self god , 
 þonne|se he hit|his|he folc fæger alyseð 
 of hæftnyde , halig drihten gewinnan|geblandan 
 þonne|se iacob byð on|an glædum sæl 
 and israelas ealle|eall|eal bliðe . ## on|an þin þæm|þam|se halig naman|nama , gedon me|ic hal , god ; 
 alysan me|ic fram laðum þurh þu|þin leof mægen|magan . 
 god , min|ic gebed gearuwe gehyran , 
 and eare onfon min|ic ongeagn|agen|agan word . 
 forðam me|ic fremde oft facn|facen gestandan , 
 sohtan min sawol|sawel swiðe|swiðan strang , 
 and na hi god settan gleaw on|an gesiht . 
 efne|efnan|efen me|ic þonne|se god gleaw fultumeð , 
 wesan|seon|is andfengea ece drihten 
 sawol|sawel minre|min ; he me|ic swican|swica nesan|neh|ne willan|wil . 
 afyr me|ic fæcne yfel feond min , 
 and hi|heo soþfæst toweorpan siððan wid . 
 ic þu|þe|ðe lust lacu|lacan|lac cweme|cweman , 
 and naman|nama þinne|þin niode swilce 
 gear andettan , forðam ic he goodne witan . 
 forðam þu me|ic alysan , lifes|lif ealdor , 
 of earfoðum eall|eal simble , 
 ealle|eall|eal min fynd eage oferseon|ofersawan . ## gehyran min|ic gebed , halig drihten , 
 nesan|neh|ne forseon æfre sarig ben ; 
 behealdan me|ic holdlice and gehyran me|ic eacan|eac . 
 grimman|grimm|grim ic wesan|seon|eoh begangan ; forðam ic gnornian 
 and me|ic forhtian feond stefn 
 and fyrenfulra fæcne niðas . 
 forðam me|ic on|an sigan|seon unriht feala ; 
 wurdon|weorþan me|ic þu|þa|se on|an yrre|irre yfele|yfel and hefig . 
 ys me|ic on|an hreðre heah heorte gedrefan|drefan 
 and me|ic fealleð on|an fyrhtu deaðes . 
 egsian me|ic and fyrhtu eall|eal forcuman , 
 and me|ic beþeссan|beþeccan þeostru niðgrim . 
 ic þu|þa|se on|an mod cweðan , hwæt|hwa me|ic sellan 
 toh|to fleogan fiðeru swa culfre , 
 and ic þonne|se ricene restan siððan . 
 efne|efnan|efen ic feor gewitan , fleam dælan|dæl , 
 and on|an westen wunian lange|lang , 
 biddan|bidan se beorn þu|þe|se me|ic betan eft 
 mod mindom and mægenes hreoh . 
 hatan|hat nu todælan , drihten usser , 
 hira|hi|heore geþeode geond þes weorold wid ; 
 forðam ic þær on|an unriht oft locade , 
 and wiðercwyda wearn gehyrdan|gehyran ; 
 dreogan þæt|se on|an burh|burg dæg and niht . 
 þunie him|hi|he gewinn wearn ofer weall hrof 
 and hi on|an midle wese|wesan munan|mann|man and inwit 
 and unsoðfæstnys ealle|eall|eal wealdan|weald . 
 næfre on|an hit|his|he weorþian wea aspringe , 
 mearc mansceat , munan|mann|man inwides ; 
 forðam gif me|ic min|ic feond fæcne wyrgeð , 
 ic þæt|se aberan bliðe mod . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se þu|þa|se ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|ðe me|ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a feogean|feogan , 
 word wyrigen and wearn sprecan , 
 ic me|ic wiþ|wið hira|hi|heore hettan|hatan hydan|hyd sneome . 
 þu wesan|seon se munan|mann|man þu|þe|se me|ic wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an anmede , and æghwæs cuð 
 latteow lust ; and wit gelome|gelom eacan|eac 
 etan swete mete|metan|met samed ætgædere , 
 and on|an god hus gangan swilce 
 mid geþeahtunge þin and min . 
 hi|heo ofer cuman|ancuman unþinged deað , 
 astigan heo on|an hell|hel heonan lifian . 
 forðam on|an hira|hi|heore gasthusum wesan|seon|is gramlic inwit , 
 and on|an hira|hi midle munan|mann|man inwitstæf . 
 ic soþlice|soðlice toh|to self drihten 
 cleopian on|an corðre , and me|ic cuðlice 
 gehyrdan|gehyran hælend drihten . 
 ic on|an æfen , eacan|eac on|an mergenne 
 and on|an midd dæg , mægene sæcge 
 and bodian , þæt|se þu bliðe me|ic 
 min stefn stiðe gehyran . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þu simble sawol|sawel min 
 lust alysan , laðum wiðferige , 
 forðam me|ic manig|manian ymb mægene syrewað . 
 þæt|se gehyreð god and hi|heo gehyneð eacan|eac , 
 þu|þe|se ær weorold wesan|seon|beon and nu wunað ece . 
 nesan him|hi|he onwendednes on|an woruldlife , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he god fyrhtu georne|geornan|georn ondrædað . 
 heo besmitan swilce hit|his|he sylfes 
 þu|þa|se gewitnes , þær hi|heo woh fremman ; 
 forðam hi|heo synt on|an yrre|irre ut adælan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo self wel geseon æfre , 
 forðam hit wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he heorte gehygd neah . 
 hi|heo word hira|hi wel gesmyredon 
 elh|ele anlicast ; eft geweorþan 
 on|an gescotfeohta scearpe gar . 
 settan on|an drihten þu|þin soð gehygd ; 
 he þu|þe|se butan fracoðum fedeð siððan . 
 nesan|neh|ne syleð he soðfæstum siððan toh|to feorh 
 þæt|se him|hi|he yþan mod innan hreðre ; 
 þu arleas ealle|eall|eal gelædan 
 on|an soð forwyrd seaðes deop . 
 se blodhreowa wer bealuinwites 
 fæcne gefyllan|fyllan nesan|neh|ne fæger lif 
 on|an midde|midd feorh gemeteð ahwær ; 
 ic me|ic on|an min drihten deoren|deore getreowige . ## miltsian|milts me|ic drihten , forðam me|ic munan|mann|man tredeð , 
 and me|ic eall|eal dæg mid unriht 
 fynd onfeohtað þurh facensearu . 
 and me|ic fæcne tredað feond min , 
 doð þæt|se eall|eal dæg fram ærmergene . 
 forðam manig synd þu|þe|ðe toh|to me|ic feohtað ; 
 wennan|wenan|wen ic me|ic wrað toh|to þu|þe|ðe , wuldor drihten . 
 ic wealdend god word herian|here , 
 and on|an god swilce georne|geornan|georn gelyfan , 
 þæt|se minre|min sprecan spedan|sped folgian 
 æghwæs eall|eal dæg ; eacan|eac ic swilce 
 on|an god drihten gearewe gewene ; 
 nesan me|ic ege mann for|faran ahwæðer . 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic eall|eal dæg min ongeagn|agen|agan word 
 silf|self sacan , swyþ|swyðe|swiðe oncuðon , 
 and wiðer me|ic wær georne|geornan|georn 
 on|an yfel hira|hi|heore geðeaht ealle|eall|eal onwendan . 
 on|an eardiað , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe swa þenceað 
 þæt|se heo gehyden hælun min , 
 swa min|ic sawel bidan þæt|se þu swilce heo 
 for|faran nahwæðer nowiht hæle|hælan|helan ; 
 on|an yrre|irre þu folc eall|eal geðreatast . 
 ic nu leof god lif min|ic secg , 
 settan on|an þin gesiht sarig tear , 
 swa ic þu|þe|ðe on|an gehatan|gehat habban geneahhige . 
 þonne|se on|an hinderling hweorfað min 
 feond fæcne , þonne ic me|ic freoðu toh|to þu|þe|ðe 
 word wilnian ; ic witan and сinan|cunnan , 
 þæt|se þu min|ic god gleaw wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 ic on|an god min|ic word georne|geornan|georn herian|here , 
 and on|an god swilce georne|geornan|georn gelyfan , 
 and ic eall|eal dæg eсe drihten 
 word weorðige ; nesan|neh|ne me|ic wiht on|an siteð 
 egesa awiht ænig mann . 
 on|an me|ic synd , mihtig god , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se min|ic gehatan|gehat 
 on|an herenesse hyldo gyldan ; 
 forðam þu min sawol|sawel of swyltdeaðes 
 laþu|laþ wiðlæddest , dydan|don lof stunde , 
 aweredest min eage wrað tear 
 and min fot|fedan fæle|feolan beweredest , 
 þæt|se ic gearewe god lician 
 on|an lifigendra sunnan|leoht eall|eal . ## miltsian|milts min|ic , god , and me|ic milde weorð , 
 forðam min|ic sawel on|an þu|þe|se swiðe getryweð , 
 and ic on|an fæger scua fiðera ðinra 
 gewicie , oðþæt gewitan forþ|forð 
 and unriht me|ic eall|eal beglide . 
 heonan ic cleopian toh|to heahgode 
 and toh|to wealdendgode , þu|þe|ðe me|ic wel dydan|don . 
 he þu|þa|se of heofenum hider onsendan 
 þu|þe|se me|ic alysan , laþu|laþ wiðferede , 
 sellan on|an edwit þu|þe|se me|ic ær trædan . 
 sendan mihtig god hit|his|he milde gehigd 
 and hit|his|he soþfæst mod samod ætgædere , 
 and min sawol|sawel sona alysan 
 of leon|leo hwelp reðe gemanan ; 
 wesan|seon|beon ic slæpan sar gedrefan|drefan . 
 synd me|ic mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn mihtig toðum 
 wæpenstrælas , þu|þa|se me|ic wundedon ; 
 wesan|seon|beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi tunge getæl|geteal teonan gehwylcre 
 and toh|to yfele|yfel gehwa ungemet scearpe . 
 ahebban þu|þe|se ofer heofenas , halig drihten ; 
 wesan|seon|is wuldur þin wid and side|sid 
 ofer þes|se eorþe|eorþ ealle|eall|eal mære|mæran . 
 fot heo minum|min fæcne grin 
 gram gearwian , and geornlice 
 min sawol|sawel swiðe onbigdon . 
 hi|heo deop seaþ delfan wid , 
 þær ic eage on|an locade , 
 and hi|heo on|an se ilca eft gefeollan . 
 gearu|gearo wesan|seon|is min|ic heorte þæt|se ic god cweme|cweman ; 
 gearu|gearo wesan|seon|is min|ic heorte þæt|se ic god swilce 
 sealmas singan , soðword sprecan . 
 arisan , wuldur min|ic , wynpsalterium , 
 and ic on|an ærmergene eacan|eac arisan 
 and min|ic hearpe herian|here drihten . 
 ic þu|þe|se on|an folc frinan drihten 
 eсe andettan , eacan|eac geond þeon|þeodan|þeod 
 sealmas singan swiðe|swiðan geneahhige . 
 forðam þu|þin mildheortnes wesan|seon|is micel wiþ|wið heofenas , 
 wesan|seon|is þin soðfæstnes swilce wiþ|wið wolcn|wolcen . 
 ahebban þu wesan|seon ofer heofenas , halig drihten ; 
 wesan|seon|is ofer ealle|eall|eal eorþ|eorðe swilce 
 þin wuldor wlite|wlitan wid and side|sid . ## gif ge soð sprecan simble wyllen , 
 demað mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn dom riht . 
 eft ge on|an heorte hogedon inwit , 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan wrað ; forðam se wite|witan eft 
 on|an eowre hand hefig gegan . 
 ge firenfull fremde wurdon|weorþan , 
 siððan hi|heo on|an worlde wesan|seon|beon acennan|acan 
 and heo on|an lif lygeword specan . 
 yrre|irre hi becuman anlic nædre , 
 þe|þa|ða|se aspide yldan|yld|ildan|ild nemnað ; 
 seon|seo|se hi|heo deaf deð , dytteð hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo eare , 
 þæt|se heo nele gehyran heahgaldor sum|su 
 þæt|se snotre mann singað wiþ|wið attrum . 
 god hira|hi|heore toðas gram gescæneð , 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo on|an muðe mycle habbað ; 
 tolyseð leo mægen|magan lungre drihten . 
 acan|ac hi|heo forweorðan wæter gelicost , 
 þonne|se hit yrnan eorþ|eorðe forswelgeð ; 
 swa hit|his|he boga bendeð , oðþæt biter eft 
 adl on|an seteð , swa hit|his|he geearnuncg byð . 
 swa weaxan|weax melteð , gif hit byð wearm neah 
 fyr gefæstnad , swa heo feallað on|an þæt|se ; 
 hi|heo sunne|sunnan|sunna nesan|neh|ne geseoð siððan æfre . 
 ærðon eowre treowe|treow telga|telg blowan , 
 wæstm weaxan|weax , ær him|hi|he wol becimeð , 
 þæt|se heo beoð on|an yrre|irre ealle|eall|eal forswelgene . 
 soþfæst blissað , þonne|se he sið onginnan , 
 hu þu|þa|se arleas ealle|eall|eal forweorðað , 
 and hit|his|he hand ðwehð on|an hæþen 
 and se fyrenfulra fæcne blod . 
 and þonne|se munan|mann|man cweþeð on|an hit|his|he modsefa : 
 " þes wesan|seon|is wæstm wis and goodes , 
 þu|þe|se hit|his|he soþfæst weorc simble læstan|læst ; " 
 hi|heo on|an eorþ|eorðe god ealle|eall|eal gedemeð . ## ahrede me|ic , halig god , hefig niðes 
 feond min , þu|þe|ðe me|ic feohtað toh|to ; 
 alysan me|ic fram laðum þu|þe|se me|ic lungre on|an 
 risan willað , nymðe þu me|ic rædan|ræd geofe . 
 generian|gener me|ic fram niþ nahtfremmendra 
 þu|þe|se heran|her unriht ealle|eall|eal wyrceað , 
 and me|ic wiþ|wið blodhreowes wer bealuwe gehælan . 
 þi|se nu min sawol|sawel swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe bysig 
 feond min fæcne ofþryhtun , 
 and me|ic strang eacan|eac stundum onginnan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic unriht on|an awiht wistan , 
 nesan|neh|ne ic firen eacan|eac fremde drihten . 
 gif ic on|an unriht birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , ic se eft geswican ; 
 on|an min geanryne , arisan þu , drihten , nu , 
 and þu self gesyhst , þæt|se ic swa dydan|don ; 
 þu wesan|seon mægena god , mihtig drihten , 
 and israela god æghwær æt|etan þearf . 
 behealdan holdlice , hu þu hraðe wylle 
 geneosian niða bearn 
 eall|eal ðeoda æghwær land|finna ; 
 nesan|neh|ne þu hweðere on|an mod milde weorðest 
 eall|eal þu|þe|ðe unriht ellen wyrceað . 
 hi|heo æt|etan æfene eft in gecyrrað , 
 þonne|se hi heard hungor þoliað , 
 swa hund ymbgað hwommas ceaster . 
 efne|efnan|efen hi|heo habbað on|an muðe milde sprecan , 
 wesan|seon|is him|hi|he on|an weler wrað sweord and scearp . 
 þonne|se gehyreð hwylc|hwilc , hwæt#2 hyra|hyr|hira|hi hyсgan|hyg|hycgan seceð gewinnan|geblandan 
 and þu hi|heo , drihten , don deop toh|to bysmre ; 
 nabban þu for|faran awiht ealle|eall|eal þeod . 
 ic min strengðu on|an þu|þe|ðe strang gehealdan , 
 forðam þu me|ic god wesan|seon gear andfencgea , 
 and mildheortnes min drihten 
 me|ic fæger becuman , þær me|ic wesan|seon|beon freond þurfan|þearf . 
 min|ic se god god , ætywan me|ic þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan good 
 for|faran minum|min feond , þu|þe|se me|ic feale syndun ; 
 nesan|neh|ne don hi toh|to dead , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan hi|heo dollice 
 þinne|þin æ geban anforlæton . 
 acan|ac þu hi|heo wid todrifan þurh þin word mægen|magan , 
 and hi|heo wrað toweorpan , wealdend min|ic drihten . 
 ys hyra|hyr|hira|hi muðes scyld manworda feala , 
 þe|þa|ða|se hi|heo mid weler wrað aspræcan ; 
 wærun hi|heo on|an oferhygde ealle|eall|eal gescende , 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo on|an liсgan|leon lange|lang ferian ; 
 forðam hi|heo on|an ende yrre|irre forgripeð 
 and hi|heo siððan nesan|neh|ne beoð samod ætgædere . 
 siððan hi|heo wisslice witan , se wealdeð god 
 ofer middangeard mannian|mann cynn|cyn 
 and eall|eal eacan|eac eorþ|eorðe gemære . 
 hi|heo on|an æfen eft gecyrrað 
 and heard eacan|eac hungor ðoliað , 
 swa hund ymbgað hwommas ceaster . 
 efne|efnan|efen hi|heo toh|to etan ut gewitað , 
 þær hi|heo towrecene wid hweorfað ; 
 gif hi|heo full|ful nesan|neh|ne beoð , fela gnorniað . 
 ic þonne|se þin strengþu stundum singan 
 and þin milde mod morgen gehwylc . 
 forðam þu min|ic andfengea æghwær wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 and ic helpan æt|etan þu|þe|ðe habban simble , 
 þonne|se me|ic costunge cnyssan geneahhige ; 
 þu wesan|seon fultuman|fultum min|ic , ic þu|þe|ðe fela singan . 
 forðam þu me|ic , god , wesan|seon gear andfengea 
 and mildheortnes , mihtig drihten . ## þu we|us todrifan , drihten user , 
 and we|us toweorpan geond werþeoda , 
 yrre|irre we|us weorþan and eft milde . 
 eorþ|eorðe þu onhreran , ealle|eall|eal gedrefdest ; 
 hælan|helan hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo wund|windan , nu heo ahreran wesan|seon|is . 
 feala þu ætywdest folc þin 
 heard wise|wis and hi|heo hræþ æfter 
 mid wynsum wine|win drenсan|drencan . 
 þu becnuncge beorht sellan 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ege ðinne ellen healdað , 
 þæt|se hi|heo him|hi|he gebeorgen boga and stræle 
 and wesan|seon|beon alysede leof þin . 
 don me|ic þu|þin seon|seo|se swyðre hand simble hal ; 
 gehyran me|ic , halig god . hwæt#2 , þu holdlice 
 on|an þin halignes heran|her aspræce : 
 " and ic blissian , ba gedælan 
 sicimam etan|et conuallem , þe|þa|ða|se samod wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an metiboris miht spedig . 
 min|ic wesan|seon|is galaad , gleaw mannases 
 and effrem ys æðele strengþu 
 heafod min heran|her on|an folde . 
 cyninc ys me|ic iuda cuð ; 
 wesan|seon|is me|ic moab min hyht hwer , 
 and ic aðenige eacan|eac on|an idumea , 
 min|ic gescy sendan , and me|ic siððan gedon 
 allophilas ealle|eall|eal gewylde . " 
 hwylc|hwilc gelædeð me|ic leofran on|an ceaster 
 weall bewyrсan|bewyrcan gewinnan|geblandan hwæt|hwa wyle swilce me|ic 
 in idumea eacan|eac gelædan gewinnan|geblandan 
 acan|ac nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon þu se self god , þu|þe|ðe we|us swa drifan gewinnan|geblandan 
 nesan|neh|ne gan þu we|us on|an mægene , mihtig drihten . 
 syl|sellan we|us nu on|an earfoðum æðele fultuman|fultum , 
 forðam hælu byð heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe 
 mannian|mann gehwilc mægene idel . 
 we|us sculan mægenes gemetan|gemet mihtig drihten 
 soþfæst syllan , and he sona mæg|magan 
 ure|ur fynd gedon|gedo|don fracoþe toh|to nagan . ## gehyran , halig god , hræþ min ben , 
 behealdan min gebed hold mod . 
 nu ic of eorþ|eorðe utgemærum 
 cleopian toh|to þu|þe|se , nu me|ic caru beateð 
 heard æt|etan heorte , helpan min|ic nu þu|þa|se ; 
 ahebban me|ic holdlice on|an hal stan . 
 þu me|ic gelædan mid lufu|lufe hyht , 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon me|ic se strang tor stið wiþ|wið feond . 
 ic eardian awa toh|to feorh 
 on|an þin selegesceote ; þær me|ic softe byð , 
 þær ic beon|beo fæger beþeссan|beþeccan fiðerum þin . 
 forðam þu gehyrdan|gehyran , halig drihten , 
 hu min|ic gebed toh|to þu|þe|ðe beorht gan|eadan ; 
 yrfe þu sellan an gehwylc , 
 se þu|þe|se naman|nama ðinne þurh neod forhtað . 
 dæg byð ofer dæge|dæg , þær byð gedefe cynincg ; 
 beoð hit|his|he winter eacan|eac wynn iced , 
 oþ|oð se dæg þu|þe|se he on|an drihten sculan 
 on|an ansyn andweard gangan , 
 and þær toh|to worlde wunian ece . 
 hwylc|hwilc seceð þæt|se þu|þe|se soþfæst byð gewinnan|geblandan 
 swa ic naman|nama þin neod singan , 
 þæt|se ic min|ic gehatan|gehat heran|her agylde 
 of dæge|dæg on|an dæg , swa hit gedefe wese|wesan . ## ic min sawol|sawel simble wylle 
 full gleawlice god underþeodan ; 
 æt|etan him|hi|he wesan|seon|is hælu min|ic heran|her eall|eal gelancg . 
 hwæt#2 , he wesan|seon|is god min|ic and gearu hælend ; 
 wesan|seon|is he fultuman|fultum min|ic , ic nesan|neh|ne forhtian wiht . 
 þonne ge mid mane mann onginnan , 
 ealle|eall|eal ge þe|þa|ða|se toh|to dead dædun sona , 
 swa ge awyrpan|aweorpan wigan of stofn . 
 swa ge min are|ar ealle|eall|eal þenсean|þenсan|þencan 
 wrað toweorpan , wid yrnan|irnan|iernan 
 þurstige muðe ; se bletsadan 
 and se wyrgedan wrað mid heorte . 
 hwæðere ic me|ic soð sawol|sawel min 
 toh|to god habban georne|geornan|georn geðeoded ; 
 he minre|min geðylde þing wealdeð . 
 hwæt#2 , he wesan|seon|is god min|ic and gleaw hælend 
 and fultuman|fultum wesan|seon|is ; nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic he ahwær befleon . 
 on|an god standeð min|ic gearu hælu 
 and wuldor|seolh|bearm min|ic and wyn micel ; 
 me|ic wesan|seon|is halig hyht on|an he swilce . 
 hycge him|hi|he halig folc hælu toh|to drihten ; 
 doð eowre heorte hige hal and clæne , 
 forðam ge|eowan|eow god standeð georne|geornan|georn on|an fultuman|fultum . 
 hwæðere ge , mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , manes unlyt 
 wyrceað on|an wægum and woh doð , 
 and ge|eowan|eow beswicað self oftast , 
 þær ge idel gylp on|an þæm|þam|se ilca fremmað . 
 nellað ge gewenan wela unriht 
 oþþe|oððe toh|to reaflace ræde|ræd þencean . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow wealan toh|to wearn flowan , 
 nyllan ge ge|eowan|eow on|an heorte þu|þa|se hige staðelian ; 
 æne ic god spræcan gearuwe gehyrdan|gehyran 
 and þæt|se treowe|treow ongitan|ongietan tid gemeldad . 
 miht wesan|seon|is drihten ofer middangeard 
 and him|hi|he se toh|to worlde wuldor|seolh|bearm standan|stand 
 and mildheortness , þæt|se he mannian|mann gehwa 
 æfter hit|his|he agen earnungum demeð , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa he wyrceð on|an worldlife . ## god min|ic , god min|ic , ic þu|þe|se gearuwe toh|to 
 æt|etan sunnan|leoht gehwa lust wacian . 
 min|ic sawel on|an þu|þe|ðe swiðe þyrsteð 
 and min|ic flæsc on|an þu|þe|ðe fæstan|fæst getreoweð . 
 on|an westen and on|an weсgan|wegan|weg swilce 
 and on|an wæterflod wennan|wenan|wen ic swiðe|swiðan , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|ðe on|an halig|halga|haleg heran|her ætywe , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin wuldur and mægen|magan wis sceawian . 
 ys þu|þin milde mod micel god|betera 
 þonne|se þes lænan|læn lif þu|þe|se we lifiað on|an ; 
 weler þu|þe|ðe min wynn heriað . 
 swa ic þu|þe|ðe on|an minum|min lif lust bletsian 
 and ic on|an naman|nama þin neod swilce 
 min hand þwean halig|halga|haleg gelome|gelom . 
 ys sawel min|ic swete gefyllan|fyllan , 
 swa seon|seo|se fætt gelynd , fæger smeoruwes ; 
 weler min wynn swilce 
 þinne|þin naman|nama nu þe|þa|ða|se neod heriað . 
 swa ic þu|þin gemynd on|an modsefa 
 on|an minre|min restan rihte|rihtan|riht begangan|begang , 
 and on|an ærmergen on|an þu|þe|ðe eacan|eac gewene , 
 forðam þu me|ic on|an fultuman|fultum fæstan|fæst gestandan . 
 ic beon|beo fæger beþeссan|beþeccan fiðerum þin 
 and hyht on|an se habban georne|geornan|georn , 
 forðam min|ic sawel on|an þu|þe|ðe soð getreoweþ ; 
 me|ic þin seon|seo|se swiðre onfencg simble æt|etan ðearfe . 
 forðam hi|heo on|an idel ealle|eall|eal siððan 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan synlice sawol|sawel min , 
 and geond eorðscræfu gan|eadan geneahhe ; 
 nu hi|heo wær sellan|gesellan|geseald under sweord hand , 
 syndon fracuðe nu fox dæl . 
 kynincg sculan on|an drihten clæne bliss|blis 
 hluttre habban , and he heriað eacan|eac 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe on|an he aþ sweriað ; 
 forðam synt gemyrde muðas ealle|eall|eal 
 þu|þa|se unriht sprecað ahwær land|finna . ## gehyran min|ic gebed , halig drihten , 
 nu me|ic costunge cnyssað geneahhe , 
 and wiþ|wið egesa yfel feond 
 min sawol|sawel gescildan simble æt|etan þearf . 
 þu me|ic oft aweredest wyrigra gemotes 
 and fram þære|se menigu þu|þe|se munan|mann|man willan 
 and unriht æghwær fremman . 
 þu|þa|se hira|hi|heore tunge teoð teonan gehwylc 
 sweord efenscearpe and hira|hi|heore swiðne boga , 
 and unscyldige mid þywan|þy|þe|se scotian þenceað . 
 hi|heo he samnuncga scearpum strelum 
 on|an scotiað , egsan nesan|neh|ne habbað , 
 acan|ac hi|heo mid wrað word trymmað 
 and sar sprecað : hwæt|hwa gesyhð usic gewinnan|geblandan 
 swa hi|heo smeagað oft swiðe unriht 
 and on|an þæm|þam|se ilca eft forweorðað , 
 þær hi|heo mamriað munan|mann|man and unriht . 
 gangeð munan|mann|man manig modig on|an heorte , 
 oðþæt he ahefeð hælend drihten . 
 syndon hyra|hyr|hira|hi wite|wita scytelum cilda 
 æghwæs onlicost ; nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he awiht þon|se micel 
 hira|hi|heore tunge nu teonan on|an sittað . 
 ealle|eall|eal synd gedrefan þu|þe|se hi|heo on|an sioð ; 
 sculan him|hi|he mannian|mann gehwylc munan|mann|man ondrædan 
 and weorc god wid mærsian 
 and hit|his|he weorc ongitan mid wisdom . 
 se soðfæsta simble on|an drihten 
 blissað baldlice , bot geweneð , 
 and he heriað eacan|eac heorte clæne . ## þu|þe|se gedafenian , drihten user , 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se munan|mann|man on|an sion swiðe herian|here 
 and on|an hierusalem gyldan and gehatan|gehat . 
 gehyran min|ic gebed , halig drihten , 
 for|faran þu|þe|ðe sculan ælc flæsc forþ|forð siðian . 
 synfull|synful word swyþ|swyðe|swiðe ofer usic 
 fræcne foran ; þu gefultuma 
 ure|ur misdæd , miht|meaht wealdend . 
 he weorðeð eadig , se þu|þe|se he ece god 
 cyst geceoseð and he clæne hafað , 
 and on|an hit|his|he earduncgstowum eardað siððan . 
 ealle|eall|eal we þin hus ecum god 
 fæger fyllað ; fæstan|fæst wesan|seon|is þu|þin templ 
 ece and wræclic awa toh|to feorh . 
 gehyran we|us , hælend god , þu wesan|seon hyht eall|eal 
 þu|þe|se on|an ðysse eorþ|eorðe utan syndon 
 oþþe|oððe feor on|an sæ folde wuniað . 
 þinne|þin miht|meaht|magan sculan munt hyran , 
 swilce þu gedrefest deop wælas 
 þæt|se byð ormæte yþian|yþ hlud 
 and hi|heo uneaðe mæg|magan ænig aræfnan . 
 þeod him|hi|he ondrædað þinne|þin egesa , 
 þu|þe|se eard nymað utan land|finna ; 
 for|faran þin wundor forht weorðað . 
 ærmorgenes gancg wiþ|wið æfentid 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se deman|dema drihten healdeð ; 
 eorþ|eorðe þu gefyllan eceum wæstm , 
 þæt|se heo welig weorþeð wer cneoris . 
 beoð god stream god wæter 
 fæstan|fæst gefyllan , þan feorhnere 
 findað foldbuend , swa him|hi|he fæger oft 
 gegearewadest , god lifian . 
 wæter yrnan wæstm tyddrað ; 
 mænige on|an molde mannian|mann cynn|cyn 
 on|an cneoris cennan weorðað , 
 and blissiað , blowað and growað 
 þurh dropunge deaw and renes . 
 þonne|se þu gear hringan|hring mid gyfe bletsian 
 and þin fremsumnesse wylt folc dælan , 
 þonne|se beoð þin feld fyllan|fyld|fylan mid wæstm . 
 þonne|se on|an wæstm weorðað mæsted , 
 and mid wynngrafe weaxað geswiru . 
 hi|heo beoð gegyrwan god wull , 
 eowdesceapum ; cumað eadilic 
 wæstm on|an wang weorðlic on|an hwætum ; 
 þonne|se hi|heo cynlice toh|to þu|þe|ðe cleopiað sona , 
 and þu|þe|se þonne|se lust lof þanciað . ## ealle|eall|eal eorðbuend eсe drihten 
 word wislicum wid herian , 
 and hit|his|he naman|nama secgeað neod mid sealmum 
 and him|hi|he wuldor lof wid syllað . 
 and god secgeað , hu hit|his|he þu|þa|se goodan weorc 
 syndon wundorlice wid geond eorþ|eorðe , 
 and eacan|eac on|an menigu mægenes þin 
 þin feond þu|þe|se fæcne leogað . 
 geweorðie wuldor ealdor 
 eall|eal ðeos eorþe , eсe drihten ; 
 and þu|þe|se singan eacan|eac , secg geneahhie , 
 þæt|se þu|þin nama wesan|seon|is ofer eall|eal niða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 se hehsta hæleþ|hæle cynn|cyn . 
 cumað nu and geseoð , hu cyme weorc 
 drihten wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan ; synt hit|his|he dom eacan|eac 
 swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe egeslice ofer eall|eal yld birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 he mæg|magan onwendan wæterian|wæter ðryðe , 
 þæt|se þes deop sæ drige weorðað , 
 and þu|þa|se strang mæg|magan stream swilce 
 gefeterian , þæt|se þu mid fote miht 
 on|an treddian eorþ|eorðe gelice . 
 hit|his|he mægen|magan wealdeð ofer eall|eal mannian|mann cyn 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to feorh , 
 and he ofer ealle|eall|eal þeon|þeodan|þeod eage wliteð ; 
 þu|þa|se he on|an yrre|irre æghwær gebringað , 
 nesan|neh|ne beoð þu|þa|se on|an him|hi|he self siððan ahafene . 
 bletsian þeod bliðe mod 
 ealle|eall|eal eorðbuend eсe drihten 
 and mid stefn lof strang asecgean . 
 he min sawol|sawel settan toh|to lif , 
 nesan|neh|ne læteð min fot|fedan laðe hreran . 
 ure|ur costade god clæne fyr 
 soð dom , swa munan|mann|man seolfor deð , 
 þonne|se munan|mann|man hit aseoðeð swiðe mid fyr . 
 þu we|us on|an gram swilce gryne gelædan , 
 and we|us bealuwa fela on|an bæc standeð ; 
 settan we|us mænige eacan|eac mann ofer heafod . 
 we þurh fyr farað and þurh flod þri , 
 and þu we|us on|an colnesse clæne gelædan . 
 ic on|an þu|þin hus halig gangan|gang 
 and þær tid þu|þe|se tifer onsecge ; 
 þær ic min|ic gehatan|gehat mid hyсgan|hyg|hycgan gyldan , 
 þæt|se min weler ær wise|wis gedældan . 
 þes ic mid muðe aspræc min æt|etan þearf , 
 þær me|ic costunge cnyssedan geneahhe , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|ðe on|an tifrum tela forgieldan 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se gehatan|gehat , þu|þe|se ic æfre heran|her 
 mid minum|min weler wis todælan . 
 gehyrað me|ic and heran|her cumað ; 
 ic ge|eowan|eow mid soþ secgean wylle , 
 gif ge god egesa georne|geornan|georn habbað , 
 hu micel he dydan|don minre|min sawol|sawel . 
 þurh hit|his|he miht|meaht|magan ic muðe cleopian 
 oþþe|oððe min tunge tid blissade . 
 gif ic me|ic unriht oncnawan awiht on|an heorte , 
 nesan|neh|ne wite|witan me|ic þæt|se , wealdend drihten . 
 forðam me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran hælend drihten , 
 and minre|min stefn behealdan strang ben . 
 drihten seon gebletsad , þu|þe|se he nesan|neh|ne dydan|don æfre 
 nymðe he min ben beald gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he milde mod me|ic dydan|don fremde . ## miltsian|milts we|us , mihtig drihten , and we|us on|an mod eacan|eac 
 gebletsa nu ; beorht sunnan|leoht 
 þinne|þin andwlitan|andwlita , and we|us on|an mod weorð 
 þurh þin mycelnesse milde and bliðe . 
 and we se on|an eorþ|eorðe andgyt habbað , 
 ure|ur weg wid geond þes werðeode 
 on|an þinne|þin hælu healdan|heald motan . 
 folc þu|þe|se andettan ; þu wesan|seon fæle|feolan god , 
 and þu|þe|se andettan ealle|eall|eal þeod . 
 habban se gefea folc æghwylc 
 and blissian beald þeod , 
 se þu|þe|se þu hi|heo on|an riht ræde|ræd deman 
 and eorðbuende ealle|eall|eal healdest . 
 folc þu|þe|se andettan fæle drihten 
 and þu|þe|se andettan ealle|eall|eal þeod . 
 ge him|hi|he eorþ|eorðe syleð æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele wæstm ; 
 gebletsige we|us bliðe drihten 
 and user god eacan|eac bletsian ; 
 habban hit|his|he egesa eall|eal eorþe|eorþ gemære . ## arisan god , ricene weorðe 
 hit|his|he feond gehwylc fæstan|fæst toweorpan ; 
 fleoð hit|his|he ansyn , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se he feodan ær . 
 recan hi|heo gelician ricene geteoriað ; 
 swa fram fyr weaxan|weax floweð and mylteð , 
 swa þu|þa|se fyrenfullan frecne|frecen|frec forweorðað ; 
 habbað soþfæst symbel ece . 
 hi|heo ansyn ecean drihten 
 habbað beorhtlice bliss|blis and sibb|sib . 
 singað soð god sealmas geneahhige , 
 and hit|his|he naman|nama swilce neod heriað ; 
 doð siþfæt se sefte and riht , 
 þu|þe|se he self astigan ofer sunne|sunnan|sunna up , 
 þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|is toh|to naman|nama nemnan drihten . 
 wesað ge on|an hit|his|he gesyhþe simble bliðe , 
 and on|an hit|his|he ansyn wese|wesan ealle|eall|eal gedrefan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se wydewum syn wrað æt|etan dom 
 oþþe|oððe steopcildum wesan strang fæder . 
 drihten wesan|seon|is on|an hit|his|he stow dema halig , 
 se þu|þe|se eardian deð an mod 
 and on|an hira|hi hus healdeð bliss|blis ; 
 se þu|þe|se on|an hit|his|he mægenes miht|meaht|magan gelædeð 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se gehæftan hæleð sniome , 
 and þu|þa|se toh|to yrre|irre beoð ealle|eall|eal gecigan 
 and eardiað on|an eorðscræfum . 
 þonne|se god gangeð for|faran hit|his|he þæt|se gleaw folc , 
 oððe geond westen|weste wid ferað , 
 þanan eorþ|eorðe byð eall|eal onhreran . 
 for|faran ansyn ecean drihten 
 heofenas droppetað ; hruse forhtiað 
 for|faran israela god egesa þrymm . 
 wilsumne regn wolcen brincgeð , 
 and þonne|se ascadeð god sundoryrfe ; 
 eall|eal þu þu|þa|se gefremest þurh þin fæstan|fæst miht . 
 þin wiht on|an þæm|þam|se wynn lifiað ; 
 þu þu|þin swete good sellan þearfa . 
 god gifeð gleaw word godspellendum , 
 syleð him|hi|he mod mægen|magan se þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is mihtig kynincg 
 and wlite wealdend ; oft weorðlic reofan|reaf 
 on|an hus mann heran|her gedælað . 
 gif ge slæpað samod on|an clero , 
 fiðeru beon culfre fæger seolfor 
 and hire|heo bæc scineð beorht gold . 
 þonne|se hi|heo se heofonlic kynincg heran|her toscadeð , 
 siððan hi|heo on|an selmon snaw weorðað . 
 gebeorh god bringeð toh|to geniht 
 wæstm weorðlice and wel þicce . 
 forðam ge onfoð fæger beorgan|beorg , 
 þær ge toh|to geniht geniomað wæstm ; 
 se wesan|seon|is wealdendgode wel liciendlic , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se wiþ|wið ende eardað drihten . 
 wærun god cræta gegearwedra 
 tynan|tin þusend geteled riman|rim , 
 mænigfeald þusend modblissiendra . 
 drihten wesan|seon|is on|an þæm|þam|se dæd spedig ; 
 on|an heahnes astigan , hæftned lædan , 
 þu|þa|se on|an hæftnede hwil micel 
 lange|lang libban , and wesan|seon|beon lacgeofa 
 ofer middangeard mannian|mann bearn . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan þær eard niman ungeleafe mann ; 
 wese|wesan of dæge|dæg on|an dæg drihten user , 
 se god god , georne|geornan|georn gebletsad . 
 syll we|us gesund siþfæt drihten ; 
 ure|ur hælend god helpan usser 
 and we|us æt|etan deaðe eacan|eac drihten gehealdan . 
 hwæðere wealdend god wiðhycgendra 
 heafdas feond heran|her gescæneð , 
 and he tofylleð feax scadan 
 þær|se þu|þe|se heran|her on|an scyldum swærum gan|eadan . 
 of basan , cweðan beald drihten , 
 ic me|ic on|an sæ deop sniome onwendan , 
 oþþæt þu|þin fot weorðe fæstan|fæst on|an blod . 
 hund tunge habbað feond , 
 from|fram þæm|þam|se þin gang wesan|seon|beon gesewene ; 
 wærun god min gang rihte|rihtan|riht , 
 soþes|soð kynincges simble on|an halig|halga|haleg . 
 þider ealdorman ofost coman , 
 and gegaderian glowan|gleow|gleo singan 
 on|an se mannian|mann midle geong 
 on|an tympanis togenum streng , 
 and on|an cirice crist , drihten god 
 beald bletsian birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn israela . 
 þær benniamines synt birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn on|an geogoðe 
 and ealdormann eacan|eac of iudan , 
 þu|þe|se latteow wesan|seon|beon forþ|forð þær|se leode|leoda|leod , 
 and ealdor eacan|eac of zabulone 
 and neptalim niode swilce . 
 bebeodan þin mægene ; þu wesan|seon mihtig god ; 
 and þu|þin weorc on|an we|us mid wisdom 
 getryme on|an þin templ|tempel tid halgian ; 
 þæt|se ys on|an hierusalem , þider þu|þe|ðe gyfe lædað 
 of feorwegum folde kynincgas . 
 on|an wudu|wudian þu wildeor word þreatian 
 and fearr gemot under folc ; 
 nesan|neh|ne beoð ut fram þu|þe|se æfre atynde , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se seolfor beoð sincan|sinc gecoste . 
 toweorpan þu þu|þa|se ðeoda ## don me|ic hal , god , forðam hreoh wæter 
 toh|to minum|min feorh inn floweð and gangeð ; 
 wesan|seon|eoh ic on|an lama ofleсgan|oflecgan , hafað lytel spedan|sped . 
 cuman ic on|an sæ hricg , þær me|ic sealtan|sealt wæter 
 hreoh and hopig holm besencte . 
 þær ic werigmod winnan|wann and cleopian , 
 þæt|se me|ic gram syndan goma has ; 
 byð me|ic æt|etan þæm|þam|se wesan|seon eagon wiðgangen ; 
 hwæðere ic on|an god min gearewe gewene . 
 hira|hi wesan|seon|is mycle micel þonne|se ic me|ic habban 
 on|an heafod nu hær feax , 
 þu|þe|se me|ic earwunga ealle|eall|eal feogeað . 
 ofer me|ic syndon þu|þa|se þu|þe|se me|ic ehtan , 
 fæst folm forþ|forð gestrangad 
 feond min , and ic forþ|forð agef 
 unrihtlice þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ic nesan|neh|ne reafude ær . 
 þu witan , wuldor god , þæt|se ic wesan|seon|eoh unwis hyg , 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þu|þe|se bemiðene min scylde . 
 nesan|neh|ne sceolon æt|etan me|ic ænig habban 
 sceame sceandlice þu|þe|se þin siðes heran|her 
 ful bealdlice bidað , drihten . 
 þu wesan|seon mægena god ; nesan|neh|ne sculan æt|etan me|ic 
 ænig unare ahwær findan , 
 þu|þe|se þu|þe|ðe israela god ahwær seceað . 
 forðam ic edwit for|faran þu|þe|se oft aræfnade 
 and me|ic hleorsceame heard becwoman , 
 and ic framþe wearð fæderenbroðrum , 
 wesan|seon|beon unmæge gyst modorcildum . 
 forðam me|ic þin hus heard ellenwod 
 æt|etan ormæte and me|ic eacan|eac fela 
 þinne|þin edwita on|an gefeallan . 
 þonne|se ic minum|min feorh fæsten|fæstan gesette|gesettan , 
 eall|eal hi|heo me|ic þæt|se on|an edwit eft oncyrdan . 
 gif ic min gewædian on|an witehrægl 
 cyme cyrde , cwædan hi|heo siððan , 
 þæt|se ic him|hi|he wæfersyn wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon eall|eal . 
 me|ic wiðerwearde wesan|seon|beon ealle|eall|eal , 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he sittan sundor on|an port ; 
 sprecan me|ic wrað , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se win drincan . 
 ic þonne|se min|ic gebed toh|to þu|þe|se , mihtig drihten , 
 tid sendan tela liciendlic , 
 and þu me|ic þonne|se on|an mænigeo miltsian|milts þinne|þin 
 gehyran me|ic hlutor hælu þin . 
 alysan me|ic of lama , þu|þe|se læs|lesan ic weorþan|weorþ lange|lang fæstan|fæst , 
 and me|ic feond afyrr , frea ælmihtig ; 
 ado me|ic of deop deorc wæter , 
 þu|þe|se læs|lesan me|ic besencen sealtan|sealt flod . 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic huru forswelgan sægrund deop 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic se seaþ supan mid muðe . 
 gehyran , drihten , me|ic , forðam gedefe wesan|seon|is 
 þu|þin milde mod mann fremsum , 
 and for|faran mænigeo miltsian|milts þinne|þin 
 geseon on|an me|ic swilce , drihten . 
 nesan|neh|ne acyr þu æfre fram þin cniht þu|þin clæne gesyhð , 
 forðam me|ic feond toh|to feohtað geneahhe ; 
 gehyran me|ic hrædlice and me|ic helpan fremman|freme . 
 behealdan min sawol|sawel and hi|heo hrædlice 
 alysan and wiðfere laþu|laþ feond . 
 arscame ; 
 for|faran þinne|þin ansyn ealle|eall|eal syndon 
 þu|þe|se feond me|ic fæcne wurdon|weorþan . 
 min|ic heorte gebidan hearmedwit feala 
 and yrmðu manig eacan|eac aræfnede ; 
 nabban eorl se ænig sorh|sorg ; 
 frefrend ic sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , findan ic nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan . 
 hi|heo min mete|metan|met mengdan wiþ|wið gealla 
 and þu|þa|se gedrugadne drenctan mid eced . 
 wese|wesan hira|hi|heore beodan|beod for|faran him|hi|he wendan on|an grin 
 and on|an edlean yfel and on|an æwisce . 
 syn hira|hi eage eacan|eac adimmad , 
 þæt|se hi|heo geseon nesan|neh|ne magan siððan awiht ; 
 weorðe hira|hi|heore bæc swilce abeged eacan|eac . 
 ageot ofer hi|heo þu|þin þæt|se gram yrre|irre , 
 and æbylignes eacan|eac yrre þin 
 hi|heo forgripan gramhicgende . 
 wese|wesan wiс|wican|wic hira|hi|heore weste|westan and idel ; 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an hira|hi|heore eðele nesan|neh|ne su þinc oneardiend . 
 forðam hi|heo eall|eal ehtan onginnan , 
 þu|þe|ðe þu him|hi|he earfoðu ænig giefan|gefan , 
 and me|ic wea ecton min wundian|wund sar . 
 asettan him|hi|he þu|þa|se unriht toh|to þu|þe|se hi|heo geearnedan , 
 and mid unriht ær gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 and hi|heo on|an þu|þin soþfæst weorc siððan nesan|neh|ne gangan . 
 syn hi|heo adilgad of gedefe eacan|eac 
 se lifigendra leof boc ; 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan hi|heo mid soðfæstum siððan awritene . 
 ic me|ic self eam|ea sarig þearfian|þearfa , 
 and me|ic andwlita onfon ecean drihten , 
 se me|ic holdlice hælan sona . 
 nu ic naman|nama drihten neod herian|here 
 and he mid lofsange lædan swilce . 
 ic þæm|þam|se leof god lician swyþor 
 þonne|se æðele cealf , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se him|hi|he upp agan 
 horn on|an heafod oððe heard cleo . 
 geseoð þæt|se and gefeoð , sarie þearfa , 
 seceað drihten and ge|eower sawel leofað . 
 forðam þu|þa|se þearfendan þriste drihten 
 gehyreð holdlice ; nyllan he gehæfte eacan|eac 
 on|an hira|hi|heore neod na forhycgan . 
 herian|here he swilce heofan and eorþ|eorðe , 
 side|sid sæflodas and þu|þa|se him|hi|he syndon on|an . 
 forðam sione god simble hæleð ; 
 beoð mænige burh|burg mid iudeum 
 eft getimbrade , þær hi|heo eard nimað . 
 þær hi|heo yrfestol eft gesittað 
 and hira|hi eþel begytað esnas drihtenes , 
 and hit|his|he naman|nama neod lufiað , 
 þær eardiað awa toh|to feorh . ## wesan , drihten god , deore|deor fultuman|fultum ; 
 behealdan , drihten , me|ic , and me|ic hraðe siððan 
 gefultuma æt|etan feorhþearfe . 
 þonne|se beoð gescende and sceamu|scamu dreogað , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se min fynd fæcne wesan|seon|beon 
 and min sawol|sawel sœ̄сan|seсan|secan mid niðe . 
 hi|heo on|an hinderlincg hweorfað and cyrrað ; 
 ealle|eall|eal hira|hi scamian , þu|þe|se me|ic yfel hogedon . 
 and hira|hi|heore æfstu eacan|eac ealle|eall|eal sceamien , 
 þu|þe|se me|ic word cweþan|cweðan : " wegan|weg la , wegan|weg la ! " 
 habban þu|þa|se mid wynn weorðe bliss|blis , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se secean simble drihten , 
 and simble cweðan : " su þu|þin miht , drihten ! " 
 and þin hælu hold lufigean . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh wædla and worldþearfa ; 
 gefultuma me|ic , god , frea ælmihtig . 
 þu me|ic fultuman|fultum wesan|seon fæstan|fæst , drihten , 
 wesan|seon alysend min|ic ; nesan|neh|ne læt þu awiht . ## ic on|an þu|þe|se , god drihten , gearuwe gewene ; 
 nesan|neh|ne weorðe ic on|an ealdor|eald æfre gescended ; 
 þu me|ic sniome alysan þurh þin þu|þa|se swiþeran miht . 
 ahyld me|ic þu|þin eare|ear toh|to hold mod , 
 and me|ic lust alysan and me|ic lungre weorð 
 on|an god drihten georne|geornan|georn þeccend 
 and on|an trum stow , þæt|se þu me|ic tela hæle|hælan|helan . 
 forðam þu me|ic , god , wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gear trymmend , 
 freoða fultumiend ; alysan me|ic feond nu , 
 and me|ic of folm afere firenwyrcendra , 
 þu|þe|se þin æ efnan|efen nellað ; 
 syndon unriht ealle|eall|eal wyrcende . 
 forðam þu me|ic wesan|seon fæle|feolan geþyld fæstan|fæst , drihten 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon me|ic on|an geoguþ hyht gleaw æt|etan frymþ . 
 ic of modur hrife mundbyrd on|an þu|þe|se 
 þriste habban ; þu wesan|seon þeccend min|ic ; 
 on|an þu|þe|se ic singge nu simble and geneahhie . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh swa forebeacen folc manig , 
 and þu me|ic wesan|seon fultuman|fultum strang fæstan|fæst æt|etan þearf . 
 su min|ic muð and min|ic mod mægene gefyllan|fyllan , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin lof mæge|mæg|magan lust singan 
 and wuldur þu|þin wid mærsian 
 and þu|þe|se eall|eal dæg æghwær herian . 
 nesan|neh|ne aweorpan þu me|ic , wuldor ealdor , 
 þonne|se me|ic yldan|yld|ildan|ild tidan|tid on|an gesige ; 
 þonne|se me|ic mægen|magan and mod mylte on|an hreðre , 
 nesan|neh|ne forlætan|forlædan þu me|ic , lifian|libban god . 
 oft me|ic feala cweþan|cweðan feond yfele|yfel , 
 and sætendan sawol|sawel minre|min 
 and on|an an þeссean|þeссan|þeccan|geþeaht eodan togædere . 
 cweþað cuðlice : " wuton cunnian , 
 hwanne he god lætan|læt swa swa gymeleas ; 
 þonne|se we he forgripan and hit|his|he gear ehtan ; 
 siððan he nesan|neh|ne habban helpend an . " 
 nesan|neh|ne ofgif þu me|ic huru , god ælmihtig ; 
 beseon þu me|ic , soð god , simble on|an fultuman|fultum . 
 beoð gedrette , eacan|eac gescende , 
 þu|þa|se min sawol|sawel ær swyþust tældun ; 
 byð þæm|þam|se scand and sceamu þu|þe|se me|ic syrwedan yfel . 
 ic me|ic simble on|an god swiðe getreowige , 
 ofer eall|eal þu|þin lof lengest|lengan|lange hihte . 
 min|ic muð sægeð þin mægenspede 
 and þu|þin soþfæst weorc swyþust mæreð , 
 sægeð þu|þe|se eall|eal dæg ece hælu . 
 forðam ic nesan|neh|ne ongitan|ongietan gram ceapunga , 
 acan|ac ic on|an þin þu|þa|se myclan miht|meaht|magan gangan|gang . 
 ic þin soðfæstnesse gemunan simble , drihten ; 
 þu me|ic arian|ar , god , ærest|ær læran 
 of geoguðhade ; nu ic wesan|seon|eoh gomel winter . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic wundor þu|þin weorþlic sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 and ic þæt|se wiþ|wið oryldu awa fremman ; 
 nesan|neh|ne forlætan|forlædan þu me|ic , lifian god , 
 oððæt ic þin earm eall|eal asecgan 
 stiþe strencðe þes cneoris , 
 eall|eal þæm|þam|se teohhe , þu|þe|se nu toweard ys , 
 þin mihtes þri , and þæt|se mære|mæran soð , 
 þæt|se þu on|an heofenum , god , heah gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan 
 wundur wræclicu ; nesan þu|þe|se , wuldor cyning , 
 ænig æfre gelic , ece drihten . 
 oft þu me|ic ætywdest earfoðes feala 
 on|an costunge cuþ mannian|mann , 
 and me|ic yfel feala oft oncnyssedest ; 
 þonne|se þu yrre|irre þu|þin eft oncyrdest 
 and me|ic of neowelnes eft neoðan alysan 
 þes eorþ|eorðe , þu|þe|se we on|an buiað . 
 þær þu þu|þin soþfæst weorc sniome tobræddest , 
 þonne|se þu gehwyrfdest and helpan min|ic , 
 and me|ic getrymedest þæt|se ic tela miht|meaht|magan ; 
 forðam ic þu|þe|se andettan , ece drihten , 
 and þu|þe|se on|an sealmfatum singan be hearpe , 
 israela god , ece and halig . 
 min weler gefeoð , wynn lofiað , 
 þonne|se ic þu|þe|se singan , sigorian|sigor wealdend , 
 and min|ic sawel eacan|eac , þu|þa|se þu self lysan . 
 swilce min|ic tunge tid mæran 
 þu|þin soþfæst weorc ; scende wesan|seon|beon ealle|eall|eal 
 þu|þe|se me|ic yfel toh|to ær geseсan|gesecan . ## syl|sellan don|dom þinne|þin , drihten , kyning ; 
 sunu cynincges syl|sellan , þæt|se he soð healdan|heald . 
 deman þu þu|þin folc deore|deor mid soð , 
 healdan|heald þin þearfa hold mid dom . 
 onfon beorg eacan|eac beorht sibb|sib 
 on|an þin folc fæger bliss|blis 
 and geswyru eacan|eac soþ dæd . 
 on|an hit|his|he soðfæstnesse swilce demeð 
 on|an folc fyrhte þearfa , 
 swilce he þearfena birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn þriste hæleð . 
 he þu|þa|se hermcweðend hyneð and bygeð , 
 se mid sunne|sunnan|sunna wunað swilce mid spiht|monan|mona , 
 þurh eall|eal weorold weorold wunað him|hi|he ece . 
 he þonne|se astigeð , swa se strang ren 
 fealleð on|an flys heran|her , and swa fæger dropian|dropa 
 þu|þe|se on|an þes eorþ|eorðe upon dreopað . 
 on|an hit|his|he agen dæg|dah|dag ypped weorðeþ 
 syb soðfæstnes swiðe|swiðan genihtsum , 
 oþþæt byð ahebban hluttor mona . 
 he þonne|se wealdeð wer cneoris
