 be sæ tweonum , sidu|side|sid rice , 
 and fram streamracum styreð him|hi|he eall|eal 
 oþ þes eorþ|eorðe utgemæru . 
 he sigelwearas seceað ealle|eall|eal 
 and hit|his|he feond folde liccigeað . 
 cumað of tharsis tires eadig 
 and of ealandum utan kynincgas ; 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he eardgyfu æðele bringað 
 of arabia , eacan|eac of saba ; 
 ealle|eall|eal him|hi|he leode|leoda|leod lacu|lac cwemað . 
 he weorðiað weorold kyning 
 þu|þa|se on|an eorðwege ealle|eall|eal syndan ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þeod he weorðiað georne|geornan|georn . 
 forðam he alyseð lungre þearfa , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he se welig nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan wiht onsittan , 
 and se wædlan , þu|þe|se on|an weorold næfð 
 ahwær elles ænig fultuman|fultum . 
 he helpeð þearfa , swilce eacan|eac wædlan , 
 and he þearfigendra sawol|sawlian|sawel gehæleð . 
 he of mansceatte and of mane eacan|eac 
 sniome hira|hi sawol|sawel softe alysan ; 
 ys hit|his|he nama for|faran him|hi|he neod gebyrhted . 
 he lyfað leode|leoda|leod , him|hi|he byð lungre sellan ; 
 of arabia gold eorl lædað ; 
 he weorþiað wer cneoressa 
 and he eall|eal dæg eacan|eac bletsiað . 
 þonne|se æðele getrym eorþ|eorðe weardað , 
 bið se beorht ahebban ofer beorg up ; 
 ofer libanum licgeað hit|his|he yþian|yþ , 
 and on|an burh|burg beon blostma|blostm fæger 
 swa on|an eorþ|eorðe heg ute on|an land|finna . 
 þonne|se byð hit|his|he nama ofer eall|eal niða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 and toh|to wid feorh weorðeð gebletsian|bletsian ; 
 ær sunne|sunnan|sunna hit|his|he nama soþfæst standeð , 
 byð hit|his|he setl ær swilce þonne|se mona . 
 and him|hi|he byð eorþe|eorþ cynn eall|eal gebletsad ; 
 ealle|eall|eal he þeod þriste heriað . 
 wese|wesan israhela ece drihten 
 and hira|hi sylfra god simble gebletsad , 
 se þu|þe|se wundor micel wyrceð ana|an ; 
 seon hit|his|he miht|meaht nama mod gebletsad 
 on|an ecnes awa toh|to worlde . 
 and þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe seon eall|eal gefyllan|fyllan , 
 þurh hit|his|he wuldor miht . wese|wesan swa , wese|wesan swa ! ## hu god wesan|seon|is ece god mid israhelum , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se mid heorte hycgeað rihte|rihtan|riht ; 
 me|ic fornean syndon losian nu þe|þa|ða|se 
 ealle|eall|eal on|an folde fot gang . 
 forðam ic fæstlice fyrenwyrcende 
 oft elnade ; noldun earm mid him|hi|he 
 sibb|sib secean , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan fyren . 
 forðam hira|hi deaðes byð deorc endestæf , 
 nesan|neh|ne hira|hi|heore wite bið wislic trymnes . 
 nesan|neh|ne synd hi|heo on|an micel mannian|mann gewinn , 
 and hi|heo mid mannian|mann nesan|neh|ne beoð mægene beswungene . 
 forðam hi|heo oferhygd niman ungemete swyþ|swyðe|swiðe , 
 þurh þæt|se hira|hi unriht wearð eall|eal untynan . 
 þanan forþ|forð becuman fæcne unriht , 
 swa swa hit of gelynde lungre cuman , 
 and hi|heo on|an heorte hogedon and þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 hu hi|heo fyrmest|forma facen and unriht 
 on|an hean|heah hus hraðost acweþan . 
 hwæt#2 , hi|heo on|an heofon settan hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hyra|hyr|hira|hi muþ , 
 and hira|hi tunge teon ofer eorþ|eorðe . 
 forðam min|ic folc hider fæger hweorfeð , 
 þær hi|heo full|ful dæg|dah|dag findað sona . 
 and þonne|se cweþan|cweðan : " hu weorðeð þes cuð god 
 oþþe|oððe þes|þeoh|se gewitness weorðeþ on|an heah gewinnan|geblandan " 
 þi|se nu fyrenfulle folde æht 
 and þes weorold wela wynn niman . 
 þu|þa|se ic on|an mod cweðan minum|min sona , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic on|an me|ic ingcan an nesan|neh|ne witan|wist , 
 hu ic min heorte healdan mid soð , 
 and min hand þwean , þær ic hettan|hatan nytan , 
 and ic wesan|seon|beon eall|eal dæg eacan|eac swingan , 
 wesan|seon|beon me|ic leawfinger be leoht dæg . 
 gif ic self cweþan|cweðan and sæcge eacan|eac , 
 swa þu|þe|se birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn weorðað geboren|geberan|beran siððan , 
 þu|þa|se ilca ic ær foreteode . 
 ic se wendan|wenan , þæt|se ic mid wisdom 
 full gleawlice ongitan miht|meaht|magan , 
 hu þes gewinnan|gewinn willan gangan , 
 oþþæt ic on|an hit|his|he hus halig gangan|gang 
 and ic þu|þa|se nihsta ongitan neod siððan . 
 hwæðere þu him|hi|he for|faran inwite yfel befeolan , 
 aweorpan hi|heo wrað , þu|þa|se hi|heo wendan ær , 
 þæt|se hi|heo wesan|seon|beon alysan , laðum wiðferede . 
 nu syndon hi|heo gewordene wrað tolysan , 
 and semninga sneome forweorþan 
 for|faran unriht þu|þe|se hi|heo ær don , 
 swa fram slæpan|slæp hwylc|hwilc swærum arisan . 
 and hi|heo on|an burh|burg drihten beald habbað 
 hira|hi ansyn , and þu hi|heo eaðe miht 
 toh|to nawihte forniman sneome . 
 ys minre|min heorte hige hluttor and clæne , 
 wærun min æder ealle|eall|eal tolysan , 
 and ic toh|to nawihte wesan|seon|eoh nyde gebiged , 
 swa ic þæt|se be owihte ær nesan|neh|ne witan|wist . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh anlic mid þu|þe|se an neat 
 and ic simble mid þu|þe|se siððan hwæðere . 
 þu min swyþran hand self geniman , 
 and me|ic mid þin willan|willa well|wel gelædan , 
 and me|ic þu|þa|se mid wuldor wela geniman . 
 hwæt#2 mæg|magan me|ic wiðerhabban on|an heofonrice gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwæt#2 willan ic fram þu|þe|se wyrcean ofer eorþe|eorþ gewinnan|geblandan 
 me|ic wesan|seon|is heorte and flæsc heard geteorad ; 
 ys me|ic heorte gehygd hyldu drihten 
 and ece dælan|dæl awa toh|to weorold . 
 forðam þu|þa|se forweorþað , þu|þe|se hira|hi wynn toh|to þu|þe|se 
 habban noldan , nesan|neh|ne hira|hi|heore hyсgan|hyg|hycgan settan ; 
 huru þu forleosest þu|þa|se forhealdað þu|þe|se . 
 min|ic wesan|seon|is ætfele mihtig drihten ; 
 good wesan|seon|is swilce , þæt|se ic on|an god drihten 
 min hyht settan , healdan|heald fæstan|fæst . 
 and ic eall|eal þu|þin lof eft asecgan 
 sione dohtor on|an hire|heo sylfre duru . ## for|faran hwinan þu we|us , ece god , æfre willan 
 æt|etan ende fram þu|þe|se ahwær drifan gewinnan|geblandan 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin yrre|irre strang and egesian|egesa micel 
 ofer þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan eowan sceap . 
 gemunan þu|þin mannweorod , þæt|se þu , mihtig god , 
 æt|etan fruma ærest|ær fæger gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . 
 þu þin yrfe æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele gyrdan|gyrd 
 self alysan and sione burh|burg , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se ilca þu eard geniman ; 
 hebban þu þin hand and hyn hira|hi oferhygd ; 
 feala wyrgnessa wrað feond 
 þin þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg hefig brohtan ; 
 gylpað gramhydige , þu|þa|se þu|þin geo ehtan 
 and on|an þinne|þin wiс|wicu wuniað midle . 
 settan hira|hi tacn|tacen|tacan , soþ nesan|neh|ne ongietan , 
 swa hi|heo on|an weсgan|wegan|weg wyrcean sculan 
 wundorbeacen , swa hi|heo on|an wudu dydan . 
 hi|heo mid æxum duru ellen curfan , 
 and mid twyecgum teoledan georne|geornan|georn 
 þæt|se hi|heo mid adesa ealle|eall|eal towurpan . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo þæt|se þu|þin fæger hus fyr forbærndan 
 and on|an eorðstede eacan|eac gewemdan , 
 þæt|se þin naman|nama geweorþan niode cennan . 
 cwædan on|an heorte : " wutan cuman|cuma ealle|eall|eal 
 and ure|ur mæg|maga mid we|us ; wutun þider gemot habban 
 and symbeldagas swilce drihten 
 on|an eorðwege ealle|eall|eal towurpan . 
 nesan|neh|ne we sweotul tacn|tacen|tacan we|us geseoð ænig , 
 nesan|neh|ne we on|an ænig wise|wis witega habbað , 
 þæt|se we|us andgytes micel æfre secgen . " 
 willan þu hu lange|lang , wealdend drihten , 
 edwit þolian yfel feond 
 and naman|nama þinne|þin nu bysmriað 
 þu|þa|se wiþerweardan wraþ wiþ|wið ende gewinnan|geblandan 
 for|faran hwinan awendan þu wuldor ansyn 
 æfre fram we|us , eacan|eac þu|þa|se swyðran hand 
 of þin sceat self wiþ|wið ende gewinnan|geblandan 
 usser god kynincg , gear þu wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 ær weorold wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , wise|wis hælu 
 on|an þes eorþe|eorþ efenmidre . 
 þu on|an þin mægenes miht|meaht|magan sped 
 sæ gesettan , swilce gebrecan 
 þæt|se draca heafod deop wæter . 
 þu se myclan draca miht forcuman 
 and hit|his|he þæt|se heard heafod gescændest , 
 sellan siglhearwum siððan toh|to mos . 
 þu self eacan|eac toslitan wyllas 
 and hlynnende hlud stream 
 on|an æthane ealle|eall|eal adrigdest . 
 þu dæg settan and deorc niht|neaht , 
 swilce þu gesettan sunne|sunnan|sunna and spiht|monan|mona ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan eorþ|eorðe gemære , 
 sumor|sumer þu and lencten swilce gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . 
 wesan þu gemyndig mannian|mann bearn , 
 se gesceafta þu|þe|se þu gesceope þu|þe|ðe ; 
 fynd ætwitað fæcne drihten , 
 unwis folc nesan|neh|ne witan þinne|þin wyrðne naman|nama . 
 nesan|neh|ne syl|sellan þu unscyldigra sawol|sawlian|sawel deore|deor 
 þu|þe|se þu|þe|se andettað earm þearfa ; 
 þær|se þu on|an ealdor|eald nesan|neh|ne forgit , ece drihten . 
 geseon þu nu self , god , soð wesan|seon|is gecyðed , 
 nu þu|þin gewitnes ys wel gefyllan|fyllan , 
 hu deorc beoð dæg|dah|dag on|an eorþ|eorðe 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se unriht æghwær wyrceað . 
 nesan|neh|ne byð se eadmoda æfre gecyrran , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se wædla and þearfian|þearfa he wyle 
 naman|nama þinne|þin neod herian . 
 arisan , drihten god , deman þin nu 
 eald intinga ; eacan|eac wesan gemyndig , 
 hu þu|þe|se unwis edwita fela 
 þurh eall|eal dæg oft aspræcon . 
 nesan|neh|ne forgit huru god mannian|mann 
 soð stefn , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se seceað þu|þe|se ; 
 fyllan þu|þa|se oferhydigan , þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe feogeað þu|þe|se , 
 and eft toh|to þu|þe|se ealle|eall|eal stigað . ## we þu|þe|se andettað , eсe drihten , 
 and þu|þe|se andettað ealle|eall|eal þeod 
 and naman|nama þinne|þin neod ciegen . 
 ic þu|þin wundur eall|eal wræclic sæcge , 
 swa ic fæstlicast mæg|magan befon word , 
 and eacan|eac soð simble deman . 
 eorþ|eorðe wesan|seon|is meltan and hire|heo eardend mid ; 
 ic þonne|se hire|heo swyre simble getrymme . 
 ic toh|to yfel cweðan oft nalæs seldan : 
 " nelle ge unriht ænig fremman 
 and agyltan , þæt|se hi|heo nesan|neh|ne gulpan se . 
 nesan|neh|ne ahebbað ge toh|to heah eowre hygeþancas , 
 nesan|neh|ne ge wiþ|wið god æfre gramword sprecan . " 
 forðam eastan|east nesan|neh|ne cymeð guma ænig , 
 nesan|neh|ne of westwegum wer cneoris , 
 nesan|neh|ne of þes weste wid moru|more|mor ; 
 forðam him|hi|he wesan|seon|is dema drihten self . 
 sum he gehyneð , sum ahefeð sniome ; 
 forðam se wine|win steap on|an waldendes hand 
 fæger gefyllan|fyllan wesan|seon|is ; se onfehð þu|þe|se he unnan . 
 þonne|se he of þes on|an þæt|se þonne|se oncerreð , 
 nyllan he þu|þa|se dærstan him|hi|he don unbryce ; 
 forðam sculan ealle|eall|eal drincan synfull|synful , 
 þu|þa|se on|an þes folde fyren wyrceað ; 
 ic þonne|se weorold gefea wynn healdan|heald , 
 and iacobes god georne|geornan|georn singan . 
 eall|eal fyrenfulra fyhtehornas 
 ic bealdlice gebrecan sniome ; 
 swyþ|swyðe|swiðe beoð ahafene þu|þa|se soðfæstan . ## god wesan|seon|beon gear cuð mid iudeum , 
 and hit|his|he æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele nama mid israelum . 
 wesan|seon|is on|an sibb|sib hit|his|he stow soþ behealdan , 
 and he on|an sione swilce eardað . 
 þær he hornbogan heard gebendeð , 
 and sweord and sceld æt|etan gescotfeohta . 
 þu wræclice wundor onlyhtest 
 fram þæm|þam|se eceum hider æðele beorg ; 
 ealle|eall|eal synt yrre|irre , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se unwis 
 hira|hi|heore heorte hige healdað mid dysig ; 
 hi|heo slæpan hira|hi swæfun unmurne ; 
 nesan|neh|ne þær wiht fundan , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se wela sohtan , 
 se þu|þe|se hi|heo on|an hand hæfdan god . 
 for|faran þinne|þin þrea þriste onginnan , 
 iacobes god , georne|geornan|georn slepan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se on|an hors hwilum wesan|seon|beon ; 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin egesian|egesa micel ; hwylc|hwilc mæg|magan æfre þu|þe|se , 
 gif þu yrre|irre buan , ahwær wiðstandan gewinnan|geblandan 
 þonne|se þu of heofenum don|dom hider on|an eorþe|eorþ 
 mid gescote sendan , þonne|se hio swyþ|swyðe|swiðe beofað ; 
 þonne toh|to dom drihten ariseð , 
 þæt|se he on|an eorþ|eorðe don ealle|eall|eal hal 
 þu|þe|se he mildheort meteð and findeð . 
 forðam þu|þe|ðe mann þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan mægen|magan andetteð , 
 and þonne|se þu|þa|se laf lust þence , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|se symbeldæg settan and gyrwan . 
 gehatað nu drihten , and him|hi|he hraðe gildan 
 eowrum þæm|þam|se god god georne|geornan|georn ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se on|an ymbhwyrfte ahwær syndan , 
 him|hi|he gyfe bringan god and clæne . 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se egsan sculan æghwylc habban , 
 þu|þe|se wer gast wealdeð and healdeð ; 
 eorðcynincgum se ege standeð . ## ic mid stefn onginnan styrman toh|to drihten , 
 and he me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran and behealdan sona . 
 ic on|an earfoðdæge eсe drihten 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan mid hand swyþ|swyðe|swiðe geneahhe , 
 and ic on|an niht|neaht for|faran him|hi|he neod gan|eadan ; 
 næs|nesan ic on|an þæm|þam|se siþ beswican awiht . 
 and ic swiðe|swiðan wiðsoc sawol|sawel minre|min 
 fæle frofor ; þu|þa|se ic fæstan|fæst god 
 gemyndgade , þær ic habban mæstne hyht . 
 swiðe ic begangan wesan|seon|beon and min|ic sylfes gast 
 wesan|seon|beon hwonlice ormod worden , 
 wesan|seon|beon eage min eacan|eac mid wæcceum 
 werded swyþ|swyðe|swiðe ; nesan|neh|ne sprecan ic word feala . 
 þu|þa|se ic eald dæg|dah|dag eft geþenсan|geþencan , 
 habban me|ic ece gear ealle|eall|eal on|an mod . 
 ic þu|þa|se mid heorte onginnan hycggean niht ; 
 wesan|seon|beon min|ic gast on|an me|ic georne|geornan|georn gebysgad . 
 þu|þa|se ic self cweðan : " ic toh|to soð witan , 
 nele þes ece god æfre toweorpan 
 nesan|neh|ne we|us witnian for|faran hit|his|he weldædum , 
 oððe wiþ ende æfre toh|to weorold 
 hit|his|he milde mod mann afyrran 
 on|an woruldlife wer cneoris . 
 nesan|neh|ne byð æfre god ungemyndig , 
 þæt|se he miltsian mannian|mann cynn , 
 oþþe|oððe on|an yrre|irre æfre willan 
 hit|his|he milde mod mann dyrne . " 
 and ic selfa cweðan : " nu ic sona onginnan 
 þes geunwendnes wenan|wena ærest|ær 
 þær|se hean|heah hand halig drihten , 
 weorc wræclicra word gemyndig , 
 þæt|se he æt|etan fruma wundor fæger gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . " 
 þu|þa|se ic metegian onginnan mænigra weorc , 
 hu ic me|ic on|an eall|eal þæm|þam|se eaðust gehealdan ; 
 on|an eall|eal þin weorc ic wesan|seon|beon smeagean|smeagan , 
 swilce ic on|an þin gehylde self begangan . 
 ys weruda god on|an weсgan|wegan|weg halig|halga|haleg ; 
 hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|is mihtig god butan ure|ur se mære god gewinnan|geblandan 
 þu wesan|seon ana|an god , þu|þe|se æghwylc miht 
 wundor gewyrcean on|an woruldlife . 
 eft þu þin miht|meaht|magan mænige cyðdest 
 folc on|an folde ; þu wiðferedes eacan|eac 
 israhela birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn of ægyptum . 
 hwæt#2 , þu|þe|se , wuldor god , wæter sceawedon 
 and þu|þe|se geseon sealtan|sealt yþian|yþ ; 
 forht wurdan flod gedrefan , 
 wesan|seon|beon swegan|sweg micel sealtera wæterian|wæter . 
 sellan weorðlice wolcnas stefn 
 þurh þin stræle strang foran ; 
 wesan|seon|beon þunurradstefn strang on|an hweol . 
 þonne|se ligette lixan cwoman , 
 eall|eal ymbhwyrft eorþ|eorðe onhrerdan . 
 wærun weg þin on|an wid sæ 
 and þin stigan|stig ofer strang wæter ; 
 nesan|neh|ne bið þær eþe þu|þin spor on|an toh|to findanne . 
 folc þu|þin þu ferian swa fæle|feolan sceap 
 þurh moyses mihtig hand 
 and aarones ealle|eall|eal gesund . ## gehealdan þu , min|ic folc , min fæstan|fæst æ ; 
 ahyldað eowre eare , þæt|se ge holdlice 
 min muðes word miht|meaht|magan gehyran . 
 ic on|an anlicnessum ærest|ær ontynan 
 min sylfes muð , secggean onginnan , 
 þu|þa|se on|an worldricum wesan|seon|beon æt|etan frymþ . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se we oncneowan , cuð ongietan , 
 and ure|ur fæder we|us æror sægan|seсgan|secgan . 
 noldan hi|heo þu|þa|se swiðe|swiðan hira|hi|heore synn|syn dyrne , 
 acan|ac yld gehwylc oðer cyðde . 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan lof simble leof drihten 
 and hit|his|he þu|þa|se myclan miht , menigu wundur , 
 þu|þa|se he gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan wer cneoris . 
 he aweссan gewitnes 
 on|an iacobe goode and strang , 
 and israhelum æ gesette|gesettan . 
 þu|þa|se he fæstan|fæst bebeodan fædera|fæder ussum , 
 þæt|se hi|heo hira|hi|heore bearn budun and sægdun , 
 and cinn oðer cyðden and mæran . 
 gif birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon geboren|geberan|beran þæm|þam|se fæder , 
 him|hi|he sculan se yldra eall|eal gesæcgan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo gleaw hyht toh|to god hæfdan , 
 and hit|his|he weorðlicu weorc gemunan , 
 and god bebod georne|geornan|georn heoldan . 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan hi|heo on|an facn|facen fædera|fæder gelice ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon earfoðcynn yrre|irre and reðe ; 
 nabban hira|hi|heore heorte hige gestaðelod ; 
 nesan toh|to wenanne , se willan god 
 hira|hi gast mid him|hi|he gyme|gyman awiht . 
 effremes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ærest|ær ongunnan 
 of boga stræle biter sendan , 
 se hi|heo on|an wig dæge|dæg wendan|wenan æfter . 
 nesan|neh|ne heoldan hi|heo halig|halga|haleg drihten 
 gewitnes , nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he weorc æ 
 awiht wislice woldan begangan . 
 eall|eal goddæda hi|heo forgiten habban , 
 and þær|se wundrian|wundor|wund , þu|þe|se he wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan ær , 
 þær|se hira|hi|heore yldran on|an locadan . 
 he on|an ægypta agen land|finna 
 him|hi|he wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan for|faran wundur mære|mæran 
 and on|an campotanea eacan|eac mid soð . 
 he sæ toslitan , sealtan|sealt yþian|yþ 
 gefæstnade , and hi|heo foran þurh . 
 him|hi|he wisian wolcen unlytel 
 dæg|dah|dagian|dag æghwylce , swa hit drihten hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 and him|hi|he ealle|eall|eal niht|neaht oðer beacen 
 fyr leoma folcnede healdan . 
 he on|an westen wid ædre 
 him|hi|he of stane|stan lætan|lettan , strang burna . 
 of þæm|þam|se wæter cwoman weorude toh|to helpan , 
 swyþ|swyðe|swiðe wynlice wæterian|wæter þryðe . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo hira|hi firen furþur ehtan , 
 and he on|an yrre|irre eft gebrohtan , 
 hira|hi|heore heafodweard hold on|an land|finna . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se on|an heorte hogedon toh|to niðe , 
 and geornlice god costadan , 
 bædan hira|hi feorh foddur giefan|gefan , 
 and gramlice be god spræcan : 
 " acan|ac we se nesan|neh|ne wenað , þæt|se we|us witig god 
 mæge|mæg|magan bringan toh|to beodan|beod gegearwian|gearwian 
 on|an þes westen wid and sidu|side|sid , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he of stane|stan stream lætan|lettan 
 wæter on|an willan|willa wynn flowan , 
 nesan|neh|ne we hwæðere wenað , þæt|se he wiht mæge|mæg|magan 
 mid hlaf þes folc heran|her afedan . " 
 siððan þæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran halig drihten , 
 he yldan|yld|ildan|ild þu|þa|se git and eft gesprecan ; 
 wesan|seon|beon gegleded fyr on|an iacobe 
 and hit|his|he yrre|irre birnan|biernan|beornan on|an israhelas , 
 forðam þu|þe|se hi|heo nesan|neh|ne willan word drihten 
 lust gelyfan , lar forhogedon . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan he þu|þa|se wid duru wolcen ontynan 
 heah of heofenum and hider rignan 
 mannian|mann toh|to mos mannian|mann cynn , 
 sellan him|hi|he heofenes hlaf hider on|an folde , 
 and engel hlaf etan mancynn , 
 and hwæten habban toh|to geniht . 
 and awehte þu|þa|se wind of heofenum , 
 auster ærest|ær and þu|þa|se affricum . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se eacan|eac feallan ufan flæsc toh|to geniht ; 
 swa sand sæ oððe þiss sweart dust 
 coman gefiðrade fugelas swilce . 
 and on|an midde|midd þu|þa|se wiс|wican|wic manig|manian feollan 
 and ymb hira|hi selegescotu swiðe|swiðan geneahhe . 
 swiðe|swiðan ætan and sæd wurdan , 
 and hira|hi lust lifdan hwil ; 
 nesan hi|heo bescyrede sceattes willan|willa . 
 þu|þa|se git hi|heo on|an muðe hira|hi|heore mete|metan|met habban , 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he on|an becuman yrre|irre drihten 
 and hira|hi|heore mænige mane swultan , 
 æðele israhela eacan|eac forwurdan . 
 in eall|eal hi|heo þes ihtan synn , 
 and noldan hit|his|he wundor wel gelyfan . 
 hi|heo hira|hi|heore dagena tidan|tid dædun idel 
 and hira|hi|heore gear gancg eacan|eac unnytt . 
 þonne|se he hi|heo sar slean , þonne|se hi|heo sœ̄сan|seсan|secan he , 
 and ær sunnan|leoht toh|to him|hi|he lust cwoman . 
 siððan hi|heo ongietan , þæt|se wesan|seon|beon god hira|hi|heore 
 fæle|feolan fultuman|fultum , freond æt|etan þearf ; 
 wesan|seon|beon heah god hira|hi|heore alysend , 
 hi|heo he lufedan leas muðe , 
 nesan|neh|ne se on|an heorte hogedan awiht . 
 næs|nesan him|hi|he on|an hreðre heorte clæne , 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo on|an gewitnes wis habban , 
 on|an hira|hi fyrhþe|fyrhþ fæst geleafa . 
 he þonne|se wesan|seon|is mildheort and manðwære 
 hira|hi fyrendædum , nyllan|nillan hi|heo toh|to flymum gedon|gedo|don . 
 he þu|þa|se manig|manian fram him|hi|he mangewyrhtan 
 yrre|irre awendan , eall|eal nesan|neh|ne willan 
 þurh hat hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hæleðum cyþan . 
 and he gemunan þæt|se hi|heo wær molde and flæsc 
 gast gangan|gan , næs|nesan se geancyr eft . 
 hi|heo he on|an westen|westan word and dæd 
 on|an yrre|irre mod eft gebrohtan , 
 aweahtan he on|an eorþ|eorðe oft butan wæter . 
 oft hi|heo grimlice god costodan 
 and israhela god eacan|eac abulgan . 
 na gemynd hæfdan , hu hit|his|he seon|seo|se mycle hand 
 on|an gewindæge werian|weorod and ferian . 
 he ægypti egesa geþywde 
 mid feala tacnian|tacn|tacen and forebeacna 
 in campotaneos ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon cuð wer . 
 þær he wæterstreamas wendan|wenan toh|to blod ; 
 nesan|neh|ne magan wæter drincan wiht ænig . 
 settan him|hi|he heard wite|witan , hund fleoge|fleogan , 
 and hi|heo ætan eacan|eac yfel tostan ; 
 hæfdan hi|heo eallunga ut awyrpan|aweorpan . 
 sellan erucan , yfel wyrm , 
 lætan|lettan hira|hi wyrtian|wyrt wæstm forslitan , 
 and hira|hi gram gewinnan|gewinn hæfdan gærshoppa . 
 hira|hi|heore wingeard wraþ hægl 
 nede forniman ; nænig motan 
 hira|hi|heore hror hriman|hrim æpla gedigean . 
 sellan hira|hi|heore neotan|neat eacan|eac swilce hægl , 
 and hira|hi|heore æht ealle|eall|eal fyr . 
 he æbyligðe on|an hi|heo bitter and yrre|irre , 
 sarlic sendan oþ|oð sawlhord 
 and þæt|se wiþ|wið yfele|yfel engel sendan . 
 he him|hi|he wegan|weg wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan wrað yrre , 
 nesan|neh|ne he hira|hi|heore sawol deað swiðe|swiðan nesan|neh|ne sparude 
 and hira|hi|heore neotan|neat niðcwealm forswelgan . 
 he þu|þa|se on|an þæm|þam|se folc frumbearna gehwylc 
 on|an ægiptum eall|eal acwellan 
 and frumwæstme folc chames . 
 þu|þa|se he hit|his|he folc geniman swa fæle|feolan sceap , 
 lædan geliccast leof eowan 
 þurh westen weg uncuðe . 
 and he hi|heo on|an hihte hold lædan ; 
 næs|nesan him|hi|he on|an fyrhtu feond egsian , 
 acan|ac ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se yþian|yþ forniman . 
 he hi|heo þu|þa|se gelædan on|an leof burh|burg 
 and halig , þe|þa|ða|se hit|his|he hand begietan|begeotan . 
 and he manig|manian for|faran him|hi|he mære|mæran þeon|þeodan|þeod 
 aweorpan of wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , sellan him|hi|he weste|westan land|finna , 
 þæt|se hi|heo mid tan getugan rihte|rihtan|riht . 
 þu|þa|se israelas æht gesætan 
 hror folc , þu|þa|se hi|heo hean|heah god 
 gebysmredan , nyllan|nillan hit|his|he bebod 
 fæstan|fæst healdan|heald . 
 hi|heo awendan aweg , nalæs wel dydan , 
 swa hira|hi|heore fæder beforan heoldan , 
 and on|an wiðermede wendan and cyrdan . 
 swa hi|heo hit|his|he yrre|irre oft aweahtan , 
 þonne|se hi|heo oferhydig up ahofan , 
 and him|hi|he wohgodu worhtan and grofun . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran halig drihten , 
 he hi|heo forhogode , and hraðe siððan 
 israhela cynn egsan geðyde . 
 and he þu|þa|se swa gelome|gelom wiðsoc snytruhuse , 
 wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan hus , þær he eard geniman 
 ær mid mann , mihtig habban . 
 he hi|heo þu|þa|se on|an hæftnyd hean|heah gesellan 
 and hira|hi|heore fæger folc on|an feond hand . 
 sellan þu|þa|se hit|his|he swæs folc sweord under ecge , 
 and hit|his|he yrfe eacan|eac eall|eal forhogode . 
 hira|hi|heore geoguþ eacan|eac grimman|grimm|grim liсgan|leon 
 fyr fæðmade ; fæmne nesan|neh|ne wær 
 geong|gangan begrette , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe hi|heo gram swultan . 
 wær sacerd hira|hi|heore sweord abrotene ; 
 nesan|neh|ne þæt|se hira|hi|heore widwan wepan mostan . 
 þu|þa|se wearð aweссan wealdend drihten , 
 swa he slæpan softe restan 
 oððe swa weorð munan|mann|man wine|win druncen|drincan . 
 he þu|þa|se hit|his|he feond slean and him|hi|he ætfæste eacan|eac 
 ece edwit awa toh|to feorh . 
 and he georne|geornan|georn wiðsoc iosepes hus , 
 nesan|neh|ne þon|se ær geceosan effremes cynn , 
 acan|ac he geceosan iudan him|hi|he geswæs frumcynn 
 on|an sione burh|burg , þær him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon simble leof . 
 he þu|þa|se anhornan eall|eal gelician 
 hit|his|he halig hus heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe 
 getimbrade ; hettan|het|hedan|hatan þæt|ðæt|se tela siððan 
 on|an worldrice wunian ece . 
 and him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se dauid geceosan , deoren|deore esne , 
 and geniman he æt|etan eowan ute be sceapum , 
 fostur feormade ; he him|hi|he onfencg hraðe . 
 he þonne|se fedeð folc iacobes 
 and israhela yrfelafe . 
 and he hi|heo þonne|se butan facn|facen fedeð siððan , 
 and hit|his|he folm siððan hi|heo forþ|forð lædeð . ## cuman on|an þin yrfe , ece drihten , 
 fremde þeon|þeodan|þeod , þu|þa|se þu|þin fæle|feolan hus , 
 ealh halig yfele|yfel gewemdan . 
 settan hierusalem samod anlicast 
 swa in æppelbearu an cytan ; 
 swilce hi|heo settan swylt þin esnum , 
 sellan flæsc hira|hi|heore fugol toh|to mos , 
 halig liс|lic hund and deore|deor . 
 hi|heo þær|se bearn blod on|an burh|burg lætan 
 swa munan|mann|man geotan wæter ymb hierusalem ; 
 blodig lah , nahtan byrgendas . 
 we synd gewordene wer cneoris 
 eall|eal edwitstæf ymbsittendum , 
 þu|þe|se we|us ahwær neah nu þe|þa|ða|se syndon . 
 hu willan þu , wuldor god , wrað yrre|irre þu|þin 
 on|an ende fram we|us æfre oncyrran gewinnan|geblandan 
 wesan|seon|is nu onbærned biter þu|þin yrre|irre 
 on|an þin folc fyr hat . 
 ageot yrre|irre þu|þin on|an þæt|se romana 
 and on|an cneowmagas þu|þe|se nesan|neh|ne cunnan þu|þe|ðe , 
 nesan|neh|ne naman|nama þinne|þin neod cigeað . 
 forðam hi|heo iacob gear ætan , 
 and hit|his|he wicstede weste|westan gelome|gelom . 
 nesan|neh|ne gemunan þu toh|to oft , miht|meaht wealdend , 
 ealdor|eald unriht þu|þe|se we oft fremman , 
 acan|ac we hraðe begytan hyldo þin , 
 forðam we ðearfende þearle syndon . 
 gefultuma we|us , frea ælmihtig , 
 and alysan we|us , lifian god ; 
 weorð ure|ur synn sefte and milde 
 for|faran naman|nama þin neod and aare . 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan æfre cweðan oðer þeod , 
 hæðen herigeas , " hwær cuman ge|eower halig god gewinnan|geblandan " 
 and we|us þæt|se on|an eage oftust weorpan , 
 þær mannian|mann wese|wesan micel ætgædere . 
 wrecan ongeagn|agen|agan blod esna þinne|þin , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon sarlice ageotan , þær þu geseon|gesawan toh|to ; 
 geong|gangan for|faran þu|þe|ðe gnornendra care 
 þær|se þu|þe|se on|an feter fæstan|fæst wær . 
 æfter ðines earm æðele mægene 
 gegangan|gegang þu|þa|se deaða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn þu|þe|se hi|heo demað nu . 
 gyldan nu gramhydigum , swa hi|heo geearnedan , 
 on|an sceotan|sceat hira|hi seofonfeald wracu , 
 forðam hi|heo edwit on|an þu|þe|se ealle|eall|eal habban . 
 we þu|þin folc wærun and fæle|feolan sceap 
 eowdes þin ; we þu|þe|ðe andettað , 
 and þu|þe|se toh|to weorold wuldur sæcgeað 
 and þu|þe|se on|an weorold weorold word heriað . ## þu þu|þe|se israela æðele cynn 
 reccest and rædan , þu nu recen behealdan , 
 þu þu|þe|ðe ioseph swa sceap grama|gram wiðlæddest . 
 þu þu|þe|ðe self nu sittan ofer cherubin , 
 æteow for|faran effraim eacan|eac mannasse 
 and beniamin , nu we biddað þu|þe|se . 
 awece þin miht|meaht|magan and mid wuldor cuman , 
 and we|us hal don heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 gehweorfan we|us , mægena god , and we|us milde æteow 
 þinne|þin andwlitan|andwlita ; ealle|eall|eal we beoð hal . 
 eala þu , mægena god , mære|mæran drihten , 
 hu lange|lang yrsast þu on|an þin esnes gebed gewinnan|geblandan 
 tyhtan we|us and fedan tear hlaf , 
 and we|us drincan gefan deorc tear 
 mannian|mann gehwylc on|an gemetan|gemet riht . 
 þu we|us asettan on|an sarcwide 
 ure|ur neahmannum ; nu we cunnion , 
 hu we|us mid fraceðum fynd bysmriað . 
 gehweorfan we|us , mægena god , and we|us milde æteow 
 þinne|þin andwlitan|andwlita ; ealle|eall|eal we beoð hal . 
 þu of ægyptum ut alædan 
 wræstne wingeard , weorpan þeon|þeodan|þeod 
 and se ilca þær eft asettan . 
 þu him|hi|he wegan|weg beforan wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan riht , 
 and hit|his|he wyrttruma|wyrtruma wræstne settan , 
 þanan eorþ|eorðe wearð eall|eal gefyllan|fyllan . 
 hit|his|he se brad scua beorg þeссean|þeссan|þeccan , 
 and hit|his|he tan astigun god cedderbeam . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se telga þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he of hlidað , 
 þu æt|etan sæstreamas sealtan|sealt gebræddest , 
 and hi|heo toh|to flod forþ|forð aweaxað . 
 forhwan þu toweorpan weallfæsten hit|his|he gewinnan|geblandan 
 wealdeð hit|his|he winbyrig eall|eal þæt|se on|an weсgan|wegan|weg færð . 
 he utan of wudu|wudian eoferas wrotað , 
 and wilde deor westað and frettað . 
 gehweorfan nu , mægena god , milde and spedig 
 þin ansyn ufan of heofenum ; 
 gewitan and beseon wingeard þes , 
 þæt|se he mid rihte|rihtan|riht ræde|rædan|ræd gangan|gang , 
 se þin seon|seo|se swiðre settan æt|etan frymþ , 
 and ofer mann sunu , þu|þe|se þu hit|his|he miht|meaht|magan ær 
 under þu|þe|ðe getrymedest , tires wealdend . 
 fyr onbærneð , folm þurhdelfeð ; 
 fram ansyn egsan ðines 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se on|an ealdor|eald yfele|yfel forweorðað . 
 seon þu|þin seon|seo|se swiðre hand ofer soð wer 
 and ofer mann sunu ; þu hit|his|he miht|meaht þu|þe|ðe 
 geagnadest , ealle|eall|eal getrymedest , 
 weoruda drihten ; nesan|neh|ne gewitað we fram þu|þe|ðe . 
 acan|ac þu we|us wel cwician|cwic , wealdend mihtig ; 
 we naman|nama þinne|þin neod cigeað . 
 gehweorfan we|us , mægena ## gif þu , israhel , wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wylt ellen gehyran . 
 gif þu , israhel , me|ic an gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 nesan|neh|ne byð god on|an þu|þe|se niwe metan|gemetan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu fremede god self gebiddest . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh þu|þin god , þu|þe|ðe gear þu|þe|se 
 of ægypta eorþe|eorþ alædan . 
 ontynan þinne|þin muð and ic he tela fyllu|fyllan ; 
 nele min|ic folc min stefn æfre gehyran , 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic israhel behealdan hold mod . 
 acan|ac hi|heo lifian hettan|het|hedan|hatan lust heorte 
 swa him|hi|he leofust wesan|seon|beon , leode|leodan|leod þeod , 
 æfter hira|hi willum wynn micel . 
 þær min|ic ongeagn|agen|agan folc , israhela cynn , 
 me|ic mid gehygd hyran cuðan , 
 oþþe|oððe on|an weg min woldan gangan , 
 þonne|se ic hira|hi fynd fyllan|fyld|fylan and hynde , 
 and þæt|se mycle mægen|magan min hand 
 hira|hi|heore ehtendas ealle|eall|eal forniman . 
 him|hi|he fynd god fæcne leogað ; 
 byð hira|hi yfele|yfel tidan|tid awa toh|to feorh . 
 he hi|heo fedan mid fætt lynde , 
 hwæte and hunige , þæt|se him|hi|he halig god 
 sellan of stane|stan , oþþæt hi|heo sæd|secgan wesan|seon|beon . ## god mihtig standan god on|an gemange , 
 and he hi|heo on|an midle mægene tosceadeð . 
 hu lange|lang deman ge dom unriht , 
 and ge onfoð ansyn synnwyrcendra gewinnan|geblandan 
 demað steopcildum dom soð 
 and eadmedum eacan|eac þæt|se self , 
 wædla and ðearfum wel soðfæstum . 
 ge of firenfull fæcne hand 
 þearfa and wædlan þriste alysað . 
 nesan|neh|ne ongeatan hi|heo nesan|neh|ne gear wistan , 
 acan|ac hi|heo on|an ðystrum þrage eodan ; 
 ealle|eall|eal abeofedan eorþ|eorðe staþelas . 
 ic ærest|ær cweðan : " ge synd uppe god , 
 ealle|eall|eal uphea , and æðele birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 ge þonne|se sweltað samod mid mann , 
 swa ealdormann on|an gefealleð . " 
 arisan drihten , nu ! deman eorðware , 
 forðam þu wesan|seon erfeweard eall|eal ðeoda . ## hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|is þu|þe|se gelic , ece drihten gewinnan|geblandan 
 nesan|neh|ne swigian|swige þu , nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|se silf|self bewere . 
 forðam þin feond fæcne forwurdan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe fæstan|fæst ær feodan , drihten , 
 and hira|hi|heore heafod wiþ|wið þu|þe|se hofe swiðe|swiðan . 
 hi|heo on|an þin folc him|hi|he facengeswipere 
 syredan and feredan , and toh|to swican hogedon , 
 and ehtunga ealle|eall|eal habban , 
 hu hi|heo þin halig|halga|haleg heran|her yfeladan . 
 cwædan cuðlice : " wutun cuman|cuma ealle|eall|eal 
 and hi|heo towyrpan geond werþeoda , 
 þæt|se nesan|neh|ne su gemyndig mannian|mann ænig , 
 hu israhela naman|nama ænig nemnan . " 
 forðam hi|heo on|an þeссean|þeссan|þeccan|geþeaht ealle|eall|eal ymbsætan , 
 and gewitnes wiþ|wið þu|þe|se wise|wis gesettan . 
 selegesceotu synd onsægd in idumea 
 and ismæhelita , eacan|eac synt moabes , 
 ammon and ammalech , agareni , 
 swilce gebal and gram manig|manian 
 fremde þeod mid eardiend folc on|an tyrum . 
 cuman samod mid ðam|se swilce assur ; 
 ealle|eall|eal on|an weg æghwær syndon 
 on|an leodstefn loðes bearn . 
 don him|hi|he nu swa þu dydan|don dæg|dah|dag madiane 
 and sisare , swilce iabin ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se niman ændor wylle 
 and cisone clæne hlimme|hlimman ; 
 wurdan þu|þa|se earm eorþe|eorþ toh|to meohxe . 
 settan hira|hi|heore ealdormann swa þu oreb dydan|don , 
 zeb and zebee and salmanaa , 
 and hira|hi|heore ealdor eall|eal swilce ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se on|an on|an ær gecweþan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo halignes god heran|her gesettan . 
 settan hi|heo nu , min|ic god , samod anlice 
 swa se wægnes hweol oþþe|oððe wind healm , 
 and swa færincga fyr wudu byrneð , 
 oððe swa lig freteð lungre morhæð , 
 swa þu hi|heo on|an yrre|irre ehtan and drefan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an hrernesse hræþ forweorðað . 
 gedon þæt|se hira|hi ansyn awa sceamige , 
 þonne|se hi|heo naman|nama þinne|þin neod seceað . 
 ealle|eall|eal beoð georette , eacan|eac gescende , 
 and on|an weoruldlife weorþað gedrefan , 
 þonne|se hi|heo naman|nama þinne|þin neod seceað . 
 þu ana|an wesan|seon ofer ealle|eall|eal heah 
 eorðbuende , ece drihten . ## synd me|ic wiс|wican|wic þin weorðe and leof , 
 mægena drihten ; wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic on|an mod se 
 willum habban , þet ic him|hi|he wunude onn . 
 heorte min|ic and flæsc hyhtað georne|geornan|georn 
 on|an se lifian leof drihten ; 
 him|hi|he eacan|eac spedlice spearuwa hus begyteð , 
 and tidlice turtle nistlað , 
 þær hio afedeð fugelas geong|gangan . 
 wærun wigbedu þu|þin , weoruda drihten ; 
 þu wesan|seon drihten min|ic and deore|deor cynincg . 
 eadig weorðað , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se eardiað 
 on|an þin hus , halig drihten , 
 and þu|þe|se on|an weorold weorold , wealdend , heriað . 
 þæt|se byð eadig wer , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he oðer 
 fultuman|fultum nesan|neh|ne seceð nymþe fæle god , 
 and þæt|se on|an heorte hige healdeð fæstan|fæst , 
 geseteð him|hi|he þæt|se self on|an ðisse sarig denu|dene , 
 þær hi|heo tear teonan cnyssað 
 on|an þæm|þam|se sylfan stede þu|þe|se þu him|hi|he settan heran|her . 
 bringan|brengan him|hi|he bletsunge se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he beorht æ 
 soð settan ; siððan eodan 
 of mægene on|an mægen|magan ; þær wesan|seon|beon miht sawan|geseon|gesawan 
 on|an sionbeorge soþes|soð drihten . 
 gehyran min|ic gebed , halig drihten , 
 þu wesan|seon mære|mæran god , milde eare , 
 and iacobes god se mære . 
 beseon drihten nu , scyldend usser ; 
 oncnaw onsyne cristes þin . 
 god|betera wesan|seon|is micel toh|to gebidanne 
 an dæg mid þu|þe|se þonne|se oðera 
 on|an þeodstefnum þusend mæl . 
 ic me|ic se wyrce and wel ceose , 
 þæt|se ic hean|heah gangan|gang on|an hus god , 
 þonne|se ic on|an fyrenfulra folc eardian . 
 forðam god lufað geornian eall|eal , 
 þæt|se munan|mann|man seon mildheort mod soþfæst , 
 þonne|se him|hi|he god gyfeð gyfe and wuldur . 
 nele god æfre god bedælan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe heorte gehygd healdað clæne ; 
 þæt|se bið eadig mann , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he ecean god 
 toh|to mundbyrde miht gestreoneð . ## þu bletsadest , bliðe drihten , 
 folde fæle|feolan , and afyrdest eacan|eac 
 of iacobe þu|þa|se grama|gram hæftned . 
 unriht þu forlætan eall|eal þin folc , 
 and hira|hi|heore fyren fæstan|fæst hæle|hælan|helan . 
 eall|eal þu þu|þin yrre|irre eðe gedon , 
 na þu ure|ur gyltas egsan gewrecan . 
 gehweorfan we|us hraðe , hælend drihten , 
 and þu|þin yrre|irre fram we|us eacan|eac oncyrre , 
 þæt|se þu we|us nesan|neh|ne weorðe wrað on|an mod . 
 nesan|neh|ne wrecan þu þu|þin yrre|irre wrað mod 
 of cynn on|an cynn and on|an cneoris ; 
 gecyr we|us georne|geornan|georn toh|to þu|þe|ðe , crist ælmihtig , 
 and þin folc on|an þu|þe|ðe gefeon swiðe|swiðan . 
 æteow we|us milde mod , mihtig drihten , 
 and we|us þin hæle|hælan|helan syl|sellan heran|her toh|to geniht . 
 siððan ic gehyran , hwæt#2 me|ic halig god 
 on|an minum|min modsefa mælan willan ; 
 sybbe he hit|his|he folc seceð geornian , 
 and swiðust toh|to þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se he seceað . 
 hwæðere he wesan|seon|is mid soð forswiðe neah 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se egsan hit|his|he ellen healdað , 
 hæleð mid hyldo , and him|hi|he heran|her syleð 
 ure|ur eorþ|eorðe æðele wuldor|seolh|bearm . 
 him|hi|he gangað ongeagn gleaw cræft , 
 mildheortness|mildheortnes mod and miht|meaht|magan soð , 
 and he sybbe lufu swilce clyppeð . 
 up of eorþ|eorðe cuman æþelian soð , 
 beseon soðfæstnes samod of heofenum . 
 syleð we|us fremsum god fæger drihten , 
 þonne|se we|us eorþ|eorðe syleð æðele wæstm . 
 he soðfæstnes simble foregangeð 
 and on|an wegan|weg setteð wise|wis gang . ## ahyld me|ic þu|þin eare|ear , halig drihten ; 
 forðam ic wesan|seon|eoh wædla , þu me|ic wel gehyran , 
 and ic self wesan|seon|eoh sorhfull þearfian|þearfa . 
 gehealdan min sawol|sawel , forðam ic halig wesan|seon|eoh ; 
 hælan|helan þinne|þin scealc , forðam ic þu|þe|ðe hihte toh|to . 
 miltsian|milts me|ic drihten , þonne|se ic mægene toh|to þu|þe|ðe 
 þurh eall|eal dæg ellen cleopade ; 
 don þin scealces sawol|sawel bliðe , 
 forðam ic hi|heo toh|to þu|þe|ðe hebban genehhige . 
 forðam þu wesan|seon wynsum , wealdend drihten ; 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin milde mod micel and genihtsum 
 eall|eal þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se þu|þe|se ellen cigeað . 
 þu mid eare onfon , ece drihten , 
 min|ic ongeagn|agen|agan gebed , and eacan|eac behealdan , 
 hu ic stefn toh|to þu|þe|ðe stundum cleopian . 
 þonne|se me|ic on|an dæge|dæg deorc earfoðe 
 carelice cnyssedan , þonne|se ic cleopian toh|to þu|þe|ðe ; 
 forðam þu me|ic gehyrdan|gehyran hold mod . 
 nesan þu|þe|se god ænig on|an gumrice 
 ahwær efne|efnan|efen gelic , ece drihten , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|ðe weorc magan wyrcean anlic . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan wer cneoris , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se weorðiað , wuldor aldor , 
 and naman|nama drihten neod cigeað . 
 forðam þu wesan|seon se mycla mihtig drihten , 
 þu|þe|se wundor miht wyrcean ana|an . 
 gelædan , drihten , me|ic on|an þinne|þin leof wegan|weg , 
 and ic on|an þin soð siððan gancge . 
 heorte min|ic ahlyhheð , þonne|se ic ðinne halig|halga|haleg naman|nama 
 forhtian me|ic on|an ferhðe , forþ|forð andettan 
 mid eall|eal heorte hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , þæt|se þu wesan|seon , halig god , 
 nemnan drihten , and we naman|nama þinne|þin 
 on|an ecnes wifcynn|hosp|flet|a weorðien . 
 ys þu|þin mildheortnes micel ofer me|ic , drihten , 
 and þu min sawol|sawel swilce alysan 
 of helwarena hinderþeostrum . 
 god min|ic se libban|leof , gramhydige me|ic 
 mid unriht oft onginnað , 
 and gesamnincge swiðmihtigra 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan min sawol|sawel swyþ|swyðe|swiðe geneahhe ; 
 nesan|neh|ne doð him|hi|he for|faran awiht egsan drihten . 
 hwæt#2 , þu wesan|seon , min|ic drihten god , dæd mildheort , 
 þenden geðyldig , þearle soþfæst . 
 beseon nu on|an me|ic , and me|ic siððan weorð 
 milde on|an mod , mihtig drihten ; 
 geteon hror magan hysse þin ; 
 don þinne|þin þeowan|þeow sunu , drihten , hal . 
 don gedefe mid me|ic , drihten , tacn|tacen|tacan , 
 and þæt|se god ongitan , þu|þa|se me|ic georne|geornan|georn ær 
 fæstan|fæst feodan , habban forþ|forð sceame . 
 forðam þu me|ic wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon fultuman|fultum fæstan|fæst , drihten , 
 and me|ic frefran , frea ælmihtig . ## healdað hit|his|he staðelas halig beorg ; 
 lufude sione duru simble drihten 
 ofer iacobes wiс|wican|wic goode ealle|eall|eal . 
 wærun wuldurlice wiþ|wið þu|þe|se wel acweðene , 
 þæt|se þu seon cymast ceaster drihten ; 
 eacan|eac ic gemyndig þu|þa|se mære|mæran raab 
 and babilonis begea gehwæðeres . 
 efne|efnan|efen fremde cynn foran of tyrum , 
 folc sigelwara naman|nama þær fæst eard . 
 modor sion " munan|mann|man " cweðan ærest|ær , 
 and hire|heo mære|mæran gewearð mann on|an innan , 
 and he hi|heo þu|þa|se hehstan heran|her staðelade . 
 drihten þæt|se on|an gewrit dema sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se frumsprecend folc wesan|seon|beon , 
 eall|eal swilce , þu|þe|se hire|heo on|an wesan|seon|beon . 
 swa ure|ur eall|eal bliss eardhæbbendra 
 on|an an þu|þe|se ece standeð . ## þu wesan|seon me|ic , drihten god , dyre hælend ; 
 ic on|an dæge|dæg toh|to þu|þe|ðe dygle cleopian , 
 and on|an niht|neaht for|faran þu|þe|se neod swilce . 
 gangan|gang min|ic ingebed on|an þu|þin gleaw gesiht ; 
 ahyld eare|ear þu|þin and gehyran min|ic gebed . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is sawel min|ic sar and yfel 
 fæstan|fæst gefyllan|fyllan ; wesan|seon|is min|ic feorh swilce 
 toh|to helldore hylded geneahhe . 
 wenað se sum , þæt|se ic on|an wrað seaþ 
 mid fyrenwyrhtum fealle|feallan sculan ; 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh mann gelic mære|mæran weorþan|geweorþan , 
 þu|þe|se mid dead bið betweoh deaðe freoh|freogan|freo . 
 swa gewundade wrað slæpan|slæp 
 syn þonne|se geworpene on|an wid hlæw , 
 þær hira|hi gymynde mann nesan|neh|ne wænan , 
 swa hi|heo syn fram þinne|þin hand hean|heah adrifene . 
 hi|heo me|ic asettan on|an seaþ hinder , 
 þær wesan|seon|beon deorc þeostru and deaþ scua . 
 þær me|ic wesan|seon|beon yrre|irre þu|þin on|an acyþed , 
 and þu me|ic oferhige on|an ealle|eall|eal gelædan . 
 feor þu me|ic dydan|don freond cuþ|cunnan ; 
 settan me|ic simble , þær me|ic unswæsost wesan|seon|beon ; 
 eam|ea ic swære sellan|gesellan|geseald , þær ic ut swican|swica nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan . 
 eage me|ic syndon unhal nu 
 weorþan|geweorþan for|faran wædle ; ic me|ic toh|to wuldor god 
 þurh eall|eal dæg ellen clypige 
 and min hand toh|to þu|þe|se hebban and ðenige . 
 nesan|neh|ne huru wundur wyrceað dead , 
 oþþe|oððe hi|heo list læceas weccean 
 and hi|heo andettan þu|þe|se ealle|eall|eal siððan . 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an ðeostrum nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þances gehygd 
 ænig wislicu wundur oncnawan , 
 oððe þu|þin soðfæstnes seon on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna 
 þu|þe|se ofergytnes on|an eardian . 
 cweþan|cweðan þu , oncnawan hi|heo wundor þin 
 on|an ðam|se dimm deorc ðystrum , 
 oððe þin rihtwisnes recen gemeteð 
 on|an ofergyttolnesse mannian|mann ænig gewinnan|geblandan 
 ic me|ic toh|to þu|þe|ðe , ece drihten , 
 mid modgehygd mægene clypade , 
 and min|ic gebed morgen gehwylc 
 for|faran silf|self þu|þe|se soþfæst becuman . 
 forhwan þu min|ic gebed æfre willan , 
 soð god , wiðsacan , oððe þinne|þin gesiht me|ic 
 on|an þes ealdor|eald æfre wyrnan gewinnan|geblandan 
 wædla ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an gewinnan|gewinn , wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan swa on|an geoguþ ; 
 ahebban ic wesan|seon|beon and gehyned , hwæðere næs|nesan gescended . 
 oft me|ic þin yrre egsian geðeowde , 
 and me|ic broga þu|þin biter gedrefan . 
 hi|heo me|ic eall|eal dæg utan ymbsealdan , 
 swa wæterflod wesan|seon|beon ætsomne . 
 þu me|ic afyrdest frynd þu|þa|se nihsta 
 and min cuðe eacan|eac cwic geyrmdest . ## mildheortness|mildheortnes þin , mihtig drihten , 
 ic on|an ecnes awa singan ; 
 fram cynn on|an cynn and on|an cneoris 
 ic þin soðfæstnesse secg geneahhe 
 on|an minum|min muþ mannian|mann cynn . 
 forðam þu|þa|se þu cweþan|cweðan cuðe word , 
 þæt|se on|an ecnes awa wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 þu|þin milde mod micel getimbrad 
 heah on|an heofenum hæleða bearn 
 and þu|þin soðfestnes simble gearwad . 
 ic minum|min gecorenum cuðe gesette|gesettan , 
 hu min|ic gewitnes willan gangan ; 
 ic dauide dyrum esne 
 on|an aðsware ær benemnan , 
 þæt|se ic hit|his|he cynn and cneowmagum 
 on|an ecnes wifcynn|hosp|flet|a gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan 
 ful sefte seld , þæt|se hi|heo sittan on|an . 
 heofenas andettað , halig drihten , 
 hu wundor þu|þin wræclic standeð , 
 and þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg eacan|eac hergeað on|an cyricean 
 þin soðfæstnesse , secgeað geneahhige . 
 nesan under wolcn|wolcen , weoroda drihten , 
 ænig anlic , nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|ðe ænig byð 
 betweoh god bearn git geliс . 
 þu beon gewuldrad god , þær bið wis geðeaht 
 and halig heah gemetincg , 
 micel and egeslic ofer eall|eal mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe on|an ymbhwyrfte ahwær syndon . 
 þu wesan|seon mægena god , mihtig drihten ; 
 nesan þu|þe|se eall|eal gelic ahwær on|an sped , 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin soðfæstnes simble æghwær . 
 þu wid sæ wealdest miht ; 
 þu hit|his|he yþ miht ana|an gesteoran , 
 þonne hi|heo on|an wegan windan|wind onhrereð . 
 þu miht oferhydige eaðe mid wund|windan 
 hean|heah gehnægean ; hafian|habban þu heah mægen|magan 
 þin earm spedan|sped wiþ|wið ealle|eall|eal fynd . 
 heofon þu wealdest , hruse swilce ; 
 eorþ|eorðe ymbehwyrft eall|eal þu gesettan . 
 þu norðdæl and sæ niode gesceope , 
 tabor etan|et hermon on|an naman|nama þin ; 
 hi|heo mid strencgðe eacan|eac upp ahebbað 
 þinne|þin swiþra earm swilce , drihten . 
 wese|wesan heah miht|meaht|magan hand þinne|þin 
 ahebban ofer hæleðas ; halig seon|seo|se swyðre wesan|seon|is , 
 þin setl don|dom soð gegearwian|gearwian . 
 mildheortnes and soðfæstnes mægene forgangað 
 þinne|þin andwlitan|andwlita ; þæt|se bið eadig folc 
 þu|þe|se сinan|cunnan naman|nama ðinne neod herigean . 
 þu|þa|se on|an þin sunnan|leoht lifigeað and gangað 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he ansyn þu|þin ær onlihtan , 
 and on|an naman|nama þin neod swilce 
 beoð eall|eal dæg eacan|eac on|an bliss|blis 
 and þin soðfæstnesse simble æghwær . 
 forðam þu hira|hi|heore mægenes wesan|seon mærost wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 and we þin weldædum wurdan ahafene . 
 we|us on|an nimeð ece drihten 
 and israhela cyning eacan|eac se halig|halgian|halga|haleg . 
 þonne|se þu ofer ealle|eall|eal undearnunga 
 þin birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn sprecest and beald cwysan : 
 " ic me|ic on|an þes folc fultuman|fultum settan 
 ofermihtigne , se ic me|ic ær geceosan . 
 ic me|ic deoren|deore scealc dauid gemetan 
 and he halig elh|ele hand smyrede . 
 heo him|hi|he fultumeð and min|ic fæle|feolan earm , 
 and he mid mycle mægene geswyðeð . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan him|hi|he ænig facen feond æteglan , 
 nesan|neh|ne unriht birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ænig sceððan . 
 of hit|his|he ansyn ealle|eall|eal ic aceorfe , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he feond fæcne syndon , 
 and hit|his|he ehtendas ealle|eall|eal geflyme . 
 he soðfæstnes min|ic samod ætgædere 
 and mildheortnes min|ic mægene healdeð , 
 and on|an naman|nama minum|min neod swilce 
 hit|his|he horn bið ahebban , hean|heah on|an miht . 
 and ic hit|his|he swiðran hand settan þence , 
 þæt|se he sæstreamum siððan wealdan|weald . 
 he me|ic him|hi|he toh|to fæle fæder gecygde : 
 'wæs me|ic andfencge , god , ece hælu .' 
 and ic þonne|se frumbearn forþ|forð asettan 
 ofer eorðcyningas eall|eal heahstne . 
 ic him|hi|he toh|to wid feorh willan gehealdan 
 min|ic milde mod and him|hi|he miht syllan , 
 min gewitnes weorðe and getreowe . 
 ic toh|to wid feorh wyrce siððan 
 þu|þin heahsetl hror and weorðlic 
 swa heofon dæg|dah|dag heran|her mid mann . 
 gif min birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn nellað min bebod efnan|efen 
 nesan|neh|ne min dom dæd healdan|heald , 
 gif hi|heo min rihtwisnes fracoðe gewemmað 
 and hi|heo min bebod bliðe nesan|neh|ne healdað , 
 þonne|se ic hira|hi|heore unriht gewrecan egsan gyrdan|gyrd 
 and hira|hi synn swinglum forgylde . 
 nesan|neh|ne ic him|hi|he mildheortness|mildheortnes min willan 
 fæger afyrran , acan|ac him|hi|he forþ|forð swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 min soðfæstnesse syllan þence . 
 ic æne swerian að on|an halig|halga|haleg , 
 þæt|se ic dauide dæd nesan|neh|ne leogan , 
 þæt|se on|an ecnes hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan cynn 
 wunað on|an wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic ; bið him|hi|he weorðlic setl 
 on|an minre|min gesiht sunne|sunnan|sunna anlic 
 and swa mona magan on|an heofenum , 
 þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is ece gewita æhwær getreowe . " 
 þu þonne|se wiðsoce soþ criste 
 and he forhogodest , hwil yldan 
 and awendan fram him|hi|he gewitnes 
 esnes þin ; ealle|eall|eal gewemman 
 hit|his|he halignes heran|her on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu hit|his|he weall wid todælan , 
 toweorpan fæsten|fæstan hit|his|he for|faran folcegsan . 
 he þu|þa|se toweorpan wegferende , 
 and he on|an edwit wearð ymbsittendum . 
 hand þu ahebban heah ehtendra , 
 gebrohtest hit|his|he feond fæcne on|an bliss|blis . 
 fultuman|fultum þu him|hi|he afyrdest fah sweord , 
 nafað æt|etan gefeohtan|gefeoht fæle helpend . 
 þu he of clænnesse clæne alysan , 
 setl hit|his|he gesettan sorglic on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 þu hit|his|he dagena tidan|tid deorc gescyrtest 
 and mid sarlic sceame onmettest . 
 willan þu hu lange|lang , wealdend drihten , 
 yrre|irre þu|þin acyðan swa onælan fyr gewinnan|geblandan 
 gemunan , mære|mæran god , hwæt#2 seon min|ic lytel spedan|sped ; 
 nesan|neh|ne huru þu mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn on|an middangeard 
 toh|to idelnes æfre gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . 
 hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|is mannian|mann , þæt|se feorh neotan , 
 and hwæþere on|an ende deað nesan|neh|ne gesceawige ; 
 oððe hwylc|hwilc mannian|mann wesan|seon|is , þæt|se hit|his|he agen 
 fram hell|hel loc sawol|sawel generian gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwær wesan|seon|is seon|seo|se eald nu , ece drihten , 
 micel mildheortness , þu|þe|se þu mancynn 
 and dauide deop aþ 
 þurh þin sylfes soð benemnan gewinnan|geblandan 
 gemunan þinne|þin esna edwitspræce , 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he fracuðlice fremde þeon|þeodan|þeod 
 utan ætywað , oðer mægþ . 
 cweþað him|hi|he þæt|se edwit , ece drihten , 
 feond þin , fæstan|fæst ætwitað 
 and þæt|se þin criste becweþað swiðe|swiðan . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a su gebletsad ece drihten 
 toh|to wid feorh . wese|wesan swa , wese|wesan swa ! ## þu wesan|seon friðstol we|us fæstan|fæst , drihten , 
 of cynn on|an cynn and on|an cneoris . 
 ærðon munt gesceaft ofer middangeard 
 oððe ymbhwyrft eorþ|eorðe wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 oþþe|oððe world wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , þu wesan|seon , wuldor god . 
 nesan|neh|ne ahwyrf þu fram mænn heah eadmedu ; 
 and þu cuðlice cweþan|cweðan self : 
 " ic mannian|mann bearn mod onwendan . " 
 for|faran þin eage , ece drihten , 
 þusend wintra|winter bið þon|se anlicast , 
 swa geostran dæg gegan|gan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ; 
 and swa hi|heo on|an niht|neaht hyrdnesse neod begangað , 
 nesan|neh|ne hira|hi|heore winterrim for|faran wiht nesan|neh|ne doð . 
 morgen gewiteð swa gemolsnad wyrt|wyrdan ; 
 oðer morgene eft gebloweð 
 and geefneð swa , oþþæt æfen cymeð , 
 þonne|se forwisnað , weorðeð toh|to dust . 
 forðam we on|an þin yrre|irre ealle|eall|eal forweorþan , 
 wesan|seon|beon on|an þin hathige heard gedrefan . 
 þu ure|ur unriht eall|eal asettan , 
 þær þu self toh|to eage locadest , 
 and ure|ur weorold þu eacan|eac gestaðelodest 
 on|an alihtincge andwlitan|andwlita þin . 
 forðam þu|þe|ðe ure|ur dæg|dah|dag ealle|eall|eal geteorudun , 
 and we on|an þin yrre|irre synt swiðe|swiðan gewæhte . 
 wær anlicast ure|ur winter 
 geongewifran , þonne|se hio geornian bið , 
 þæt|se heo afære fleoge|fleogan on|an nette ; 
 beoð ure|ur geardagas gnornscendende , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se hira|hi|heore hundred|1000 seon|seo|se samod ætgædere . 
 gif on|an mihtig mann geweorðeð , 
 þæt|se hi|heo hundehtatig yld gebidan|bidan , 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se þær ofer beoð æfre getellan 
 wintra|winter on|an weorold , þu|þa|se beoð gewinnan|gewinn and sar . 
 we|us manðwærnes becuman micel ofer ealle|eall|eal 
 and we on|an þæm|þam|se gefea forht gewurdan . 
 hwæt|hwa se soð me|ic cunnan|cann sæcgean ænig , 
 hu þin yrre egsian standeð 
 and seon|seo|se micel miht gewinnan|geblandan nesan þæt|se mann ænig 
 þu|þe|se þu|þa|se ariman rihte|rihtan|riht cunnan . 
 don we|us þu|þa|se þin swiðran hand , drihten , cuðe , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se on|an snytrum syn swiðe getyde , 
 and þu|þa|se hira|hi|heore heorte healdað clæne . 
 gehweorfan we|us hwæthwiga , halig drihten ; 
 wesan þin scealcum wel eaðbede . 
 we synd gefyllan fæger on|an mergenne 
 þinne|þin mildheortness|mildheortnes ; se we on|an mod nu 
 habbað ealle|eall|eal dæg|dah|dag æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele bliss|blis . 
 we gefeoð swilce for|faran þon|se fæger dæg|dah|dag , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se þu we|us toh|to eadmedum ealle|eall|eal gebrohtest , 
 and for|faran ðam|se gear þu|þe|se we on|an geseon yfel feala . 
 beseon on|an þin scealcas swæs eage 
 and on|an þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan weorc , ece drihten , 
 and hira|hi|heore birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gerec bliðe mod . 
 wese|wesan we|us beorhtnes ofer bliðan drihten , 
 ure|ur se god god georne|geornan|georn ofer ealle|eall|eal ; 
 gerec ure|ur handgeweorc heah ofer usic . ## me|ic eardað æt|etan æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele fultuman|fultum 
 se hehstan heofonrices weard , 
 þu|þe|se me|ic æt|etan wunað awa toh|to feorh . 
 ic toh|to drihten cweðan : " þu me|ic dyre wesan|seon 
 fæle|feolan fultuman|fultum ; habban ic freond on|an him|hi|he , 
 min|ic se god god , and ic on|an þu|þe|ðe geare|gear hycge . " 
 forðam he me|ic alysan of laðum grin , 
 hunta unholdum , hearma word . 
 he me|ic mid hit|his|he gesculdrum sceadan|scead beþeссan|beþeccan ; 
 forðam ic under fiðrum fæle|feolan hihte . 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic soðfæstnes min|ic scylde wiþ|wið feond , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu þu|þe|se nihtegsan nede ondrædan . 
 nesan|neh|ne forhtast þu þu|þe|ðe on|an dæge|dæg flan|fla on|an lyft , 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se þurhgangan gar on|an ðeostrum , 
 oððe on|an midd dæg mære|mæran deoful . 
 fealleð þu|þe|se on|an þu|þa|se winestra wergra þusend , 
 and eacan|eac geteledra tynan|tin þusend 
 on|an þin þu|þa|se swiðran , and þu|þe|se nesan|neh|ne sceaðeð ænig . 
 hwæðere þu se eage eall|eal sceawadest , 
 gesege fyrenfulra frecne|frecen|frec wite|witan . 
 þu me|ic wesan|seon se hehsta hyht , halig drihten ; 
 þu me|ic friðstol on|an þu|þe|ðe fæst settan . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þu|þe|se ænig yfel egle|eglan weorðan , 
 nesan|neh|ne heard sweopu hus þin 
 on|an neahwest nahwær sceþþan . 
 forðam he hit|his|he engel bebeodan , þæt|se hi|heo mid earm þu|þe|se 
 on|an hira|hi|heore hand heoldan georne|geornan|georn , 
 þæt|se þu wilwega wealdan motan . 
 and þu|þe|se on|an folm feredan swilce , 
 þu|þe|se læs|lesan þu fræcne on|an stan fote spurnan|spornan . 
 þu ofer aspide miht eaðe gangan , 
 and beald nu basiliscan tredan , 
 and leon|leo and draca list gebygean . 
 forðam he hyht toh|to me|ic , ic he hraðe lysan , 
 niode he scylde , nu he cuðe naman|nama min . 
 he cigan me|ic , and ic he cuðlice 
 hold gehyrdan|gehyran , and he hraðe siððan 
 of earfoþe ut alysan . 
 ic he generian and hit|his|he naman|nama swilce 
 gewuldrian geond ealle|eall|eal werðeoda , 
 and him|hi|he lifdagas lange|lang syll , 
 swilce him|hi|he min hælu hold ætywe . ## god wesan|seon|is , þæt|se munan|mann|man drihten gear andettan 
 and neodlice hit|his|he naman|nama asinge , 
 se heahestan hæleða cynn|cyn ; 
 and þonne|se on|an morgene mægene sæcge , 
 hu he milde wearð mannian|mann cynn , 
 and hit|his|he soð sæcge niht . 
 hwæt#2 , ic on|an tynan|tin streng teon|geteon habban , 
 hu ic þu|þe|se on|an psalterio singan miht|meaht|magan 
 oððe þu|þe|se mid hearpe hlystan cweme|cweman , 
 forðam þu me|ic on|an þin weorc wise|wis lufadest ; 
 hihte ic toh|to þinne|þin hand halig|halga|haleg dæd . 
 hu micel synt þin mægenweorc , mihtig drihten ; 
 wærun þin geðancas þearle deop . 
 wonhydig wer se wiht nesan|neh|ne cunnan|cann , 
 nesan|neh|ne se andgit hafað ænig dysig . 
 þonne|se forþ|forð cumað fyrenfulra ðreat , 
 heap synnig hige onlic ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þær ætywað , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe unriht 
 on|an weoruldlife worhtan geornian , 
 þæt|se hi|heo forwordene weorðen siððan 
 on|an weorold weorold and toh|to wid feorh . 
 þu on|an ecnes awa , drihten , 
 heahesta beon , heofonrices weard . 
 þi|se nu þin feond fæcne , drihten , 
 on|an eorðwege ealle|eall|eal forweorþað , 
 and weorðað towrecene wid ealle|eall|eal , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se unriht æror worhtan . 
 þonne|se anhorn eall|eal gelicost , 
 min|ic horn weorðeð ahebban swiðe|swiðan 
 and min ieldo beoð æghwær genihtsum . 
 and eage þu|þin eacan|eac sceawian , 
 hwær fynd min fæcne wær , 
 and min wergend wrað gehyrdan|gehyran 
 efne|efnan|efen þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan eare|ear swilce . 
 se soðfæsta samed anlicast 
 beorht on|an blæd bloweð swa palma , 
 and swa libanes beorgan lideð and groweð . 
 settað nu georne|geornan|georn on|an god hus , 
 þæt|se ge on|an hit|his|he wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wel geblowan . 
 nu git syndan manig|manian mannian|mann swilce , 
 þu|þe|se hiom ieldo gebidan ær toh|to geniht , 
 and þu|þa|se mid geþyld þenden sægdan , 
 cweþan|cweðan , þæt|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon soþfæst self drihten 
 and he unriht awyht nesan|neh|ne healdan . ## drihten he gegyrwan god strengðu , 
 and he þu|þa|se mid micel mægene begyrdan . 
 drihten rixað , dema usser , 
 and he mid weorðlice wlite|wlitan gegyrwan . 
 and þu|þa|se ymbhwyrft eorþe|eorþ getrymede , 
 swa folde standan fæstan|fæst siððan . 
 gearu wesan|seon|is þu|þin setl , and þu , ece god , 
 ær weorold fruma , wunian butan ende . 
 hofe hira|hi|heore stefn stream , drihten , 
 hofe and hlynsadan hlud rædan|reord 
 fram wæterstefnum wid manig . 
 wræclice syndon wægea gang , 
 þonne|se sæstreamas swiðust flowað ; 
 swa wesan|seon|is wundorlic wealdend usser 
 halig drihten on|an heanessum . 
 þu|þin gewitnes wesan|seon|is weorc geleafsum , 
 and mid soð wesan|seon|is swiðe|swiðan getreowed . 
 hus þin halig gedafenian , 
 drihten usser , and dæg|dah|dag lange|lang . ## þu wesan|seon wracena god , and þu miht wrecan swilce , 
 ana|an gefreogan æghwylс mann . 
 ahebban þu|þe|se on|an ellen , eorþe|eorþ dema , 
 gyldan oferhydigum , swa hi|heo ær gram wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan . 
 hu lange|lang fyrenwyrhtan folde wealdað 
 oþþe|oððe manwyrhtan morðre gylpað gewinnan|geblandan 
 hi|heo oftust sprecað , unnyt sæcgeað 
 and woh meldiað , wyrceað unriht . 
 folc hi|heo þu|þin , drihten , fæcne gehyndan , 
 and yrfe þu|þin eall|eal forcoman . 
 ælþeodig mann , earm wydewan , 
 steopcilda feala stundum acwealdon . 
 sægdan and cwædan , þæt|se nesan|neh|ne geseon|gesawan 
 drihten æfre , dydan|don swa he willan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þæt|se iacobes god ongitan cuðe . 
 onfindað þæt|se and ongeotað þu|þe|se on|an folc nu 
 unwiseste eall|eal syndon ; 
 dysig hwæthwygu deop þæt|se oncnawan . 
 se þu|þe|ðe ærest|ær eald eare wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 hu se oferhleoður æfre weorþan gewinnan|geblandan 
 and him|hi|he eage gesyhð eall|eal sellan 
 and he scearpe nesan|neh|ne mæge|mæg|magan gesceawian gewinnan|geblandan 
 and se þu|þe|se ege healdeð eall|eal þeod , 
 and hit|his|he þrea nesan|neh|ne seon þær for|faran awiht , 
 se þu|þe|se mann læreð micelne|micel wisdom gewinnan|geblandan 
 god ealle|eall|eal cunnan|cann guma geðancas 
 eorðbuendra , forðam hi|heo idel synt . 
 þæt|se bið eadig mann , þu|þe|se þu he , ece god , 
 on|an þinne|þin soð æ self getyhtest 
 and he þeodscipe ðinne læran 
 and him|hi|he yfele|yfel dæg|dah|dag ealle|eall|eal gebeorgest , 
 oðþæt bið frecne|frecen|frec seaþ þæm|þam|se fyrenfullan 
 deop adolfen deorc and ðystre . 
 næfre wiðdrifeð drihten ure|ur 
 hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan folc , nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he yrfe þon|se micel 
 on|an ealdor|eald willan|wil æfre forlætan . 
 hwylc|hwilc þonne|se gena gehwyrfed byð , 
 þæt|se he on|an unriht eft nesan|neh|ne cyrran ; 
 oððe hwylc|hwilc nymeð me|ic , þæt|se ic munan|mann|man fleon|fleo 
 and mid rihtheortum ræde|ræd þence gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwylc|hwilc ariseð mid me|ic , þæt|se ic rihtan|riht fremman 
 and wiþ|wið awyrgedum winnan and standan|stand , 
 þu|þe|se unriht ealle|eall|eal wyrceað gewinnan|geblandan 
 nymðe me|ic drihten , dema usser , 
 gefultumede fæger æt|etan þearf , 
 wenincga min|ic sawel sœ̄сan|seсan|secan hell|hel . 
 gif ic se sægan|seсgan|secgan , þæt|se min|ic sylfes fot 
 ful sarlice asliden wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic mildheortnes mihtig drihten 
 gefultumede , þæt|se ic feorh agan . 
 æfter þære|se menigu min sar 
 þu|þe|se me|ic ær on|an ferhðe fæstan|fæst gestodan , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic þin frofor fæger , drihten , 
 gesibbedan sawol|sawel min . 
 nesan|neh|ne ætfyligeð þu|þe|se ahwær facen nesan|neh|ne unriht ; 
 þu gefæstnian facen sar ; 
 hi|heo soþfæst sneome gehæftað 
 and hira|hi|heore sawol|sawel ofslean þenceað , 
 blod soðfæstra biter ageotan . 
 forðam me|ic wesan|seon|is weorþan|geweorþan wealdend drihten 
 toh|to friðstole fæstan|fæst and gestaðelad ; 
 wesan|seon|is me|ic fultuman|fultum hit|his|he fæstan|fæst on|an drihten . 
 þonne|se him|hi|he gyldeð god ælmihtig 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se unriht þu|þe|ðe hi|heo geearnedan , 
 and on|an hira|hi|heore facn|facen fæstan|fæst todrifeð 
 drihten eallmihtig , dema soþfæst . ## cumað nu togædere , wutun cweme|cweman god , 
 wynn drihten wealdend herigean , 
 ure|ur hælend|hælan hyldo gebeodan . 
 wutun hit|his|he ansyn ærest|ær secean , 
 þæt|se we andettan ure|ur fyren 
 and we sealmas him|hi|he singan mid wynn . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is se micel god mihtig drihten 
 and se micel cynincg ofer eall|eal mannian|mann god . 
 forðam nesan|neh|ne wiðdrifeð drihten usser 
 hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan folc æfre æt|etan þearf ; 
 he þes heahbeorgas healdeð swilce . 
 eacan|eac he sæ wealdeð and he settan se ; 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan hit|his|he folm eacan|eac folde drige . 
 cumað him|hi|he for|faran and cneow|cneo|cnawan bigeað 
 on|an ansyn ure|ur drihten , 
 and him|hi|he wepan for|faran þu|þe|ðe we|us wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan ær . 
 forðam he wesan|seon|is drihten god , dema usser ; 
 wærun we hit|his|he fæle|feolan folc and hit|his|he fæger sceap , 
 þu|þa|se he on|an hit|his|he edisce ær afedde . 
 gif ge toh|to dæge|dæg drihten stefn 
 hold gehyran , næfre ge heorte geþanc 
 deorc forhyrdan drihten willan|willa . 
 swa on|an grimnesse fyrn gear dydan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se wrað dæge|dæg and on|an westen|westan , 
 þær min|ic þurh|ðurh facen fæder eowre 
 þes cneoris cunnedan georne|geornan|georn , 
 þær hi|heo cunnedan , cuð ongietan 
 and min|ic sylfes weorc geseon mid eage . 
 nu ic feowertig folc þes 
 wintra|winter rim wunade neah , 
 aa and simble cweðan and eacan|eac swa oncnawan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an heorte hyсgan|hyg|hycgan dysegedan . 
 hi|heo weg min wiht nesan|neh|ne oncneowan , 
 þæt|se ic ær on|an yrre|irre aþ benemnan , 
 gif hi|heo on|an min restan ricene gan|eadan . ## singað nu drihten sang neowe|neo ; 
 singan þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe eall|eal eceum drihten . 
 singað nu drihten , and hit|his|he soð naman|nama 
 beald bletsiað ; beorn sæcgeað 
 fram dæge|dæg toh|to dæge|dæg drihten hælu . 
 secgeað hit|his|he wuldor|seolh|bearm geond sigeþeode , 
 and on|an eall|eal folc hit|his|he fæger wundor . 
 he wesan|seon|is se mycla god ; forðam he mænan sculan 
 ellen herian ; he wesan|seon|is egeslic god 
 ofer ealle|eall|eal god eorðbuendra . 
 syndon ealle|eall|eal hæþen god hildedeoful ; 
 heofon þonne wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan halig drihten . 
 ys on|an þinne|þin gesiht soð andetnes , 
 fæger halignes fæstan|fæst gebletsad 
 and weorðlic wlite|wlitan wuldor þin . 
 bringað nu drihten buan ætsomne 
 wlite|wlitan and are|ar , wuldor|seolh|bearm ðridde , 
 and þæt|se of hira|hi eðele don ealle|eall|eal þeon|þeodan|þeod , 
 þæt|se hi|heo naman|nama drihtenes neod herigean . 
 genimað ge|eowan|eow arlice lacan|lac and in gangað 
 on|an hit|his|he wictunas ; weorðiað drihten 
 on|an hit|his|he þære|se halig|halga|haleg heall geneahhige . 
 for|faran hit|his|he ansyn sculan eorþ|eorðe beofian ; 
 secgað nu on|an cynn and on|an cneoris , 
 þæt|se from|fram treowe|treow becuman tirfæst romana 
 drihten ure|ur ; dom he siððan 
 eorþ|eorðe ymbhwyrft ealle|eall|eal gesette|gesettan . 
 he ferhtlic rihtan|riht folc demeð 
 and on|an hit|his|he yrre|irre ealle|eall|eal þeon|þeodan|þeod . 
 heofenas blissiað , hruse swilce 
 gefeoð fæstlice , and flod þri ; 
 sealtan|sealt sæstreamas sælðe habbað . 
 habbað feld eacan|eac fæger bliss|blis 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se on|an him|hi|he eard weardiað ; 
 wærun wudubearuwas on|an wyndagum 
 for|faran andwlitan|andwlita ecean drihten , 
 forðam he cuman on|an cyneðrymme , 
 þæt|se he þes eorþ|eorðe ealle|eall|eal deman . 
 þonne|se he ymbhwyrft eorþ|eorðe folc 
 soð and rihte|rihtan|riht siððan demeð . ## rixað nu mid rihte|rihtan|riht romana drihten ; 
 wesan|seon|is eorþ|eorðe nu eacan|eac on|an bliss|blis , 
 and se fæger gefea habbað 
 ealanda manig ut on|an garsæcge . ## stundum onginnað 
 fægnian mid folm on|an gefea ælс|ælc ; 
 beorg blissiað , beacen oncnawan , 
 for|faran ansyn ecean drihten ; 
 forðam he eadig cuman eorþe|eorþ toh|to demanne . 
 he ymbhwyrft eorþe|eorþ demeð 
 soð and rihte|rihtan|riht , and hit|his|he syndrig folc 
 on|an rihtnes ræde|rædan|ræd gebringeð . ## rixað drihten , and he reðe folc 
 healdeð on|an yrre|irre ungemete swiðe|swiðan ; 
 sitteð ofer cherubin , se þu|þe|se sona mæg|magan 
 ana|an eorðware ealle|eall|eal onstyrian . 
 drihten wesan|seon|is on|an sion , dema se mæsta , 
 heah and mære|mæran ofer eall|eal hæleða folc . 
 we andetað þin þæm|þam|se ecean naman|nama , 
 þæt|se he mid mann wesan|seon|is micel and egeslic , 
 halig on|an helpan hæleþ|hæle bearn , 
 aare cyning don|dom æghwær lufade . 
 þu gegearwadest gear ærest|ær , 
 þæt|se þu recen , god , rihte|rihtan|riht began ; 
 þu on|an iacobe god dom 
 æt|etan fruma worlde fæger settan . 
 ahebbað halig heofena drihten , 
 usserne god ellencræfte , 
 and hit|his|he fot sceamul forþ|forð weorþiað ; 
 forðam he halig wesan|seon|is hæleða bearn . 
 moyses etan|et aaron mære|mæran gebroðor , 
 soð sacerd , samuhel ðridda , 
 þu|þa|se god hit|his|he naman|nama neod cigdan . 
 hi|heo cymlice cigan drihten , 
 and he hi|heo gehyrdan|gehyran hold mod , 
 sprecan him|hi|he word toh|to þurh wolcn|wolcen swyr . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se gewitnes wel gehealdan 
 and hit|his|he bebod beorht efnedan , 
 þu|þa|se he him|hi|he sellan and self bebeodan . 
 þu gehyrdan|gehyran hi|heo|heg , halig drihten , 
 and him|hi|he , meahtig god , milde weorþan , 
 and hira|hi|heore æfþancan ealle|eall|eal gewrecan . 
 hebbað yrnan|ure|irnan|iernan god , hælend drihten , 
 and he on|an halig|halga|haleg heran|her weorðiað 
 mære beorgan|beorg ; forðam hit|his|he magan synt 
 and halig wesan|seon|is heofonrices weard . ## nu ge mycle gefea mihtig drihten 
 eall|eal þes|þeoh|se eorþ|eorðe ellen hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo , 
 and bliss|blis god beald þeowie . 
 gangað on|an ansyn ealle|eall|eal bliðe ; 
 witað wislice þæt|se he wesan|seon|is wealdend god ; 
 he we|us gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan and we hit|his|he syndon . 
 we hit|his|he folc syndan and hit|his|he fæle|feolan sceap , 
 þe|þa|ða|se he on|an hit|his|he edisce ealle|eall|eal afedde ; 
 gað nu on|an hit|his|he dor , god andettað , 
 and he weorðiað on|an wictunum 
 mid lofsangum lust micel . 
 heriað naman|nama drihten , forðam he wesan|seon|is niðum swæs ; 
 wesan|seon|is þu|þin milde mod ofer mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 
 widsið maðolade , wordhord onlucan , 
 se þu|þe|se mann micel mægþ ofer eorþe|eorþ , 
 folc geondferan ; oft he on|an flett geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon 
 myneliс maþþum . him|hi|he from|fram myrgingum 
 æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele onwæcnan|onwacan . he mid ealhhilde , 
 fæle freoþuwebban , forma siþ 
 hreðcyninges ham geseсan|gesecan 
 eastan|east of ongle , eormanrices , 
 wraþ wærloga . ongon þu|þa|se worn sprecan : 
 " fela ic mann gefrignan mægþ wealdan ! 
 sculan þeodna gehwylc þeaw lifgan , 
 eorl æfter oþrum|oþer|oðer eðle ræde|rædan , 
 se þu|þe|se hit|his|he þeodenstol geþeon willan|wil . 
 þær|se wesan|seon|beon hwæl hwil selast , 
 and alexandreas eall|eal ricost 
 mann cynn|cyn , and he micel geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ic ofer folde gefrægen habban . 
 ætla wealdan hunum , eormanric gotum , 
 becca baningum , burgendum gifica . 
 casere|caser wealdan creacum and cælic finn , 
 hagena holmrygum and heoden glommum . 
 witt wealdan swæfum , wæd|wad hælsingum , 
 meaca myrgingum , mearchealf hundingum . 
 þeodric wealdan froncum , þyle rondingum , 
 breoca brondingum , billing wernum . 
 oswine wealdan eowu and ytum gefwulf , 
 fin folcwalding fresna cynn . 
 sigehere lengest|lengan|lange sædenum wealdan , 
 hnæf hocingum , helm wulfingum , 
 wald woingum , wod|wadan þyringum , 
 sæferð sycgum , sweom ongendþeow , 
 sceafthere ymbrum , sceafa longbeardum , 
 hun hætwerum and holen|helan wrosnum . 
 hringweald wesan|seon|beon hatan herefarena cyning . 
 offa wealdan ongle , alewih denu|dene ; 
 se wesan|seon|beon þær|se mannian|mann modgast eall|eal , 
 no hwæþre he ofer offan eorlscype fremman|fremede , 
 acan|ac offa geslean ærest|ær mann , 
 cnihtwesende , cynerice micel . 
 nænig efeneald him|hi|he eorlscipe micel|mare|mara 
 on|an orette . an sweord 
 merce gemærde wiþ|wið myrgingum 
 bi|be fifeldore ; healdan forþ|forð siððan 
 engel and swefan , swa hit offa geslean . 
 hroþwulf and hroðgar healdan lengest|lengan|lange 
 sibb|sib ætsomne suhtorfædran , 
 siððan hi forwrecan wicing cynn 
 and ingeldes ord forbigdan , 
 forheowan æt|etan heorot heaðobeardna þri . 
 swa ic geondferan fela fremde londa 
 geond ginne grund . god and yfel 
 þær ic cunnade cnosl bidæled , 
 freomægum feor folgade wid . 
 forðam ic mæg|magan singan and secgan spell , 
 mæne|mænan for|faran mengo in meoduhealle 
 hu me|ic cynegode cyst dugan . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon mid hunum and mid hreðgotum , 
 mid sweom and mid geatum and mid suþdenum . 
 mid wenlum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid wærnum and mid wicing . 
 mid gefþum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid winedum and mid gefflegum . 
 mid engel ic wesan|seon|beon and mid swæfum and mid ænenum . 
 mid seax ic wesan|seon|beon and sycgum and mid sweordwerum . 
 mid hronum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid deanum and mid heaþoreamum . 
 mid þyringum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid þrowend , 
 and mid burgendum , þær ic bugan|beah|beag geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon ; 
 me|ic þær guðhere forgifan|forgiefan glædlicne maþþum 
 songes toh|to lean . næs|nesan þæt|se sæne cyning ! 
 mid froncum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid frysum and mid frumtingum . 
 mid ruh ic wesan|seon|beon and mid glommum and mid rumwalum . 
 swilce ic wesan|seon|beon on|an eatule mid ælfwine , 
 se habban moncynnes , min gefræge , 
 leohteste hond lof toh|to wyrcenne , 
 heorte unhneaweste hring gedal , 
 beorht beah|beagian|beag , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn eadwines . 
 mid sercingum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid seringum ; 
 mid creacum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid finn and mid casere|caser , 
 se þu|þe|se winburga geweald agan , 
 wiolena and wilnian , and wæl|wala rices . 
 mid scottum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid peohtum and mid scridefinnum ; 
 mid lidwicingum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid leonum and mid longbeardum , 
 mid hæðnum and mid hæleþ|hæle and mid hundingum . 
 mid israhelum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid exsyringum , 
 mid ebreum and mid indeum and mid egyptum . 
 mid moidum ic wesan|seon|beon and mid persum and mid myrgingum , 
 and mofdingum and ongend myrgingum , 
 and mid amothingum . mid eastþyringum ic wesan|seon|beon 
 and mid eolh and mid istum and idumingum . 
 and ic wesan|seon|beon mid eormanrice ealle|eall|eal þrage , 
 þær me|ic gotena cyning god dugan ; 
 se me|ic bugan|beah|beag forgifan|forgiefan , burgwarena fruma , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se six hund|1000 wesan|seon|beon smætes gold , 
 gescyred sceatta scillingrime ; 
 se ic eadgilse on|an æht sellan , 
 minum|min hleodryhtne , þu|þa|se ic toh|to ham bicwom , 
 leof toh|to lean , se þu|þe|se he me|ic land forgifan|forgiefan , 
 min fæder eþel , frea myrginga . 
 and me|ic þu|þa|se ealhhild oþer|oðer forgifan|forgiefan , 
 dryhtcwen duguþ , dohtor eadwines . 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo lof lengan geond londa fela , 
 þonne|se ic be songe secgan sculan 
 hwær ic under swegl|swegel selast witan 
 goldhrodene cwen giefu|giefan bryttian . 
 þonne witan scilling sciran rædan|reord 
 for|faran uncrum sigedryhtne song ahofan , 
 hlud bi|be hearpe hleoþor swinsade , 
 þonne|se manig mann , mod wlonce , 
 word sprecan , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se wel cuþa|cuþ , 
 þæt|se hi|heo næfre song sellan nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran . 
 ðonan ic eall|eal geondhweorfan eþel gotena , 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a gesiþ þu|þa|se selestan ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon innweorud earmanrices . 
 heðcan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic and beadecan and herelingas , 
 emercan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic and fridlan and eastgotan , 
 frod and god fæder unwenes . 
 seccan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic and beccan , seafolan and þeodric , 
 heaþoric and sifecan , hliþ and incgenþeow . 
 eadwine sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic and elsan , ægelmund and hungar , 
 and þu|þa|se wloncan gedryht wiþmyrginga . 
 wulfhere sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic and wyrmhere ; ful oft þær wigan|wig nesan|neh|ne alæg , 
 þonne|se hræda herian|here|heran heard sweord 
 ymb wistlawudu werig sculan 
 eald eþelstol ætlan leode|leoda|leod . 
 rædhere sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ic and rondhere , rumstan and gislhere , 
 wiþergield and freoþeric , wudgan and haman ; 
 nesan|neh|ne wær þæt|se gesiþ þu|þa|se sæmest , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se ic hi anihst nemnan sculan . 
 ful oft of þæm|þam|se heap hwinan fleogan 
 giellan gar on|an grome þeon|þeodan|þeod ; 
 wræccan þær weoldan wundnan gold 
 wer and wif , wudga and ham . 
 swa ic þæt|se simble onfond on|an þære|se feringe , 
 þæt|se se beon libban londbuendum 
 se þu|þe|se him|hi|he god syleð guma romana 
 toh|to gehealdan , þenden he heran|her leofað . " 
 swa scriþan gesceapum hweorfað 
 gleomen guma geond grund fela , 
 þearf secgað , þoncword sprecan , 
 simble suþ oþþe|oððe norð sum gemetað 
 gydda gleaw , geofum unhneawne , 
 se þu|þe|se for|faran duguþ willan|wil don|dom aræran , 
 eorlscipe æfnan , oþþæt eal scæceð , 
 sunnan|leoht and lif somod ; lof se gewyrceð , 
 hafað under heofon heahfæstne don|dom . 
 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon agangan gear hwyrftum 
 twegen hund|1000 and þri geteled rim , 
 swilce xxx eacan|eac , þinggemearces , 
 wintra|winter for|faran weorold , se þu|þe|se wealdend god 
 acennan wearð , cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 in middangeard þurh mennisc heo , 
 soðfæstra sunnan|leoht . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon syxte gear 
 constantines caserdomes , 
 þæt|se he romwara in romana wearð 
 ahebban , hildfruma , toh|to hereteman . 
 wesan|seon|beon se leodhwata lindgeborga 
 eorlum arfæst . æðelinges weaxan 
 romana under roderum . he wesan|seon|beon rihtan|riht cyning , 
 guðweard guma . he god trymman 
 mærðum and miht , þæt|se he manig wearð 
 geond middangeard mann toh|to hroðer , 
 werþeodum toh|to wræc|wrecan , siððan wæpen ahebban 
 wiþ|wið hetendum . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon hild beodan , 
 wig woma|wom . werod samnodan 
 huna leode|leodan|leod and hreðgotan , 
 faran fyrdhwate franca and hugas . 
 wesan|seon|beon hwate wer , 
 gearu toh|to guðe . gar lixtan , 
 wriðene wælhlencan . word and bord 
 hebban herecombol . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon hearding 
 sweotol samnian|gesamnian and eal sib geador . 
 for|faran folc gedryht . fyrdleoð agalan 
 wulf on|an wealdan|weald , wælrune nesan|neh|ne mað . 
 urigfeðera irnan|iernan|earn singan|sang ahebban , 
 laðum on|an last . lungre scynde 
 ofer cantwara|burg ent beaduþreata micel , 
 here toh|to hild , swilce huna cyning 
 ymbsittendra awer magan 
 abannan toh|to beadu burgwigendra . 
 for|faran fyrd micel . feþa trymman 
 eoredcestum , þæt|se on|an ælfylce 
 deareðlacende on|an danubie , 
 stærcedfyrhðe , stæðe wician 
 ymb se wæter wylm . werod breahtm 
 willan romwara romana geþringan , 
 here ahyðan . þær wearð huna cyme 
 cuð ceasterwara . þu|þa|se se casere|caser hatan 
 ongeagn grama|gram guðgelæcan 
 under earhfære ofost micel 
 bannan toh|to beadu , beran|bera ut þræce 
 rinc under roderum . wesan|seon|beon romware , 
 secg sigerofe , sona gegearwian|gearwian 
 wæpn|wæpen toh|to wigge , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi|heo werod læssa 
 habban toh|to hild þonne|se huna cining ; 
 ridan ymb rof , þonne|se rand dynnan|dynian , 
 campwudu clynede , cyning þreate for|faran , 
 here toh|to hild . hrefen uppe galan , 
 wan and wælfel . werod wesan|seon|beon on|an tyhtan . 
 hleapan hornboran , hreopan fricca , 
 mearh molde tredan . mægen|magan samnian , 
 caf toh|to cease . cyning wesan|seon|beon afyrhted , 
 egsan geaclad , siððan elþeodig , 
 huna and hreða herian|here|heran sceawede , 
 þæt|ðæt|se he on|an romwara rices ende 
 ymb se wæter stæð werod samnian , 
 mægen|magan unrime . modsorge wegan 
 romwara cyning , rices nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan 
 for|faran werodleste , habban wiga toh|to lutan , 
 eaxlgestealna wiþ|wið ofermægene , 
 hror toh|to hild . herian|here|heran wician , 
 eorl ymb æðeling , egstreame neah 
 on|an neahwest nihtlangne fyrst , 
 se þu|þe|se hi|heo feond gefær fyrmest|forma gesægon . 
 þu|þa|se wearð on|an slæpan|slæp self ætywan 
 þæm|þam|se casere|caser , þær he on|an corðre swefan , 
 sigerofum seon|gesegen swefn woma|wom . 
 þynсan|þyncan him|hi|he wlitescyne on|an wer had 
 hwit and hiwbeorht hæleða nathwylc 
 geywan ænliс þonne|se he ær oððe sið 
 gesege under swegl|swegel . he of slæpan|slæp onbrægd , 
 eofurcumble beþeссan|beþeccan . him|hi|he se ar hraðe , 
 wlitig wuldor bodian|boda|bod , wiþ|wið þingian 
 and be naman|nama nemnan , ( nihthelm toglad ) : 
 " constantinus , hatan þu|þe|se cyning engel , 
 wyrd wealdend , wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon beodan , 
 duguða dryhten . nesan|neh|ne ondrædan þu þu|þe|ðe , 
 þeah þu|þe|se elþeodig egesa hwopan , 
 heard hild . þu toh|to heofenum beseon 
 on|an wuldor weard , þær þu wrað findan , 
 sigor tacn|tacen|tacan . " he wesan|seon|beon sona gearu 
 þurh se halig|halga|haleg hæs , hreðerlocan onspannan , 
 up locade , swa him|hi|he se ar abeodan , 
 fæle|feolan friðowebba . geseon he frætwum beorht 
 wliti wuldor treo ofer wolcn|wolcen hrof , 
 gold glengan , ( gimm lixtan ) ; 
 wesan|seon|beon se blæc|blacian|blac beam bocstæf awriten|awritan , 
 beorht and sunnan|leoht : " mid þis beacn|beacen þu 
 on|an þæm|þam|se frecne fær feond oferswiðesð , 
 geletest lað werod . " þu|þa|se þæt|se sunnan|leoht gewitan , 
 up siðode , and se ar somed , 
 on|an clæne gemang . cyning wesan|seon|beon þywan|þy|þe|se bliðra 
 and þu|þe|se sorgleasra , secg aldor , 
 on|an fyrhðsefan , þurh þu|þa|se fæger gesyhð . 
 hatan þu|þa|se onlice æðelinga hleo , 
 beorn beaggifa , swa he þæt|se beacen geseon , 
 heria hildfruma , þæt|se him|hi|he on|an heofon ær 
 iewan|geiewan wearð , ofost micel , 
 constantinus , cristes rode|rod , 
 tireadig cyning , tacn|tacen|tacan gewyrcan . 
 hatan þu|þa|se on|an uhta mid ærdæge 
 wigend wreccan , and wæpenþræce 
 hebban heorucumbul , and þæt|se halig treo 
 him|hi|he beforan ferian on|an feond gemang , 
 beran|bera beacen god . byme singan 
 hlud for|faran here . hrefn weorc gefeon , 
 urigfeðra , irnan|iernan|earn sið behealdan , 
 wælhreow wigan|wig . wulf singan|sang ahebban , 
 holtes gehleða . hildegesa standan . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon bord gebrecan and beorn geþrec , 
 heard handgeswing and hergian|here gring , 
 siððan heo earhfære ærest|ær metan . 
 on|an þæt|se fæge|fægan folc flan|fla scuras , 
 gar ofer geolorand on|an gram gemang , 
 hetend heorugrimme , hildenædran , 
 þurh finger geweald forþ|forð onsendan . 
 stæppan|steppan stiðhidige , stundum wrecan , 
 brecan bordhreðan , bil in dufan , 
 þringan þræchearde . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon þuf hebban , 
 segn for|faran sweota , sigeleoð galan . 
 gylden|gyldan grima , gar lixtan 
 on|an herefelda . hæðen grungon , 
 feollan|feallan friðelease . fleon|fleogan instæpes 
 huna leode|leodan|leod , swa þæt|se halig treo 
 aræran hatan romwara cyning , 
 heaðofremmende . wurdon|weorþan hearding 
 wid towrecene . sum wigan|wig forniman . 
 sum unsofte aldor generian 
 on|an þæm|þam|se heresiðe . sum healfcwic
