 fleon|fleogan on|an fæsten|fæstan and feorh beorgan 
 æfter stanclifum , stede weardedon 
 ymb danubie . sum drenc forniman 
 on|an lagostreame lifes|lif æt|etan ende . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon modig mægen|magan on|an lust , 
 ehtan elþeod oþ|oð þæt|se æfen forþ|forð 
 fram dæg ord . daroðæsc fleon|fleogan , 
 hildenædran . heap wesan|seon|beon gescyrded , 
 laðra lindwered . lythwon becuman 
 huna here ham eft þanan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon gesyne þæt|se sige|sigan|seon forgifan|forgiefan 
 constantino cyning ælmihtig 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se dægweorc , domweorðunga , 
 romana under roderum , þurh hit|his|he rode|rod treo . 
 gewitan þu|þa|se here helm ham eft þanan , 
 huðe hremig , ( hild wesan|seon|beon sceþþan ) , 
 wigge geweorðod . cuman þu|þa|se wiga hleo 
 þegnian|þegn|þegen þreate þryðbold sec , 
 beadurof cyning burh|burg neosan . 
 hatan þu|þa|se wiga weard þu|þa|se wisestan 
 snude toh|to sionoðe , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se snytro cræftan|cræft 
 þurh fyrngewrito friсgan habban , 
 healdan higeþancum hæleða ræd . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se fricggan onginnan folc aldor , 
 sigerof cyning , ofer sid weorod , 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þær ænig yldra oððe gingra 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he toh|to soð secggan magan , 
 galdre|galdor cyþan , hwæt#2 se god wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 bold brytta , " þu|þe|se þes hit|his|he beacen wesan|seon|beon 
 þu|þe|se me|ic swa sunnan|leoht oðywde and min leode|leodan|leod generian , 
 tacnian|tacn|tacen torhtost , and me|ic tir forgifan|forgiefan , 
 wigsped wiþ|wið wrað , þurh þæt|se wlitig treo . " 
 hio him|hi|he ondsware ænig nesan|neh|ne magan 
 agifan togenes , nesan|neh|ne ful geare|gear cuðon 
 sweotol gesecggan be þæm|þam|se sigebeacne . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þa|se wisestan word cweþan|cweðan 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se heremægene þæt|se hit heofoncyninges 
 tacn|tacen|tacan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , and se tweogan|tweo nesan . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se gefrignan þu|þa|se þurh fulwihtan|fulwiht 
 læran wesan|seon|beon , ( him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon sunnan|leoht sefa , 
 ferhð gefeon , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hira|hi fea wesan|seon|beon ) , 
 þæt|ðæt|se hi|heo for|faran þæm|þam|se casere|caser cyþan motan 
 godspell|godspel gifu|gifan , hu se gast helm , 
 in þrynesse þrymm geweorðad , 
 acennan wearð , cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 and hu on|an galgan wearð god ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 ahon for|faran here heard wite|wita . 
 alysan leode|leoda|leod birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn of locan deofol , 
 geomor gast , and him|hi|he gifu|gifan sellan 
 þurh þu|þa|se ilca gesceaft þu|þe|se him|hi|he geywan wearð 
 self on|an gesiht , sigor tacn|tacen|tacan , 
 wiþ|wið þeod þræce . and hu se þridda dæge|dæg 
 of byrgenn|byrgen|byrgan beorn wuldor|seolh|bearm 
 of deaðe arisan|ar , dryhten eall|eal 
 hæleða cynn|cyn , and toh|to heofon astigan . 
 þus gleawlice gastgerynum 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan sigerofum , swa fram siluestre 
 læran wesan|seon|beon . æt|etan þæm|þam|se se leodfruma 
 fulwihtan|fulwiht onfon and þæt|se forþ|forð gehealdan 
 on|an hit|his|he dagana tidan|tid , dryhten toh|to willan|willa . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon on|an sæl sinc brytta , 
 niðheard cyning . wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he niwe gefea 
 befeolan in fyrhðe , wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he frofor micel 
 and hyht nihst heofonrices weard . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se dryhten æ dæg and niht 
 þurh gast gifu|gifan georne|geornan|georn cyþan , 
 and he soþlice|soðlice silf|self getengde 
 goldwine guma in god þeowdom , 
 æscrof , unslaw . þu|þa|se se æðeling findan , 
 leodgebyrga , þurh larsmiðas , 
 guðheard , garþrist , on|an god boc 
 hwær ahon wesan|seon|beon here beorhtme 
 on|an rode|rod treo rodor waldend 
 æfstum þurh inwit , swa se eald feond 
 forlæran ligesearwum , leode|leodan|leod fortyhte , 
 iudea cyn , þæt|se hi|heo god silf|self 
 ahon , hergian|here fruma . se hi|heo in hynðum sculan 
 toh|to wid feorh wergðu dreogan ! 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon cristes lof þæm|þam|se casere|caser 
 on|an firhðsefan , forþ|forð gemyndig 
 ymb þæt|se mære|mæran treo , and þu|þa|se hit|his|he modor hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 feran foldwege folc þreate 
 toh|to iudeum , georne|geornan|georn sec 
 wiga þreate hwær se wuldor beam , 
 halig under hruse , hydan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 æðelcyning rod . elene nesan|neh|ne willan 
 se siðfates sæne weorðan , 
 nesan|neh|ne se wilgifan word gehyrwan , 
 hiere|hieran sylfre sunu , acan|ac wesan|seon|beon sona gearu , 
 wif on|an willsið , swa hire|heo weoruda helm , 
 byrnwiggendra , bebiddan|bebeodan habban . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se ofstlice eorl mengu 
 toh|to flote fysan . fearoðhengestas 
 ymb geofenes stæð gearu standan , 
 sælan sæmearas , sunde|sund getenge . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon orcnæwe ides siþfæt , 
 siððan wæges helm werod|weorod geseсan|gesecan . 
 þær wlanc manig æt|etan wendelsæ 
 on|an stæðe standan . stundum wrecan 
 ofer mearcpaðu , mægen|magan æfter oðer , 
 and þu|þa|se gehlodon hildesercum , 
 bord and ord , byrnwigendum , 
 wer and wif , wæghengestas . 
 lætan þu|þa|se ofer fifelwæg famig scriðan 
 bronte brimþisan . bord oft onfon 
 ofer earhgeblond yða swengas ; 
 sæ swinsade . nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic sið nesan|neh|ne ær 
 on|an egstreame ides lædan , 
 on|an merestræte , mægen|magan fægerra|fæger . 
 þær magan gesion , se se sið behealdan , 
 brecan ofer bæðweg , brimwudu snyrgan 
 under swellingum , sæmearh plegean , 
 wadan wægflotan . wigan|wiga wesan|seon|beon bliðe , 
 collenferhðe , cwen siðes gefeon , 
 siððan toh|to hyðe hringedstefnan 
 ofer lagofæsten liþan|geliþan habban 
 on|an creca land|finna . ceolas lætan 
 æt|etan sæfearoðe , sande bewrecene , 
 ald yðhofu , oncrum fæstan|fæst 
 on|an brim bidan beorn geþing , 
 hwonne heo se guðcwen guma þreate 
 ofer eastwegas eft geseсan|gesecan . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon on|an eorle eðgesyne 
 bregdan byrne and bill gecost , 
 geatolic guðscrud , grimhelm manig , 
 ænlic eoforcumbul . wesan|seon|beon æscwigan , 
 secggas ymb sigecwen , siðes gefysde . 
 fyrdrinc from faran on|an lust 
 on|an creca land|finna , casere|caser boda , 
 hilderincas , hyrstum gewerede . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon gesyne sincgim lucan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se hereþreate , hlaford gifu . 
 wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se eadhreðige elene gemyndig , 
 þriste on|an geþanc , þeodnes willan|willa 
 geornan|georn on|an mod þæt|se hio iudeas 
 ofer herefeldas heap gecoste 
 lindwigendra land|finna geseсan|gesecan , 
 secg þreate . swa hit siððan gelimpan 
 ymb lytel fæc þæt|se þæt|ðæt|se leodmægen , 
 guðrofe hæleþ|hæle|hælan toh|to hierusalem 
 cuman in þu|þa|se ceaster corðra micel , 
 eorl æscrofe , mid þu|þa|se æðele cwen . 
 hatan þe|þa|ða|se gebeodan burgsittendum 
 þæm|þam|se snoterestum side|sid and wid 
 geond iudeas , guma gehwylc , 
 meðelhegende , on|an gemot cuman|cuma , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe deoplicost dryhten geryno 
 þurh rihte|rihtan|riht æ reccan cuðon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon samnian|gesamnian of sidwegum 
 mægen|magan unlytel , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe moyses æ 
 reccan cuðon . þær on|an riman|rim wesan|seon|beon 
 þri þusend se leode|leoda|leod 
 alesen toh|to lar . onginnan þu|þa|se leoflic wif 
 wer ebrea word negan : 
 " ic þæt|se gearolice ongiten habban 
 þurg wittig wordgeryno 
 on|an god boc þæt|se ge geardagum 
 weorþ wesan|seon|beon wuldorcyning , 
 dryhten dyre and dædhwæte . 
 hwæt#2 , ge ealle|eall|eal snytro unwislice , 
 wrað wiðweorpon , þu|þa|se ge wergdon þan 
 þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow of wergðe þurh hit|his|he wuldor miht , 
 fram ligcwale , lysan þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 of hæftnede . ge mid horu speowdon 
 on|an se ondwlitan þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow eage sunnan|leoht , 
 fram blindnes bot gefremian 
 edniowunga þurh þæt|se æðele spald , 
 and fram unclæne oft generian 
 deofol gast . ge toh|to deaþ se 
 deman|dema onginnan , se þu|þe|ðe of deaðe self 
 weorold awehte on|an wer corþre 
 in þæt|se ær lif eowres cynn|cyn . 
 swa ge modblinde mengan onginnan 
 liсgan|leon wiþ|wið soð , sunnan|leoht wiþ|wið þystru|þystre , 
 æfst wiþ|wið are|ar , inwitþancum 
 wroht webbedan . ge|eowan|eow seon|seo|se wergðu forðam 
 sceðþeð scyldfullum . ge þu|þa|se sciran miht 
 deman|dema onginnan , and gedweolan libban , 
 þeostru geþanc , oþ|oð þes dæg . 
 gangan nu snude , snytro geþencaþ , 
 wer wisfæste , word cræftig , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe eowre æ æðele cræftig 
 on|an ferhðsefan fyrmest|forma habban , 
 þu|þa|se me|ic soþlice|soðlice secgan cunnan , 
 ondsware cyþan for|faran eowic forþ|forð 
 tacnian|tacn|tacen gehwilc þu|þe|se ic him|hi|he toh|to sec . " 
 eodan þu|þa|se on|an geruman reonigmode 
 eorl æcleawe , egesa geþreade , 
 gehðum geomor , georne|geornan|georn sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 þu|þa|se wisestan wordgeryno , 
 þæt|se hio þære|se cwene|cwen oncweðan magan 
 swa til swa trages , swa hio him|hi|he toh|to sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . 
 hio þu|þa|se on|an þreate þusend mannian|mann 
 findan ferhðgleawra , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se fyrngemynd 
 mid iudeum gearwian cuðon . 
 þringan þu|þa|se on|an þreate þær on|an þrymm bidan 
 in cynestole casere|caser mæg|magan , 
 geatolic guðcwen gold hyrstan . 
 elene maþelian and for|faran eorlum sprecan : 
 " gehyrað , higegleawe , halig run , 
 word and wisdom . hwæt#2 , ge wittig 
 lar onfon , hu se liffruma 
 in cildes had cennan weorþan , 
 miht|meaht wealdend . be þæm|þam|se moyses singan|sang , 
 and þæt|se word cweðan weard israhela : 
 'eow acennan bið cniht on|an degle , 
 miht mære|mæran , swa se modor nesan|neh|ne bið 
 wæstm geeacnod þurh wer friсgan|frig|fricgan .' 
 be ðam|se dauid cyning dryhtleoð agalan , 
 frod fyrnweota , fæder salomones , 
 and þæt|se word gecweþan wigona baldor : 
 'ic frumþa god for|faran sceawian , 
 sigorian|sigor dryhten . he on|an gesiht wesan|seon|beon , 
 mægena wealdend , min|ic on|an þu|þa|se swiðran , 
 þrymm hyrdan|hyran|hirde . þanan ic nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan 
 æfre toh|to ald onsion min .' 
 swa hit eft be ge|eowan|eow essaias , 
 wittig for|faran weorodum , word mælan , 
 deophycggende þurh dryhten gast : 
 'ic up ahebban eafora gingne 
 and birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn cennan , þæm|þam|se ic blæd forgifan|forgiefan , 
 halig higefrofre , acan|ac hi|heo hyrwan me|ic , 
 feogean|feogan þurh feondscipe , nagan foreþances , 
 wisdom gewitt|gewitan ; and þu|þa|se weregan neotan|neat , 
 þu|þe|se munan|mann|man dæg|dah|dagian|dag gehwa drifeð and þirsceð , 
 ongitaþ hira|hi goddend , nales gnyrnwræcum 
 feogað frynd hira|hi þu|þe|se him|hi|he fodder gifað , 
 and me|ic israhela æfre nesan|neh|ne willan 
 folc oncnawan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic feala for|faran him|hi|he 
 æfter woruldstundum wundrian|wundor|wund gefremian .' 
 hwæt#2 , we þæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran þurh halig bec 
 þæt|se ge|eowan|eow dryhten gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf don|dom unscyndne , 
 meotod miht|meaht spedan|sped , moyse sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 hu ge heofoncyninge hyran sculan , 
 lar læstan|læst . ge|eowan|eow se lungre aþreotan , 
 and ge þæm|þam|se ryhte wiðroten habban , 
 onscunedon se sciran scippend eall , 
 dryhten dryhten , and gedwola|gedwol fylgan 
 ofer rihtan|riht god . nu ge raþe gangan 
 and findan gen þu|þa|se þu|þe|se fyrngewritu 
 þurh snytro cræftan|cræft sellan cunnan , 
 æriht ge|eower , þæt|se me|ic ondsware 
 þurh sid sefa secgan cunnan . " 
 eodan þe|þa|ða|se mid mengo modcwanige , 
 collenferhðe , swa him|hi|he se cwen beodan . 
 findan þu|þa|se d forþsnottera 
 alesen leodmæga , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe leornungcræft 
 þurh modgemynd micel habban , 
 on|an sefa snytro . heo toh|to salu|salor eft 
 ymb lytel fæc laðode wesan|seon|beon , 
 ceaster weard . hio se cwen onginnan 
 word genegan , ( wlitan ofer ealle|eall|eal ) : 
 " oft ge dyslice dæd gefremedon , 
 werig wræcmæcggas , and gewrit herwdon , 
 fædera|fæder lar , næfre furður þonne|se nu , 
 þe|þa|ða|se ge blindnes bot forsegon , 
 and ge wiðsocon soð and rihte|rihtan|riht , 
 þæt|se in bethleme birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wealdende , 
 cyning anboren , cennan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 æðelinga ord . þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ge þu|þa|se æ cuðon , 
 wittig word , ge nesan|neh|ne willan þu|þa|se , 
 synwyrcende , soð oncnawan . " 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se anmode ondsweredon : 
 " hwæt#2 , we ebreisce æ leornedon , 
 þu|þa|se on|an fyrndagum fæder cuðon 
 æt|etan god earce , nesan|neh|ne we geare|gear cunnan 
 þurh hwæt#2 þu þus heard , hlæfdige , we|us 
 eorre weorþan . we þæt|ðæt|se æbylgð nytan 
 þu|þe|se we gefremedon on|an þes folcscere , 
 þeodenbealwa , wiþ|wið þec æfre . " 
 elene maðelade and for|faran eorlum sprecan , 
 undearninga ides reordian 
 hlud for|faran here : " ge nu hraðe gangað , 
 sundor asecaþ þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe snytro mid ge|eowan|eow , 
 mægn and modcræft , micel habban , 
 þæt|se me|ic þingian|þing gehwylc þriste gecyðan , 
 untraglice , þu|þe|se ic him|hi|he toh|to sec . " 
 gan|eadan þu|þa|se fram run , swa him|hi|he se romana cwen , 
 bald in burh|burg , bebiddan|bebeodan habban , 
 geomormode , georne|geornan|georn smeagean|smeagan , 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan searoþancum , hwæt#2 se syn wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 þu|þe|se hi|heo on|an þæm|þam|se folc fremman habban 
 wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se casere|caser , þu|þe|se him|hi|he se cwen wite|witan . 
 þu|þa|se þær for|faran eorlum on|an reordian , 
 gidda gearosnotor , ( ðam|se wesan|seon|beon iudas nama , 
 word cræftig ) : " ic witan geare|gear 
 þæt|se hio willan|wil sec be ðam|se sigebeam 
 on|an ðam|se þrowian þeod waldend , 
 eall gnyrna leas , god ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 se orscyldne eofota gehwilc 
 þurh hettan|hatan hon on|an hean|heah beam 
 in fyrndagum fæder usse . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon þrealic þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan ! nu wesan|seon|is þurfan|þearf micel 
 þæt|se we fæstlice ferhð staðelien , 
 þæt|se we se morðres melda nesan|neh|ne weorðen 
 hwær þæt|se halig trio beheled weorþan 
 æfter wigþræce , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan toweorpan wesan|sien|seon|nesan 
 frod fyrngewritu and þu|þa|se fæderlic 
 lar forlætan . nesan|neh|ne bið lang ofer þæt|ðæt|se 
 þæt|se israhela æðele motan 
 ofer middangeard micel ricsian , 
 æcræft eorl , gif þes yppe|yppan bið , 
 swa þu|þa|se þæt|se ilca gio min|ic yldra fæder 
 sigerof sægan|seсgan|secgan , ( þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|beon sachius nama ) , 
 frod fyrnwiota , fæder minum|min , 
 eaferan , 
 wendan|wenan he of weorold and þæt|se word cweðan : 
 'gif þu|þe|se þæt|se gelimpan|gelimp on|an lifdagum 
 þæt|se þu gehyran ymb þæt|se halig treo 
 frod frignan , and geflitu ræran 
 be ðam|se sigebeam on|an þæm|þam|se soðcyning 
 ahon wesan|seon|beon , heofonrices weard , 
 eall sybbe birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , þonne|se þu snude gecyð , 
 min|ic swæs sunu , ær þec swylt niman . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan æfre ofer þæt|se ebrea þeodan|þeod 
 rædþeahtende romana healdan|heald , 
 duguðum wealdan , acan|ac þær|se don|dom leofað 
 and hira|hi dryhtscipe , 
 in weorold weorulda willum gefyllan|fyllan , 
 þu|þe|ðe se ahangnan cyning herian and lofiað .' 
 þu|þa|se ic fromlice fæder minum|min , 
 eald æwita , agifan|agiefan ondsware : 
 'hu willan þæt|se geweorðan on|an woruldrice 
 þæt|se on|an se halig|halga|haleg hand sendan 
 toh|to feorhlege fæder usse 
 þurh wrað gewitt|gewitan , gif hi|heo witan ær 
 þæt|se he crist wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , cyning on|an roderum , 
 soð sunu meotudes , sawol|sawlian|sawel nergend ?' 
 þe|þa|ða|se me|ic yldra min|ic agifan|agiefan ondsware , 
 frod on|an fyrhðe fæder reordian : 
 'ongit , guma ginga , god heahmægen , 
 nergendes naman|nama . se wesan|seon|is niða gehwa 
 unasecgendlic , se self nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 on|an moldwege munan|mann|man aspyrigean . 
 næfre ic þu|þa|se geþeaht þu|þe|se þes|þeoh|se þeodan|þeod onginnan 
 sec willan , acan|ac ic simble mec 
 asced þær|se scylda , nales sceame wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan 
 gast minum|min . ic him|hi|he georne|geornan|georn oft 
 se unriht ondsæc fremman|fremede , 
 þonne|se uðweotan æht bisæton , 
 on|an sefa sœ̄сan|seсan|secan hu hi|heo sunu meotudes 
 ahon , helm wer , hlaford eall 
 engel and elda , æðelust bearn . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hi|heo swa disige deað oðfæstan , 
 wer wonsælige , swa hi|heo wendan|wenan ær , 
 sar settan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he sum hwil 
 on|an galgan hit|his|he gast onsendan , 
 sigebearn god . þu|þa|se siððan wesan|seon|beon 
 of rode|rod ahebban rodera wealdend , 
 eall þrymm þri , þri niht|neaht siððan 
 in byrgenn|byrgen|byrgan bidan wesan|seon|beon 
 under þeosterlocan , and þu|þa|se þywan|þy|þe|se þridda dæg 
 eall|eal sunnan|leoht sunnan|leoht lifgende arisan|ar , 
 ðeoden engel , and hit|his|he þegn|þegen he , 
 soð sigorian|sigor frea , seolfne geywan , 
 beorht on|an blæd . þonne|se broðor þu|þin 
 onfon æfter fyrst|first fulwiht bæð , 
 leoht geleafa . þu|þa|se for|faran lufu|lufe dryhten 
 stephanus wesan|seon|beon stan worpod ; 
 nesan|neh|ne gyldan|gieldan he yfel yfele|yfel , acan|ac hit|his|he ealdfeondum 
 þingian þrohtherd , bædan|biddan þrymcyning 
 þæt|se he him|hi|he þu|þa|se weadæd toh|to wræc|wrecan nesan|neh|ne settan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo for|faran æfstum unscyldigne , 
 synn|syn leas , sawles lar 
 feorh berædan , swa he þurh feondscipe 
 toh|to cwalu manig cristes folc 
 deman toh|to deaþ . swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah him|hi|he dryhten eft 
 milts gefremian , þæt|se he manig wearð 
 folc toh|to frofor , siððan him|hi|he fyrmþ god , 
 niða nergend , naman|nama oncyrde , 
 and he siððan wesan|seon|beon sanctus paulus 
 be naman|nama hatan , and him|hi|he nænig wesan|seon|beon 
 ælærendra oðer beterian|betera 
 under swegl|swegel hleo siððan æfre , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se wif oððe wer on|an weorold cendan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he stephanus stan hatan 
 abreotan on|an beorgan|beorg , broðor þinne|þin . 
 nu þu magan gehyran , hæleð min|ic se libban|leof , 
 hu arfæst wesan|seon|is eall|eal wealdend , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah we æbylgð wiþ|wið he oft gewyrcen , 
 synn|syn wund|windan , gif we sona eft 
 þær|se bealudæda bot gefremmaþ 
 and se unriht eft geswican . 
 forðam ic soþlice|soðlice and min|ic swæs fæder 
 siððan gelyfan|gelifan 
 þæt|se geþrowade eall þrymm god , 
 lifes|lif lattiow , laðlic wite|witan 
 for|faran oferþearfe ilda cynn|cyn . 
 forðam ic þu|þe|se læran|lesan þurh leoðorune , 
 hyse leofesta , þæt|se þu hospcwide , 
 æfst nesan|neh|ne eofulsæc æfre nesan|neh|ne fremman , 
 grimm|grim geagncwide , wiþ|wið god bearn . 
 þonne|se þu geearnast þæt|se þu|þe|se bið ece lif , 
 selust sigeleana , sellan in heofon .' 
 þus mec fæder min|ic on|an fyrndagum 
 unweaxenne word læran , 
 sepan soðcwidum , ( þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|beon symon nama ) , 
 guma gehðum frod . nu ge geare|gear cunnan 
 hwæt#2 ge|eowan|eow se on|an sefa sellan þince 
 toh|to gecyðanne , gif ðeos cwen usic 
 frigneð ymb þæt|ðæt|se treo , nu ge fyrhðsefan 
 and modgeþanc min cunnan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se togenes þu|þa|se gleawestan 
 on|an wer þreate word mælan : 
 " næfre we hyrdan|hyran hæleð ænig 
 on|an þes þeon|þeodan|þeod , butan þec nu þe|þa|ða|se , 
 þegn oðer þyslic cyþan 
 ymb swa dygle wyrdan|wyrd . don swa þu|þe|se þynce , 
 fyrngidda frod , gif þu frignan|fregnan wesan|seon|nesan 
 on|an wer corðre . wisdom beðearf , 
 word wærlicra and witan|wita snytro , 
 se se æðele sculan ondwyrde agifan 
 for|faran þyslicne þreotan on|an meþle . " 
 weoxan word cwide , wer þeahtedon 
 on|an healf gehwær , sum hyder , sum þider , 
 þrydedon and þenсean|þenсan|þencan . þu|þa|se cuman þegnian|þegn|þegen heap 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se heremeðle . hropan fricca , 
 casere|caser boda : " ge|eowan|eow þes|þeoh|se cwen laþian , 
 secg toh|to salu|salor , þæt|se ge seonoðdomas 
 rihte|rihtan|riht reccen . wesan|seon|is ge|eowan|eow ræde|ræd þurfan|þearf 
 on|an meðelstede , mod snytro . " 
 heo wesan|seon|beon gearu , geomormode 
 leodgebyrgean , þu|þa|se hi|heo laðod wesan|seon|beon 
 þurh heard gebannan ; toh|to hofe|hof|hebban gan|eadan , 
 cyðdon cræft miht . þu|þa|se se cwen onginnan 
 wer ebresce word negan , 
 fricggan fyrhðwerige ymb fyrngewritu , 
 hu on|an weorold ær wittig singan , 
 gasthalige guma , be god bearn , 
 hwær se þeon|þeodan geþrowade , 
 soð sunu meotudes , for|faran sawol|sawlian|sawel lufu|lufe . 
 heo wesan|seon|beon stearc , stane|stan heardran , 
 nyllan|nillan þæt|se geryne rihte|rihtan|riht cyþan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hire|heo andswaru ænig secgan , 
 torngeniðlan , se hio him|hi|he toh|to sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 acan|ac hio word gehwæs wiðersæc fremman , 
 fæstan|fæst on|an fyrhðe , þæt|se heo frignan onginnan , 
 cweþan|cweðan þæt|se hio on|an ald owiht swylces 
 nesan|neh|ne ær nesan|neh|ne sið æfre hyrdan|hyran . 
 elene maþelade and him|hi|he yrre|irre oncwæð : 
 " ic ge|eowan|eow toh|to soð secgan willan , 
 and se in lif liсgan|leon nesan|neh|ne wyrðeð , 
 gif ge þes leas lengan|leng|lange gefylgað 
 mid fæcne gefic , þu|þe|se me|ic for|faran standan , 
 þæt|se ge|eowan|eow in beorgan|beorg bæl fornimeð , 
 hattost heaðowelma , and ge|eower hra bryttað , 
 lacan lig , þæt|se ge|eowan|eow sculan þæt|se leas 
 apundrad weorðan toh|to woruldgedale . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan ge þe|þa|ða|se word geseðan þu|þe|se ge hwil nu on|an unriht 
 wreon under womm sceat , nesan|neh|ne magan ge þu|þa|se wyrdan|wyrd bemiðan , 
 bedyrnan þu|þa|se deop miht|meaht|magan . " þe|þa|ða|se wurdon|weorþan hi|heo deaðes on|an wenan|wena , 
 ad and endelifes , and þær þu|þa|se an betæсan|betæcan 
 giddum gearusnottorne , ( þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|beon iudas nama 
 cennan for|faran cneomagum ) , se hi|heo þære|se cwene|cwen agefon , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan he sundorwisne : " he þu|þe|se mæg|magan soð gecyðan , 
 onwreon wyrd geryno , swa þu he word frignan|fregnan , 
 æriht from|fram ord oþ|oð ende forþ|forð . 
 he wesan|seon|is for|faran eorþ|eorðe æðele cynn|cyn , 
 wordcræftes wis and wittig sunu , 
 bald on|an meðle ; him|hi|he gebyrde|gebyrd wesan|seon|is 
 þæt|se he gencwidas gleaw habban , 
 cræftan|cræft in breost . he gecyðeð þu|þe|se 
 for|faran wer mengo wisdom gifu|gifan 
 þurh þu|þa|se myclan miht , swa þu|þin mod lufian . " 
 hio on|an sybbe forlætan sec gehwylcne 
 agen|agan eard , and se an geniman , 
 iudas toh|to gisl , and þu|þa|se georne|geornan|georn bædan|biddan 
 þæt|se he be se rode|rod rihtan|riht getæhte 
 þu|þe|se ær in legere wesan|seon|beon lange|lang bedyrned , 
 and he seolfne sundor acigde . 
 elene maþelian toh|to þæm|þam|se anhagan , 
 tireadig cwen : " þu|þe|se synt twegen gearu , 
 swa lif swa deað , swa þu|þe|se leof bið 
 toh|to geceosanne . cyðan ricene nu 
 hwæt#2 þu se toh|to þingan|þing þafian willan . " 
 iudas hire|heo ongeagn þingian ( nesan|neh|ne magan he þu|þa|se gehðu bebugan , 
 oncyrran rex geniðlan ; he wesan|seon|beon on|an þære|se cwene|cwen geweald ) : 
 " hu mæg|magan þæm|se geweorðan þu|þe|se on|an westen|westan 
 meðe and meteleas morland trydeð , 
 hungor hæftan , and him|hi|he hlaf and stan 
 on|an gesiht buan samod geweorðað , 
 streac and hnesce , þæt|se he se stan niman 
 wiþ|wið hungor hleo , hlaf nesan|neh|ne gime , 
 gewendan toh|to wædle , and þu|þa|se witan|wist wiðsæce , 
 betera wiðhyccge , þonne|se he began beneah gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se seon|seo|se eadig ondwyrde agifan|agiefan 
 elene for|faran eorlum undearnunga : 
 " gif þu in heofonrice habban willan 
 eard mid engel and on|an eorþ|eorðe lif , 
 sigorlean in swegl|swegel , secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan ricene me|ic 
 hwær seon|seo|se rod wunian radorcyninges , 
 halig under hruse , þu|þe|se ge hwil nu 
 þurh morðres munan|mann|man mann dyrndun . " 
 iudas maðelade , ( him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon geomor sefa , 
 hatan|hat æt|etan heorte , and gehwæðres wa , 
 ge he heofonrices hyht swa mod 
 and þes ondwearde anforlætan , 
 romana under roderum , ge he þe|þa|ða|se rode|rod nesan|neh|ne tæсan|tæcan ) : 
 " hu mæg|magan ic þæt|se findan þæt|se swa fyrn gewearð 
 wintra|winter gang gewinnan|geblandan wesan|seon|is nu worn sceacen , 
 cc oððe micel geteled riman|rim . 
 ic nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan areccan , nu ic þæt|se riman|rim nesan|neh|ne сinan|cunnan . 
 wesan|seon|is nu feala siðþan forðgewitenra 
 frod and god þu|þe|se we|us for|faran wesan|seon|beon , 
 gleaw guma . ic on|an geogoðe wearð 
 on|an siðdagum siððan acennan , 
 cnihtgeong hæleð . ic nesan|neh|ne сinan|cunnan þæt|se ic nytan , 
 findan on|an fyrhðe þæt|se swa fyrn gewearð . " 
 elene maðelade him|hi|he on|an ondsware : 
 " hu wesan|seon|is þæt|se weorþan|geweorþan on|an þes werþeode 
 þæt|se ge swa monigfeald on|an gemynd witan , 
 all tacnian|tacn|tacen gehwylc swa troiana 
 þurh gefeohtan|gefeoht fremman gewinnan|geblandan þæt|se wesan|seon|beon fyr mycle , 
 open ealdgewin , þonne|se þes|þeoh|se æðele gewyrd , 
 gear gongum . ge þæt|se geare|gear cunnan 
 edre gereccan , hwæt#2 þær eall wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an manrime morðorslehtes , 
 dareðlacendra dead gefeallan|feallan 
 under bordhagan . ge þu|þa|se byrgenn 
 under stanhleoðum , and þu|þa|se stow swa some , 
 and þu|þa|se wintergerim on|an gewrit settan . " 
 iudas maðelade , gnornsorge wegan : 
 " we se hereweorces , hlæfdige min|ic , 
 for|faran nydþearfe neah myndgian , 
 and þu|þa|se wiggþræce on|an gewrit settan , 
 þeod gebæru , and þes næfre 
 þurh ænig mann muð gehyrdan|gehyran 
 hæleðum cyþan , butan heran|her nu þe|þa|ða|se . " 
 him|hi|he seon|seo|se æðele cwen agifan|agiefan ondsware : 
 " wiðsæcest þu toh|to swiðe|swiðan soð and rihte|rihtan|riht 
 ymb þæt|se lifes|lif treow , and nu lytel ær 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan soþlice|soðlice be þæm|þam|se sigebeam 
 leode|leoda|leod þin , and nu on|an liсgan|leon cyrrest . " 
 iudas hire|heo ongeagn þingian , cweðan þæt|se he þæt|se on|an gehðu gesprecan 
 and on|an tweo swiðe , wendan|wenan him|hi|he trage hnah . 
 him|hi|he oncwæð hraðe casere|caser mæg|magan : 
 " hwæt#2 , we þæt|ðæt|se hyrdan|hyran þurh halig bec 
 hæleðum cyþan þæt|se ahon wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an caluarie cyning freobearn , 
 god gastsunu . þu sculan geagninga 
 wisdom onwreon , swa gewrit secgaþ , 
 æfter stedewange hwær seon|seo|se stow wesan|seon|nesan 
 caluarie , ær þec cwealm niman , 
 sweltan for|faran synn , þæt|se ic hi|heo siððan mæge|mæg|magan 
 geclænsian criste toh|to willan|willa , 
 hæleðum toh|to helpan , þæt|se me|ic halig god 
 gefyllan , frea mihtig , feorh ingeþanc , 
 weoruda wuldorgeofa , willan|willa min , 
 gast geocend . " hire|heo iudas oncwæð 
 stiðhycgende : " ic þu|þa|se stow nesan|neh|ne сinan|cunnan , 
 nesan|neh|ne se wang wiht nesan|neh|ne þu|þa|se wise|wis cunnan|cann . " 
 elene maðelode þurh eorne hyсgan|hyg|hycgan : 
 " ic þæt|se geswerian þurh sunu meotodes , 
 se ahangnan god , þæt|se þu hungor sculan 
 for|faran cneomagum cwylmed weorðan , 
 butan þu forlætan þu|þa|se leasung 
 and me|ic sweotollice soð gecyðe . " 
 hatan þu|þa|se swa cwic corðre lædan , 
 scufan scyldigne ( scealcas nesan|neh|ne gælan ) 
 in dryge seaþ , þær he duguða leas 
 siomode in sorh|sorg seofon nihtian|niht|neaht fyrst 
 under hearmlocan hungor þreatian , 
 clommum beclungen , and þu|þa|se cleopigan onginnan 
 sar besylced on|an se seofeðan dæg , 
 meðe and meteleas , ( mægen|magan wesan|seon|beon geswiðrod ) : 
 " ic ge|eowan|eow healsie þurh heofon god 
 þæt|se ge me|ic of ðyssum earfeðum up forlætan , 
 hean|heah fram hungor geniðlan . ic þæt|se halig treo 
 lust cyþan , nu ic hit lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 helan for|faran hungor . wesan|seon|is þes hæftan toh|to ðan strang , 
 þreanyd se þearl and þes þroht toh|to se heard 
 dogorrimum . ic adreogan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , 
 nesan|neh|ne lengan|leng|lange helan be ðam|se lifes|lif treo , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic ær mid dysig þurhdrifan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 and þæt|ðæt|se soð toh|to læt|late seolf gecnawan . " 
 þu|þa|se þæt|ðæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran se þær hæleðum sceadan , 
 beorn gebæro , hio bebeodan hraðe 
 þæt|se he munan|mann|man of nearu|nearo and of nydcleofan , 
 fram þæm|þam|se engan hofe|hof|hebban , up forlætan . 
 hi|heo þæt|ðæt|se ofstlice efnan sona , 
 and he mid are|ar up gelædan 
 of carcern , swa him|hi|he seon|seo|se cwen bebeodan . 
 stæppan|steppan þu|þa|se toh|to þære|se stow stiðhycgende 
 on|an þu|þa|se dun up þu|þe|ðe dryhten ær 
 ahon wesan|seon|beon , heofonrices weard , 
 godbearn on|an galgan , and hwæðre geare|gear nytan , 
 hungor gehyned , hwær se halig rod , 
 þurh feond searu folde tynan , 
 lange|lang legere fæstan|fæst leode|leoda|leod dyrne 
 wunian wælreste . word stunde ahebban 
 ellen oncyðig , and on|an ebrisc sprecan : 
 " dryhten hælend , þu þu|þe|ðe agan dom geweald , 
 and þu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan þurh þin wuldor miht 
 heofon and eorþ|eorðe and holmþræce , 
 sæ sid fæðm , samod ealle|eall|eal gesceaft , 
 and þu ametan mund þin 
 eall|eal ymbhwyrft and uprador , 
 and þu self sitest , sigorian|sigor waldend , 
 ofer þæm|þam|se æðelestan engelcynne , 
 þu|þe|se geond lyft farað sunnan|leoht bewundene , 
 mycle mægenþrymme . nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þær mannian|mann gecynd 
 of eorðwegum up gefere|gefera 
 in lichoman mid þu|þa|se leoht gedryht , 
 wuldor arisan|ar . þu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan þu|þa|se 
 and toh|to þegnung þinne|þin gesettan , 
 halig and heofonlic . þær|se on|an had wesan|seon 
 in sindreame six nemnan|genemnan , 
 þu|þa|se ymbsellan synt mid syxum eacan|eac 
 fiðrum gefrætwad , fæger scinan . 
 þær|se wesan|seon feower þu|þe|se on|an flihte wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 þu|þa|se þegnung þrymm beweotigaþ 
 for|faran onsyne ece deman|dema , 
 singallice singan in wuldor 
 hædrum stefn heofoncininges lof , 
 woða wlitegaste , and þes word cweðan 
 clæne stefn , ( þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|is ceruphin nama ) : 
 'halig wesan|seon|is se halig|halgian|halga|haleg heahengla god , 
 weoroda wealdend ! wesan|seon|is se wuldor ful 
 heofun and eorþ|eorðe and eall|eal heahmægen , 
 tire tacnian|getacnian .' syndon twegen on|an þæm|þam|se , 
 sigorcynn on|an swegl|swegel , þu|þe|se munan|mann|man seraphin 
 be naman|nama hateð . he sculan neorxnawang 
 and lifes|lif treo legene sweord 
 halig healdan|heald . heardecg cwacian , 
 beofaþ brogdenmæl , and bleo wrixleð 
 grap gryrefæst . se þu , god dryhten , 
 wealdest wid fyrhð , and þu womfulle 
 scyldwyrcende sceaþa of radorum 
 aweorpan wonhydige . þu|þa|se se werig sceolu 
 under heolstorhofu hreosan sculan 
 in wite|wita forwyrd , þær hi|heo in wylme nu 
 dreogan deaðcwale in draca fæðme , 
 þeostru forþylmed . he þin wiðsoc 
 aldordome . se he in ermðum sculan , 
 eall|eal fulian|ful ful , fah þrowian , 
 þeowned þolian . þær he þu|þin nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 word aweorpan , wesan|seon|is in wite|wita fæstan|fæst , 
 eall|eal synn fruma , susl gebunden|gebindan|bindan . 
 gif þu|þin willian|willa wesan|seon|nesan , wealdend engel , 
 þæt|se ricsian se þu|þe|ðe on|an rode|rod wesan|seon|beon , 
 and þurh marian in middangeard 
 acennan wearð in cildes had , 
 þeon|þeodan engel , ( gif he þu|þin nesan 
 sunu synn|syn leas , næfre he soð swa feala 
 in woruldrice wundrian|wundor|wund gefremian 
 dogorgerimum ; no þu of deaðe he 
 swa þrymlice , þeod wealdend , 
 aweссan for|faran weorodum , gif he in wuldor þu|þin 
 þurh þe|þa|ða|se beorht birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn nesan|neh|ne wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ) , 
 gedon nu , fæder engel , forþ|forð beacen þu|þin . 
 swa þu gehyrdan|gehyran se halig|halga|haleg wer 
 moyses on|an meðle , þu|þa|se þu , miht|meaht god , 
 geywan þæm|þam|se eorle on|an þu|þa|se æðele tidan|tid 
 under beorhhliðe ban iosephes , 
 swa ic þu|þe|se , werod wyn , gif hit wesan|seon|nesan willian|willa þu|þin , 
 þurg þæt|se beorht gesceap biddan willan 
 þæt|se me|ic þæt|se goldhord , gast scyppend , 
 geopenie , þæt|se yld wesan|seon|beon 
 lange|lang behydan . forlætan|forlædan nu , lifes|lif fruma , 
 of ðam|se wangstede wynsum up 
 under radores ryne recan astigan 
 lyftlacende . ic gelyfan þu|þe|se sel 
 and þywan|þy|þe|se fæstlicor ferhð staðelige , 
 hyht untweondne , on|an se ahangnan crist , 
 þæt|se he wesan|seon|nesan soþlice|soðlice sawol|sawlian|sawel nergend , 
 ece ælmihtig , israhela cining , 
 walde wid ferhð wuldor on|an heofenum , 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a butan ende eсe gestealda . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se of se stow steam up arisan|ar 
 swilce recan under radorum . þær aræran wearð 
 beorn breostsefa . he mid begen hand , 
 eadig and ægleaw , upweard plegade . 
 iudas maþelian , gleaw in geþanc : 
 " nu ic þurh soð hafu seolf gecnawan|cnawan 
 on|an heard hige þæt|se þu hælend wesan|seon 
 middangeard . wesan|seon|nesan þu|þe|ðe , mægena god , 
 þrymsittendum þanc butan ende , 
 se þu me|ic swa meðum and swa manweorcum 
 þurh þu|þin wuldor|seolh|bearm inwrige wyrd geryno . 
 nu ic þu|þe|se , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god , biddan willan , 
 weoroda willgifa , nu ic witan þæt|se þu wesan|seon 
 gecyðed and acennan all cyning þri , 
 þæt|se þu micel nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|nesan min gylta , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ic gefremian nalles feam siðum , 
 metud , gemyndig . lætan|læt|lædan mec , miht|meaht god , 
 on|an rimtale rices þin 
 mid halig hlyte wunigan 
 in þære|se beorht burh|burg , þær wesan|seon|is broðor min|ic 
 geweorðod in wuldor , se he wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon wiþ|wið þec , 
 stephanus , healdan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he stangreopum 
 worpod wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . he hafað wigges lean , 
 blæd butan blinnan . wesan|seon in boc hit|his|he 
 wundor þu|þa|se he wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan on|an gewrit cyðed . " 
 onginnan þu|þa|se wilfægen æfter þæm|þam|se wuldor treo , 
 ellen anhydig , eorþ|eorðe delfan 
 under turfhagan , þæt|se he on|an twentig 
 fotmælum feor findan behelede , 
 under neol niðer næsse gehydde 
 in þeostorcofan . he þær þri metan 
 in þæm|þam|se reonian hofe|hof|hebban rod ætsomne , 
 greotan begrauene , swa hio geardagum 
 arleas sceolu eorþ|eorðe beþeссan|beþeccan , 
 iudea cynn . hi|heo wiþ|wið god bearn 
 nið ahofun , swa hi|heo no sculan , 
 þær hi|heo leahtra fruma lar nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon modgemynd micel geblissian|blissian , 
 hige onhyrdan , þurh þæt|se halig treo , 
 inbryrded breostsefa , siððan beacen geseh , 
 halig under hruse . he mid hand befon 
 wuldor wynbeam , and mid weorod ahebban 
 of foldgræfe . feðegestas 
 gan|eadan , æðelingas , in on|an þu|þa|se ceaster . 
 asettan þu|þa|se on|an gesiht sigebeam þri 
 eorl anhydige for|faran elene cneo , 
 collenferhðe . cwen weorc gefeon 
 on|an ferhðsefan , and þu|þa|se frignan onginnan 
 on|an hwylca|hwilc þær|se beam birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wealdende , 
 hæleða hyhtgifa , hon wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon : 
 " hwæt#2 , we þæt|se hyrdan|hyran þurh halig bec 
 tacn|tacen cyþan , þæt|se twegen mid him|hi|he 
 geþrowedon , and he wesan|seon|beon þridda self 
 on|an rode|rod treo . rodor eal geswearc 
 on|an þu|þa|se sliðan tidan|tid . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan , gif þu cunnan , 
 on|an hwylcre þyssa þri þeon|þeodan engel 
 geþrowode , þrymm hyrdan|hyran|hirde . " 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hire|heo iudas , nesan|neh|ne ful gear witan|wist , 
 sweotol gecyþan be ðam|se sigebeam , 
 on|an hwilc se hælend ahebban wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 sigebearn god , ær he asettan hatan 
 on|an se middel þære|se mære|mæran burh|burg 
 beam mid bearhtme , and gebidan þær 
 oððæt him|hi|he gecyðde cyning ælmihtig 
 wundor for|faran weorodum be ðam|se wuldor treo . 
 gesittan sigerofe , singan|sang ahebban , 
 rædþeahtende , ymb þu|þa|se rod þri 
 oþ|oð þu|þa|se nigoðan tidan|tid , habban neowe gefea 
 mærðum metan|gemetan . þu|þa|se þær menigo cuman , 
 folc unlytel , and gefærenne munan|mann|man 
 bringan|brengan on|an beran beorn þreate 
 on|an neahwest , ( wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se nigoðe tidan|tid ) , 
 gingne gastleas . þu|þa|se þær iudas wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an modsefa micel geblissian|blissian . 
 hatan þu|þa|se asettan sawlleasne , 
 lif belidenes liс|lic on|an eorþ|eorðe , 
 unlifgendes , and up ahebban 
 riht wemend þær|se rod twegen|twa 
 fyrhðgleaw on|an fæðme ofer þæt|se fæge|fægan hus , 
 deophycgende . hit wesan|seon|beon dead swa ær , 
 liс|lic legere fæstan|fæst . leomu colian 
 þreanedum beþeссan|beþeccan . þu|þa|se se þridde wesan|seon|beon 
 ahebban halig . hra wesan|seon|beon on|an anbide 
 oððæt him|hi|he uppan æðelinges wesan|seon|beon 
 rod aræran , rodorcyninges beam , 
 sigebeacen soð . he sona arisan|ar 
 gast gegearwian|gearwian , geador buan samod 
 liс|lic and sawel . þær wesan|seon|beon lof hebban 
 fæger mid þywan|þy|þe|se folc . fæder weorðodon , 
 and se soð sunu wealdende 
 word herian|heredon . wesan|seon|nesan him|hi|he wuldor|seolh|bearm and þanc 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a butan ende eall gesceafta ! 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se folc on|an ferhðsefan , 
 ingemynde , swa him|hi|he wifcynn|hosp|flet|a sculan , 
 wundor þu|þa|se þu|þe|se wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan weoroda dryhten 
 toh|to feorhnere firas cynn , 
 lifes|lif lattiow . þu|þa|se þær ligesynnig 
 on|an lyft astigan lacan feond . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se hleoðrian helledeofol , 
 eatol æclæca , yfel gemyndig : 
 " hwæt#2 wesan|seon|is þes , la , mannian|mann , þu|þe|se min eft 
 þurh fyrngeflit folgian wyrdeð , 
 iceð eald nið , æht strudeð gewinnan|geblandan 
 þes wesan|seon|is singal sacu . sawol|sawlian|sawel nesan|neh|ne motan 
 manfremmende in minum|min lengan|leng|lange 
 æht wunigan . nu cuman elþeodig , 
 se ic ær on|an firen fæst talde , 
 hafað mec bereafian riht gehwilc , 
 feohgestreona . nesan þæt|ðæt|se fæger sið . 
 feala me|ic se hælend hearma gefremian , 
 niða nearolicra , se þu|þe|ðe in nazareð 
 afeded wesan|seon|beon . siððan furþum weaxan 
 of cildhad , simble cyrran toh|to him|hi|he 
 æht min . nesan|neh|ne motan|mot ænig nu 
 rihte|rihtan|riht spowan . wesan|seon|is hit|his|he romana brad 
 ofer middangeard . min|ic wesan|seon|is geswiðrod 
 rædan|ræd under roderum . ic þu|þa|se rode|rod nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 hleahtor herigean . hwæt#2 , se hælend me|ic 
 in þæm|þam|se engan ham oft getynde , 
 geomor toh|to sorh|sorg ! ic þurh iudas ær 
 hyhtful gewearð , and nu gehyned wesan|seon|eoh , 
 god geasne , þurh iudas eft , 
 fah and freondleas . gen ic findan сinan|cunnan 
 þurh wrohtstafas wiðercyr siððan 
 of ðam|se wearhtreafum , ic awecce wiþ|wið þu|þe|ðe 
 oðer cyning , se ehteð þu|þin , 
 and he forlæteð lar þin 
 and manþeawum minum|min folgian , 
 and þec þonne|se sendeð in þu|þa|se sweartestan 
 and þu|þa|se wyrrestan witebrogan , 
 þæt|se þu , sar forseсan|forsecan , wiðsæcest fæstan|fæst 
 se ahangnan cyning , þæm|þam|se þu hyrdan|hyran ær . " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se gleawhydig iudas oncwæð , 
 hæleð hildedeor , ( him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon halig gast 
 befeolan fæstan|fæst , fyrhat lufu , 
 weallan gewitt|gewitan þurh wittig snytro ) , 
 and þæt|se word cweðan , wisdom ful : 
 " nesan|neh|ne þurfan þu swa swiðe|swiðan , synn|syn gemyndig , 
 sar niwigan and sæce ræran , 
 morðres manfrea , þæt|se þu|þe|se se mihtig cyning 
 in neolnes nyðer bescufeð , 
 synwyrcende , in susl grund 
 dom leas , se þu|þe|ðe dead feala 
 word awehte . wite|witan þu þu|þe|se gearwor 
 þæt|se þu unsnyttrum anforlætan 
 leoht beorhtost and lufu|lufe dryhten , 
 se fæger gefea , and on|an fyrbæðe 
 susl beþringan siððan wunian , 
 ad onælan , and þær awa sculan , 
 wiðerhycgende , wergðu dreogan , 
 yrmðu butan ende . " elene gehyrdan|gehyran 
 hu se feond and se freond geflitu ræran , 
 tireadig and trag , on|an twegen|twa halfa , 
 synnig and gesælig . sefa wesan|seon|beon þu|þe|se glæd 
 se þu|þe|se heo gehyrdan|gehyran se hellesceaþan 
 oferswiðedne , synn|syn brytta , 
 and þu|þa|se wundrade ymb se wer snytro , 
 hu he swa geleafful on|an swa lytel fæc 
 and swa uncyðig æfre weorþan , 
 gleawnes þurhgoten . god þancian , 
 wuldorcyning , se hire|heo se willian|willa gelimpan 
 þurh birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god began gehwæðres , 
 ge æt|etan þære|se gesiht se sigebeam , 
 ge se geleafa þu|þe|se hio swa sunnan|leoht oncnawan , 
 wuldorfæste gifu|gifan in se wer breost . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon gefrege in þære|se folcsceare , 
 geond þu|þa|se werþeode wid lædan , 
 mære|mæran morgenspel manig on|an anda 
 þær|se þu|þe|se dryhten æ dyrne willan , 
 beodan æfter burh|burg , swa brimo fæðmeð , 
 in ceaster gehwære , þæt|se cristes rod , 
 fyrn folde begrafan , findan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 sellan sigebeacna þær|se þu|þe|se sið oððe ær 
 halig under heofenum ahebban weorþan , 
 and wesan|seon|beon iudeum gnornsorga micel , 
 wer wansælig , wyrd laðost , 
 þær hi|heo hit for|faran weorold wendan magan , 
 cristen gefea . þe|þa|ða|se se cwen bebeodan 
 ofer eorlmægen arisan|ar fysan 
 ricene toh|to rad . sculan romwarena 
 ofer hean|heah holm hlaford secean 
 and þæm|þam|se wiggende wilspella micel 
 seolfum gesecgan , þæt|se þæt|ðæt|se sigorbeacen 
 þurh meotodes est metan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 findan in folde , þæt|se ær feala mæl 
 behydan wesan|seon|beon halig|halga|haleg toh|to teonan , 
 cristen folc . þu|þa|se ðam|se cininge wearð 
 þurh þu|þa|se mære|mæran word mod geblissian|blissian , 
 ferhð gefeon . næs|nesan þu|þa|se fricgendra 
 under goldhoman gad in burh|burg , 
 feorran|feorr|feor geferede . wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he frofor micel 
 weorþan|geweorþan in worlde æt|etan ðam|se willspelle , 
 hlihende hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , þu|þe|se him|hi|he hereræswan 
 ofer eastwegas , arisan|ar bringan|brengan , 
 hu gesund sið ofer swonrade 
 secg mid sigecwen asettan habban 
 on|an creca land|finna . hi|heo se casere|caser hatan 
 ofost micel eft gearwian 
 self toh|to siþ . secg nesan|neh|ne gælan 
 siððan andswaru edre gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 æðelinges word . hatan he elene hælan|helan 
 abeodan beadurofre , gif hi|heo brim nesan 
 and gesund sið settan motan , 
 hæleð hwætmode , toh|to þære|se halig|halga|haleg burh|burg . 
 hatan hire|heo þu|þa|se arisan|ar eacan|eac gebeodan 
 constantinus þæt|se hio cirican þær 
 on|an þæm|þam|se beorhhliðe begra ræde|ræd 
 getimbrede , templ|tempel dryhten 
 on|an caluarie criste toh|to willan|willa , 
 hæleðum toh|to helpan , þær se halig rod 
 metan|gemetan wesan|seon|beon , mærost beam 
 þær|se þu|þe|se gefrignan|frignan|fregnan foldbuend 
 on|an eorðwege . hio geefnde swa , 
 siððan winemagas weste|westan bringan|brengan 
 ofer lagufæsten leofspell manig . 
 þe|þa|ða|se seon|seo|se cwen bebeodan cræft getyde 
 sundor asecean þu|þa|se selestan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se wrætlicost wyrcan cuðon 
 stangefogum , on|an þæm|þam|se stedewange 
 girwan god templ|tempel , swa hire|heo gast weard 
 rædan|reord of roderum . heo þu|þa|se rode|rod hatan 
 gold beweorcean and gimcynnum , 
 mid þæm|þam|se æðelestum eorcnanstan 
 besettan searocræftum and þu|þa|se in seolfren fæt 
 loc belucan . þær þæt|se lifes|lif treo , 
 sellan sigebeam , siððan wunian 
 æðele anbrece . þær bið wifcynn|hosp|flet|a gearu 
 wraðu wannhalum wite|wita gehwilc , 
 sæce and sorh|sorg . hi|heo sona þær 
 þurh þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg gesceaft helpan findan , 
 godcund gifu|gifan . swilce iudas onfon 
 æfter fyrstmearce fulwiht bæð , 
 and geclænsian|clænsian wearð criste getreowe , 
 lifwearde leof . hit|his|he geleafa wearð 
 fæstan|fæst on|an ferhðe , siððan frofor gast 
 wiс|wican|wic gewunian in se wer breost , 
 byldan toh|to bot . he þæt|se god|betera geceosan , 
 wuldor wynn , and þæm|þam|se wyrsa wiðsoc , 
 deofulgildum , and gedwola|gedwol fyllan|fyld|fylan , 
 unriht æ . him|hi|he wearð ece rex , 
 meotud milde , god , miht|meaht wealdend . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon gefulwad se þu|þe|ðe ær feala tid 
 sunnan|leoht gearu 
 inbryrded breostsefa on|an þæt|se god|betera lif , 
 wendan|gewendan toh|to wuldor . huru , wyrdan|wyrd gescreaf 
 þæt|se he swa geleaffull and swa leof god 
 in worldrice weorðan sculan , 
 criste gecweme . þæt|se gecyðed wearð , 
 siððan elene hatan eusebium 
 on|an rædgeþeaht , rome bisceop , 
 gefetian on|an fultuman|fultum , forðsnoterne , 
 hæleða geræde toh|to þære|se halig|halga|haleg burh|burg , 
 þæt|se he gesette|gesettan on|an sacerdhad 
 in ierusalem iudas þæm|þam|se folc 
 toh|to bisceop burh|burg on|an innan , 
 þurh gast gifu|gifan toh|to god templ|tempel 
 cræft gecorene , and he cyriacus 
 þurh snytro þeссean|þeссan|þeccan|geþeaht siððan nemnan 
 niwe stefn . nama wesan|seon|beon gecyrran 
 beorn in burh|burg on|an þæt|se god|betera forþ|forð , 
 æ hælend . þu|þa|se gen elene wesan|seon|beon 
 mod gemynd ymb þu|þa|se mære|mæran wyrdan|wyrd , 
 geneahhe for|faran þæm|þam|se nægl þu|þe|se se nergendes 
 fot|fedan þurhwadan and hit|his|he folm swa some , 
 mid þæm|þam|se on|an rode|rod wesan|seon|beon rodera wealdend 
 gefæstnian|fæstnian , frea mihtig . be ðam|se frignan onginnan 
 cristen cwen , cyriacus bædan|biddan 
 þæt|se hire|heo þu|þa|se ginian gast miht 
 ymb wundorwyrd willan|willa gefyllan , 
 onwreon wuldorgifu , and þæt|se word acwæð 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se bisceop , bald reordian : 
 " þu me|ic , eorl hleo , se æðele beam , 
 rode|rod rodera cininges ryhte getæhtesð , 
 on|an þu|þa|se ahon wesan|seon|beon hæðenum folm 
 gast geocend , god ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 nerigend firas . mec se næglian|nægl gen 
 on|an fyrhðsefan fyrwet myngaþ . 
 willan ic þæt|se þu findan þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe in folde gen 
 deop bedelfan dierne|diere wesan|nesan , 
 heolstre behydan . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a min|ic hige sorgað , 
 reonig reoteð , and geresteð no 
 ærþan me|ic gefyllan fæder ælmihtig , 
 wereda wealdend , willan|willa min , 
 niða nergend , þurh þær|se næglian|nægl cyme , 
 halig of hiehða . nu þu hrædlice 
 eall|eal eaðmedum , ar selesta , 
 þin ben onsendan in þe|þa|ða|se beorht gesceaft , 
 on|an wuldor wyn . biddan|bidan wiga þri 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se gecyðe , cyning ælmihtig , 
 hord under hruse þæt|se hydan gen , 
 duguðum dyrne , deogol bideð . " 
 þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg onginnan hyсgan|hyg|hycgan staðolian , 
 breost onbryrded , bisceop se folc . 
 glædmod gan|eadan guma þreate 
 god hergendra , and þu|þa|se geornlice 
 cyriacus on|an caluarie 
 hleor onhylde , hygerune nesan|neh|ne mað , 
 gast miht toh|to god cleopian 
 eall|eal eaðmedum , bædan|biddan him|hi|he engel weard 
 geopenigean uncuðe wyrdan|wyrd , 
 niwe on|an nearu|nearo , hwær he þær|se næglian|nægl swiðe 
 on|an þæm|þam|se wangstede wenan|wena þurfan . 
 lætan þe|þa|ða|se tacn|tacen|tacan forþ|forð , þær hi|heo toh|to seon , 
 fæder , frofor gast , þurh|ðurh fyr bleo 
 up eðigean þær þu|þa|se æðelestan 
 hæleða geræde hydan wesan|seon|beon 
 þurh nearusearwe , nægl on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 þe|þa|ða|se cuman semninga sunne|sunnan|sunna beorht 
 lacan lig . leode|leodan|leod geseon 
 hira|hi willgifan wundor cyþan , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þær of heolstre , swilce heofonsteorran 
 oððe goldgimmas , grund|grindan getenge , 
 nægl of nearu|nearo neoðan scinan 
 sunnan|leoht lixan . leode|leodan|leod gefeon , 
 weorud willhreðig , sægan|seсgan|secgan wuldor|seolh|bearm god 
 ealle|eall|eal anmode , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi|heo ær wesan|seon|beon 
 þurh deofol spildan in gedwola|gedwol lange|lang , 
 acyrred fram criste . hi|heo cweþan|cweðan þus : 
 " nu we seolfe geseoð sigor tacn|tacen|tacan , 
 soðwundor god , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah we wiðsocun ær 
 mid leasingum . nu wesan|seon|is in sunnan|leoht cymen , 
 onwreon , wyrd bigang . wuldor|seolh|bearm se agan 
 on|an heannesse heofonrices god ! " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon geblissian|blissian se þu|þe|ðe toh|to bot gehweorfan 
 þurh birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god , bisceop þær|se leode|leoda|leod , 
 niwe stefn . he þæm|þam|se nægl onfon , 
 egesa geaclod , and þære|se arwyrðan 
 cwene|cwen bringan|brengan . habban ciriacus 
 eall|eal gefyllan|fyllan , swa him|hi|he seon|seo|se æðele bebeodan , 
 wif willan|willa . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon wop hringan|hring , 
 hatan|hat heafodwylm ofer hleor geotan , 
 ( nalles for|faran torn tear feollan|feallan 
 ofer wira gespon ) , wuldor gefyllan|fyllan 
 cwene|cwen willian|willa . heo on|an cneow|cneo|cnawan settan 
 sunnan|leoht geleafa , lacan|lac weorðode , 
 bliss hremig , þu|þe|se hire|heo bringan wesan|seon|beon 
 gnyrna toh|to geoc . god þancian , 
 sigorian|sigor dryhten , se þu|þe|se hio soð gecnawan 
 ondweardlice þæt|se wesan|seon|beon oft bodian 
 feor ær beforan fram fruma weorold , 
 folc toh|to frofor . heo gefyllan|fyllan wesan|seon|beon 
 wisdom gifu|gifan , and þu|þa|se wiс|wican|wic behealdan 
 halig heofonlic gast , hreðer weardian , 
 æðele innoþ , swa hi|heo ælmihtig 
 sigebearn god sioððan freoðode . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se geornlice gastgerynum 
 on|an sefa secean soðfæstnesse 
 wegan|weg toh|to wuldor . huru , werod god 
 gefullæste , fæder on|an roderum , 
 cining ælmihtig , þæt|se seon|seo|se cwen begietan|begeotan 
 willan|willa in weorold . wesan|seon|beon se witedom 
 þurh fyrnwitan beforan singan 
 eall|eal æfter ord , swa hit eft gelimpan 
 ðinga gehwilc . þeodcwen onginnan 
 þurh gast gifu|gifan georne|geornan|georn sec 
 nearu|nearo geneahhe , toh|to hwinan hio þu|þa|se nægl selost 
 and deorlicost gedon|gedo|don magan , 
 dugoðum toh|to hroðer , hwæt#2 se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon dryhten willian|willa . 
 hatan þe|þa|ða|se gefetigean forðsnotterne 
 ricene toh|to run , se þu|þe|se rædgeþeaht 
 þurh gleaw miht georne|geornan|georn cuðe , 
 frod on|an ferhðe , and he frignan onginnan 
 hwæt#2 him|hi|he se on|an sefa selost þynсan|þyncan 
 toh|to gelæstan , and hit|his|he lar geceosan 
 þurh þeodscipe . he hire|heo þriste oncwæð : 
 " þæt|se wesan|seon|is gedafenlic þæt|se þu dryhten word 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan healdan|heald , halig run , 
 cwen seleste , and se cininges bebod 
 georne|geornan|georn begangan|begang , nu þu|þe|se god sellan 
 sawol|sawel sigesped and snytro cræftan|cræft , 
 nerigend firas . þu þes|se nægl hatan|hat 
 þæm|þam|se æðelestan eorðcyninga 
 burgagendra on|an hit|his|he bridels don , 
 mearh toh|to midlum . þæt|se manig sceall 
 geond middangeard mære|mæran weorðan , 
 þonne|se æt|etan sæcce mid þywan|þy|þe|se oferswiðan mæge|mæg|magan 
 feond gehwylcne , þonne|se fyrdhwate 
 on|an twegen|twa healf tohtan secaþ , 
 sweordgeniðlan , þær hi|heo ymb sige|sigan|seon winnað , 
 wrað wiþ|wið wrað . he agan|ac æt|etan wigge spedan|sped , 
 sigor æt|etan sæcce , and sybbe gehwær , 
 æt|etan gefeohtan|gefeoht frið , se þu|þe|ðe foran lædeð 
 bridels on|an blanca|blanc , þonne|se beadurofe 
 æt|etan garþræce , guma gecoste , 
 berað bord and ord . þes bið beorn gehwa 
 wiþ|wið æglæce unoferswiðed 
 wæpen æt|etan wigge . be ðam|se se wittig singan|sang , 
 snottor searuþancum , ( sefa deop gewadan , 
 wisdom gewitt|gewitan ) , he þæt|se word cweðan : 
 'cuþ þæt|se gewyrðeð þæt|se se cyning sculan 
 mearh under modegum midlum geweorðod , 
 bridelshringum . bið þæt|se beacen god 
 halig nemnan , and se hwæteadig , 
 wigge weorðod , se þæt|se wicg byrð .' " 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se ofstlice eall|eal gelæstan 
 elene for|faran eorlum . æðelinges hatan , 
 beorn beaggifan , bridels frætwan , 
 hire|heo selfre sunu sendan toh|to lacu|lacan|lac 
 ofer geofenes stream gifu|gifan unscynde . 
 hatan þu|þa|se tosamne þu|þa|se heo seleste 
 mid iudeum guma witan|wist , 
 hæleða cynn|cyn , toh|to þære|se halig|halga|haleg burh|burg 
 cuman|cuma in þu|þa|se ceaster . þu|þa|se seon|seo|se cwen onginnan 
 læran leof heap þæt|se hi|heo lufu|lufe dryhten , 
 and sybbe swa same sylfra betweonum , 
 freondræddenne , fæstan|fæst gelæstan 
 leahtorlease in hira|hi lifes|lif tidan|tid , 
 and se latteowes lar hyrdan|hyran , 
 cristen þeaw , þu|þe|se him|hi|he cyriacus 
 buan|beodan , bocian|boc gleaw . wesan|seon|beon se bissceophad 
 fæger befæstan . oft him|hi|he feorran|feorr|feor toh|to 
 lama , limseoce , lefan cuman , 
 healt , heorudreorige , hreofe and blind , 
 hean|heah , hygegeomre , simble hælu þær 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se bisceop , bot findan 
 ece toh|to ald . þe|þa|ða|se gen him|hi|he elene forgifan|forgiefan 
 sincweorðunga , þu|þa|se hio wesan|seon|beon siðes fus 
 eft toh|to eðle , and þu|þa|se eall|eal bebeodan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se gumrice god hergendum , 
 wer and wif , þæt|se hi|heo weorðeden 
 mod and mægene se mære|mæran dæg , 
 heorte gehigdum , in ðam|se se halig rod 
 metan|gemetan wesan|seon|beon , mærost beam 
 þær|se þu|þe|se of eorþ|eorðe up aweoxe , 
 leodan under leaf . wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se lencten aginnan|agan 
 butan six niht|neaht ær sumer cyme 
 on|an maias kalend . wesan|seon|nesan þær|se mannian|mann gehwa 
 behlidan hell|hel duru , heofon ontynan , 
 ece geopenad engel romana , 
 dream unhwilen , and hira|hi dælan|dæl scired 
 mid marian , þu|þe|se on|an gemynd niman 
 þære|se deorestan dægweorðunga 
 rode|rod under roderum , þu|þa|se se ricesta 
 eall|eal oferwealdend earm beþeссan|beþeccan . finit . 
 þus ic frod and fus þurh þæt|se fæcne hus 
 wordcræftum wefan and wundor læs|lesan , 
 þragum þreodude and geþanc reodode 
 niht nearu|nearo . nytan ic gearu 
 be se rode|rod rihtan|riht ær me|ic rumran þeссean|þeссan|þeccan|geþeaht 
 þurh þe|þa|ða|se mære|mæran miht on|an mod þeccan 
 wisdom onwreon . ic wesan|seon|beon weorc fah , 
 synn asæled , sorh|sorg gewæled , 
 bitter|bitor|biter gebunden|gebindan|bindan , bisig beþringan , 
 ær me|ic lar onlag þurh leoht had 
 gamelum toh|to geoc , gifu|gifan unscynde 
 mægencyning ametan and on|an gemynd begietan|begeotan , 
 torht ontynan , tid gerymde , 
 bancofan onbindan , breostlocan onwand , 
 leoðucræft onlucan . se ic lust brucan , 
 willum in worlde . ic se wuldor treowe|treow 
 oft , nales æne , habban ingemynd 
 ær ic þæt|se wundor onwreon habban 
 ymb se beorht beam , swa ic on|an boc findan , 
 wyrd gang , on|an gewrit cyþan 
 be ðam|se sigebeacne . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wesan|seon|beon secg oþ|oð þæt|ðæt|se 
 cnyssed cearwelmum , drusende , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he in medohealle maðmas þege , 
 æplede gold . gnornian 
 gefere|gefera|gefer , nearusorge dreogan , 
 enge run , þær him|hi|he for|faran 
 milpaðas mætan|metan , modig þrægde 
 wirum gewlencan . wesan|seon|is geswiðrad , 
 gomen æfter gear , geogoð wesan|seon|is gecyrran , 
 ald onmedla . wesan|seon|beon gear 
 geogoðhades glæm . nu synt geardagas 
 æfter fyrstmearce forþ|forð gewitene , 
 lifwynne liþan|geliþan , swa toglideð , 
 flod gefysde . æghwam bið 
 lænan|læn under lyft ; land|finna frætwe 
 gewitan under wolcn|wolcen windan|wind geliccost , 
 þonne|se he for|faran hæleðum hlud astigeð , 
 wæðeð be wolcn|wolcen , wedan færeð 
 and eft semninga swige gewyrðeð , 
 in nedcleofan nearu|nearo geheaðrod , 
 þream forþrycced . 
 swa wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þes|þeoh|se world eall|eal gewiteð , 
 and eacan|eac swa some þu|þe|se hire|heo on|an wurdon|weorþan 
 atydrede , tionleg nimeð , 
 þonne dryhten self don|dom geseceð 
 engel weorude . sceall æghwylc þær 
 reordberend rihtan|riht gehyran 
 dæd gehwylcra þurh se deman|dema muð , 
 and word swa same wedan gesyllan , 
 eall unsnyttro ær gesprecenra , 
 þriste geþonca . þonne|se on|an þri dæleð 
 in fyr fon folc an gehwylc , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se geweorþan on|an wid feorh 
 ofer sid grund . soþfæst bioð 
 yfemest in þæm|þam|se ad , eadig gedryht , 
 duguð domgeorne , swa hi|heo adreogan magan 
 and butan earfeðum eaðe geþolian , 
 modig mægen|magan . him|hi|he gemetgaþ eall|eal 
 æled leoma , swa him|hi|he eðost bið , 
 self geseftost . synfull|synful beoð , 
 mane gemengan , in ðam|se midle þread , 
 hæleð higegeomre , in hat wylm , 
 þrosme beþehte . bið se þridda dælan|dæl , 
 awyrgede womsceaðan , in se wylmes grund , 
 leas leodhatan , liсgan|leon befæstan 
 þurh ærgewyrht , arleas sceolu , 
 in gleda grippan|gripe|gripan . god no siððan 
 of ðam|se morðorhofe in gemynd cumað , 
 wuldorcyning , acan|ac hi|heo worpene beoð 
 of ðam|se heaðuwylme in hellegrund , 
 torngeniðlan . bið þæm|þam|se twegen dæl 
 ungelice . motan engel frea 
 geseon , sigorian|sigor god . hi|heo asodene beoð , 
 asundrian fram synn , swa smæte gold 
 þæt|se in wylme bið womm gehwilc 
 þurh ofn fyr eall|eal geclænsian|clænsian , 
 amered and gemylted . swa bið þær|se mannian|mann ælc 
 ascyred and asceaden scylda gehwylcre , 
 deop firenian|firen , þurh se dom fyr . 
 motan þonne|se siðþan sybbe brucan , 
 ece eadwelan . him|hi|he bið engel weard 
 milde and bliðe , se þu|þe|ðe hi|heo manian gehwylc 
 forseon , synn|syn weorc , and toh|to sunu metudes 
 word cleopian . forðam hi|heo nu on|an wlite|wlitan scinan 
 engel gelice , yrfe brucan 
 wuldorcyning toh|to wid feorh . 
 amen . 
 
 oft him|hi|he anhaga are|ar gebideð , 
 metudes milts , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he modcearig 
 geond lagulade long|lange sculan 
 hreran mid hondum hrimcealde sæ , 
 wadan wræclast . wyrdan|wyrd bið ful arædan ! 
 swa cweðan eardstapa , earfeþa gemyndig , 
 wraþ wælsleahta , winemæga hryre : 
 " oft ic sculan ana|an uhtna gehwylc 
 min cearu cwiþan . nesan nu cwic nan 
 þu|þe|se ic him|hi|he modsefa min durran 
 sweotule asecgan . ic toh|to soþ witan 
 þæt|se beon in eorle indryhten þeaw , 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he ferðlocan fæstan|fæst bindan , 
 healdan|heald hit|his|he hordcofan , hycge swa he willan . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan werig mod wyrdan|wyrd wiðstondan , 
 nesan|neh|ne se hreo hyсgan|hyg|hycgan helpan gefremman . 
 forðam domgeorne dreorig oft 
 in hyra|hyr|hira|hi breostcofan bindað fæstan|fæst ; 
 swa ic modsefa min sculan , 
 oft earmcearig , eðle bidæled , 
 freomægum feor feter sælan , 
 siððan gear iu goldwine min 
 hruse heolstre biwrah , and ic hean|heah þanan 
 wod|wadan wintercearig ofer waþema gebindan , 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan seledreorig sinc brytta , 
 hwær ic feor oþþe|oððe neah findan magan 
 se þu|þe|se in meoduhealle min witan , 
 oþþe|oððe mec freondleas frefran willan , 
 wenian mid wynn . witan se þu|þe|se cunnað , 
 hu sliþen bið sorg toh|to gefere|gefera , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he lutan hafað leof geholena . 
 warað he wræclast , nales windan gold , 
 ferðloca freorig , nalæs folde blæd . 
 gemunan he selesecgas and sincþege , 
 hu he on|an geoguþ hit|his|he goldwine 
 wennan toh|to witan|wist . wyn eal gedreas ! 
 forðam witan se þu|þe|se sculan hit|his|he winedryhtnes 
 leof larcwidum long|lange forþolian , 
 þonne sorg and slæpan somod ætgædre 
 earm anhogan oft gebindað . 
 þinceð him|hi|he on|an mod þæt|se he hit|his|he mondryhten 
 clyppan and cyssan , and on|an cneo lecgan 
 honda and heafod , swa he hwilum|hwil ær 
 in geardagum giefstolas brucan . 
 þonne onwæcneð eft wineleas guma , 
 gesiht him|hi|he biforan fealu weg , 
 baþian brimfuglas , brædan feþer , 
 hreosan hriman|hrim and snaw , hagle mengan|gemengan . 
 þonne|se beoð þywan|þy|þe|se hefigran heorte benne , 
 sar æfter swæs . sorg bið geniwad , 
 þonne|se mæg|mecgan|magian|maga gemynd mod geondhweorfeð ; 
 greteð gliwstafum , georne|geornan|georn geondsceawað 
 secg geseldan . swimmað eft on|an wegan|weg . 
 fleotendra ferð no þær fela bringeð 
 cuþ cwidegiedda . cearo bið geniwad 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se sendan sculan swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe geneahhe 
 ofer waþema gebindan werig sefa . 
 forðam ic geþencan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan geond þes weorold 
 for|faran hwinan modsefa min|ic nesan|neh|ne gesweorce , 
 þonne|se ic eorl lif eal geondþence , 
 hu hi|heo færlice flet ofgiefan , 
 modig maguþegnas . swa þes middangeard 
 eall|eal dogra gehwa dreoseð and fealleþ , 
 forðam nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan weorþan|weorþ wis wer , ær he agan 
 wintra|winter dælan|dæl in woruldrice . wite|wita sculan geþyldig , 
 nesan|neh|ne sculan no toh|to hatheort nesan|neh|ne toh|to hrædwyrde , 
 nesan|neh|ne toh|to wican|wacan|wac wiga|wig nesan|neh|ne toh|to wanhydig , 
 nesan|neh|ne toh|to forht nesan|neh|ne toh|to fægen|fægan , nesan|neh|ne toh|to feohgifre 
 nesan|neh|ne næfre gielp toh|to geornan|georn , ær he geare|gear cunnan . 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan sculan gebidan , þonne|se he beatan spriceð , 
 oþþæt collenferð cunnan gearu 
 hwider hreþer gehygd hweorfan willan . 
 ongietan sculan gleaw hæle|hælan|helan hu gæstlic bið , 
 þonne|se eall|eal þes weorold wela weste|westan stondeð , 
 swa nu missenlice geond þes middangeard 
 windan|wind biwaune weall stondaþ , 
 hriman|hrim bihrorene , hryðge þu|þa|se ederas . 
 woriað þu|þa|se winsalo , waldend licgað 
 dream bidrorene , duguþ eal gecrong , 
 wlonc bi|be weallan|weall . sum wigan|wig forniman , 
 ferian in forðwege , sum fugel oþbær 
 ofer hean|heah holm , sum se hara|har wulf 
 deaðe gedælan , sum dreorighleor 
 in eorðscræfe eorl gehydde . 
 yþan swa þes eardgeard æled scyppend 
 oþþæt burhware breahtm leas 
 eald ent geweorc idel standan . 
 se þonne|se þes wealsteal wise|wis geþenсan|geþencan 
 and þes deorc lif deop geondþenceð , 
 frod in ferðe , feor oft gemunan 
 wælsleahta worn , and þes word acwið : 
 " hwær cuman mearg gewinnan|geblandan hwær cuman mago gewinnan|geblandan hwær cuman maþþumgyfa gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwær cuman symbla gesetu gewinnan|geblandan hwær wesan|nesan seledreamas gewinnan|geblandan 
 eala beorht bune ! eala byrnwiga ! 
 eala þeodnes þri ! hu seon|seo|se þrag gewitan , 
 genap under nihthelm , swa heo no wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 stondeð nu on|an last leof duguþ 
 wealh wundor heah , wyrmlicum fah . 
 eorl fornoman ascian þryþe , 
 wæpen wælgifru , wyrdan|wyrd seon|seo|se mære|mæran , 
 and þes stanhleoþu storm cnyssað , 
 hrið hreosan hruse bindeð , 
 winter woma|wom , þonne|se woh cymeð . 
 nipeð nihtscua , norþan|norþ onsendeð 
 hreo hæglfare hæleþ|hæle on|an anda . 
 eall|eal wesan|seon|is earfoðlic eorþe|eorþ romana , 
 onwendeð wyrd gesceaft weoruld under heofon . 
 heran|her bið feoh lænan|læn , heran|her bið freond lænan|læn , 
 heran|her bið mann|man lænan|læn , heran|her bið mæg|magan lænan|læn , 
 eal þes eorþe|eorþ gesteal idel weorþeð . " 
 swa cweðan snottor on|an mod , gesittan him|hi|he sundor æt|etan run . 
 til beon se þu|þe|se hit|his|he treowe|treow gehealdeþ , nesan|neh|ne sculan næfre hit|his|he torn toh|to rycene 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan of hit|his|he breost acyþan , nemþe he ær þu|þa|se bot cunnan , 
 eorl mid ellen gefremman . wel bið þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he are|ar seceð , 
 frofor toh|to fæder on|an heofon , þær we|us eal seon|seo|se fæstnung stondeð . 
 
 brucan|brocen|brecan weorþan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se hyssa hwæne hors forlætan , 
 feor afysan , and forþ|forð gangan , 
 hicgan toh|to hand and toh|to hige god . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se offan mæg|magan ærest|ær onfindan , 
 þæt|se se eorl nyllan|nillan yrhðo geþolian , 
 he lætan|lettan him|hi|he þu|þa|se of handon leof fleoge|fleogan 
 hafoc wiþ|wið se holtes , and toh|to þære|se hild stæppan|steppan . 
 be þæm|þam|se munan|mann|man miht|meaht|magan oncnawan þæt|se se cniht nyllan|nillan 
 wacian æt|etan þæm|þam|se wigan|wig , þu|þa|se he toh|to wæpn|wæpen fon . 
 eacan|eac him|hi|he willan eadric hit|his|he ealdor|eald gelæstan , 
 frea toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht ; onginnan þu|þa|se forþ|forð beran|bera 
 gar toh|to guþ . he habban god geþanc 
 þu|þa|se hwil þu|þe|se he mid hand healdan|heald miht|meaht|magan 
 bord and bradswurd ; beatan he gelæstan 
 þu|þa|se he ætforan hit|his|he frea feohtan sculan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se þær byrhtnoð onginnan beorn trymian , 
 ridan|rad and rædan , rinc tæсan|tæcan 
 hu hi|heo sculan standan and se stede healdan|heald , 
 and bædan|biddan þæt|se hyra|hyr|hira|hi randas rihte|rihtan|riht healdan 
 fæstan|fæst mid folman , and nesan|neh|ne forhtedon na . 
 þu|þa|se he habban þæt|se folc fæger getrymmed , 
 he lihtan þu|þa|se mid leodon þær him|hi|he leofost wesan|seon|beon , 
 þær he hit|his|he heorðwerod holdost witan|wist . 
 þu|þa|se standan on|an stæðe , stiðlice clypian 
 wicing ar , word mælan , 
 se on|an beatan abeodan brimliþend 
 ærænde toh|to þæm|þam|se eorle , þær he on|an ofer standan : 
 " me|ic sendan toh|to þu|þe|se sæmen snelle , 
 hatan þu|þe|ðe secgan þæt|se þu motan sendan raðe 
 beah|beag wiþ|wið gebeorg ; and ge|eowan|eow god|betera wesan|seon|is 
 þæt|se ge þes garræs mid gafol forgyldon , 
 þonne|se we swa heard hild dælon . 
 nesan|neh|ne þurfan we we|us spillan , gif ge spedan toh|to þæm|þam|se ; 
 we willað wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se gold grið fæstnian . 
 gif þu þat gerædan , þu|þe|se heran|her ricost wesan|seon , 
 þæt|se þu þin leode|leoda|leod lysan willan , 
 syllan sæmann on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi sylfra don|dom 
 feoh wiþ|wið freogan|freod , and niman frið æt|etan we|us , 
 we willian|willan mid þæm|þam|se sceattum we|us toh|to scype gangan , 
 on|an flot feran , and ge|eowan|eow friþ healdan|heald . " 
 byrhtnoð maþelian , bord hafenode , 
 windan|wand wac æsc , word mælan , 
 yrre|irre and anræd agifan|agiefan him|hi|he andswaru : 
 " gehyrdan|gehyran þu , sælida , hwæt#2 þes folc segeð gewinnan|geblandan 
 hi|heo willað ge|eowan|eow toh|to gafol gar syllan , 
 ættrynne ord and eald swurd , 
 þu|þa|se heregeatu þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow æt|etan hild nesan|neh|ne dugan|deah . 
 brimmanna bodian|boda|bod , abeodan eft ongeagn , 
 secgan þin leode|leoda|leod miccle laþ spell , 
 þæt|se heran|her styntan unforcuð eorl mid hit|his|he werod|weorod , 
 þu|þe|se willan|wil gealgean eþel þes , 
 æþelredes eard , ealdor min , 
 folc and folde . fealle|feallan sceolon 
 hæþen|hæðen æt|etan hild . toh|to heanlic me|ic þinceð 
 þæt|se ge mid ure|ur sceattum toh|to scype gangon 
 unbefohtene , nu ge þus feor hider 
 on|an yrnan|ure|irnan|iernan eard in becuman . 
 nesan|neh|ne sceole ge swa softe sincan|sinc gegangan ; 
 we|us sculan ord and ecg ær geseman , 
 grim guðplega , ær we gofol syllon . " 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se bord beran|bera , beorn gangan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an þæm|þam|se easteðe ealle|eall|eal standan . 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan þær for|faran wæter werod toh|to þæm|þam|se oðer : 
 þær cuman flowan flod æfter ebban , 
 lucan lagustreamas . toh|to lang hit him|hi|he þynсan|þyncan , 
 hwanne hi|heo togædere gar beron . 
 hi|heo þær pantan stream mid prasse bestandan , 
 eastseaxena ord and se æschere . 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan hyra|hyr|hira|hi ænig oþrum|oþer|oðer derian , 
 butan hwæt|hwa þurh flan flyht fyllan|fylan geniman . 
 se flod ut gewitan ; þu|þa|se flota standan gearowe , 
 wicing fela , wig georne|geornan|georn . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se hæleða hleo healdan|heald þu|þa|se bricge 
 wigan|wiga wigheardne , se wesan|seon|beon hatan wulfstan , 
 caf mid hit|his|he cynn . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon ceolan sunu , 
 þu|þe|se se forma munan|mann|man mid hit|his|he franca ofsceat 
 þu|þe|se þær baldlicost on|an þu|þa|se bricge stæppan|steppan . 
 þær standan mid wulfstane wigan|wiga unforht , 
 ælfere and maccus , modig twegen , 
 þu|þa|se nyllan|nillan æt|etan þæm|þam|se ford fleam gewyrcan , 
 acan|ac hi|heo fæstlice wiþ|wið þe|þa|ða|se fynd werian , 
 þu|þa|se hwil þu|þe|se hi|heo wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen wealdan motan . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo þæt|se ongietan and georne|geornan|georn geseon 
 þæt|se hi|heo þær bricgweardas biter findan , 
 onginnan lytegian þu|þa|se laðe gystas , 
 biddan þæt|se hi|heo upgangan aginnan|agan motan , 
 ofer se ford faran , feþan lædan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se eorl onginnan for|faran hit|his|he ofermod 
 alyfan land|finna toh|to fela laþere ðeode . 
 onginnan ceallian þu|þa|se ofer cald wæter 
 byrhtelmes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ( beorn gehlyston ) : 
 " nu ge|eowan|eow wesan|seon|is ryman , gað ricene toh|to we|us , 
 guma toh|to guþ . god ana|an witan 
 hwæt|hwa þære|se wælstow wealdan motan|mot . " 
 wadan þu|þa|se wælwulfas ( for|faran wæter nesan|neh|ne murnan ) , 
 wicing werod , westan|west|wesan ofer pantan , 
 ofer scir|defena wæter scyldas wegon , 
 lidmen toh|to land|finna linde beran . 
 þær ongeagn grama|gram gearowe standan 
 byrhtnoð mid beorn . he mid bord hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 wyrcan se wihagan , and þæt|se werod healdan|heald 
 fæstan|fæst wiþ|wið feond . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon feohtan|feoht neh , 
 tir æt|etan getohte . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se tidan|tid cuman 
 þæt|se þær fæge|fægan mann fealle|feallan sculan . 
 þær wearð hream ahebban , hremmas windan , 
 irnan|iernan|earn æs geornan|georn ; wesan|seon|beon on|an eorþe|eorþ cyrm . 
 hi|heo lætan þu|þa|se of folman feolhearde spere , 
 gegrundene gar fleoge|fleogan . 
 boga wesan|seon|beon bysig . bord ord onfon . 
 biter wesan|seon|beon se beaduræs . beorn feollan|feallan . 
 on|an gehwæðere hand , hyssas liсgan . 
 wund wearð wulfmær , wælræste geceosan , 
 byrhtnoðes mæg|magan ; he mid bil wearð , 
 hit|his|he swustersunu , swiðe|swiðan forheawen . 
 þær wærð wicing wiþerlean agyfen . 
 gehyrdan|gehyran ic þæt|se eadweard an slean 
 swiðe|swiðan mid hit|his|he sweord , swenges nesan|neh|ne wyrnan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he æt|etan fot feallan fæge|fægan cempa ; 
 se him|hi|he hit|his|he ðeoden þanc gesæde , 
 þæm|þam|se burþene , þu|þa|se he byre habban . 
 swa stemnetton stiðhicgende 
 hyse æt|etan hild , hycgan georne|geornan|georn 
 hwæt|hwa þær mid ord ærost miht|meaht|magan 
 on|an fægean mann feorh gewinnan , 
 wigan|wiga mid wæpn|wæpen . wæl|wel feolan on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 standan stædefæste . stihte hi|heo byrhtnoð , 
 bædan|biddan þæt|se hyssa gehwylc hycgan toh|to wigan|wig 
 þu|þe|se on|an denon willan don|dom gefeohtan . 
 wod|wadan þu|þa|se wig heard , wæpen up ahebban , 
 bord toh|to gebeorg , and wiþ|wið se beorn stæppan|steppan . 
 gan|eadan swa anræd eorl toh|to þæm|þam|se ceorle , 
 æghwæðer hyra|hyr|hira|hi oðer yfel hycgan . 
 sendan þe|þa|ða|se se særinc suþerne gar , 
 þæt|se wundian|gewundian wearð wiga hlaford . 
 he scufan þu|þa|se mid ðam|se scylde , þæt|se se sceaft toberstan , 
 and þæt|se spere sprengan , þæt|se hit springan ongeagn . 
 gegremod wearð se guðrinc ; he mid gar stingan 
 wlanc wicing , þu|þe|se him|hi|he þu|þa|se wund|windan forgifan|forgiefan . 
 frod wesan|seon|beon se fyrdrinc ; he lætan|lettan hit|his|he franca wadan 
 þurh se hysses hals . hand wisian 
 þæt|se he on|an þæm|þam|se færsceaðan feorh geræhte , 
 þe|þa|ða|se he oþer|oðer ofstlice sceotan|sceat , 
 þæt|se seon|seo|se byrne toberstan . he wesan|seon|beon on|an breost wund 
 þurh þe|þa|ða|se hringlocan . him|hi|he æt|etan heorte standan 
 ætterne ord . se eorl wesan|seon|beon þu|þe|se bliþra— 
 hlihhan|hliehhan|hlehhan þu|þa|se , modi munan|mann|man , sæd|secgan metod þanc 
 se dægweorc þu|þe|se him|hi|he drihten forgifan|forgiefan . 
 forlætan þu|þa|se dreng sum|su daroð of hand , 
 fleoge|fleogan of folman , þæt|se se toh|to forþ|forð gewitan 
 þurh se æþele æþelredes þicgan|þegen|geþicgan . 
 him|hi|he be healf standan hyse unweaxen , 
 cniht on|an gecampe , se full caflice 
 brædan|bregdan of þæm|þam|se beornan|beorn blodig gar , 
 wulfstanes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , wulfmær se geonga|geong , 
 forlætan forheardne faran eft ongeagn . 
 ord in gewadan , þæt|se se on|an eorþe|eorþ liсgan|licgan 
 þu|þe|se hit|his|he þeon|þeodan ær þearle geræhte . 
 gan|eadan þu|þa|se gesyrwed secg toh|to þæm|þam|se eorle— 
 he willan se beorn beah|beag gefecgan , 
 reofan|reaf and hring and gerenod swurd . 
 þu|þa|se byrhtnoð brædan|bregdan bill of sceðe , 
 brad and bruneccg , and on|an þu|þa|se byrnan slean . 
 toh|to raþe he gelette lidmanna sum|su , 
 þu|þa|se he se eorles earm amyrde . 
 feallan þu|þa|se toh|to folde fealohilte swurd— 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan he gehealdan heard mece , 
 wæpn|wæpen wealdan . þu|þa|se git þæt|se word cweðan 
 har hilderinc , hyssas byldan , 
 bædan|biddan gangan forþ|forð god geferan— 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan þu|þa|se on|an fot lengan|leng|lange fæstan|fæst gestandan . 
 he toh|to heofenum wlitan : 
 " geþancie þu|þe|se , ðeoda waldend , 
 eall|eal se wynn þu|þe|se ic on|an weorold gebidan . 
 nu ic agan|ac , milde metod , micel þearf 
 þæt|se þu minum|min gast god geunnan , 
 þæt|se min|ic sawul toh|to þu|þe|ðe siðian motan|mot 
 on|an þu|þin geweald , þeon|þeodan engel , 
 mid friþ ferian— ic wesan|seon|eoh frymdi toh|to þu|þe|se 
 þæt|se hi|heo helsceaðan hynan nesan|neh|ne motan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se he heawan hæðen scealcas 
 and begen þu|þa|se beorn þu|þe|se him|hi|he big standan , 
 ælfnoð and wulmær begen liсgan , 
 þe|þa|ða|se onemn hyra|hyr|hira|hi frea feorh gesellan . 
 hi|heo bugan þu|þa|se fram beaduwe þu|þe|se þær beon|beo|bannan nyllan|nillan . 
 þær wurdon|weorþan oddan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ærest|ær on|an fleam : 
 godric fram guþ , and se god forlætan 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he mænigne oft mear gesellan 
 ( he gehleop se eoh þu|þe|se agan hit|his|he hlaford , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se geræde þu|þe|se hit rihtan|riht nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon ) 
 and hit|his|he broðor mid him|hi|he begen ærndon , 
 godwine and godwig , guþ nesan|neh|ne gyman , 
 acan|ac wendan|wenan fram þæm|þam|se wigan|wig and se wudu sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 fleon|fleogan on|an þæt|se fæsten|fæstan and hyra|hyr|hira|hi feorh beorgan , 
 and mannian|mann micel þonne|se hit ænig mæð wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 gif hi|heo þu|þa|se geearnunga ealle|eall|eal gemunan 
 þu|þe|se he him|hi|he toh|to duguþ gedon|gedo|don habban . 
 swa him|hi|he offa on|an dæg ær asecgan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se meþelstede , þu|þa|se he gemot habban , 
 þæt|se þær modelice manig|manega sprecan 
 þu|þe|se eft æt|etan þærfe þolian nyllan|nillan . 
 þu|þa|se wearð afeallen se folc ealdor , 
 æþelredes eorl ; ealle|eall|eal geseon 
 heorðgeneatas þæt|se hyra|hyr|hira|hi heorra|heore liсgan|licgan . 
 þu|þa|se þær wendan|wenan forþ|forð wlanc þegenas ; 
 unearge mann efstan georne|geornan|georn . 
 hi|heo willan þu|þa|se ealle|eall|eal oðer twega , 
 lif forlætan oððe leof gewrecan . 
 swa hi|heo byldan forþ|forð birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ælfrices , 
 wiga|wig winter geong|gangan , word mælan ; 
 ælfwine þu|þa|se cweðan ( he on|an ellen sprecan ) : 
 " gemunað þu|þa|se mæl þu|þe|se we oft æt|etan meodo sprecan , 
 þonne|se we on|an bence beatan ahebban , 
 hæleð on|an heall , ymbe|ymb heard gewinnan|gewinn : 
 nu mæg|magan cunnian hwæt|hwa cennan|cene su . 
 ic wylle min æþele eall|eal gecyþan , 
 þæt|se ic wesan|seon|beon on|an myrcon miccles cynnes— 
 wesan|seon|beon min|ic ealdafæder ealhelm hatan , 
 wis ealdorman , woruldgesælig . 
 nesan|neh|ne sceolon me|ic on|an þære|se þeon|þeodan|þeod þegenas ætwitan 
 þæt|se ic of ðisse fyrd feran willan , 
 eard gesecan , nu min|ic ealdor ligeð 
 forheawen æt|etan hild . me|ic wesan|seon|is þæt|se hearma micel : 
 he wesan|seon|beon æghwæðer min|ic mæg|magan and min|ic hlaford . " 
 þu|þa|se he forþ|forð gan|eadan , fæhðe gemunan , 
 þæt|se he mid ord an geræhte 
 flota on|an þæm|þam|se folc , þæt|se se on|an folde liсgan|licgan 
 forwegen mid hit|his|he wæpn|wæpen . onginnan þu|þa|se wine manian , 
 frynd and gefere|gefera , þæt|se hi|heo forþ|forð gan|eadan . 
 offa gemælde , æscholt asceoc : 
 " hwæt#2 þu , ælfwine , hafian|habban ealle|eall|eal gemanian 
 þegenas toh|to þearf , nu ure|ur þeon|þeodan lið , 
 eorl on|an eorþ|eorðe . we|us wesan|seon|is eall|eal þurfan|þearf 
 þæt|se ure|ur æghwylc oþer|oðer byldan 
 wigan|wiga toh|to wigan|wig , þu|þa|se hwil þu|þe|se he wæpen mæge|mæg|magan 
 habban and healdan|heald , heard mece , 
 gar and god swurd . we|us godric hæfð , 
 earh oddan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , ealle|eall|eal beswicene . 
 wendan|wenan se formoni munan|mann|man , þu|þa|se he on|an mearh ridan|rad , 
 on|an wlanc þæm|þam|se wicge , þæt|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon hit ure|ur hlaford ; 
 forðam wearð heran|her on|an feld folc totwæman , 
 scyldburh tobrecan . abreoðe hit|his|he angin , 
 þæt|se he heran|her swa manig munan|mann|man aflymde ! " 
 leofsunu gemælde and hit|his|he linde ahebban , 
 bord toh|to gebeorg ; he þæm|þam|se beornan|beorn oncwæð : 
 " ic þæt|se gehatan|gehat , þæt|se ic heonan nelle 
 fleon fot trym , acan|ac willan furðor gan , 
 wrecan on|an gewinnan|gewinn min winedrihten . 
 nesan|neh|ne þurfan me|ic ymb sturmere stedefæst hælæð 
 word ætwitan , nu min|ic wine|win gecranc , 
 þæt|se ic hlafordleas ham siðie , 
 wendan|wenan fram wigan|wig , acan|ac me|ic sculan wæpen niman , 
 ord and iren . " he ful yrre|irre wod|wadan , 
 feohtan|feccan fæstlice— fleam he forhogode . 
 dunnere þu|þa|se cweðan , daroð acwehte , 
 unorne ceorl , ofer eall|eal clypian , 
 bædan|biddan þæt|se beorn gehwylc byrhtnoð wræc|wrecan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan na wandian se þu|þe|se wrecan þenceð 
 frea on|an folc , nesan|neh|ne for|faran feorh murnan . " 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo forþ|forð gan|eadan ; feorh hi|heo nesan|neh|ne reссan|reccan|recan . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se hiredmen heardlice feohtan , 
 gram garberend , and god biddan 
 þæt|se hi|heo motan gewrecan hyra|hyr|hira|hi winedrihten 
 and on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi feond fyllan|fylan gewyrcan . 
 him|hi|he se gysel onginnan geornlice fylstan ; 
 he wesan|seon|beon on|an norðhymbron heard cynn|cyn , 
 ecglafes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon æscferð nama . 
 he nesan|neh|ne wandian na æt|etan þæm|þam|se wigplegan , 
 acan|ac he fysan forþ|forð flan|fla genehe . 
 hwilum he on|an bord sceotan|sceat , hwilum beornan|beorn|beirnan tæsan : 
 æfre ymb stunde he sellan sum wund|windan , 
 þu|þa|se hwil þu|þe|ðe he wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen wealdan motan . 
 þu|þa|se git on|an ord standan eadweard se langian|lang , 
 gearu|gearo and geornful , gylpword sprecan 
 þæt|se he nyllan|nillan fleoge|fleogan fotmæl land|finna , 
 ofer bæc bugan , þu|þa|se hit|his|he beterian|betera leg . 
 he brecan se bordweall and wiþ|wið þu|þa|se beorn feohtan|feccan , 
 oðþæt he hit|his|he sincgyfan on|an þæm|þam|se sæmann 
 wurðlice wrecan , ær he on|an wæl liсgan|licgan . 
 swa dydan|don æþeric , æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele gefere|gefera|gefer , 
 fus and forðgeorn , feohtan|feccan eornoste . 
 sibyrhtes broðor and swiðe|swiðan manig oþer|oðer 
 cleofan cellod bord , cennan|cene hi|heo werian . 
 berstan bord lærig , and seon|seo|se byrne singan|sang 
 gryreleoða sum|su . þu|þa|se æt|etan guðe slean 
 offa se sælidan , þæt|se he on|an eorþ|eorðe feallan , 
 and þær gaddes mæg|magan grund geseсan|gesecan . 
 raðe wearð æt|etan hild offa forheawen . 
 he habban þeah geforþod þæt|se he hit|his|he frea hettan|gehatan , 
 swa he beotian ær wiþ|wið hit|his|he beahgifan 
 þæt|se hi|heo sculan begen on|an burh ridan|rida , 
 hal toh|to ham , oððe on|an herian|here|heran crincgan , 
 on|an wælstow wund sweltan . 
 he liсgan|licgan ðegenlice ðeodne gehende . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð bord gebrecan . brimmen wadan , 
 guðe gegremode ; gar oft þurhwadan 
 fæge feorhhus . forþ|forð þu|þa|se gan|eadan wistan , 
 þurstanes sunu , wiþ|wið þes secg feohtan|feccan ; 
 he wesan|seon|beon on|an geþringan hyra|hyr|hira|hi þri bana|ban , 
 ær him|hi|he wigelmes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn on|an þæm|þam|se wæl liсgan|licgan . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon stið gemot . standan fæstan|fæst 
 wigan|wiga on|an gewinnan|gewinn . wigend crincan , 
 wund werig|werian . wæl|wel feolan on|an eorþe|eorþ . 
 oswold and eadwold ealle|eall|eal hwil , 
 begen þu|þa|se gebroðor|broþor , beorn trymman , 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi winemagas wordon biddan 
 þæt|se hi|heo þær æt|etan ðearfe þolian sculan , 
 unwaclice wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen neotan . 
 byrhtwold maþelian bord hafenode 
 ( se wesan|seon|beon eald geneat ) , æsc acwehte ; 
 he ful baldlice beorn læran : 
 " hige sculan þu|þe|se heard , heorte þu|þe|se cene , 
 mod sculan þu|þe|se micel|mare|mara , þu|þe|se ure|ur mægen|magan lytlað . 
 heran|her lið ure|ur ealdor eall|eal forheawen , 
 god on|an greotan . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a mæg|magan gnornian 
 se þu|þe|ðe nu fram þes wigplegan wendan þenceð . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh frod feorh ; fram ic nesan|neh|ne willan , 
 acan|ac ic me|ic be healf minum|min hlaford , 
 be swa leof mann , licgan þence . " 
 swa hi|heo æþelgares birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ealle|eall|eal byldan , 
 godric toh|to guþ . oft he gar forlætan , 
 wælspere windan on|an þu|þa|se wicing , 
 swa he on|an þæm|þam|se folc fyrmest|forma gan|eadan , 
 heawan and hynde , oðþæt he on|an hild gecranc . 
 næs|nesan þæt|se na se godric þu|þe|se þe|þa|ða|se guðe forbugan 
 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic frod wite|wita on|an fyrndagum 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan , snottor ar , sundorwundra fela . 
 wordhord onwreon wittig lar 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan bocian|boc gleaw , boda ærcwide , 
 þæt|se ic soþlice|soðlice siððan magan 
 ongitan bi|be þæm|þam|se gealdor god ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ,
