 wilgest on|an wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , and se waccor swa some , 
 scyldum bescyredne , on|an gescead witan|wita . 
 þæt|se mæg|magan æghwylc mann|man eaþe|eaþ geþencan , 
 se þu|þe|se he nesan|neh|ne læteð on|an þes lænan tidan|tid 
 amyrran hit|his|he gemynd mod gælsa 
 and on|an hit|his|he dægrime druncen|drincan toh|to romana , 
 þonne|se manig beoð mæþelhegendra , 
 wlonce wigsmiþas winburgum in , 
 sittan æt|etan simble , soðgied wrecað , 
 word wrixlað , witan|wita fundian 
 hwylc|hwilc æscstede inne in ræcede 
 mid wer wunian , þonne|se win hweteð 
 beorn breostsefan . breahtem stigeð , 
 cirm on|an corþre , cwide scralletaþ 
 missenlice . swa beon modsefa 
 dæl gedælan|dælan , wesan|nesan dryhtguman 
 ungelice . sum|su on|an oferhygdo 
 þrymm þringeð , þrinteð him|hi|he in innan 
 ungemedemad mod ; sindan toh|to manig þæt|se ! 
 bið þæt|se æfþonca eal gefyllan|fyllan 
 feond fligepilum , facensearwum ; 
 breodað he and bælceð , boð hit|his|he sylfes 
 swiðe micel þonne|se se sella mann|man , 
 þenceð þæt|se hit|his|he wise|wis welhwam þince 
 eal unforcuþ . beon se oþer|oðer swican , 
 þonne|se he se facn finta sceawað . 
 wrenceþ he and blenceþ , worn geþenceþ 
 hinderhoca , hygegar leteð , 
 scurum sceoteþ . he þu|þa|se scylde nesan|neh|ne witan 
 fæhþu gefremian , feogean|feogan hit|his|he betran 
 eorl for|faran æfstum , læteð inwitflan 
 brecan se burgweal , þu|þe|se him|hi|he bebeodan meotud 
 þæt|se he þæt|se wigsteal werig sculan , 
 siteþ symbelwlonc , searu læteð 
 wine|win gewæged word ut faran , 
 þræfte þringan þrymm gebyrmed , 
 æfæst onælan , oferhygda ful , 
 niþ nearowrencum . nu þu cunnan magan , 
 gif þu þyslicne þegn gemittan 
 wunian in wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , wite|witan þu|þe|se be þes 
 feawa|feaw forðspellum þæt|se þæt|se beon feond birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 flæsc bifongen , hafað fretan lif , 
 grundfusne gæstan|gan god orfeormne , 
 wuldorcyning . þæt|se se wittig song , 
 gearowyrdig guma , and þæt|se gyd awrecan : 
 " se þu|þe|se he silf|self in þu|þa|se sliþnan tidan|tid 
 þurh oferhygda up ahlæneð , 
 ahefeð heahmodne , se sculan hean|heah wese|wesan 
 æfter neosiþum niþer gebiged , 
 wunian wite|wita fæstan|fæst , wyrm beþringan . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon gear iu in god romana 
 se mid engel oferhygd astag , 
 widmære gewin . wroht ahofan , 
 heard heresiþ , heofon widledan , 
 forsawan hyra|hyr|hira|hi sellan , þu|þa|se hi|heo toh|to swican þenсean|þenсan|þencan 
 and þrymcyning þeodenstoles 
 riсe beryfan , swa hit ryht nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon , 
 and þonne|se gesettan on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi sylfra don|dom 
 wuldor wynlond . þæt|se him|hi|he wigan|wig forstandan 
 fæder frumsceafta ; wearð him|hi|he seon|seo|se feohtan|feoht toh|to grim . 
 þonne bið þæm|þam|se oþrum|oþer|oðer ungelice 
 se þu|þe|se heran|her on|an eorþe|eorþ eaðmod leofað , 
 and wiþ gesibbra gehwone simble healdeð 
 freogan|freod on|an folc and hit|his|he feond lufað , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he him|hi|he abylgnesse oft gefremian 
 willum in þes weorold . se motan|mot wuldor dream 
 in halig hyht heonan astigan 
 on|an engel eard . nesan|neh|ne beon þæm|þam|se oþrum|oþer|oðer swa , 
 se þu|þe|se on|an ofermedum earh|earg dæd 
 libban in leahtrum , nesan|neh|ne beoð þu|þa|se lean gelic 
 mid wuldorcyning . " wite|witan þu|þe|se be þes , 
 gif þu eaðmodne eorl gemetan|gemet , 
 þegn on|an þeon|þeodan|þeod , þæm|þam|se bið simble 
 gæstan|gan gegæderad god ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 wilsum in worlde , gif me|ic se witega nesan|neh|ne leogan . 
 forðam we sculan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a hycgende hælu ræde|ræd 
 gemunan in mod mæl gehwylc 
 se selestan sigorian|sigor waldend . 
 amen . 
 
 hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|is hæleþ|hæle se horsc and se hygecræftig 
 þæt|se þæt|se mæge|mæg|magan asecgan , hwæt|hwa mec on|an sið wræc|wrecan , 
 þonne|se ic astigan strong , stundum reþe|reðe , 
 þrymful þunie , þragum wræc|wrecan 
 ferian|feran geond folde , folcsalo bærnan|bær , 
 ræced reafian gewinnan|geblandan recas stigað , 
 hasu ofer hrofum . hlin bið on|an eorþe|eorþ , 
 wælcwealm wer , þonne|se ic wudu hreran , 
 bearwas bledhwæt , beam fyllu|fyllan , 
 holm gehrefed , heahum meahtum 
 wrecan on|an waþ , wid sendan ; 
 habban me|ic on|an hrycge þæt|se ær had wreon 
 foldbuend , flæsc and gæstas , 
 somod on|an sunde|sund . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt|hwa mec þecce , 
 oþþe|oððe hu ic hatan , þu|þe|se þu|þa|se hlæst bere|beran|ber . ## neb wesan|seon|beon min|ic on|an nearu|nearo , and ic neoþan wæter|wæt , 
 flod underflowen , firgenstreamum 
 swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe besincan , and on|an sunde|sund awox 
 ufan yþ þeccan , an getenge 
 liþendum wudu|wudian lice min . 
 habban feorh cwic , þu|þa|se ic of fæðmum cuman 
 brim and beam on|an blæc|blac hrægle . 
 sum wesan|seon|beon hwit hyrstan min , 
 þu|þa|se mec lifgende lyft upp ahebban , 
 windan|wind of wegan , siððan wid bær|beran 
 ofer seolhbaþo . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 ic hatan . ## hrægl wesan|seon|is min|ic hasofag , hyrstan beorht , 
 read and scir on|an reaf minum|min . 
 ic dysig dwellan and dol hwettan 
 unrædsiþas , oþrum|oþer|oðer styrian|styran 
 nyttre for|faran . ic se nowiht witan 
 þæt|se heo swa gemædan , mod bestolene , 
 dæd gedwolen , deoraþ min 
 woh wise|wis gehwa . wa him|hi|he se þeaw , 
 siððan heah bringað horda deorast , 
 gif hi|heo unrædes ær nesan|neh|ne geswican . ## fot ic ferian|feran , folde slite|slitan , 
 grene wongas , þenden ic gæstan|gan bere|beran|ber . 
 gif me|ic feorh losað , fæstan|fæst bindan 
 sweart wealh , hwilum|hwil sellan mann . 
 hwilum|hwil ic deore|deor drincan sellan 
 beornan|beorn of bosm , hwilum|hwil mec bryd triedeð 
 felawlonc fot , hwilum|hwil feorran|feorr|feor bringan 
 wonfeax wale wegeð and þyð , 
 dol druncmennen deorc niht|neaht , 
 wæteð in wæter|wæt , wyrmeð hwilum|hwil 
 fæger|fæge toh|to fyr ; me|ic on|an fæðme stician 
 hygegalan hond , hwyrfeð geneahhe , 
 swifeð me|ic geond sweart . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 ic hatan , 
 þu|þe|se ic lifgende land reafian 
 and æfter deaþ dryht þeowian . ## ic sugan|seon turf tredan , x wesan|seon|beon eall|eal , 
 six broþor and hyra|hyr|hira|hi sweostor mid ; 
 habban feorg cwic . fellan|fel hongedon 
 sweotol and gesyne on|an sele|sel wegan 
 an gehwilc . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi ængum þywan|þy|þe|se wyrs , 
 nesan|neh|ne siþ þywan|þy|þe|se sar , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi swa sculan 
 reaf birofene , rodra weard 
 meahtum aweссan , muþa|muþ slitan 
 hasu bledan|bled . hrægl bið geniwad 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ær forðcymene frætwe lætan 
 licgan on|an last , gewitan|gewita land tredan . ## ic wesan|seon|beon wæpenwiga . nu mec wlonc þeceð 
 geong|gangan hagostealdmon gold and sylfore , 
 woh wirbogum . hwilum|hwil wer cyssað , 
 hwilum|hwil ic toh|to hild hleoþor bonne 
 wilgehleþan , hwilum|hwil wycg byreþ 
 mec ofer mearc , hwilum|hwil merehengest 
 fereð ofer flod frætwum beorht , 
 hwilum|hwil mægða sum|su min gefylleð 
 bosm beaghroden ; hwilum|hwil ic bord sculan , 
 heard , heafodleas , behlyþed licgan , 
 hwilum|hwil hongige hyrstum frætwed , 
 wlitig on|an wegan|wag , þær wer drincað , 
 freolic fyrdsceorp . hwilum|hwil folcwigan 
 on|an wicge wegað , þonne|se ic windan|wind sculan 
 sincfag swelgan of sumes bosm ; 
 hwilum|hwil ic gereordum rinc laðige 
 wlonce toh|to wine|win ; hwilum|hwil wraþ sculan 
 stefn minre|min forstelan hreddan , 
 flyman feondsceaþan . friсgan|frig|fricgan hwæt#2 ic hatan . ## hals wesan|seon|is min|ic hwit and heafod fealu , 
 side|sid swa some . swift ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an feþe , 
 beadowæpen bere|beran|ber . me|ic on|an bæc standað 
 heran|her swilce swe on|an hleorum . hlifiað twegen 
 eare ofer eage . ord ic steppan 
 in grene græs . me|ic bið gyrn witod , 
 gif mec onhæle on|an onfindeð 
 wælgrim wiga|wig , þær ic wiс|wican|wic bugan , 
 bold mid bearn , and ic biddan|bidan þær 
 mid geoguðcnosle , hwonne gæstan|gan cuman|ancuman 
 toh|to duru minum|min , him|hi|he beon deað witod . 
 forðam ic sculan of eðle eafora min 
 forhtmod fergan , fleam nergan , 
 gif he me|ic æfterweard eall|eal weorþeð ; 
 he berað breost . ic hit|his|he bidan nesan|neh|ne durran , 
 reþe on|an geruman , ( nele þæt|se rædan|ræd teale ) , 
 acan|ac ic sculan fromlice feþemundum 
 þurh steap beorgan|beorg stræte|stræt wyrcan . 
 eaþe|eaþ ic mæg|magan freoh|freo feorh genergan , 
 gif ic mægburge motan|mot min gelædan 
 on|an degolne wegan|weg þurh dun þyrel|hærn 
 swæs and gesibbe ; ic me|ic siððan nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 wælhwelpes wigan|wig wiht onsittan . 
 gif se niðsceaþa nearu|nearo stigan|stig 
 me|ic on|an swaþe seceþ , nesan|neh|ne tosæleþ him|hi|he 
 on|an þæm|þam|se gegnpaþe guþgemotes , 
 siððan ic þurh hyll hrof geræce , 
 and þurh hest hrino hildepilum 
 laðgewinnum , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ic long|lange fleon|fleogan|flean . ## oft ic sculan wiþ wegan winnan and wiþ windan|wind feohtan , 
 somod wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se sæcce , þonne|se ic sec gewitan 
 eorþe|eorþ yþ þeccan ; me|ic beon se eþel fremde . 
 ic beon|beo strong se gewinn , gif ic stille|stillan weorþan|weorþ ; 
 gif me|ic se tosæleð , hi|heo beoð swiþra þonne|se ic , 
 and mec slitan sona flymað , 
 willað oþfergan þæt|se ic friþian sculan . 
 ic him|hi|he þæt|se forstonde , gif min|ic steort þolað 
 and mec stiþne wiþ stan motan 
 fæstan|fæst gehabban . friсgan|frig|fricgan hwæt#2 ic hatan . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh mundbora minre|min heorde , 
 eodorwirum fæstan|fæst , innan gefyllan|fyllan 
 dryhtgestreona . dægtid oft 
 spætan sperebrogan ; spedan|sped beon þywan|þy|þe|se micel|mare|mara 
 fyllu|fyllan minre|min . frea þæt|se bihealdeð , 
 hu me|ic of hrife fleogað hyldepilas . 
 hwilum|hwil ic sweart swelgan onginnan 
 brun beadowæpnum , bitter|bitor|biter ord , 
 egle attorsperum . wesan|seon|is min|ic innað til , 
 wombhord wlitig , wloncum deore|deor ; 
 mann gemunan þæt|se me|ic þurh muþ fareð . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh wunderlicu wiht ; nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan word sprecan , 
 mældan for|faran mann , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic muþ habban , 
 wid wombe 
 ic wesan|seon|beon on|an ceole and min cnosl micel . ## ic on|an siþ sugan|seon s r o 
 h hygewloncne , heafodbeorhtne , 
 swift ofer sælwong swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe þrægan . 
 habban him|hi|he on|an hrycge hildeþryþe 
 næs|ne o þusend nægledne ridan|rad 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a næs|ne flet w . widlast ferian 
 rynestrong on|an rad rof hund o 
 f o wifcynn|hosp|flet|a h . for|faran wesan|seon|beon þywan|þy|þe|se beorht , 
 swylcra siþfæt . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 ic hatan . ## hwilum|hwil ic gewitan , swa nesan|neh|ne wenian|wenan mann , 
 under yþian|yþ geþræc eorþe|eorþ sec , 
 garsecges grund . gifen beon wregan , 
 fam|fah wealcan|gewealcan ; 
 hwælmere hlimmeð , hlud grimmeð , 
 stream staþu beatað , stundum weorpan 
 on|an stealc hliþ stane|stan and sonde , 
 wær|waru and wegan , þonne|se ic winnan , 
 holmmægne biþeaht , hruse styrge , 
 side|sid sægrund . sundhelme nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 losian ær mec lætan|læt se þu|þe|se min|ic latteow bið 
 on|an siþian|siþ gehwa . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan , þoncol mann|man , 
 hwæt|hwa mec bregdan of brim fæþmum , 
 þonne|se stream eft stille|stillan weorþað , 
 yþian|yþ geþweran , þu|þe|se mec ær wreon . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh wunderlicu wiht , on|an gewin sceapen , 
 frea minum|min leof , fæger|fæge gyrwan|gegyrwan . 
 byrne wesan|seon|is min|ic bleofag , swilce beorht seomað 
 wir ymb se wælgim þu|þe|se me|ic waldend gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 se me|ic widgalum wisað hwilum|hwil 
 self toh|to sacu|sacan . þonne|se ic sincan|sinc weсgan|wegan|weg 
 þurh hlutterne dæg , hondweorc smiþian|smiþ , 
 gold ofer geard . oft ic gæstberend 
 cwellan compwæpnum . cyning mec gyrweð 
 sincan|sinc and seolfor and mec on|an sellan|sele|sel weorþað ; 
 nesan|neh|ne wyrneð wordlofes , wise|wis mæneð 
 min for|faran mengo , þær hi meodu drincað , 
 healdeð mec on|an heaþore , hwilum|hwil læteð eft 
 radwerigne on|an gerum sceacan , 
 orlegfromne . oft ic oþrum|oþer|oðer scod 
 frecne|frecen|frec æt|etan hit|his|he freond ; fah wesan|seon|eoh ic wid , 
 wæpn|wæpen awyrgan . ic me|ic wenan|wena nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 þæt|se me|ic birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wræc|wrecan on|an bonan feorh , 
 gif me|ic gromra hwylc|hwilc guþ genægeð ; 
 nesan|neh|ne weorþeð se mægburg gemicledu 
 eafora minum|min þu|þe|se ic æfter wæcnan|wacan , 
 nymþe ic hlafordleas hweorfan motan|mot 
 from|fram þæm|þam|se healdan þu|þe|se me|ic hring gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf . 
 me|ic bið forþ|forð witod , gif ic frea hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo , 
 guþ fremman , swa ic gien dydan|don 
 minum|min þeodne on|an þonc , þæt|se ic þolian sculan 
 bearngestreona . ic wiþ bryd nesan|neh|ne motan|mot 
 hæman habban , acan|ac me|ic se hyhtplegan 
 geno wyrneð , se mec gear on|an 
 bendan leсgan|lecgan ; forðam ic brucan sculan 
 on|an hagosteald hæleþ|hæle gestreona . 
 oft ic wirum dol wif abelgan , 
 wonie hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo willan|willa ; heo me|ic wom|woh spreceð , 
 floceð hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo folm , firenian mec word , 
 ungod gæleð . ic nesan|neh|ne gyme|gyman se compes ## neb wesan|seon|is min|ic niþerweard ; neol ic ferian|feran 
 and be grund|grindan græf , geong|gangan swa me|ic wisað 
 har holtes feond , and hlaford min|ic 
 woh færeð weard æt|etan steort , 
 wrigian on|an wonge , wegeð mec and þyð , 
 saweþ on|an swæð min|ic . ic snyþige forþ|forð , 
 bringan of bearwe , bindan cræftan|cræft , 
 wegan on|an wægne , habban wundrian|wundor|wund fela ; 
 me|ic beon gongendre grene on|an healf 
 and min|ic swæð sweotol sweart on|an oþer|oðer . 
 me|ic þurh hrycg wrecan hongaþ under 
 on|an orþoncpil , oþer|oðer on|an heafod , 
 fæstan|fæst and forðweard . fealleþ on|an side|sid 
 þæt|se ic toþ teran , gif me|ic tela þenian 
 hindeweardre , þæt|se beon hlaford min|ic . ## ætsomne cuman sixtig mann 
 toh|to wægstæþe wicgum ridan|rida ; 
 habban xi eoredmæcgas 
 fridhengestas , feower sceamas . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan magorincas ofer merian|mere feolan , 
 swa hi|heo fundedon , acan|ac wesan|seon|beon flod toh|to deop , 
 atol yþian|yþ geþræc , ofer heah , 
 stream stronge . onginnan stigan þu|þa|se 
 on|an wægn wer and hyra|hyr|hira|hi wicg somod 
 hlodan under hrunge ; þu|þa|se þu|þa|se hors oðbær 
 eh and eorl , æsc dealle , 
 ofer wæter byht wægn toh|to land|finna , 
 swa he oxa nesan|neh|ne teon nesan|neh|ne esna mægen|magan 
 nesan|neh|ne fæthengest , nesan|neh|ne on|an flod swom , 
 nesan|neh|ne be grund|grindan wod|wadan gestum under , 
 nesan|neh|ne lah|lagu drefan , nesan|neh|ne on|an lyft fleogan , 
 nesan|neh|ne under bæc cyrde ; bringan|brengan hwæþre 
 beorn ofer burna and hyra|hyr|hira|hi bloncan mid 
 from|fram stæðe heah , þæt|se hi stopan up 
 on|an oþer|oðer , ellenrofe , 
 wer of wegan , and hyra|hyr|hira|hi wicg gesund . ## agof wesan|seon|is min|ic noma eft onhwyrfed ; 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh wrætlic wiht on|an gewin sceapen . 
 þonne|se ic onbugan , and me|ic of bosm fareð 
 ætren onga , ic beon|beo eallgearo 
 þæt|se ic me|ic þæt|se feorhbealo feor aswape . 
 siððan me|ic se waldend , se me|ic þæt|se wite|witan gescop , 
 leoþo forlæteð , ic beon|beo lengra þonne|se ær , 
 oþþæt ic spætan , spillan|spildan geblonden , 
 ealfelo ator þæt|se ic ær geap . 
 nesan|neh|ne togongeð se guma hwylca|hwilc , 
 ænigum eaþe|eaþ þæt|se ic þær ymb sprice , 
 gif he hrineð þæt|se me|ic of hrife fleogeð , 
 þæt|se se mandrinc mægen geceapaþ , 
 fullwered fæstan|fæst feorh sinnan|sin . 
 nelle ic unbunden ænigum hyran 
 nymþe searosæled . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 ic hatan . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh wunderlicu wiht , wræsne min stefn , 
 hwilum|hwil beorcan|beorc swa hund|1000 , hwilum|hwil blætan swa gat , 
 hwilum|hwil græde swa gos , hwilum|hwil giellan swa hafoc , 
 hwilum|hwil ic onhyrge se hasu irnan|iernan|earn , 
 guðfugles hleoþor , hwilum|hwil glidan|glida rædan|reord 
 muþ gemæne , hwilum|hwil mæw song , 
 þær ic glæd sittan . gifu mec nemnað , 
 swilce æsc and ridan|rad os fullesteð , 
 hægl and wesan|seon|is . nu ic hatan wesan|seon|eoh 
 swa þu|þa|se six stæf sweotule becnaþ . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh wunderlicu wiht , wif on|an hyht , 
 neahbuendum nytan ; nænig sceþþan 
 burgsittendra , nymþe bonan an . 
 staþol min|ic wesan|seon|is steapheah , stonde ic on|an bedd|bed , 
 neoþan ruh nathwær . neþeð hwilum|hwil 
 ful cyrtenu ceorles dohtor , 
 modwlonc meowle , þæt|se heo on|an mec gripeð , 
 ræseð mec on|an reod , reafað min|ic heafod , 
 fegeð mec on|an fæsten|fæstan . felan sona 
 min gemotes , seon|seo|se þu|þe|se mec nearwað , 
 wif wundenlocc . wæt|wadan bið þæt|se eage . ## mec feond sum|su feorh besnyþede , 
 woruldstrenga binom . wætte siððan , 
 dyfan on|an wæter|wæt , dydan|don eft þanan , 
 settan on|an sunne|sunnan|sunna , þær ic swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe beleas 
 herum þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ic habban . heard mec siððan 
 sniðan seaxses ecg , sinder begrunden ; 
 finger feoldan , and mec fugol wyn 
 geondsprengan speddropum spyrian geneahhe 
 ofer brun brerd . beamtelge swelgan , 
 stream dælan|dæl , stæppan|steppan eft on|an mec , 
 siþade sweartlast . mec siððan wreon 
 hæleð hleobordum , hyþe beþenede , 
 gierwan mec mid gold ; forðam me|ic gliwedon 
 wrætlic weorc smiþian|smiþ , wire bifongen . 
 nu þu|þa|se gereno and se reada|read telg 
 and þu|þa|se wuldorgesteald wid mærað 
 dryhtfolca helm , nales dol wite|witan . 
 gif min|ic birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wer brucan willað , 
 hi beoð þywan|þy|þe|se gesundran and þywan|þy|þe|se sigefæstran , 
 heorte þywan|þy|þe|se hwætran and þywan|þy|þe|se hygebliþran , 
 ferþe þywan|þy|þe|se frodran , habban freond þywan|þy|þe|se micel , 
 swæs and gesibbra , soþ and god , 
 til and getreowe , þu|þa|se hyra|hyr|hira|hi tyr and eadan|ead 
 est ycað and hi arstafas , 
 lissum bilecgað and hi|heo lufu|lufe fæþmum 
 fæstan|fæst clyppað . friсgan|frig|fricgan hwæt#2 ic hatan , 
 niþ toh|to nytt . nama min|ic wesan|seon|is mære|mæran , 
 hæleþ|hæle gifre and halig self . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh weorð wer , wid findan , 
 bringan of bearwum and of burghleoþum , 
 of denu|dene and of dun . dæg mec wægun 
 feþer on|an lifte , ferian mid list 
 under hrofes hleo . hæleð mec siððan 
 baþedan in byden . nu ic wesan|seon|eoh bindere 
 and swingere , sona weorpan 
 esne toh|to eorþe|eorþ , hwilum|hwil eald ceorl . 
 sona þæt|se onfindeð , se þu|þe|se mec fehð ongeagn , 
 and wiþ|wið mægenþisan minre|min genæsteð , 
 þæt|se he hrycge sculan hruse sec , 
 gif he unrædes ær nesan|neh|ne geswiceð , 
 strengo bistolen , strong on|an sprecan , 
 mægene binumen ; nagan hit|his|he mod geweald , 
 fot nesan|neh|ne folm . friсgan|frig|fricgan hwæt#2 ic hatan , 
 þu|þe|ðe on|an eorþe|eorþ swa esnas bindan , 
 dol æfter dynt be dæg sunnan|leoht . ## beon folde dælan|dæl fæger|fæge gierwan|gegierwan 
 mid þywan|þy|þe|se heardestan and mid þywan|þy|þe|se scearpestan 
 and mid þywan|þy|þe|se grymmestan guma gestreona , 
 ceorfan , sweorfan , cyrred , þyrred , 
 bindan , windan , blæced , wæced , 
 frætwed , geatwed , feorran|feorr|feor lædan 
 toh|to duru dryht . dream bið in innan 
 cwic wiht , clengeð , lengeð , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ær lifgende long|lange hwil 
 wilnian bruceð and no wiþ|wið spriceð , 
 and þonne|se æfter deaþ deman|dema onginneð , 
 melda mislice . micel wesan|seon|is toh|to hycganne 
 wisfæstum mann , hwæt#2 seon|seo|se wiht su . ## ic wiht geseon wundorlice 
 horn bitweonum huþu lædan , 
 lyftfæt leohtlic , list gierwan|gegierwan , 
 huþu toh|to þæm|þam|se ham of þæm|þam|se heresiþe ; 
 walde hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo on|an þære|se burh|burg bur atimbran , 
 searu asettan , gif hit swa magan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se cuman wundorlicu wiht ofer weall hrof , 
 seon|seo|se wesan|seon|is eall|eal cuð eorðbuendum , 
 ahreddan þu|þa|se þu|þa|se huþu and toh|to ham bedrifan 
 wreccan ofer willan|willa , gewitan hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo westan|west|wesan þanan 
 fæhþu feran , forþ|forð onettan . 
 dust stonc toh|to heofon , deaw feolan on|an eorþe|eorþ , 
 niht|neaht forþ|forð gewitan . nænig siððan 
 wer gewitan þære|se wiht sið . ## hwilum|hwil mec min|ic frea fæstan|fæst genearwað , 
 sendeð þonne|se under salwonges 
 bearm se brad , and on|an bidan wriceð , 
 þrafað on|an þystru|þystre þrymm sum , 
 hæst on|an enge , þær me|ic heord siteð 
 hruse on|an hrycge . nagan ic hwyrftweges 
 of þæm|þam|se aglace , acan|ac ic eþelstol 
 hæleþ|hæle hreran ; hornsalu wagiað , 
 wer wicstede , weall beofiað , 
 steap ofer stiwitum . stille|stillan þynceð 
 lyft ofer land and lah|lagu swige , 
 oþþæt ic of enge up aþringe , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa mec wisian se mec wræde on|an 
 æt|etan frumsceafte furþum leсgan|lecgan , 
 bendan and clomme , þæt|se ic onbugan nesan|neh|ne motan|mot 
 of se geweald þu|þe|se me|ic weg tæcneð . 
 hwilum|hwil ic sculan ufan yþian|yþ wregan , 
 stream styrgan and toh|to stæþ þywan 
 flintgrægne flod . famig winneð 
 wegan wiþ|wið weallan|weall , winnan ariseð 
 dun ofer dyppan|dype ; hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo deorc on|an last , 
 eare|ear geblonden , oþer|oðer fereð , 
 þæt|se hi gemittað mearclonde neah 
 heah hlinc . þær bið hlud wudu , 
 brimgiesta breahtm , bidað stille|stillan 
 stealc stanhleoþu streamgewinnes , 
 hopgehnastes , þonne|se heah geþringan 
 on|an cleofu crudan . þær bið ceole wenan|wen 
 sliþe sæcce , gif he sæ byreð 
 on|an þu|þa|se grimman|grimm|grim tidan|tid , gæsta full|ful , 
 þæt|se he sculan romana birofen weorþan|weorþ , 
 feorh bifohten fæmig ridan|rida 
 yþian|yþ hrycgum . þær bið egsian sum|su 
 æled geywan , þær|se þu|þe|se ic hyran sculan 
 strong on|an stiðweg . hwæt|hwa gestilleð þæt|se gewinnan|geblandan 
 hwilum|hwil ic þurhræse , þæt|se me|ic on|an bæc rideð 
 woh wægfatu , wid toþringe 
 lagustreama full , hwilum|hwil lætan|læt eft 
 slupan tosamne . se bið sweg micel , 
 breahtm ofer burh|burg , and gebreca hludast , 
 þonne|se scearp cymeð sceon|sceo wiþ oþrum|oþer|oðer , 
 ecg wiþ|wið ecge ; earpan gesceafte 
 fus ofer folc fyr swætað , 
 blæc|blac liсgan|leon , and gebrecu ferað 
 deorc ofer dryht gedyne micel , 
 farað feohtan , fealle|feallan lætað 
 sweart sumsendu seaw of bosm , 
 wæt of wombe . winnan fareð 
 atol eoredþreat , egsian astigeð , 
 micel modþrea mann cynn , 
 broga on|an burh|burg , þonne|se blæc|blac scotiað 
 scriþan scinan scearpum wæpn|wæpen . 
 dol him|hi|he nesan|neh|ne ondrædeð þe|þa|ða|se deaðsperu , 
 swylteð hwæþre , gif him|hi|he soð meotud 
 on|an geryhtu þurh regn ufan 
 of gestune læteð stræle fleoge|fleogan , 
 faran flan|fla . fea þæt|se gedygað , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se geræceð rynegiestes wæpen . 
 ic se orlege or anstelle , 
 þonne|se gewitan wolcengehnaste 
 þurh geþræc þringan þrimme micel 
 ofer byrnan bosm . biersteð hlud 
 heah hloðgecrod ; þonne|se hnigan eft 
 under lyft helm land near , 
 and me|ic on|an hrycg hladan þæt|se ic habban sculan , 
 meahtum gemagnad min frea . 
 swa ic þrymful þeowan|þeow þragum winnan , 
 hwilum|hwil under eorþe|eorþ , hwilum|hwil yþian|yþ sculan 
 hean|heah underhnigan , hwilum|hwil holm ufan 
 stream styrge , hwilum|hwil stigan|stig up , 
 wolcnfare wregan , wid ferian|feran 
 swift and swiþfeorm . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 ic hatan , 
 oþþe|oððe hwæt|hwa mec ræran , þonne|se ic restan nesan|neh|ne motan|mot , 
 oþþe|oððe hwæt|hwa mec stæðþe , þonne|se ic stille|stillan beon|beo . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh legbysig , lacu|lacan|lac mid windan|wind , 
 bewindan mid wuldor , weder gesomnad , 
 fus forðweges , fyr gebysgad , 
 bearu blowan , beornan gled . 
 ful oft mec gesiþ sendað æfter hondum , 
 þæt|se mec wer and wif wlonce cyssað . 
 þonne|se ic mec onhabban , and hi|heo onhnigaþ toh|to me|ic 
 manig mid milts , þær ic mann sculan 
 ycan upcyme eadignesse . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh ligbysig , lacu|lacan|lac mid windan|wind , 
 w . . . . . .dre gesomnad , 
 fus forðweges , fyr gemylted , 
 bear . . . blowan , beornan gled . 
 ful oft mec gesiþ sendað æfter hondum , 
 þær mec wer and wif wlonce gecyssað . 
 þonne|se ic mec onhabban , hi|heo onhnigað toh|to me|ic , 
 modig milts , swa ic mongum sculan 
 ycan upcyme eadignesse . ## wesan|seon|is þes middangeard missenlic 
 wise|wis gewlitegad , wrætt gefrætwad . 
 ic sugan|seon sellic þingan|þing singan on|an ræcede . 
 wiht wesan|seon|beon wrætlic wer on|an gemonge , 
 se habban wæstum wundorlicran . 
 niþerweard wesan|seon|beon neb hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo , 
 fot|fedan and folm fugele gelice ; 
 no hwæþre fleoge|fleogan mæg|magan nesan|neh|ne fela gongan , 
 hwæþre feþegeorn fremman onginneð , 
 сeosan|geсeosan|gecoren|geceosan|ceosan cræft , cyrreð geneahhe 
 oft and gelome|gelom eorlum on|an gemonge , 
 siteð æt|etan simble , sæl bidan , 
 hwonne ær heo cræftan|cræft hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo cyþan motan|mot 
 wer on|an wonge . nesan|neh|ne heo þær wiht þigeð 
 se þu|þe|se him|hi|he æt|etan bliss|blis beorn habbað 
 deor dom geornan|georn . hio dumb wunað . 
 hwæþre hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo wesan|seon|is on|an fote fæger hleoþor , 
 wynlicu woðgiefu . wrætlic me|ic þinceð , 
 hu seon|seo|se wiht mæge|mæg|magan word lacan 
 þurh fot neoþan , frætwed hyrstum . 
 hafað hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo on|an halse , þonne|se hio hord warað , 
 bær|beran , beah|beag deall , broþor|broðor sinnan|sin , 
 mæg|magan mid mægen . micel wesan|seon|is toh|to hycgenne 
 wise|wis woðboran , hwæt#2 se wiht wesan|seon|nesan . ## wesan|seon|is þes middangeard missenlic 
 wise|wis gewlitegad , wrætt gefrætwad . 
 siþ sellic ic sugan|seon searo hweorfan , 
 grindan wiþ|wið greotan , giellan faran . 
 nabban sellicu wiht syne nesan|neh|ne folm , 
 exle nesan|neh|ne earm ; sculan on|an an fot|fedan 
 searoceap swifan , swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe feran , 
 faran ofer feld . habban fela ribb ; 
 muð wesan|seon|beon on|an midde|midd . moncynne nytan , 
 fereð foddurwelan , folcscipe dreogeð , 
 wist in wigeð , and wer gieldeð 
 gafol gear gehwa se þu|þe|se guma brucað , 
 romana and hean|heah . recan , gif þu cunnan , 
 wis word gleaw , hwæt#2 se wiht wesan|seon|nesan . ## wiht cuman æfter weсgan|wegan|weg wrætlicu liþe|liþan , 
 cymlic from|fram ceole cleopian toh|to land , 
 hlinsade hlud ; hleahtor wesan|seon|beon gryrelic , 
 egesful on|an eard , ecge wesan|seon|beon scearpe . 
 wesan|seon|beon hio hetegrim , hild toh|to sæne , 
 biter beadoweorca ; bordweallas grafan , 
 heardhiþende . heterune bond , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan searocræftig ymb hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo sylfre gesceaft : 
 " wesan|seon|is min|ic modor mægða cynn|cyn 
 se deorestan , þæt|se wesan|seon|is dohtor min|ic 
 eacen|eacan up liþan , swa þæt|se wesan|seon|is æled cuþ|cunnan , 
 firas on|an folc , þæt|se seon|seo|se on|an folde sculan 
 on|an eall|eal londa gehwa lissum stondan . " ## ic wiht geseon in wer burh|burg , 
 seon|seo|se þæt|se feoh fedeð . hafað fela toþ ; 
 nebb beon hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo æt|etan nytt , niþerweard gongeð , 
 hiþeð holdlice and toh|to ham tyhð , 
 wæþeð geond weall , wyrt seceð ; 
 aa heo þu|þa|se findeð , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se fæstan|fæst nesan|neh|ne beon ; 
 læteð hio þu|þa|se wlitig , wyrt fæstan|fæst , 
 stille|stillan stondan on|an staþolwonge , 
 beorht blican , blowan and growan . ## mec se wæt wong , wundor freorig , 
 of hit|his|he innaþe ærist cennan . 
 nesan|neh|ne witan ic mec beworhtne wull flysum , 
 hær þurh heahcræft , hygeþoncum min|ic . 
 wundene me|ic nesan|neh|ne beoð wefle , nesan|neh|ne ic weorpan hafu , 
 nesan|neh|ne þurh þreatian geþræcu þræd me|ic nesan|neh|ne hlimmeð , 
 nesan|neh|ne æt|etan me|ic hrutan hrisil scriþeð , 
 nesan|neh|ne mec ohwonan sculan am cnyssan . 
 wyrm mec nesan|neh|ne awæfan wyrd cræft , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se geolu|geolo godwebb geatwum frætwað . 
 willan|wil mec mann|man hwæþre seþeah wid ofer eorþe|eorþ 
 hatan|hat for|faran hæleþ|hæle hyhtlic gewæde . 
 secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan soðcwidum , searoþoncum gleaw , 
 word wisfæst , hwæt#2 þes gewæde su . ## ic wiht geseon on|an weсgan|wegan|weg feran , 
 seon|seo|se wesan|seon|beon wrætlice wundor gierwan|gegierwan . 
 habban feowere fot|fedan under wombe 
 and ehtuwe 
 monn h w þusend wiif þusend x fiftig kf wf hors qxxs 
 ufon on|an hrycge ; 
 habban twegen fiþre and twelf eage 
 and six heafod . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 hio wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 for|faran flodwegas ; nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæt|se na fugul ana|an , 
 acan|ac þær wesan|seon|beon æghwylces an gelicnes 
 hors and monnes , hund and fugol , 
 and eacan|eac wif wlite|wlitan . þu witan , gif þu const , 
 toh|to gesecganne , þæt|se we soð witan|wita , 
 hu þære|se wiht wise|wis gonge . ## ic þu|þa|se wiht geseon ; womb wesan|seon|beon on|an hindan 
 þriþum aþrunten . þegn folgade , 
 mægenrofa munan|mann|man , and micel habban 
 ferian|feran þæt|se hit fellan|feld|felan , fleon|fleogan|flean þurh hit|his|he eage . 
 nesan|neh|ne swylteð he simble , þonne|se syllan sculan 
 innað þæm|þam|se oþrum|oþer|oðer , acan|ac him|hi|he eft cymeð 
 bot in bosm , blæd beon aræran ; 
 he sunu wyrceð , bið him|hi|he self fæder . ## ic þu|þa|se wiht geseon wæpnedcynnes , 
 geoguðmyrþe grædig ; him|hi|he on|an gafol forlætan 
 ferðfriþende feower wellan 
 scir sceotan , on|an gesceap þeote|þeotan . 
 mann|man maþelade , se þu|þe|se me|ic gesægde : 
 " seon|seo|se wiht , gif hio gedygeð , dun briceð ; 
 gif he tobirsteð , bindeð cwic . " ## gewrit secgað þæt|se seon|seo|se wiht su 
 mid moncynne micel tid 
 sweotol and gesyne . sundorcræft hafað 
 micel|mare|mara micel , þonne|se hit mann witan . 
 heo willan|wil gesecan sundor æghwylс 
 feorhberendra , gewiteð eft feran on|an wegan|weg . 
 nesan|neh|ne bið hio næfre niht|neaht þær oþer|oðer , 
 acan|ac hio sculan wideferh wreccan last 
 hamleas hweorfan ; no þywan|þy|þe|se hean beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne hafað hio fot nesan|neh|ne folm , nesan|neh|ne æfre folde hrinan|hran , 
 nesan|neh|ne eage æghwæðer twega , 
 nesan|neh|ne muð hafian|habban , nesan|neh|ne wiþ mann sprecan , 
 nesan|neh|ne gewitan hafað , acan|ac gewrit secgað 
 þæt|se seon|seo|se su earmost eall|eal wiht , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se æfter gecynde|gecynd cennan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne hafað hio sawol|sawel nesan|neh|ne feorh , acan|ac hio siþ sculan 
 geond þes wundorworuld wid dreogan . 
 nesan|neh|ne hafian|habban hio blod nesan|neh|ne ban , hwæþre bearn wearð 
 geond þes middangeard mongum toh|to frofor . 
 næfre hio heofon hrinan|hran , nesan|neh|ne toh|to hell|hel motan|mot , 
 acan|ac hio sculan wideferh wuldorcyning 
 lar lifgan . long wesan|seon|is toh|to secganne 
 hu hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo ealdorgesceaft æfter gongeð , 
 woh wyrd gesceapu ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is wrætlic þingan|þing 
 toh|to gesecganne . soð wesan|seon|is æghwylc 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ymb þes wiht word becneð ; 
 nesan|neh|ne hafað heo ænig lim , libban efne|efnan|efen seþeah . 
 gif þu mæge|mæg|magan reselan recen gesecgan 
 soþ word , secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 hio hatan . ## ic sculan þragbysig þegn|þegen minum|min , 
 hring hæfted , hyran georne|geornan|georn , 
 min|ic bed brecan , breahtm cyþan 
 þæt|se me|ic halswriþan hlaford sellan . 
 gretan gan|eadan ; ic him|hi|he gromheortum 
 winterceald oncweþan . wearm lim 
 gebindan bæg hwilum|hwil bersteð ; 
 se þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah beon on|an þonce þegn|þegen minum|min , 
 þær wiht wite|witan , and word min|ic 
 on|an spedan|sped mæge|mæg|magan spel gesecgan . ## ece wesan|seon|is se scyppend , se þes eorþe|eorþ nu 
 wreðstuþum wealdeð and þes world healdeð . 
 romana wesan|seon|is se reccend and on|an ryht cyning 
 eall|eal anwalda , eorþe|eorþ and heofon , 
 healdeð and wealdeð , swa he ymb þes utan hweorfeð . 
 he mec wrætlice wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan æt|etan frymþe , 
 þu|þa|se he þes ymbhwyrft ærest|ær settan , 
 hatan mec wæccende wunian long|lange , 
 þæt|se ic nesan|neh|ne slæpan|slapan siððan æfre , 
 and mec semninga slæpan ofergongeþ , 
 beoð eage min|ic ofestum betynan . 
 þes middangeard meahtig dryhten 
 mid hit|his|he onwalde æghwær styreð ; 
 swa ic mid waldendes word eall|eal 
 þes ymbhwyrft utan ymbclyppe . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh toh|to þon|se bleað , þæt|se mec bealdlice mæg|magan 
 gearu gongende grima abregan , 
 and eofore wesan|seon|eoh æghwær cene , 
 þonne|se he gebelgan|belgan bidsteal giefeð ; 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan mec oferswiþan segnberendra 
 ænig ofer eorþe|eorþ , nymþe se ana|an god 
 se þes hean|heah heofon healdeþ and wealdeþ . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an stence strengra micel 
 þonne|se ricels oþþe|oððe rose su , 
 on|an eorþe|eorþ turf 
 wynlic weaxeð ; ic wesan|seon|eoh wræstre þonne|se heo . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se lilie su leof moncynne , 
 beorht on|an blostma , ic wesan|seon|eoh betre þonne|se heo ; 
 swilce ic nard stenc nyde oferswiþan 
 mid minre|min swetnes simble æghwær , 
 and ic full|ful wesan|seon|eoh þonne|se þes fen sweart 
 þæt|se heran|her yfel adelan stinceð . 
 eal ic under heofon hwearfte recce , 
 swa me|ic leof fæder læran æt|etan frymþe , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þa|se mid ryhte reccan motan 
 þicce and þynne ; þingian|þing gehwilc 
 onlicnesse æghwær healdan|heald . 
 hyrre ic wesan|seon|eoh heofon , hateþ mec heahcyning 
 hit|his|he deagol þingan|þing dyre bihealdan ; 
 eacan|eac ic under eorþe|eorþ eal sceawian 
 wom|woh wraðscrafu wraþ gæsta . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh micel yldra þonne|se ymbhwyrft þes 
 oþþe|oððe þes middangeard magan geweorþan , 
 and ic giestron wesan|seon|beon geong|gangan acennan 
 mære|mæran toh|to mann þurh minre|min modor hrif . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh fægerra|fæger frætwum gold , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hit mann|man awerge wirum utan ; 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh wyrslicre þonne|se þes wudu fulian|ful 
 oððe þes waroð þu|þe|se heran|her awyrpan|aweorpan ligeð . 
 ic eorþe|eorþ wesan|seon|eoh æghwær brædre , 
 and widgielra þonne|se þes wong grenian|grene ; 
 folm mec mæg|magan bifon and finger þri 
 utan eaþe|eaþ ealle|eall|eal ymbclyppan . 
 heard ic wesan|seon|eoh and caldra|cald þonne|se se heardian|heard forst , 
 hriman|hrim heorugrimma , þonne|se he toh|to hruse cymeð ; 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh ulcanus up irnendan 
 leoht leoma leсgan|lecgan hat . 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an goma gena swete 
 þonne|se þu beobread blendan|blandan mid hunige ; 
 swilce ic wesan|seon|eoh wraþ þonne|se wermod su , 
 þu|þe|se heran|her on|an hyrstum heasewe stondeþ . 
 ic mesan mæg|magan meahtelicor 
 and efnetan eald þyrs , 
 and ic gesælig mæg|magan simble lifgan 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic ætes nesan|neh|ne su æfre toh|to feorh . 
 ic mæg|magan fromlicor fleoge|fleogan þonne|se pernex 
 oþþe|oððe irnan|iernan|earn oþþe|oððe hafoc æfre magan ; 
 nesan zefferus , se swift windan|wind , 
 þæt|se swa fromlice mæg|magan feran æghwær ; 
 me|ic wesan|seon|is snægl swift , snelra regnwyrm 
 and fenyce for|faran hreþer ; 
 wesan|seon|is se gor sunu gonge hræd , 
 se we wifel word nemnað . 
 hefigere ic wesan|seon|eoh micel þonne|se se hara|har stan 
 oþþe|oððe unlytel lead clympre , 
 leoht ic wesan|seon|eoh micel þonne|se þes lytel wyrm 
 þu|þe|se heran|her on|an flod gæð fot dryge|drygan . 
 flinte ic wesan|seon|eoh heard þu|þe|se þes fyr drifan 
 of þes strongan style heard , 
 hnescre ic wesan|seon|eoh micel halsrefeþre , 
 seon|seo|se heran|her on|an windan|wind wæweð on|an lyft . 
 ic eorþe|eorþ wesan|seon|eoh æghwær brædre 
 and widgelra þonne|se þes wong grenian|grene ; 
 ic uttor eaþe|eaþ eal ymbwinde , 
 wrætlice wefan wundorcræfte . 
 nesan under me|ic ænig oþer|oðer 
 wiht waldendre on|an worldlife ; 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh ufor eall|eal gesceafta , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan waldend user , 
 se mec ana|an mæg|magan ecan meahtum , 
 geþeon þrymm , þæt|se ic onþunian nesan|neh|ne sculan . 
 mara ic wesan|seon|eoh and strengra þonne|se se micel hwæl , 
 se þu|þe|se garsecges grund bihealdeð 
 sweart syne ; ic wesan|seon|eoh swiþra|swiþ þonne|se he , 
 swilce ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an mægene minum|min læssa 
 þonne|se se hondwyrm , se þu|þe|se hæleþ|hæle birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 secg searoþoncle , seax delfað . 
 nu hafu ic in heafod hwit loccas 
 wræste gewundne , acan|ac ic wesan|seon|eoh wid calu ; 
 nesan|neh|ne ic breaga nesan|neh|ne brun brucan motan , 
 acan|ac mec bescyrede scyppend eall|eal ; 
 nu me|ic wrætlice weaxað on|an heafod 
 þæt|se me|ic on|an gescyldrum scinan motan 
 ful wrætlice wund loccas . 
 mara ic wesan|seon|eoh and fætt þonne|se amæsted swin , 
 beorgan|bearg bellan , þu|þe|se on|an bocwuda , 
 woh wrotan wynn libban 
 þæt|se he ## edniwe ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is moddor monigra cynn , 
 se selestan , se sweartestan , 
 se deorestan se þu|þe|se dryht birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 ofer folde sceotan|sceat toh|to gefea ongeagn|agen|agan . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan we heran|her in eorþe|eorþ owiht lifgan , 
 nymðe we brucan se þu|þa|se birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn doð . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is toh|to geþencanne þeod gehwylc , 
 wisfæstum wer , hwæt#2 seon|seo|se wiht su . ## ic sugan|seon wyhte wrætlice twegen|twa 
 undearnunga ute plegan|plega 
 hæmedlac ; hwitloc anfeng 
 wlanc under wædum , gif se weorc spowan , 
 fæmne fyllo . ic on|an flett mæg|magan 
 þurh runstafas rinc secgan , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se bec witan|wita , began ætsomne 
 naman|nama þær|se wiht . þær sculan nyd wese|wesan 
 twega oþer|oðer and se torht æsc 
 on|an on|an line , ac twegen , 
 hægelas swa some . hwylc|hwilc se hordgates 
 cægan cræftan|cræft þu|þa|se clamme onlucan 
 þu|þe|se þu|þa|se rædellan wiþ|wið rynemenn 
 hygefæste healdan heorte bewrigene 
 orþoncbendum gewinnan|geblandan nu wesan|seon|is undyrne 
 wer æt|etan wine|win hu þu|þa|se wiht mid we|us , 
 heanmode twegen|twa , hat wesan|nesan . ## ic witan indryhtne æþelu|æþele|æþel deoren|deore 
 giest in geard , þæm|þam|se se grimm|grim nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 hungor sceððan nesan|neh|ne se hatian|hat þurst , 
 ieldo nesan|neh|ne adl . gif him|hi|he arlice 
 esne þenað , se þu|þe|se aginnan|agan sculan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se siðfate , hi gesund æt|etan ham 
 findað witod him|hi|he witan|wist and bliss|blis , 
 cnosl unrim , care , gif se esne 
 hit|his|he hlaford hyreð yfel , 
 frea on|an for|faran . nesan|neh|ne willan|wil forht wese|wesan 
 broþor|broðor oþrum|oþer|oðer ; him|hi|he þæt|se begen sceðeð , 
 þonne|se hi from|fram bearm begen hweorfað 
 an magan|maga ellorfuse , 
 moddor and sweostor . mann|man , se þu|þe|se willan , 
 cyþan cynewordum hu se cuma hatan , 
 eðþa se esne , þu|þe|se ic heran|her ymb sprice . ## wrætlic hongað bi|be wer þeon|þeoh , 
 frea under sceat . foran wesan|seon|is þyrel|hærn . 
 bið stiþ and heard . stede hafað god . 
 þonne|se se esne hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan hrægl 
 ofer cneo hefeð , willan|wil þæt|se cuþ|cunnan hol 
 mid hit|his|he hangellan heafod gretan 
 þæt|se he efenlang ær oft gefyllan . ## ic on|an winсel|wincel gefrignan weaxan nathwæt , 
 þindan and þunian , þecen hebban . 
 on|an þæt|se banleas bryd grapian , 
 hygewlonc hondum . hrægle þeссean|þeссan|þeccan 
 þrindende þingan|þing þeodnes dohtor . ## wer sæt|sittan æt|etan wine|win mid hit|his|he wif twegen 
 and hit|his|he twegen suno and hit|his|he twegen|twa dohtor , 
 swase sweostor , and hyra|hyr|hira|hi suno twegen , 
 freolico frumbearn . fæder wesan|seon|beon þær inne 
 þær|se æþeling æghwæðres mid , 
 eam|ea and nefa . eall|eal wesan|seon|beon fife 
 eorl and ides insittendra . ## moððe word fretan . me|ic þæt|se þynсan|þyncan 
 wrætlicu wyrdan|wyrd , þu|þa|se ic þæt|se wundor gefrignan , 
 þæt|se se wyrm forswelgan wer gied sumes , 
 þeof in þystre , þrymfæstne cwide 
 and se strang staþol . stælgiest nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 wiht þywan|þy|þe|se gleaw , þu|þe|se he þæm|þam|se word swelgan . ## ic gefrignan for|faran hæleþ|hæle hringan|hring endean , 
 torht butan tunge , tilian|til þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he hlud 
 stefn nesan|neh|ne cirmde , strongum word . 
 sincan|sinc for|faran secg swigende cweðan : 
 " gehælan mec , helpend gæsta . " 
 ryne ongietan reada|read gold 
 guma galdorcwide , gleaw beþencan 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi hælu toh|to god , swa se hringan|hring cweðan . ## ic witan eardfæstne an standan , 
 deaf , dumb , se oft dæg swilgeð 
 þurh gopes hond gifre lacu|lac . 
 hwilum|hwil on|an þæm|þam|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic se wonna þegn , 
 sweart and saloneb , sendeð oþer|oðer 
 under goma him|hi|he gold dyrran , 
 þu|þa|se æþeling oft wilniað , 
 cyning and cwene|cwen . ic þæt|se cyn nu gen 
 nemnan nesan|neh|ne willan , þu|þe|se him|hi|he toh|to nytt swa 
 and toh|to dugþum don þæt|se se dumb heran|her , 
 eorp unwita , ær forswilgeð . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh anhaga isern wund , 
 bil gebennad , beadoweorca sæd , 
 ecgum werig . oft ic wigan|wig seon|seo|se , 
 frecne|frecen|frec feohtan . frofor nesan|neh|ne wennan|wenan|wen , 
 þæt|se me|ic geoc cyme guðgewinnes , 
 ær ic mid æled eal forwurðe , 
 acan|ac mec hnossiað homera laf , 
 heardecg heoroscearp , hondweorc smiþian|smiþ , 
 bitað in burh|burg ; ic abidan sculan 
 laþran gemotes . næfre læcecynn 
 on|an folcstede findan magan , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se mid wyrt wund|windan gehælan , 
 acan|ac me|ic ecga dolg eacen|eacan weorðað 
 þurh deaðslege dæg|dah|dag and niht|neaht . ## wiga|wig wesan|seon|is on|an eorþe|eorþ wundor acennan 
 dryht toh|to nytt , of dumb twegen 
 torht atyhted , se on|an teon wigeð 
 feond hit|his|he feond . forstrangne oft 
 wif he wrið ; he him|hi|he wel hereð , 
 þeowian|þeowan him|hi|he geþweran , gif him|hi|he þegniað 
 mægeð and mæcgas mid gemetan|gemet ryhte , 
 fedað he fæger|fæge ; he him|hi|he freme stepeð 
 lif on|an lissum . leanað grimman|grimm|grim 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se he wloncne weorþan|weorþ læteð . ## ic sugan|seon wrætlice wuhte feower 
 samed siþian ; sweart wær last , 
 swæþ swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe blæc . swift wesan|seon|beon on|an for|faran , 
 fugol framra ; fleogan on|an lyft , 
 dufan|deaf under yþan|yþ . dreogan unstille 
 winnan wiga|wig se him|hi|he weg tæcneþ 
 ofer fæted gold feower eall|eal . ## ic sugan|seon ræpingas in ræced fergan 
 under hrof sal heard twegen , 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon genamnan , nearu|nearo bend 
 gefeterade fæstan|fæst togædre ; 
 þær|se oþrum|oþer|oðer wesan|seon|beon on|an getenge 
 wonfah wale , seon|seo|se wealdan hyra|hyr|hira|hi 
 began siþ bend fæst . ## ic sugan|seon on|an bearwe beam hlifian , 
 tan torht . þæt|se treow wesan|seon|beon on|an wynn , 
 wudu weaxan . wæter he and eorþe 
 feddan fæger|fæge , oþþæt he frod dæg|dah|dag 
 on|an oþrum|oþer|oðer wearð aglachade 
 deop gedolgod , dumb in bend , 
 wriþan ofer wundian|wund , wonnum hyrstum 
 foran gefrætwed . nu he fæcne wegan|weg 
 þurh hit|his|he heafod mægen|magan hildegieste 
 oþrum|oþer|oðer rymeð . oft hi on|an ystan|yst strudan 
 hord ætgædre ; hræd wesan|seon|beon and unlæt 
 se æftera , gif se ær fær 
 genamnan in nearowe neþan motan . ## hyse cuman gangan , þær he hi|heo witan 
 stondan in wincsele , stæppan|steppan feorran|feorr|feor toh|to , 
 hror hægstealdmon , hof|hebban hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan 
 hrægl hondum up , hrindan under gyrdels 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo stondendre stiþes nathwæt , 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan hit|his|he willan|willa ; wagedan buta . 
 þegn onnette , wesan|seon|beon þragum nytan 
 tillic esne , teorode hwæþre 
 æt|etan stunda gehwa strong ær þon|se hio , 
 werig se weorc . hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo weaxan ongon 
 under gyrdelse þæt|se oft god mann 
 ferðþum freogað and mid feoh bicgað . ## ic sugan|seon in heall , þær hæleð drincan , 
 on|an flet beran|bera feower cynn , 
 wrætlic wudutreow and windan gold , 
 sincan|sinc searobunden , and seolfor dælan|dæl 
 and rode|rod tacn , se we|us toh|to roderum up 
 hlæder ræran , ær he helwara 
 cantwara|burg abrecan . ic se beam mæg|magan 
 eaþe|eaþ for|faran eorlum æþelu|æþele secgan ; 
 þær wesan|seon|beon hlin and acc and se heardian|heard iw 
 and se fealwian|fealu holen|helan ; frea wesan|nesan ealle|eall|eal 
 nytan ætgædre , naman|nama habbað an , 
 wulfheafedtreo , þæt|se oft wæpen abæd 
 hit|his|he mondryhtne , maðm in heall , 
 goldhilted sweord . nu me|ic þes giedd 
 ondsware ywe , se he on|an med 
 word secgan hu se wudu hatan . ## ic wesan|seon|beon þær inne þær ic an geseon 
 winnan wiht wido bennegean , 
 holt hweorfan ; heaþoglemma fon , 
 deop dolga . daroþ wesan|seon|beon 
 weo þære|se wiht , and se wudu searu 
 fæstan|fæst gebunden|gebindan|bindan . hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo fot wesan|seon|beon 
 biidfæst oþer|oðer , oþer|oðer bisgo dreogan , 
 lacan on|an lyft , hwilum|hwil land neah . 
 treow wesan|seon|beon getenge þæm|þam|se þær torht standan 
 leaf bihongen . ic laf geseon 
 minum|min hlaford , þær hæleð drincan , 
 þær|se flan|fla geweorc , on|an flet beran|bera . ## ðeos lyft byreð lytel wiht 
 ofer beorghleoþa . þu|þa|se wesan|nesan blæc|blac swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe , 
 sweart salopade . sang rope 
 heap ferað , hlud cirmað , 
 tredað bearonæssas , hwilum|hwil burgsalo 
 niþþe|niþþas bearn . nemnað hi self . ## ic witan anfete ellen dreogan 
 wiht on|an wonge . wid nesan|neh|ne fereð , 
 nesan|neh|ne fela rideð , nesan|neh|ne fleoge|fleogan mæg|magan 
 þurh scirne dæg , nesan|neh|ne hi|heo scip fereð , 
 nacian|naca nægledbord ; nytan bið hwæþre 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo mondryhtne monegum tid . 
 hafað hefig steort , heafod lytel , 
 tunge lange|lang , toð nænig , 
 isern dælan|dæl ; eorðgræf pæþeð . 
 wæt nesan|neh|ne swelgeþ nesan|neh|ne wiht iteþ , 
 foþres nesan|neh|ne gitsað , fereð oft swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 lagoflod on|an lyft ; lif nesan|neh|ne gielpeð , 
 hlaford gifu , hyreð swa þeana 
 þeodne sin . þri wesan|nesan in naman|nama 
 ryhte runstafas , þær|se wesan|seon|is ridan|rad foran . ## ic sugan|seon in heall hringan|hring gylden|gyldan 
 mann sceawian , mod gleaw , 
 ferþþum frod . friþospede bædan|biddan 
 god nergende gæstan sin 
 se þu|þe|se wendan|wenan wriþan ; word æfter cweðan 
 hringan|hring on|an hyrian , hælend nemnan 
 tillfremmendra . him|hi|he torht in gemynd 
 hit|his|he dryhten naman|nama dumb bringan|brengan 
 and in eagna gesiht , gif se æþele 
 gold tacn|tacen|tacan ongietan cuþ|cunnan 
 and dryhten dolg , don swa se beah|beag 
 benne cweþan|cweðan . nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þære|se ben 
 ænig monnes ungefullodre 
 god ealdorburg gæstan|gan gesecan , 
 rodera ceaster . ræde|rædan|ræd , se þu|þe|se willan , 
 hu se wrætlican wundian|wund cweþan|cweðan 
 hring toh|to hæleþ|hæle , þu|þa|se he in heall wesan|seon|beon 
 wylted and wendan wloncra folm . ## mec gesette|gesettan soð sigorian|sigor waldend 
 crist toh|to compe . oft ic cwic bærnan|bær , 
 unrimu cyn eorþe|eorþ getenge , 
 næte mid niþ , swa ic him|hi|he no hrinan , 
 þonne|se mec min|ic frea feohtan hateþ . 
 hwilum|hwil ic monigra mod arete , 
 hwilum|hwil ic frefran þu|þa|se ic ær winnan on|an 
 feorran|feorr|feor swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe ; hi|heo se felað þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah , 
 swilce se oþer|oðer , þonne|se ic eft hyra|hyr|hira|hi 
 ofer deop gedreag drohtað betan . ## ic wesan|seon|beon be sonde , sæwealle neah , 
 æt|etan merefaroþe , minum|min gewunade 
 frumstaþole fæstan|fæst ; fea ænig wesan|seon|beon 
 mann cynn|cyn , þæt|se min þær 
 on|an anæde eard behealdan , 
 acan|ac mec uhtna gehwa yð se brun 
 lagufæðme beleolc . lutan ic wendan|wenan 
 þæt|se ic ær oþþe|oððe sið æfre sculan 
 ofer meodubence muðleas sprecan , 
 word wrixlan . þæt|se wesan|seon|is wundor dælan|dæl , 
 on|an sefa searolic þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se swylc nesan|neh|ne conn , 
 hu mec seax ord and seon|seo|se swiþra|swiþ hond , 
 eorles ingeþonc and ord somod , 
 þing geþydan , þæt|se ic wiþ þu|þe|se sculan 
 for|faran wit an twegen ærendspræce 
 abeodan bealdlice , swa hit beorn micel 
 uncre wordcwidas widdor nesan|neh|ne mænan . ## oft mec fæstan|fæst bileac freolicu meowle , 
 ides on|an earce , hwilum|hwil up ateon 
 folm sin and frea sellan , 
 hold þeodne , swa hio hatan wesan|seon|beon . 
 siðþan me|ic on|an hreþer heafod sticade , 
 nioþan upweardne , on|an nearu|nearo fegan . 
 gif se ondfengan ellen dugan , 
 mec frætwedne fyllan sculan 
 ruh nathwæt . rædan|ræd hwæt#2 ic mæne|mænan . ## ic wesan|seon|eoh heard and scearp , hingonges strong , 
 forðsiþes from|fram , frea unforcuð , 
 wadan|wad under wamb and me|ic wegan|weg self 
 ryhtne geryme . rinc bið on|an ofeste , 
 se mec on|an þyð æftanweardne , 
 hæleð mid hrægle ; hwilum|hwil ut tyhð 
 of hol hat , hwilum|hwil eft fareð 
 on|an nearu|nearo nathwær , nydeþ swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe 
 suþerne secg . secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan hwæt#2 ic hatan . ## oft ic secg seledreame sculan 
 fæger|fæge onþeon , þonne|se ic wesan|seon|eoh forþ|forð beran 
 glæd mid gold , þær guma drincað . 
 hwilum|hwil mec on|an cofa cysseð muþ 
 tillic esne , þær witan twegen beon , 
 fæðme on|an folm . . . . . .grum þyð , 
 wyrceð hit|his|he willian|willa . . . . . .ð fiftig . . . 
 full|ful , þonne|se ic forþ|forð cyme 
 . . . . . . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic þywan|þy|þe|se miþan , 
 . . .an on|an sunnan|leoht 
 . . . . . . 
 swilce eacan|eac bið sona 
 . . .r . . . . . .te getacnad , hwæt#2 me|ic toh|to 
 . . .leas rinc , þu|þa|se wit geryde wesan|seon|beon . ## ic sugan|seon wenan|wen and wesan|seon|is ofer wong faran , 
 beran|bera beorcan|beorc eh ; begen wesan|seon|beon on|an siþþe

 wisdom cyþan ; no þær word sprecað 
 ænig ofer eorþ|eorðe . þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah nu æled birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 londbuendra last min 
 swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe secað , ic swaþe hwilum|hwil 
 min bemiþan mann gehwylc . 
 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se azarias ingeþoncum 
 hleoþrede halig þurh hat lig , 
 dreogan dæd geornan|georn , dryhten herian , 
 wis in weorc , and þes word acwæð : 
 " meotud allwihta , þu wesan|seon meahtum swiðan 
 niþ toh|to nerganne . wesan|seon|is þu|þin noma mære|mæran , 
 wlitig and wuldorfæst ofer werþeode . 
 wesan|nesan þin dom on|an dæd gehwa 
 soð geswiðde and gesigefæste , 
 eacan|eac þin willan|willa in woruldspedum 
 ryhte mid ræde|rædan|ræd . rodera waldend , 
 geoc we|us georne|geornan|georn , gæsta scyppend , 
 and þurh hyldo helpan , halig dryhten , 
 nu we þec for|faran þearfa and for|faran þreanyd 
 and for|faran eaðmedum are biddan , 
 leсgan|lecgan bilegde . we se lifgende 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan in weorold , eacan|eac þon|se wom|woh don 
 yldran usse , in oferhygdum 
 þu|þin bibodu brecan burgsittende , 
 had oferhogedon halig|halga|haleg lifes|lif . 
 wurdon|weorþan we towrecene geond wid grund , 
 heap tohworfne , hyldu|hyldo leas ; 
 wesan|seon|beon ure|ur lif geond londa fela 
 fracuð and gefræge foldbuend . 
 nu þu usic bewrecan in þes wyrrestan 
 eorðcyninges æhtgewealda , 
 in hæftan heorogrimmes , sceolon we þær hæþen 
 þreanyd 
 hæfdes 
 toh|to abrahame and toh|to isace 
 and iacobe , gæsta scyppend . 
 þu him|hi|he gehatan þurh hleoþorcwidas 
 þæt|se þu hyra|hyr|hira|hi fromcynn on|an fyrndagum 
 ycan willan , þæt|se hit æfter him|hi|he 
 on|an cyneryce cennan weorþan , 
 yced on|an eorþe|eorþ , þæt|se swa unrime , 
 had toh|to hebban , swa heofonsteorran 
 bugað brad hwearft oþ|oð brimflodas , 
 swa waroþa sond ymb sealtan|sealt wæter , 
 yþan|yþ geond eargrund , þæt|se swa unrime 
 ymb wintra|winter hwearft weorðan sculan . 
 fyllan|fylan nu þu|þa|se frumspræce , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se user fea lifgen , 
 wlitega þin wordcwidas and þin wuldor|seolh|bearm we|us . 
 gecyð cræftan|cræft and magan , nu þec caldeas 
 and eacan|eac fela folc fricgan habban 
 þæt|se þu ana|an wesan|seon ece dryhten , 
 sigerof settend and soð meotod , 
 wuldor waldend and woruldsceafta . " 
 swa se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer hergende wesan|seon|beon 
 meotudes milts , and hit|his|he modsefa 
 reссan|reht|reccan þurh rædan|reord . þe|þa|ða|se of roderum wearð 
 engel ælbeorhta ufon onsendan , 
 wlitescyne wer in hit|his|he wuldorhoman , 
 cuman him|hi|he þu|þa|se toh|to are|ar and toh|to ealdornere 
 þurh lufu|lufe and þurh lisse . se se lig tosceaf , 
 halig and heofonbeorht , hatan|hat fyr , 
 þæt|se se bittra bryne beorgan sculan 
 for|faran se engel ege æfæst þri . 
 tosweop and toswengde þurh swiðes magan 
 liges leoma , swa hyra|hyr|hira|hi lice nesan|neh|ne scod , 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|beon in þæm|þam|se ofn , þu|þa|se se engel cuman , 
 windig and wynsum , wedere onlicust , 
 þonne|se on|an sumer tidan|tid sendan weorþeð 
 dropa dreorung mid dæg hwil . 
 se wesan|seon|beon in þæm|þam|se fire for|faran frea meahtum 
 halig|halga|haleg toh|to helpan . wearð se hatian|hat lig 
 todrifan and todwæsced , þær þu|þa|se dædhwatan 
 þri mid geþoncum þeon|þeodan herian|heredon , 
 biddan bletsian birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn in weorold 
 ealle|eall|eal gesceafte eсe dryhten , 
 þeod waldend . swa hi|heo þri cweþan|cweðan , 
 mod horsc , þurh gemæne word : 
 " bletsian þec , bilwit fæder , 
 woruldsceafta wuldor|seolh|bearm and weorc gehwylc , 
 heofon and engel and hluttor wæter , 
 and eal mægen|magan eorþe|eorþ gesceafta . 
 bletsian þec , soþfæst cyning , sunne|sinnan and mona , 
 sunnan|leoht leoma , lifgende god , 
 hædre and hlutor and heofondreame 
 wæstem weorðian . ful oft þu , wuldorcyning , 
 þurh lyft lætest leode|leoda|leod toh|to fremman|freme 
 milde morgenren . manig sculan siððan 
 wyrt|wyrdan onwæcnan , eacan|eac þon|se wudubearwas 
 tan tydrað . trymmað eorðwelan , 
 hleoð and hluttrað . næfre hlisa agan|ac 
 meotud þan|se micel|mare|mara þonne|se he wiþ|wið mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 wyrceð weldædum . wis bið se þu|þe|se con 
 ongytan se geocend , þu|þe|se we|us eall|eal good syleð 
 þu|þe|se we habbað þenden we heran|her beoð , 
 and we|us milde meotod micel|mare|mara gehateð , 
 gif we geearniað , ellen willað , 
 þonne feran sculan þurh frea hæs 
 sundor an gehwæs sawel of lice . 
 and þec , god dryhten , gæstas hergen , 
 beornan fyr and beorht sumor|sumer , 
 wearm wederdagas , waldend mannian|mann , 
 frea on|an ferðe . fremman eorðwelan 
 þurh monigne had , milde dryhten , 
 and þec dæg and niht|neaht , domfæst cyning , 
 lofian and lufian , lux etan|et tenebre , 
 þu|þe|se þes werþeoda weard healdað . 
 deop dryhten bibod dreogan hi|heo þæt|se long|lange . 
 and þec , crist cyning , ceolas weorðian , 
 fæder , forst and snaw , folc waldend , 
 winterbiter weder and wolcn|wolcen genip , 
 and þec liexende ligetta hergen , 
 blæc|blac , breahtumhwate , brytenrices weard , 
 dyrne dryhten . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þu|þin don|dom su 
 god and gengan|gangan . þu se geornlice 
 wyrcest , wuldorcyning . wæstm here , 
 bletsian bled , and þu|þin blæd wese|wesan 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a forþ|forð ece , ælmihtig god . 
 wesað and weaxað ealle|eall|eal werþeode , 
 lifgað bi|be þæm|þam|se lissum þu|þe|se we|us se libban|leof cyning , 
 ece dryhten , ær gesette|gesettan 
 sin bearn toh|to bryce , bremen dryhten . 
 and þec , halig|halgian|halga|haleg god , heah dun 
 geond middangeard milts hergen , 
 fæger folde and fæder romana . 
 forðam waldend scieppan wudig|wudian mor , 
 lof leanige sunnan|leoht hyrdan|hyran|hirde . 
 bletsian þec , soþfæst cyning , sæ and wæter|wæt 
 heah holm , halig dryhten , 
 domlice deop wæter ; and dryhten bibod 
 geofonfloda gehwylc georne|geornan|georn bihealdeð , 
 þonne|se merestreamas meotudes ræswa|ræs 
 wæter onwealcað . witan ealdgecynd 
 þæt|se ær gescop ece dryhten 
 lagufloda bigong , sunnan|leoht hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se wuniað widferende 
 siþ on|an sunde|sund seldlicra fela . 
 bletsian þec þu|þa|se ealle|eall|eal , ece dryhten , 
 þurh þinne|þin willan|willa , wuldorfæst cyning , 
 and þec ealle|eall|eal æsprynge , ece dryhten , 
 hean|heah hergen . ful oft þu hluttor lætest 
 wæter wynlico toh|to woruldhyhte 
 of clife clæne . þæt|se we|us se cyning gescop 
 mann toh|to milts and toh|to mægeneacan . 
 bletsian þec , bilwit fæder , 
 fisс|fisc and fugol , felameahtigne , 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|se onhrerað hreo wægas 
 on|an þæm|þam|se brad brim , bremen dryhten , 
 hergen halig , and heofonfuglas , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se lacan geond lyft farað . 
 bletsian þec , dryhten , deor and nyten|nytan . 
 meotud mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn milts hergen 
 and eсe god , israhela cynn . 
 bletsian þu|þe|se þin sacerd , soþfæst cyning , 
 milde mæsseras mære dryhten , 
 and þin þeowas , ðeoda hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 swilce halig hluttre saule , 
 and , ece god , eaðmodheorte . 
 nu þec ananias and azarias 
 and misahel , meotud , milts hergaþ . 
 nu we geong|gangan þri god bletsiað , 
 felameahtigne fæder in heofon , 
 se soð sunu and se sigefæst gæstan|gan . 
 forðam we|us onsendan sigorian|sigor waldend 
 engel toh|to are|ar , se þu|þe|se we|us beorgan|bearg 
 fyr and feond , and mid fiþre bewreah 
 wiþ|wið brynebrogan . " breahtm hwurfun 
 ymb þæt|se hatan|hat hus hæðne leode|leodan|leod , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se ongietan god ondsacan 
 þæt|se hi|heo nesan|neh|ne meahtan , nesan|neh|ne meotod willan , 
 acwellan cnyhta æ , acan|ac hi crist scyld . 
 hwerfan|hweorfan þu|þa|se toh|to heall , swa he hraþost magan , 
 eorl acolmod , þæt|se he ofer hit|his|he ealdor|eald gestandan . 
 abeodan þu|þa|se for|faran þære|se duguðe deop ærende|ærend , 
 halig gehyld , ( hlystan wesan|seon|beon þær inne ) , 
 gromhydig guma : " þæt|se ic geare|gear witan|wist , 
 þæt|se we þri habban , þeod wisian|wis , 
 geong|gangan cniehtas , for|faran gæstlufan 
 gebunden|gebindan|bindan toh|to bæle in byrnendes 
 fyr leoma . nu ic þær feower mann 
 seon|seo|se toh|to soð , nales me|ic self geridan|gerad . 
 hweorfað nu æfter heorðe , nænig hatan|hat sceþeð , 
 ofn æled|ælan , acan|ac him|hi|he wesan|seon|is engel mid , 
 hafað beorht blæd ; nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan him|hi|he bryne sceþþan 
 wlitig wuldorhoman . " þe|þa|ða|se þæm|þam|se word swelgan 
 breogo|brego caldea , gewitan þu|þa|se toh|to þæm|þam|se bryne gongan 
 anhydig eorl , þæt|se he ofer þæm|þam|se ad gestandan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se of þæm|þam|se liсgan|leon lifgende birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 nabocodonossor near ætgongan . 
 nesan|neh|ne forhogodon þæt|se þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg , siððan hi|heo hwætmode 
 woruldcyninges weornan gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 acan|ac gan|eadan of þæm|þam|se fyr , feorh unwemme , 
 wuldor gewlitegad , swa hyra|hyr|hira|hi wædum nesan|neh|ne scod 
 gifre gleda nið , acan|ac hi|heo mid gæstlufan 
 synn geswenсan|geswencan and gesigefæston , 
 mod gleaw , in monþeawum , 
 þurh foreþoncas fyr gedygdon . 
 
 " secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan me|ic hwæt#2 þær weorudes wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon eall|eal 
 on|an farones fyrd , þu|þa|se hi folc god 
 þurh feondscipe fylgan ongunn . . . . " 
 " nytan ic hit be wiht , butan ic wennan|wenan|wen þus , 
 þæt|se þær screoda wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gescyred riman|rim 
 six hun . . . . . .a searohæbbendra ; 
 þæt|se eal forniman yþan|yþ . . . 
 wraþ wyrdan|wyrd in woruldrice . " 
 
 ardor frigesscit , nitor squalescit , 
 amor abolescit , lux obtenebrescit . 
 hatan|hat acolað , hwit asolað , 
 leof alaðaþ , sunnan|leoht aðystrað . 
 senescunt omnia que æterna non sunt . 
 æghwæt forealdað se þu|þe|se ece nesan|neh|ne byð . 
 
 leode|leoda|leod wesan|seon|is minum|min swilce him|hi|he mann|man lacan|lac gifu|gifan ; 
 willað hi he aþecgan , gif he on|an þreotan cymeð . 
 ungelic wesan|seon|is we|us . 
 wulf wesan|seon|is on|an ig|ieg , ic on|an oþer . 
 fæstan|fæst wesan|seon|is þæt|se eglond , fenn biworpen . 
 wesan|nesan wælreow wer þær on|an ig ; 
 willað hi he aþecgan , gif he on|an þreotan cymeð . 
 ungelice wesan|seon|is we|us . 
 wulf ic min widlastum wena|wen hycgan ; 
 þonne|se hit wesan|seon|beon renig weder and ic reotugu sæt|sittan , 
 þonne|se mec se beaducafa boga|bog bilegde , 
 wesan|seon|beon me|ic wyn toh|to þon|se , wesan|seon|beon me|ic hwæþre eacan|eac lað . 
 wulf , min|ic wulf , wenian|wena|wen me|ic þin 
 seoc gedon , þin seldcymas , 
 murnan mod , nales meteliste . 
 gehyran þu , eadwacer gewinnan|geblandan uncerne earm hwelp 
 bireð wulf toh|to wudu|wudian . 
 þæt|se mann|man eaþe|eaþ tosliteð se næfre gesomnad wesan|seon|beon , 
 uncer giedd geador . 
 hwæt#2 ! ic þes singan|sang siðgeomor findan 
 on|an seoc sefa , samnian wid 
 hu þu|þa|se æðelingas ellen cyðdon , 
 torht and tireadige . twelfe|twelf wesan|seon|beon , 
 dæd domfæste , dryhten gecorene , 
 leof on|an lif . lof wid springan , 
 miht and mærðo , ofer middangeard , 
 þeodnes þegnian|þegn|þegen , þri unlytel . 
 halig|halga|haleg heap hlydan wisian 
 þær hi|heo dryhten æ deman|dema sculan , 
 reccan for|faran rinc . sum on|an romebyrig , 
 frame , fyrdhwate , feorh ofgefon 
 þurg nerones nearu|nearo searu , 
 petrus and paulus . wesan|seon|is se apostolhad 
 wid geweorðod ofer werþeoda ! 
 swilce andreas in achagia 
 for|faran egias ald geneðde . 
 nesan|neh|ne þreodode he for|faran þrymm ðeodcyninges , 
 ænig on|an eorþ|eorðe , acan|ac him|hi|he ece geceosan 
 langsum lif , sunnan|leoht unhwilen , 
 siððan hildeheard , here byrhtme , 
 æfter guðplegan gealga þehte . 
 hwæt#2 , we eacan|eac gehyrdan|gehyran be iohanne 
 æglæawe mann æðele reccan ! 
 se mannian|mann wesan|seon|beon , min gefrege , 
 þurh cneoris criste libban 
 on|an wer had , siððan wuldor cyning , 
 engel ordfruma , eorþ|eorðe sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 þurh fæmne hrif , fæder manncynn . 
 he in effessia ealle|eall|eal þrage 
 leode|leodan|leod læran , þanan lifes|lif wegan|weg 
 siþ geseсan|gesecan , swegl|swegel dream , 
 beorht boldwelan . næs|nesan hit|his|he broðor lætan|læt|lædan , 
 siðes sæne , acan|ac þurh|ðurh sweord bitan 
 mid iudeum iacob sculan 
 for|faran herode ealdor|eald gedælan , 
 feorh wiþ|wið flæsc . philipus wesan|seon|beon 
 mid asseum , þanan ece lif 
 þurh rode|rod cwealm ricene geseсan|gesecan , 
 siððan on|an galgan in gearapolim 
 ahon wesan|seon|beon hildecorðre . 
 huru , wid wearð wurd undyrne 
 þæt|se toh|to indeum ald gelædan 
 beaducræftig beornan|beorn|beirnan , bartholameus ! 
 se hatan astrias in albano , 
 hæðen and hygeblind , heafod beneotan , 
 forðam he þe|þa|ða|se hæðengild hyran nesan|neh|ne willan , 
 wigan|wig weorðian . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon wuldor dream , 
 lifwela leof þonne|se þes leas god . 
 swilce thomas eacan|eac þriste geneðde 
 on|an indea oðer dæl , 
 þær manig wearð mod onlihtan , 
 hige onhyrdan , þurh hit|his|he halig word . 
 siððan collenferð cyning broðor 
 awehte for|faran weorodum , wundorcræfte , 
 þurh dryhten miht , þæt|se he of deaðe arisan|ar , 
 geong|gangan and guðhwæt , and him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon gad nama , 
 and þe|þa|ða|se þæm|se folc feorg gesellan , 
 sinnan|sin æt|etan sæcce . sweordræs forniman 
 þurh hæðen hand , þær se halig|halgian|halga|haleg gecrang , 
 wund for|faran weorudum , þanan wuldor sunnan|leoht 
 sawol|sawel geseсan|gesecan sigor toh|to lean . 
 hwæt#2 , we þæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran þurg halig bec , 
 þæt|se mid sigelwarum soð yppe|yppan wearð , 
 dryhtlic don|dom god ! dæg or onwæcnan|onwacan , 
 sunnan|leoht geleafa , land|finna wesan|seon|beon fælsian 
 þurh matheus mære|mæran lar . 
 se hettan|het|hedan|hatan irtacus þurh|ðurh yrnan hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , 
 wælreow cyning , wæpn|wæpen aswebban . 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde we þæt|se iacob in ierusalem 
 for|faran sacerdum sweltan þrowian . 
 ðurg stenges sweng stiðmod gecrang , 
 eadig for|faran æfest . hafað nu ece lif 
 mid wuldorcining , wig toh|to lean . 
 nesan þe|þa|ða|se twegen tohtan sæne , 
 lindgelaces , land|finna persea 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan siðfrome , simon and thaddeus , 
 beorn beadorofe ! him|hi|he wearð begen samod 
 on|an endedæg . æðele sculan 
 þurh|ðurh wæpenhete weorc þrowigan , 
 sigelean sec , and se soð gefea , 
 dream æfter deaðe , þu|þa|se gedælan|dælan wearð 
 lif wiþ|wið lice , and þes lænan gestreon , 
 idel æhtwelan , ealle|eall|eal forhogodan . 
 þus þe|þa|ða|se æðelingas ende gesellan , 
 twelf tilmodige . tir unbræcne 
 wegan on|an gewitt wuldor þegn|þegen . 
 nu ic þonne|se biddan beornan|beorn|beirnan se þu|þe|ðe lufian 
 þysses giddes begangan|begang þæt|se he geomor me|ic 
 se halig|halga|haleg heap helpan biddan , 
 friðes and fultomes . hu , ic freond beþearf 
 liðra on|an lad , þonne|se ic sculan lang ham , 
 eardwic uncuþ , ana|an gesecan , 
 lætan me|ic on|an last liс|lic , eorþ|eorðe dælan|dæl , 
 wælreaf wunigean weormum toh|to hroðre . 
 heran|her mæg|magan findan foreþances gleaw , 
 se þu|þe|ðe he lysteð leoðgiddunga , 
 hwæt|hwa þes fitt fegan . þær on|an ende standeþ , 
 eorl se on|an eorþ|eorðe brucan . nesan|neh|ne motan hi|heo awa ætsomne , 
 woruldwunigende ; sculan gedreosan , 
 on|an eðle , æfter tohreosan 
 lænan|læn lices frætewa , efne|efnan|efen swa toglideð . 
 þonne|se and cræft neosað 
 niht nearowe , on|an him|hi|he ligeð , 
 cyning þeodom . nu þu cunnan miht 
 hwæt|hwa on|an þæm|þam|se word wesan|seon|beon wer oncyðig . 
 wesan|seon|nesan se gemyndig , mann se þu|þe|ðe lufian 
 þes galdre|galdor begangan|begang , þæt|se he geoc me|ic 
 and frofor friclu . ic sceall feor heonan , 
 on|an elles forþ|forð , eardes neosan , 
 sið asettan , nytan ic self hwær , 
 of þes weorold . wiс|wican|wic wesan|nesan uncuþ , 
 eard and eðel , swa bið ælc mann 
 nemþe he godcund gast brucan . 
 agan|ac utu we þu|þe|se geornor toh|to god cleopigan , 
 sendan usse ben on|an þu|þa|se beorht gesceaft , 
 þæt|se we se botles brucan motan , 
 ham in hehðo , þær wesan|seon|is hihta micel , 
 þær cyning engel clæne gildeð 
 lean unhwilen . nu wifcynn|hosp|flet|a hit|his|he lof standeð , 
 micel and mære|mæran , and hit|his|he miht seomian , 
 ece and edgiong , ofer ealle|eall|eal gesceaft . 
 finit . 
 
 heran|her eadward kingc , engel hlaford , 
 sendan soþfæste sawol|sawel toh|to criste 
 on|an god wær , gast halig . 
 he on|an weorold heran|her wunian þrage 
 on|an kyneþrymme , cræftig ræde|ræd , 
 xxiiii , freolic wealdend , 
 wintra|winter gerim , weolan britnode , 
 and healf tidan|tid , hæleða wealdend , 
 wealdan wel þeon|geþingan|geþeon wæl and scottum 
 and brytta eacan|eac , byre æðelredes , 
 engel and sexum , oretmægcum , 
 swa ymbclyppað cealde brymmas , 
 þæt|se eall|eal eadwarde , æðele kinge , 
 hyrdan|hyran holdlice hagestealde mann . 
 wesan|seon|beon wifcynn|hosp|flet|a bliðemod bealuleas kyng , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he lange|lang ær , land|finna bereafian , 
 wunian wræclast wid geond eorþ|eorðe , 
 siððan cnut ofercuman|ofercom kynn æðelredes 
 and denu|dene wealdan deore|deor romana 
 engel land|finna xxviii 
 wintra|winter gerim , wela brytnodon . 
 siððan forþ|forð becuman freolice in geatwum 
 kyningc kystum god , clæne and milde , 
 eadward se æðele , eðel bewerode , 
 land|finna and leode|leodan|leod , oðþæt lungre becuman 
 deað se biter , and swa deore|deor geniman 
 æþele of eorþ|eorðe ; engel ferian 
 soþfæste sawol|sawel innan swegl|swegel sunnan|leoht . 
 and se frod swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah befæstan þæt|se romana 
 heahþungenum mann , harolde self , 
 æþelu|æþele|æþel eorle , se in ealle|eall|eal tidan|tid 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde holdlice hærran sin 
 word and dæd , wiht nesan|neh|ne agælde 
 se þu|þe|se þurfan|þearf wesan|seon|beon se þeodkyninges . 
 
 heran|her cuman ælfred , se unsceððiga æþeling , æþelrædes 
 sunu cinges , hider inn and willan toh|to hit|his|he modor , þu|þe|se on|an win- 
 cestre sæt|sittan , acan|ac hit him|hi|he nesan|neh|ne geþafian godwine eorl , nesan|neh|ne ec oþer|oðer 
 mann þu|þe|se micel mihton wealdan , forðam hit hleoðrode þu|þa|se 
 swiðe|swiðan toward haraldes , þeah hit unriht wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 acan|ac godwine he þu|þa|se gelette and he on|an hæftan settan , 
 and hit|his|he gefere|gefera he todrifan , and sum mislice ofslean ; 
 sum hi|heo munan|mann|man wiþ|wið feoh sellan , sum hreowlice acwellan , 
 sum hi|heo munan|mann|man bendan , sum hi|heo munan|mann|man blendan|blandan , 
 sum hamelian , sum hættode . 
 nesan|neh|ne wearð dreorlicre dæd gedon|gedo|don on|an þison eard , 
 siððan denu|dene cuman and heran|her frið niman . 
 nu wesan|seon|is toh|to gelyfan toh|to ðan leof god , 
 þæt|se hi|heo blission bliðe mid criste 
 þu|þe|se wesan|seon|beon butan scylde swa earmlice acwellan . 
 se æþeling lyfode þu|þa|se git ; ælc yfel munan|mann|man him|hi|he hettan|gehatan , 
 oðþæt munan|mann|man gerædan þæt|se munan|mann|man he lædan 
 toh|to eligbyrig swa gebindan . 
 sona swa he lendan , on|an scype munan|mann|man he blendan|blandan , 
 and he swa blind bringan|brengan toh|to ðam|se munecon , 
 and he þær wunian þe|þa|ða|se hwil þu|þe|se he lyfode . 
 siððan he munan|mann|man byrigde , swa him|hi|he wel gebyrian , 
 ful wurðlice , swa he weorþ wesan|seon|beon , 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se westan , þæm|þam|se styple ful gehende , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se suðportice ; seon|seo|se saul wesan|seon|is mid criste . 
 
 . . .e þu|þe|ðe me|ic ræde|rædan ðance , 
 he in me|ic findan mæg|magan , gif he feola lysteð 
 gastlices lifes|lif god biesene , 
 þæt|se he ful eaþe|eaþ mæg|magan upp gestigan 
 toh|to ðam|se heofonlic ham , þær byð wifcynn|hosp|flet|a hyht and wyn , 
 blis on|an burh|burg , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god 
 sielfes hira|hi eage geseon motan . 
 þæt|se mæg|magan se mann|man begytan , se þu|þe|se hit|his|he modgeðanc 
 æltowe buan , and þonne|se þurh hit|his|he ingehygd 
 toh|to þissa halig helpan geliefeð , 
 and hira|hi bisene fulgað , swa þes|þeoh|se boc|bacan sagað . 
 me|ic awritan hettan|het|hedan|hatan wulfstan bisceop , 
 þeowan|þeow and þearfian|þearfa se þu|þe|se eal|all þri aof , 
 and eacan|eac walden wesan|seon|is wiht gehwelcre , 
 on|an ece god eall gesceafta . 
 bidan þu|þe|se se bisceop , se þu|þe|se þes|se boc|bacan begietan|begeotan 
 þu|þe|se þu on|an þin hand nu hafian|habban and sceawian , 
 þæt|se þu him|hi|he toh|to þeossum halig|halga|haleg helpan biddan , 
 þu|þe|se hira|hi|heore gemynd heran|her on|an gemearcude siendon , 
 and þæt|se him|hi|he god ællmihtig 
 forgyu . . . þu|þa|se gyltas þu|þe|se he geo wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 and eacan|eac resðe mid him|hi|he , se þu|þe|ðe agan|ac eall|eal rices geweald , 
 and eacan|eac swa hit|his|he beahgifan , þu|þe|se him|hi|he þes|se bysen forgifan|forgiefan , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|is se selesða sinc brytta , 
 ælfryd mid engel , eall|eal cyning 
 þær|se þu|þe|se he sið oððe ær for|faran secgan hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 oððe he iorðcyninga ær ænig gefrignan . 
 
 ic þes giedd wrecan bi|be me|ic ful geomor , 
 minre|min sylfre sið . ic þæt|se secgan mæg|magan , 
 hwæt#2 ic yrmþa gebidan , siððan ic up aweox , 
 niwe oþþe|oððe eald , no micel þonne|se nu . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic wite|witan winnan min wræcsiþa . 
 ærest|ær min|ic hlaford gewitan heonan of leode|leoda|leod 
 ofer yþian|yþ gelacan ; habban ic uhtcearu 
 hwær min|ic leodfruma land wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic me|ic feran gewitan folgað sec , 
 wineleas wræcca , for|faran minre|min weaþearfe . 
 onginnan þæt|se se monnes mæg|maga hycgan 
 þurh dyrne þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan , þæt|se hi todælan wit , 
 þæt|se witan gewidost in woruldrice 
 libban laðlicost , and mec longade . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan mec hlaford min|ic herheard niman , 
 agan ic leof lutan on|an þes londstede , 
 hold freond . forðam wesan|seon|is min|ic hyсgan|hyg|hycgan geomor . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic me|ic ful gemæcne monnan findan , 
 heardsæligne , hygegeomorne , 
 mod miþendne , morþor hycgendne . 
 bliþe gebæro ful oft witan beotedan 
 þæt|se wit nesan|neh|ne gedælan nemnan deað ana|an 
 owiht elles ; eft wesan|seon|is þæt|se onhweorfan , 
 wesan|seon|is nu swa hit næfre wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 freondscipe uncer . sculan ic feor ge neah 
 min felaleofan fæhðu dreogan . 
 hatan mec mann|man wunian on|an wudu|wudian bearwe , 
 under actreo in þæm|þam|se eorðscræfe . 
 eald wesan|seon|is þes eorðsele , eal ic wesan|seon|eoh oflongad , 
 wesan|nesan denu|dene dimm , dun uphea , 
 bitter|bitor|biter burgtunas , brerum beweaxne , 
 wiс|wican|wic wynn leas . ful oft mec heran|her wraþ begietan|begeotan 
 fromsiþ frea . frynd wesan|nesan on|an eorþe|eorþ , 
 leof lifgende , leger weardiað , 
 þonne|se ic on|an uhta ana|an gonge 
 under actreo geond þes eorðscrafu . 
 þær ic sittan motan|mot sumorlangne dæg , 
 þær ic wepan mæg|magan min wræcsiþas , 
 earfoþe fela ; forðam ic æfre nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 þære|se modceare minre|min gerestan , 
 nesan|neh|ne eall|eal se longaþes þu|þe|se mec on|an þes lif begietan|begeotan . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a sculan geong|gangan mann|man wese|wesan geomormod , 
 heard heorte þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan , swilce habban sculan 
 bliþe gebæro , eacan|eac þon|se breostcearu , 
 sinsorgna gedreag . su æt|etan him|hi|he self gelong 
 eal hit|his|he weorold wyn , su ful wid fah 
 feorr|feor folclondes , þæt|se min|ic freond siteð 
 under stanhliþe storm behrimed , 
 wine|win werigmod , wæter|wæt beflowan 
 on|an dreorsele . dreogeð se min|ic wine|win 
 micel modceare ; he gemunan toh|to oft 
 wynlicran wiс|wican|wic . wa bið þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se sculan 
 of langoþ leof abidan . 
 
 nu ic fitt gen ymb fisс|fiscian|fisc cynn 
 willan woðcræfte word cyþan 
 þurh modgemynd bi|be þæm|þam|se micel hwale . 
 se bið unwillum oft metan|gemetan , 
 frecne|frecen|frec and ferðgrim fareðlacendum , 
 niþþe|niþþas gehwylc . þ " " ;am wesan|seon|is noma cennan , 
 fyrnstreama geflotan , fastitocalon . 
 wesan|seon|is se hiw gelic hreofum stane|stan , 
 swilce worie bi|be wæd ofer , 
 sondbeorgum ymbsellan , særinca micel , 
 swa þæt|se wenian|wenan wægliþende 
 þæt|se hi on|an ealond sum|su eage wlitan , 
 and þonne|se gehydað heahstefn scip 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se unlonde oncyrrapum , 
 setlaþ sæmearas sund æt|etan ende , 
 and þonne|se in þæt|se eglond up gewitað 
 collenferþe . ceolas stondað 
 bi|be stæþ fæstan|fæst , stream biwunden . 
 þonne gewiciað werigferðe , 
 faroðlacende , frecne|frecen nesan|neh|ne wenað , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se ealonde æled|ælan weccað , 
 heahfyr ælað ; hæleþ|hæle|hælan beon on|an wynn , 
 reonigmode , ræste geliste . 
 þonne|se gefeleð facn cræftig 
 þæt|se him|hi|he þu|þa|se ferend on|an fæstan|fæst wunian , 
 wiс|wican|wic weardiað weder on|an lust , 
 þonne semninga on|an sealten|sealt wegan 
 mid þu|þa|se noþ niþer gewitan 
 garsecges gæstan|gan , grund geseceð , 
 and þonne|se in deaðsele drence bifæsteð 
 scip mid scealcum . swa bið scinna þeaw , 
 deofol wise|wis , þæt|se hi|heo , drohtende 
 þurh dyrne magan , duguðe beswicað , 
 and on|an teosu tyhtan til dæd , 
 wemað on|an willan|willa , þæt|se hi wraþ secen , 
 frofor toh|to feond , oþþæt hi fæstan|fæst þær 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se wærloga wiс|wican|wic geceosað . 
 þonne|se þæt|se gecnaweð of cwicsusle 
 flah feond gemah , se firas gehwylc 
 hæleþ|hæle cynn|cyn on|an hit|his|he hringan|hring beon 
 fæstan|fæst gefegan|fegan , he him|hi|he feorgbona 
 þurh sliþen searo siððan weorþeð , 
 wloncum and hean , þu|þe|se hit|his|he willan|willa heran|her 
 firen fremmað , mid þæm|þam|se he færinga , 
 heoloþhelme biþeaht , hell|hel seceð , 
 god geasne , grundleas wylm 
 under mistglome , swa se micel hwæl , 
 se þu|þe|se bisenceð sæliþend 
 eorl and yðmearas . he hafað oþer|oðer gecynd , 
 wæterþisa wlonc , wrætlicran gien . 
 þonne|se he on|an holm hungor bysgað 
 and se aglæca ætes lysteþ , 
 þonne se mereweard muð ontyneð , 
 wid weler ; cymeð wynsum stenc 
 of hit|his|he innoþ , se oþer|oðer þurh se , 
 sæfisca cynn , beswican weorðaþ , 
 swimmað sundhwate þær se swete stenc 
 ut gewitað . hi|heo þær in farað 
 unware weorude , oþþæt se wid ceafl 
 gefyllan|fyllan bið ; þonne|se færinga 
 ymbe|ymb þu|þa|se herehuþe hlemmeð togædre 
 grimman|grimm|grim goma . swa beon guma gehwa , 
 se þu|þe|se oftost hit|his|he unwærlice 
 on|an þes lænan tidan|tid lif bisceawað , 
 læteð he beswican þurh swete stenc , 
 leas willan|willa , þæt|se he beon leahtrum fah 
 wiþ|wið wuldorcyning . him|hi|he se awyrgda ongeagn 
 æfter hinsiþe hell|hel ontyneð , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se leaslice lices wynn 
 ofer ferhtgereaht fremman on|an unræd . 
 þonne|se se fæcne in þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan 
 gebrengan|bringan|brengan hafað , bealu|bealo cræftig , 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se edwylme þu|þa|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an cleofiað , 
 gyltum gehrodene , and ær georne|geornan|georn hit|his|he 
 in hira|hi lifdagum lar hyrdan|hyran , 
 þonne|se he þu|þa|se grimman|grimm|grim goma bihlemmeð 
 æfter feorhcwale fæstan|fæst togædre , 
 hell|hel hlinduru ; nagan hwyrft nesan|neh|ne swican , 
 utsiþ æfre , þu|þa|se þær in cumað , 
 þon|se micel þu|þe|se þu|þa|se fisс|fisc faraðlacende 
 of se hwæl fon hweorfan motan . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is eallinga 
 
 dryhten dryhten , and wifcynn|hosp|flet|a deofol wiþsacan 
 word and weorc , þæt|se we wuldorcyning 
 geseon motan . witon wifcynn|hosp|flet|a sibb|sib toh|to him|hi|he 
 on|an þes hwilnan tidan|tid hælu sec , 
 þæt|se we mid swa leof in lof motan 
 toh|to wid feorh wuldor neotan . 
 
 hwæt#2 ! we gefrunan on|an fyrndagum 
 twelfe|twelf under tungol tireadige hæleð , 
 þeodnes þegn|þegen . no hira|hi þri alæg 
 campræden þonne|se cumbol hneotan , 
 siððan hi|heo gedælan , swa him|hi|he dryhten self , 
 heofon heahcyning , hlydan getæhte . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon mære|mæran mann ofer eorþ|eorðe , 
 from folctogan and fyrdhwate , 
 rof rinc , þonne|se rond and hand 
 on|an herefelda helm ealgian , 
 on|an meotudwange . wesan|seon|beon hira|hi matheus sum|su , 
 se mid iudeum onginnan godspell ærest|ær 
 word writan wundorcræfte . 
 þæm|þam|se halig god hlydan geteon 
 ut on|an þæt|se igland þær ænig þu|þa|se git|gietan 
 ellþeodigra eðles nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan 
 blæd brucan . oft him|hi|he bonena hand 
 on|an herefelda heard gescogan . 
 eal wesan|seon|beon þæt|se mearcland morðre bewindan , 
 feond facn|facen , folcstede guma , 
 hæleða eðel . næs|nesan þær hlaf wist 
 wer on|an þæm|þam|se wonge , nesan|neh|ne wæter drync 
 toh|to bruconne , agan|ac hi|heo blod and felan|fel , 
 firas flæschoman , feorrancumenra , 
 ðegon geond þu|þa|se þeon|þeodan|þeod . swelc wesan|seon|beon þeaw hira|hi 
 þæt|se hi|heo æghwylс ellðeodigra 
 dydan him|hi|he toh|to mos meteþearfende , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se þæt|se ealand utan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . 
 swylc wesan|seon|beon se folc freoðoleas tacn|tacen|tacan , 
 unlæd eafoð , þæt|se hi|heo eage gesiht , 
 hettend heorogrimme , heafodgimmas 
 agetton gealgmode gar ord . 
 siððan him|hi|he geblendan biter tosamne , 
 dryas þurh dwolcræft , drync unheorne , 
 se onwendan gewitan , wer ingeþanc , 
 heorte on|an hreðre , ( hyсgan|hyg|hycgan wesan|seon|beon oncyrred ) , 
 þæt|se hi|heo nesan|neh|ne murndan æfter mandreame , 
 hæleþ|hæle|hælan heorogrædige , acan|ac hi|heo hi|heo|heg and gærs 
 for|faran meteleaste meðe gedreccan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon matheus toh|to þære|se mære|mæran burh|burg 
 cuman in þu|þa|se ceaster . þær wesan|seon|beon cirm micel 
 geond mermedonia , manfulra hloð , 
 fordenera gedræg , siððan deofol þegn|þegen 
 geascian æðelinges sið . 
 gan|eadan him|hi|he þu|þa|se togenes , gar hyrstan , 
 lungre under linde , ( nalas læt|late wesan|seon|beon ) , 
 eorre æscberend , toh|to þæm|þam|se orlege . 
 hi|heo þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg þær hand gebindan 
 and fæstnian feond cræftan|cræft , 
 hæleð hellfuse , and hit|his|he heafod segl 
 abreoton mid bil ecge . hwæðre he in breost þu|þa|se git|gietan 
 herian in heorte heofonrices weard , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he ator drync atulne onfon . 
 eadig and onmod , he mid ellen forþ|forð 
 wyrðode word wuldor aldor , 
 heofonrices weard , halig|halga|haleg stefn , 
 of carcern . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon cristes lof 
 on|an fyrhðlocan fæstan|fæst bewindan . 
 he þu|þa|se wepan weregum tear 
 hit|his|he sigedryhten sarig rædan|reord 
 gretan , guma breogo|brego , geomor stefn , 
 weoruda wilgeofan , and þus word cweðan : 
 " hu me|ic elþeodig inwitwrasne 
 searonet seowað ! wifcynn|hosp|flet|a ic symles wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an weg gehwa willan|willa þin 
 geornan|georn on|an mod ; nu þurh|ðurh geohða sculan 
 dæd fremman swa þu|þa|se dumb neotan|neat . 
 þu ana|an cunnan eall|eal gehygdo , 
 meotud mancynn , mod in hreðre . 
 gif þu|þin willian|willa wesan|seon|nesan , wuldor aldor , 
 þæt|se me|ic wærloga wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen ecgum , 
 sweord , aswebban , ic beon|beo sona gearu
