 toh|to adreoganne þæt|se þu , drihten min|ic , 
 engel eadgifa , eðelleasum , 
 dugeða dædfruma , deman|dema willan . 
 forgif me|ic toh|to are|ar , ælmihtig god , 
 sunnan|leoht on|an þes lif , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan ic lungre sculan , 
 ablended in burh|burg , æfter billhete 
 þurh hearmcwide heorugrædigra , 
 laðra leodsceaðena , lengan|leng|lange þrowian 
 edwitspræce . ic toh|to an þu|þe|se , 
 middangeard weard , mod staþolian , 
 fæstan|fæst fyrhðlufan , and þu|þe|se , fæder engel , 
 beorht blædgifa , biddan willan 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu me|ic nesan|neh|ne gescyrige mid scyldhetum , 
 werig wrohtsmiðum , on|an se wyrrestan , 
 dugoða demend , deað ofer eorþ|eorðe . " 
 æfter þes word cuman wuldor tacn|tacen|tacan 
 halig of heofenum , swilce hadre segl 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se carcern . þær gecyðed wearð 
 þæt|se halig god helpan gefremian , 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð hyrian|hyran|gehyran heofoncyninges stefn 
 wrætlic under wolcn|wolcen , wordhleoðres swegan|sweg 
 mære þeodnes . he hit|his|he maguþegne 
 under hearmlocan hælu and frofor 
 beadurofum abeodan beorht stefn : 
 " ic þu|þe|se , matheus , min syll sybbe 
 under swegl|swegel . nesan|neh|ne beon|beo þu on|an sefa toh|to forht , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an mod nesan|neh|ne murnan . ic þu|þe|se mid wunian 
 and þu|þe|se alysan of þes leoðubendum , 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se menigo þu|þe|se þu|þe|se mid wuniað 
 on|an nearonedum . þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is neorxnawang , 
 blæd beorhtost , boldwela fægrost , 
 ham hyhtlicost , haleg miht 
 torht ontynan . þær þu tyres motan , 
 toh|to wid feorh willan|willa brucan . 
 geþolian þeod þrea ! nesan seon|seo|se þrah micel 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se wærloga witebendum , 
 synnig þurh|ðurh searocræft , swencan motan . 
 ic þu|þe|se andreas ædre onsendan 
 toh|to hleo and toh|to hroðre in þes hæðena|hæðen cantwara|burg . 
 he þu|þe|ðe alyseð of þes leodhete . 
 wesan|seon|is toh|to þære|se tidan|tid tælmet hwil 
 emn mid soð seofon and twentig 
 nihtgerimes , þæt|se þu of nede motan , 
 sorh|sorg geswenced , sigor gewyrðod , 
 hweorfan of henðum in gehyld god . " 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg helm ælwihta , 
 engel scyppend , toh|to þæm|þam|se uplican 
 eðelrice . he wesan|seon|is on|an rihtan|riht cyning , 
 staðolfæst styrend , in stow gehwa . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon matheus micel onbryrded 
 niwe stefn . nihthelm toglad , 
 lungre leoran . sunnan|leoht æfter cuman , 
 dægredwoma . duguð samnade , 
 hæðne hildfrecan , heap þringan , 
 ( guðsearo giellan , gar hrysedon ) , 
 bolgenmod , under bordhreoðan . 
 willan cunnian hwæðer cwic libban 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se on|an carcern clommum fæstan|fæst 
 hleoleasan wiс|wican|wic hwil wunedon , 
 hwilc hi|heo toh|to etan ærest|ær mihton 
 æfter fyrstmearce feorh berædan . 
 habban hi|heo on|an run and on|an rimcræft 
 awriten|awritan , wælgrædige , wer endestæf , 
 hwanne hi|heo toh|to mos meteþearfende 
 on|an þære|se werþeode weorðan sculan . 
 cirmdon caldheorte , ( corðor oðer getang ) , 
 reðe ræsboran . riht nesan|neh|ne gimdon , 
 meotudes mildse . oft hira|hi mod onwadan 
 under dimscuan deofol lar , 
 þonne|se hi|heo unlæd eafeðum gelyfan|gelifan . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se gemetan mod glawne , 
 halig hæle|hælan|helan , under heolstorlocan 
 bidan beadurofne se him|hi|he beorht cyning , 
 engel ordfruma , unnan willan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon first aginnan|agan frumrædenne 
 þinggemearces butan þri niht|neaht , 
 swa hit wælwulfas awriten|awritan habban 
 þæt|se hi|heo banhringas abrecan þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 lungre tolysan liс|lic and sawol|sawel , 
 and þonne|se todælan duguðe and geogoðe , 
 wer toh|to witan|wist and toh|to wilþege , 
 fæge flæschoman . feorh nesan|neh|ne bemurndan , 
 grædig guðrincas , hu se gast sið 
 æfter swyltcwale settan|gesettan weorþan . 
 swa hi|heo simble ymb þritig þingan|þing gehedon 
 nihtgerimes ; wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he neod micel 
 þæt|se hi|heo tobrugdon blodig ceafl 
 firas flæschoman him|hi|he toh|to foddorþege . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon gemyndig , se þu|þe|ðe middangeard 
 gestaðelode strang miht , 
 hu he in ellþeodigum yrmðum wunian , 
 belucan leoðubendum , þu|þe|se oft hit|his|he lufu|lufe adreg 
 for|faran ebreum and israhelum ; 
 swilce he iudea galdorcræftum 
 wiðstod stranglice . þu|þa|se se stefn gewearð 
 herian|heran|geherian of heofenum , þær se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer 
 in achaia , andreas , wesan|seon|beon , 
 ( leode|leodan|leod læran on|an lifes|lif wegan|weg ) , 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he cirebaldum cininga wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 meotud mancynn , modhord onlucan , 
 weoruda drihten , and þus word cweðan : 
 " þu sculan feran and frið lædan , 
 siþ gesecan , þær sylfætan 
 eard weardigað , eðel healdan 
 morðorcræftum . swa wesan|seon|is þære|se menigo þeaw 
 þæt|se hi|heo uncuðra ængum nesan|neh|ne willað 
 on|an þæm|þam|se folcstede feorh geunnan 
 siððan manfull on|an mermedonia 
 onfindan feasceaft . þær sceall feorhgedal , 
 earmlic yld cwealm , æfter wyrþe . 
 þær ic seomian witan þinne|þin sigebroðor 
 mid þæm|þam|se burhware bend fæst . 
 nu bið for|faran þri niht|neaht þæt|se he on|an þære|se þeon|þeodan|þeod sculan 
 for|faran hæðen handgewinne 
 þurh gar grippan|gripe|gripan gast onsendan , 
 ellorfusne , butan þu ær cyme . " 
 ædre him|hi|he andreas agef andswaru : 
 " hu mæg|magan ic , dryhten min|ic , ofer deop gelad 
 for|faran gefremman on|an feorr|feor wegan|weg 
 swa hrædlice , heofon scyppend , 
 wuldor waldend , swa þu word becweþan gewinnan|geblandan 
 þæt|ðæt|se mæg|magan engel þu|þin eaþ gefere|gefera , 
 halig of heofenum con him|hi|he holm begangan|begang , 
 sealtan|sealt sæstreamas and swanrade , 
 waroðfaruða gewinnan|gewinn and wæterbrogan , 
 weg ofer widland . nesan|neh|ne synt me|ic wine cuðe , 
 eorl elþeodig , nesan|neh|ne þær ænig witan 
 hæleða gehygdo , nesan|neh|ne me|ic herestræta 
 ofer cald wæter cuðe wesan|nesan . " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se ondswarude ece dryhten : 
 " eala , andreas , þæt|se þu wifcynn|hosp|flet|a willan 
 se siðfætes sæne weorþan|weorþ ! 
 nesan þæt|se uneaðe eallwealdan god 
 toh|to gefremmanne on|an foldwege , 
 þæt|ðæt|se se ceaster hider on|an þes cneoris 
 under swegl|swegel gangan|gang asettan weorþ , 
 breogostol breme , mid þæm|þam|se burhware , 
 gif hit word becwið wuldor agend . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan þu se siðfætes sæne weorðan , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an gewitt toh|to wican|wacan|wac , gif þu wel þencest 
 wiþ|wið þinne|þin waldend wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gehealdan , 
 treowe|treow tacn|tacen|tacan . beon|beo þu on|an tidan|tid gearu ; 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan se ærende ilding wyrðan . 
 þu sculan þu|þa|se for|faran gefere|gefera and þu|þin feorh beran|bera 
 in gram grippan|gripe|gripan , þær þu|þe|se guðgewinn 
 þurh hæðen hildewoman , 
 beorn beaducræft , gebeodan|beodan wyrðeð . 
 scealtu æninga mid ærdæge , 
 emn toh|to morgene , æt|etan mere ende 
 ceol gestigan and on|an cald wæter 
 brecan ofer bæðweg . hafian|habban bletsunge 
 ofer middangeard min , þær þu ferian|feran ! " 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg healdend and wealdend , 
 upengel fruma , eðel sec , 
 middangeard weard , se mære|mæran ham , 
 þær soðfæstra sawol|sawlian|sawel motan 
 æfter lices hryre lifes|lif brucan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon ærende|ærend æðele cempa 
 abeodan in burh|burg , nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he bleað hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , 
 agan|ac he wesan|seon|beon anræd ellenweorces , 
 heard and higerof , nalas hildlata , 
 gearu|gearo , guðe fram , toh|to god camp . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se on|an uhta mid ærdæge 
 ofer sandhleoðu toh|to sæ faruðe , 
 þriste on|an geþanc , and hit|his|he þegn|þegen mid , 
 gangan on|an greotan . garsecg hlynede , 
 beatan brimstreamas . se beornan|beorn|beirnan wesan|seon|beon on|an hyht , 
 siððan he on|an waruðe widfæðme scip 
 modig gemetan . þu|þa|se cuman morgentorht 
 beacnian|beacn|beacen beorhtost ofer breomo sneowan , 
 halig of heolstre . heofoncandel blican|blac 
 ofer lagoflodas . he þær lidweardas , 
 þrymlice þri þegn|þegen gemetan , 
 modiglice mann , on|an merebate 
 sittan siðfrome , swilce hi|heo ofer sæ cuman . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon drihten self , dugeða wealdend , 
 ece ælmihtig , mid hit|his|he engel twegen . 
 wesan|seon|beon hi|heo on|an gescirplan scipferendum , 
 eorl onlice ealiðendum , 
 þonne|se hi|heo on|an flod fæðm ofer feorr|feor wegan|weg 
 on|an cald wæter ceolum lacað . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se gegretan , se þu|þe|ðe on|an greotan standan , 
 fus on|an faroðe , fægn reordade : 
 " hwanan cuman ge ceolum liðan , 
 macræftige mann , on|an mereþissan , 
 an ægflotan gewinnan|geblandan hwanan eagorstream 
 ofer yða gewealcan|gewealc eowic bringan|brengan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se ondswarode ælmihti god , 
 swa þæt|se nesan|neh|ne witan|wist , se þu|þe|ðe se word bidan , 
 hwæt#2 se mannian|mann wesan|seon|beon meðelhegendra , 
 þu|þe|se he þær on|an waroðe wiðþingode : 
 " we of marmedonia mægþ syndon 
 feorran|feorr|feor geferede . we|us mid flod bær|beran 
 on|an hranrad heahstefn nacian|naca , 
 snellic sæmearh , snude bewindan , 
 oðþæt we þissa leode|leoda|leod land|finna geseсan|gesecan , 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon bewrecene , swa we|us windan|wind fordrifan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se andreas eaðmod oncwæð : 
 " willan ic þu|þe|se biddan , þeah ic þu|þe|se beah|beagian|beag lutan , 
 sincweorðunga , syllan magan , 
 þæt|se þu we|us gebrohte brant ceole , 
 heah hornscipe , ofer hwæl eðel 
 on|an þære|se mægþ . bið þu|þe|ðe meorð wiþ|wið god , 
 þæt|se þu we|us on|an lad liðe weorðe . " 
 eft him|hi|he ondswarode æðelinga helm 
 of yðlide , engel scippend : 
 " nesan|neh|ne magan þær gewunian widferende , 
 nesan|neh|ne þær elþeodig eardes brucað , 
 agan|ac in þære|se ceaster cwealm þrowiað , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe feorran|feorr|feor þider feorh gelædan , 
 and þu wilnian nu ofer wid merian|mere 
 þæt|se þu on|an þu|þa|se fægðe þin feorh spillan|spildan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se andreas agef ondsware : 
 " usic lust hweteð on|an þu|þa|se leodmearc , 
 micel mod hyht , toh|to þære|se mære|mæran burh|burg , 
 þeon|þeodan leofesta , gif þu we|us þin willan 
 on|an merefaroðe milts gecyðan . " 
 him|hi|he ondswarode engel þeon|þeodan , 
 neregend firas , of naca stefn : 
 " we þu|þe|ðe estlice mid we|us willað 
 ferigan freolice ofer fisc bæð 
 efne|efnan|efen toh|to þæm|þam|se land|finna þær þu|þe|se lust myneð 
 toh|to gesecanne , siððan ge eowre 
 gafulrædenne agifan habbað , 
 sceatt gescrifene , swa ge|eowan|eow scipweardas , 
 arisan|ar ofer yðbord , unnan willað . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ofstlice andreas wiþ|wið , 
 wineþearfende , word mælan : 
 " nabban ic fæted gold nesan|neh|ne feohgestreon , 
 wela nesan|neh|ne witan|wist nesan|neh|ne wira gespannan , 
 land|finna nesan|neh|ne locenra beah|beagian|beag , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se mæge|mæg|magan lust ahwettan , 
 willan|willa in weorold , swa þu word becweþan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se beorn breogo , þær he on|an bolca sæt|sittan , 
 ofer waroða geweorpan wiðþingode : 
 " hu gewearð þu|þe|se se , wine|win leofesta , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu sæbeorgas sec woldes , 
 merestreama gemetan|gemet , maðmum bedælan , 
 ofer cald cleofu ceoles neosan gewinnan|geblandan 
 nabban þu|þe|se toh|to frofor on|an faroðstræte 
 hlaf witan|wist nesan|neh|ne hlutterne 
 drync toh|to dugoðe . wesan|seon|is se drohtað strang 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se lagolade lange|lang cunnian|cunnan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he andreas þurh|ðurh ondsware , 
 wis on|an gewitt , wordhord onlucan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne gedafenian þu|þe|se , nu þu|þe|se dryhten gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf 
 wela and witan|wist and woruldspede , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu ondsware mid oferhygdum , 
 sec sarcwide . sel bið æghwam 
 þæt|se he eaðmedum ellorfusne 
 oncnawan cuðlice , swa þæt|se crist bebeodan , 
 þeon|þeodan þrymfæst . we hit|his|he þegn|þegen synd 
 сeosan|geсeosan|gecoren|geceosan|ceosan toh|to cempa . he wesan|seon|is cyning on|an rihtan|riht , 
 wealdend and wyrhta wuldorþrymm , 
 on|an ece god eall gesceafta , 
 swa he ealle|eall|eal befehð an cræftan|cræft , 
 hefon and eorþ|eorðe , halig|halga|haleg miht , 
 sigorian|sigor selost . he þæt|ðæt|se self cweðan , 
 fæder folc gehwæs , and we|us feran hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 geond ginne grund gast streonan : 
 'farað nu geond ealle|eall|eal eorþ|eorðe sceat 
 emn swa wid swa wæter bebugeð , 
 oððe stedewangas stræte|stræt gelicgaþ . 
 bodiað æfter burh|burg beorht geleafa 
 ofer folde fæðm . ic ge|eowan|eow freoðo healdan|heald . 
 nesan|neh|ne ðurfan ge on|an þu|þa|se for|faran frætwe lædan , 
 gold nesan|neh|ne seolfor . ic ge|eowan|eow god gehwæs 
 on|an eower agen|agan don|dom est ahwette .' 
 nu þu seolfa miht sið userne 
 gehyran hygeþancol . ic sculan hraðe cunnan 
 hwæt#2 þu we|us toh|to duguðum gedon|gedo|don willan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ondswarode ece dryhten : 
 " gif ge syndon þegn|þegen se þu|þe|se þri ahebban 
 ofer middangeard , swa ge me|ic secgaþ , 
 and ge gehealdan þæt|se ge|eowan|eow se halig|halgian|halga|haleg beodan , 
 þonne|se ic ge|eowan|eow mid gefea ferian willan 
 ofer brimstreamas , swa ge bena wesan|seon . " 
 þu|þa|se in ceol stigan collenfyrhðe , 
 ellenrofe , æghwylcum wearð 
 on|an merefaroðe mod geblissian|blissian . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ofer yða geswing andreas onginnan 
 mereliðendum miltsian|milts biddan 
 wuldor aldor , and þus word cweðan : 
 " forgife þu|þe|se dryhten domweorðunga , 
 willan|willa in weorold and in wuldor blæd , 
 meotud manncynn , swa þu me|ic hafian|habban 
 on|an þes siðfæte sybbe gecyðed ! " 
 gesittan him|hi|he þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg helmwearde neah , 
 æðele be æðele . æfre ic nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 þon|se cymlicor ceol gehladenne 
 heahgestreonum . hæleð in sittan , 
 þeodnas þrymfulle , þegn|þegen wlitig . 
 þe|þa|ða|se reordian romana þeon|þeodan , 
 ece ælmihtig , hatan hit|his|he engel gan , 
 mære maguþegn , and mete|metan|met syllan , 
 frefran feasceaft ofer flod wylm , 
 þæt|se hi|heo þu|þe|se eaþ mihton ofer yða geþringan 
 drohtaþ adreogan . þu|þa|se gedrefan|drefan wearð , 
 onhreran hwælmere . hornfisc plegian|plegan , 
 glidan geond garsecg , and se græg mæw 
 wælgifre windan|wand . wedercandel sweorcan , 
 wind weaxan , wægas grindan , 
 stream styrian , streng georran , 
 wædo gewætte . wæteregsa standan 
 þreatian þryðum . þegn|þegen wurdon|weorþan 
 acolmode . ænig nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan 
 þæt|se he lifgende land|finna begete , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se mid andreas on|an eagorstream 
 ceol geseсan|gesecan . næs|nesan him|hi|he cuð þu|þa|se git 
 hwæt|hwa þæm|þam|se sæflotan sund wisian . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg on|an holmwege 
 ofer argeblond , andreas þu|þa|se git|gietan , 
 þegn þeodenhold , þanc gesægde , 
 rice ræsboran , þu|þa|se he reordian wesan|seon|beon : 
 " þu|þe|ðe þissa swæsenda soþfæst meotud , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma , lean forgilde , 
 weoruda waldend , and þu|þe|se wist gifu|gifan , 
 heofonliс hlaf , swa þu hyldo wiþ|wið me|ic 
 ofer firigendstream freogan|freod gecyðdest ! 
 nu synt geþreade þegn|þegen min , 
 geong|gangan guðrincas . garsecg hlymmeð , 
 geofon geotan . grund wesan|seon|is onhreran , 
 deop gedrefan|drefan , duguð wesan|seon|is geswenced , 
 modig mægen|magan micel gebysgod . " 
 him|hi|he of helma oncwæð hæleða scyppend : 
 " lætan|læt|lædan nu geferian flota userne , 
 lid toh|to land|finna ofer lagufæsten , 
 and þonne|se gebidan beorn þin , 
 arisan|ar on|an eard , hwanne þu eft cyme . " 
 edre him|hi|he þu|þa|se eorl agefan ondsware , 
 þegn|þegen þrohthearde , þafigan nesan|neh|ne willan 
 þæt|ðæt|se hi|heo forlætan æt|etan lides stefnan 
 leof lareow and him|hi|he land|finna сeosan|ceosan : 
 " hwider hweorfað we hlafordleas , 
 geomormode , god orfeorme , 
 synn wund|windan , gif we swician þu|þe|se gewinnan|geblandan 
 we bioð laðe on|an land|finna gehwa , 
 folc fracoðe , þonne|se firas birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 ellenrofe , æht besittan , 
 hwylc|hwilc hira|hi selost simble gelæstan 
 hlaford æt|etan hild , þonne|se hand and rond 
 on|an beaduwange bil forgrunden 
 æt|etan niðplegan nearu|nearo þrowedon . " 
 þu|þa|se reordade romana þeon|þeodan , 
 wærfæst cining , word stunde ahebban : 
 " gif þu þegn wesan|seon|nesan þrymsittendes , 
 wuldorcyning , swa þu word becweþan , 
 recan þu|þa|se gerynu|geryne , hu he reordberend 
 læran under lyft . lang wesan|seon|is þes siþfæt 
 ofer fealuwne flod ; frefra þin 
 mæcgas on|an mod . micel wesan|seon|is nu gena 
 lad ofer lagustream , land|finna swiðe|swiðan feorran|feorr|feor 
 toh|to gesecanne . sund wesan|seon|is geblonden , 
 grund wiþ|wið greotan . god eaðe mæg|magan 
 heaðoliðendum helpan gefremman . " 
 onginnan þu|þa|se gleawlice gingra sinnan|sin , 
 wuldorspedig wer word trymman : 
 " ge þæt|se gehogodon , þu|þa|se ge on|an holm stigan , 
 þæt|se ge on|an faru|fah folc feorh gelædan , 
 and for|faran dryhten lufu|lufe deað þrowian , 
 on|an ælmyrcna eðelrice 
 sawol|sawel gesellan . ic þæt|se self witan , 
 þæt|se we|us gescyldeð scyppend engel , 
 weoruda dryhten . wæteregesa sculan , 
 geðyd and geðreatod þurh þryðcining , 
 lah|lagu lacan , liðra wyrðan . 
 swa gesælan iu , þæt|se we on|an sæbat 
 ofer waruðgewinn wæda cunnedan , 
 faroðridende . frecne|frecen|frec þynсan|þyncan 
 egle|eglan ealada . eagorstreamas 
 beatan bordstæðu , brim oft oncwæð , 
 yð oðerre . hwilum|hwil upp astandan 
 of brim bosm on|an bat fæðm 
 egesian|egesa ofer yðlid . ælmihtig þær , 
 meotud mancynn , on|an mereþyssan 
 beorht basnian . beorn wurdon|weorþan 
 forht on|an mod , friðes wilnedon , 
 miltsian|milts toh|to mære . þu|þa|se seon|seo|se menigo onginnan 
 clypian on|an ceole , cyning sona arisan|ar , 
 engel eadgifa , yðum stillan , 
 wæter wælmum . wind þreade , 
 sæ sessade , smylte wurdon|weorþan 
 merestreama gemeotu . þe|þa|ða|se ure|ur mod ahliehhan|ahlehhan 
 siððan we gesegon under swegl|swegel gangan|gang 
 wind and wægas and wæterbrogan 
 forht gewordne for|faran frea egesa . 
 forðam ic ge|eowan|eow toh|to soð secgan willan , 
 þæt|se næfre forlæteð lifgende god 
 eorl on|an eorþ|eorðe , gif hit|his|he ellen dugan|deah . " 
 swa hleoðrode halig cempa , 
 ðeawum geþancul . þegn|þegen læran 
 eadig oreta , eorl trymman , 
 oððæt hi|heo semninga slæpan ofergan , 
 meðe be micel . merian|mere sweoðerade , 
 yða ongin eft oncyrde , 
 hreoh holmþracu . þu|þa|se þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg wearð 
 æfter gryrehwile gast geblissian|blissian . 
 onginnan þe|þa|ða|se reordigan ræde|ræd snottor , 
 wis on|an gewitt , wordlocan onspannan : 
 " næfre ic sælidan god metan , 
 macræftigran , se þu|þe|ðe me|ic þynceð , 
 rowend rofran , rædsnotterran , 
 word wisran . ic willan þu|þe|se , 
 eorl unforcuð , an nu gena 
 ben biddan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic þu|þe|se beah|beagian|beag lutan , 
 sincweorðunga , syllan miht|meaht|magan , 
 fætedsinces . willan ic freondscipe , 
 þeon|þeodan þrymfæst , þinne|þin , gif ic magan , 
 begitan god . se þu gifu|gifan hleotest , 
 halig hyht on|an heofonþrymme , 
 gif þu lidwerigum larna þinne|þin 
 est wyrðest . willan ic an toh|to þu|þe|ðe , 
 cynerof hæleð , cræft neosan , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu me|ic getæhte , nu þu|þe|se tir cyning 
 and miht forgifan , mannian|mann scyppend , 
 hu þu wægflotan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon besteman , 
 sæhengeste , sund wisian . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon on|an gifeðe iu and nu þu|þa|se 
 syxtyne siðum on|an sæbat , 
 merian|mere hrerendum mund freorig , 
 eagorstreamas , ( wesan|seon|is þes an micel ) , 
 swa ic æfre nesan|neh|ne geseon ænig mann , 
 þryðbearn hæleða , þu|þe|se geliс , 
 steore|steoran ofer stæfnan . streamwelm hwileð , 
 beateþ brimstæðo . wesan|seon|is þes bitan|bat ful scrid , 
 færeð famigheals , fugole gelicost 
 glideð on|an geofon . ic georne|geornan|georn witan 
 þæt|se ic æfre nesan|neh|ne geseon ofer yðlade 
 on|an sæleodan syllicran cræftan|cræft . 
 wesan|seon|is þon|se geliccost swa he on|an landsceare 
 stille|stillan standan|stand , þær he storm nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , 
 windan|wind awecgan , nesan|neh|ne wæterflod 
 brecan brondstæfne , hwæðere on|an brim snoweð 
 snel under segl . þu wesan|seon seolfa geong|gangan , 
 wigendra hleo , nalas winter frod , 
 hafian|habban þu|þe|se on|an fyrhðe , faroðlacende , 
 eorles ondsware . æghwylces cunnan 
 word for|faran weorold wislic andgit . " 
 him|hi|he ondswarode ece dryhten : 
 " oft þæt|se gesæleð , þæt|se we on|an sælade , 
 scip under scealcum , þonne|se sceor cymeð , 
 brecað ofer bæðweg , brimhengestum . 
 hwilum|hwil we|us on|an yðum earfoþlice|earfoðlice 
 gesæleð on|an sæwe , þeah we sið nesan , 
 frecne|frecen|frec gefere|gefera . flodwylm nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 mannian|mann ænig ofer meotudes est 
 lungre gelettan : agan|ac him|hi|he lifes|lif geweald , 
 se þu|þe|ðe brim bindeð , brun yða 
 ðyð and þreatað . he þeod sculan 
 racian mid rihte|rihtan|riht , se þu|þe|ðe rodor ahebban 
 and gefæstnian folm sin , 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan and wreðede , wuldras fyllan|fyld|fylan 
 beorht boldwelan , swa bledsian wearð 
 engel eðel þurh hit|his|he an miht . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is gesyne , soð orgete , 
 cuð oncnawen , þæt|se þu cyning wesan|seon 
 þicgan|þegen|geþicgan þeon|geþingan|geþeon , þrymsittendes , 
 forðam þu|þe|se sona sæholm oncnawan , 
 garsecges begangan|begang , þæt|se þu gifu|gifan hæfdes 
 halig gast . hærn eft onwand , 
 aryða geblond . egesian|egesa gestillan , 
 widfæðme wegan . wædu swæðorodon 
 seoðþan hi|heo ongeton þæt|se þu|þe|ðe god habban 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon bewindan , se þu|þe|ðe wuldor blæd 
 gestaðolade strang miht . " 
 þu|þa|se hleoðrade halig|halga|haleg stefn 
 cempa collenferhð , cyning wyrðude , 
 wuldor waldend , and þus word cweðan : 
 " wesan þu bledsian , breogo|brego mancynn , 
 dryhten hælend ! wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þu|þin don|dom lyfað ! 
 ge neh ge feor wesan|seon|is þu|þin nama halig , 
 wuldor gewlitegad ofer werþeoda , 
 milts mærsian|gemærsian . nænig mannian|mann wesan|seon|is 
 under heofonhwealfe , hæleða cynn|cyn , 
 ðætte areccan mæg|magan oððe riman|rim wite|witan 
 hu ðrymlice , þeod baldor , 
 gast geocend , þin gifu|gifan dælan . 
 huru wesan|seon|is gesyne , sawol|sawlian|sawel nergend , 
 þæt|se þu þes hysse hold geweorþan 
 and he geong geofum wyrðodest , 
 wis on|an gewitt and wordcwidum . 
 ic æt|etan efenealdum æfre nesan|neh|ne metan 
 on|an modsefa micel|mare|mara snytro . " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se of ceole oncwæð cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 frægn|frignan|fregnan fromlice fruma and ende : 
 " secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan , þances gleaw þegn , gif þu cunnan , 
 hu þæt|ðæt|se geweorþan be wer tweonum , 
 þæt|se þe|þa|ða|se arleas inwidþancum , 
 iudea cynn wiþ|wið god bearn 
 ahebban hearmcwide . hæleð unsælig 
 no þær gelyfan|gelifan in hira|hi liffruman , 
 grome gealgmode , þæt|se he god wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he wundrian|wundor|wund feala weorodum gecyðde , 
 sweotulra and gesynra . synnig nesan|neh|ne mihton 
 oncnawan þæt|se cynebearn , se þu|þe|ðe acennan wearð 
 toh|to hleo and toh|to hroðre hæleða cynn , 
 eall|eal eorðwarum . æþeling weaxan 
 word and wisdom , agan|ac he þær|se wundrian|wundor|wund wifcynn|hosp|flet|a , 
 domagende , dælan|dæl nænig 
 frætre þeon|þeodan|þeod beforan cyðde . " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se andreas agef andswaru : 
 " hu miht|meaht|magan þæt|se gewyrðan in werþeode , 
 þæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne gehyrdan|gehyran hælend miht , 
 guma leofost , hu he hit|his|he gif cyðde 
 geond weorold wid , wealdende birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gewinnan|geblandan 
 sellan he dumb gesprecan , deaf gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 healt and hreofum hyсgan|hyg|hycgan blissian , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|se limseoce lange|lang wesan|seon|beon , 
 werig|werian , wanhale , wite|wita gebindan , 
 æfter burhstedum blind gesegon . 
 swa he on|an grundwæge guma cynn|cyn 
 manig|manian missenlice mann of deaðe 
 word awehte . swilce he eacan|eac wundrian|wundor|wund feala 
 cynerof cyðde þurh hit|his|he cræft miht . 
 he gehalgian for|faran heremægene 
 win of wæter and wendan hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 beorn toh|to bliss|blis , on|an þu|þa|se betera gecynd . 
 swilce he afedde of fixum twegen 
 and of fif hlaf firas cynn|cyn 
 fif ðusendo . feþa sittan , 
 reonigmode , restan gefegon , 
 werig|werian æfter waðe , witan|wist þicgan , 
 mann on|an molde , swa him|hi|he gemedost wesan|seon|beon . 
 nu þu miht gehyran , hyse leofesta , 
 hu we|us wuldor weard word and dæd 
 lufian in lif , and þurh lar spannan 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se fæger gefea , þær freoh|freogan|freo motan , 
 eadig mid engel , eard weardigan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe æfter deaðe dryhten secað . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se gen weg weard wordhord onlucan , 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan ofer bolca , beald reordade : 
 " miht þu me|ic gesecgan , þæt|se ic soð wite|witan , 
 hwæðer wealdend þu|þin wundor on|an eorþ|eorðe , 
 þu|þa|se he gefremian nalas feam siðum , 
 folc toh|to frofor beforan cyðde , 
 þær bisceop and boh|bocere 
 and ealdormann æht besittan , 
 mæðelhægende gewinnan|geblandan me|ic þæt|se þinceð , 
 þæt|ðæt|se hi|heo for|faran æfstum inwit syredon 
 þurh deop gedwola|gedwol . deofol lar 
 hæleð hynfuse hyrdan|hyran toh|to georne|geornan|georn , 
 wrað wærloga . hi|heo seon|seo|se wyrdan|wyrd beswican , 
 forleolc and forlæran . nu hi|heo lungre sceolon , 
 werig|werian mid werig , wræc|wrecan þrowian , 
 biter bryne on|an bana fæðme . " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se andreas agef ondsware : 
 " secg ic þu|þe|ðe toh|to soð þæt|ðæt|se he swiðe|swiðan oft 
 beforan fremman|fremede folc ræswa|ræs 
 wundor æfter wundor|wund on|an wer gesiehðe , 
 swilce deogollice dryhten guma 
 folcræd fremman|fremede , swa he toh|to friðe hycgan . " 
 him|hi|he ondswarode æðelinga helm : 
 " miht þu , wis hæleð , word gesecgan , 
 mæg|mecgan|magian|maga mod rof , mægen|magan þu|þa|se he cyðde , 
 deormod on|an digol , þe|þa|ða|se mid dryhten oft , 
 rodera rædend , run besittan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se andreas ondsware agef : 
 " hwæt#2 frinan þu me|ic , frea leofesta , 
 word wrætlicum , and þu|þe|se wyrd gehwære 
 þurh snyttra cræftan|cræft soð oncnawest gewinnan|geblandan " 
 þe|þa|ða|se git|gietan him|hi|he wæges weard wiðþingode : 
 " nesan|neh|ne frinan ic þu|þe|ðe for|faran tælan nesan|neh|ne þurh|ðurh teoncwide 
 on|an hranrad , acan|ac min|ic hige blissað , 
 wynn wridað , þurh þin wordlæðe , 
 æðele eсe . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|eoh ic ana|an þæt|ðæt|se , 
 acan|ac mannian|mann gehwa mod bið on|an hyht , 
 fyrhð afrefred , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se feor oððe neah 
 on|an mod gemunan hu se mæg|mecgan|magian|maga fremman|fremede , 
 godbearn on|an grund . gast hweorfon , 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan siðfrome swegl|swegel dream , 
 engel eðel þurh þu|þa|se æðele miht . " 
 edre him|hi|he andreas agef ondsware : 
 " nu ic on|an þu|þe|se self soð oncnawan , 
 wisdom gewitan , wundorcræfte 
 sigesped sellan|gesellan|geseald , ( snyttrum bloweð , 
 beorht bliss|blis , breost innanweard ) , 
 nu ic þu|þe|se self secgan willan 
 oor and ende , swa ic se æðelinges 
 word and wisdom on|an wer gemote 
 þurh hit|his|he sylfes muð simble gehyrdan|gehyran . 
 oft gesamnian side|sid herigeas , 
 folc unmæte , toh|to frea dom , 
 þær hi|heo hyrcnodon halig lar . 
 þonne eft gewitan æðelinga helm , 
 beorht blædgifa , in bold oðer , 
 þær him|hi|he togenes , god herigende , 
 toh|to ðam|se meðelstede manig|manian cuman , 
 snottre selerædend . simble gefegon , 
 beorn bliðheorte , burhweardes cyme . 
 swa gesælan iu þæt|se se sigedema 
 feran , frea mihtig . næs|nesan þær folc micel 
 on|an siðfate , sin leode|leoda|leod , 
 nemnan ellefne orettmæcgas , 
 geteled tireadige . he wesan|seon|beon twelfta self . 
 þu|þa|se we becuman toh|to þæm|þam|se cynestole , 
 þær getimbran wesan|seon|beon templ|tempel dryhten , 
 heah and horngeap , hæleðum gefrege , 
 wuldor gewlitegod . huscworde onginnan 
 þurh inwitðanc ealdorsacerd 
 herme hyspan , hordlocan onspannan , 
 wroht webbade . he on|an gewitt oncnawan 
 þæt|se we soðfæstes swaðe folgian , 
 læstan larcwide . he lungre ahebban 
 woðe wiðerhydig wea onblonden : 
 'hwæt , ge syndon earm ofer ealle|eall|eal mann ! 
 wadað widlastas , weornan geferað 
 earfoðsiða , ellþeodiges nu 
 butan leodriht lar hyrað , 
 eadig orhlytte æðeling cyðað , 
 secgað soþlice|soðlice þæt|se mid sunu meotudes 
 drohtigen dæghwæmlice . þæt|se wesan|seon|is duguðum cuð 
 hwanan þæm|þam|se ordfruman æðele onwæcnan|onwacan . 
 he wesan|seon|beon afeded on|an þes folcsceare , 
 cildgeong acennan mid hit|his|he cneomagum . 
 þus syndon hatan hamsittende , 
 fæder and modur , se we gefrægen habbað 
 þurh modgemynd , maria and ioseph . 
 syndon him|hi|he on|an æðele oðere twegen 
 beorn geboren|geberan , broðorsybbum , 
 sunu iosephes , simon and iacob .' 
 swa hleoðrodon hæleða ræswan|ræswa , 
 dugoð domgeorne , dyrne þenсean|þenсan|þencan 
 meotudes miht|meaht|magan . munan|mann|man eft gehweorfan , 
 yfel endeleas , þær hit ær arisan|ar . 
 þu|þa|se se þeon|þeodan gewitan þegnian|þegn|þegen heap 
 fram þæm|þam|se meðelstede miht swiðan , 
 dugeða dryhten , sec digol land|finna . 
 he þurh wundrian|wundor|wund feala on|an þæm|þam|se westen|westan 
 cræft gecyðde þæt|se he wesan|seon|beon cyning on|an rihtan|riht 
 ofer middangeard , mægene swiðan , 
 waldend and wyrhta wuldorþrymm , 
 on|an ece god eall gesceafta . 
 swilce he oðerra unrim cyðde 
 wundorworca on|an wer gesiht . 
 siððan eft gewitan oðer siþ 
 getrume mycle , þæt|se he in templ|tempel gestandan , 
 wuldor aldor . wordhleoðor astag 
 geond heahræced . halig lar 
 synnig nesan|neh|ne swelgan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he soð swa feala 
 tacnian|tacn|tacen gecyðde , þær hi|heo toh|to segon . 
 swilce he wrætlice wundor agræfene , 
 anlicnes engel sin 
 geseh , sigorian|sigor frea , on|an sele|sel wegan|wag , 
 on|an twegen|twa healf torht gefrætwed , 
 wlitig gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . he word cweðan : 
 'ðis wesan|seon|is anlicnes engelcynna 
 se bremestan þu|þe|se mid þæm|þam|se burhware 
 in þære|se ceaster wesan|seon|is . cheruphim etan|et seraphim 
 þu|þa|se on|an swegeldreamum syndon nemnan . 
 for|faran onsyne ecan dryhten 
 standað stiðferðe , stefn herigað , 
 halig|halga|haleg hleoðrum , heofoncyninges þri , 
 meotudes mundbyrd . heran|her amearcian wesan|seon|is 
 halig hiw , þurh handmægen 
 awriten|awritan on|an weallan|weall wuldor þegn|þegen .' 
 þu|þa|se gen word cweðan weoruda dryhten , 
 heofonhalig gast , for|faran þæm|þam|se heremægene : 
 'nu ic bebeodan beacen ætywan , 
 wundor geweorðan on|an wer gemange , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þes|þeoh|se onlicnes eorþ|eorðe sec , 
 wlitig of wegan|wag , and word sprecan , 
 secg soðcwidum , ( þywan|þy|þe|se sceolon gelyfan 
 eorl on|an cyþ ) , hwæt#2 min|ic æðele wesan|sien|seon|nesan .' 
 nesan|neh|ne durran þu|þa|se forhylman hælend bebod 
 wundor for|faran weorodum , acan|ac of weallan|weall ahleop , 
 frod fyrngeweorc , þæt|se he on|an folde standan , 
 stan fram stane|stan . stefn æfter cuman , 
 hlud þurh heard , hleoðor dynnan|dynian , 
 word wemman|weman . wrætlic þynсan|þyncan 
 stiðhycgendum stan ongin . 
 sepan sacerd sweotol tacn|tacen , 
 witig werian|weorod and word cweðan : 
 'ge synd unlæd , earm geþohta 
 searowum beswicene , oððe sel nytan , 
 mod gemyrde . ge mann|man cigað 
 god ece birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , se þu|þe|se grund and sund , 
 heofon and eorþ|eorðe and hreo wægas , 
 salte sæstreamas and swegl uppe 
 amearcian mund sin . 
 þes wesan|seon|is se ilca ealwalda god 
 se on|an fyrndagum fæder cuðon . 
 he abrahame and isace 
 and iocobe gifu|gifan bryttode , 
 wela weorðode , word sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 ærest|ær habrahame æðele geþingu , 
 þæt|se of hit|his|he cynn cennan sculan 
 weorðan wuldor god . wesan|seon|is seon|seo|se wyrdan|wyrd mid ge|eowan|eow 
 open , orgete , magan|maga eage nu 
 geseon sigor god , swegl|swegel agend .' 
 æfter þes word weorud hlosnian 
 geond þæt|se side|sid sel , ( swigian ealle|eall|eal ) , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þe|þa|ða|se yldestan eft onginnan 
 secgan synfull|synful , ( soð nesan|neh|ne oncneowan ) , 
 þæt|se hit drycræft gedon|gedo|don wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 scingelacum , þæt|se se scyna stan 
 mælan for|faran mann . munan|mann|man wridode 
 geond beorn breost , brandhata nið 
 weallan on|an gewitt , weorm blæd fag , 
 ator ælfæle . þær orcnawe wearð 
 þurh teoncwide tweogan mod , 
 mæcga misgehygd morðre bewindan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se þeon|þeodan bebeodan þryðweorc faran , 
 stan on|an stræte|stræt of stedewange , 
 and forþ|forð gan foldweg tredan , 
 grene grund , god ærende 
 lar lædan on|an þu|þa|se leodmearc 
 toh|to channaneum , cyning word 
 beodan habrahame mid hit|his|he eafora twæman|twegen 
 of eorðscræfe ærest|ær fremman , 
 lætan landrest , leoðo gadrigean , 
 gast onfon and geogoðhade , 
 edniwinga andweard cuman|cuma , 
 frod fyrnweotan , folc gecyðan , 
 hwilc hi|heo god miht ongiten habban . 
 gewitan he þu|þa|se feran , swa him|hi|he frea mihtig , 
 scyppend wer , gescrifen habban , 
 ofer mearcpaðu , þæt|se he on|an mambre becuman 
 beorht blican , swa him|hi|he bebeodan meotud , 
 þær þu|þa|se lichoman lange|lang þrage , 
 heahfæder hra , beheled wesan|seon|beon . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se ofstlice up astandan 
 habraham and isaac , æðeling þridda 
 iacob of greotan toh|to god geþingan|geþing , 
 sneome of slæpan|slæp þæm|se fæstan|fæst . hettan|het|hedan|hatan hi|heo toh|to þæm|þam|se siþ gyrwan , 
 faran toh|to frea dom . sculan hi|heo þæm|þam|se folc gecyðan 
 hwæt|hwa æt|etan frumsceafte furðum teon 
 eorþ|eorðe eallgrene and upheofon , 
 hwær se wealdend wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þu|þe|se þæt|se weorc staðolade . 
 nesan|neh|ne durran þu|þa|se gelettan lengan|leng|lange owihte 
 wuldorcyning word . geweotan þe|þa|ða|se þe|þa|ða|se witigan þri 
 modig mearcland tredan . forlætan moldern wunigean 
 open eorðscræfu , willan hi|heo ædre gecyðan 
 frumweorca fæder . þu|þa|se þæt|se folc gewearð 
 egesa geaclod , þær þu|þa|se æðelingas 
 word weorðodon wuldor aldor . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se ricene hettan|het|hedan|hatan rices hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 toh|to eadwelan oþer|oðer siþ 
 sec mid sybbe swegl|swegel dream , 
 and se toh|to wid feorh willum neotan . 
 nu þu miht gehyran , hyse leofesta , 
 hu he wundrian|wundor|wund worn word cyðde , 
 swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah nesan|neh|ne gelyfan|gelifan lar sin 
 modblinde mann . ic witan manig nu git 
 micel mære|mæran spell þu|þe|ðe se mæg|mecgan|magian|maga fremman|fremede , 
 rodera rædend , þe|þa|ða|se þu aræfnan nesan|neh|ne miht , 
 hreðre behabban , hygeþances gleaw . " 
 þus andreas ondlangne dæg 
 herian hleoðorcwidum halig lar , 
 oððæt he semninga slæpan ofergan 
 on|an hronrade heofoncyninge neh . 
 þe|þa|ða|se gelædan hettan|het|hedan|hatan lifes|lif brytta 
 ofer yða geþræc engel sinnan|sin , 
 fæðmum ferigean on|an fæder wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 leof mid lissum ofer lagufæsten , 
 oððæt sæwerige slæpan ofergan . 
 þurh lyftgelac on|an land|finna becuman 
 toh|to þære|se ceaster þu|þe|se him|hi|he cining engel 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þa|se arisan|ar siðigean , 
 eadig on|an upweg , eðles neosan . 
 lætan se halig|halga|haleg be herestræte 
 swefan on|an sybbe under swegl|swegel hleo , 
 bliðne bidan burhwealle neh , 
 hit|his|he niðhetum , nihtlangne fyrst , 
 oðþæt dryhten forlætan dægcandelle 
 scir scinan . sceadu sweðerodon , 
 winnan under wolcn|wolcen . þu|þa|se cuman wederes blæst , 
 hador heofonleoma , ofer hof blican . 
 onwæcnan|onwacan þu|þa|se wig heard , ( wang sceawian ) , 
 for|faran burggeatum . beorg steap , 
 hleoðu hlifian , ymbe|ymb har stan 
 tigelfagan trafu , torr standan , 
 windig weall . þu|þa|se se wisian|wis oncnawan 
 þæt|se he marmedonia mægþ habban 
 siþ geseсan|gesecan , swa him|hi|he self bebeodan , 
 þu|þa|se he him|hi|he for|faran gescraf , fæder mancynn . 
 geseh he þu|þa|se on|an greotan gingra sinnan|sin , 
 beorn beadurofe , biryhte him|hi|he 
 swefan on|an slæpan|slæp . he sona onginnan 
 wigend weccean , and word cweðan : 
 " ic ge|eowan|eow secgan mæg|magan soð orgete , 
 þæt|se we|us gystrandæge on|an geofon stream 
 ofer arwelan æðeling ferian . 
 in þæm|þam|se ceole wesan|seon|beon cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 waldend werðeode . ic hit|his|he word oncnawan , 
 þeah he hit|his|he mægwlite bemiðen habban . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se æðelingas ondsweorodon , 
 geong|gangan gencwidum , gastgerynum : 
 " we þu|þe|ðe , andreas , eaðe gecyðað 
 sið userne , þæt|se þu self miht 
 ongitan gleawlice gastgehygdum . 
 we|us sæwerige slæpan ofergan . 
 þu|þa|se cuman earn ofer yða wylm 
 faran on|an flyht , feðer hremig , 
 we|us ofslæpendum sawol|sawel abrugdon , 
 mid gefea ferian flyht on|an lyft , 
 brehtmum bliðe , beorht and liðe . 
 lissum lufian and in lof wunedon , 
 þær wesan|seon|beon singal singan|sang and swegl|swegel gong , 
 wlitig weoroda heap and wuldor þreotan . 
 utan ymbe|ymb æðele engel standan , 
 þegn|þegen ymb þeon|þeodan , þusendmælum , 
 herian|heredon on|an hehðo halig|halga|haleg stefn 
 dryhten dryhten . dream wesan|seon|beon on|an hyht . 
 we þær heahfæder halig oncnawan 
 and martyrian|martyr mægen|magan unlytel , 
 singan sigedryhtne soðfæstlic lof , 
 dugoð domgeorne . þær wesan|seon|beon dauid mid , 
 eadig oretta , essages sunu , 
 for|faran crist cuman , cining israhela . 
 swilce we gesegon for|faran sunu meotudes , 
 æðele eсe , eowic standan , 
 twelfe|twelf getellan , tireadige hæleð . 
 ge|eowan|eow þegnian þrymsittende , 
 halig heahenglas . ðam|se bið hæleða well|wel 
 þu|þe|se þær|se blissian|bliss brucan motan . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon wuldor wynn , wigendra þri , 
 æðelic onginnan , næs|nesan þær ænigum gewinnan|gewinn . 
 þæm|þam|se bið wræcsið witod , wite|witan geopenad , 
 þu|þe|se þær|se gefea sculan fremde weorðan , 
 hean|heah hwearfian , þonne|se heonan gangan . " 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon modsefa micel geblissian|blissian 
 halig on|an hreðre , siððan hleoðorcwide 
 gingra gehyrdan|gehyran , þæt|se hi|heo god willan 
 onmunan swa mycles ofer mann ealle|eall|eal , 
 and þæt|se word cweðan wigendra hleo : 
 " nu ic , god dryhten , ongiten habban 
 þæt|se þu on|an faroðstræte feor nesan|neh|ne wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 cyning wuldur , þu|þa|se ic on|an ceol gestigan , 
 ðeh ic on|an yðfare , engel þeon|þeodan , 
 gast geocend , ongitan nesan|neh|ne cuðe . 
 weorð me|ic nu milde , meotud ælmihtig , 
 bliðe , beorht cyning ! ic on|an brimstreame 
 sprecan word worn , witan æfter nu 
 hwæt|hwa me|ic wyrðmyndum on|an wudubate 
 ferian ofer flod . þæt|se wesan|seon|is frofor gast 
 hæleða cynn . þær wesan|seon|is helpan gearu , 
 milts æt|etan mære , mannian|mann gehwylc , 
 sigorsped sellan|gesellan|geseald , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se seceð toh|to him|hi|he . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he for|faran eage onsyne wearð 
 æðeling oðywed in þu|þa|se ilca tidan|tid , 
 cining cwicera gehwæs , þurh cniht had . 
 þu|þa|se he word cweðan , wuldor aldor : 
 " wesan þu , andreas , hal , mid þes willgedryht , 
 ferðgefeonde ! ic þu|þe|se friðe healdan|heald , 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se nesan|neh|ne motan mangeniðlan , 
 gram grynsmiðas , gast gesceððan . " 
 feallan þu|þa|se toh|to folde , frioðo wilnian 
 word wis hæleð , winedryhten frægn|frignan|fregnan : 
 " hu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan ic þæt|se , waldend firas , 
 synnig wiþ|wið seolfne , sawol|sawlian|sawel nergend , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|se swa god ongitan nesan|neh|ne magan 
 on|an wægfære , þær ic word gesprecan 
 min for|faran meotude micel þonne|se ic sculan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he andswarian ealwalda god : 
 " no þu swa swiðe|swiðan synn gefremedest 
 swa þu in achaia ondsæc dydan|don , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu on|an feorwegas feran nesan|neh|ne cuðe 
 nesan|neh|ne in þu|þa|se ceaster becuman magan , 
 þingan|þing gehegan þri nihtian|niht|neaht 
 fyrstgemearces , swa ic þu|þe|se feran hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 ofer weg gewinnan|gewinn . witan nu þu|þe|se gearwor 
 þæt|se ic eaðe mæg|magan an gehwylcne 
 fremman and fyrþran freond min 
 on|an land|finna gehwylc , þær me|ic leofost bið . 
 arisan nu hrædlice , rædan|ræd ædre ongit , 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan bledsian , swa þu|þe|se beorht fæder 
 geweorðað wuldorgifu toh|to wid ald , 
 cræftan|cræft and miht|meaht|magan . þu in þu|þa|se ceaster gong 
 under burglocan , þær þu|þin broðor wesan|seon|is . 
 witan ic matheus þurh mæne hand 
 hrinan heorudolgum , heafodmagan 
 searonettum besettan . þu he sec sculan , 
 leof alysan of laðra hettan|hatan , 
 and eal þæt|se mancynn þu|þe|se him|hi|he mid wunian , 
 elþeodig inwitwrasnum , 
 bealuwe gebindan . him|hi|he sculan bot hraðe 
 weorþan|weorþ in weorold and in wuldor lean , 
 swa ic him|hi|he self ær secgende wesan|seon|beon . 
 nu þu , andreas , sculan edre geneðan 
 in gram grippan|gripe|gripan . wesan|seon|is þu|þe|se guð weotod , 
 heard heoruswengum scel þu|þin hra dælan 
 wund weorðan , wættre geliccost 
 faran flod blod . hi|heo þu|þin feorh nesan|neh|ne magan 
 deaðe gedælan , þeah þu drype ðolie , 
 synnig slege . þu þæt|se sar aberan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu|þe|se ahweorfan hæðen þri , 
 grim gargewinn , þæt|se þu god swican , 
 dryhten þin . wesan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a dom geornan|georn ; 
 lætan|læt|lædan þu|þe|ðe on|an gemynd hu þæt|se manig wearð 
 firas gefrege geond feala land|finna , 
 þæt|se me|ic bysmredon bennum fæst 
 wer wansælig . word tyrgdon , 
 slean and swingan , synnig nesan|neh|ne mihton 
 þurh sarcwide soð gecyðan . 
 þu|þa|se ic mid iudeum gealga þehte , 
 ( rod wesan|seon|beon aræran ) , þær rinc sum|su 
 of minre|min side|sid swat ut forlætan , 
 dreor toh|to folde . ic adreogan feala 
 yrmþa ofer eorþ|eorðe . willan ic ge|eowan|eow on|an se 
 þurh bliðne hige bysen onstellan , 
 swa on|an ellþeode ywed wyrðeð . 
 manig|manian syndon in þes mære|mæran burh|burg 
 þær|se þu|þe|se þu gehweorfest toh|to heofonleohte 
 þurh min naman|nama , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi|heo morðres feala 
 in fyrndagum fremman habban . " 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg heofon sec , 
 eall cyning cining , se clæne ham , 
 eaðmedum upp , þær wesan|seon|is ar gelang 
 firas gehwylc , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hi|heo findan cunnan|cann . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon gemyndig modgeþyldig , 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan beaduwe heard , gan|eadan in burh hraðe , 
 anræd oretta , ellen gefyrðred , 
 mæg|mecgan|magian|maga mod rof , meotude getreowe , 
 stæppan|steppan on|an stræte|stræt , ( stigan|stig wisian ) , 
 swa him|hi|he nænig guma ongitan nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan , 
 synfull|synful geseon . habban sigorian|sigor weard 
 on|an þæm|þam|se wangstede wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon betolden 
 leof leodfruman mid lof sin . 
 habban þu|þa|se se æðeling in þringan|geþringan , 
 cristes cempa , carcern neh . 
 geseh he hæðen hloð ætgædere , 
 for|faran hlindura hyrdas standan , 
 seofone ætsomne . ealle|eall|eal swylt forniman , 
 dreosan domleas . deaðræs forfon 
 hæleð heorodreorige . þe|þa|ða|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg gebiddan 
 bilwytne fæder , breostgehygdum 
 herian on|an hehðo heofoncyninges þri , 
 god dryhtendom . duru sona onirnan 
 þurh handhrine halig gast , 
 and þær in gan|eadan , ellen gemyndig , 
 hæle|hælan|helan hildedeor . hæðen swefan , 
 dreor druncen , deaðwang reodan . 
 geseh he matheus in þæm|þam|se morðorcofan , 
 hæleð higerofne under heolstorlocan , 
 secgan dryhten lof , domweorðinga 
 engel ðeodne . he þær ana|an sæt|sittan 
 geohðum geomor in þæm|þam|se gnornhofe . 
 geseh þu|þa|se under swegl|swegel swæs gefere|gefera , 
 halig halig . hyht wesan|seon|beon geniwad . 
 arisan|ar þu|þa|se togenes , god þancade 
 se þu|þe|ðe hi|heo onsunde æfre motan 
 geseon under sunne|sunnan|sunna . syb wesan|seon|beon gemæne 
 begen þæm|þam|se gebroðrum , blis edniwe . 
 æghwæðer oðer earm beþehte , 
 cystan|cyssan hi|heo and clyppan . criste wesan|seon|beon begen 
 leof on|an mod . hi|heo sunnan|leoht ymbscan 
 halig and heofontorht . hreðor innan wesan|seon|beon 
 wynn awelled . þu|þa|se word onginnan 
 ærest|ær andreas æðele gefere|gefera 
 on|an clustorcleofan mid cwide sin 
 gretan godfyrhtne , sæd|secgan him|hi|he guðgeðingu , 
 feohtan faru|fah mann : " nu wesan|seon|is þes folc on|an lust , 
 hæleð hyder on|an 
 gewyrht eardes neosan . " 
 æfter þes word wuldor þegn|þegen , 
 begen þu|þa|se gebroðor , toh|to gebed hyldon , 
 sendan hira|hi ben for|faran birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god . 
 swilce se halig|halgian|halga|haleg in þæm|þam|se hearmlocan 
 hit|his|he god gretan and him|hi|he geoc bædan|biddan , 
 hælend helpan , ær þan|se hra crinсgan|cringan|crincgan 
 for|faran hæðen hildeþrymme , 
 and þu|þa|se gelædan of leoðobendum 
 fram þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan on|an frið dryhten 
 twegen and hundteontig|1000 geteled riman|rim , 
 swilce feowertig , 
 generian fram niðe , ( þær he nænig forlætan 
 under burglocan bennum fæst ) , 
 and þær wifian|wif þu|þa|se git , weorodes toh|to eacan|eaca , 
 an wanian|wana þu|þe|se fiftig 
 forht gefreoðode . fægen|fægan wesan|seon|beon siðes , 
 lungre leordan , nalas lengan|leng|lange bidan 
 in þæm|þam|se gnornhofe guðgeþingo . 
 gewitan þu|þa|se matheus menigo lædan 
 on|an gehyld god , swa him|hi|he se halig|halgian|halga|haleg bebeodan . 
 weorod on|an wilsið wolcn|wolcen beþehte , 
 þu|þe|se læs|lesan him|hi|he scyldhatan scyððan cuman 
 mid earhfare , ealdgeniðlan . 
 þær þu|þa|se modig mid him|hi|he mæðel gehedan , 
 treowgeþoftan , ær hi|heo on|an twegen hweorfan . 
 æghwæðer þær|se eorl oðer trymman 
 heofonrices hyht , hell|hel wite 
 word werian|weorod . swa þe|þa|ða|se wigend mid him|hi|he , 
 hæleð higerofe , halig|halga|haleg stefn 
 cempa cost cyning weorðadon , 
 wyrd waldend , se wuldor nesan|neh|ne bið 
 æfre mid eldum ende befon . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se andreas inn on|an ceaster 
 glædmod gangan , toh|to se þu|þe|ðe he gram gemot , 
 faru|fah folcmægen , gefrægen habban , 
 oððæt he gemetan be mearcpaðe 
 standan stræte|stræt neah stapul ærenne . 
 gesittan him|hi|he þu|þa|se be healf , habban hluttre lufu|lufe , 
 ece upgemynd engel bliss|blis ; 
 þanan basnian under burhlocan 
 hwæt#2 him|hi|he guðweorca gifeðe weorþan . 
 þu|þa|se gesamnedon side|sid herigeas , 
 folc frumgaras . toh|to þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan 
 wærleasra werod wæpn|wæpen cuman , 
 hæðne hildfrecan , toh|to se þu|þa|se hæftas ær 
 under hlinscuwan hearm þrowedon . 
 wendan and willan wiðerhycgende 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an elþeodig æt|etan gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 weotude witan|wist . him|hi|he seon|seo|se wenan|wen gelah , 
 siððan mid corðre carcern duru 
 eorre æscberend open findan , 
 onhliden hamera geweorc , hyrdas dead . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se unhyðige eft gecyrdon , 
 lust belorene , laðspell beran|bera , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan þæm|þam|se folc þæt|se þær feorrcundra , 
 ellreordigra , ænig toh|to laf 
 in carcern cwic nesan|neh|ne gemetan , 
 agan|ac þær heorodreorige hyrdas lah , 
 gæsne on|an greotan , gast berofene , 
 fæger|fæge flæschaman . þu|þa|se wearð forht manig 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se færspelle folc ræswian|ræswa|ræs , 
 hean|heah , hygegeomor , hungor on|an wena|wen , 
 blat beodgastes . nytan betera rædan|ræd , 
 þonne|se hi|heo þu|þa|se belidenan him|hi|he toh|to lifnere 
 dead gefeormedon . duruþegnum wearð 
 in an tidan|tid eall|eal ætsomne 
 þurh heard gelacan hildbedd styrian . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic lungre gefrignan leode|leodan|leod tosamne 
 burgwaru bannan . beorn cuman , 
 wiggendra þreotan , wicgum gengan|genga , 
 on|an mearh modig , mæðelhegende , 
 æsc dealle . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eall|eal geador 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se þingstede þeodan|þeod samnian|gesamnian . 
 lætan him|hi|he þu|þa|se betweonum taan wisian 
 hwilc hira|hi ærest|ær oðer sculan 
 toh|to foddurþege feorh ongyldan ; 
 hleotan hellcræftum , hæðengildum 
 teledon betwinum . þe|þa|ða|se se tan|ta gehweorfan 
 efne|efnan|efen ofer an ealdgesiða , 
 se wesan|seon|beon uðweota eorl dugoðe , 
 here on|an ore . hraðe siððan wearð 
 fetorwrasnum fæstan|fæst , feorh orwena . 
 cleopian þu|þa|se collenferhð cearegan rædan|reord , 
 cweðan he hit|his|he sylfes sunu syllan willan 
 on|an æhtgeweald , eafora geong , 
 lifes|lif toh|to lisse . hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se lacan|lac hraðe 
 þicgan toh|to þance . þeodan|þeod wesan|seon|beon oflysted , 
 mete|met modgeomre , næs|nesan him|hi|he toh|to maðme wynn , 
 hyht toh|to hordgestreonum . hungor wesan|seon|beon 
 þearle þreatian , swa se ðeodsceaða 
 rowan ricsian . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon rinc manig , 
 guðfrec guma , ymb se geonga|geong feorh 
 breost onbryrded . toh|to þæm|þam|se beadulace 
 wesan|seon|beon þæt|se weatacen wid gefrege , 
 geond þu|þa|se burh bodad beornan|beorn manig , 
 þæt|se hi|heo se cniht cwealm corðre geseсan|gesecan , 
 duguðe and eogoðe , dælan|dæl onfon 
 lifes|lif toh|to leof . hi|heo lungre toh|to se , 
 hæðen herigweardas , herian|here|heran samnodan 
 ceastrewarena . cyrm upp astigan 
 þe|þa|ða|se se geonga|geong onginnan geomor stefn , 
 hæftan for|faran herian|here , hearmleoð galan|gal , 
 freond feasceaft , friðes wilnian . 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan earmsceapen are|ar findan , 
 freoðe æt|etan þæm|þam|se folc , þu|þe|se him|hi|he feorh willan , 
 ealdor geunnan . habban æglæcan 
 sæcce geseсan|gesecan . sculan sweord ecg , 
 scerp and scurheard , of sceaþa folm , 
 fyrmælum fag , feorh acsigan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se andrea earmlic þynсan|þyncan , 
 þeodbealo þearlic toh|to geðolianne , 
 þæt|se he swa unscyldig ealdor|eald sculan 
 lungre linnan|linen . wesan|seon|beon se leodhete 
 þrist and þrohtheard . þrymman sceocan , 
 modig maguþegnas , morðres on|an lust , 
 willan æninga , ellenrofe , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se hysebeorðre heafola gescenan , 
 gar agetan . he god forstandan , 
 halig of hehðo , hæðenum folc . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan wæpen wer wexe gelicost 
 on|an þæm|þam|se orlege eall|eal formeltan , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan scyldhatan sceððan mihton , 
 egle|eglan ondsacan , ecga þryðum . 
 swa wearð alysan of leodhete , 
 geong|gangan of gyrne . god eall|eal þanc , 
 dryhten dryhten , se þu|þe|ðe he don|dom gifeð 
 guma gehwylc , þær|se þu|þe|se geoc toh|to him|hi|he 
 seceð mid snytrum . þær bið simble gearu 
 freogan|freod unhwilen , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hi|heo findan cunnan|cann . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon wop hæfen in wer burh|burg , 
 hlud here cyrm . hropan fricca , 
 mænan meteleaste , meðe standan , 
 hungor gehæfte . hornsalu wunedon , 
 weste|westan winræced , wela nesan|neh|ne benohton 
 beorn toh|to brucanne on|an þu|þa|se bitter|bitor|biter tidan|tid , 
 gesittan searuþancle sundor toh|to run 
 ermðu eahtigan . næs|nesan him|hi|he toh|to eðle wynn . 
 fregnan þu|þa|se gelome|gelom frec oðer : 
 " nesan|neh|ne helan se þu|þe|ðe habban hold lar , 
 on|an sefa snytro ! nu wesan|seon|is sælan|sæl cuman , 
 þrea ormæte , wesan|seon|is nu þurfan|þearf micel 
 þæt|se we wisfæstra word hyran . " 
 þu|þa|se for|faran þære|se dugoðe deoful ætywan , 
 winnan|wann and wliteleas , habban werig hiw . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se meldigan morþor brytta , 
 hellehinca , se halig|halga|haleg wer 
 wiðerhycgende , and þæt|se word cweðan : 
 " heran|her wesan|seon|is ferian|feran ofer feorr|feor wegan|weg 
 æðelinga sum|su innan ceaster , 
 ellþeodigra , se ic andreas 
 nemnan heran . he ge|eowan|eow neon gesceod 
 þe|þa|ða|se he aferede of fæsten|fæstan 
 manncynn micel þonne|se gemetan|gemet wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 nu ge magan eaðe oncyðdæda 
 wrecan on|an gewyrhtum . lætað wæpn|wæpen spor 
 iren ecgheard , ealdorgeard sceoran , 
 fæge feorhhord . gað fromlice 
 þæt|se ge wiðerfeohtend wig gehnægan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se andreas agef ondsware : 
 " hwæt#2 , þu þristlice þeon|þeodan|þeod læran , 
 bældest toh|to beadowe ! wæþan|west þu|þe|se bæles cwealm , 
 hat in hell|hel , and þu herian|here|heran fysan , 
 feþa toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht . wesan|seon þu fag wiþ|wið god , 
 dugoða demend . hwæt#2 , þu deofol stræl , 
 icest þin yrmðo . þu|þe|ðe se ælmihtig|eallmihtig 
 hean|heah gehnægde , and on|an heolstor bescufan , 
 þær þu|þe|se cyning cining clamme beleсgan|belecgan , 
 and þu|þe|se siððan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a satan nemnan , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe dryhten wifcynn|hosp|flet|a deman|dema cuðon . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se git se wiðermeda word læran 
 folc toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht , feond cræftan|cræft : 
 " nu ge gehyrað hæleða gewinnan , 
 se ðyssum herian|here micel hearma gefremian . 
 þæt|ðæt|se wesan|seon|is andreas , se me|ic on|an fliteð 
 word wrætlicum for|faran wer menigo . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon beacen beodan burhsittendum . 
 ahleopon hildfrome here brehtme 
 and toh|to weallgeatum wigend þringan , 
 cennan|cene under cumblum , corðre mycle 
 toh|to ðam|se orlege , ord and bord . 
 þu|þa|se word cweðan weoroda dryhten , 
 meotud miht swiðan sægan|seсgan|secgan hit|his|he magoþegne : 
 " sculan þu , andreas , ellen fremman ! 
 nesan|neh|ne mið þu for|faran menigo , agan|ac þinne|þin modsefa 
 staðola wiþ|wið strang ! nesan seon|seo|se stund læt 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se wælreow wite|wita belecgaþ , 
 cealdan clommum . cyðan þu|þe|se silf|self , 
 herd hige þinne|þin , heorte staðola , 
 þæt|se hi|heo min|ic on|an þu|þe|ðe mægen|magan oncnawan . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hi|heo and nesan|neh|ne motan ofer min est 
 þinne|þin lichoman , lehtrum scyldige , 
 deaðe gedælan , þeah þu drype þolian , 
 mirce manslaga . ic þu|þe|se mid wunian . " 
 æfter þæm|þam|se word cuman werod unmæte , 
 lysu larsmeoðas , mid lindgecrode , 
 bolgenmod ; beran ut hræðe 
 and þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg þær hand gebindan . 
 siððan geypped wesan|seon|beon æðelinga wynn , 
 and hi|heo andweard eage magan 
 gesion sigerofne , þær wesan|seon|beon sec manig 
 on|an þæm|þam|se welwange wig oflysted 
 leode|leoda|leod duguðe . lutan sorgian 
 hwylc|hwilc him|hi|he þæt|se edlean æfter weorþan . 
 hatan þu|þa|se lædan ofer landsceare , 
 ðragmælum teon , torngeniðlan , 
 swa hi|heo hit frecnost findan magan . 
 dragan deormodne æfter dunscræfum , 
 ymb stanhleoðo , stærcedferþne , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa wid swa weg toh|to liсgan , 
 ent ærgeweorc , innan burh|burg , 
 stræte|stræt stanfah . storm upp arisan|ar 
 æfter ceasterhofum , cirm unlytel 
 hæðnes here . wesan|seon|beon se halig|halga|haleg liс|lic 
 sarbennum seoþan , swat besteman , 
 banhus abrecan . blod yðum weallan , 
 hatan|hat heolfre . habban him|hi|he on|an innan 
 ellen untweonde , wesan|seon|beon þæt|se æðele mod 
 asundrad fram synn , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he sar swa feala 
 deop dolgslegum dreogan sculan . 
 swa wesan|seon|beon eall|eal dæg oððæt æfen cuman 
 sigetorht swingan . sar eft gewadan 
 ymb se beorn breost , oðþæt beorht gewitan 
 sunne|sinnan swegeltorht toh|to settan glidan|glida . 
 læddan þu|þa|se leode|leodan|leod laðne gewinnan 
 toh|to carcern . he wesan|seon|beon criste swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 leof on|an mod . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon sunnan|leoht sefa 
 halig heorte neh , hige untyddre . 
 þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wesan|seon|beon under heolstorscuwan , 
 eorl ellenheard , ondlange niht|neaht 
 searoþancum besettan . snaw eorþ|eorðe bindan 
 wintergeworpum . weder coledon 
 heard hægelscurum , swilce hriman|hrim and forst , 
 har hildstapan , hæleða eðel 
 lucan , leode|leoda|leod gesetu . land|finna wesan|seon|beon freorig 
 cealdum cylegicelum , clingan wæter þri 
 ofer eastream , wesan|seon|is brycgade 
 blæc brimrade . bliðheort wunian 
 eorl unforcuð , ellen gemyndig , 
 þrist and þrohtheard in þreanedum 
 wintercealdan niht|neaht . no on|an gewitt blon , 
 acol for|faran þywan|þy|þe|se egesa , se þu|þe|se he ær onginnan , 
 þæt|se he wifcynn|hosp|flet|a domlicost dryhten herian , 
 weorðade word , oððæt wuldor gim 
 heofontorht onhlad . þe|þa|ða|se cuman hæleða þreotan 
 toh|to se dimm ding , duguð unlytel , 
 wadan wælgifre weorodes brehtme . 
 hatan ut hræðe æðeling lædan 
 in wrað geweald , wærfæstne hæleð . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon eft swa ær ondlangne dæg 
 swingan sarslegum . swat yðum weallan 
 þurh bancofan , blodlifrum swelgan , 
 hatan|hat heolfre . hra weorc nesan|neh|ne sinnan , 
 wund werig . þu|þa|se cuman wop hringan|hring 
 þurh se beorn breost , blat ut faran , 
 weallan waðuman stream , and he word cweðan : 
 " geseon nu , dryhten god , drohtað min , 
 weoruda willgeofa ! þu wæþan|west and const 
 an gehwilc earfeðsiðas . 
 ic gelyfan toh|to þu|þe|ðe , min|ic liffruma , 
 þæt|se þu mildheort me|ic for|faran þin mægenspedum , 
 nerigend firas , næfre willan , 
 ece ælmihtig , anforlætan , 
 swa ic þæt|se gefremme , þenden feorh leofað , 
 min|ic on|an molde , þæt|se ic , meotud , þin 
 lar leofwende lutan geswican . 
 þu wesan|seon gescyldend wiþ|wið sceaþa wæpn|wæpen , 
 ece eadfruma , eall|eal þin ; 
 nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan nu bysmrian bana manncynn , 
 facn frumbearn , þurh feond cræftan|cræft 
 leahtrum belecgan þu|þa|se þu|þin lof berað . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se þær ætywan se atol gast , 
 wrað wærloga . wigend læran 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se heremægene hell|hel dioful 
 awerged in wite|wita , and þæt|se word cweðan : 
 " sleað synnig ofer seolfes muð , 
 folc gewinnan ! nu toh|to feala reordian . " 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon orlege eft onhreran , 
 niwe stefn . nið upp arisan|ar 
 oþðæt sunne|sinnan gewitan toh|to settan glidan|glida 
 under niflan næs|nesan . niht|neaht helmade , 
 brunwann oferbræd beorg steap , 
 and se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wesan|seon|beon toh|to hofe|hof|hebban lædan , 
 deor and domgeorn , in þæt|se dimm ræced ; 
 sculan þonne|se in neadcofan nihtlangne fyrst 
 wærfæst wunian wiс|wican|wic unsyfre . 
 þu|þa|se cuman seofon sum|su toh|to sellan|sele|sel geonga|geong , 
 atol æglæca yfel gemyndig , 
 morðres manfrea myrce gescyrded , 
 deoful deaðreow duguðum bereafian , 
 onginnan þu|þa|se þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg hospword sprecan : 
 " hwæt#2 hycgan þu , andreas , hidercyme þinne|þin 
 on|an wrað geweald gewinnan|geblandan hwæt#2 wesan|seon|is wuldor|seolh|bearm þu|þin , 
 þu|þe|se þu oferhigdum upp aræran , 
 þu|þa|se þu god ussa gild gehnægdest gewinnan|geblandan 
 hafian|habban nu þu|þe|se an eall|eal getihhad 
 land|finna and leode|leodan|leod , swa dydan|don lareow þu|þin . 
 cyneþrym ahebban , þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|beon crist nama , 
 ofer middangeard , þynden hit magan swa . 
 se herodes ealdor|eald besnyðede , 
 forcuman æt|etan camp cyning iudea , 
 rices berædan , and he rode|rod befealg , 
 þæt|se he on|an gealga hit|his|he gast onsendan . 
 swa ic nu bebeodan bearn minum|min , 
 þegn|þegen þryðfullum , þæt|ðæt|se hi|heo þu|þe|ðe hnægan , 
 gingra æt|etan guðe . lætað gar ord , 
 earh ættre gemæl , in gedufan 
 in fæge ferð . gað fromlice , 
 þæt|ðæt|se ge guðfrecan gylp forbegan . " 
 hi|heo wesan|seon|beon rowan , ræsdon on|an sona 
 gifre grap . he god forstandan , 
 staðulfæst steorend , þurh hit|his|he strang miht . 
 siððan hi|heo oncnawan cristes rode|rod 
 on|an hit|his|he mægwlite , mære|mæran tacn|tacen|tacan , 
 wurdon|weorþan hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se acol on|an þæm|þam|se onfon , 
 forht , afærde , and on|an fleam niman . 
 onginnan eft swa ær ealdgeniðla , 
 hell|hel hæftling , hearmleoð galan|gal : 
 " hwæt#2 wearð ge|eowan|eow swa rof , rinc min , 
 lindgesteallan , þæt|se ge|eowan|eow swa lutan gespowan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se earmsceapen agef ondsware , 
 fah fyrnsceaþa , and hit|his|he fæder oncwæð : 
 " nesan|neh|ne magan|maga we him|hi|he lungre lað ætfæstan , 
 sweltan þurh searu . gan þu|þe|se self toh|to ! 
 þær þu gegninga guðe findan , 
 frecne|frecen|frec feohtan , gif þu furður durran 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se anhagan ald geneðan . 
 we þu|þe|ðe magan eaðe , eorl leofost , 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se secgplegan sel gelæran|gelær ; 
 ær þu gegninga guðe fremman , 
 wig woma , wealdan|weald , hu þu|þe|ðe sælan|sæl 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se gegnslege . utan gangan eft , 
 þæt|se we bysmrigen bend fæst , 
 oðwitan him|hi|he hit|his|he wræcsið . habbað word gearu 
 wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se æglæcan eall|eal trahtian ! " 
 þu|þa|se hleoðrade hlud stefn , 
 wite|wita bewæled , and þæt|se word cweðan : 
 " þu þu|þe|se , andreas , aclæccræftum 
 lange|lang feredes ! hwæt#2 , þu leode|leoda|leod feala 
 forleolce and forlæran ! nu lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne miht 
 gewealdan þywan|þy|þe|se weorc . þu|þe|se synd wite se grim 
 weotud be gewyrhtum . þu sculan werigmod , 
 hean|heah , hroðra leas , hearm þrowigan , 
 sar swyltcwale . secg min 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se guðplegan gearu wesan|nesan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se æninga ellenweorcum 
 unfyrn fæc|facian feorh ætþringan . 
 hwylc|hwilc wesan|seon|is se mihtig ofer middangeard , 
 þæt|se he þu|þe|se alysan of leoðubendum , 
 mannian|mann cynn|cyn , ofer min est gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se andreas agef ondsware : 
 " hwæt#2 , me|ic eaðe ælmihtig god , 
 niða neregend , se þu|þe|ðe in nied iu 
 gefæstnian fyrn|fyren clommum ! 
 þær þu siððan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a , susl gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 in wræc|wrecan winnan , wuldor blinnan , 
 siððan þu forhogedes heofoncyninges word . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon yfel or , ende næfre 
 þin wræc weorðeð . þu sculan wid feorh 
 ecan þin yrmðu . þu|þe|se bið wifcynn|hosp|flet|a simble 
 of dæge|dæg on|an dæg drohtaþ strengra . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð on|an fleam se þu|þe|ðe þe|þa|ða|se fæhðo iu 
 wiþ|wið god gear grimman|grimm|grim gefremian . 
 cuman þu|þa|se on|an uhta mid ærdæge 
 hæðen hloð halig neosan 
 leode|leoda|leod weorude . hatan lædan ut 
 þrohtheardne þegn þridda siþ , 
 willan aninga ellenrofes 
 mod gemyltan . hit nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan swa ! 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon niowinga nið onhreran , 
 heard and hetegrim . wesan|seon|beon se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer 
 sar swingan , searu gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 dolgbennum þurhdrifan , ðendon dæg lihtan . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se geomormod toh|to god cleopian , 
 heard of hæftan , halig|halga|haleg stefn 
 wepan werigferð , and þæt|se word cweðan : 
 " næfre ic geferde mid frea willan|willa 
 under heofonhwealfe heardran drohtnoð , 
 þær ic dryhten æ deman|dema sculan . 
 wesan|seon me|ic leoðu tolucan , liс|lic sar gebrucan|gebrecan|brucan|brecan , 
 banhus blodfag , benne weallað , 
 seonodolg swatige . hwæt#2 , þu sigorian|sigor weard , 
 dryhten hælend , on|an dæg tidan|tid 
 mid iudeum geomor weorþan 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu of gealga , god lifian , 
 fyrnweorc frea , toh|to fæder cleopian , 
 cininga wuldor|seolh|bearm , and cweþan|cweðan þus : 
 'ic þu|þe|ðe , fæder engel , frignan willan , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma , hwæt#2 forlætan þu me|ic ?' 
 and ic nu þri dæg|dah|dag þolian sculan 
 wælgrim wite . biddan ic , weoroda god , 
 þæt|se ic gast min agifan motan|mot , 
 sawol|sawlian|sawel symbelgifa , on|an þin sylfes hand . 
 þu þæt|ðæt|se gehatan þurh þu|þin halig word , 
 þu|þa|se þu we|us twelfe|twelf trymman onginnan , 
 þæt|se we|us heterof hild nesan|neh|ne gescogan , 
 nesan|neh|ne lices dælan|dæl lungre oððeoded , 
 nesan|neh|ne synu nesan|neh|ne ban on|an swaðe liсgan , 
 nesan|neh|ne loc of heafod toh|to forlore weorþan , 
 gif we þin lar læstan|læst willan . 
 nu wesan|seon sionwe toslopen , wesan|seon|is min|ic swat adropen , 
 licgað æfter land|finna loccas todrifene , 
 fex on|an folde . wesan|seon|is me|ic feorhgedal 
 leof mycle þonne|se þes|þeoh|se lifcearo . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se stefn oncwæð , stiðhycgendum , 
 wuldorcyning word hloðrode : 
 " nesan|neh|ne wepan se wræcsið , wine|win leofesta , 
 nesan þu|þe|se toh|to frecne|frecen|frec . ic þu|þe|se friðe healdan|heald , 
 minre|min mundbyrde mægene besettan . 
 me|ic wesan|seon|is miht ofer eall|eal , 
 sigorsped sellan|gesellan|geseald . soð þæt|se gecyðeð 
 manig æt|etan meðle on|an þæm|þam|se myclan dæge|dæg , 
 þæt|se þæt|ðæt|se geweorðeð , þæt|se ðeos wlitig gesceaft , 
 heofon and eorþ|eorðe , hreosan togadore , 
 ær awæged wesan|seon|nesan word ænig 
 þu|þe|se ic þurh min muð meðlan onginnan . 
 geseon nu seolfes swæðe , swa þu|þin swat agitan 
 þurh bangebrec blodig stigan|stig , 
 lices lælan . no þu|þe|se laðes micel 
 þurh daroða gedrep gedon|gedo|don motan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se heard micel hearma gefremedan . " 
 þu|þa|se on|an last beseon leoflic cempa 
 æfter wordcwidum wuldorcyning . 
 geseh he geblowene bearwas standan 
 blæd gehrodene , swa he ær hit|his|he blod agitan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se word cweðan wigendra hleo : 
 " wesan|seon|nesan þu|þe|ðe ðanc and lof , þeod waldend , 
 toh|to wid feorh wuldor|seolh|bearm on|an heofon , 
 se þu me|ic on|an sar , sigedryhten min|ic , 
 ellþeodigne , on|an nesan|neh|ne forlætan . " 
 swa se dædfruma dryhten herian 
 halig|halga|haleg stefn oððæt hador sægl 
 wuldortorht gewitan under waðu scriðan . 
 þu|þa|se þu|þa|se folctogan feorðan siþ , 
 egle|eglan ondsacan , æðeling lædan 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se carcern , willan cræft gehygd , 
 magorædendes mod oncyrran 
 on|an þære|se deorc niht|neaht . þu|þa|se cuman dryhten god 
 in þæt|se hlinræced , hæleða wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 and þu|þa|se wine|win synn word gretan 
 and frofor cweðan , fæder manncynn , 
 lifes|lif lareow , hatan hit|his|he lichoman 
 hal brucan : " nesan|neh|ne sculan þu in henðum wifcynn|hosp|flet|a lengan|leng|lange 
 searohæbbendra sar þrowian . " 
 arisan|ar þu|þa|se mægene rof , sægan|seсgan|secgan meotude þanc , 
 hal of hæftan heard wite|wita . 
 næs|nesan him|hi|he wemman|gewemman wlite|wlitan , nesan|neh|ne wloh of hrægle 
 lungre alysan , nesan|neh|ne loc of heafod , 
 nesan|neh|ne ban gebrucan|gebrecan|brucan|brecan , nesan|neh|ne blodig wund 
 lice gelenge , nesan|neh|ne laðes dælan|dæl , 
 þurh dolgslege dreor besteman , 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|beon eft swa ær þurh þu|þa|se æðele miht 
 lof lædan , and on|an hit|his|he lice trum . 
 hwæt#2 , ic hwil nu halig lar , 
 leoðgiddinga , lof se þu|þe|se wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 word wemman|weman , wyrdan|wyrd undyrne 
 ofer min|ic gemetan|gemet . micel wesan|seon|is toh|to secganne , 
 langsum leornung , þæt|se he in lif adreogan , 
 eall|eal æfter ord . þæt|se scell æglæwra 
 mann on|an molde þonne|se ic me|ic tælige 
 findan on|an ferðe , þæt|se fram fruma cunnan 
 eall|eal þu|þa|se earfeðo þu|þe|se he mid ellen adreogan , 
 grimm|grim guða . hwæðre git|gietan sceolon 
 lytel sticca leoðworda dælan|dæl 
 furður reccan . þæt|se wesan|seon|is fyrnsægen , 
 hu he weorna feala wite|wita geðolode , 
 heard hild , in þære|se hæðena|hæðen burh|burg . 
 he be weallan|weall geseon wundor fæstan|fæst 
 under sælwage sweras unlytel , 
 stapulas standan , storm bedrifene , 
 eald ent geweorc . he wiþ|wið an se , 
 mihtig and modrof , mæðel gehede , 
 wis , wundor gleaw , word stunde ahebban : 
 " geher þu , marmanstan , meotudes ræde|ræd , 
 for|faran se onsyne ealle|eall|eal gesceafte 
 forht geweorðað , þonne|se hi|heo fæder geseoð 
 heofon and eorþ|eorðe herigea micel 
 on|an middangeard mancynn sec . 
 lætan|læt|lædan nu of þin staþol stream weallan , 
 ea inflede , nu þu|þe|ðe ælmihtig 
 hateð , heofon cyning , þæt|se þu hrædlice 
 on|an þes fretan folc forþ|forð onsendan 
 wæter widrynig toh|to wer cwealm , 
 geofon geotan . hwæt#2 , þu gold wesan|seon , 
 sincgife , syll ! on|an þu|þe|ðe self cyning 
 writan , wuldor god , word cyðde 
 recen geryno , and ryhte æ 
 getacnian on|an tynan|tin word , 
 meotud miht swiðan . moyse sellan , 
 swa hit soþfæst siððan healdan , 
 modig magoþegnas , mæg|maga sinnan|sin , 
 godfyrhte guma , iosua and tobias . 
 nu þu miht gecnawan þæt|se þu|þe|se cyning engel 
 gefrætwian furður mycle 
 giofum geardagum þonne|se eall|eal gimm cynn . 
 þurh hit|his|he halig hæs þu sculan hræðe cyþan 
 gif þu hit|his|he ondgitan ænig habban . " 
 næs|nesan þu|þa|se wordlatu wiht þon|se micel|mare|mara 
 þæt|se se stan togan . stream ut aweoll , 
 flowan ofer folde . famig walcan 
 mid ærdæge eorþ|eorðe þehton , 
 myclade mereflod . meoduscerwen wearð 
 æfter symbeldæge , slæpan|slæp tobrugdon 
 searuhæbbende . sund grund|grindan onfon , 
 deop gedrefan|drefan . duguð wearð afyrhted 
 þurh se flod fær . fæge|fægan sweltan , 
 geong|gangan on|an geofene guðræs forniman 
 þurh sealten|sealt wegan|weg . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon sorgbyrþen , 
 biter beorþegu . byrlas nesan|neh|ne gælan , 
 ombehtþegnas . þær wesan|seon|beon ælc genog 
 fram dæg ord drync sona gearu . 
 weaxan wæter þri . wer cwanedon , 
 eald æscberend . wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he ut munan 
 fleon fealu stream , willan feorh beorgan , 
 toh|to dunscræfum drohtað sec , 
 eorþ|eorðe ondwist . him|hi|he þæt|se engel forstandan , 
 se þe|þa|ða|se burh oferbrægd blæc|blac liсgan|leon , 
 hatan|hat heaðowælme . hreoh wesan|seon|beon þær inne 
 beatan brim . nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan beorn hloð 
 of þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan fleam spowan . 
 wægas weaxan , wæd hlynsian , 
 fleon|fleogan fyrgnastas , flod yðum weallan . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon yðfynde innan burh|burg 
 geomorgidd wrecan . gehðo mændan 
 forhtferð manig , fusleoð galan . 
 egeslic æled|ælan eagsyne wearð , 
 heardlic hereteam , hleoðor gryrelic . 
 þurh lyftgelac leges blæst 
 weall ymbweorpan , wæter mycladon . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon wop wer wid hyrian|hyran|gehyran , 
 earmlic yld gedræg . þu|þa|se þær on|an onginnan , 
 feasceaft hæleð , folc gadorigean , 
 hean|heah , hygegeomor , heofan sprecan : 
 " nu ge magan self soð gecnawan , 
 þæt|se we mid unriht ellþeodigne 
 on|an carcern clommum beleсgan|belecgan , 
 witebendum . we|us seon|seo|se wyrdan|wyrd scyðeð , 
 heard and hetegrim . þæt|se wesan|seon|is heran|her swa cuð , 
 wesan|seon|is hit mycle sel , se þu|þe|se ic soð talian , 
 þæt|se we he alysan of leoðobendum , 
 ealle|eall|eal anmode , ( ofost wesan|seon|is selost ) , 
 and we|us se halig|halga|haleg helpan biddan , 
 geoc and frofor . we|us bið gearu sona 
 sybb æfter sorh|sorg , gif we secaþ toh|to him|hi|he . " 
 þu|þa|se þær andrea orgete wearð 
 on|an fyrhðlocan folc gebæro , 
 þær wesan|seon|beon modig mægen|magan forbeged , 
 wigendra þri . wæter fæðmedon , 
 flowan firgendstream , flod wesan|seon|beon on|an lust , 
 oþþæt breost oferstag , brim weallan , 
 eorlum oþ|oð exle . þu|þa|se se æðeling hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 streamfare stille|stillan , storm restan 
 ymbe|ymb stanhleoðu . stæppan|steppan ut hræðe 
 cennan|cene collenferð , carcern agifan|agiefan , 
 gleawmod , god leof . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon gearu sona 
 þurh streamræce stræt ryman . 
 smeolt wesan|seon|beon se sigewang , simble wesan|seon|beon dryge|drygan 
 folde fram flod , swa hit|his|he fot gestop . 
 wurdon|weorþan burhware bliðe on|an mod , 
 ferhðgefeonde . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon forþ|forð cuman 
 geoc æfter gyrne . geofon swaðrode 
 þurh halig hæs , hlystan yþan|ystan|yst forgifan|forgiefan , 
 brimrad gebidan . þu|þa|se se beorgan|beorg tohladan , 
 eorðscræf egeslic , and þær in forlætan 
 flod fæðmian , fealewe wægas , 
 geotan gegrind grund eall|eal forswelgan . 
 nalas he þær yðe an bisencte , 
 ach se weorodes eacan|eac þe|þa|ða|se wyrrestan , 
 faa folcsceaðan , feowertyne 
 gewitan mid þywan|þy|þe|se wegan in forwyrd sceacan 
 under eorþe|eorþ grund . þu|þa|se wearð acolmod , 
 forhtferð manig folc on|an last . 
 wendan hi|heo wifian|wif and wer cwealm , 
 þearlra geþingian|geþing ðrage hnagran , 
 siððan mane faa , morðorscyldige , 
 guðgelacan under grund hreosan . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se anmode ealle|eall|eal cweþan|cweðan : 
 " nu wesan|seon|is gesyne þæt|ðæt|se þu|þe|se soð meotud , 
 cyning eallwihta , cræft wealdeð , 
 se þes ar hider onsendan 
 þeod toh|to helpan . wesan|seon|is nu þurfan|þearf micel 
 þæt|se we gumcystum georne|geornan|georn hyran . " 
 þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg onginnan hæleð blissigean , 
 wigendra þreotan word retan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne beoð ge toh|to forht , þeah þu|þe|se fellan|fel сeosan|ceosan 
 synnig cynn . swylt þrowian , 
 wite be gewyrhtum . ge|eowan|eow wesan|seon|is wuldor sunnan|leoht 
 torht ontynan , gif ge tela hycgað . " 
 sendan þu|þa|se hit|his|he ben for|faran birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god , 
 bædan|biddan halig helpan gefremman 
 guma geogoðe , þu|þe|se on|an geofene ær 
 þurh flod fæðm feorh gesellan , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu|þa|se gast , god orfeorme , 
 in wite|wita forwyrd , wuldor bescyrede , 
 in feond geweald ferian|feran nesan|neh|ne wurdan . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|ðæt|se ærende|ærend ealwealdan god 
 æfter hleoðorcwidum halig gast 
 wesan|seon|beon on|an þanc sprecan|gesprecan , ðeoda ræswan|ræswa . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se onsunde ealle|eall|eal arisan , 
 geong|gangan of greotan , þu|þa|se ær geofon cwellan . 
 þu|þa|se þær ofostlice upp astandan 
 manig|manian on|an meðle , min gefrege , 
 eafora unweaxne , þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon eall|eal eador 
 leoðolic and gastlic , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi|heo lungre ær 
 þurh flod fær feorh aleton . 
 onfon fulwihtan|fulwiht and freoðuwære , 
 wuldor wedd|wedan wite|wita aspedde , 
 mundbyrd meotudes . þu|þa|se se modig hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 cyning cræftiga|cræftig , cirice getimbran , 
 gerwan god templ|tempel , þær se geogoð arisan|ar 
 þurh fæder fulwihtan|fulwiht and se flod onsprang . 
 þu|þa|se gesamnian secg þreate 
 wer geond þu|þa|se winburg wid and side|sid , 
 eorl anmode , and hira|hi ides mid , 
 cweþan|cweðan holdlice hyran willan , 
 onfon fromlice fullwihtes bæð 
 dryhten toh|to willan|willa , and diofolgild , 
 eald eolhstedas , anforlætan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon mid þywan|þy|þe|se folc fulwihtan|fulwiht hæfen , 
 æðele mid eorlum , and æ god 
 rihtan|riht aræran , rædan|ræd on|an land|finna 
 mid þæm|þam|se ceasterwara , cirice halgian . 
 þær se ar god an gesette|gesettan , 
 wisfæstne wer , word gleaw , 
 in þære|se beorht burh|burg bisceop þæm|þam|se leode|leoda|leod , 
 and gehalgian for|faran þæm|þam|se heremægene 
 þurh apostolhad , platan nemnan , 
 þeod on|an þearf , and þriste bebeodan 
 þæt|se hi|heo hit|his|he lar læstan georne|geornan|georn , 
 feorhræd fremman . sægan|seсgan|secgan hit|his|he fus hige , 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se goldburg ofgifan willan , 
 secg seledream and sincgestreon , 
 beorht beagselu , and him|hi|he brimþisan 
 æt|etan sæ faroðe sec willan . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se weorod weorc toh|to geþoligenne , 
 þæt|se hi|heo se leodfruma lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne willan 
 wiht gewunian . þu|þa|se him|hi|he wuldor god 
 on|an þæm|þam|se siðfæte self ætywan , 
 and þæt|se word cweðan , weoruda dryhten : 
 " folc of firen gewinnan|geblandan wesan|seon|is him|hi|he fus hyсgan|hyg|hycgan 
 gað geomrian , geohðo mænað 
 wer wif samod . hira|hi wop becuman , 
 murnan mod 
 for|faran sneowan . 
 nesan|neh|ne sculan þu þæt|se eowan anforlætan 
 on|an swa niowan gefea , agan|ac him|hi|he naman|nama min 
 on|an ferðlocan fæstan|fæst getimbre . 
 wunian|wuna in þære|se winbyrig , wigendra hleo , 
 salu sinchroden , seofon nihtian|niht|neaht fyrst . 
 siððan þu mid mildse minre|min ferian|feran . " 
 þu|þa|se eft gewitan oðer siþ 
 modig , mægene rof , marmedonia 
 ceaster sec . cristen weaxan 
 word and wisdom , siððan wuldor þegn , 
 æþelcyning ar , eage seon . 
 læran þu|þa|se þu|þa|se leode|leodan|leod on|an geleafa wegan|weg , 
 trymman torhtlice , tireadigra 
 wennan toh|to wuldor weorod unmæte , 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg ham heofon rices , 
 þær fæder and sunu and frofor gast 
 in þrinnesse þrymm wealdeð 
 in weorold weorold wuldorgestealda . 
 swilce se halig|halgian|halga|haleg herigeas þreade , 
 deofulgild todrifan and gedwola|gedwol fyllan|fyld|fylan . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon satane sar toh|to geþolian , 
 micel mod sorg , þæt|se he þe|þa|ða|se menigu geseon 
 hweorfan higebliðe fram helltrafum 
 þurh andreas est lar 
 toh|to fæger gefea , þær næfre feond nesan|neh|ne bið , 
 gast gramhydiges , gangan|gang on|an land|finna . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon gefyllan æfter frea dom 
 dæg|dah|dag on|an riman|rim , swa him|hi|he dryhten bebeodan , 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se wederburg wunian sculan . 
 onginnan he þu|þa|se fysan and toh|to flote gyrwan , 
 bliss hremig , willan on|an brimþisan 
 achaie oðer siþ 
 self gesecan , þær he sawulgedal , 
 beaducwealm gebidan . þæt|se þæm|þam|se bana nesan|neh|ne wearð 
 hleahtor behweorfan , agan|ac in hell|hel ceafl 
 sið asettan , and siððan no , 
 fah , freond leas , frofor benohte . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic lædan gefrignan leode|leoda|leod weorod 
 leof lareow toh|to lides stefnan , 
 mæcgas modgeomre . þær manig wesan|seon|beon 
 hatan|hat æt|etan heorte hyсgan|hyg|hycgan weallan . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se gebrengan æt|etan brim næsse 
 on|an wægþele wigan|wiga unslawne . 
 standan him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se on|an ofer æfter reotan 
 þendon hi|heo on|an yðum æðelinga wunn 
 ofer seolhpaðu geseon mihton , 
 and þu|þa|se weorðedon wuldor agend , 
 cleopian on|an corðre , and cweþan|cweðan þus : 
 " on|an wesan|seon|is ece god eall gesceafta ! 
 wesan|seon|is hit|his|he miht and hit|his|he æht ofer middangeard 
 breme bledsian , and hit|his|he blæd ofer eall|eal 
 in heofonþrymme halig|halga|haleg scineð , 
 wlitig on|an wuldor toh|to wid ealdor|eald , 
 ece mid engel . þæt|se wesan|seon|is æðele cyning ! " 
 
 wuldor|seolh|bearm su þu|þe|ðe and weorþmynd , wereda drihten , 
 fæder on|an folde , fæger gemæne , 
 mid sylfan sunu and soð gast . 
 amen . 
 
 cyninge|cyning . 
 þu wesan|seon se weallstan þu|þe|se þe|þa|ða|se wyrhta iu 
 wiðwurpon toh|to weorc . wel þu|þe|se geriseð 
 þæt|se þu heafod wesan|seon|nesan heall mære , 
 and gesomnian side|sid weall 
 fæstan|fæst gefog , flint unbræcne , 
 þæt|se geond eorðb . . . . . .g eall|eal eagna gesihþ 
 wundrian toh|to worlde wuldor ealdor . 
 gesweotula nu þurh searocræft þu|þin sylfes weorc , 
 soþfæst , sigorbeorht , and sona forlætan 
 weallan|weall wiþ|wið weallan|weall . nu wesan|seon|is þæm|þam|se weorc þurfan|þearf 
 þæt|se se cræftig cuman|ancuman and se cyning self , 
 and þonne|se gebetan , nu gebrosnad wesan|seon|is , 
 hus under hrofe . he þæt|se hra gescop , 
 leomo læmena ; nu sculan liffrea 
 se werig heap wraþ ahreddan , 
 earm from|fram egsan , swa he oft dydan|don . 
 eala þu reccend and þu rihtan|riht cyning , 
 se þu|þe|se locan healdeð , lif ontyneð , 
 eadig . . . upwegas , oþrum|oþer|oðer forwyrneð 
 wlitig wilsiþes , gif hit|his|he weorc nesan|neh|ne dugan|deag . 
 huru we for|faran þearf þes word sprecað , 
 and þusend . . . . . .giað se þu|þe|se mann|man gescop 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne . . .ete . . . . . .ceose weorðan 
 cearfulra þingan|þing , þu|þe|se we in carcern 
 sittað sorgende , sunne|sunnan|sunna wenað , 
 hwonne we|us liffrea sunnan|leoht ontynan , 
 weorðe ussum mod toh|to mundbora , 
 and þæt|se tydre gewitt|gewitan tire bewindan , 
 gedon usic se weorþ , þu|þe|se he toh|to wuldor forlætan , 
 þu|þa|se we heanlice hweorfan sceoldan 
 toh|to þes enge land , eðle bescyrede . 
 forðam secgan mæg|magan , se þu|þe|ðe soð spriceð , 
 þæt|se he ahreddan , þu|þa|se forhwyrfed wesan|seon|beon , 
 frumcyn firas . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se fæmne geong|gangan , 
 mægþ manes leas , þu|þe|se he him|hi|he toh|to modor geceosan ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon weorþan|geweorþan butan wer frigum , 
 þæt|se þurh bearn gebyrd bryd eacen|eacan wearð . 
 nænig efenlic þæm|þam|se , ær nesan|neh|ne siððan , 
 in worlde gewearð wif gearnung ; 
 þæt|se degol wesan|seon|beon , dryhten geryne . 
 eal giofu gæstlic grundsceat geondspreot ; 
 þær wisna fela wearð inlihtan 
 lar longsum þurh lifes|lif fruma 
 þu|þe|se ær under hoðman biholen liсgan|licgan , 
 wittig woðsong , þu|þa|se se waldend cuman , 
 se þu|þe|se reordian|reord gehwæs ryne gemiclað 
 se þu|þe|se geneahhe noman scyppendes 
 þurh horsc had hergan willað . 
 eala sibb|sib gesiht , sanct hierusalem , 
 cynestola cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , cristes burglond , 
 engel eþelstol , and þu|þa|se an in þu|þe|se 
 saule soðfæstra simble gerestað , 
 wuldor hremig . næfre womm tacn 
 in þæm|þam|se eardgearde eawed weorþeð , 
 acan|ac þu|þe|se firina gehwylc feor abugeð , 
 wærgðo and gewinn . beon toh|to wuldor full 
 halig|halga|haleg hyht , swa þu hatan|gehatan wesan|seon . 
 sioh nu self þu|þe|se geond þes side|sid gesceaft , 
 swilce rodor hrof rum geondwlitan 
 ymb healf gehwone , hu þec heofon cyning 
 siþ geseceð , and self cymeð , 
 nimeð eard in þu|þe|se , swa hit ær gefyrn 
 wittig wisfæste word sægan|seсgan|secgan ,
