 seomian sweart , siþ nesan|neh|ne þurfan 
 hlud hlihhan , acan|ac heo helltregum 
 werig|werian wunian and wea cuðon , 
 sar and sorh|sorg , susl þrowedon 
 þystru|þystre beþeссan|beþeccan , þearl æfterlean 
 se þu|þe|se heo onginnan wiþ|wið god winnan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon soð swa ær sibb on|an heofnum , 
 fæger|fæge freoþoþeawas , frea eall|eal leof , 
 þeon|þeodan hit|his|he þegn|þegen ; þrymm weaxan 
 duguða mid drihten , dreamhæbbendra . 
 wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se gesome , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se swegl buað , 
 wuldor eðel . wroht wesan|seon|beon asprungen , 
 oht mid engel and orlegnið , 
 siððan herewosan heofon ofgæfon , 
 sunnan|leoht belorene . him|hi|he on|an last setl , 
 wuldorsped welig , wid stodan 
 gifu growan on|an god romana , 
 beorht and geblædfæst , buendra leas , 
 siððan wræcstowe werig|werian gast 
 under hearmlocan hean|heah geforan . 
 þu|þa|se þeahtian þeon|þeodan ure|ur 
 modgeþonce , hu he þu|þa|se mære|mæran gesceaft , 
 eðelstaðolas eft gesette|gesettan , 
 swegltorhtan seld , god werod|weorod , 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo gielpsceaþan ofgifen habban , 
 heah on|an heofenum . forðam halig god 
 under roderas fon , rice miht , 
 willan þæt|se him|hi|he eorþ|eorðe and uproder 
 and sid wæter gesette|gesettan weorþan 
 woruldgesceafte on|an wrað gieldan , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se forhealdene of hleo sendan . 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon heran|her þu|þa|se git|gietan|geotan nymþe heolstersceado 
 wiht weorþan|geweorþan , acan|ac þes wid grund 
 standan deop and dim , drihten fremde , 
 idel and unnyt . on|an se eage wlitan 
 stiðfrihþ cining , and þu|þa|se stow behealdan , 
 dream leas , geseon deorc gesweorc 
 semian sinnihte sweart under roderum , 
 winnan and weste|westan , oðþæt þes|þeoh|se woruldgesceaft 
 þurh word gewearð wuldorcyning . 
 heran|her ærest|ær gesceppan ece drihten , 
 helm eallwihta , heofon and eorþ|eorðe , 
 rodor aræran , and þes rum land|finna 
 gestaþelode strang miht , 
 frea ælmihtig . folde wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se git , 
 græs ungrene ; garsecg þeссean|þeссan|þeccan 
 sweart synnihte , side|sid and wid , 
 woh weg . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon wuldortorht 
 heofonweardes gast ofer holm beran 
 micel sped . metod engel hatan , 
 lifes|lif brytta , sunnan|leoht forþ|forð cuman|cuma 
 ofer rum grund . raþe wesan|seon|beon gefyllan|fyllan 
 heahcininges hæs ; him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon halig sunnan|leoht 
 ofer westen|westan , swa se wyrhta bebeodan . 
 þu|þa|se gesundrian sigorian|sigor waldend 
 ofer laguflode sunnan|leoht wiþ|wið þeostru , 
 sceadan|scead wiþ|wið sciman . sceop þu|þa|se begen naman|nama , 
 lifes|lif brytta . sunnan|leoht wesan|seon|beon ærest|ær 
 þurh drihten word dæg nemnan|genemnan , 
 wlitebeorht gescaft . wel lician 
 frea æt|etan frymþ forþbæro tidan|tid , 
 dæg ærest ; geseon deorc sceado 
 sweart swiðrian geond sid grund . 
 þu|þa|se seon|seo|se tidan|tid gewitan ofer timber sceacan 
 middangeard , metod æfter scufan 
 scirum sciman , scippend ure|ur , 
 æfen ærest|ær . him|hi|he yrnan|irnan|iernan on|an last , 
 þringan þystru|þystre genip , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se se þeon|þeodan self 
 sceop niht|neaht naman|nama . nergend ure|ur 
 hi|heo gesundrian ; siððan æfre 
 dreogan and don drihten willan|willa , 
 ece ofer eorþ|eorðe . þe|þa|ða|se cuman oðer dæg , 
 sunnan|leoht æfter þeostru . hatan þu|þa|se lifes|lif weard 
 on|an mereflode midde|midd weorðan 
 hyhtlic heofontimber . holm dælan 
 waldend ure|ur and gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan þu|þa|se 
 roderas fæsten|fæstan ; þæt|se se rice|ric ahebban 
 up from|fram eorþ|eorðe þurh hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan word , 
 frea ælmihtig . flod wesan|seon|beon adælan 
 under heahrodore halig|halga|haleg miht , 
 wæter of wæter , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se wuniað git 
 under fæsten|fæstan folc hrofes . 
 þu|þa|se cuman ofer folde fus siðian 
 mære|mæran merigen þridda . nesan metod þe|þa|ða|se gyte 
 widlond nesan|neh|ne weg nytt , acan|ac standan bewrigen fæstan|fæst 
 folde mid flod . frea engel hatan 
 þurh hit|his|he word wese|wesan wæter gemæne , 
 þu|þa|se nu under roderum hira|hi|heore ryne healdað , 
 stow gestefnde . þe|þa|ða|se standan hraðe 
 holm under heofon , swa se halig|halgian|halga|haleg bebeodan , 
 sid ætsomne , þe|þa|ða|se sundrian|gesundrian wesan|seon|beon 
 lago wiþ|wið land|finna . geseon þu|þa|se lifes|lif weard 
 drige stow , dugoða hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 wid æteowian , þu|þa|se se wuldorcyning 
 eorþ|eorðe nemnan . gesette|gesettan yðum hira|hi|heore 
 onrihtne ryne , rum flod , 
 and gefeterode . . . 
 nesan|neh|ne þynсan|þyncan þu|þa|se gerysne rodor weard , 
 þæt|se adam lengan|leng|lange ana|an wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 neorxnawonges , niwe gesceafte , 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde and healdend . forðam him|hi|he heahcyning , 
 frea ælmihtig fultuman|fultum tiode ; 
 wif aweссan and þu|þa|se wrað sellan , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma , leof rinc . 
 he þæt|se andweorc of adames 
 lice aleoðode , and him|hi|he list ateon 
 rib of side|sid . he wesan|seon|beon restan fæstan|fæst , 
 and softe swefan , sar nesan|neh|ne witan|wist , 
 earfoða dælan|dæl , nesan|neh|ne þær ænig cuman 
 blod of benne , acan|ac him|hi|he breogo|brego engel 
 of lice ateon liodende ban , 
 wer unwundod , of þæm|þam|se wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan god 
 freolice fæmne . feorh in gedon , 
 ece saula . heo wesan|seon|beon engel gelice . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eue , adames bryd , 
 gast gegearwian|gearwian . hi|heo on|an geogoðe buan 
 wlitebeorht wesan|seon|beon on|an weorold cennan 
 meotodes miht . munan|mann|man nesan|neh|ne cuðon 
 don nesan|neh|ne dreogan , acan|ac him|hi|he drihten wesan|seon|beon 
 begen on|an breost beornan lufu . 
 þu|þa|se gebledsian bliðheort cyning , 
 metod alwihta , mann cynn|cyn 
 þe|þa|ða|se forma twegen|twa , fæder and moder , 
 wif and wæpned . he þu|þa|se word cweðan : 
 " temað nu and wexað , tudor fyllað 
 eorþ|eorðe ælgrene , incre cynn , 
 sunu and dohtor . git sculan sealtan|sealt wæter 
 wunian on|an geweald and eall|eal weorold gesceaft . 
 brucað blæddaga and brimhlæste 
 and heofonfugla . git wesan|seon|is halig feoh 
 and wilde deor on|an geweald sellan|gesellan|geseald , 
 and lifian , þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe land|finna tredað , 
 feorheaceno cynn , þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe flod wecceð 
 geond hronrade . git hyrað eall|eal . " 
 þu|þa|se sceawian scyppend ure|ur 
 hit|his|he weorc wlite|wlitan and hit|his|he wæstmian|wæstm blæd , 
 niwe gesceafta . neorxnawong standan 
 god and gastlic , gifena gefyllan|fyllan 
 freme forðweardum . fæger sunnan|leoht 
 þæt|se liðe land|finna lago yrnan , 
 wylleburne ( nalles wolcn|wolcen þe|þa|ða|se git|gietan|geotan 
 ofer rum grund regn beran , 
 winnan|wann mid windan|wind , hwæðre wæstm standan 
 folde gefrætwian|gefrætewian ) ; healdan forðryne 
 eastream hira|hi|heore æðele feower 
 of þæm|þam|se niwe neorxnawonge . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon adælede drihten miht 
 ealle|eall|eal of an , þu|þa|se he þes eorþ|eorðe gesceppan , 
 wæter|wæt wlitebeorht , and on|an weorold sendan . 
 se an hatað yldan|yld|ildan|ild , eorðbuende , 
 fison folcweras ; se folde dælan|dæl 
 brad bebugeð beorht stream 
 hebeleac utan . on|an þære|se eðyltyrf 
 niððas findað neah and feorran|feorr|feor 
 gold and gymcynn , gumþeoda birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 þe|þa|ða|se selestan , se þu|þe|se we|us secgað bec . 
 þonne|se seon|seo|se æftre ethiopia— 
 land|finna and liodgeard— beligeð witon , 
 ginne romana , þære|se wesan|seon|is geon noma . 
 þridda wesan|seon|is tigris , seon|seo|se wiþ|wið þeodscipe , 
 ea inflede , assirie belið . 
 swilce wesan|seon|is seon|seo|se feorþa , þu|þa|se nu geond folc manig 
 wer eufraten wid nemnað . 
 " acan|ac niotað git se oðres eall|eal , forlætað se an beam , 
 wariað git wiþ|wið se wæstm . nesan|neh|ne weorþ git wilnian gæd . " 
 hnigan þu|þa|se mid heafod heofoncyninge 
 georne|geornan|georn togenes and secgan eall|eal þanc , 
 list and þær|se lar . he lætan|lettan heo þæt|se land|finna buan , 
 hwærf him|hi|he þu|þa|se toh|to heofenum halig drihten , 
 stiðferhð cyning . standan hit|his|he handgeweorc 
 somod on|an sande , nytan sorh|sorgian|sorg wiht 
 toh|to begrornianne , butan heo god willan|willa 
 lengest|lengan|lange læstan . heo wesan|seon|beon leof god 
 ðenden heo hit|his|he halig word healdan|heald willan . 
 habban se alwalda engelcynna 
 þurh handmægen , halig drihten , 
 tene getrimede , þæm|se he getruwian wel 
 þæt|se hi|heo hit|his|he giongorscipe fyligan willan , 
 wyrcean hit|his|he willan|willa , forðam he him|hi|he gewitan forgifan|forgiefan 
 and mid hit|his|he hand gesceppan , halig drihten— 
 settan|gesettan habban he hi|heo swa gesæliglice . an habban he swa swiðne geworhtne , 
 swa mihtig on|an hit|his|he modgeþohte , he lætan|lettan he swa micles wealdan , 
 hehstne toh|to him|hi|he on|an heofon romana ; habban he he swa hwit geworhtne , 
 swa wynlic wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he wæstm on|an heofon þæt|se him|hi|he cuman from|fram werod drihten , 
 gelic wesan|seon|beon he þæm|þam|se leoht steorra . lof sculan he drihten wyrcean , 
 dyran sculan he hit|his|he dream on|an heofon , and sculan hit|his|he drihten þancian 
 se lean þu|þe|se he him|hi|he on|an þæm|þam|se sunnan|leoht gescerede þonne|se lætan|læt he hit|his|he he lange|lang wealdan . 
 acan|ac he awendan hit him|hi|he toh|to wyrsa þingan|þing , onginnan him|hi|he winnan up ahebban 
 wiþ|wið se hehstan heofnes waldend , þu|þe|se siteð on|an þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg stol . 
 deore|deor wesan|seon|beon he drihten ure|ur ; nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan him|hi|he bedyrned weorðan 
 þæt|se hit|his|he engyl onginnan ofermod wese|wesan , 
 ahebban he wiþ|wið hit|his|he hearra , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan hetespræce , 
 gylpword ongeagn , nyllan|nillan god þeowian , 
 cweðan þæt|se hit|his|he liс|lic wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon sunnan|leoht and scene , 
 hwit and hiowbeorht . nesan|neh|ne magan he æt|etan hit|his|he hige findan 
 þæt|se he god willan geongerdome 
 þeodne þeowian . þynсan|þyncan him|hi|he self 
 þæt|se he mægyn and cræftan|cræft micel|mare|mara habban 
 þonne|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg god habban miht|meaht|magan 
 folcgestælna . feala word gespæc 
 se engel ofermod . þenсean|þenсan|þencan þurh hit|his|he an cræftan|cræft 
 hu he him|hi|he strenglicran stol gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 heahran on|an heofon ; cweðan þæt|se he hit|his|he hige spannan 
 þæt|se he westan|west|wesan and norð wyrcean onginnan , 
 trymman getimbro ; cweðan him|hi|he tweogan|tweo þynсan|þyncan 
 þæt|se he god willan geong weorðan . 
 " hwæt#2 sculan ic winnan gewinnan|geblandan " cweðan he . " nesan me|ic wihtæ þurfan|þearf 
 hearra toh|to habbanne . ic mæg|magan mid hand swa fela 
 wundrian|wundor|wund gewyrcean . ic habban geweald micel 
 toh|to gyrwanne godlecran stol , 
 hearra on|an heofne . hwy sculan ic æfter hit|his|he hyldo ðeowian , 
 bugan him|hi|he swilces geongordomes gewinnan|geblandan ic mæg|magan wese|wesan god swa he . 
 bigstandað me|ic strang geneatas , þu|þa|se nesan|neh|ne willað me|ic æt|etan þæm|þam|se striðe geswican , 
 hæleþ heardmode . hi|heo habbað me|ic toh|to hearra gecorene , 
 rof rinc ; mid swilcum mæg|magan munan|mann|man rædan|ræd geþencean , 
 fon mid swilcum folcgesteallan . frynd synd hi|heo min georne|geornan|georn , 
 hold on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi hygesceaftum . ic mæg|magan hyra|hyr|hira|hi hearra|heah wese|wesan , 
 ræde|rædan on|an þes romana . swa me|ic þæt|se rihtan|riht nesan|neh|ne þinceð , 
 þæt|se ic oleccan awiht þurfan 
 god æfter god ænig . nesan|neh|ne willan ic lengan|leng|lange hit|his|he geong wurþan . " 
 þu|þa|se hit se allwalda eall|eal gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 þæt|se hit|his|he engyl onginnan ofermede micel 
 ahebban wiþ|wið hit|his|he hearra and sprecan healic word 
 dollice wiþ|wið drihten sinnan|sin . sculan he þu|þa|se dæd ongyldan , 
 worc se gewinn gedælan , and sculan hit|his|he wite|witan habban , 
 eall|eal morðra micel . swa deð mann gehwilc 
 þu|þe|se wiþ|wið hit|his|he waldend winnan ongynneð 
 mid mane wiþ|wið se mære|mæran drihten . þu|þa|se wearð se mihtig gebelgan|belgan , 
 hehsta heofon waldend , weorpan he of þan|se hean|heah stol . 
 hettan|hatan habban he æt|etan hit|his|he hearra winnan|gewinnan , hyldo habban hit|his|he ferlorene , 
 gram wearð him|hi|he se god on|an hit|his|he mod . forðam he sculan grund gesecean 
 heard hellewite , se þu|þe|se he winnan|wann wiþ|wið heofnes waldend . 
 acwæð he þu|þa|se fram hit|his|he hyldo and he on|an hell|hel weorpan , 
 on|an þu|þa|se deop dæl , þær he toh|to deofol wearð , 
 se feond mid hit|his|he gefere|gefera|gefer eall|eal . feollan|feallan þu|þa|se ufon of heofnum 
 þurh lengo swa , þri niht|neaht and dæg|dah|dag , 
 þu|þa|se engel of heofnum on|an hell|hel , and heo ealle|eall|eal forsceop 
 drihten toh|to deofol . forðam heo hit|his|he dæd and word 
 nyllan|nillan weorðian , forðam he heo on|an wyrsa sunnan|leoht 
 under eorþ|eorðe neoðan , ællmihtig god , 
 settan sigelease on|an þu|þa|se sweart hell|hel . 
 þær hæbbað heo on|an æfyn ungemet lange|lang , 
 eall|eal feond gehwilc , fyr edneowe , 
 þonne|se cymð on|an uhta easterne windan|wind , 
 forst fyrn|fyren cald . simble fyr oððe gar , 
 sum|su heard geswincan|geswinc habban sculan . 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan munan|mann|man hit him|hi|he toh|to wite|witan , ( hyra|hyr|hira|hi weorold wesan|seon|beon gehwyrfed ) , 
 forma siþ , fyllan|fyld|fylan hell|hel 
 mid þæm|þam|se andsaca . healdan engel forþ|forð 
 heofonrices hehðe , þu|þe|se ær god hyldo gelæstan . 
 liсgan þu|þa|se oðer fynd on|an þæm|þam|se fyr , þu|þe|se ær swa feala habban 
 gewinn wiþ|wið hira|hi|heore waldend . wite|witan þoliað , 
 hat heaðowelm hell|hel tomiddes , 
 brand and brad ligas , swilce eacan|eac þu|þa|se biter recas , 
 þrosm and þystre , forðam hi|heo þegnscipe 
 god forgyman . hi|heo hyra|hyr|hira|hi galan|gal beswican , 
 engel oferhygd , nyllan|nillan alwaldan 
 word weorþian , habban wite|witan micel , 
 wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se befeallene fyr toh|to botm 
 on|an þu|þa|se hatan|hat hell þurh hygeleaste 
 and þurh ofermetto . sœ̄сan|seсan|secan oþer|oðer land|finna : 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon sunnan|leoht leas and wesan|seon|beon liges full , 
 fyr fær micel . fynd ongietan 
 þæt|se hi|heo habban wrixlan wite|wita unrim 
 þurh hira|hi|heore micel mod and þurh miht god 
 and þurh ofermetto eall|eal swiðe . 
 þu|þa|se sprecan se ofermod cyning , þu|þe|se ær wesan|seon|beon engel scynost , 
 hwitost on|an heofne and hit|his|he hearra leof , 
 drihten dyre , oþ|oð hi|heo toh|to dol wurdon|weorþan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he for|faran galscipe god self wearð , 
 mihtig on|an mod , yrre|irre . weorpan he on|an þæt|se morðer innan , 
 niðer on|an þæt|se niobedd , and sceop him|hi|he naman|nama siððan , 
 cweðan se hehsta hatan|hat sculan 
 satan siððan , hettan|het|hedan|hatan he þære|se sweart hell|hel 
 grund gyme|gyman , nalles wiþ|wið god winnan . 
 satan maðelode , sorgian sprecan , 
 se þu|þe|ðe hell|hel forþ|forð healdan|heald sculan , 
 gieme|gieman se grund . wesan|seon|beon ær god engel , 
 hwit on|an heofne , oþ|oð he hit|his|he hyсgan|hyg|hycgan forspeon , 
 and hit|his|he ofermetto eall|eal swiðe , 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne willan wereda drihten 
 word wurðian . weallan him|hi|he on|an innan 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan ymb hit|his|he heorte , hatan|hat wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he utan 
 wraðlic wite|witan . he þu|þa|se word cweðan : 
 " wesan|seon|is se ænga studu ungelic swiðe|swiðan 
 þæm|þam|se oðer þu|þe|se we ær cuðon , 
 hean|heah on|an heofonrice , þu|þe|se me|ic min|ic hearra|heah onlag , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah we he for|faran þæm|þam|se alwaldan aginnan|agan nesan|neh|ne motan , 
 romigan ure|ur rices . næfð he þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah rihtan|riht gedon|gedo|don 
 þæt|se he we|us hæfð befælled fyr toh|to botm , 
 hell|hel þære|se hatan|hat , heofonrice beniman ; 
 hafað hit mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian mid moncynne 
 toh|to gesettanne . þæt|se me|ic wesan|seon|is sorh|sorgian|sorg micel , 
 þæt|se adam sculan , þu|þe|se wesan|seon|beon of eorþ|eorðe wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 min stronglican stol behealdan , 
 wese|wesan him|hi|he on|an wynn , and we þes wite|witan þolian , 
 hearm on|an þes hell|hel . wa la , agan ic min hand geweald 
 and motan an tidan|tid ute weorðan , 
 wese|wesan an winterstunde , þonne|se ic mid þis werode-- 
 acan|ac licgað me|ic ymbe|ymb irenbenda , 
 rideð racente sal . ic wesan|seon|eoh rices leas ; 
 habbað me|ic swa heard hell|hel clommas , 
 fæstan|fæst befon . heran|her wesan|seon|is fyr micel , 
 ufan and neoðone . ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a nesan|neh|ne geseon 
 laðran landscipe . lig nesan|neh|ne aswamað , 
 hatan|hat ofer hell|hel . me|ic habbað hring gespong , 
 sliðhearda sal siðes amyrred , 
 afyrran me|ic min|ic feðe ; fot|fedan synt gebindan , 
 hand gehæfte . synt þissa heldora 
 weg forwyrсan|forwyrcan , swa ic mid wiht nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 of þes lioðobendum . licgað me|ic ymbe|ymb 
 heard irenes hatan|hat geslægene 
 grindel great . mid þywan|þy|þe|se me|ic god hafað 
 hæftan be þæm|þam|se heals , swa ic witan he min hige cuðe ; 
 and þæt|se witan|wist eacan|eac werod drihten , 
 þæt|se sculan wit adame yfele|yfel gewurðan 
 ymb þæt|se heofonrice , þær ic agan min hand geweald . 
 acan|ac ðoliaþ we nu þrea on|an hell|hel , ( þæt|se syndon þystre and hæto ) , 
 grimman|grimm|grim , grundleas . hafað we|us god self 
 forswapen on|an þes sweart mist ; swa he we|us nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ænig synn gestælan , 
 þæt|se we him|hi|he on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna lað gefremedon . he hæfð we|us þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah se sunnan|leoht bescyrede , 
 beweorpan on|an eall|eal wite|wita micel . nesan|neh|ne magan we se wracu gefremman , 
 geleanian him|hi|he mid laðes wiht þæt|se he we|us hafað se sunnan|leoht bescyrede . 
 he hæfð nu mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian an middangeard , þær he hæfð mann|man geworhtne 
 æfter hit|his|he onlicnesse . mid þæm|þam|se he willan|wil eft gesettan 
 heofon romana mid hluttrum saulum . we se sculan hycgan georne|geornan|georn , 
 þæt|se we on|an adame , gif we æfre mægen|magan , 
 and on|an hit|his|he eafrum swa some , anda gebetan , 
 onwendan him|hi|he þær willan|willa sin , gif we hit mægen|magan wiht aþencan . 
 nesan|neh|ne gelyfan ic me|ic nu se sunnan|leoht furðor se þu|þe|se he him|hi|he þenceð lange|lang niotan , 
 se ead mid hit|his|he engel cræftan|cræft . nesan|neh|ne magan we þæt|se on|an ald gewinnan , 
 þæt|se we mihtig god mod onwæcnan|onwacan . witon oðwendan hit nu mann bearn , 
 þæt|se heofonrice , nu we hit habban nesan|neh|ne motan , gedon|gedo|don þæt|se hi|heo hit|his|he hyldo forlætan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo þæt|se onwendan þæt|se he mid hit|his|he word bebeodan : þonne|se weorð he him|hi|he wrað on|an mod , 
 ahwet hi|heo from|fram hit|his|he hyldo , þonne|se sculan hi|heo þes hell|hel sec 
 and þes grimman|grimm|grim grund ; þonne|se motan we hi|heo we|us toh|to giongrum habban , 
 firas birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn on|an þes fæst clomme . onginnað nu ymb þu|þa|se fyrd þencean ! 
 gif ic ænig þægne þeodenmadmas 
 gear forgifan|forgiefan , þenden we on|an þan|se god romana 
 gesælige sittan and habban ure|ur setl geweald , 
 þonne|se he me|ic na on|an leofran tidan|tid lean nesan|neh|ne magan 
 min gifu|gifan gyldan , gif hit|his|he gien willan 
 min þegnian|þegn|þegen hwilc geþafa wurðan , 
 þæt|se he up heonan ute miht|meaht|magan 
 cuman|cuma þurh þes clustro , and habban cræftan|cræft mid him|hi|he 
 þæt|se he mid feðerhoman fleoge|fleogan magan , 
 windan on|an wolcn|wolcen , þær wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan stondað 
 adam and eue on|an eorðrice 
 mid wela bewindan , and we synd aworpene hider 
 on|an þes deop dalo . nu hi|heo drihten synt 
 wurðran micel , and motan him|hi|he se wela aginnan|agan 
 þu|þe|se we on|an heofonrice habban sculan , 
 romana mid rihte|rihtan|riht ; wesan|seon|is se rædan|ræd gescyred 
 mann cynn . þæt|se me|ic wesan|seon|is on|an minum|min mod swa sar , 
 on|an minum|min hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hreoweð , þæt|se hi|heo heofonrice 
 aginnan|agan toh|to ald . gif hit ge|eower ænig mæge|mæg|magan 
 gewendan mid wiht þæt|se hi|heo word god , 
 lar forlætan , sona hi|heo him|hi|he þu|þe|se laðran beoð . 
 gif hi|heo brecað hit|his|he gebodscipe , þonne|se he him|hi|he abelgan wurðeþ ; 
 siððan bið him|hi|he se wela onwendan and weorþ him|hi|he wite|witan gegarwod , 
 sum|su heard hearmscearu . hycgað hit|his|he ealle|eall|eal , 
 hu ge hi|heo beswican ! siððan ic me|ic sefte mæg|magan 
 restan on|an þes racente , gif him|hi|he þæt|se romana losað . 
 se þu|þe|se þæt|se gelæsteð , him|hi|he bið lean gearu|gearo 
 æfter toh|to ald , se we heran|her inne magan 
 on|an þes fyr forþ|forð freme gewinnan . 
 sittan lætan|læt ic he wiþ|wið me|ic silf|self , swa hwæt|hwa swa þæt|se secgan cymeð 
 on|an þes hatan|hat hell|hel , þæt|se hi|heo heofoncyninges 
 unweorþlice word and dæd 
 lar . . . . " 
 ange he þu|þa|se gyrwan god andsaca , 
 fus on|an frætwum ( habban fæcne hyсgan|hyg|hycgan ) ; 
 hæleðhelm on|an heafod asettan and se full heard gebindan , 
 spenn mid spangum ; witan|wist him|hi|he spræca fela , 
 worian|woh word . windan|wand him|hi|he up þanan , 
 hwerfan|hweorfan him|hi|he þurh þu|þa|se helldora , ( habban hyсgan|hyg|hycgan strang ) , 
 lacan on|an lyft laþwendemod , 
 swingan þæt|se fyr on|an twegen|twa feond cræftan|cræft ; 
 willan dearnunga drihten geongran 
 mid mandæde , mann beswican , 
 forlædan and forlæran , þæt|se hi|heo wurdon|weorþan lað god . 
 he þu|þa|se geferde þurh feond cræftan|cræft 
 oððæt he adam on|an eorðrice , 
 god handgesceaft , gearu findan , 
 wislice wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , and hit|his|he wif somed , 
 freoh|freogan|freo fægroste , swa hi|heo fela cuðon 
 god gegearwigean— þu|þa|se him|hi|he toh|to gingra 
 metod mancynn mearcian selfa— 
 and him|hi|he bi|be twegin beam standan 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon utan ofætes gehlædene , 
 werian mid wæstm , swa hi|heo waldend god , 
 heah heofoncyning hand gesette|gesettan , 
 þæt|se þær ieldo birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn motan on|an ceosan 
 god and yfel , guma æghwilc , 
 wela and wawan . næs|nesan se wæstm gelic ! 
 oðer wesan|seon|beon swa wynlic , wlitig and scene , 
 liðe and lofsum . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon lifes|lif beam . 
 motan on|an ecnisse æfter lybban , 
 wese|wesan on|an weorold , se se wæstm onbat , 
 swa him|hi|he æfter þywan|þy|þe|se ieldo nesan|neh|ne derian , 
 nesan|neh|ne suht swaru , acan|ac motan simble wese|wesan 
 lungre on|an lust and hit|his|he lif aginnan|agan , 
 hyldo heofoncyninges heran|her on|an weorold habban . 
 him|hi|he toh|to wesan|seon|beon witod geþingþo 
 on|an se hean|heah heofon , þonne|se he heonan wendan|wenan . 
 þonne|se wesan|seon|beon se oðer eallenga sweart , 
 dim and þystru|þystre ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon deaðes beam , 
 se bær|beran bitter|bitor|biter fela . sculan buan witan|wita 
 yld æghwilc yfel and god 
 gewindan on|an þes weorold . sculan on|an wite|witan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 mid swat and mid sorh|sorg siððan libban , 
 swa hwæt|hwa swa gebyrgde se on|an þæm|þam|se beam geweaxan . 
 sculan he ieldo beniman ellendæda , 
 dream and drihtscipes , and him|hi|he beon|beo|bannan deað scyred . 
 lytel hwil sculan he hit|his|he lifes|lif niotan , 
 sec þonne|se land|finna sweartost on|an fyr . 
 sculan feond þeowian , þær wesan|seon|is eall|eal frecnian|frecne|frecen micel 
 leode|leoda|leod toh|to lang hwil . þæt|se witan|wist se laða georne|geornan|georn , 
 dyrne deofol bodian|boda|bod þu|þe|se wiþ|wið drihten winnan|wann . 
 weorpan he þu|þa|se on|an wyrm liс|lic and windan|wand him|hi|he þu|þa|se ymbutan 
 se deaðes beam þurh deofol cræftan|cræft , 
 geniman þær se ofætes and wendan|wenan he eft þanan 
 þær he witan|wist handgeweorc heofoncyninges . 
 ongon he þu|þa|se frinan forma word 
 se laða mid ligen : " langað þu|þe|se awuht , 
 adam , up toh|to god gewinnan|geblandan ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an hit|his|he ærende|ærend hider 
 feorran|feorr|feor ferian|feran , nesan|neh|ne þæt|se nu fyrn nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 þæt|se ic wiþ|wið he silf|self sæt|sittan . þu|þa|se hettan|het|hedan|hatan he me|ic on|an þes sið faran , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þæt|se þu þes ofætes etan , cweðan þæt|se þu|þin abal and cræftan|cræft 
 and þu|þin modsefa mara weorþan , 
 and þu|þin lichoma leoht micel , 
 þu|þin gesceapu scenran , cweðan þæt|se þu|þe|se ænig sceat ðearf 
 nesan|neh|ne weorþan on|an weorold . nu þu willan|willa hæftan|habban , 
 hyldo gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan heofoncyninges , 
 toh|to þance þenian þin hearan , 
 hæftan|habban þu|þe|se wiþ|wið drihten dyrne geworhtne . ic gehyrdan|gehyran he þin dæd and word 
 lofian on|an hit|his|he sunnan|leoht and ymb þu|þin lif sprecan . 
 swa þu læstan|læst sculan þæt|se on|an þes land|finna hider 
 hit|his|he boda bringað . brad synd on|an weorold 
 grene geard , and god siteð 
 on|an þæm|þam|se hehstan heofna romana , 
 ufan alwalda . nele þu|þa|se earfeðu 
 self habban þæt|se he on|an þes sið faru|faran|fah , 
 guma drihten , acan|ac he hit|his|he gingra sendan 
 toh|to þinne|þin sprecan . nu he þu|þe|se mid spell|spel hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 listas læran . læstan|læst þu georne|geornan|georn 
 hit|his|he ambyhto , niman þu|þe|se þes ofæt on|an hand , 
 bitan|biddan|bidan hit|his|he and byrige . þu|þe|se weorð on|an þin breost rum , 
 wæstm þywan|þy|þe|se wlitegra . þu|þe|se sendan waldend god , 
 þu|þin hearra|heah þes helpan of heofonrice . " 
 adam maðelode þær he on|an eorþ|eorðe standan , 
 selfsceafte guma : " þonne|se ic sigedrihten , 
 mihtig god , mæðlan gehyrdan|gehyran 
 strang stemn|stefn , and me|ic heran|her stondan hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 hit|his|he bebod healdan|heald , and me|ic þes bryd forgifan|forgiefan , 
 wlitesciene wif , and me|ic warnian hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 þæt|se ic on|an se deaðes beam bedroren nesan|neh|ne weorþan , 
 beswican toh|to swiðe|swiðan , he cweðan þæt|se þu|þa|se sweart hell|hel 
 healdan|heald sculan se þu|þe|ðe bi|be hit|his|he heorte wuht 
 laðes gelædan . nytan þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu mid ligen faru|faran|fah 
 þurh dyrne geþanc , þu|þe|se þu drihten wesan|seon 
 bodian|boda|bod of heofnum . hwæt#2 , ic þinne|þin bysnigan|bysnian|bysen nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , 
 word nesan|neh|ne wisna wuht oncnawan , 
 siðes nesan|neh|ne sagona . ic witan hwæt#2 he me|ic self bebeodan , 
 nergend user , þu|þa|se ic he nehst geseon : 
 he hettan|het|hedan|hatan me|ic hit|his|he word weorðian and wel healdan|heald , 
 læstan|læst hit|his|he lar . þu gelic nesan|neh|ne beon 
 ænig hit|his|he engel þu|þe|se ic ær geseon , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu me|ic oðiewdest ænig tacn|tacen|tacan 
 þu|þe|se he me|ic þurh treowe|treow toh|to onsendan , 
 min|ic hearra|heah þurh hyldo . þywan|þy|þe|se ic þu|þe|se hyran nesan|neh|ne cunnan|cann , 
 acan|ac þu magan þu|þe|se forþ|forð faran . ic habban me|ic fæst geleafa 
 up toh|to þæm|þam|se ælmihtegan god þu|þe|se me|ic mid hit|his|he earm wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 heran|her mid hand sin . he mæg|magan me|ic of hit|his|he hean|heah romana 
 geofian mid god gehwilcum , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he hit|his|he gingra nesan|neh|ne sendan . " 
 wendan|wenan he wraðmod þær he þæt|se wif geseon 
 on|an eorðrice euan stondan , 
 sceone gesceapene , cweðan þæt|se sceaþa micel 
 eall|eal hira|hi|heore eafora æfter siððan 
 weorþan on|an weorold : " ic witan , git waldend god 
 abelgan weorþ , swa ic him|hi|he þes bodscipe 
 selfa secg , þonne|se ic of þis siþ cuman|ancuman 
 ofer lang wegan|weg , þæt|se git|gietan nesan|neh|ne læstan|læst wel 
 hwilc ærende|ærend swa he easten hider 
 on|an þes sið sendeð . nu sculan he self faran 
 toh|to incre andswaru ; nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan hit|his|he ærende|ærend 
 hit|his|he bodian|boda|bod beodan ; þywan|þy|þe|se ic witan þæt|se he git abelgan weorþ , 
 mihtig on|an mod . gif þu þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah minum|min willan , 
 wif willan , word hyran , 
 þu magan hit|his|he þonne|se rum rædan|ræd geþencan . 
 gehyсgan|gehycgan on|an þin breost þæt|se þu git begen twegen magan 
 wite|witan bewarigan , swa ic þu|þe|se wisian . 
 æt|etan þes ofetes ! þonne|se wurðað þu|þin eage swa sunnan|leoht 
 þæt|se þu magan swa wid ofer weorold ealle|eall|eal 
 geseon siððan , and selfes stol 
 herran þin , and habban hit|his|he hyldo forþ|forð . 
 magan þu adame eft gestyran , 
 gif þu hit|his|he willan|willa hæftan|habban and he þin word getrywð . 
 gif þu him|hi|he toh|to soð sægan|seсgan|secgan hwilc þu selfa hæftan|habban 
 bisne on|an breost , se þu gebod god , 
 lar læst , he se lað strið , 
 yfel andwyrde|andwyrdan|andwerdan on|an forlæteð 
 on|an breostcofan , swa witan him|hi|he butu 
 on|an spedan|sped sprecað . span þu he georne|geornan|georn 
 þæt|se he þin lar læstan|læst , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan git lað god , 
 incrum waldende , weorðan þurfan . 
 gif þu þæt|se angin fremman , ides seon|seo|se betste , 
 forhelan ic incrum herran þæt|se me|ic hearmes swa fela 
 adam gesprecan , earh|earg word . 
 tyhð me|ic untryowða , cwyð þæt|se ic seon|seo|se teon geornan|georn , 
 grama|gram ambyhtsecg , nales god engel , 
 acan|ac ic cunnan|cann ealle|eall|eal swa geare|gear engel gebyrde , 
 heah heofon gehlidu ; wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se hwil se lang 
 þæt|se ic geornlice god þegnian 
 þurh hold hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , herran minum|min , 
 drihten self ; nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|eoh ic deofol gelic . " 
 lædan hi|heo swa mid ligen and mid list spannan 
 ides on|an þæt|se unriht , oðþæt hire|heo on|an innan onginnan 
 weallan wyrm þeссean|þeссan|þeccan|geþeaht ( habban hire|heo waccor hige 
 metod mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian ) , þæt|se heo hire|heo mod onginnan 
 lætan æfter þæm|þam|se lar ; forðam heo æt|etan þæm|þam|se lað onfon 
 ofer drihten word deaðes beam 
 weorcsum wæstm . nesan|neh|ne wearð wyrsa dæd 
 mann mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian ! þæt|se wesan|seon|is micel wundor 
 þæt|se hit ece god æfre willan 
 þeon|þeodan þolian , þæt|se weorþan þegn swa manig 
 forlædd be þæm|þam|se lygenum þu|þe|se for|faran þæm|þam|se lar cuman . 
 heo þu|þa|se se ofætes æt|etan , alwaldan brecan 
 word and willan|willa . þu|þa|se magan heo wid geseon 
 þurh se lað lænan|læn þu|þe|se hi|heo mid ligen beswican , 
 dearnenga bedragan , þu|þe|se hire|heo for|faran hit|his|he dæd cuman , 
 þæt|se hire|heo þynсan|þyncan hwit heofon and eorþ|eorðe , 
 and eall|eal þes|þeoh|se weorold wlitig , and geweorc god 
 micel and mihtig , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah heo hit þurh monnes þeссean|þeссan|þeccan|geþeaht 
 nesan|neh|ne sceawian ; acan|ac se sceaða georne|geornan|georn 
 swicode ymb þu|þa|se sawol|sawel þu|þe|se hire|heo ær þu|þa|se sien onlah , 
 þæt|se heo swa wid wlitan magan 
 ofer heofonrice . þu|þa|se se forhatena sprecan 
 þurh feondscipe ( nalles he hi|heo fremman|freme læran ) : 
 " þu magan nu þu|þe|se self geseon , swa ic hit þu|þe|se secgan nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf , 
 eue seon|seo|se god , þæt|se þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is ungelic 
 wlite|wlitan and wæstm , siððan þu minum|min word getruwodest , 
 læst min lar . nu scineð þu|þe|se sunnan|leoht for|faran 
 glædlic ongeagn þæt|se ic from|fram god bringan|brengan 
 hwit of heofon ; nu þu hit|his|he hrinan magan . 
 sægan|seсgan|seon adame hwilce þu gesiht hæftan|habban 
 þurh min cime cræft . gif git|gietan|geotan þurh cuscne siodo 
 læstan|læst min lar , þonne|se gifu|gifan ic him|hi|he se sunnan|leoht genog 
 se ic þu|þe|se swa god gegired habban . 
 nesan|neh|ne wite|witan ic him|hi|he þu|þa|se womcwidas , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he hit|his|he weorþ nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|nesan 
 toh|to alætanne ; se fela he me|ic laðes sprecan . " 
 swa hire|heo eafora sculan æfter lybban : 
 þonne|se hi|heo lað gedoð , hi|heo sculan lufu|lufe wyrcean , 
 betan hira|hi|heore hearra hearmcwyde and habban hit|his|he hyldo forþ|forð . 
 þu|þa|se gangan toh|to adame ides scenost , 
 wifian|wif wlitegost þu|þe|se on|an weorold cuman|come , 
 forðam heo wesan|seon|beon handgeweorc heofoncyninges , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah heo þu|þa|se dearnenga fordon weorþan , 
 forlædan mid ligen , þæt|se hi|heo lað god 
 þurh se wrað geþanc weorðan sculan , 
 þurh se deofol searo don|dom forlætan , 
 hierran hyldo , hefonrices þolian 
 manig hwil . bið þæm|þam|se mann full wa 
 þu|þe|se he nesan|neh|ne warnað þonne|se he hit|his|he geweald hafað ! 
 sum|su heo hire|heo on|an hand bær|beran , sum|su hire|heo æt|etan heorte liсgan|licgan , 
 æppel unsælig , se hire|heo ær forbeodan 
 drihten drihten , deaðbeames ofet , 
 and þæt|se word acwæð wuldor aldor , 
 þæt|se þæt|se micel morð mann nesan|neh|ne þurfan 
 þegn|þegen þolian , acan|ac he þeod gehwa 
 hefonrice forgifan|forgiefan , halig drihten , 
 widbradne wela , gif hi|heo se wæstm on|an 
 lætan willan þu|þe|se þæt|se laðtreow 
 on|an hit|his|he boga|bog bær|beran , bitter|bitor|biter gefyllan|fyllan ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon deaðes beam þu|þe|se him|hi|he drihten forbeodan . 
 forlec hi|heo þu|þa|se mid ligen se wesan|seon|beon lað god , 
 on|an hettan|hatan heofoncyninges , and hyсgan|hyg|hycgan euan , 
 wif wican|wacan|wac þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan , þæt|se heo onginnan hit|his|he word truwian , 
 læstan|læst hit|his|he lar , and geleafa niman 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se bysen from|fram god bringan habban 
 þu|þe|se he hire|heo swa wærlice word sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 iewan hire|heo tacn|tacen|tacan and treowe|treow hettan|gehatan , 
 hit|his|he hold hyсgan|hyg|hycgan . þu|þa|se heo toh|to hire|heo hearra sprecan : 
 " adam , frea min|ic , þes ofet wesan|seon|is swa swete , 
 blið on|an breost , and þes bodian|boda|bod sciene , 
 god engel god , ic on|an hit|his|he gearu geseon 
 þæt|se he wesan|seon|is ærendsecg uncres hearra , 
 hefoncyninges . hit|his|he hyldo wesan|seon|is wit god|betera 
 toh|to gewinnanne þonne|se hit|his|he wiðermedo . 
 gif þu him|hi|he heodæg wuht hearmes gesprecan , 
 he forgifð hit þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah , gif witan him|hi|he geongordom 
 læstan|læst willað . hwæt#2 scal þu|þe|se swa laðlic strið 
 wiþ|wið þin hearra boda gewinnan|geblandan wit wesan|seon|is hit|his|he hyldo þurfan|þearf ; 
 he mæg|magan wit ærendian toh|to þæm|þam|se alwaldan , 
 heofoncyninge . ic mæg|magan heonan geseon 
 hwær he self siteð , ( þæt|se wesan|seon|is suþ and east ) , 
 wela bewindan , se þes|se weorold gesceppan ; 
 geseon ic him|hi|he hit|his|he engel ymbe|ymb hweorfan 
 mid feðerhaman , eall|eal folc micel , 
 wereda wynsumast . hwæt|hwa magan me|ic swelc gewitan gifan , 
 gif hit gegnunga god nesan|neh|ne onsendan , 
 heofon waldend gewinnan|geblandan gehyran mæg|magan ic rum 
 and swa wid geseon on|an weorold ealle|eall|eal 
 ofer þes side|sid gesceaft , ic mæg|magan swegl|swegel gamen 
 gehyran on|an heofnum . wearð me|ic on|an hige sunnan|leoht 
 utan and innan , siðþan ic se ofætes onbat . 
 nu habban ic hit|his|he heran|her on|an hand , herra se god ; 
 gifu|gifan ic hit þu|þe|se georne|geornan|georn . ic gelyfan þæt|se hit from|fram god cuman|come , 
 bringan from|fram hit|his|he bysen , se me|ic þes bodian|boda|bod sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 wær word . hit nesan wuhte gelic 
 elles on|an eorþ|eorðe , butan swa þes ar sægeð , 
 þæt|se hit gegnunga from|fram god cuman|come . " 
 hio sprecan him|hi|he þicce toh|to and spannan he eall|eal dæg 
 on|an þu|þa|se dimm dæd þæt|se hi|heo drihten hira|hi|heore 
 willan|willa brecan . standan se wrað bodian|boda|bod , 
 leсgan|lecgan him|hi|he lust on|an and mid list spannan , 
 fylgan him|hi|he frecne|frecen|frec ; wesan|seon|beon se feond full neah 
 þu|þe|se on|an þu|þa|se frecne fyrd gefaran|faran habban 
 ofer lang wegan|weg ; leode|leodan|leod hycgan 
 on|an þæt|se micel morð , mann forweorpan , 
 forlæran and forlædan , þæt|se hi|heo lænan|læn god , 
 ælmihtig gifu|gifan anforlætan , 
 heofenrices geweald . hwæt#2 , se hellsceaða 
 gearu witan|wist þæt|se hi|heo god yrre|irre 
 habban sculan and hellgeþwing , 
 se nearu|nearo nið , nied onfon , 
 siððan hi|heo gebod god forbrecan habban , 
 þu|þa|se he forlæran mid ligenwordum 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se unræde ides sciene , 
 wifian|wif wlitegost , þæt|se heo on|an hit|his|he willan|willa sprecan ; 
 wesan|seon|beon hire|heo on|an helpan handweorc god 
 toh|to forlæranne . 
 heo sprecan þe|þa|ða|se toh|to adame ides sceonost 
 ful þiclice , oþ|oð þæm|þam|se þegn|þegen onginnan 
 hit|his|he hige hweorfan , þæt|se he þæm|þam|se gehatan|gehat getruwian 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he þæt|se wif word sægan|seсgan|secgan . 
 heo dydan|don hit þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þurh hold hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , nytan þæt|se þær hearma swa fela , 
 fyrenearfeða , fylgean sculan 
 mann cynn , se heo on|an mod geniman 
 þæt|se heo se lað boda lar hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 acan|ac wendan|wenan þæt|se heo hyldo heofoncyninges 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan mid þæm|þam|se word þu|þe|se heo þæm|þam|se werian|wer swelce 
 tacn|tacen|tacan oðiewde and treowe|treow hettan|gehatan , 
 oðþæt adame innan breost 
 hit|his|he hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hwyrfde and hit|his|he heorte onginnan 
 wendan toh|to hire|heo willan|willa . he æt|etan þæm|þam|se wif onfon 
 hell|hel and hinnsið , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hit nesan hatan swa , 
 acan|ac hit ofetes noman aginnan|agan sculan ; 
 hit wesan|seon|beon þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah deaðes swefn and deofol gespon , 
 hell and hinnsið and hæleða forlor , 
 menniscra morð , þæt|se hi|heo toh|to mete|metan|met dædon , 
 ofet unfæle . swa hit him|hi|he on|an innan cuman , 
 hrinan|hran æt|etan heorte , hlihhan|hliehhan|hlehhan þu|þa|se and plegian|plegan 
 bodian|boda|bod bitter|bitor|biter gehugod , sægan|seсgan|secgan begra þanc 
 hearra sin : " nu habban ic þin hyldo me|ic 
 witod gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , and þinne|þin willan|willa gelæstan 
 toh|to ful monegum dæge|dæg . mann synt forlædan , 
 adam and eue . him|hi|he wesan|seon|is unhyldo 
 waldendes witod , nu hi|heo wordcwyde hit|his|he , 
 lar forlætan . forðam hi|heo lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne magan 
 healdan|heald heofonrice , acan|ac hi|heo toh|to hell|hel sculan 
 on|an se sweart sið . swa þu hit|his|he sorh|sorg nesan|neh|ne þurfan 
 beran|bera on|an þin breost , þær þu gebunden|gebindan|bindan liсgan , 
 murnan on|an mod , þæt|se heran|her mann bun 
 se hean|heah heofon , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah witan hearmas nu , 
 þreaweorc þoliað , and þystru|þystre land|finna , 
 and þurh þu|þin micel mod manig forlætan 
 on|an heofonrice heahgetimbro , 
 godlice geard . wit wearð god yrre|irre 
 forðam witan him|hi|he nyllan|nillan on|an heofonrice 
 hnigan mid heafod halig|halga|haleg drihten 
 þurh geongordom ; acan|ac wit gegangan nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 þæt|se witan him|hi|he on|an þegnscipe þeowian willan . 
 forðam wit waldend wearð wrað on|an mod , 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan heard , and we|us on|an hell|hel bedrifan , 
 on|an þæt|se fyr fyllan|fyld|fylan folc micel , 
 and mid hand hit|his|he eft on|an heofonrice 
 rihte|rihtan|riht rodorstol and þæt|se romana forgifan|forgiefan 
 mann cynn . mæg|magan þu|þin mod wese|wesan 
 bliðe on|an breost , forðam heran|her synt butu gedon|gedo|don : 
 ge þæt|se hæleða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn heofonrice sculan 
 leode|leodan|leod forlætan and on|an þæt|se lig toh|to þu|þe|se 
 hatan|hat hweorfan , eacan|eac wesan|seon|is hearm god , 
 modsorg macian|gemacian . swa hwæt#2 swa witan heran|her morðres þoliað , 
 hit wesan|seon|is nu adame eall|eal forgieldan 
 mid hearra hettan|hatan and mid hæleða forlore , 
 mann mid morðes cwealm . forðam wesan|seon|is min|ic mod hælan|gehælan , 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan ymb heorte gerum , ealle|eall|eal synt uncre hearmas gewrecene 
 laðes þæt|se witan lange|lang þoledon . nu willan ic eft þæm|þam|se liсgan|leon near , 
 satan ic þær sec willan ; he wesan|seon|is on|an þære|se sweart hell|hel 
 hæftan mid hring gesponne . " hwerfan|hweorfan him|hi|he eft niðer 
 bodian|boda|bod bitresta ; sculan he þu|þa|se brad ligas 
 sec , hell|hel gehliðo , þær hit|his|he hearra|heah liсgan|licgan , 
 simon sælan|gesælan . sorgedon ba twegen|twa , 
 adam and eue , and him|hi|he oft betuh 
 gnornword gengan ; god him|hi|he ondrædan , 
 hira|hi|heore herran hettan|hatan , heofoncyninges nið 
 swiðe|swiðan onsittan ; self forstandan 
 hit|his|he word onwendan . þæt|se wif gnornian , 
 hof|hebban hreowigmod , ( habban hyldo god , 
 lar forlætan ) , þu|þa|se heo þæt|se sunnan|leoht geseon 
 ellor scriðan þæt|se hire|heo þurh untreowa 
 tacn|tacen|tacan iewan se him|hi|he se teonan gerædan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo hell|hel nið habban sculan , 
 hynða unrim ; forðam him|hi|he higesorga 
 birnan|biernan|beornan on|an breost . hwilum|hwil toh|to gebed feollan|feallan 
 sinhiwan somed , and sigedrihten 
 god gretan and god nemnan , 
 heofon waldend , and he biddan 
 þæt|se hi|heo hit|his|he hearmsceare habban motan , 
 georne|geornan|georn fulgangan , þu|þa|se hi|heo god habban 
 bodscipe abrecan . bær|bar hi|heo geseon 
 hira|hi|heore lichama ; nabban on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna þu|þa|se git|gietan|geotan 
 sælða gesetena , nesan|neh|ne hi|heo sorh|sorg wiht 
 weorc witan , acan|ac hi|heo wel magan 
 libban on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna , gif hi|heo willan lar god , 
 foreweard fremman . þu|þa|se hi|heo fela sprecan 
 sorhworda somed , sinhiwan twegen|twa . 
 adam gemælde and toh|to euan sprecan : 
 " hwæt#2 , þu eue , hæftan|habban yfele|yfel mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian 
 uncer sylfra sið . gesyhst þu nu þu|þa|se sweart hell|hel 
 grædig and gifre gewinnan|geblandan nu þu hi|heo grimman|grimm|grim magan 
 heonane gehyran . nesan heofonrice 
 gelic þæm|þam|se liсgan|leon , acan|ac þes wesan|seon|is land|finna wel|betan , 
 þæt|se witan þurh uncres hearra þanc habban motan , 
 þær þu þæm|þam|se nesan|neh|ne hyran|hierde|hierdan|hieran þu|þe|se wit þes hearm gerædan , 
 þæt|se witan waldendes word forbrecan , 
 heofoncyninges . nu witan hreowige magan 
 sorgian for|faran þes siþ . forðam he wit self bebeodan 
 þæt|se witan wit wite|witan warian sculan , 
 hearma mæstne . nu slitan|slidan me|ic hunger and þurst 
 bitter|bitor|biter on|an breost , se witan begra ær 
 wesan|seon|beon orsorh|orsorg on|an ealle|eall|eal tidan|tid . 
 hu sculan witan nu libban oððe on|an þis land|finna wese|wesan , 
 gif heran|her windan|wind cymð , weste|westan oððe eastan|east , 
 suðan oððe norþan gewinnan|geblandan gesweorc up færeð , 
 cymeð hægl scur hefone getenge , 
 færeð forst on|an gemang , se byð fyrn|fyren ceald . 
 hwilum|hwil of heofnum hatan|hat scineð , 
 blicð þes|þeoh|se beorht sunne|sinnan , and witan heran|her bær standað , 
 unwered wædo . nys wit wuht beforan 
 toh|to scursceade , nesan|neh|ne sceattes wiht 
 toh|to mete|metan|met mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian , acan|ac wit wesan|seon|is mihtig god , 
 waldend wraðmod . toh|to hwon sculan witan weorðan nu gewinnan|geblandan 
 nu me|ic mæg|magan hreowan|hreow þæt|se ic bædan|biddan heofnes god , 
 waldend se god , þæt|se he þu|þe|se heran|her wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan toh|to me|ic 
 of liðum minum|min , nu þu me|ic forlæran hæftan|habban 
 on|an min herran hettan|hatan . swa me|ic nu hreowan|hreow mæg|magan 
 æfre toh|to ald þæt|se ic þu|þe|se minum|min eage geseon . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se sprecan eue eft , ides scienost , 
 wifian|wif wlitegost ; hi|heo wesan|seon|beon geweorc god , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah heo þu|þa|se on|an deofol cræftan|cræft bedroren weorþan : 
 " þu magan hit me|ic witan|wita , wine|win min|ic adam , 
 word þin ; hit þu|þe|se þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah wyrs nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 on|an þin hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hreowan|hreow þonne|se hit me|ic æt|etan heorte deð . " 
 hire|heo þu|þa|se adam andswarian : 
 " gif ic waldendes willan|willa cuðe , 
 hwæt#2 ic hit|his|he toh|to hearmsceare habban sculan 
 ( nesan|neh|ne geseon|gesawan þu no sniomor ) þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah me|ic on|an sæ wadan 
 hettan|hatan heofon god heonone nu þu|þa|se , 
 on|an flod faran , nesan he firnum se deop , 
 merestream se micel , þæt|se hit|his|he o min|ic mod getweode , 
 acan|ac ic toh|to þæm|þam|se grund|grindan gengan|gangan , gif ic god magan 
 willan|willa gewyrcean . nesan me|ic on|an weorold niod 
 ænig þegnscipes , nu ic min þeodnes hafian|habban 
 hyldo forwyrсan|forwyrcan , þæt|se ic hi|heo habban nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan . 
 acan|ac witan þus bær nesan|neh|ne magan butu ætsomne 
 wese|wesan toh|to wuhte . witon gan on|an þes wealdan|weald innan , 
 on|an þes holtes hleo . " hweorfan hi|heo batwa , 
 togengdon gnorngende on|an se grene wealdan|weald , 
 sittan onsundrum|onsundran , bidan selfes gesceapu 
 heofoncyninges , þu|þa|se hi|heo þu|þa|se habban nesan|neh|ne motan 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he ær forgifan|forgiefan ælmihtig god . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo hira|hi|heore lichoman leaf beþeссan|beþeccan , 
 werian mid se wealdan|weald , wæda nesan|neh|ne habban ; 
 acan|ac hi|heo on|an gebed feollan|feallan butu ætsomne 
 morgen gehwilce , biddan mihtig 
 þæt|se hi|heo nesan|neh|ne forgietan god ælmihtig , 
 and him|hi|he gewisade waldend se god , 
 hu hi|heo on|an þæm|þam|se sunnan|leoht forþ|forð libban sculan . 
 þu|þa|se cuman feran frea ælmihtig 
 ofer midd dæg , mære|mæran þeon|þeodan , 
 on|an neorxnawang neod sinnan|sin ; 
 willan neosian nergend usser , 
 bilwit fæder , hwæt#2 hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn dydan|don ; 
 witan|wist forwyrсan|forwyrcan þu|þa|se he ær wlite|wlitan sellan . 
 gewitan|gewita him|hi|he þu|þa|se gangan geomermode 
 under beamsceade blæd bereafian , 
 hydan hi|heo on|an heolstre , þu|þa|se hi|heo halig word 
 drihten gehyrdan|gehyran , and ondrædan him|hi|he . 
 þu|þa|se sona onginnan swegl|swegel aldor , 
 weard ahsian woruldgesceafta , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan him|hi|he recen toh|to romana þeon|þeodan 
 hit|his|he sunu gangan . him|hi|he þu|þa|se self oncwæð , 
 hean|heah hleoðrade hrægles þearfian|þearfa : 
 " ic wreon me|ic heran|her wæda leas , 
 liffrea min|ic , leaf þecce . 
 scyldfull min sceaðen wesan|seon|is me|ic sar , 
 frecne|frecen|frec on|an ferhðe ; nesan|neh|ne durran nu forþ|forð gan 
 for|faran þu|þe|ðe andweard . ic wesan|seon|eoh eall|eal eall|eal nacod|nacian . " 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se ædre god andswarede : 
 " secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan me|ic þæt|se , sunu min|ic , for|faran hwon secest þu 
 sceadan|scead sceomiende gewinnan|geblandan þu sceon æt|etan me|ic 
 furðum nesan|neh|ne anfenge , acan|ac gefea eall|eal . 
 for|faran hwon witan þu wea and wreon sceome , 
 gesyhst sorh|sorg , and þu|þin self þecest 
 liс|lic mid leaf , sagian lifceare 
 hean|heah hygegeomor , þæt|se þu|þe|se wesan|seon|nesan hrægles þurfan|þearf , 
 nymþe þu æppel an byrgan 
 of ðam|se wudubeame þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se word forbeodan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se adam eft andswarian : 
 " me|ic þe|þa|ða|se blæd on|an hand bryd gesellan , 
 freolucu fæmne , freadrihten min|ic , 
 þu|þe|ðe ic þu|þe|se on|an teonan geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon . nu ic se tacn|tacen|tacan weсgan|wegan|weg 
 sweotol on|an me|ic self . witan ic sorh|sorgian|sorg se micel . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se se euan frægn|frignan|fregnan ælmihtig god : 
 " hwæt#2 dreogan þu , dohtor , dugeþa genohra , 
 niwe gesceafta neorxnawang , 
 growendra gifu , þu|þa|se þu gitsian 
 on|an beam grippan|gripe|gripan , blæd niman 
 on|an treowe|treow telga|telg , and me|ic on|an teonan 
 etan þu|þa|se unfreme , adame sellan 
 wæstm þu|þa|se git wesan|seon|beon word minum|min 
 fæstan|fæst forboden gewinnan|geblandan " him|hi|he þu|þa|se freolecu mæg|magan , 
 ides æwiscmod andswarian : 
 " me|ic nædre beswican and me|ic neodlice 
 toh|to forsceape scyhte and toh|to scyldfrece , 
 fah wyrm þurh fægir word , oðþæt ic fracoðlice 
 feondræs gefremian , fæhðe gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 and þu|þa|se reafian , swa hit rihtan|riht nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon , 
 beam on|an bearwe and þu|þa|se blæd æt|etan . " 
 þu|þa|se nædre sceop nergend usser , 
 frea ælmihtig fah wyrm 
 wid siþ and þu|þa|se word cweðan : 
 " þu sculan wideferhð werg þin breost , 
 bearm tredan brad eorþ|eorðe , 
 faran feðeleas , þenden þu|þe|se feorh wunað , 
 gast on|an innan . þu sculan greotan etan 
 þin lifdagas . swa þu laðlice 
 wroht onstellan , þu|þe|se þæt|se wif feoð , 
 hatað under heofnum and þu|þin heafod tredeð 
 fah mid fot sin . þu sculan fiersn sætan 
 tohtan niwe ; tuddor bið gemæne 
 incrum orlegnið wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þenden standeð 
 weorold under wolcn|wolcen . nu þu witan and cunnan , 
 lað leodsceaða , hu þu lifian sculan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se toh|to euan god yrringa sprecan : 
 " wendan þu|þe|se from|fram wynn ! þu sculan wæpnedmen 
 wese|wesan on|an geweald , mid wer egsan 
 heard genearwad , hean|heah þrowian 
 þinne|þin dæd gedwild , deaðes bidan , 
 and þurh wop and heaf on|an weorold cennan 
 þurh sar micel sunu and dohtor . " 
 abeodan eacan|eac adame ece drihten , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma , lað ærende|ærend : 
 " þu sculan oðer eðel secean , 
 wynleasran wiс|wican|wic , and on|an wræc|wrecan hweorfan 
 nacod|nacian niedwædla , neorxnawang 
 dugeðum bedælan . þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is gedal witod 
 lices and sawol|sawel . hwæt#2 , þu laðlice 
 wroht onstellan ; forðam þu winnan sculan 
 and on|an eorþ|eorðe þu|þe|se þin andlifne 
 selfa geræcan , wegan swatig hleor , 
 þinne|þin hlaf etan , þenden þu heran|her libban , 
 oðþæt þu|þe|se toh|to heorte heard gripeð 
 adl unliðe þu|þe|se þu on|an æple ær 
 selfa forswelgan ; forðam þu sweltan sculan . " 
 hwæt#2 , we nu gehyrað hwær we|us hearmstafas 
 wrað onwocan and woruldyrmðo . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se wuldor weard wædum gyrwan , 
 scyppend usser ; hettan|het|hedan|hatan hira|hi|heore sceome þeccan 
 frea frumhrægle ; hettan|het|hedan|hatan hi|heo from|fram hweorfan 
 neorxnawang on|an nearu|nearo lif . 
 him|hi|he on|an last belucan liðsa and wynn 
 hihtfulne ham halig engel 
 be frea hæs fyren sweord ; 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þær inwitfull ænig gefere|gefera 
 womscyldig mann|man , acan|ac se weard hafað 
 miht and strengðo , se þæt|se mære|mæran lif 
 dugeðum deore|deor drihten healdeð . 
 no hwæðre ælmihtig eall|eal willan 
 adame and euan arna ofteon , 
 fæder æt|etan frymþ , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he him|hi|he from|fram swican , 
 acan|ac he him|hi|he toh|to frofor lætan|lettan hwæðere forþ|forð wese|wesan 
 hyrstedne hrof halig|halga|haleg tungol 
 and him|hi|he grundwelan ginne sellan ; 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þæm|þam|se sinhiwum sæ and eorþ|eorðe 
 tuddorteondra teohha gehwilcre 
 toh|to woruldnytte wæstm fedan . 
 gesittan þu|þa|se æfter synn sorgfulre land|finna , 
 eard and eðyl unspedigran 
 freme gehwilcre þonne|se se frumstol wesan|seon|beon 
 þu|þe|se hi|heo æfter dæd of adrifen wurdon|weorþan . 
 onginnan hi|heo þu|þa|se be god hæs 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn astrienan , swa him|hi|he metod bebeodan . 
 adames and euan afor wesan|seon|beon 
 freolicu twegen|twa frumbearn cennan , 
 cain and abel . we|us cyðað bec , 
 hu þu|þa|se dædfruman dugeþa stryndan , 
 wela and witan|wist , willgebroðor . 
 oðer hit|his|he toh|to eorþ|eorðe ellen tilian , 
 se wesan|seon|beon ærboren ; oðer æht healdan 
 fæder on|an fultuman|fultum , oðþæt forþ|forð gewitan 
 dægrimes worn . hi|heo þu|þa|se drihten lacan|lac 
 begen bringan|brengan . breogo|brego engel beseon 
 on|an abeles gieldan eage sin , 
 cyning eallwihta , caines nesan|neh|ne willan 
 tiber sceawian . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon torn werian|wer 
 hefig æt|etan heorte . hygewælm asteah 
 beornan|beorn on|an breost , blatende nið , 
 yrre|irre for|faran æfstum . he þu|þa|se unræden 
 folm gefremian , freomæg ofslean , 
 broðor sinnan|sin , and hit|his|he blod ageat , 
 cain abeles . cwealmdreore swelgan 
 se middangeard , monnes swat . 
 æfter wælswenge wea wesan|seon|beon aræran , 
 trega tuddor . of ðam|se twig siððan 
 leodan laðwende lengan|leng|lange swa swiðe 
 reðe wæstm . ræсan|ræcan wid 
 geond werþeoda wroht telga , 
 hrinan hearmtanas heard and sar 
 drihta bearn , ( doð gieta swa ) . 
 of þæm|þam|se brad blado bealu|bealo gehwilces 
 sprytan onginnan . we þæt|se spell magan , 
 wælgrimme wyrdan|wyrd , wop cwiðan , 
 nales holunge ; acan|ac we|us heard sceþþan|sceon|sceadan 
 freolecu fæmne þurh forma gyldan 
 þu|þe|se wiþ|wið metod æfre mann gefremeden , 
 eorðbuende , siððan adam wearð 
 of god muðe gast eacen|eacan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se word frægn|frignan|fregnan wuldor aldor 
 cain , hwær abel eorþ|eorðe wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se se cystleasa cwealm wyrhta 
 ædre æfter þon|se andswarian : 
 " nesan|neh|ne сinan|cunnan ic abeles or nesan|neh|ne for|faran , 
 hleomæges sið , nesan|neh|ne ic hyrdan|hyran|hirde wesan|seon|beon 
 broðor min . " him|hi|he þu|þa|se breogo|brego engel , 
 godspedig gast gean þingade : 
 " hwæt#2 , befealdest þu folm þin 
 wrað on|an wælbedd wærfæstne rinc , 
 broðor þinne|þin , and hit|his|he blod toh|to me|ic 
 cleopað and cigeð . þu se cwealm sculan 
 wite|witan winnan and on|an wræc|wrecan hweorfan , 
 awyrgan toh|to wid ald . nesan|neh|ne seleð þu|þe|se wæstm eorþ|eorðe 
 wlitig toh|to woruldnytte , acan|ac heo wældreore swelgan 
 halig|haleg of hand þin ; forðam heo þu|þe|se hroðra oftihð , 
 glæmes grene folde . þu sculan geomor hweorfan , 
 arleas of eard þin , swa þu abele weorþan 
 toh|to feorhbanan ; forðam þu flema sculan 
 widlast wrecan , winemagum lað . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ædre cain andswarian : 
 " nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf ic ænigre are|ar wenan|wena 
 on|an woruldrice , acan|ac ic forwyrсan|forwyrcan habban , 
 heofon heahcyning , hyldo þin , 
 lufu|lufe and freogan|freod ; forðam ic last sculan 
 wea on|an wena|wen wid lecgan , 
 hwonne me|ic gemittan manscyldigne , 
 se me|ic feor oððe neah fæhðe gemonige , 
 broðorcwealmes . ic hit|his|he blod ageat , 
 dreor on|an eorþ|eorðe . þu toh|to dæge|dæg þes 
 ademan me|ic fram duguðe and adrifest from|fram 
 eard minum|min . me|ic toh|to aldorbanan 
 weorðeð wrað sum|su . ic awyrgan sculan , 
 þeon|þeodan , of gesiht þinne|þin hweorfan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se selfa oncwæð sigorian|sigor drihten : 
 " nesan|neh|ne þurfan þu þu|þe|se ondrædan deaðes broga , 
 feorhcwealm nu git|gietan|geotan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu from|fram sculan 
 freomagum feor fah gewitan|gewita . 
 gif mann hwelc mund sin 
 ald beneoteð , he on|an cymeð 
 æfter þære|se synn seofonfeald wræc|wracu , 
 wite|witan æfter weorc . " he waldend on|an , 
 tirfæst metod , tacn|tacen|tacan settan , 
 freoðobeacen frea , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan he feond hwilc 
 mid guðþræce gretan durran 
 feorran|feorr|feor oððe neah . hatan þu|þa|se from|fram hweorfan 
 modor and mæg|maga manscyldigne , 
 cnosl sin . him|hi|he þu|þa|se cain gewitan 
 gongan geomormod god of gesiht , 
 wineleas wrecca , and him|hi|he þu|þa|se wiс|wican|wic geceosan 
 eastlandum on|an , eðelstowe 
 fædergeardum feor , þær him|hi|he freolecu mæg|magan , 
 ides æfter æðele eafora fedan . 
 se ærest wesan|seon|beon enos hatan , 
 frumbearn caines . siððan fæder ongon 
 mid þæm|þam|se cneomagum ceaster timbran ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon under wolcn|wolcen weallfæstenna 
 ærest|ær eall|eal þær|se þu|þe|se æðelingas , 
 sweordberende , settan hatan . 
 þanan hit|his|he eafora ærest|ær wocan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn from|fram bryd , on|an þæm|þam|se burhstede . 
 se yldesta wesan|seon|beon iared hatan , 
 sunu enoses . siððan wocan , 
 þu|þa|se se cynn|cyn cneowrim icton , 
 mægburg caines . malalehel wesan|seon|beon 
 æfter iarede yrfe hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 fæder on|an last , oðþæt he forþ|forð gewitan . 
 siððan mathusal mæg|maga dælan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn æfter bearn broðrum sin 
 æðelinga gestreon , oðþæt aldorgedal 
 frod fyrndagum fremman sculan , 
 lif oflætan . lameh onfon 
 æfter fæder dæge|dæg fletgestealdum , 
 botlgestreonum . him|hi|he bryd twegen|twa , 
 ides on|an eðle eafora fedan , 
 ad and sella ; þær|se an wesan|seon|beon 
 iabal noma , se þurh gleaw geþanc 
 herbuendra hearpe ærest|ær 
 hand sin hlyn awehte , 
 swinsigende swegan|sweg , sunu lamehes . 
 swilce on|an se mægþ mæg|mecgan|magian|maga wesan|seon|beon hatan 
 on|an þu|þa|se ilca tidan|tid tubalcain , 
 se þurh snytro spedan|sped smiðcræftega wesan|seon|beon , 
 and þurh mod gemynd mann ærest|ær , 
 sunu lamehes , sulhgeweorces 
 fruma wesan|seon|beon ofer folde , siððan folc birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 ær cuðon and isern , 
 burhsittende , brucan wid . 
 þu|þa|se hit|his|he wif twæman|twegen word sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 lameh seolfa , leof gebedda , 
 adan and sellan unarlic spel : 
 " ic on|an morðor ofslean min sum 
 hyldemaga ; honda gewemman 
 on|an caines cwealm min , 
 fyllan|fyld|fylan mid folm fæder enoses , 
 ordbanan abeles , eorþ|eorðe sellan 
 wældreor wer . witan ic gearu 
 þæt|se þæm|þam|se lichryre on|an last cymeð 
 soðcyninges seofonfeald wræc|wracu , 
 micel æfter mane . min|ic sculan swiðe 
 mid grimman|grimm|grim gryre gieldan wurðan 
 fyllan and feorhcwealm , þonne|se ic forþ|forð scio . " 
 þu|þa|se wearð adame on|an abeles gyldan 
 eafora on|an eðle oþer|oðer fedan , 
 soþfæst sunu , þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|beon seth noma . 
 se wesan|seon|beon eadig and hit|his|he yldrum ðah 
 freolic toh|to frofor , fæder and modor ; 
 adames and euan , wesan|seon|beon abeles gieldan 
 on|an woruldrice . þu|þa|se word acwæð 
 ord moncynnes : " me|ic ece sellan 
 sunu selfa sigorian|sigor waldend , 
 lifes|lif aldor on|an leof stælan|stelan , 
 se þu|þe|se cain ofslean , and me|ic cearsorge 
 mid þis magotimbre of mod asceaf 
 þeon|þeodan usser . him|hi|he se þanc wesan|seon|nesan ! " 
 adam habban , þu|þa|se he eft onginnan 
 him|hi|he toh|to eðulstæfe oðres strienan 
 bearn be bryd , beornan|beorn|beirnan ellenrof , 
 xxx and hund þes lifes|lif , 
 wintra|winter on|an weorold . we|us gewrit secgað 
 þæt|se heran|her eahtahund ieсan|iecan siððan 
 mægðum and mæcgum mægburg sinnan|sin 
 adam on|an eorþ|eorðe ; eall|eal habban 
 nigenhund wintra|winter 
 and xxx eacan|eac , þu|þa|se he þes weorold 
 þurh gastgedal ofgyfan sculan . 
 him|hi|he on|an last seth leodan|leod weardian , 
 eafora æfter yldrum ; eþelstol healdan 
 and wif begietan|begeotan . wintra|winter habban 
 fif and hundteontig|1000 þu|þa|se heo furðum onginnan 
 hit|his|he mægburge mann geicean 
 sunu and dohtor . sethes eafora 
 se yldesta wesan|seon|beon enos hatan ; 
 se nemnan god niðþa bearn 
 ærest|ær eall|eal , siððan adam stæppan|steppan 
 on|an grene græs gast geweorðad . 
 seth wesan|seon|beon gesælig ; siððan stryndan|strynd 
 seofon winter heran|her sunu and dohtor 
 and eahtahund . eall|eal habban 
 twelf and nigonhund , þu|þa|se seon|seo|se tidan|tid gewearð 
 þæt|se he friðgedal fremman sculan . 
 him|hi|he æfter healdan , þu|þa|se he of weorold gewitan , 
 enos yrfe , siððan eorþ|eorðe swelgan 
 sædberendes sethes lice . 
 he wesan|seon|beon leof god and libban heran|her 
 wintra|winter hundnigontig ær he be wif heran|her 
 þurh gebedscipe birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn astrynde ; 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se cennan wearð cainan ærest|ær 
 eafora on|an eðle . siððan eahtahund 
 and fiftyno on|an friðo drihten 
 gleawferhð hæleð geogoðe stryndan|strynd , 
 sunu and dohtor ; sweltan , þu|þa|se he habban , 
 frod fyrnwita , fif and nigonhund . 
 þære|se cneoris wesan|seon|beon cainan siððan 
 æfter enose aldordema , 
 weard and wisian|wis . wintra|winter habban 
 efne|efnan|efen hundseofontig ær him|hi|he sunu wæcnan|wacan . 
 þu|þa|se wearð on|an eðle eafora fedan , 
 mago cainanes , malalehel wesan|seon|beon hatan . 
 siððan eahtahund æðelinga riman|rim 
 and feowertig eacan|eac feorh geicte 
 enoses sunu . eall|eal nigonhund 
 wintra|winter habban þu|þa|se he weorold ofgiefan 
 and tynan|tin eacan|eac , þu|þa|se hit|his|he tiddæge 
 under rodera rum riman|rim wesan|seon|beon gefyllan|fyllan . 
 him|hi|he on|an last healdan land|finna and yrfe 
 malalehel siððan missere worn . 
 se frumgara fif and sixtig 
 wintra|winter habban þu|þa|se he be wif onginnan 
 bearn strynan . him|hi|he bryd sunu 
 meowle toh|to mann bringan|brengan . se mæg|mecgan|magian|maga wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an hit|his|he mægþ , min gefræge , 
 guma on|an geogoðe , iared hatan . 
 libban siððan and lissa brucan 
 malalehel lange|lang , mondreama heran|her , 
 woruldgestreona . wintra|winter habban 
 fif and hundnigontig , þu|þa|se he forþ|forð gewitan , 
 and eahtahund ; eafora læfan 
 land|finna and leodweard . long|lange siððan 
 geared guma gold brittade . 
 se eorl wesan|seon|beon æðele , æfæst hæleð , 
 and se frumgar hit|his|he freomagum leof . 
 fif and hundteontig|1000 on|an fyore libban 
 wintra|winter gebidenra on|an woruldrice 
 and sixtig eacan|eac þu|þa|se seon|seo|se sælan|sæl gewearð 
 þæt|se hit|his|he wif sunu on|an weorold bringan|brengan ; 
 se eafora wesan|seon|beon enoc hatan , 
 freolic frumbearn . fæder heran|her þu|þa|se git 
 hit|his|he cynn|cyn forþ|forð cneorim icte , 
 eafora eahtahund ; eall|eal habban 
 fif and sixtig , þu|þa|se he forþ|forð gewitan , 
 and nigonhund eacan|eac nihtgerimes , 
 wine|win frod winter , þu|þa|se he þes weorold ofgiefan 
 and geared þu|þa|se gleaw læfan 
 land|finna and leodweard , leof rinc . 
 enoch siððan ealdordom ahebban , 
 freoðosped folc wisian|wis , nalles fealle|feallan lætan|lettan 
 don|dom and drihtscipe , 
 þenden he hyrdan|hyran|hirde wesan|seon|beon heafodmæg . 
 brucan blæddaga , bearn stryndan|strynd 
 þreohund wintra|winter . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon þeon|þeodan hold , 
 rodera waldend . se rinc heonan 
 on|an lichoman lisse sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 drihten duguðe , nales deaðe sweltan 
 middangeard , swa heran|her mann don , 
 geong|gangan and eald , þonne|se him|hi|he god hira|hi|heore 
 æht and ætwist eorþ|eorðe gestreona 
 on|an genimeð and hira|hi|heore aldor somed , 
 acan|ac he cwic gewitan mid cyning engel 
 of þes lænan lif feran 
 on|an þæm|þam|se gearu þu|þe|se hit|his|he gast onfon 
 ær he toh|to mann modor bringan|brengan . 
 he þæm|þam|se yldestan eafora læfan 
 folc , frumbearne . fif and sixtig 
 wintra|winter habban þu|þa|se he weorold ofgiefan , 
 and eacan|eac þri hund|1000 . þrage siððan 
 mathusal healdan mæg|mecgan|magian|maga yrfe , 
 se on|an lichoman lengest|lengan|lange þissa 
 worulddreama brucan . worn gestrynan 
 ær hit|his|he swyltdæge sunu and dohtor ; 
 habban frod hæle|hælan|helan , þu|þa|se he from|fram sculan 
 niþþe|niþþas hweorfan , nigonhund wintra|winter 
 and hundseofontig toh|to . sunu æfter healdan , 
 lamech leodgeard , lange|lang siððan 
 weorold bryttade . wintra|winter habban 
 twegen|twa and hundteontig|1000 þu|þa|se seon|seo|se tidan|tid gewearð 
 þæt|se se eorl onginnan æðele cennan , 
 sunu and dohtor . siððan libban 
 fif and hundnigontig , frea moniges brucan 
 wintra|winter under wolcn|wolcen , werod aldor , 
 and fif hund|1000 eacan|eac ; healdan þæt|se folc tela , 
 bearn stryndan|strynd , him|hi|he byras wocan , 
 eafora and ides . he se yldestan 
 noe nemnan , se niððum ær 
 land|finna bryttade siððan lamech gewitan . 
 habban æðelinga aldorwisa 
 fif hund|1000 wintra|winter þu|þa|se he furðum onginnan 
 bearn strynan , se þu|þe|se bec cweðan . 
 seman wesan|seon|beon hatan sunu noes 
 se yldesta , oðer cham , 
 þridda iafeth . þeod tymdon 
 rum under roderum , riman|rim miclade 
 mann mægþ geond middangeard 
 sunu and dohtor . þe|þa|ða|se git|gietan|geotan wesan|seon|beon sethes cynn , 
 leof leodfruman on|an lufu|lufe swiðe|swiðan 
 drihten dyre and domeadig , 
 oðþæt birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god bryd onginnan 
 on|an caines cynn sec , 
 werig folc , and him|hi|he þær wif сeosan|ceosan 
 ofer metod est mann eafora , 
 scyldfulra mægþ scyne and fæger . 
 þu|þa|se reordade rodor waldend 
 wrað moncynne and þu|þa|se word cweðan ; 
 " nesan|neh|ne syndon me|ic on|an ferhðe freoh|freogan|freo from|fram gewitene 
 cneorisn caines , acan|ac me|ic þæt|se cynn hafað 
 sar abelgan . nu me|ic sethes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 torn niwiað and him|hi|he toh|to nimað 
 mægeð toh|to gemæccum min feond ; 
 þær wifian|wif wlite|wlitan onwadan grome , 
 ides ansien , and ece feond 
 folcdriht wer , þu|þa|se ær on|an friðe wesan|seon|beon . " 
 siððan hundtwelftig geteled riman|rim 
 wintra|winter on|an weorold wræc|wrecan bisgian 
 fæge|fægan þeod , hwonne frea willan 
 on|an wærloga wite|witan settan 
 and on|an deað slean dæd scyldige 
 gigantmæcgas , god unleofe , 
 micel mansceaðan , metod laðe . 
 þu|þa|se geseon selfa sigoro waldend 
 hwæt#2 wesan|seon|beon mann manes on|an eorþ|eorðe 
 and þæt|se hi|heo wesan|seon|beon womm ðriste , 
 inwitfulle . he þæt|se unfæger 
 wer cneoris gewrecan þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 forgripan gumcynne grimman|grimm|grim and sar , 
 heard miht . hreowan|hreaw he swiðe|swiðan 
 þæt|se he folcmægþa fruma aweссan , 
 æðelinga ord , þu|þa|se he adam sceop , 
 cweðan þæt|se he willan for|faran wer synn 
 eall|eal aæðan þæt|se on|an eorþ|eorðe wesan|seon|beon , 
 forleosan liс|lician gehwilc þær|se þu|þe|se lifes|lif gast 
 fæðmum þeссean|þeссan|þeccan . eall|eal þæt|se frea willan 
 on|an se toweard tidan|tid acwellan 
 þu|þe|se þu|þa|se nealæсan|nealæcan niðða bearn . 
 noe wesan|seon|beon god , nergende leof , 
 swiðe|swiðan gesælig , sunu lameches , 
 domfæst and gedefe . drihten witan|wist 
 þæt|se se æðelinges ellen dugan 
 breostgehygdum ; forðam him|hi|he breogo|brego sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 halig æt|etan hleoðre , helm allwihta , 
 hwæt#2 he fah wer fremman willan ; 
 geseon unriht eorþ|eorðe full|ful , 
 side|sid sælwongas synn gehladene , 
 widlum gewemman . þu|þa|se waldend sprecan , 
 nergend usser , and toh|to noe cweðan : 
 " ic willan mid flod folc acwellan 
 and cynn gehwilc cucra wuhta , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se lyft and flod lædað and fedað , 
 feoh and fugol . þu sculan frið habban 
 mid sunu þin , þonne sweart wæter , 
 woh wælstreamas werod|weorod swelgað , 
 sceaðum scyldfullum . ongyn þu|þe|se scip wyrcan , 
 merehus micel . on|an þæm|þam|se þu monegum sculan 
 restan geryman , and rihte|rihtan|riht setl 
 ælc æfter agen eorþ|eorðe tudor . 
 gescype scylfan on|an scip bosm . 
 þu þæt|se fær gewyrc fiftig wid , 
 ðrittiges heah þreohund lang 
 elngemeta , and wiþ|wið yða gewyrc 
 gefegan fæstan|fæst . þær sculan fæsl wese|wesan 
 cwiclifigendra cynn gehwilces 
 on|an þæt|se wudufæsten wocor lædan|gelædan 
 eorþ|eorðe tudor ; earc sculan þywan|þy|þe|se micel|mare|mara . " 
 noe fremman|fremede swa he nergend hatan , 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg heofoncyninge , 
 onginnan ofostlice þæt|se hof|hebban wyrcan , 
 micel merecieste . mæg|maga sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon þrealic þingan|þing þeod toweard , 
 reðe wite|witan . hi|heo nesan|neh|ne reссan|reccan|recan se ! 
 geseon þu|þa|se ymb wintra|winter worn wærfæst metod 
 geofonhusa micel gearu|gearo hlifigean , 
 innan and utan eorþ|eorðe lim 
 gefæstnian|fæstnian wiþ|wið flod , fær noes , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se selestan . þæt|se wesan|seon|is syndrig cynn ; 
 simble bið þywan|þy|þe|se heard þu|þe|se hit hreoh wæter , 
 sweart sæstreamas swiðe beatað . 
 þe|þa|ða|se toh|to noe cweðan nergend usser : 
 " ic þu|þe|se se min , mann leofost , 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gesylle , þæt|se þu wegan|weg niman 
 and feorh fæsl þu|þe|se þu ferian sculan 
 geond deop wæter dægrimes worn 
 on|an lides bosm . lædan , swa ic þu|þe|se hatan|hat , 
 under earce bord eafora þin , 
 frumgaran þri , and ge|eower feower wif , 
 and þu seofone geniman on|an þæt|se sundreced 
 tudor gehwilces geteled rim , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se toh|to mete|metan|met mann lifian , 
 and þær|se oðerra ælc twegen|twa . 
 swilce þu of eall|eal eorþ|eorðe wæstm 
 witan|wist under wægbord werod|weorod gelædan , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se mid sceolon mereflod nesan . 
 fedan freolice feorh wocre 
 oþ|oð ic þære|se laf lagosiða eft 
 rædan|reord under roderum ryman willan . 
 gewitan þu nu mid hiwan|hiw on|an þæt|se hof|hebban gangan , 
 gast werod|weorod . ic þu|þe|se god witan , 
 fæsthydigne ; þu wesan|seon freoðo weorþ , 
 arian|ar mid eafora . ic on|an andwlitan|andwlita 
 nu ofor seofon niht|neaht sigan lætan|læt 
 wællregn ufan wid eorþ|eorðe . 
 feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag fæhðe ic willan 
 on|an wer stælan and mid wægþreate 
 æht and agend eall|eal acwellan 
 þu|þa|se beutan beoð earce bord 
 þonne|se sweart racu stigan onginneð . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se noe gewitan , swa he nergend hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 under earce bord eafora lædan , 
 wer on|an wægþæl and hira|hi|heore wif somed ; 
 and eall|eal þæt|se toh|to fæsl frea ælmihtig 
 habban willan under hrof gefaran 
 toh|to hira|hi|heore ætgifan , swa him|hi|he ælmihtig 
 werod drihten þurh hit|his|he word abeodan . 
 him|hi|he on|an hon belucan heofonrices weard 
 merehuses muð mund sin , 
 sigorian|sigor waldend , and segnade 
 earce innan agen sped 
 nergend usser . noe habban , 
 sunu lameches , syxhund wintra|winter 
 þu|þa|se he mid bearn under bord gestigan , 
 gleaw mid geogoðe , be god hæs , 
 dugeðum dyrum . drihten sendan 
 regn from|fram roderum and eacan|eac rum lætan|lettan 
 willeburnan on|an weorold þringan 
 of æder gehwære , egorstreamas 
 sweart swogan . sæ up stigan 
 ofer stæðweallas . strang wesan|seon|beon and reðe 
 se þu|þe|ðe wæter wealdan ; wreon and þeссean|þeссan|þeccan 
 manfæhðu birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn middangeard 
 wonnan wegan , wer eðelland ; 
 hof|hebban hergian , hygeteonan wræc|wrecan 
 metod on|an mann . merian|mere swiðe|swiðan gripan|grap 
 on|an fæge|fægan folc feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag , 
 nihtian|niht|neaht oðer swilc . nið wesan|seon|beon reðe , 
 wællgrim wer , wuldorcyning . 
 yða wrecan arleas feorh 
 of flæschoman . flod ealle|eall|eal wreon , 
 hreoh under heofon heah beorg 
 geond sid grund and on|an sund ahebban 
 earce from|fram eorþ|eorðe and þu|þa|se æðele mid , 
 þu|þa|se segnade selfa drihten , 
 scyppend usser , þu|þa|se he þæt|se scip belucan . 
 siððan wid ridan|rad wolcn|wolcen under 
 ofer holm hrincg hof|hebban seleste , 
 for|faran mid fearm . fær nesan|neh|ne motan 
 wægliðendum wæter broga 
 hæst hrinan , acan|ac hi|heo halig god 
 ferian and nerian . fiftena standan 
 deop ofer dun se drenceflod 
 monnes eln|ellen . þæt|se wesan|seon|is mære wyrdan|wyrd ! 
 þæm|þam|se æt|etan niehsta wesan|seon|beon nan toh|to gedaled , 
 nymþe heo wesan|seon|beon ahebban on|an þu|þa|se hean|heah lyft , 
 þu|þa|se se egorhere eorþ|eorðe tuddor 
 eall|eal acwellan , butan þæt|se earce bord 
 healdan heofon frea , þu|þa|se he halig god 
 ece upp forlætan edmodne flod 
 stream stigan , stiðferhð cyning . 
 þu|þa|se gemunan god mereliðende , 
 sigorian|sigor waldend sunu lameches 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se wocre þu|þe|se he wiþ|wið wæter|wæt belucan , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma , on|an lides bosm . 
 gelædan þu|þa|se wigend werod drihten 
 word ofer widland . willflod onginnan 
 lytligan eft . lago ebbade , 
 sweart under swegl|swegel . habban soð metod 
 eafora egstream eft gecyrran 
 torht ryne , regn stillan|gestillan . 
 for|faran famig scip fiftig and hund 
 nihtian|niht|neaht under roderum , siððan nægledbord , 
 fær seleste , flod up ahebban , 
 oðþæt rimgetæl reðre þrage 
 dæg|dah|dagian|dag forþ|forð gewitan . þe|þa|ða|se on|an dun gesittan 
 heah mid hlæste holmærna micel , 
 earc noes , þu|þe|se armenia 
 hatene syndon . þær se halig|halgian|halga|haleg bidan , 
 sunu lameches , soð gehat 
 lange|lang þrage , hwonne him|hi|he lifes|lif weard 
 frea ælmihtig frecne siða 
 restan agifan|agiefan , se he rum dreogan 
 þu|þa|se he on|an sunde|sund geond sid grund 
 woh yða wid beran . 
 holm wesan|seon|beon heononweard ; hæleð langian , 
 wægliðende , swilce wif hira|hi|heore , 
 hwonne hi|heo of nearu|nearo ofer nægledbord 
 ofer streamstaðe stæppan motan 
 and of enge ut æht lædan . 
 þu|þa|se fandian forðweard scip , 
 hwæðer sincan sæflod þu|þa|se git 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon under wolcn|wolcen . lætan|lettan þu|þa|se ymb worn daga— 
 se þu|þe|se heah hlioðo horde onfon 
 and æðele eacan|eac eorþ|eorðe tudres— 
 sunu lameches sweart fleoge|fleogan 
 hrefn ofer heahflod of hus ut . 
 noe tellan þæt|se he on|an neod he , 
 gif he on|an þære|se lad land|finna nesan|neh|ne findan , 
 ofer sid wæter sec willan 
 on|an wægþele . eft him|hi|he seon|seo|se wenan|wen geleah , 
 acan|ac se feond gespearn fleotan hreowan|hreaw ; 
 salwigfeðera sec nyllan|nillan . 
 he þu|þa|se ymb seofon niht|neaht sweart hrefne 
 of earce forlætan æfter fleoge|fleogan 
 ofer heah wæter hasu culufran 
 on|an fandunga , hwæðer famig sæ 
 deop þu|þa|se gyte dælan|dæl ænig 
 grene eorþ|eorðe ofgifen habban . 
 heo wid hire|heo willan|willa sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 and rum fleon|fleogan|flean . nohweðere restan findan , 
 þæt|se heo for|faran flod fot nesan|neh|ne magan 
 land|finna gespornan nesan|neh|ne on|an leaf treowe|treow 
 steppan for|faran stream , acan|ac wesan|seon|beon steap hleoðo 
 bewrigen mid wæter . gewitan se wilde fugel 
 on|an æfen earce sec 
 ofer woh wegan , werig sigan , 
 hungri toh|to hand halig|halga|haleg rinc . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon culufre eft of cofa sendan 
 ymb wucan wilde . seon|seo|se wid fleon|fleogan|flean 
 oðþæt heo rumgal restestowe 
 fæger findan and þu|þa|se fot stæppan|steppan 
 on|an beam hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo ; gefeon bliðemod 
 se þu|þe|se heo gesittan swiðe|swiðan werig 
 on|an treowe|treow telga|telg torht motan . 
 heo feðera onsceoc , gewitan fleoge|fleogan eft 
 mid lacu|lac hire|heo , liðend bringan|brengan 
 elebeam twig on|an toh|to hand , 
 grene blædæ . þu|þa|se ongitan|ongietan hraðe 
 flotmonna frea þæt|se wesan|seon|beon frofor cuman , 
 earfoðsiða bot . þu|þa|se git se eadega wer 
 ymb wucan þridda wilde culufran 
 an sendan . seon|seo|se eft nesan|neh|ne cuman 
 toh|to liþan fleoge|fleogan , acan|ac heo land|finna begietan|begeotan , 
 grene bearwas ; nyllan|nillan glæd æfre 
 under salwed bord siððan ætywan 
 on|an þellfæstenne , þu|þa|se hire|heo þurfan|þearf nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon . 
 þu|þa|se toh|to noe sprecan nergend usser , 
 heofonrices weard , halig|halga|haleg rædan|reord : 
 " þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is eðelstol eft ryman , 
 lisse on|an land|finna , lagosiða restan 
 fæger on|an folde . gewitan on|an freðo gangan 
 ut of earce , and on|an eorþ|eorðe bearm 
 of þæm|þam|se hean|heah hofe|hof|hebban hiwan lædan þu 
 and ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se wocre þu|þe|se ic wægþrea on|an 
 liðe nerian þenden lago habban 
 þrymm geþeahtne þridda eðyl . " 
 he fremman|fremede swa and frea hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 stigan ofer streamweall , swa him|hi|he seon|seo|se stefn bebeodan , 
 lust micel , and alædan þu|þa|se 
 of wægþele wrað laf . 
 þu|þa|se noe onginnan nergende lacan|lac 
 rædfæst reðran , and recen geniman 
 on|an eall|eal dælan|dæl æht sin , 
 ðam|se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he toh|to dugeðum drihten sellan , 
 gleaw toh|to þæm|þam|se gieldan , and þu|þa|se god self 
 torhtmod hæle|hælan|helan tiber onsægde , 
 cyninge|cyning engel . huru cuð dydan|don 
 nergend usser , þu|þa|se he noe 
 gebletsade and hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn somed , 
 þæt|se he þæt|se gyldan on|an þanc agifan habban 
 and on|an geogoðhade god dæd 
 ær earnian þu|þa|se him|hi|he eall|eal wesan|seon|beon 
 arian|ar est ælmihtig god , 
 domfæst dugeþa . þu|þa|se git drihten cweðan , 
 wuldris aldor word toh|to noe : 
 " tymað nu and tiedrað , tires brucað , 
 mid gefea fryðo ; fyllað eorþ|eorðe , 
 eall|eal geiceað . ge|eowan|eow wesan|seon|is eðelstol 
 and holm hlæst and heofonfuglas 
 and wilde deor on|an geweald sellan|gesellan|geseald , 
 eorþ|eorðe ælgrene and eacen|eacan feoh . 
 næfre ge mid blod beodgereordu 
 unarlice eowre þicgeað , 
 besmitan mid synn sawldreore . 
 ælc he selfa ærest|ær begrindeð 
 gast dugeðum se þu|þe|se mid gar ord 
 oðer aldor oðþringeð . nesan|neh|ne ðearf he þywan|þy|þe|se edleane gefeon 
 modgeþance , acan|ac ic monnes feorh 
 toh|to slagan sec swiðe micel , 
 and toh|to broðor bana , se þu|þe|se blodgyte , 
 wællfyll wer wæpn|wæpen gespedeð , 
 morð mid mund . monn wesan|seon|beon toh|to god 
 anlicnes ærest|ær gesceapen . 
 ælc hafað magwlite metod and engel 
 þær|se þu|þe|se healdan|heald willan|wil halig þeaw . 
 weaxað and wridað , wilnian brucað , 
 arian|ar on|an eorþ|eorðe ; æðele fyllað , 
 eowre fromcynne , folde sceat , 
 team and tudor . ic ge|eowan|eow treowe|treow se 
 min sellan , þæt|se ic on|an middangeard 
 næfre egorhere eft gelædan , 
 wæter ofer widland . ge on|an wolcn|wolcen se 
 oft and gelome|gelom andgiettacen 
 magan sceawigan , þonne|se ic scurbogan 
 min iewan , þæt|se ic mann þes 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gelæstan , þenden weorold standeð . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon se snotra sunu lamehes 
 of ferian|feran acumen flod on|an last 
 mid hit|his|he eafora þri , yrfe hyrdan|hyran|hirde . 
 ( and hira|hi|heore feower wif 
 nemnan wesan|seon|beon percoba , olla , 
 olliua , olliuani . ) 
 wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he wærfæst metod , wæter|wæt laf . 
 hæleð hygerof hatene wesan|seon|beon , 
 sunu noes , seman and cham , 
 iafeð þridda . from|fram þæm|þam|se gumrincum 
 folc geludon , and gefyllan|fyllan wearð 
 eall|eal þes middangeard mann bearn . 
 þe|þa|ða|se noe onginnan niwe stefn 
 mid hleomagum ham staðelian 
 and toh|to eorþ|eorðe him|hi|he ætes tilian|tilia ; 
 woh and wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , wingeard settan , 
 sawan sæd fela , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan georne|geornan|georn . 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he wlitebeorht wæstm bringan|brengan , 
 geartorhte gifu|gifan , grene folde . 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se gegan , þæt|se se eadega wer 
 on|an hit|his|he wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wearð wine|win druncen|drincan , 
 swefan symbelwerig , and him|hi|he selfa scufan 
 reofan|reaf of lice swa gerysne nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon : 
 liсgan|licgan þu|þa|se limnacod . he lutan ongitan|ongietan 
 þæt|se him|hi|he on|an hit|his|he inne swa earm gelimpan , 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he on|an hreðre heafodswima 
 on|an se halig|halga|haleg hofe|hof|hebban heorte clyppan . 
 swiðe|swiðan on|an slæpan|slæp sefa nearwode 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan on|an gemynd drepan 
 he hand self mid hrægle wryon 
 and sceome þeccan , swa gesceapu wesan|seon|beon 
 wer and wif , siððan wuldor þegn 
 ussum fæder and modor fyren sweord 
 on|an last belucan lifes|lif eðel . 
 þu|þa|se cuman ærest|ær cam in siðian , 
 eafora noes , þær hit|his|he aldor liсgan|licgan , 
 ferhðe forstelan . þær he freondlice 
 on|an hit|his|he agen fæder are|ar nesan|neh|ne willan 
 gesceawian , nesan|neh|ne þu|þa|se sceon huru 
 hleomagum helan , acan|ac he hlihende 
 broðrum sægan|seсgan|secgan , hu se beornan|beorn|beirnan he 
 restan on|an recede . hi|heo þu|þa|se raðe stæppan|steppan , 
 hira|hi|heore andwlitan|andwlita in bewrigenum 
 under loðum list , þæt|se hi|heo leof mann 
 geoc gefremeden ; god wesan|seon|beon begen , 
 seman and iafeð . þe|þa|ða|se of slæpan|slæp onbrægd 
 sunu lamehes , and þu|þa|se sona ongitan|ongietan 
 þæt|se him|hi|he cynegodum cham nesan|neh|ne willan , 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon are|ar þurfan|þearf , ænig cyþan 
 hyldo and treowe|treow . þæt|se þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg wesan|seon|beon 
 sar on|an mod , onginnan þu|þa|se hit|his|he selfes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 word wyrgean , cweðan , he wese|wesan sculan 
 hean|heah under heofnum , hleomaga þeowan|þeow , 
 cham on|an eorþe|eorþ ; him|hi|he þu|þa|se cwyde siððan 
 and hit|his|he fromcynne frecne|frecen|frec scodon . 
 þu|þa|se nyttade noe siððan 
 mid sunu sin side|sid rices 
 ðreohund wintra|winter þes lifes|lif , 
 freomen æfter flod , and fiftig eacan|eac , þu|þa|se he forþ|forð gewitan . 
 siððan hit|his|he eafora eadan|ead bryttedon , 
 bearn stryndan ; him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon beorht wela . 
 þu|þa|se wearð iafeðe geogoð afeded , 
 hyhtlic heorðwerod heafodmæg , 
 sunu and dohtor . he wesan|seon|beon selfa til , 
 healdan wifcynn|hosp|flet|a romana , eðeldreamas , 
 blæd mid bearn , oðþæt breost hord , 
 gast ellorfus gangan sculan 
 toh|to god dom . geomor siððan 
 fæder flettgesteald freond dælan , 
 swæs and gesibbum , sunu iafeðes ; 
 se team wesan|seon|beon tuddor gefyllan|fyllan 
 unlytel dælan|dæl eorþ|eorðe gesceafta . 
 swilce chames suno cennan wurdon|weorþan , 
 eafora on|an eðle ; þu|þa|se yldestan 
 chus and chanan hatene wesan|seon|beon . 
 ful freolice feorh , frumbearn chames ,
