 chus wesan|seon|beon æðele heafodwisa , 
 wilnian brytta and worulddugeða 
 broðrum sin , botlgestreona , 
 fæder on|an last , siððan forþ|forð gewitan 
 cham of lice , þu|þa|se him|hi|he cwealm gesceod . 
 se magoræswa mægþ sin 
 dom sægan|seсgan|secgan , oðþæt hit|his|he dogora wesan|seon|beon 
 riman|rim aurnen . þu|þa|se se rinc agifan|agiefan 
 eorðcunde eadan|ead , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan oðer lif , 
 fæder nebroðes . frumbearn siððan 
 eafora chuses yrfestole wealdan , 
 widmære wer , swa we|us gewrit secgeað , 
 þæt|se he moncynnes micel habban 
 on|an þæm|þam|se mældagum mægen|magan and strengo . 
 se wesan|seon|beon babylones bregorices fruma , 
 ærest|ær æðelinga ; eðelðrym onhof , 
 ryman and ræran . rædan|reord wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se gieta 
 eorðbuendum on|an gemæne . 
 swilce of cames cneoris wæcnan|wacan 
 wermægða fela ; of þæm|þam|se widfolc 
 cneorim micel cennan wesan|seon|beon . 
 þu|þa|se wearð seman sunu and dohtor 
 on|an woruldrice worn afeded , 
 freoh|freo bearn , ærðon frod сeosan|ceosan 
 winter wælreste werod aldor . 
 on|an þære|se mægþ wesan|seon|beon mann til , 
 þær|se on|an wesan|seon|beon eber hatan , 
 eafora semes ; of þæm|þam|se eorle wæcnan|wacan 
 unrim þeod , þu|þa|se nu æðelingas , 
 ealle|eall|eal eorðbuend , ebrei hatað . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se eastan|east æht lædan , 
 feoh and feorm . folc wesan|seon|beon anmod ; 
 rof rinc sœ̄сan|seсan|secan rum land|finna , 
 oðþæt hi|heo becuman corðrum micel , 
 folc feran , þær hi|heo fæstlice 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , eard geniman . 
 gesettan þu|þa|se sennar sid and wid 
 leode|leoda|leod ræswan|ræswa ; leof mann 
 hira|hi|heore geardagum grene wongas , 
 fæger|fæge folde , him|hi|he forðwearde 
 on|an se dægtid duguðe wesan|seon|beon , 
 wilnian gehwilces weaxan spedan|sped . 
 þe|þa|ða|se þær mann|man manig be hit|his|he mægwine , 
 æðeling anmod , oðer bædan|biddan 
 se hi|heo him|hi|he toh|to mærðe , ær seon|seo|se mengeo eft 
 geond folde birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn tofaran sculan , 
 leode|leoda|leod mægþ on|an landsocne 
 burh gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan and toh|to beacn|beacen torr 
 up aræran toh|to rodortunglum . 
 se þu|þe|se hi|heo geseсan|gesecan sennera feld , 
 swa þu|þa|se foremeahtige folc ræswan|ræswa , 
 þu|þa|se yldestan oft and gelome|gelom 
 liðsum gewunedon ; lar sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 wer toh|to weorc and toh|to wrohtscipe , 
 oðþæt for|faran wlencu|wlencan and for|faran wonhygdum 
 cyðdon cræftan|cræft hira|hi|heore , ceaster wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan 
 and toh|to heofnum up hlædræ ræran , 
 streng stepton stænnene weallan|weall 
 ofer mann gemetan|gemet , mærþu georne|geornan|georn , 
 hæleð mid honda . þu|þa|se cuman halig god 
 wer cneoris weorc sceawigan , 
 beorn burhfæsten , and þæt|se beacen somed , 
 þu|þe|se toh|to roderum up ræran onginnan 
 adames eafora , and se unrædes 
 stiðferhð cyning steore|steoran|steor gefremian , 
 þu|þa|se he reðemod rædan|reord gesette|gesettan 
 eorðbuendum ungelice , 
 þæt|se hi|heo þære|se specan spedan|sped nesan|neh|ne agan . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo gemittan miht spedig , 
 teoche æt|etan torr|toh , getæl|geteal micel , 
 weorc wise|wis , nesan|neh|ne þær wermægða 
 ænig witan|wist hwæt#2 oðer cweðan . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hi|heo gewurðan weallan|weall stænen 
 up forþ|forð timbran , acan|ac hi|heo earmlice 
 heap tohladan , hleoðrum gedælan ; 
 wesan|seon|beon oðere æghwilc worden 
 mægburh fremde , siððan metod tobræd 
 þurh hit|his|he miht|meaht spedan|sped mann sprecan . 
 toforan þu|þa|se on|an feower weg 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ungeþeode 
 on|an landsocne . him|hi|he on|an last buan 
 stiðlic stantorr and seon|seo|se steap burh 
 samod samwyrcan on|an sennar standan . 
 weaxan þu|þa|se under wolcn|wolcen and wriðade 
 mægburh semes , oðþæt mann|man awacan 
 on|an þære|se cneoris , cynebearna riman|rim , 
 þancolmod wer , þeaw hydig . 
 wurdon|weorþan þæm|þam|se æðelinge eafora acennan|acan , 
 in babilone birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn afeded 
 freolicu twegen , and þu|þa|se frumgaran , 
 hæleð higerofe , hatene wesan|seon|beon 
 abraham and aaron ; þæm|þam|se eorlum wesan|seon|beon 
 frea engel begen freond and aldor . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð aarone eafora fedan , 
 leoflic on|an lif , ðam|se wesan|seon|beon loth noma . 
 þe|þa|ða|se magorincas metod geþingan|geþeon , 
 abraham and loth , unforcuðlice , 
 swa him|hi|he from|fram yldrum æðele wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an woruldrice ; forðam hi|heo wid nu 
 dugeðum demað drihtfolca birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 þu|þa|se se mæl wesan|seon|beon mearc agongen 
 þæt|se him|hi|he abraham ides bringan|brengan , 
 wif toh|to ham , þær he wiс|wican|wic agan , 
 fæger and freolic . seon|seo|se fæmne wesan|seon|beon 
 sar hatan , se þu|þe|se we|us secgeað bec . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se wintra|winter fela weorold bryttedon , 
 sincan|sinc ætsomne , sibb|sib healdan 
 gear mengeo . nohwæðre gifeðe wearð 
 abrahame þu|þa|se git þæt|se him|hi|he yrfeweard 
 wlitebeorht ides on|an weorold bringan|brengan , 
 sar abrahame , sunu and dohtor . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se mid cnosl ofer caldea folc 
 feran mid feorm fæder abrahames ; 
 snotor mid gesibbum secean willan 
 cananea land|finna . he cneowmægas , 
 metod gecorene mid siðedon 
 of þære|se eðeltyrf , abraham and loth . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se cynegode on|an carran 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn eard geniman , 
 wer mid wif . on|an þæm|þam|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic hit|his|he 
 fæder abrahames feorh gesellan , 
 wærfæst hæle|hælan|helan ; wintra|winter habban 
 twegen|twa hundteontig|1000 , geteled riman|rim , 
 and fife eacan|eac , þu|þa|se he forþ|forð gewitan 
 missere frod metodsceaft seon|seo . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg sprecan , heofonrices weard , 
 toh|to abrahame , ece drihten : 
 " gewitan þu nu feran and þin faru|faran|fah lædan , 
 ceap toh|to cnosl . carran ofgif , 
 fæder eðelstol . faran , swa ic þu|þe|se hatan|hat , 
 mann leofost , and þu minum|min wel 
 lar hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo , and þæt|se land|finna gesec 
 þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se ælgrene ywan willan , 
 brad folde . þu gebletsad sculan 
 on|an mundbyrde minre|min lifigan . 
 gif þu|þe|ðe ænig eorðbuendra 
 mid wea greteð , ic he wergðo on|an 
 min settan and modhete , 
 longsum nið ; lisse sellan , 
 wilnian wæstm þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se wurðiað . 
 þurh þu|þe|se eorðbuende ealle|eall|eal onfoð , 
 folcbearn freoðo and freondscipe , 
 bliss|blis minre|min and bletsunge 
 on|an woruldrice . wriðende sculan 
 mægþ þinne|þin monrim wese|wesan 
 swiðe|swiðan under swegl|swegel sunu and dohtor , 
 oðþæt fromcyme folde weorðeð , 
 þeodlond manig þin gefyllan|fyllan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se abraham gewitan æht lædan 
 of egipta eðelmearce , 
 gumcystum god , gold and seolfor 
 swiðfeorm and gesælig , swa him|hi|he sigorian|sigor weard , 
 waldend usser þurh hit|his|he word abeodan , 
 ceap from|fram carran ; sœ̄сan|seсan|secan cananea 
 land and leodgeard . þu|þa|se cuman leof god 
 on|an þu|þa|se eðelturf ides lædan , 
 swæs gebedda and hit|his|he suhtrian 
 wif on|an willan|willa . wintra|winter habban 
 fif and hundseofontig þe|þa|ða|se he faran sculan , 
 carran ofgifan and cneowmagas . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se feran gewitan fæder ælmihtig 
 lar gemyndig land|finna sceawian 
 geond þu|þa|se folcsceare be frea hæs 
 abraham wid , oðþæt ellenrof 
 toh|to sicem cuman siþ spedig , 
 cynn cananeis . þu|þa|se he cyning engel 
 abrahame iewan selfa , 
 domfæst wereda and drihten cweðan : 
 " þes wesan|seon|is seon|seo|se eorþ|eorðe þu|þe|se ic ælgrene 
 tudor þin torht willan 
 wæstm gewlo on|an geweald don , 
 rum romana . " þu|þa|se se rinc god 
 wibed wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan and þu|þa|se waldende 
 lifes|lif leohtfruman lacan|lac onsægde 
 gast helm . him|hi|he þu|þa|se git gewitan 
 abraham eastan|east eage wlitan 
 on|an land|finna cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , ( lisse gemunan 
 heofonweardes gehatan|gehat , þu|þa|se him|hi|he þurh halig word 
 sigorian|sigor selfcyning soð gecyðde ) , 
 oðþæt drihtweras duguþ geforan 
 þær wesan|seon|is botlwela bethlem hatan . 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan bliðemod and hit|his|he broðor sunu 
 forþ|forð oferforan folcmæro land|finna 
 eastan|east mid æht , æfæst mann 
 weallsteapan hleoðu , and him|hi|he þu|þa|se wiс|wican|wic сeosan|ceosan 
 þær him|hi|he wlitebeorht wongas geþuhton . 
 abraham þu|þa|se oðere siþ 
 wibed wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan . he þær word god 
 torht cigan , tiber onsægde 
 hit|his|he liffrea , ( him|hi|he se lean agifan|agiefan 
 nalles hneawlice þurh hit|his|he hand metend ) , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se gledstyde gumcystum til . 
 þær ræsbora þrage siððan 
 wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wunian and wilnian brucan , 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan mid bryd , oðþæt brohþrea 
 cananea wearð cynn getenge , 
 hunger se heardian|heard , hamsittendum , 
 wælgrim wer . him|hi|he þu|þa|se wishydig 
 abraham gewitan on|an egypte , 
 drihten сeosan|geсeosan|gecoren|geceosan|ceosan , drohtað sec , 
 fleon|fleogan|flean wærfæst wea ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se wite|witan toh|to strang . 
 abraham maðelode , geseon egypta 
 hornsele hwit and heah burh|burg 
 beorht blican ; onginnan þu|þa|se hit|his|he bryd frea , 
 wishydig wer , word læran : 
 " siððan egypte eage motan 
 on|an þinne|þin wlite|wlitan wlitan wlanc manig , 
 þonne|se æðelinga eorl wenað , 
 mæg|magan ælfscieno , þæt|se þu min|ic wesan|seon|nesan 
 beorht gebedda , þu|þe|se willan|wil beorn sum|su 
 him|hi|he geagnian . ic me|ic onegan mæg|magan 
 þæt|se me|ic wrað sum|su wæpn|wæpen ecge 
 for|faran freondmynde feorh beneotan . 
 secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan þu , sar , þæt|se þu wesan|seon|nesan sweostor min|ic , 
 lices mæge|mæg|magan , þonne|se þu|þe|se leodweras 
 fremde fricgen hwæt#2 wesan|seon|nesan freondlufu 
 ellðeodigra uncer twega , 
 feorran cumenra . þu him|hi|he fæstan|fæst helan 
 soð sprecan ; swa þu minum|min sculan 
 feorh gebeorgan , gif me|ic freoðo drihten 
 on|an woruldrice , waldend usser , 
 on|an ælmihtig , swa he ær dydan|don , 
 lengra lifes|lif . se we|us þes lad sceop , 
 þæt|se we on|an egiptum are|ar sculan 
 freme friclan and we|us freme sec . " 
 þu|þa|se cuman ellenrof eorl siðian , 
 abraham mid æht on|an egypte , 
 þær him|hi|he folcweras fremde wesan|seon|beon , 
 wine|win uncuðe . word sprecan 
 ymb se wif wlite|wlitan wlonce manig , 
 dugeðum dealle ; him|hi|he drihtlicu mæg|magan 
 on|an wlite|wlitan , modig mænegum ðuhte , 
 cyning þegn|þegen . hi|heo þæt|se cuð don 
 hira|hi|heore folcfrean and fægerra|fæger lutan 
 for|faran æðelinge ides sinnan , 
 acan|ac hi|heo sarran swiðe micel , 
 wynsum wlite|wlitan word herian|heredon , 
 oðþæt he lædan hatan leoflic wif toh|to 
 hit|his|he selfes sellan|sele|sel . sinc brytta , 
 æðelinga helm hatan abrahame 
 duguðum stepan . hwæðere drihten wearð , 
 frea faraone fah and yrre|irre 
 for|faran wifmyne ; se wrað ongeald 
 heard mid hiwan|hiw hægstealdra wyn . 
 ongæt hwæðere guma aldor 
 hwæt#2 him|hi|he waldend wræc|wrecan witeswingum ; 
 hatan him|hi|he abraham toh|to egesa geðreadne 
 breogo|brego egipto , and hit|his|he bryd agifan|agiefan , 
 wif toh|to geweald ; hatan him|hi|he wine|win ceosan , 
 ellor æðelingas , oðer dugeðe . 
 abeodan þu|þa|se þeodcyning þegn|þegen sin , 
 ombihtscealcum , þæt|se hi|heo he arlice 
 eall|eal onsundne eft gebrohten 
 of þære|se folcsceare , þæt|se he on|an friðe wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se abraham æht lædan 
 of egypta eðelmearce ; 
 hi|heo ellenrofe ides ferian , 
 bryd and begas , þæt|se hi|heo toh|to bethlem 
 on|an cuðe wiс|wican|wic ceap lædan , 
 eadig eorðwelan oðer siþ , 
 wif and willan|willa and hira|hi|heore woruldgestreon . 
 onginnan him|hi|he þu|þa|se bytlian and hira|hi|heore burh ræran , 
 and sellan|sele|sel settan , salu niwian . 
 wer on|an wonge wibed settan 
 neah þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se abraham æror ræran 
 hit|his|he waldende þu|þa|se weste|westan cuman . 
 þær se eadig eft ecan drihten 
 niwe stefn noman weorðade ; 
 tilmodig eorl tiber onsægde 
 þeodne engel , þancian swiðe|swiðan 
 lifes|lif leohtfruman lisse and arian|ar . 
 wunedon on|an þæm|þam|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , habban wilnian geniht 
 abraham and loth . eadan|ead bryttedon , 
 oðþæt hi|heo on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna nesan|neh|ne magan lengan|leng|lange somed 
 blæd brucan and hira|hi|heore begra þær 
 æht habban , acan|ac sculan arfæst , 
 þu|þa|se rinc þywan|þy|þe|se rumor sec 
 ellor eðelseld . oft wesan|seon|beon teonan 
 wærfæstra wer weredum gemæne , 
 heard hearmplega . þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg onginnan 
 arian|ar gemyndig abraham sprecan 
 fæger|fæge toh|to lothe : " ic wesan|seon|eoh fædera|fæder þu|þin 
 sibgebyrdum , þu min|ic suhterga . 
 nesan|neh|ne sceolon wit betweonan teonan weaxan , 
 wroht wriðian— nesan|neh|ne þæt|se willan god ! 
 acan|ac witan synt gemagas ; wit gemæne nesan|neh|ne sculan 
 elles awiht , nymþe eall|eal tela 
 lufu langsum . nu þu , loth , geþenc , 
 þæt|se wit modig ymb mearc sittað , 
 þeod þrymfæste þegn|þegen and gesiððum , 
 folc cananea and feretia , 
 rof rinc . nesan|neh|ne willað rumor wit 
 landriht hira|hi|heore ; forðam witan lædan sculan , 
 teonwit of þes stow , and wit staðolwangas 
 rumor sec . ic rædan|ræd sprecan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn arones , begra uncer , 
 soð secg . ic þu|þe|se selfes don|dom 
 lif , libban|leof . leornian þu|þe|se seolfa 
 and geþancmeta þin mod 
 on|an hwilce healf þu willan hwyrft don , 
 cyrran mid ceap , nu ic þu|þe|se cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan abeodan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se loth gewitan land|finna sceawigan 
 be iordane , grene eorþ|eorðe . 
 seon|seo|se wesan|seon|beon wæter weaht and wæstm þeccan , 
 lagostreamum sunnan|leoht , and gelic god 
 neorxnawang , oðþæt nergend god 
 for|faran wer synn wylme gesellan 
 sodoman and gomorran , sweart liсgan|leon . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se eard geceosan and eðelsetl 
 sunu arones on|an sodoma burh|burg ; 
 æht sinnan|sin ealle|eall|eal lædan , 
 beah|beag from|fram bethlem and botlgestreon , 
 wela , windan gold . wunian siððan 
 be iordane gear mænego . 
 þær folcstede fæger|fæge wesan|seon|beon , 
 mann arleas , metod laðe . 
 wesan|seon|beon sodomisc cynn synn þriste , 
 dæd gedwolen ; dreogan hira|hi|heore selfra 
 eсe unræd . æfre nesan|neh|ne willan 
 þæm|þam|se leodþeawum loth onfon , 
 acan|ac he þære|se mægþ monwisan fleon|fleogan|flean , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he on|an þæm|þam|se land|finna lifian sculan , 
 facen and fyren , and he fæger|fæge healdan , 
 þeawfæst and geþyldig on|an þæm|þam|se þeodscipe , 
 emn þon|se gelicost , lar gemyndig , 
 þu|þe|se he nesan|neh|ne cuðe hwæt#2 þu|þa|se cynn don . 
 abraham wunian eðeleardum 
 cananea forþ|forð . he cyning engel , 
 metod moncynnes mundbyrde healdan , 
 wilnian wæstm and worulddugeðum , 
 lufu|lufe and lissum ; forðam hit|his|he lof secgað 
 wid under wolcn|wolcen wer cneoris , 
 fullwona birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . he frea hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 est on|an eðle , ðenden he eardes brucan , 
 halig and higefrod ; næfre hleowlora 
 æt|etan edwihtan æfre weorðeð 
 feorhberendra forht and acol , 
 mann|man for|faran metod , þu|þe|se him|hi|he æfter wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 þurh gemynd spedan|sped mod and dæd , 
 word and gewitt , wise|wis þance , 
 oþ|oð hit|his|he ealdorgedal oleccan willan|wil . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic aldor gefrignan elamitarna 
 from folctogan , fyrd gebeodan , 
 orlahomar ; him|hi|he ambrafel 
 of sennar side|sid worude 
 for|faran on|an fultuman|fultum . gewitan hi|heo feower þu|þa|se 
 þeodcyningas þrymm micel 
 sec suþ þanan sodoman and gomorran . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon guðhergum be iordane 
 wer eðelland wid geondsendan , 
 folde feond . sculan forht manig 
 blachleor ides bifian gan 
 on|an fremde fæðm ; feollan|feallan wergend 
 bryd and beah|beagian|beag , bennum seoc . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se togeanes mid guðþræce 
 fife foran folccyningas 
 sweota suðon , willan sodome burh 
 wrað werian ; þu|þa|se wintra|winter twelf 
 norðmonnum ær nied sculan 
 gombon gieldan and gafol sellan , 
 oðþæt þu|þa|se leode|leodan|leod lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne willan 
 elamitarna aldor swiðan 
 folcgestreonum , acan|ac him|hi|he from|fram swican . 
 faran þu|þa|se tosamne . franca wesan|seon|beon hlud , 
 wrað wælherigas . singan|sang se wann fugel 
 under deoreðsceaftum , deawigfeðera , 
 hræs on|an wenan|wena . hæleð onettan 
 on|an mægencorðrum , mod þryðge , 
 oðþæt folcgetrume gefaran|faran habban 
 sid tosamne suðan and norþan , 
 helma|helm þeссean|þeссan|þeccan . þær wesan|seon|beon heard plegian , 
 wælgara wrixl , wigcyrm micel , 
 hlud hildesweg . hand bregdan 
 hæleð of scæðum hringmæled sweord , 
 ecgum dihtig . þær wesan|seon|beon eaðfynde 
 eorle orlegceap , se þu|þe|ðe ær nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 niðes genihtsum . norðmen wesan|seon|beon 
 suðfolcum swican ; wurdon|weorþan sodomware 
 and gomorre , gold brytta , 
 æt|etan þæm|se lindcrodan leof bedrorene , 
 fyrdgesteallum . gewitan feorh hira|hi|heore 
 fram þæm|þam|se folcstyde fleam nergan , 
 secg ofslegene ; him|hi|he on|an swaðe feollan|feallan 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , ecgum ofþegde , 
 willgesiððas . habban wigsigor 
 elamitarna ord wisian|wis , 
 wealdan wælstow . gewitan seon|seo|se wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen laf 
 fæsten|fæstan sec . fynd gold strudan , 
 ahudan þu|þa|se mid here hordburh wer , 
 sodoman and gomorran , þu|þa|se sælan|sæl ageald , 
 mære|mæran ceaster . mægþ siðedon , 
 fæmne and wuduwe , freond beslægene , 
 from|fram hleowstole . hettend lædan 
 ut mid æht abrahames mæg|magan 
 of sodoma burh|burg . we þæt|se soð magan 
 secgan furður , hwelc siððan wearð 
 æfter þæm|se gehnæste , herewulfa sið , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se lædan loth and leode|leoda|leod god , 
 suðmonna sincan|sinc , sigor gielpan|gelpan . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se secg hraðe gewitan siðian , 
 on|an gar laf , se þe|þa|ða|se guðe genesan , 
 abraham sec . se þæt|se orlegweorc 
 þæm|þam|se ebriscan eorle gecyðde , 
 forslean swiðe|swiðan sodoma folc , 
 leode|leoda|leod duguðe and lothes sið . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se inwitspell abraham sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 freond sin ; bædan|biddan him|hi|he fultum 
 wærfæst hæleð willgeðoftan , 
 aner and manre , escol þridda , 
 cweðan þæt|se him|hi|he wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon weorc on|an mod , 
 sorh|sorgian|sorg sarost , þæt|se hit|his|he suhtriga 
 þeownyd þolian ; bædan|biddan him|hi|he þræcrofe 
 þu|þa|se rinc se rædan|ræd ahicgan , 
 þæt|se hit|his|he hyldemæg ahreded weorþan , 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan mid bryd . him|hi|he þu|þa|se broðor þri 
 æt|etan sprecan þære|se sped micel 
 hælan hygesorge heard word , 
 ellenrofe , and abrahame 
 treowe|treow sellan , þæt|se hi|heo hit|his|he torn mid him|hi|he 
 gewrecan on|an wrað , oððe on|an wæl|wel fealle|feallan . 
 þu|þa|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg hatan hit|his|he heorðwerod 
 wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen onfon . he þær wiga findan , 
 æscberendra , xviii 
 and ccc eacan|eac , þeodenholdra , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se he witan|wist þæt|se magan wel æghwylc 
 on|an fyrd wegan fealu linde . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se abraham gewitan and þu|þa|se eorl þri 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he ær treowe|treow sellan mid hira|hi|heore folcgetrume ; 
 willan hit|his|he mæg|magan huru , 
 loth alynnan of laðscipe . 
 rinc waron rof , randas wegan 
 forþ|forð fromlice on|an foldwege . 
 hildewulfas herewicum neh 
 gefaran|faran habban . þu|þa|se he hit|his|he frumgaran , 
 wishydig wer , word sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 þares afera , him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon þurfan|þearf micel 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an twegen|twa healf 
 grimman|grimm|grim guðgemot gystum eowan 
 heard handplegan ; cweðan þæt|se him|hi|he se halig|halgian|halga|haleg , 
 ece drihten , eaðe miht|meaht|magan 
 æt|etan þæm|þam|se spereniðe spedan|sped lænan . 
 þu|þa|se ic neðan gefrignan under nihtscuwan 
 hæleð toh|to hild . hlyn wearð on|an wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic 
 scylda and sceafta , sceotend fyllan , 
 guðflana gegrind ; gripan unfægre 
 under sceotan|sceat wer scearpe gar , 
 and feond feorh feollan|feallan ðicce , 
 þær hlihende huðe ferian 
 secg and gesiððas . sigor eft ahweorfan 
 of norðmonna niðgeteone , 
 æsctir wer . abraham sellan 
 wigan|wig toh|to wedd|wedan , nalles windan gold , 
 for|faran hit|his|he suhtrigan , slean and fyllan|fyld|fylan 
 feond on|an fitt . him|hi|he on|an fultuman|fultum gripan|grap 
 heofonrices weard . here wurdon|weorþan 
 feower on|an fleam , folccyningas , 
 leode|leodan|leod ræswan|ræswa . him|hi|he on|an last standan 
 hihtlic heorðwerod , and hæleð liсgan , 
 on|an swaðe sittan , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se sodoma 
 and gomorra gold berofan , 
 bestrudon stigwitum . him|hi|he þæt|se stiðe gyldan|gieldan 
 fædera|fæder lothes . fleon wesan|seon|beon 
 elamitarna aldorduguðe 
 dom bedrorene , oðþæt hi|heo domasco 
 unfeor wesan|seon|beon . gewitan him|hi|he abraham þe|þa|ða|se 
 on|an þu|þa|se wigrode wiðertrod seon|seo 
 laðra mann . loth wesan|seon|beon ahreded , 
 eorl mid æht , ides hweorfan , 
 wif on|an willan|willa . wid geseon 
 freoh|freo feorhbanan fugol slitan 
 on|an ecgwale . abraham ferian 
 suðmonna eft sincan|sinc and bryd , 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , oðle nior , 
 mægeð hira|hi|heore mæg|maga . næfre mann|man eall|eal 
 lifigendra heran|her lytel werian|weorod 
 þon|se wurðlicor wigsið ateon , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se wiþ|wið swa micel mægen geræsde . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon suþ þanan sodoma folc 
 guðspell wegan , hwelc gromra wearð 
 feond fromlad . gewitan him|hi|he frea leode|leoda|leod , 
 eorlum bedroren , abraham sec , 
 freond feasceaft . him|hi|he ferian mid 
 solomia sinc hyrdan|hyran|hirde ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon se mære melchisedec , 
 leode|leoda|leod bisceop . se mid lacu|lac cuman 
 fyrdrinc fruma fæger|fæge gretan , 
 abraham arlice , and him|hi|he on|an settan 
 god bletsunge , and swa gyddode : 
 " wesan|seon|beon þu gewurðod on|an wer riman|rim 
 for|faran se eage þu|þe|se þu|þe|ðe æsc tir 
 æt|etan guðe forgifan|forgiefan ! þæt|se wesan|seon|is god selfa , 
 se þu|þe|ðe hettendra hergian|here þrymm 
 on|an geweald gebrecan , and þu|þe|se wæpn|wæpen lætan|læt|lædan 
 rancstræte forþ|forð rum wyrcan , 
 huðe ahreddan and hæleð fyllan . 
 on|an swaðe sittan ; nesan|neh|ne magan siðwerod 
 guðe spowan , acan|ac hi|heo god flymde , 
 se þu|þe|ðe æt|etan feohtan mid frumgarum 
 wiþ|wið ofermægnes egsan sculan 
 hand sin , and haleg treow , 
 seon|seo|se þu wiþ|wið rodor weard rihte|rihtan|riht healdest . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se se beornan|beorn|beirnan bletsunga lean 
 þurh hand agifan|agiefan , and se hereteames 
 eall|eal teoðan sceotan|sceat abraham sellan 
 god bisceop . þu|þa|se sprecan guðcyning , 
 sodoma aldor , secg befylled , 
 toh|to abrahame ( him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon arian|ar þurfan|þearf ) . 
 " forgif me|ic mennen min leode|leoda|leod , 
 þu|þe|se þu ahreddest here cræft 
 wer wælclommum ! hafian|habban þu|þe|se windan gold 
 þæt|se ær ongeagn|agen|agan wesan|seon|beon ussum folc , 
 feoh and frætwa ! lætan|læt|lædan me|ic freoh|freogan|freo lædan 
 eft on|an eðel æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 on|an weste|westan wiс|wican|wic wif and cniht , 
 earm wydewan ! eafora syndon dead , 
 folcgesiðas , nymðe fea an , 
 þu|þe|se me|ic mid sculan mearc healdan|heald . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se abraham andswarian 
 ædre for|faran eorlum , ellen gewurðod , 
 dom and sigor , drihtlice sprecan : 
 " ic þu|þe|se gehatan|gehat , hæleða waldend , 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg , þu|þe|se heofon wesan|seon|is 
 and þes eorþ|eorðe agendfrea , 
 word minum|min , nesan woruldfeoh , 
 þu|þe|se ic me|ic aginnan|agan willan , 
 sceotan|sceat nesan|neh|ne scilling , se ic on|an sceotend , 
 þeon|þeodan mære , þin ahreddan , 
 æðelinga helm , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þu eft cweðan 
 þæt|se ic weorþan , willgesteallum , 
 eadig on|an eorþ|eorðe ærgestreonum 
 sodoma rices ; acan|ac þu selfa motan heonan 
 huðe lædan , þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se æt|etan hild geslean , 
 ealle|eall|eal butan dælan|dæl þissa drihtwera , 
 aneres and mamor and escoles . 
 nelle ic þu|þa|se rinc rihte|rihtan|riht benæman , 
 acan|ac hi|heo me|ic fulleodon æt|etan æscþræce , 
 feohtan þu|þe|se æfter frofor . gewitan þu ferian nu 
 ham hyrstan gold and healsmægeð , 
 leode|leoda|leod ides . þu þu|þe|se laðra nesan|neh|ne þurfan 
 hæleða hildþræce hwil onsittan , 
 norðmanna wigan|wig ; acan|ac nefuglas 
 under beorhhleoþum blodig sittað , 
 þeodherga wæl þicce gefyllan|fyllan . " 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se se healdend ham siðian 
 mid þywan|þy|þe|se hereteame þu|þe|se him|hi|he se halig|halgian|halga|haleg forgifan|forgiefan , 
 ebrea leodan|leod arna gemyndig . 
 þu|þa|se gen abrahame eowan selfa 
 heofon heahcyning halig sprecan , 
 trymman tilmodigne and him|hi|he toh|to reordian : 
 " med syndon micel þin ! nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu þu|þe|se þu|þin mod asealcan , 
 wærfæst willan|willa min ! nesan|neh|ne þurfan þu þu|þe|se wiht ondrædan , 
 þenden þu min lar læstan , acan|ac ic þu|þe|se lifian heran|her 
 wiþ|wið wea gehwa wreon and scylde 
 folm minum|min ; nesan|neh|ne þurfan þu forht wese|wesan . " 
 abraham þu|þa|se andswarian , 
 dædrof drihten sin , frægn|frignan|fregnan he dægrime frod : 
 " hwæt#2 gefan þu me|ic , gast waldend , 
 freomanna toh|to frofor , nu ic þus feasceaft wesan|seon|eoh gewinnan|geblandan 
 nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf ic yrfestol eafora bytlian 
 ænig min , acan|ac me|ic æfter sculan 
 min woruldmagas wela bryttian . 
 nesan|neh|ne sellan þu me|ic sunu ; forðam mec sorg dreceð 
 on|an sefa swiðe|swiðan . ic self nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 rædan|ræd ahycgan . gæð gerefa min|ic 
 fægen|fægan freobearnum ; fæstan|fæst mynteð 
 ingeþanc þæt|se me|ic æfter wesan|seon|nesan 
 eafora sinnan|sin yrfeweardas . 
 geseoð þæt|se me|ic of bryd birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn nesan|neh|ne wæcnan|wacan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ædre god andswarian : 
 " næfre gerefa rædað þin 
 eafora yrfe , acan|ac þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 frætwa healdeð , þonne|se þu|þin flæsc ligeð . 
 sceawian heofon , and hyrstan geriman|gerim , 
 rodor tungel , þu|þa|se nu rum hira|hi|heore 
 wuldorfæstne wlite|wlitan wid dælað 
 ofer brad brymu beorht scinan . 
 swilc bið mægburge menigo þinne|þin 
 folcbearnum from . nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu þu|þin ferhð wese|wesan 
 sorh|sorg æsæled . gien þu|þe|se sunu weorðeð , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn of bryd þurh gebyrd cuman , 
 se þu|þe|ðe æfter bið yrfe hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 god mære|mæran . nesan|neh|ne geomrian|geomor þu ! 
 ic wesan|seon|eoh se waldend se þu|þe|se for|faran wintra|winter fela 
 of caldea ceaster alædan , 
 feowera sum , hettan|gehatan þu|þe|se folcstede 
 wid toh|to geweald . ic þu|þe|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon nu , 
 mago ebrea , min sellan , 
 þæt|se sculan fromcynne folde þin , 
 sidland manig , settan|gesettan wurðan , 
 eorþ|eorðe sceat oþ|oð eufraten , 
 and from|fram egypta eðelmearce 
 swa mid niðas on|an twegen|twa nilus sceadeð 
 ( and eft wendeð sæ ) wid romana . 
 eall|eal þæt|se sculan aginnan|agan eafora þin , 
 þeodlanda gehwilc , swa þu|þa|se þri wæter 
 steap stanbyrig stream bewindað , 
 famig flod folcmægða byht . " 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon sarran sar on|an mod , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he abrahame ænig nesan|neh|ne wearð 
 þurh gebedscipe birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gemæne , 
 freolic toh|to frofor . onginnan þu|þa|se ferhðcearig 
 toh|to werian|wer sin word mæðlan : 
 " me|ic se forwyrnan waldend heofon , 
 þæt|se ic mægburge motan þinne|þin 
 riman|rim miclian roderum under 
 eafora þin . nu ic wesan|seon|eoh orwena 
 þæt|se wit se eðylstæf æfre weorðe 
 gifeðe ætgædere . ic wesan|seon|eoh geomorfrod ! 
 drihten min|ic , don swa ic þu|þe|se biddan ! 
 heran|her wesan|seon|is fæmne , freolecu mæg|magan , 
 ides egyptisc , on|an on|an geweald . 
 hatan|hat þu|þe|se þu|þa|se recen restan gestigan , 
 and afanda hwæðer frea willan 
 ænig þu|þe|se yrfewearda 
 on|an weorold lætan þurh þæt|se wif cuman|cuma . " 
 þu|þa|se se eadega wer ides lar 
 geðafode , hatan him|hi|he þeowmennen 
 on|an bedd gan bryd lar . 
 hire|heo mod astigan þu|þa|se heo wesan|seon|beon magotimbre 
 be abrahame eacen|eacan worden . 
 onginnan æfþancum agendfrean 
 halsfæst herian , higeþryðe wegan , 
 wesan|seon|beon laðwendo , lust nesan|neh|ne willan 
 þeowdom þolian , acan|ac heo þriste onginnan 
 wiþ|wið sarran swiðe|swiðan winnan . 
 þu|þa|se ic þæt|se wif gefrignan word cyþan 
 hire|heo mandrihtne mod sorh|sorg , 
 sarferhð sægan|seсgan|secgan and swiðe|swiðan cweðan : 
 " nesan|neh|ne fremman þu gerysnu and rihtan|riht wiþ|wið me|ic . 
 þafian þu gena þæt|se me|ic þeowmennen , 
 siððan agar þu|þe|ðe , ides last , 
 beddreste gestigan , swa ic bena|ben wesan|seon|beon , 
 dreссan dogora gehwa dæd and word 
 unarlice . þæt|se aginnan|agan sculan 
 gif ic motan|mot for|faran þu|þe|se min wealdan , 
 abraham libban|leof . se wesan|seon|nesan ælmihtig , 
 duguða drihten , dema mid wit twih . " 
 hire|heo þu|þa|se ædre andswarian 
 wishidig wer word sin : 
 " nesan|neh|ne forlætan ic þu|þe|se , þenden witan lifiað buan , 
 arna leas , acan|ac þu þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan motan 
 mennen ateon , swa þu|þin mod freoð . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð unbliðe abrahames cwen , 
 hire|heo worcþeowe wrað on|an mod , 
 heard and hreðe , higeteonan sprecan 
 fræcne on|an fæmne . heo þu|þa|se fleon gewitan 
 þrea and þeowdom ; þolian nesan|neh|ne willan 
 yfel and ondlean , se þu|þe|ðe ær dydan|don 
 toh|to sarran , acan|ac heo on|an sið gewitan 
 westen|westan sec . þær hi|heo wuldor þegn , 
 engel drihten on|an gemittan 
 geomormode , se hi|heo georne|geornan|georn frægn|frignan|fregnan : 
 " hwider fundian þu , feasceaft ides , 
 siþ dreogan gewinnan|geblandan þec sar agan|ac . " 
 heo him|hi|he ædre andswarian : 
 " ic fleon|fleogan|flean wea , wanian|wana wilnian gehwilces , 
 hlæfdige hettan|hatan , hean|heah of wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , 
 trega and teonan . nu sculan tearighleor 
 on|an westen|westan witod bidan , 
 hwonne of heorte hunger oððe wulf 
 sawol|sawel and sorh|sorg somed abregde . " 
 hire|heo þu|þa|se se engel andswarian : 
 " nesan|neh|ne cearu þu feor heonan fleam dælan 
 somwist incre , acan|ac þu sec eft , 
 earnian|earn þu|þe|se arian|ar , eaðmod ongin 
 dreogan æfter dugeðum , wesan drihtenhold . 
 þu sculan , agar , abrahame sunu 
 on|an weorold bringan . ic þu|þe|se word nu 
 minum|min secg , þæt|se se magorinc sculan 
 mid yld wese|wesan ismahel hatan . 
 se bið unhyre , orlæggifre , 
 and wiðerbreca wer cneoris , 
 mæg|maga sin ; he manig 
 on|an wrað winnað mid wæpenþræce . 
 of þæm|þam|se frumgaran folc awæcniað , 
 þeodan|þeod unmæte . gewitan þu þinne|þin eft 
 waldend sec ; wunian|wuna þæm|se þu|þe|se agan ! " 
 heo þu|þa|se ædre gewitan engel lar 
 hire|heo hlaford , swa se halig|halgian|halga|haleg bebeodan , 
 god ærendgast , gleaw sprecan . 
 þu|þa|se wearð abrahame ismael geboren|geberan|beran , 
 efne|efnan|efen þu|þa|se he on|an weorold wintra|winter habban 
 six and hundeahtatig . sunu weaxan and ðah , 
 swa se engel ær þurh hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan word , 
 fæle|feolan freoðoscealc , fæmne sægan|seсgan|secgan . 
 þu|þa|se se ðeoden ymb xiii gear , 
 ece drihten , wiþ|wið abrahame sprecan : 
 " libban|leof , swa ic þu|þe|se læran|lesan , læstan|læst uncre wel 
 treowrædenne ! ic þu|þe|se on|an tid gehwone 
 duguðum steppan|step . wesan þu dæd from|fram 
 willan|willa min ! ic þu|þa|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon forþ|forð 
 soð gelæstan , þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se sellan geo 
 frofor toh|to wedd|wedan , se þu|þin ferhð bemurnan . 
 þu sculan halgian hired þinne|þin . 
 settan sigor tacn soð on|an gehwylc 
 wæpnedcynnes , gif þu willan on|an me|ic 
 hlaford habban oððe hold freond 
 þin fromcynne . ic se folc beon|beo 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde and healdend , gif ge hyrað me|ic 
 breostgehygdum and bebod willað 
 min|ic fullian . sculan mann gehwilc 
 þære|se cneoris cildisc wese|wesan 
 wæpnedcynnes , se þu|þe|se on|an weorold cymð , 
 ymb seofon niht|neaht sigor tacn|tacen 
 geagnian|agnian me|ic , oððe of eorþ|eorðe 
 þurh feondscipe feor adælan , 
 adrifen from|fram duguðum . doð swa ic hatan|hat ! 
 ic ge|eowan|eow treowige , gif ge þæt|se tacn|tacen|tacan gegaþ 
 soðgeleafan . þu sculan sunu aginnan|agan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn be bryd þinne|þin , se sculan burhsittende 
 ealle|eall|eal isaac hatan|hat . nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf þu|þe|se se eafora sceomigan , 
 acan|ac ic þæm|þam|se magorince min syll 
 godcund gifu|gifan gast miht , 
 freondsped fremde . he onfon sculan 
 bliss|blis minre|min and bletsunge , 
 lufu|lufe and lisse . of þæm|þam|se leodfruman 
 brad folc cumað , bregowearda fela 
 rof arisan , rices hyrdas , 
 woruldcyningas wid mære|mæran . " 
 abraham þe|þa|ða|se ofestum leсgan|lecgan 
 hleor on|an eorþ|eorðe , and mid hucse bewindan 
 þu|þa|se hleoðorcwydas on|an hige sin , 
 modgeðance . he se mældæges 
 self nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan þæt|se him|hi|he sar , 
 bryd blondenfeax bringan magan 
 on|an weorold sunu ; witan|wist gearu 
 þæt|se þæt|se wif huru wintra|winter habban 
 efne|efnan|efen hund , geteled rim . 
 he þu|þa|se metod oncwæð missarum frod : 
 " lifge ismael lar swilce , 
 þeon|þeodan , þin , and þu|þe|se þanc weсgan|wegan|weg , 
 heardrædne hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , heorte strang , 
 toh|to dreoganne dæg and niht 
 word and dæd willan|willa þinne|þin . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se fæger frea ælmihtig , 
 ece drihten , andswarian : 
 " þu|þe|se sculan winter frod on|an weorold bringan 
 sar sunu . soð forþ|forð gan 
 weorþ æfter þes wordgemearcum : 
 ic ismael est willan 
 bletsian nu , swa þu bena|ben wesan|seon 
 þin frumbearne , þæt|se feorhdaga 
 on|an woruldrice worn gebiddan|gebidan , 
 tan tudor . þu se tiða beon|beo ! 
 hwæðre ic isace , eafora þin , 
 geonga|geong bearn , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se gen nesan 
 on|an weorold cuman , willian|willa sped 
 dugeða gehwilcre on|an dæg|dah|dag willan 
 swiðe stepan and him|hi|he soð toh|to 
 mod wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon min gelæstan , 
 halig higetreowa , and him|hi|he hold wese|wesan . " 
 abraham fremman|fremede swa him|hi|he se eca bebeodan , 
 settan friðotacen be frea hæs 
 on|an hit|his|he selfes sunu , hatan þæt|se segn wegan 
 heah gehwylc þu|þe|se hit|his|he hina wesan|seon|beon 
 wæpnedcynnes , wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gemyndig , 
 gleaw on|an mod , þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he god sellan 
 soð treowe|treow , and þu|þa|se seolf onfon 
 torht tacn|tacen . wifcynn|hosp|flet|a hit|his|he tir metod , 
 domfæst cyning , dugeðum ieсan|iecan 
 on|an woruldrice ; he him|hi|he se wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan toh|to , 
 siððan he on|an fær furðum magan 
 hit|his|he waldendes willan|willa fremman . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se wif ahliehhan|ahlehhan wereda drihten 
 nalles glædlice , acan|ac heo gear frod 
 se hleoðorcwyde husce beleсgan|belecgan 
 on|an sefa swiðe|swiðan . soð nesan|neh|ne gelyfan|gelifan , 
 þæt|se þære|se sprecan spedan|sped folgian . 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se gehyrdan|gehyran heofon waldend , 
 þæt|se on|an bur ahebban bryd abrahames 
 hihtleasne hleahtor , þu|þa|se cweðan halig god : 
 " nesan|neh|ne willan|wil sar soð gelyfan 
 word minum|min . sculan seon|seo|se wyrdan|wyrd swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 forþ|forð steallian swa ic þu|þe|se æt|etan frymþ hettan|gehatan . 
 soð ic þu|þe|se secg , on|an þes sylfan tidan|tid 
 of ides bið eafora wæcned . 
 þonne|se ic þes ilca oðer siþ 
 wiс|wican|wic gesece , þu|þe|se beoð worngehat 
 min|ic læstan|gelæstan . þu on|an magan|maga wlitan , 
 þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , abraham libban|leof ! " 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se ædre ellorfuse 
 æfter þære|se sprecan sped feran 
 of þæm|þam|se hleoðorstede , halig gast , 
 last leсgan|lecgan , ( him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon sunnan|leoht mæg|magan 
 self on|an gesiððe ) , oðþæt hi|heo on|an sodoman , 
 weallsteape cantwara|burg , wlitan magan . 
 geseon ofer sincan|sinc salu hlifian , 
 reced ofer reada|read gold . onginnan þu|þa|se rodera waldend , 
 arfæst wiþ|wið abraham sprecan , sægan|seсgan|secgan him|hi|he unlytel spell : 
 " ic on|an þes burh|burg bearhtm gehyran , 
 synnig cyrm swiðe|swiðan hlud , 
 ealogalra gylp , yfele|yfel sprecan 
 werod under weall habban ; forðam wærlogona wesan|seon , 
 folc firenian|firen hefig . ic willan fandigan nu , 
 mago ebrea , hwæt#2 þu|þa|se mann don , 
 gif hi|heo swa swiðe|swiðan synn|syn fremmað 
 þeaw and geþanc , swa hi|heo on|an þweorh sprecað 
 facen and inwit ; þæt|se sculan fyr wrecan , 
 swefyl and sweart lig sar and grimman|grimm|grim , 
 hatan|hat and hæst hæðnum folc . " 
 wer basnedon witeloccas , 
 wea under weall , and hira|hi|heore wif somed . 
 duguðum wlanc drihten gyldan|gieldan 
 god mid gnyrne , oðþæt gast helm , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne willan 
 torn þrowigean , acan|ac him|hi|he toh|to sendan 
 stiðmod cyning strang twegen 
 arisan|ar sinnan|sin , þu|þa|se on|an æfentid 
 siþ geseсan|gesecan sodoma ceaster . 
 hi|heo þu|þa|se æt|etan burhgeate beornan|beorn|beirnan gemittan 
 silf|self sittan sunu arones , 
 þæt|se þæm|þam|se gleaw werian|wer geong|gangan þynсan|þyncan 
 mann for|faran hit|his|he eage . arisan|ar þu|þa|se metod þeowan|þeow 
 gast togeanes , gretan gan|eadan 
 cuman|cuma cuðlice , cynn gemunan 
 rihtan|riht and gerisno , and þæm|þam|se rinc beodan 
 nihtfeormunge . him|hi|he þu|þa|se nergendes 
 æðele ærendrecan andswarian : 
 " hafian|habban arna þanc , þær|se þu|þe|se þu wit buan|beodan ! 
 witan be þes stræte|stræt stille|stillan þencað 
 sæl bidan , siððan sunne|sunnan|sunna eft 
 forþ|forð toh|to morgen metod up forlætan|forlædan . " 
 þu|þa|se toh|to fot loth 
 þæm|þam|se giest hnigan|hnah , and him|hi|he georne|geornan|georn beodan 
 restan and gereorda and hit|his|he recedes hlowan 
 and þegnung . hi|heo on|an þanc сeosan|ceosan 
 æðelinges est , gan|eadan sona , 
 swa him|hi|he se ebrisca eorl wisade , 
 in undor edor . þær him|hi|he se æðele gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 gleawferhð hæle|hælan|helan , giestliðnysse 
 fæger|fæge on|an flett , oðþæt forþ|forð gewitan 
 æfenscima . þu|þa|se cuman æfter niht|neaht 
 on|an last dæge|dæg . lagustreamas wreon , 
 þri mid þystre þes lifes|lif , 
 sæ and sidland . cuman sodomware , 
 geong|gangan and eald , god unleofe 
 corðrum micel cuman|cuma acsian , 
 þæt|se hi|heo behabban here mægen 
 loth mid giest . hatan lædan ut 
 of þæm|þam|se hean|heah hofe|hof|hebban halig arisan|ar , 
 wer toh|to geweald , word cweþan|cweðan 
 þæt|se mid þæm|þam|se hæleðum hæman willan 
 unscomlice , arna nesan|neh|ne gyman . 
 þu|þa|se arisan|ar hraðe , se þu|þe|ðe oft rædan|ræd ongitan|ongietan , 
 loth on|an recede , gan|eadan lungre ut , 
 sprecan þu|þa|se ofer ealle|eall|eal æðelinga gedriht 
 sunu arones , snytra gemyndig : 
 " heran|her syndon inne unwemme twegen|twa 
 dohtor min . doð , swa ic ge|eowan|eow biddan 
 ( nesan|neh|ne сinan|cunnan þær|se ides owðer gieta 
 þurh gebedscipe beorn neawest ) 
 and geswicað þære|se synn . ic ge|eowan|eow syll þu|þa|se , 
 ær ge sceon wiþ|wið gesceapu fremman , 
 ungifre yfel yld bearn . 
 onfoð þæm|se fæmne , lætað frið agan 
 gistas min , þu|þa|se ic for|faran god willan 
 gemundbyrdan , gif ic motan|mot , for|faran ge|eowan|eow . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se seon|seo|se mænigeo þurh gemæne word , 
 arleas cyn , andswarian : 
 " þes þinceð gerisne and rihtan|riht micel , 
 þæt|se þu þu|þe|ðe aferige of þes folcsceare . 
 þu þes werðeode wræccan last 
 freond feasceaft feorran|feorr|feor geseсan|gesecan , 
 wineþearfende . willan þu , gif þu motan , 
 wese|wesan usser heran|her aldordema , 
 leode|leoda|leod lareow gewinnan|geblandan " þu|þa|se ic on|an lothe gefrignan 
 hæðne heremæcgas hand gripan , 
 fah folm . him|hi|he fylston wel 
 gystas sinnan|sin , and he of gromra þu|þa|se , 
 cuman|cuma arfæst , clommum abrugdon 
 in under edor , and þu|þa|se ofstlice 
 an gehwilcum ymbstandend 
 folc sodoma fæstan|fæst forsittan 
 heafodsiena . wearð eal herian|here|heran sona 
 burhwarena blind . abrecan nesan|neh|ne magan 
 reðemode reced æfter gistum , 
 swa hi|heo fundedon , acan|ac þær from wesan|seon|beon 
 god spellbodan . habban gistmægen 
 stiðe strengeo , styran swiðe|swiðan 
 werod|weorod mid wite|witan . sprecan word þu|þa|se 
 fæle|feolan freoðoscealcas fæger|fæge toh|to lothe : 
 " gif þu sunu agan oððe swæs mæg|magan , 
 oððe on|an þes folc freond ænig 
 eacan|eac þes ides þu|þe|se we heran|her on|an wlitað , 
 alædan of þes leodbyrig , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe leof wesan|sien|seon|nesan , 
 ofestum micel , and þu|þin ealdor nerian|neh , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þu forweorðe mid þes wærloga . 
 wit hit waldend hatan for|faran wer synn 
 sodoma and gomorra sweart liсgan|leon , 
 fyr gesyllan and þes folc slean , 
 cynn on|an ceastrum mid cwealmþrea 
 and hit|his|he torn wrecan . þære|se tidan|tid wesan|seon|is 
 neah þringan|geþringan . gewitan þu nergean þu|þin 
 feorh foldwege . þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is frea milde . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ædre loth andswarian : 
 " nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic mid ides aldornere min 
 swa feor heonan feðegange 
 siþ gesecan . git|gietan me|ic sibblufan 
 and freondscipe fæger|fæge cyðað , 
 treowe|treow and hyldo tiðiað me|ic . 
 ic witan heah burh heran|her an neah , 
 lytel ceaster . lyfað me|ic þær 
 are|ar and restan , þæt|se we aldornere 
 on|an sigor up sec motan . 
 gif git|gietan þæt|se fæsten|fæstan fyr willað 
 steap forstandan , on|an þære|se stow we 
 gesund magan sæl bidan , 
 feorh generigan . " him|hi|he þu|þa|se freondlice 
 engel arfæst andswaredon : 
 " þu sculan þære|se ben , nu þu ymb þu|þa|se burh sprycst , 
 tiða weorðan . teng recen toh|to 
 þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan ; witan þu|þe|se friðe healdað 
 and mundbyrde . nesan|neh|ne motan wit 
 on|an wærloga wrecan torn god , 
 swebban synnig cynn , ærðon þu on|an sægor þu|þin 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gelædan and bryd somed . " 
 þu|þa|se onettan abrahames mæg|magan 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan . feðe nesan|neh|ne sparian 
 eorl mid ides , acan|ac he ofost forþ|forð 
 last leсgan|lecgan , oðþæt he gelædan 
 bryd mid bearn under burhlocan 
 in sægor hit|his|he . þu|þa|se sunne|sinnan up , 
 folc friðcandel , furðum gan|eadan , 
 þu|þa|se ic sendan gefrignan swegl|swegel aldor 
 swefl of heofnum and sweart lig 
 wer toh|to wite|witan , weallan fyr , 
 se hi|heo on|an ærdagum drihten tynan 
 lange|lang þrage . him|hi|he se lean forgieldan 
 gast waldend ! gripan|grap heahþrea 
 on|an hæðencynn . hlynn wearð on|an ceastrum , 
 cirm arleas cwealm on|an ore , 
 lað cynn|cyn . lig eall|eal forniman 
 þæt|se he grene fond goldburgum in , 
 swilce þær ymbutan unlytel dælan|dæl 
 sid folde geondsendan wesan|seon|beon 
 bryne and broga . bearwas wurdon|weorþan 
 toh|to axan and toh|to yslan , eorþ|eorðe wæstmian|wæstm , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa wid swa þe|þa|ða|se witelac 
 reðe geræcan rum land|finna wer . 
 strudan fyr steap and geap , 
 swogan for|faran , swelgan eall|eal geador 
 þæt|se on|an sodoma burh|burg secg agan 
 and on|an gomorra . eall|eal þæt|se god spillan|spildan , 
 frea mid þywan|þy|þe|se folc . þu|þa|se þæt|se fyrgebræc , 
 leode|leoda|leod lifgedal , lothes gehyrdan|gehyran 
 bryd on|an burh|burg , under bæc beseon 
 wiþ|wið se wælfylles . we|us gewrit secgað 
 þæt|se heo on|an sealtstanes sona weorþan 
 anlicnes . æfre siððan 
 se monlica ( þæt|se wesan|seon|is mære|mæran spell ) 
 stille|stillan wunian , þær hi|heo strang begietan|begeotan 
 wite|witan , se heo word wuldor þegnian|þegn|þegen 
 hyran nesan|neh|ne willan . nu sculan heard and steap 
 on|an þæm|þam|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wyrdan|wyrd bidan , 
 drihten dom , hwonne dogora riman|rim , 
 weorold gewitan . þæt|se wesan|seon|is wundrian|wundor|wund sum|su , 
 þær|se þu|þe|ðe gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan wuldor aldor . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se abraham gewitan ana|an gangan 
 mid ærdæge þæt|se he eft gestandan 
 þær word ær wiþ|wið hit|his|he waldend sprecan 
 frod frumgara . he geseon from|fram folde up 
 wid fleoge|fleogan wælgrimne recan . 
 hi|heo se wlenco onwadan and wingedrync 
 þæt|se hi|heo firendæd toh|to frec wurdon|weorþan , 
 synn|syn þriste , soð ofergeaton , 
 drihten dom , and hwæt|hwa him|hi|he dugeða forgifan|forgiefan , 
 blæd on|an burh|burg . forðam him|hi|he breogo|brego engel 
 wylmhatne lig toh|to wræc|wrecan sendan . 
 waldend usser gemunan wærfæst þu|þa|se 
 abraham arlice , swa he oft dydan|don 
 leof mannan . loth generian , 
 mæg|magan se oðres , þu|þa|se seon|seo|se mænegeo forwearð . 
 nesan|neh|ne durran þu|þa|se dædrof hæle|hælan|helan 
 for|faran frea egesa on|an þæm|þam|se fæsten|fæstan 
 lengan|leng|lange eardigean , acan|ac him|hi|he loth gewitan 
 of burh|burg gangan and hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn somed 
 wælstow fyrr wiс|wican|wic sceawian , 
 oðþæt hi|heo be hliðe heah dun 
 eorðscræf findan . þær se eadega loth 
 wærfæst wunian , waldende leof , 
 dægrimes worn and hit|his|he dohtor twegen|twa . 
 hi|heo don swa ; druncen gan|eadan 
 seon|seo|se yldre toh|to ær on|an restan 
 hira|hi|heore began fæder . nesan|neh|ne witan|wist blondenfeax 
 hwonne him|hi|he fæmne toh|to bryd him|hi|he buan wesan|seon|beon , 
 on|an ferhðcofan fæstan|fæst genearwod 
 mod and gemynd , þæt|se he mægða sið 
 wine|win druncen|drincan gewitan|gewita nesan|neh|ne magan . 
 ides wurdon|weorþan eacen , eafora brohtan 
 willgesweostor on|an weorold sunu 
 hira|hi|heore eald fæder . þær|se æðelinga 
 modor oðer moab nemnan , 
 lothes dohter , seon|seo|se on|an lif wesan|seon|beon 
 winter yldre . we|us gewrit secgeað , 
 godcund bec , þæt|se seon|seo|se gingra 
 hire|heo ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ammon hettan|hatan . 
 of þæm|þam|se frumgarum folc unrim , 
 þrymfæste twegen|twa þeod awacan . 
 oðer þær|se mægða moabitare 
 eorðbuende ealle|eall|eal hatað , 
 widmære cynn , oðer wer nemnað , 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , ammonitare . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se mid bryd broðor arones 
 under abimelech æht lædan 
 mid hit|his|he hiwan|hiw . hæleðum sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 þæt|se sar hit|his|he sweostor wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 abraham word beorgan hit|his|he ald , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se he witan|wist gearu þæt|se he winemaga , 
 on|an folc lutan freond habban . 
 þu|þa|se se þeon|þeodan hit|his|he þegn|þegen sendan , 
 hatan hi|heo bringan toh|to him|hi|he self 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon ellþeodig oðer siþ , 
 wif abrahames from|fram werian|wer lædan 
 on|an fremde fæðm . him|hi|he þær fylste þu|þa|se 
 ece drihten , swa he oft dydan|don , 
 nergend usser . cuman niht self , 
 þær se waldend liсgan|licgan wine|win druncen|drincan . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se soð cyning þurh swefn sprecan 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se æðelinge and him|hi|he yrre|irre hwopan : 
 " þu abrahames ides geniman , 
 bryd æt|etan beornan|beorn . þu|þe|se abregdan sculan 
 for|faran þære|se dæd deað of breost 
 sawol|sawel þin . " him|hi|he symbelwerig 
 synn|syn brytta þurh slæpan oncwæð : 
 " hwæt#2 , þu æfre , engel þeon|þeodan , 
 þurh þu|þin yrre|irre willan ald lætan , 
 heah , beheowan se þu|þe|se heran|her leofað 
 riht þeaw , bið on|an ræde|rædan|ræd fæstan|fæst , 
 modgeþance , and him|hi|he milts 
 toh|to þu|þe|se seceð gewinnan|geblandan me|ic sægan|seсgan|secgan ær 
 þæt|se wif hire|heo word selfa 
 unfricgendum , þæt|se heo abrahames 
 sweostor wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . nabban ic synn wiþ|wið hi|heo , 
 facn ænig fremman gena . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ædre eft ece drihten , 
 soþfæst metod , þurh þæt|se swefn oncwæð : 
 " agifan abrahame ides sinnan|sin , 
 wif toh|to geweald , gif þu on|an weorold lengan|leng|lange , 
 æðelinga helm , aldres recce . 
 he wesan|seon|is god and gleaw , mæg|magan self god sprecan , 
 geseon sweglcyning . þu sweltan sculan 
 mid feoh and mid feorm , gif þu þæm|þam|se frumgaran 
 bryd wyrnan . he abiddan mæg|magan , 
 gif he ofost me|ic ærendian|ærende willan|wil 
 þeawfæst and geþyldig þu|þin abeodan , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þe|se lissa lifigendum git|gietan|geotan 
 on|an dæg|dah|dag lætan|læt duguþ brucan 
 sinc gesund . " þu|þa|se slæpan|slæp tobrægd 
 forht folc weard . hatan him|hi|he fetigean toh|to 
 sprecan sinnan|sin , sped sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 eorlum abimeleh , egesa geðread , 
 waldendes word . wer him|hi|he ondrædan 
 for|faran þære|se dæd drihten hand 
 sweng æfter swefn . hatan self cyning 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se abraham toh|to ofost micel . 
 þu|þa|se reordian romana þeon|þeodan : 
 " mago ebrea , se þu me|ic wylle 
 word secgean , hu gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan ic þæt|se , 
 siððan þu usic under , abraham , þin 
 on|an þes eðelturf æht lædan , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic þus swiðe|swiðan searo renodest gewinnan|geblandan 
 þu ellþeodig usic willan 
 on|an þes folcsceare facn|facen besyrwan , 
 synn besmitan , sægan|seсgan|secgan word 
 þæt|se sar þu|þin sweostor wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 lices mæge|mæg|magan , willan laðlice 
 þurh þæt|se wif on|an me|ic wroht alecgean , 
 ormæte yfel . we þu|þe|se arlice 
 gefeormedon , and þu|þe|se freondlice 
 on|an þes werþeode wiс|wican|wic getæhton , 
 land|finna toh|to lissum . þu we|us leanast nu , 
 unfreondlice freme þancian ! " 
 abraham þu|þa|se andswarian : 
 " nesan|neh|ne dydan|don ic for|faran facn|facen nesan|neh|ne for|faran feondscipe 
 nesan|neh|ne for|faran wiht se ic þu|þe|se wea uðe , 
 acan|ac ic me|ic , guma baldor , guðbordes sweng 
 leodmagum feor lar gebearh , 
 siððan me|ic se halig|halgian|halga|haleg of hyrdan|hyran|hirde frea 
 min fæder fyrn alædan . 
 ic fela siððan folc geseсan|gesecan , 
 wine|win uncuðra , and þes wif mid me|ic , 
 freond feasceaft . ic se færes wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 on|an wena|wen sæt|sittan hwonne me|ic wrað sum|su 
 ellþeodigne ald beheawan , 
 se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he þes ides eft aginnan|agan willan . 
 forðam ic wigsmiðum word sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 þæt|se sar min|ic sweostor wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 æghwær eorþ|eorðe þær witan eardian leas 
 mid wealandum winnan sculan . 
 ic þæt|se ilca dreogan on|an þes eðyltyrf , 
 siððan ic þin , þeon|þeodan mære , 
 mundbyrde geceosan . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon me|ic on|an mod cuð , 
 hwæðer on|an þes folc frea ælmihtig 
 egesian|egesa wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , þu|þa|se ic heran|her ærest|ær cuman . 
 forðam ic þegn|þegen þin dyrnde 
 and self þu|þe|se swiðe micel 
 soð sprecan , þæt|se me|ic sar 
 bryd last beddreste gestigan . " 
 þu|þa|se onginnan abimæleh abraham swiðan 
 woruldgestreonum and him|hi|he hit|his|he wif agifan|agiefan . 
 sellan him|hi|he toh|to bot , se þu|þe|se he hit|his|he bryd geniman , 
 gangan|gan feoh and glæd seolfor 
 and weorcþeos . sprecan þu|þa|se word eacan|eac 
 toh|to abrahame æðelinga helm : 
 " wunian|wuna mid usic and þu|þe|se wiс|wican|wic geceos 
 on|an þes land|finna þær þu|þe|se leofost wesan|seon|nesan , 
 eðelstowe , þu|þe|se ic aginnan|agan sculan . 
 wesan we|us fæle|feolan freond , we þu|þe|ðe feoh syllað ! " 
 cweðan þu|þa|se eft raðe oðer word 
 toh|to sarran sinc brytta : 
 " nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf þu|þe|ðe on|an edwit abraham settan , 
 þin freadrihten , þæt|se þu flettwaðas , 
 mæg|magan ælfscieno , min tredan , 
 acan|ac him|hi|he hygeteonan hwit seolfor 
 deop betan . nesan|neh|ne cearu incit duguða 
 of ðisse eðyltyrf ellor sec , 
 wine uncuðe , acan|ac wuniað heran|her . " 
 abraham fremman|fremede swa he hit|his|he aldor hatan , 
 onfon freondscipe be frea hæs , 
 lufu|lufe and lissum . he wesan|seon|beon leof god . 
 forðam he sibb|sib gesælig dreogan 
 and hit|his|he scippende under sceadan|scead gefaran , 
 hleowfeðrum þeccan , heran|her þenden libban . 
 þu|þa|se gien wesan|seon|beon yrre|irre god abimelehe 
 for|faran þære|se synn þu|þe|se he wiþ|wið sarrai 
 and wiþ|wið abrahame ær gefremian , 
 þu|þa|se he gedælan him|hi|he deore|deor twegen|twa , 
 wif and wæpned . he se weorc gehleat 
 frecne|frecen|frec wite|witan . nesan|neh|ne magan freoh|freogan|freo nesan|neh|ne þeowan|þeow 
 hira|hi|heore bregoweardas bearn ecan 
 monrim mægþ , acan|ac him|hi|he þæt|se metod forstandan , 
 oðþæt se halig|halgian|halga|haleg hit|his|he hlaford 
 abraham onginnan arra biddan 
 eсe drihten . him|hi|he engel helm 
 getigðode , tuddorsped onlucan 
 folccyninge freoh|freo and þeow , 
 wer and wifian|wif ; lætan|lettan weaxan eft 
 hira|hi|heore rimgetel rodor waldend , 
 eadan|ead and æht . ælmihtig wearð 
 milde on|an mod , moncynnes weard , 
 abimeleche , swa he abraham bædan|biddan . 
 þu|þa|se cuman feran frea ælmihtig 
 toh|to sarrai , swa he self cweðan , 
 waldend usser , habban wordbeot 
 leof læstan|gelæstan , lifes|lif aldor 
 eafora and ides . abrahame wæcnan|wacan 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn of bryd , se breogo|brego engel , 
 ær se magotudre modor wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 eacen|eacan be eorle , isaac nemnan . 
 he abraham on|an hit|his|he agen hand 
 beacen settan , swa him|hi|he bebeodan metod , 
 wuldortorht ymb wucan , se þu|þe|se he on|an weorold 
 toh|to moncynne modor bringan|brengan . 
 cniht weaxan and þag , swa him|hi|he cynde|cynd wesan|seon|beon 
 æðele from|fram yldrum . abraham habban 
 wintra|winter hunteontig þu|þa|se him|hi|he wif sunu 
 on|an þanc geberan . he se ðrage bidan , 
 siððan him|hi|he ærest|ær þurh hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan word 
 se dægwillan drihten bodian . 
 þu|þa|se seon|seo|se wyrdan|wyrd gewearð þæt|se þæt|se wif geseon 
 for|faran abrahame ismael plegan|plega , 
 þær hi|heo æt|etan swæsendum sittan buan twegen , 
 halig on|an hige , and hira|hi|heore hiwan eall|eal , 
 drincan and dryman . þu|þa|se cweðan drihtlecu mæg|magan , 
 bryd toh|to beornan|beorn : " forgif me|ic , beah|beagian|beag weard , 
 min|ic swæs frea : hatan|hat siðian 
 agar ellor and ismael 
 lædan mid hi|heo ! nesan|neh|ne beoð we lengan|leng|lange somed 
 willum minum|min , gif ic wealdan motan|mot . 
 næfre ismael wiþ|wið isace , 
 wiþ|wið min|ic ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn yrfe dæleð 
 on|an last þu|þe|se , þonne|se þu of lice 
 aldor asendest . " þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon abrahame 
 weorc on|an mod þæt|se he on|an wræc|wrecan drifan 
 hit|his|he selfes sunu . þu|þa|se cuman soð metod 
 freoh|freo on|an fultuman|fultum , witan|wist ferhð guma 
 cearu on|an clommum . cyning engel sprecan 
 toh|to abrahame , ece drihten : 
 " lætan|læt|lædan þu|þe|se aslupan sorh|sorg of breost , 
 modgewinnan , and mægeð hire|heo , 
 bryd þinne|þin ! hatan|hat buan twegen aweg 
 agar feran and ismael , 
 cniht of cyþ ! ic hit|his|he cynn gedon 
 brad and bresne bearn tudor , 
 wæstm spedig , swa ic þu|þe|se word hettan|gehatan . " 
 þu|þa|se se wer hyrdan|hyran|hirde hit|his|he waldende , 
 drifan of wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic dreorigmod twegen , 
 ides of eard and hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 " sweotol wesan|seon|is and gesene þæt|se þu|þe|se soð metod 
 on|an gesiððe wesan|seon|is , swegl|swegel aldor , 
 se þu|þe|ðe sigor seleð snytrum miht 
 and þu|þin mod trymeð 
 godcund gifu . forðam þu|þe|ðe giena spowan , 
 se þu wiþ|wið freond oððe feond fremman onginnan 
 word oððe dæd . waldend scufeð , 
 frea on|an forðwegas folm sin 
 willan|willa þinne|þin . þæt|se wesan|seon|is wid cuð 
 burhsittendum . ic þu|þe|se biddan nu , 
 wine|win ebrea , word minum|min , 
 þæt|se þu tilmodig treowe|treow sellan , 
 wær þin , þæt|se þu willan me|ic 
 wese|wesan fæle|feolan freond freme toh|to lean , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ic toh|to duguðum þu|þe|ðe gedon|gedo|don habban , 
 siððan þu feasceaft feorran|feorr|feor cuman|come 
 on|an þes werþeode wræccan last . 
 gyldan me|ic mid hyldo , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se hneaw nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 land|finna and lissa . wesan þes leode|leoda|leod nu 
 and mægburge minre|min arfæst , 
 gif þu|þe|se alwalda , ure|ur drihten , 
 scirian willan , se þu|þe|ðe gesceapu healdeð , 
 þæt|se þu randwigum rumor motan|mot 
 on|an ðisse folcsceare frætwa dælan , 
 modig gestreon , mearc settan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se abraham abimelehe 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon sellan þæt|se he willan swa . 
 siððan wesan|seon|beon se eadega eafora þares 
 in filistea folc eardfæst , 
 leodan|leod ebrea lange|lang þrage , 
 feasceaft mid fremde . him|hi|he frea engel 
 wiс|wican|wic getæhte þær wer hatað 
 burhsittende bersabea land . 
 þær se halig|halgian|halga|haleg heahsteap reced , 
 burh timbrede and bearo settan , 
 weobedd wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , and hit|his|he waldende 
 on|an þæm|þam|se glædstede gild onsægde , 
 lacan|lac geneahe , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se lif forgifan|forgiefan , 
 gesæliglic swegl|swegel under . 
 þu|þa|se se rinc se rice|ric onginnan 
 cyning costigan , cunnian georne|geornan|georn 
 hwilc se æðelinges ellen wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 stiðum word sprecan him|hi|he stefn toh|to : 
 " gewitan þu ofestlice , abraham , feran , 
 last lecgan and þu|þe|se lædan mid 
 þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . þu sculan isaac me|ic 
 onsecgan , sunu ðinne , self toh|to tibre . 
 siððan þu gestigan steap dun , 
 hrincg se hean|heah land|finna , þu|þe|se ic þu|þe|se heonan getæce , 
 up þin agen fot , þær þu sculan ad gegærwan , 
 bælfyr bearn þin , and blotan self 
 sunu mid sweord ecge , and þonne|se sweart liсgan|leon 
 leof liс|lic forbærnan and me|ic lacan|lac bebeodan . " 
 nesan|neh|ne forsittan he þywan|þy|þe|se siþ , acan|ac sona onginnan 
 fysan toh|to for|faran . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon frea engel , 
 word ondrysne , and hit|his|he waldend leof . 
 þu|þa|se se eadig abraham sinnan|sin 
 nihtreste ofgiefan . nalles nergendes 
 hæs wiðhogode , acan|ac he se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer 
 gyrdan|gyrd græg sweord , cyðde þæt|se him|hi|he gast weard 
 egesian|egesa on|an breost wunian . onginnan þu|þa|se hit|his|he esol bætan 
 gamolferhð gold brytta , hatan he geong|gangan twegen 
 mann mid siðian . mæg|magan wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan þridda 
 and he feorða self . þu|þa|se he fus gewitan 
 from|fram hit|his|he agen hofe|hof|hebban isaac lædan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn unweaxen , swa him|hi|he bebeodan metod . 
 efstan þu|þa|se swiðe|swiðan and onettan 
 forþ|forð foldwege , swa him|hi|he frea tæсan|tæcan 
 weg ofer westen|westan , oðþæt wuldortorht , 
 dæg þridda up ofer deop wæter 
 ord aræmde . þu|þa|se se eadega wer 
 geseon hlifigan heah dun 
 swa him|hi|he sægan|seсgan|secgan ær swegl|swegel aldor . 
 þe|þa|ða|se abraham sprecan toh|to hit|his|he ombihtum : 
 " rinc min , restað incit 
 heran|her on|an þes wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic . witan eft cumað , 
 siððan witan ærende|ærend uncer twega 
 gastcyninge agifan habbað . " 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se se æðeling and hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan sunu 
 toh|to se gemearces þu|þe|se him|hi|he metod tæсan|tæcan , 
 wadan ofer weald . wudu bær|beran sunu , 
 fæder fyr and sweord . þe|þa|ða|se se fricgean onginnan 
 wer winter geong|gangan word abraham : 
 " witan heran|her fyr and sweord , frea min|ic , habbað ; 
 hwær wesan|seon|is þæt|se tiber , þæt|se þu torht god 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se brynegielde bringan þencest gewinnan|geblandan " 
 abraham maðelode ( habban on|an on|an gehycgan 
 þæt|se he gedæde swa he drihten hettan|het|hedan|hatan ) : 
 " him|hi|he þæt|se soðcyning self findeð , 
 moncynnes weard , swa him|hi|he gemetan|gemet þinceð . " 
 gestigan þu|þa|se stiðhydig steap dun 
 up mid hit|his|he eafora , swa him|hi|he se eca bebeodan , 
 þæt|se he on|an hrofe gestandan hean|heah land|finna 
 on|an þære|se stow þu|þe|se him|hi|he se strang toh|to , 
 wærfæst metod word tæсan|tæcan . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se ad hladan , æled|ælan weccan , 
 and gefeterode fot|fedan and honda 
 bearn sin and þu|þa|se on|an bæl ahebban 
 isaac geong , and þu|þa|se ædre gegripan 
 sweord be gehiltum , willan hit|his|he sunu cwellan 
 folm sin , fyr sencan 
 mæg dreor . þu|þa|se metod ðegn , 
 ufan engel sum|su , abraham hlud 
 stefn cygde . he stille|stillan gebidan 
 ar sprecan and þæm|þam|se engel oncwæð . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ofost toh|to ufan of roderum 
 wuldorgast god word mælan : 
 " abraham libban|leof , nesan|neh|ne slean þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 acan|ac þu cwic abregd cniht of ad , 
 eafora þinne|þin ! him|hi|he on|an wuldor god ! 
 mago ebrea , þu med sculan 
 þurh se halig|halga|haleg hand , heofoncyninges , 
 soð sigorleanum selfa onfon , 
 ginfæstum gifu . þu|þe|se willan|wil gast weard 
 lissum gyldan þæt|se þu|þe|se wesan|seon|beon leof hit|his|he 
 sibb and hyldo þonne|se þu|þin sylfes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . " 
 ad standan onælan . habban abrahame 
 metod moncynnes , mæge|mæg|magan lothes , 
 breost geblissad , þu|þa|se he him|hi|he hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn forgifan|forgiefan , 
 isaac cwic . þe|þa|ða|se se eadega bewlitan , 
 rinc ofer exle , and him|hi|he þær rom geseon 
 unfeor þanan an standan , 
 broðor arones , brembrum fæst . 
 se abraham geniman and he on|an ad ahebban 
 ofestum micel for|faran hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn . 
 abrægd þu|þa|se mid þywan|þy|þe|se bil ; brynegield onhread , 
 reccendne wegan|weg , rommes blod , 
 onbleot þæt|se lacan|lac god , sægan|seсgan|secgan lean þanc 
 and eall|eal þær|se þu|þe|se he him|hi|he ær and sið , 
 gifena drihten , forgifan habban . 
 
 þæt|se wearð underne eorðbuendum , 
 þæt|se meotod habban miht and strengðo 
 þe|þa|ða|se he gefestnade folde sceat . 
 seolfa he gesette|gesettan sunne|sunnan|sunna and spiht|monan|mona , 
 stan and eorþ|eorðe , stream ut on|an sæ , 
 wæter and wolcn , þurh|ðurh hit|his|he wundrian|wundor|wund miht . 
 deop ymblyt clene ymbhaldeð 
 meotod on|an miht , and eal|all middangeard . 
 he selfa mæg|magan sæ geondwlitan , 
 grund in geofene , god ongeagn|agen|agan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 and he ariman mæg|magan rægnas scuran , 
 dropa gehwelcne . dæg|dah|dagian|dag enderim 
 seolua he gesette|gesettan þurh hit|his|he soð miht . 
 swa se wyrhta þurh hit|his|he wuldor gast 
 serede and settan on|an six dæg|dah|dag 
 eorþ|eorðe dæl , up on|an heofon , 
 and hean|heah holm . hwæt|hwa wesan|seon|is þæt|se þu|þe|ðe cunnan 
 orðonc clene nymðe ece god gewinnan|geblandan 
 dream he gedelde , duguðe and geþeode|geþeodan , 
 adam ærest|ær , and þæt|se æðele cyn , 
 engel ordfruman , þæt|se þu|þe|se eft forwarð . 
 ðuhte him|hi|he on|an mod þæt|se hit miht|meaht|magan swa , 
 þæt|se hi|heo weron seolfe swegl|swegel brytan , 
 wuldor waldend . him|hi|he þær wirse gelimpan , 
 þe|þa|ða|se heo in hell|hel ham staðeledon , 
 on|an æfter oðer , in þæt|se atol scref , 
 þær heo brynewelme bidan sculan 
 sar sorh|sorg , nales swegl|swegel sunnan|leoht 
 habban in heofnum heahgetimbrad , 
 acan|ac gedufan sceolun in se deop wælm 
 niðær under nessas in se neowlan grund , 
 gredig and gifre . god ana|an witan 
 hu he þæt|se scyldige werud forscrifen hefde ! 
 cleopað þonne se ald ut of hell|hel , 
 wriceð wordcwedas weregan rædan|reord , 
 eisegan stefn : " hwær cuman engel ðrym , 
 þu|þe|se we on|an heofnum habban sceoldan gewinnan|geblandan 
 þes wesan|seon|is ðeostræ ham , ðearle gebunden|gebindan|bindan 
 fæst fyrclommum ; flor wesan|seon|is on|an welme 
 ator onælan . nesan nu ende feor 
 þæt|se we sceolun ætsomne susel þrowian , 
 wea and werig , nalles wuldor blæd 
 habban in heofnum , hehselda wyn . 
 hwæt#2 , we for|faran dryhtene iu dream hefdon , 
 song on|an swegl|swegel selrum tid , 
 þær nu ymb se æcan æðele stondað , 
 heleð ymb hehseld , herigað drihten 
 word and werc , and ic in wite|witan sculan 
 bidan in bend , and me|ic bættran ham 
 for|faran oferhygdum æfre nesan|neh|ne wennan|wenan|wen . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he andsweradan atol gast , 
 swarte and synfull|synful , susl begnornende : 
 " þu we|us gelærdæst þurh|ðurh lyge ðinne 
 þæt|se we helan heran nesan|neh|ne scealdon . 
 ðuhte þu|þe|se an þæt|se þu agan all geweald , 
 heofnes and eorþe|eorþ , wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon halig god , 
 scypend seolfa . nu earttu sceaðana sum|su , 
 in fyrlocan feste gebunden|gebindan|bindan . 
 wendes þu þurh|ðurh wuldor|seolh|bearm þæt|ðæt|se þu weorold agan , 
 all onwald , and we engel mid ðec . 
 atol wesan|seon|is þu|þin onseon ! habbað we eal|all swa 
 for|faran þin leasungum lyðre ferian|feran . 
 segdest we|us toh|to soð þæt|se þin sunu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 meotod moncynnes ; hafustu nu micel|mare|mara susel ! " 
 swa firenfull facn word 
 hira|hi|heore aldorðægn on|an reordadon , 
 on|an cearu cwide . crist heo afirde , 
 dream bedelde . hæfdan dryhten lihtan 
 for|faran oferhygdum ufan forlætan , 
 habban he toh|to hyht hell|hel floras , 
 beornan bealo . blæc|blac hworfon 
 scinnan forscepene , sceaþa hwearfedon , 
 earm æglecan , geond þæt|se atol scref , 
 for|faran ðam|se anmedlan þu|þe|se hi|heo ær dreogan . 
 eft reordade oðer siþ 
 feond aldor . wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se forht ongeagn|agen|agan , 
 seoððan he þes wite worn gefelan . 
 he spearcade , þonne he spreocan onginnan 
 fyr and ator ; nesan|neh|ne bið swelc fæger dream 
 þonne he in wite|wita word indraf : 
 " ic wesan|seon|beon iu in heofnum halig ængel , 
 dryhtene deore|deor ; hefde me|ic dream mid god , 
 micelne|micel for|faran meotode , and ðeos menego swa some . 
 þu|þa|se ic in mod minum|min hogade 
 þæt|se ic willan towerpan wuldor leoma , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn helendes , aginnan|agan me|ic burh|burg geweald 
 eall|eal toh|to æht , and ðeos earm heap 
 þu|þe|se ic hebban toh|to hell|hel ham geledde . 
 wennan|wenan|wen þæt|se tacn|tacen|tacan sutol þu|þa|se ic asellan wesan on|an wærgðu , 
 niðer under nessas in se neowlan grund . 
 nu ic ge|eowan|eow hebban toh|to hæftum ham gefærde 
 eal|all of eard . nesan heran|her eadig tir , 
 wloncra winsele , nesan|neh|ne weorold dream , 
 nesan|neh|ne ængel ðreat , nesan|neh|ne we upheofon 
 aginnan|agan motan . wesan|seon|is þes atol ham 
 fyr onælan . ic wesan|seon|eoh fah wiþ|wið god . 
 æce æt|etan hell|hel duru draca eardigað , 
 hatan|hat on|an reðre ; heo we|us helpan nesan|neh|ne magan . 
 wesan|seon|is se walica ham wite afyllan ; 
 nagan we se heolstres þæt|se we we|us gehydan mægon 
 in ðissum neowlan genip . hær wesan|seon|is nedran swæg , 
 wyrm gewunade . wesan|seon|is þes wite clom 
 feste gebunden|gebindan|bindan . feond seondon reðe , 
 dimm and deorc . nesan|neh|ne heran|her dæg lyhteð 
 for|faran scedes sciman , sceppendes sunnan|leoht . 
 iu agan ic geweald eall|eal wuldor , 
 ær ic motan in ðeossum atol æðele gebidan 
 hwæt#2 me|ic drihten god deman|dema willan , 
 fah on|an flor . nu ic feran cuman 
 deofol menego toh|to ðissum dimm ham . 
 acan|ac ic sculan on|an flyge and on|an flyht ðragum 
 eardian neosan , and ge|eower micel , 
 þu|þe|se þes oferhydes ord onstaldon . 
 nesan|neh|ne ðurfon we þes wenan|wena , þæt|se we|us wuldorcyning 
 æfre willan eard alefan , 
 æðel toh|to æht , swa he ær dydan|don , 
 eсe onwald ; agan|ac him|hi|he all geweald , 
 wuldor and wite|wita , waldendes sunu . 
 forðam ic sculan hean|heah and earm hweorfan se widor , 
 wadan wræclast , wuldor benemnan , 
 duguðum bedeled , nænig dream aginnan|agan 
 uppe mid ængel , þes þu|þe|ðe ic ær cweðan 
 þæt|se ic wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon seolfa swægles brytta , 
 wiht wealdend . acan|ac hit me|ic wyrsa gelomp ! " 
 swa se werega gast word sæd|secgan 
 hit|his|he earfoðo ealle|eall|eal ætsomne , 
 fah in fyrn|fyren , ( fyrleoma standan 
 geond þæt|se atol scræf ator geblonden ) : 
 " ic wesan|seon|eoh limwæstmum þæt|se ic gelutian nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 on|an þes side|sid sellan|sele|sel , synn forwundian . 
 hwæt#2 , heran|her hatan|hat and ceald hwilum|hwil mencgað ; 
 hwilum|hwil ic geherian hellescealcas , 
 gnornende cynn , grund mæne|mænan , 
 niðer under næssum ; hwilum|hwil nacod|nacian mann 
 winnað ymb wyrm . wesan|seon|is þes windig sellan|sele|sel 
 eall|eal inneweard atol gefyllan|fyllan . 
 nesan|neh|ne motan|mot ic hihtlicran ham brucan , 
 burh|burg nesan|neh|ne bold , nesan|neh|ne on|an þu|þa|se beorht gescæft 
 nesan|neh|ne motan|mot ic æfre micel eage starian . 
 wesan|seon|is me|ic nu wyrsa þæt|se ic wuldor sunnan|leoht 
 uppe mid engel æfre cuðe , 
 song on|an swegl|swegel , þær sunu meotodes 
 habbað eadig birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ealle|eall|eal ymbfon 
 seolfa mid sang . nesan|neh|ne ic þæm|þam|se sawol nesan|neh|ne motan|mot 
 ænigum sceððan , 
 butan þæm|þam|se an þu|þe|se he aginnan|agan nyllan ; 
 þu|þa|se ic motan|mot toh|to hæftum ham geferian , 
 bringan toh|to bold in se biter grund . 
 ealle|eall|eal we syndon ungelice 
 þonne|se þu|þe|se we iu in heofon habban ærror 
 wlite|wlitan and weorðmynt . ful oft wuldor swegan|sweg 
 bringan|brengan toh|to bearm birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn hælend , 
 þær we ymb he utan ealle|eall|eal hofe , 
 leomu ymb leof , lofsonga word , 
 drihten secgan . nu ic wesan|seon|eoh dæd fah , 
 wundian|gewundian mid womm ; sculan nu þes wite clom 
 beoran beornan in bæc minum|min , 
 hatan|hat on|an hell|hel , hyhtwillan leas . " 
 þu|þa|se git feola cwiðde firna heran , 
 atol æglæca , ut of hell|hel , 
 wite|wita werig . word spearca fleon|fleogan|flean 
 ator gelicost , þonne|se he ut þorhdraf : 
 " eala drihtenes þri ! eala duguða helm ! 
 eala meotodes miht ! eala middaneard ! 
 eala dæg leoht ! eala dream god ! 
 eala engel þreotan ! eala upheofen ! 
 eala þæt|se ic eam|ea eall|eal leas ecan dream , 
 þæt|se ic mid hand nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan heofon geræcan , 
 nesan|neh|ne mid eage nesan|neh|ne motan|mot up locian , 
 nesan|neh|ne huru mid eare nesan|neh|ne sculan æfre geheran 
 þære|se byrhtestan beman stefn ! 
 se ic willan of selde sunu meotodes , 
 drihten adrifan , and aginnan|agan me|ic se dream geweald , 
 wuldor and wynn , me|ic þær wyrsa gelimpan 
 þonne|se ic toh|to hihte aginnan|agan motan . 
 nu ic wesan|seon|eoh asceaden fram þære|se sciran driht , 
 alædan fram sunnan|leoht in se lað ham . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic þæt|se gehicgan hu ic in þæm|se becuman , 
 in þes neowle genip , niðsynnum fah , 
 awyrpan|aweorpan of weorold . witan ic nu þu|þa|se 
 þæt|se bið all leas ecan dream 
 se þu|þe|ðe heofencyninge heran nesan|neh|ne þenceð , 
 meotode cweme|cweman . ic þæt|se morðer sculan , 
 wea and wite and wracu dreogan , 
 god bedælan , iudædum fah , 
 se þu|þe|ðe ic geþenсan|geþencan adrifan drihten of selde , 
 weoroda waldend ; sculan nu wreclastas 
 settan sorhgcearig , siþ wid . " 
 hwerfan|hweorfan þu|þa|se toh|to hell|hel þu|þa|se he gehened wesan|seon|beon , 
 god andsaca ; don hit|his|he gingra swa , 
 gifre and grædig , þu|þa|se hi|heo|heg god bedrifan 
 in þæt|se hatan|hat hof|hebban þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|is helan nama . 
 forðam sculan gehycgan hæleða æghwylc 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne abælige birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn waldendes . 
 lætan|læt him|hi|he toh|to bysen hu þu|þa|se blæc|blac feond 
 for|faran oferhygdum ealle|eall|eal forweorþan . 
 neoman we|us toh|to wynn weoroda drihten , 
 uppe eсe gefea , engel waldend . 
 he þæt|se gecydde þæt|se he mægencræft habban , 
 miht|meaht miccle , þu|þa|se he þu|þa|se mænego adrifan , 
 hæftas of þæm|se hean|heah selde . gemunan we se halig|halga|haleg drihten , 
 eсe in wuldor mid all gescefta ealdor|eald ; 
 ceosan we|us eard in wuldor mid eall|eal cyning cyninge|cyning , 
 se wesan|seon|is crist nemnan|genemnan ; 
 beoran on|an breost bliðe geþoht , 
 sibb|sib and snytero ; gemunan soð and rihtan|riht , 
 þonne|se we toh|to hehselde hnigan þencað , 
 and se anwaldan arian|ar biddan . 
 þonne|se behofað se þu|þe|ðe heran|her wunað 
 weorulde wynn þæt|se him|hi|he wlite|wlitan scinu|scinan 
 þonne|se he oðer lif eft geseceð , 
 fæger land|finna þonne|se þes|þeoh|se folde seon|seo|se ; 
 wesan|seon|is þær wlitig and wynsum , wæstm scinað , 
 beorht ofer burh|burg . þær wesan|seon|is brad land , 
 hyhtlicra ham in heofonrice , 
 criste gecwemra . uta cerran þider 
 þær he self sittan , sigorian|sigor waldend , 
 drihten hælend , in þæm|se deore ham , 
 and ymb þæt|se hehsetl hwit standað 
 engel feþa and eadig , 
 halig heofenþreatas herigað drihten 
 word and weorc . hira|hi|heore wlite|wlitan scineð 
 geond eall|eal weorold weorold mid wuldorcyning . 
 þe|þa|ða|se gat ic furðor fricgan feond ondetan ; 
 wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he eall|eal ful strang wom|woh and wite ; habban wuldorcyning 
 for|faran oferhigdum anforlætan ; 
 cweþan|cweðan eft hraðe oðer word : 
 " nu wesan|seon|is gesene þæt|se we syngian 
 uppe on|an eard . sceolon nu æfre se 
 dreogan domleas gewinnan|gewinn drihten miht . 
 hwæt#2 , we in wuldor wlite|wlitan wunian motan 
 þær we halig|halga|haleg god heran willan , 
 and him|hi|he singan|sang ymb seld secgan sculan 
 þusendmælum . þu|þa|se we þær wesan|seon|beon , 
 wunian on|an wynn , geherdon wuldor swegan|sweg , 
 beman stefn . byrhtword arisan|ar 
 engel ordfruma , and toh|to þæm|se æþele 
 hnigan him|hi|he sanct ; sigetorht arisan|ar 
 ece drihten , ofer we|us gestandan 
 and gebledsian bilewit heap 
 dogra gehwylc , and hit|his|he se deore|deor sunu , 
 gast scyppend . god seolfa wesan|seon|beon 
 eall|eal andfeng þu|þe|se þær up becuman , 
 and he on|an eorþ|eorðe ær gelefde . 
 þu|þa|se se ofþuhte þæt|se se þeon|þeodan wesan|seon|beon 
 strang and stiðmod . onginnan ic þu|þa|se steppan forþ|forð 
 ana|an wiþ|wið engel , and toh|to him|hi|he eall|eal sprecan : 
 'ic сinan|cunnan ge|eowan|eow læran langsum rædan|ræd , 
 gif ge willað minre|min miht|meaht|magan gelefan . 
 uta oferhycgan helm se micel , 
 werod waldend , aginnan|agan we|us þes wuldor sunnan|leoht , 
 eall|eal toh|to æht . þes wesan|seon|is idel gylp 
 þæt|se we ær dreogan ealle|eall|eal hwil .' 
 þe|þa|ða|se gewearð usic þæt|se we willan swa 
 drihten adrifan of þæm|þam|se deore ham , 
 cyning of cestre . cuð wesan|seon|is wid 
 þæt|se wreclastas wunian motan , 
 grimman|grimm|grim grund . god seolfa him|hi|he 
 romana haldeð . he wesan|seon|is ana|an cyning , 
 þu|þe|se we|us eorre gewearð , ece drihten , 
 meotod miht swiðan . sculan nu þes|þeoh|se menego heran|her 
 licgan on|an leahtrum , sum on|an lyft scacan , 
 fleoge|fleogan ofer folde ; fyr bið ymbutan 
 on|an æghwylcum , þæh he uppe seon|seo|se . 
 nesan|neh|ne motan|mot he þæm|þam|se sawol þu|þe|se þær secað up , 
 eadig of eorþe|eorþ æfre gehrinan , 
 agan|ac ic be hondum motan|mot hæþen sceale 
 gripan toh|to grund|grindan , god andsaca . 
 sum sceolon hweorfan geond hæleða land|finna 
 and unsib oft onstyrian 
 mann mægðum geond middaneard . 
 ic heran|her geþolian sculan þingian|þing æghwylces , 
 bitter|bitor|biter niðæs beala gnornian , 
 sican and sorhful , se ic seolfa wealdan , 
 þonne|se ic on|an heofon ham staðelode , 
 hwæðer we|us se eca æfre willan 
 on|an heofon romana ham alefan , 
 eðel toh|to æht , swa he ær dydan|don . " 
 swa gnornedon god andsaca , 
 hatan|hat on|an hell|hel . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon hælend god 
 wrað weorþan|geweorþan for|faran womcwidum . 
 forðam mæg|magan gehycgan , se þu|þe|ðe hit|his|he heorte dugan|deah , 
 þæt|se he him|hi|he afirre frecne|frecen|frec geþoht , 
 laðe leahtras , lifigendra gehwylc . 
 gemunan simble on|an mod meotodes strengðo ; 
 gearwian we|us togenes grene stræte|stræt 
 up toh|to engel , þær wesan|seon|is se ælmihtig|eallmihtig god . 
 and we|us befæðman willan|wil freobearn god , 
 gif we þæt|se on|an eorþ|eorðe ær geþencað , 
 and we|us toh|to þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg helpan gelefað . 
 þonne|se he we|us no forlæteð , agan|ac lif syleð 
 uppe mid engel , eadig dream . 
 tæceð we|us se torht trumlicne ham , 
 beorht burhweallas . beorht scinað 
 gesælige sawol|sawel , sorh|sorg bedælan , 
 þær heo æfre forþ|forð wunian motan 
 cestre and cynestol . witon cyþan þæt|se ! 
 deman|dema we on|an eorþ|eorðe , ærror lifigend , 
 onlucan mid list lucan waldendes , 
 ongeotan gastlice ! we|us ongeagn cumað 
 þusend engel , gif þider motan , 
 and þæt|se on|an eorþ|eorðe ær gewyrcað . 
 forðam se bið eadig se þu|þe|ðe æfre willan|wil 
 munan|mann|man oferhycgan , meotode cweme|cweman , 
 synn adwæscan . swa he self cweðan : 
 " soþfæst mann , sunne|sunnan|sunna gelice , 
 fæger|fæge gefrætewod in hira|hi|heore fæder romana 
 scinað in sceldbyrig . " þær heo sceppend seolf 
 friðe befæðmeð , fæder mancynn , 
 ahefeð holdlice in heofon sunnan|leoht , 
 þær heo mid wuldorcyning wunian motan 
 awa toh|to ald , 
 aginnan|agan dream dream mid drihten god , 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to weorold wifcynn|hosp|flet|a butan ende . 
 eala hwæt#2 ! se awyrgda wrað geþenсan|geþencan 
 þæt|se he heofencyninge heran nesan|neh|ne willan , 
 fæder frefergendum . flor ator weol , 
 hatan|hat under hæftum ; hreopan deofol , 
 wid geond windsele wea cwanedon , 
 munan|mann|man and morður . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se menego þær 
 swilce onælan ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se eall|eal full strong , 
 þonne|se wesan|seon|beon hira|hi|heore aldor , þu|þe|se þær ærest|ær cuman 
 forþ|forð on|an feþan , fæstan|fæst gebunden|gebindan|bindan 
 fyr and liсgan|leon . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon fæstlic þreotan ; 
 ec sculan hit|his|he þegn|þegen þær gewunian 
 atol eðles , nalles up þanan 
 geheran in heofon halig dream , 
 þær heo oft fæger folgað habban 
 uppe mid engel . wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se all se 
 god leas , agan|ac nymþe gryndes ad 
 wunian nesan|neh|ne motan and se werig sellan|sele|sel 
 þær wesan|seon|is wom|woh and wop wid herian|heran|geherian , 
 and gristbitungc and gnornungc mecga . 
 nabbað he toh|to hyht nymþe cyle and fyr , 
 wea and wite and wyrm þreotan , 
 draca and næddran and se dimm ham . 
 forðam miht|meaht|magan geheran , se þu|þe|ðe æt|etan hyllan|hyll wesan|seon|beon 
 twelf mil neh , þæt|se þær wesan|seon|beon toða geheaw , 
 hlud and geomor . god andsaca 
 hweorfan geond hell|hel hatan|hat onælan 
 ufan and utan ( him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon æghwær wa ) , 
 wite|wita werig|werian , wuldor bescyrede , 
 dream bedælan . heofon deop gehygd , 
 þu|þa|se heo on|an heofon ham staðelodon , 
 þæt|se hi|heo willan benæman nergendne crist 
 rodera rices , agan|ac he on|an rihtan|riht gehealdan 
 hired heofon and þæt|se halig seld . 
 nesan nænig swa snotor nesan|neh|ne swa cræftig , 
 nesan|neh|ne se swa gleaw , nymþe god seolfa , 
 þæt|se asecgan mæge|mæg|magan swegl|swegel leoma , 
 hu scima þær scineð ymbutan 
 meotodes miht|meaht|magan , geond þæt|se mære|mæran cynn , 
 þær habbað engel eadig dream , 
 sanct singað ( þæt|se wesan|seon|is se seolfa ) for|faran god . 
 þonne|se beoð þu|þa|se eadig þu|þe|se of eorþ|eorðe cumað , 
 bringað toh|to bearm blostma stences , 
 wyrt wynsum ( þæt|se synd word god ) , 
 þonne|se hi|heo befæðmeð fæder mancynn , 
 and hi|heo gesegnað mid hit|his|he swiðran hond , 
 lædeð toh|to lihtan , þær hi|heo lif agan 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to ald , uplicne ham , 
 byrhtne burhstyde . blæd bið æghwæm 
 þæm|se þu|þe|ðe hælend|hælan heran þenceð , 
 and wel wesan|seon|is þæm|þam|se þu|þe|ðe þæt|se wyrcan motan|mot . 
 wesan|seon|beon þæt|se encgelcyn ær nemnan|genemnan , 
 lucifer hatan , leohtberend , 
 on|an geardagum in god romana . 
 þu|þa|se he in wuldor wroht onstalde 
 þæt|se he oferhyda aginnan|agan willan . 
 þu|þa|se satanus sweart geþenсan|geþencan 
 þæt|se he willan on|an heofon hehseld wyrcan 
 uppe mid þæm|þam|se ecan . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon ealdor hira|hi|heore , 
 yfel ordfruma . him|hi|he þæt|se eft gehreaw , 
 þu|þa|se he toh|to hell|hel hnigan sculan , 
 and hit|his|he hired mid he , in hynðo geglidan , 
 nergendes nið , and no seoððan 
 þæt|se hi|heo motan in se ecan andwlitan|andwlita seon|seo 
 butan ende . þu|þa|se him|hi|he egsian becuman , 
 dynnan|dynian|dyne for|faran deman|dema , þu|þa|se he duru in hell|hel 
 brecan and begde . blis wearð mann 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo hælend heafod geseon . 
 þonne|se wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se atol þu|þe|se we ær nemnan 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon mid egsan ealle|eall|eal afyrhte , 
 wid geond windsele word mænan : 
 " þes wesan|seon|is stronglic , nu þes storm becuman , 
 þicgan|þegen|geþicgan mid þreate , þeon|þeodan engel . 
 him|hi|he beforan fereð fæger sunnan|leoht 
 þonne|se we æfre ær eage geseon , 
 butan þu|þa|se we mid engel uppe wesan|seon|beon . 
 willan|wil nu ure|ur wite þurh hit|his|he wuldor cræftan|cræft
