 fæger|fæge , fæder userne , forðam þu|þe|se he we|us æt|etan frymþe geteon 
 lif and lænne willan|willa ; he usic willan|wil þær|se lean gemonian . 
 meotud sculan in wuldor , mann|man sculan on|an eorþe|eorþ 
 geong|gangan ealdian . god we|us ece beon , 
 nesan|neh|ne wendað he wyrd nesan|neh|ne he wiht dreccan , 
 adl nesan|neh|ne ieldo ælmihtig ; 
 nesan|neh|ne gomelað he in gæstan , acan|ac he wesan|seon|is gen swa he wesan|seon|beon , 
 þeon|þeodan geþyldig . he we|us geþonc syleð , 
 missenlicu mod , monge rædan|reord . 
 feorhcynna fela fæþmeþ wid 
 eglond manig . eardas rum 
 meotud aræran for|faran moncynne , 
 ælmihtig god , efenfela began 
 þeod and þeaw . þingan|þing sculan gehegan 
 frod wiþ frod ; beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi ferð gelic , 
 hi|heo wifcynn|hosp|flet|a sacu|sacan seman , sibb|sib gelærað , 
 þu|þa|se ær wonsælge awegen habbað . 
 rædan|ræd sculan mid snytro , ryht mid wise|wis , 
 til sculan mid til . twegen beoð gemæcca ; 
 sculan wif and wer in weorold cennan 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn mid gebyrde|gebyrd . beam sculan on|an eorþ|eorðe 
 leaf liþe|liþan , leomu gnornian . 
 fus sculan feran , fæge|fægan sweltan 
 and dogra gehwa ymb gedal sacan 
 middangeard . meotud ana|an witan 
 hwær se cwealm cuman , þu|þe|se heonan of cyþþu gewitan . 
 umbor yceð , þu|þa|se æradl nimeð ; 
 þywan|þy|þe|se weorþeð on|an folde swa fela firas cynn|cyn , 
 nesan|neh|ne su se magutimbres gemetan|gemet ofer eorþe|eorþ , 
 gif hi|heo nesan|neh|ne wanian se þes weorold teon . 
 dol beon se þu|þe|se hit|his|he dryhten nytan , toh|to se oft cymeð deað unþinged . 
 snotre mann sawol beorgað , healdað hyra|hyr|hira|hi soð mid ryhte . 
 eadig bið se þu|þe|se in hit|his|he eþel geþihð , earm se him|hi|he hit|his|he frynd geswicað . 
 nefre sculan se him|hi|he hit|his|he neþan|nest aspringeð , nyde sculan þrage gebunden|gebindan|bindan . 
 bliþe sculan bealoleas heorte . blind sculan hit|his|he eagna þolian , 
 oftigen beon him|hi|he torht gesihþ . nesan|neh|ne magan hi|heo tungol bewitian , 
 swegltorht sunne|sunnan|sunna nesan|neh|ne spiht|monan|mona ; þæt|se him|hi|he beon sar in hit|his|he mod , 
 onge þonne|se he hit ana|an witan , nesan|neh|ne weneð þæt|se him|hi|he se edhwyrft cyme . 
 waldend him|hi|he þæt|se wite|witan teon , se him|hi|he mæg|magan wyrp syllan , 
 hælu of heofodgimme , gif he witan heorte clæne . 
 lefan mann|man læce behofað . læran sculan mann|man geong monnan , 
 trymman and tyhtan þæt|se he tela cunnan , oþþæt he mann|man atemedne habban , 
 syll him|hi|he wist and wædo , oþþæt he mann|man on|an gewitt alædan . 
 nesan|neh|ne sculan he mann|man cildgeongne forcweþan , ær he he acyþan motan|mot ; 
 þywan|þy|þe|se sculan on|an þeon|þeodan|þeod geþeon , þæt|se he wese|wesan þristhycgende . 
 styran sculan mann|man strongum mod . storm oft holm gebringan , 
 geofen in grimm|grim sæl ; onginnað grome fundian 
 fealu on|an feorran|feorr|feor toh|to land , hwæðer he fæstan|fæst stonde . 
 weall him|hi|he wiþre healdað , him|hi|he beon windan|wind gemæne . 
 swa beon sæ smilte , 
 þonne|se hi windan|wind nesan|neh|ne weceð ; 
 swa beon þeod geþweran , þonne|se hi geþingad habbað , 
 gesittað him|hi|he on|an gesund þing , and þonne|se mid gesiþ healdan 
 cennan|cene mann gecynde|gecynd romana . cyning beon anweald geornan|georn ; 
 lað se þu|þe|se land monaþ|monað , leof se þu|þe|se micel|mare|mara beodeð . 
 þri sculan mid wlenco , þriste mid cene , 
 sceolun buan recen beadu fremman . 
 eorl sculan on|an eoh bog , eorod sculan getrume ridan|rida , 
 fæstan|fæst feþa stondan . fæmne æt|etan hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo bordan geriseð ; 
 widgongel wif word gespringeð , oft hi mann|man womm bilihð , 
 hæleð hi hosp mænað , oft hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo hleor abreoþeð . 
 sceomiande munan|mann|man sculan in sceadan|scead hweorfan , scir|defena in sunnan|leoht geriseð . 
 hond sculan heofod inwyrcan , hord in streonum bidan , 
 gifstol gierwan|gegierwan stondan , hwonne he guma gedælan . 
 gifre beon se þæm|þam|se gold onfehð , guma se on|an heahsetle genugan ; 
 lean sculan , gif we leogan nellað , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se we|us þes lisse geteon . 
 forst sculan freosan , fyr wudu meltan , 
 eorþe growan , wesan|seon|is brycgian , 
 wæter helm wegan , wundor lucan 
 eorþe|eorþ ciþas . on|an sculan inbindan 
 forst fetre felameahtig god ; 
 winter sculan geweorpan , weder eft cuman|cuma , 
 sumor|sumer swegl|swegel hatan|hat , sund unstille . 
 deop dead wegan dyrne bið lengest|lengan|lange ; 
 holen|helan sculan inæled , yrfe gedælan|dælan 
 dead monnes . don|dom beon selast . 
 cyning sculan mid ceap cwene|cwen gebicgan , 
 bunum and beah|beag ; buan sceolon ærest|ær 
 geofum god wese|wesan . guð sculan in eorle , 
 wigan|wig geweaxan , and wif geþeon 
 leof mid hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo leode|leoda|leod , leohtmod wese|wesan , 
 run healdan|heald , rumheort beon|beo|bannan 
 mearh and maþum|maþm , meodorædenne 
 for|faran gesiðmægen simble æghwær 
 eodor æþeling ærest|ær gegretan , 
 forma full|ful toh|to frea hond 
 ricene geræcan , and him|hi|he rædan|ræd witan|wita 
 boldagendum begen ætsomne . 
 scip sculan næglan , scyld gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 sunnan|leoht linden bord , leof wilcuma 
 frysan wif , þonne|se flotian|flota stondeð ; 
 beon hit|his|he ceol cuman and hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo ceorl toh|to ham , 
 ongeagn|agen|agan ætgeofa , and heo he in laðaþ , 
 wæsceð hit|his|he warig hrægl and him|hi|he sellan wæd niwe , 
 liþan|liþ him|hi|he on|an land se hit|his|he lufu bædeð . 
 wif sculan wiþ wer wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon gehealdan , oft hi|heo mann|man womm belihð ; 
 fela bið fæsthydigra , fela bið fyrwetgeornra , 
 freoð hi fremde monnan , þonne|se se oþer|oðer feor gewitan . 
 lida beon long|lange on|an siþ ; wifcynn|hosp|flet|a mann|man sculan seþeah leof wenan|wena , 
 gebidan se he gebædan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan . hwonne him|hi|he eft gebyrian weorðe , 
 ham cymeð , gif he hal leofað , nefne him|hi|he holm gestyreð , 
 merian|mere hafað mund mægðegsan wyn . 
 ceapeadig mann|man cyningwic þonne|se 
 leodon cypeþ , þonne|se liþe|liþan cymeð ; 
 wudu|wudian and wæter nyttað , þonne|se him|hi|he beon wiс|wican|wic alyfan , 
 mete|metan|met bygan|bycgan|bugan , gif he micel|mare|mara þurfan|þearf , ærþon he toh|to meþe weorþan|weorþ . 
 seoc se beon þu|þe|se toh|to seldan ieteð ; þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he mann|man on|an sunne|sunnan|sunna lædan , 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan he be þywan|þy|þe|se weder wese|wesan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hit su wearm on|an sumer , 
 ofercuman beon he , ær he acwelan , gif he nytan hwæt|hwa he cwic fedan . 
 mægen|magan mann|man sculan mid mete|metan|met fedan , morþor under eorþe|eorþ befeolan , 
 hinder under hruse , þu|þe|se hit forhelan þenceð ; 
 nesan|neh|ne beon þæt|se gedefe deaþ , þonne|se hit gedyrned weorþeð . 
 hean|heah sculan gehnigan , hadl gesigan , 
 ryht rogian . rædan|ræd beon nyttost , 
 yfel unnyttost , þæt|se unlæd nimeð . 
 god bið gengan|gangan , and wiþ god lengan . 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan sculan healdan|gehealdan , hond wealdan , 
 seon|seo|se sculan in eage , snytro in breost , 
 þær bið se monnes modgeþoncas . 
 muþa|muþ gehwylc mete|metan|met þurfan|þearf , mælan|mæl sceolon tid gongan . 
 gold geriseþ on|an guma sweord , 
 sellic sigesceorp , sincan|sinc on|an cwene|cwen , 
 god scieppan guma , garniþ wer , 
 wigan|wig towiþre wicfreoþa healdan|heald . 
 scyld sculan cempa , sceaft reafere , 
 sculan bryd bugan|beah|beag , bec leornere , 
 husl halig|halga|haleg mann , hæþen|hæðen synn . 
 wadan wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan weos , wuldor|seolh|bearm alwalda , 
 rum roderas ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is romana god , 
 self soðcyning , sawol|sawlian|sawel nergend , 
 se we|us eal forgifan|forgiefan þæt|se we on|an lifgaþ , 
 and eft æt|etan þæm|þam|se ende eall|eal wealdeð 
 mann cynn . þæt|se wesan|seon|is meotud self . 
 rædan|ræd sculan mann|man secgan , run writan , 
 leoþ|leon gesingan , lof gearnian , 
 don|dom areccan , dæg onettan . 
 til mann|man til and tom mearh , 
 cuþ and gecostes and calcrondes ; 
 nænig firas toh|to fela gestryneð . 
 wel mann|man sculan wine|win healdan|heald on|an weg gehwylc ; 
 oft mann|man fereð feor bi|be tune|tun , þær him|hi|he witan freond unwiotodne . 
 wineleas , wonsælig mann|man genimeð him|hi|he wulf toh|to gefere|gefera , 
 felafæcne deor . ful oft he se gefere|gefera|gefer sliteð ; 
 gryre sculan for|faran greggum , græf dead mann ; 
 hungor heofeð , nales þæt|se heaf bewindeð , 
 nesan|neh|ne huru wæl|wel wepeð wulf se græg , 
 morþorcwealm mæcga , acan|ac hit wifcynn|hosp|flet|a micel|mare|mara willan . 
 wræd sculan windan , wræc|wracu heard mann . 
 boga|bog sculan stræle , sculan begen gelic 
 mann|man toh|to gemæcca . maþþum oþer|oðer weorð , 
 gold mann|man sculan gifan . mæg|magan god syllan 
 eadig æht and eft niman . 
 sellan|sele|sel sculan stondan , self ealdian . 
 licgan beam læsest groweð . 
 treo sceolon brædan and treow weaxan , 
 se geond bilwitra breost ariseð . 
 wærleas mann|man and wonhydig , 
 ætrenmod and ungetreow , 
 se nesan|neh|ne gymeð god . 
 fela sceop meotud se þu|þe|se fyrn gewearð , hettan|het|hedan|hatan siððan swa forþ|forð wese|wesan . 
 wær gehwylc wislicu word gerisað , 
 gleomen gied and guma snytro . 
 swa manig beon mann ofer eorþe|eorþ , swa beon modgeþoncas ; 
 ælc him|hi|he hafað sundorsefan . 
 longað þonne|se þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þu|þe|se him|hi|he con leoþian|leoþ worn , 
 oþþe|oððe mid hondum con hearpe gretan ; 
 hafian|habban him|hi|he hit|his|he gliwes giefu|giefan , þu|þe|se him|hi|he god sellan . 
 earm beon se þu|þe|se sculan ana|an lifgan , 
 wineleas wunian hafian|habban him|hi|he wyrdan|wyrd teon|geteon ; 
 betre him|hi|he wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þæt|se he broþor|broðor agan , begen hi|heo an monnes , 
 eorles eafora wær , gif hi|heo sceoldan eofor onginnan 
 oþþe|oððe begen beran|bera ; beon þæt|se sliþhende deor . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a sculan þu|þa|se rinc geræde|gerædan lædan 
 and him|hi|he ætsomne swefan ; 
 næfre hi mann|man tomælde , 
 ær hi deað todælan . 
 hi twegen sceolon tæfle ymbsittan , þenden him|hi|he hyra|hyr|hira|hi torn toglide , 
 forgietan þær|se geocran gesceafta , habban him|hi|he gomen on|an bord ; 
 idel hond æmetlan genugan tæfles monnes , þonne|se teoselum weorpeð . 
 seldan in sidu|side|sid ceole , nefne he under segl yrnan , 
 werig scealc wiþ windan|wind rowan ; ful oft mann|man wearn tihð 
 earh|earg , þæt|se he ellen forleosan , drugað hit|his|he ar on|an bord . 
 lot sculan mid lysu , liþan|list|lesan mid gedefe ; 
 þywan|þy|þe|se weorþeð se stan forstelan . 
 oft hi word toweorpað , 
 ær hi bæс|bæc tobreden ; 
 gear wesan|seon|is hwær arædan . 
 wearð fæhþo fyr cynn , siððan furþum swelgan 
 eorþ|eorðe abeles blod . næs|nesan þæt|se andæge nið , 
 of þæm|þam|se wrohtdropan wid gesprungon , 
 micel mann|man æled , monegum þeod 
 bealoblonden niþ . slean hit|his|he broðor swæs 
 cain , se cwealm nerian ; cuþ|cunnan wesan|seon|beon wid siððan , 
 þæt|se ece nið æled scod , swa aþolwarum . 
 dreogan wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen gewin wid geond eorþe|eorþ , 
 ahogodan and ahyrdan heore sliþendne . 
 gearu|gearo sculan guðbord , gar on|an sceafte , 
 ecg on|an sweord and ord spere , 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan heard mann . helm sculan cene , 
 and wifcynn|hosp|flet|a se hean hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hord unginnost . 
 
 me|ic lifes|lif onlah se þes sunnan|leoht onwreon , 
 and þæt|se torht geteon , tillice onwreon . 
 glæd wesan|seon|beon ic gliwum , glenged hiwan|hiw , 
 blissian|bliss bleoum , blostmian|blostma|blostm hiwan|hiw . 
 secg mec segon , symbel nesan|neh|ne alegon , 
 feohgiefe gefegon ; frætwed wegan 
 wicg ofer wongum wennan gongum , 
 lisse mid long leoma gehongum . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon wæstm aweссan , world onspreht , 
 under roderum areaht , rædmægne oferþeaht . 
 giest gengan , gerscype menсgan|mengan , 
 lisse lengan , lust glengan . 
 scrifen scrad glidan þurh gescad in brad , 
 wesan|seon|beon on|an lagustreame lad , þær me|ic leoþu nesan|neh|ne biglad . 
 habban ic hean|heah had , nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon me|ic in heall gad , 
 þæt|se þær rof weord ridan|rad . oft þær rinc gebidan , 
 þæt|se he in sellan|sele|sel sægan|seсgan|seon sincgewæge , 
 þegn|þegen geþyhte . þenden wesan|seon|beon me|ic mægen|magan , 
 horsc mec herian|heredon , hild generian , 
 fæger|fæge ferian , feondon biweredon . 
 swa mec hyhtgiefu healdan , hygedryht befealdan , 
 staþolæht steold , stepegongum wealdan 
 swilce eorþe alan , agan ic ealdorstol , 
 galdorwordum galan . gomen sibb|sib nesan|neh|ne ofoll , 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|beon gefest gear , gellende sner , 
 wuniendo wær wilbec bescær . 
 scealcas wesan|seon|beon scearpe , scyl wesan|seon|beon hearpe , 
 hlud hlynede , hleoþor dynnan|dynian , 
 sweglrad swinsade , swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe nesan|neh|ne minsade . 
 burgsele beofode , beorht hlifade , 
 ellen eacnade , eadan|ead beacnade , 
 frea frodade , from godade , 
 mod mægnade , min fægnade , 
 treow telgade , tir welgade , 
 blæd blissade , 
 gold gearwade , gim hwearfade , 
 sincan|sinc searwade , sib nearwade . 
 from|fram ic wesan|seon|beon in frætwum , freolic in geatwum ; 
 wesan|seon|beon min|ic dream dryhtlic , drohtað hyhtlic . 
 folde ic freoþode , folc ic leoþian , 
 lif wesan|seon|beon min|ic long|lange , leode|leoda|leod in gemonge , 
 tirum getonge , tela gehonge . 
 nu min|ic hreþer wesan|seon|is hreoh , heofsiþum sceoh , 
 nydbysgum neah ; gewiteð niht in fleon|fleogan|flean 
 se ær in dæge|dæg wesan|seon|beon dyre . scriþeð nu deop in feorh 
 brondhord geblowan|blowan , breost in forgrowan , 
 flyht toflowan . flah wesan|seon|is geblowan|blowan 
 micel in gemynd ; mod gecynde|gecynd 
 greteð ungrynde grorn efenpynde , 
 bealofus byrneð , bittre toyrneð . 
 werig winneð , widsið onginneð , 
 sar nesan|neh|ne sinniþ , sorh|sorg cinnið , 
 blæd hit|his|he blinnið , bliss|blis linnið , 
 list linneð , lust nesan|neh|ne tinneð . 
 dream swa heran|her gedreosað , dryhtscype gehreosað , 
 lif heran|her mann forleosað , leahtras oft geceosað ; 
 treowþrag wesan|seon|is toh|to trag , seon|seo|se untrum genag , 
 steap eatole misþah , and eal stund genag . 
 swa nu world wendan , wyrdan|wyrd sendan , 
 and hetes henteð , hæleþ|hæle scyndeð . 
 wercyn gewiteð , wælgar sliteð , 
 flahmah flitan , flan|fla mann|man hwiteð , 
 borgsorg biteð , bald ald þwiteþ , 
 wræcfæc wriþað , wriþan|wraþ að smitan , 
 singryn sidað , searofearo glidan , 
 gromtorn grafan , græft hafað , 
 searohwit solian , sumurhat colað , 
 foldwela fealleð , feondscipe wealleð , 
 eorðmægen ealdaþ , ellen colað . 
 me|ic þæt|se wyrdan|wyrd gewæf , and gewyrht forgifan|forgiefan , 
 þæt|se ic grafan græf , and þæt|se grimman|grimm|grim græf 
 flean flæsc nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , þonne|se flanhred dæg 
 nydgrapum niman , þonne|se seon|seo|se niht|neaht becymeð 
 seon|seo|se me|ic eðles ofonn and mec heran|her eardes onconn . 
 þonne|se lichoma ligeð , lim wyrm fretan , 
 acan|ac him|hi|he wennan|wenn gewigeð and þu|þa|se wist geþygeð , 
 oþþæt beon þu|þa|se ban on|an , 
 and æt|etan neah nan nefne se neda tan|ta 
 balawun heran|her hleotan . nesan|neh|ne beon se hlisa adroren . 
 ær þæt|se eadig geþenceð , he he þu|þe|se oft swenceð , 
 byrgeð him|hi|he þu|þa|se bitter|bitor|biter synn , hycgan toh|to þære|se betran wynn , 
 gemunan morþ lisse , þær wesan|nesan miltsian|milts bliss|blis 
 hyhtlice in heofon romana . witon nu halig|halga|haleg gelice 
 scyldum biscyrede scyndan generian , 
 womm biwerede , wuldor generian , 
 þær moncyn motan|mot for|faran meotude rot 
 soð god geseon , and aa in sibb|sib gefea . 
 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic secgan gen bi|be sum fugol 
 wundorliс 
 fæger , 
 þæt|se word þu|þe|se cweðan wuldor ealdor : 
 " in swa hwilc tiid swa ge mid treowe|treow toh|to me|ic 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hweorfað , and ge hellfirena 
 sweart geswicað , swa ic simble toh|to ge|eowan|eow 
 mid siblufan sona gecyrre 
 þurh milde mod . ge beoð me|ic siððan 
 torht tireadge talade and riman , 
 beorht broþor on|an bearn stælan|stelan . " 
 witon we þywan|þy|þe|se geornor god oliccan , 
 firen feogan , friþ earnian , 
 duguðe toh|to dryhten , þenden we|us dæg scinu|scinan , 
 þæt|se swa æþele eardwica cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan 
 in wuldor wlite|wlitan wunian motan . 
 finit . 
 
 crist wesan|seon|beon acennyd , cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 on|an midd winter , mære|mæran þeon|þeodan , 
 ece ælmihtig , on|an þywan|þy|þe|se eahtoþa dæg 
 hælend hatan|gehatan , heofonrices weard . 
 swa þu|þa|se sylfan tiid side|sid herigeas , 
 folc unmæte , habbað foreweard gear , 
 for|faran þywan|þy|þe|se se kalend we|us cymeð geþincged 
 on|an þæm|þam|se ilca dæge|dæg we|us toh|to tune|tun , 
 forma monaþ|monað ; he folc micel 
 ianuarius gerum hatan . 
 and se ymb fif niht|neaht se fulwihttiid 
 ece drihten toh|to we|us cymeð , 
 se twelfta dæg tireadige , 
 hæleð heaðurofe , hatað on|an brytene , 
 in folde heran|her . swilce emb feower wucan 
 se solmonað sigeð toh|to tune|tun 
 butan twegen niht|neaht , swa hit getellan geo , 
 februarius fær , frod gesiþ , 
 eald ægleawe . and se ymb an niht|neaht 
 þæt|se we marian mæsse healdað , 
 cyning modor , forðam heo crist on|an þæm|þam|se dæge|dæg , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wealdende , bringan|brengan toh|to templ|tempel . 
 ðænne se emb fif niht|neaht þæt|se afered byð 
 winter of wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , and se wigend þu|þa|se 
 æfter seofentynum swylt þrowade 
 nihtgerimes , nergendes þicgan|þegen|geþicgan , 
 mathias mære|mæran , min gefræge , 
 se þu|þe|se lencten on|an tun liþan|geliþan habban , 
 wer toh|to wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic . swilce eacan|eac wesan|seon|is wid cuð 
 ymb þri and twegen|twa þeod gewelhwær 
 hit|his|he cyme kalend ceorlum and eorlum 
 ( butan þonne bises gebeodan|beodan weorðe 
 feorðan geare|gear ; þonne he furðor cymeð 
 ufor an niht|neaht we|us toh|to tune|tun ) , 
 hriman|hrim hyrstan hagolscurum færð 
 geond middangeard martius reðe , 
 hlyd healic . ðænne se halig|halgian|halga|haleg se 
 emb xi niht|neaht æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele scynde 
 gregorius in god wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 breme in brytene . swilce benedictus 
 ymb nigon niht|neaht se nergend sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 heard and higestrang , se heriað wel 
 in gewrit wise|wis , wealdende þeowan|þeow 
 rinc regolfæste . swilce eacan|eac rimcræftige 
 on|an þu|þa|se ilca tiid emniht healdað , 
 forðam wealdend god wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan æt|etan frymþ 
 on|an þywan|þy|þe|se sylfan dæge|dæg sunne|sunnan|sunna and spiht|monan|mona . 
 hwæt#2 , ymb feower niht|neaht fæder onsendan , 
 se þu|þe|se emnihte eorl healdað , 
 heahengel hit|his|he , se hælu abeodan 
 marian mycle , þæt|se heo meotod sculan 
 cennan , kyning wel|betan , swa hit gecyðed wearð 
 geond middangeard ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se mære|mæran wyrdan|wyrd , 
 folc gefræge ! swilce emb feower and þri 
 nihtgerimes , se nergend sendan 
 aprelis monaþ|monað , on|an þæm|þam|se oftust cymð 
 seon|seo|se mære|mæran tiid mann toh|to frofor , 
 drihten ærist ; þonne dream gerist 
 wel wid gehwær , swa se witega singan|sang : 
 " þes wesan|seon|is se dæg se drihten we|us 
 wisfæst wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , wer cneoris , 
 eall|eal eorðwarum eadig toh|to bliss|blis . " 
 nesan|neh|ne magan we þu|þa|se tidan|tid be getæl|geteal healdan|heald 
 dagena rim , nesan|neh|ne drihten stigan|stig 
 on|an heofenas up , forðam þu|þe|se hwearfað aa 
 wis gewyrdum , acan|ac sculan winter frod 
 on|an circule cræftan|cræft findan 
 halig dæg|dah|dag . sculan we hwæðere git 
 martira gemynd micel areccan , 
 wrecan word forþ|forð , witan gesingan , 
 þæt|se ymb nihgontyne niht|neaht and fif , 
 se þu|þe|se eastermonað toh|to we|us cymeð , 
 þæt|se munan|mann|man reliquias ræran onginneð , 
 halig gehyrste ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is healic dæg , 
 bentiid breme . swilce in burh raþe 
 ymb six niht|neaht se , smicer on|an gearu , 
 wudu and wyrt cymeð wlitig scriðan 
 þrymilce on|an tun , þearf bringeð 
 maius micel geond menigu gehwær . 
 swa þi|se ilca dæge|dæg æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele gefere|gefera , 
 philippus and iacob , feorh agefan , 
 modig magoþegnas for|faran meotudes lufu|lufe . 
 and se ymb twegen|twa niht|neaht se tæсan|tæcan god 
 elene eadig æþelust beam , 
 on|an þæm|þam|se þrowian þeon|þeodan engel 
 for|faran mannian|mann lufu|lufe , meotud on|an galgan 
 be fæder leaf . swilce ymb fyrst wucan 
 butan an niht|neaht se yld bringð 
 sigelbeorhte dæg|dah|dag sumor|sumer toh|to tune|tun , 
 wearm gewyderu . þonne wang hraðe 
 blostma|blostm blowað , swilce blis astihð 
 geond middangeard manig hadian|had 
 cwicera cynn , cyninge|cyning lof secgað 
 mænifealdlice , mære bremað , 
 ælmihtig . se emb eahtian|eahta and nigon 
 dogera rim se drihten niman 
 in oðer sunnan|leoht agustinus , 
 bliðne on|an breost , se þu|þe|se he on|an brytene heran|her 
 eaðmode him|hi|he eorl findan 
 toh|to god willan|willa , swa him|hi|he se gleaw bebeodan 
 gregorius . nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic guma wifcynn|hosp|flet|a fyrn 
 ænig ær æfre bringan 
 ofer sealten|sealt merian|mere god lar , 
 bisceop bremran . nu on|an brytene restan 
 on|an cantwarum cynestole neah , 
 mynster mære . þonne monaþ|monað bringð 
 ymb twegen|twa and feower tiida lange|lang 
 ær liða we|us toh|to tune|tun , 
 iunius on|an geard , on|an þæm|þam|se gim astihð 
 on|an heofenas up hyhst on|an geare|gear , 
 tungol torhtust , and of tille agrynt , 
 toh|to settan sigeð . wyle siððan lengan|leng|lange 
 grund behealdan and gangan lator 
 ofer folde wang fægerust leoht , 
 woruldgesceafta . þonne wuldor þegn 
 ymb þreotyne , þeodnes dyrling , 
 iohannes in geardagan wearð acennan , 
 tynan|tin niht|neaht eacan|eac ; we þu|þa|se tiid healdað 
 on|an midd sumor|sumer mycles on|an æþelu|æþele|æþel . 
 wid wesan|seon|is geweorðod , swa þæt|se wel gerist , 
 halig tidan|tid geond hæleða birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 petrus and paulus . hwæt#2 , þu|þa|se apostol , 
 þeodenholde , þrowedon on|an rome 
 ofer midd sumor|sumer , miccle gewitan|gewiss|gewis , 
 furðor fif niht|neaht , folcbealo þrealic , 
 mære martyrdom ; habban mænige ær 
 wundrian|wundor|wund gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan geond wærþeoda , 
 swilce hi|heo æfter þæm|þam|se unrim fremman 
 swutelra and gesynra þurh sunu meotudes , 
 ealdorþegnas . þonne ædre cymð 
 emb twegen|twa niht|neaht se tidlice we|us 
 iulius monaþ|monað , on|an þæm|þam|se iacobus 
 ymb feower niht|neaht feorh gesellan 
 and twentigum , trum in breost , 
 frod and fæstræd folc lareow , 
 zebedes afera . and se simble scriþan 
 ymb seofon niht|neaht se sumer gebrihted 
 weodmonað on|an tun , welhwær bringeð 
 agustus yrmenþeodum 
 hlafmæssan dæg . swa se hærfest cymð 
 ymbe|ymb oðer swylc butan an wanan , 
 wlitig , wæstm hladan ; wela byð geywan 
 fæger on|an folde . þonne forþ|forð gewitan 
 ymb þri niht|neaht se þeodne getreowe 
 þurh martyrdom , mære|mæran diacon , 
 laurentius , hæfð nu lif wiðþan 
 mid wuldorfæder weorc toh|to lean . 
 swilce se ymb fif niht|neaht fægerust mægða , 
 wifian|wif wuldor|seolh|bearm , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan werod god 
 for|faran sunu sibb|sib , sigefæst ham 
 on|an neorxnawang ; habban nergend þu|þa|se 
 fæger fostorlean fæmne forgieldan 
 ece toh|to ealdor|eald . þonne ealling byð 
 ymb tynan|tin niht|neaht se tiid geweorðad 
 bartholomeus in brytene heran|her , 
 wyrdan|wyrd welþungen . swilce eacan|eac wid byð 
 eorlum geypped æþeling deað 
 ymb feower niht|neaht , se þu|þe|se fæger iu 
 mid wæter oferweorpan wuldor cynebearn , 
 wiga|wig weorðlice . be him|hi|he wealdend cweðan 
 þæt|se nan mære munan|mann|man geond middangeard 
 betweoh wif and werian|wer weorþan acennan . 
 and se ymbe|ymb þri niht|neaht geond þeod feala 
 se haligmonð , heleþum þingan|geþingan , 
 fereð toh|to folc , swa hit foregleawe , 
 eald uþwita , æror fundan , 
 septembres fær , and þywan|þy|þe|se seofoþan dæg 
 þæt|se acennan wearð cwen selost , 
 drihten modor . þonne dagena worn 
 ymbe|ymb þreotyne þegn unforcuð , 
 godspell|godspel gleaw , gast onsendan 
 matheus hit|his|he toh|to metodsceafte , 
 in eсe gefea . þonne ealling cymð 
 ymb þri niht|neaht se þeod wid 
 emnihtes dæg , yld bearn . 
 hwæt#2 , we weorðiað wid geond eorþ|eorðe 
 heahengles tiid on|an hærfest , 
 michaheles , swa þæt|se menigo witan , 
 fif niht|neaht ufor se þu|þe|se folc byð , 
 eorlum geywan emnihtes dæg . 
 and se ymb twegen|twa niht|neaht þæt|se se teoða monð 
 on|an folc fereð , frod geþeaht , 
 october on|an tun we|us toh|to geniht , 
 winterfylleð , swa he wid cigað 
 igbuende engel and seax , 
 wer mid wif . swilce wiga tiid 
 ymb twentig se twegra healdað 
 and seofon niht|neaht samod ætgædere 
 on|an an dæg . we þu|þa|se æþeling 
 fyrn gefrunan þæt|se hi foremære , 
 simon and iudas , simble wesan|seon|beon , 
 drihten dyre ; forðam hi|heo don|dom hlutan , 
 eadig upweg . and se ofost bringð 
 ymb feower niht|neaht , folc genihtsum , 
 blotmonað on|an tun , beorn toh|to witan|wist , 
 nouembris , niða bearn 
 eadignesse , swa nan oðer na deð 
 monaþ|monað micel|mare|mara milts drihten . 
 and þywan|þy|þe|se ilca dæge|dæg eall|eal we healdað 
 sanct symbel þær|se þu|þe|se sið oððe ær 
 worhtan in weorold willan|willa drihten . 
 siððan winter dæg wid gangeð 
 on|an six niht|neaht , sigelbeortne genimð 
 hærfest mid herian|here hrim and snaw , 
 forst gefeterad , be frea hæs , 
 þæt|se we|us wunian nesan|neh|ne motan wang grene , 
 folde frætuwe . se ymb feower niht|neaht 
 se martinus mære|mæran geleorde , 
 wer womm leas wealdend sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 upengel weard . þonne ymb eahtian|eahta niht|neaht 
 and feowerum se fah god 
 besenctun on|an sægrund sigefæst wer , 
 on|an brim hara|har , þu|þe|se iu beorn fela 
 clementes oft clypiað toh|to þearf . 
 and se ymb seofon niht|neaht , sigedrihtne leof , 
 æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele andreas up on|an roderum 
 hit|his|he gast agifan|agiefan on|an god wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 fus on|an forðweg . þonne folc bringð 
 morgen toh|to mann monaþ|monað toh|to tune|tun , 
 decembris drihta bearn , 
 ær iula . swilce emb eahtian|eahta and twelf 
 nihtgerimes se nergend self 
 þristhydigum thomase forgifan|forgiefan 
 wiþ|wið earfeðum ece romana , 
 beald beornwigan bletsunga hit|his|he . 
 þonne emb feower niht|neaht se fæder engel 
 hit|his|he sunu sendan on|an þes side|sid gesceaft 
 folc toh|to frofor . nu ge findan magan 
 halig tiida þu|þe|se munan|mann|man healdan|heald sculan , 
 swa bebugeð gebod geond brytenricu 
 sexna kyning on|an þes sylfan tiid . 
 
 rod wesan|seon|is min|ic nama . geo ic riсe cyning 
 bær|beran byfigynde , blod besteman . 
 þes rode|rod hettan|het|hedan|hatan æþlmær wyrican and aðelwold his beroþor 
 criste toh|to lof for|faran ælfrices saule hyra|hyr|hira|hi beroþor . 
 
 wrætlic wesan|seon|is þes wealstan , wyrdan|wyrd gebrecan ; 
 burgstede berstan , brosnað ent geweorc . 
 hrofas wesan|nesan gehrorene , hreorge torr , 
 hrungeat bereofan , hriman|hrim on|an lim , 
 sceard scurbeorge scorene , gedrorene , 
 ældo undereotone . eorðgrap hafað 
 waldend wyrhta forweorone , geleorene , 
 heardgripe hruse , oþ hund|1000 cnea 
 werþeoda gewitan|gewita . oft se wigan|wag gebidan 
 ræghar and readfah romana æfter oþrum|oþer|oðer , 
 ofstonden under storm ; steap geap gedreas . 
 wonað git|gietan|geotan se . . .num geheapen , 
 felan|fel on|an 
 grimman|grimm|grim grindan 
 scinan heo . . . 
 . . .g orþonc ærsceaft 
 . . .g lamrindum bugan|beah|beag 
 mod mo . . . . . .yne swift gebrægd 
 hwætred in hring , hygerof gebond 
 weallwalan wirum wundor togædre . 
 beorht wesan|seon|beon burgræced , burnsele manig , 
 heah horngestreon , heresweg micel , 
 meodoheall manig dream full , 
 oþþæt þæt|se onwendan wyrdan|wyrd seon|seo|se swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe . 
 crinсgan|cringan|crincgan walo wid , cwoman woldæg , 
 swylt eall|eal forniman secgrofra wer ; 
 wurdon|weorþan hyra|hyr|hira|hi wigsteal westen|westan staþol , 
 brosnade burgsteall . betend crinсgan|cringan|crincgan 
 here toh|to hruse . forðam þes hof dreorgiað , 
 and se teaforgeapa tigele sceadeð 
 hrostbeages hrof . hryre wong gecrong 
 gebrucan|gebrecan|brucan|brecan toh|to beorg , þær iu beornan|beorn|beirnan manig 
 glædmod and goldbeorht gleoma gefrætwed , 
 wlonc and wingal wighyrstum scinan ; 
 sugan|seon on|an sincan|sinc , on|an sylfor , on|an searogimmas , 
 on|an eadan|ead , on|an æht , on|an eorcanstan , 
 on|an þes beorht cantwara|burg brad rices . 
 stanhofu stodan , stream hatan|hat weorpan 
 wid wylme ; wealh eall|eal befon 
 beorht bosm , þær þu|þa|se bæþ wesan|seon|beon , 
 hatan|hat on|an hreþer . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon hyðelic . 
 lætan þonne|se geotan 
 ofer har stan hatan|hat stream 
 un . . . 
 . . .þþæt hringmere hatan|hat 
 þær þu|þa|se bæþ wesan|seon|beon . 
 þonne|se wesan|seon|is 
 . . .re ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is cynelic þingan|þing , 
 hus . . . . . . cantwara|burg . . . . 
 hwæt#2 ! we gardena in geardagum , 
 þeodcyninga , þri gefrunon , 
 hu þe|þa|ða|se æþeling ellen fremman . 
 oft scyld scefing sceaþena þreatum , 
 monegum mægþ , meodosetla ofteon , 
 egsian eorl . siððan ærest|ær wearð 
 feasceaft findan , he se frofor gebidan , 
 weaxan under wolcn|wolcen , weorðmyndum þiсgan|þicgan|þeon , 
 oðþæt him|hi|he æghwylc þær|se ymbsittendra 
 ofer hronrade hyran sculan , 
 gomban gyldan . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon god cyning ! 
 þæm|se eafera wesan|seon|beon æfter cennan , 
 geong|gangan in geard , se god sendan 
 folc toh|to frofor ; fyrenðearfe ongitan|ongietan 
 þu|þe|se hi|heo ær dreogan aldorleas 
 lange|lang hwil . him|hi|he se liffrea , 
 wuldor wealdend , woroldare forgifan|forgiefan ; 
 beowulf wesan|seon|beon breme (blæd wid sprang) , 
 scyldes eafera scedelandum in . 
 swa sculan geong|gangan guma god gewyrcean , 
 from feohgiftum on|an fæder bearm , 
 þæt|se he on|an yldan|yld|ildan|ild eft gewunian 
 wilgesiþas , þonne|se wigan|wig cuman|ancuman , 
 leode|leodan|leod gelæstan ; lofdædum sculan 
 in mægþ gehwære munan|mann|man geþeon . 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se scyld gewitan toh|to gescæphwile 
 felahror feran on|an frea wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 hi|heo he þu|þa|se ætberan toh|to brim faroðe , 
 swæs gesiþ , swa he selfa bædan|biddan , 
 þenden word wealdan wine|win scyldinga ; 
 leof landfruma lange|lang agan . 
 þær æt|etan hyðe standan hringedstefna , 
 isig and utfus , æþeling fær . 
 aledon þu|þa|se leof þeon|þeodan , 
 beah|beagian|beag brytta , on|an bearm scip , 
 mære be micel . þær wesan|seon|beon madma fela 
 of feorwegum , frætwa , lædan|gelædan ; 
 nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic cymlicor ceol gegyrwan 
 hildewæpnum and heaðowædum , 
 bil and byrnum ; him|hi|he on|an bearm liсgan|licgan 
 madma mænigo , þu|þa|se him|hi|he mid sculan 
 on|an flod æht feor gewitan|gewita . 
 nalæs hi|heo he læssa lacu|lac teodan , 
 þeodgestreonum , þon|se þu|þa|se don 
 þu|þe|se he æt|etan frumsceafte forþ|forð onsendan 
 an ofer yðe umborwesende . 
 þu|þa|se git hi|heo him|hi|he asettan seon geldenne 
 heah ofer heafod , lætan holm beran|bera , 
 giefan|gefan on|an garsecg ; him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon geomor sefa , 
 murnan mod . mann nesan|neh|ne cunnan 
 secgan toh|to soð , selerædende , 
 hæleð under heofenum , hwæt|hwa þæm|se hlæste onfon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon on|an burh|burg beowulf scyldinga , 
 leof leodcyning , long|lange þrage 
 folc gefræge (fæder ellor hwerfan|hweorfan , 
 aldor of earde) , oþþæt him|hi|he eft onwæcnan|onwacan 
 heah healfdene ; healdan þenden libban , 
 gamol and guðreouw , glæde scyldingas . 
 þæm|se feower birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn forþ|forð riman|geriman 
 in worold wocun , weoroda ræswan|ræswa , 
 heorogar and hroðgar and halig|halgian|halga|haleg til ; 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic þæt|se wesan|seon|beon onelan cwen , 
 heaðoscilfingas healsgebedda . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon hroðgare heresped gyfen , 
 wig weorðmynd , þæt|se him|hi|he hit|his|he winemagas 
 georne|geornan|georn hyrdan|hyran , oðð þæt|se seon|seo|se geogoð geweaxan , 
 magodriht micel . him|hi|he on|an mod birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 þæt|se healreced hatan|hat willan , 
 medoærn micel , mann gewyrcean 
 þonne|se ieldo birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn æfre gefrunon , 
 and þær on|an innan eall|eal gedælan 
 geonga|geong and eald , swylc him|hi|he god sellan , 
 butan folcscare and feorh guma . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic wid gefrignan weorc gebannan 
 manig mægþ geond þes middangeard , 
 folcstede frætwan . him|hi|he on|an fyrst|first gelomp , 
 ædre mid yld , þæt|se hit wearð ealgearo , 
 healærna micel ; scieppan him|hi|he heort naman|nama 
 se þu|þe|se hit|his|he word geweald wid habban . 
 he beatan nesan|neh|ne aleh , beah|beag dælan , 
 sincan|sinc æt|etan simble . sellan|sele|sel hlifade , 
 heah and horngeap , heaðowylma bidan , 
 lað liges ; nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon hit lengan þu|þa|se gen 
 þæt|se se ecghete aþumsweorum 
 æfter wælniðe wæcnan sculan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se ellengæst earfoþlice|earfoðlice 
 þrage geþolian , se þu|þe|se in þystru|þystre bidan , 
 þæt|se he dogora gehwa dream gehyrdan|gehyran 
 hlud in heall ; þær wesan|seon|beon hearpe swegan|sweg , 
 swutol singan|sang scopes . sægan|seсgan|secgan se þu|þe|se cuþ|cunnan 
 frumsceaft firas feorran|feorr|feor reccan , 
 cweðan þæt|se se ælmihtig|eallmihtig eorþ|eorðe wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 wlitebeorht wang , swa wæter bebugeð , 
 gesette|gesettan sigehreþig sunne|sunnan|sunna and spiht|monan|mona 
 leoma toh|to sunnan|leoht landbuend 
 and gefrætwade folde sceat 
 leoma and leaf , lif eacan|eac gesceppan 
 cynn gehwylc þær|se þu|þe|ðe cwic hwyrfaþ . 
 swa þe|þa|ða|se drihtguman dream libban 
 eadiglice , oððæt on|an onginnan 
 fyren fremman feond on|an hell|hel . 
 wesan|seon|beon se grimm|grim gæstan|gan grendel hatan , 
 mære|mæran mearcstapa , se þu|þe|se mor healdan , 
 fen and fæsten|fæstan ; fifelcynnes eard 
 wonsæli wer weardian hwil , 
 siþðan him|hi|he scyppend forscrifen habban 
 in caines cynn . se cwealm gewrecan 
 ece drihten , se þu|þe|se he abel slean ; 
 nesan|neh|ne gefeon he þære|se fæhðe , acan|ac he he feor forwrecan , 
 metod for|faran þywan|þy|þe|se mane , mancynn fram . 
 þanan untydras ealle|eall|eal onwæcnan|onwacan , 
 eoten and ylfe and orcneas , 
 swilce gigantas , þu|þa|se wiþ|wið god winnan 
 lange|lang þrage ; he him|hi|he se lean forgieldan . 
 gewitan þe|þa|ða|se neosian , syþðan niht|neaht becuman , 
 hean|heah hus , hu hit hringdene 
 æfter beorþege gebuan|buan habban . 
 findan þu|þa|se þær inne æþeling gedriht 
 swefan æfter simble ; sorh|sorg nesan|neh|ne cuðon , 
 wonsceaft wer . wiht unhælo , 
 grim and grædig , gearu|gearo sona wesan|seon|beon , 
 reocan|reoc and reþe|reðe , and on|an ræste geniman 
 þritig þegnian|þegn|þegen , þanan eft gewitan 
 huðe hremig toh|to ham faran , 
 mid þære|se wælfylle wiс|wicu neosan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon on|an uhta mid ærdæge 
 grendles guðcræft guma undyrne ; 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon æfter witan|wist wop up ahebban , 
 micel morgensweg . mære|mæran þeon|þeodan , 
 æþeling ærgod , unbliðe sæt|sittan , 
 þolian ðryðswyð , þegnsorge dreogan , 
 siððan hi|heo se lað last sceawedon , 
 werig gast ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se gewin toh|to strang , 
 lað and longsum . næs|nesan hit lengra fyrst , 
 acan|ac ymb an niht|neaht eft gefremian 
 morðbeala micel|mare|mara and no murnan for|faran , 
 fæhðe and fyren ; wesan|seon|beon toh|to fæstan|fæst on|an þæm|þam|se . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eaðfynde þu|þe|se him|hi|he elles hwær 
 gerumlicor ræste sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 bed æfter burum , þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he gebeacnian|beacnian wicu|wice|wican sweotol tacn|tacen 
 healðegnes hettan|hatan ; healdan he siððan 
 fyr and fæstor se þæm|se feond ætwindan . 
 swa rixode and wiþ|wið rihte|rihtan|riht wan , 
 ana|an wiþ|wið eall|eal , oðþæt idel standan 
 husian|hus sellan . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se hwil micel ; 
 twelf wintra|winter tidan|tid torn geþolian 
 wine|win scyldinga , wea gehwelcne , 
 sid sorh|sorgian|sorg . forðam secg wearð , 
 yld bearn , undyrne cuð , 
 gyddum geomor , se grendel wan 
 hwil wiþ|wið hroþgar , heteniðas wegan , 
 fyren and fæhðe fela missere , 
 singal sæce , sibb|sib nesan|neh|ne willan 
 wiþ|wið mannian|mann hwæt|hwa mægenes deniga , 
 feorhbealo feorran|feorr|feor , fea þingian , 
 nesan|neh|ne þær nænig wita wenan|wena þurfan 
 beorht bot toh|to bana folm , 
 acan|ac se æglæca ehtan wesan|seon|beon , 
 deorc deaþscua , duguþ and geogoþe , 
 seomade and syrede , sinnihte healdan 
 mistige mor ; mann nesan|neh|ne cunnan 
 hwider helrunan hwyrftum scriþað . 
 swa fela fyren feond mancynn , 
 atol angengea , oft gefremian , 
 heard hynða . heorot eardian , 
 sincfag sel sweart niht|neaht ; 
 no he se gifstol gretan motan , 
 maþðum for|faran metod , nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he munan witan . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon wræc|wrecan micel wine|win scyldinga , 
 mod brecða . manig oft gesittan 
 romana toh|to run ; rædan|ræd eahtedon 
 hwæt#2 swiðferhðum sellan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 wiþ|wið færgryre toh|to gefremmanne . 
 hwilum|hwil hi|heo gehatan æt|etan hærgtrafum 
 wigweorþunga , word biddan 
 þæt|se him|hi|he gastbona geoc gefremian 
 wiþ|wið þeodþreaum . swylc wesan|seon|beon þeaw hyra|hyr|hira|hi , 
 hæþen hyht ; hell|hel gemunan 
 in modsefa , metod hi|heo nesan|neh|ne cunnan , 
 dæd demend , nesan|neh|ne witan hi|heo drihten god , 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo huru heofena helm herian nesan|neh|ne cunnan , 
 wuldor waldend . wa bið þæm|se þu|þe|ðe sculan 
 þurh sliðne nið sawol|sawel bescufan 
 in fyr fæþm , frofor nesan|neh|ne wenan|wena , 
 wiht gewendan ; wel bið þæm|se þu|þe|se motan|mot 
 æfter deaðdæge drihten secean 
 and toh|to fæder fæþmum freoðo wilnian . 
 swa þe|þa|ða|se mælceare mæg|mecgan|magian|maga healfdenes 
 singal seaþ , nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan snotor hæleð 
 wea onwendan ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se gewin toh|to swyð , 
 liþan|laþ and longsum , þu|þe|se on|an þe|þa|ða|se leode|leodan|leod becuman , 
 nydwracu niþgrim , nihtbealwa micel . 
 þæt|se fram ham gefrignan higelaces þegn , 
 god mid geatum , grendles dæd ; 
 se wesan|seon|beon moncynnes mægenes strengest 
 on|an þæm|se dæge|dæg þysses lifes|lif , 
 æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele and eacen|eacan . hettan|het|hedan|hatan him|hi|he yðlidan 
 god gegyrwan , cweðan , he guðcyning 
 ofer swanrade secean willan , 
 mære þeon|þeodan , þu|þa|se him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon mannian|mann þurfan|þearf . 
 se siþfæt him|hi|he snotere ceorlas 
 lythwon lean , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he him|hi|he leof wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ; 
 hwettan higerofne , hælan|helan sceawedon . 
 habban se god geata leode|leoda|leod 
 cempa gecorone þær|se þu|þe|se he cenoste 
 findan miht|meaht|magan ; xvna sum|su 
 sundwudu sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ; secg wisade , 
 lagucræftig mann|man , landgemyrcu . 
 fyrst forþ|forð gewitan . flotian|flota wesan|seon|beon on|an yðum , 
 bitan|bat under beorgan|beorg . beorn gearu 
 on|an stefn stigan ; stream windan , 
 sund wiþ|wið sande ; secg beran 
 on|an bearm naca beorht frætwe , 
 guðsearo geatolic ; guma ut scufan , 
 wer on|an wilsið , wudu bundenne . 
 gewitan þu|þa|se ofer wægholm , windan|wind fysan , 
 flotian|flota famiheals fugol gelicost , 
 oðþæt ymb antid oþer|oðer dogores 
 wundenstefna wadan|gewadan habban 
 þæt|se þe|þa|ða|se liðende land|finna geseon , 
 brimclifu blican , beorg steap , 
 side|sid sænæssas ; þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon sund liþan , 
 eoletes æt|etan ende . þanan up hraðe 
 wedera leode|leodan|leod on|an wang stigan , 
 sæwudu sælan (syrcan hrysedon , 
 guðgewædo) , god þancedon 
 se þu|þe|se him|hi|he yþlade eaðe wurdon|weorþan . 
 þu|þa|se of weallan|weall geseon weard scildinga , 
 se þu|þe|se holmclifu healdan|heald sculan , 
 beran|bera ofer bolca beorht randas , 
 fyrdsearu fuslicu ; he fyrwyt brecan 
 modgehygd , hwæt#2 þu|þa|se mann wesan|seon|beon . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se toh|to waroðe wicge ridan|rida 
 þegn hroðgares , þrymm cweccan 
 mægenwudu mund , meþelwordum frægn|frignan|fregnan : 
 "hwæt syndon ge searohæbbendra , 
 byrnum werian|weorod , þu|þe|se þus brontne ceol 
 ofer lagustræte lædan cuman , 
 hider ofer holm gewinnan|geblandan . . .le wesan|seon|beon 
 endesæta , ægwearde healdan , 
 þu|þe|se on|an land|finna denu|dene laðra nænig 
 mid scipherge sceðþan nesan|neh|ne magan . 
 no heran|her cuðlicor cuman|cuma onginnan 
 lindhæbbende ; nesan|neh|ne ge leafnesword 
 guðfremmendra gearu nesan|neh|ne witan , 
 mæg|mecgan|magian|maga gemedu . næfre ic micel|mare|mara geseon 
 eorl ofer eorþe|eorþ þonne wesan|seon|is ge|eower sum|su , 
 secg on|an searu ; nesan þæt|se seldguma , 
 wæpn|wæpen geweorðad , næfne him|hi|he hit|his|he wlite|wlitan leogan , 
 ænlic ansyn . nu ic ge|eower sculan 
 frumcyn witan|wita , ær ge fyr heonan , 
 leassceaweras , on|an land|finna denu|dene 
 furþur feran . nu ge feorbuend , 
 mereliðende , min gehyrað 
 anfeald þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan : ofost wesan|seon|is sellan 
 toh|to gecyðanne hwanan eowre cyme syndon ." 
 him|hi|he se yldesta ondswarode , 
 werod wisian|wis , wordhord onlucan : 
 "we synt gumcynnes geata leode|leodan|leod 
 and higelaces heorðgeneatas . 
 wesan|seon|beon min|ic fæder folc gecyþan|cyþan , 
 æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele ordfruma , ecgþeow hatan . 
 gebidan wintra|winter worn , ær he on|an wegan|weg hweorfan , 
 gamol of geard ; he gearu gemunan 
 wita welhwylc wid geond eorþe|eorþ . 
 we þurh hold hige hlaford þinne|þin , 
 sunu healfdenes , secean cuman , 
 leodgebyrgean ; wesan þu we|us larena god . 
 habbað we toh|to þæm|se mære|mæran micel ærende|ærend , 
 deniga frea , nesan|neh|ne sculan þær dyrne sum|su 
 wese|wesan , se ic wennan|wenan|wen . þu witan (gif hit wesan|seon|is 
 swa we soþlice secgan hyrdon) 
 þæt|se mid scyldingum sceaðona ic nytan hwylc|hwilc , 
 deogol dædhata , deorc niht|neaht 
 eaweð þurh egsan uncuðne nið , 
 hynðu and hrafyl . ic se hroðgar mæg|magan 
 þurh rum sefa rædan|ræd gelæran|gelær , 
 hu he frod and god feond oferswyðeþ , 
 gif him|hi|he edwendan æfre sculan 
 bealuwa bisigu , bot eft cuman|cuma , 
 and þu|þa|se cearwylmas colran wurðaþ ; 
 oððe wifcynn|hosp|flet|a syþðan earfoðþrage , 
 þreanyd þolað , þenden þær wunað 
 on|an heahstede husian|hus sellan ." 
 weard maþelian , þær on|an wicge sæt|sittan , 
 ombeht unforht : "æghwæþres sculan 
 scearp scyldwiga gescad witan|wita , 
 word and worca , se þu|þe|se wel þenceð . 
 ic þæt|se gehyran , þæt|se þes wesan|seon|is hold weorod 
 frea scyldinga . gewitan forþ|forð beran|bera 
 wæpen and gewæde ; ic ge|eowan|eow wisian . 
 swilce ic maguþegnas min hatan|hat 
 wiþ|wið feond gehwone flota eower , 
 niwtyrwydne naca on|an sande 
 are|ar healdan|heald , oþðæt eft byreð 
 ofer lagustreamas leof mannan 
 wudu wundenhals toh|to wedermearce , 
 godfremmendra swilc gifeþe bið 
 þæt|se se hilderæs hal gedigeð ." 
 gewitan him|hi|he þu|þa|se feran . flotian|flota stille|stillan bidan , 
 seomian on|an sal sidfæþmed scip , 
 on|an ancor fæstan|fæst . eoforlic scionon 
 ofer hleorberan hreodan gold , 
 fah and fyrheard ; ferhwearde healdan 
 guþmod grimmon . guma onettan , 
 sigan|seon ætsomne , oþþæt hi sælan|sæl timbred , 
 geatolic and goldfah , ongyton mihton ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon foremærost foldbuend 
 receda under roderum , on|an þæm|se se rice|ric bidan ; 
 lixan se leoma ofer land|finna fela . 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se hildedeor hof|hebban modig 
 torht getæhte , þæt|se hi|heo him|hi|he toh|to mihton 
 gegnum gangan ; guðbeorna sum|su 
 wicg gewendan , word æfter cweðan : 
 "mæl wesan|seon|is me|ic toh|to feran ; fæder alwalda 
 mid arstafas eowic gehealdan 
 siða gesund . ic toh|to sæ willan 
 wiþ|wið wrað werod weard healdan|heald ." 
 stræt wesan|seon|beon stanfah , stigan|stig wisian 
 guma ætgædere . guðbyrne scinan 
 heard hondlocen , hringiren scir|defena 
 song in searu , þu|þa|se hi|heo toh|to sellan|sele|sel furðum 
 in hyra|hyr|hira|hi gryregeatwum gangan cuman . 
 settan sæmeþe side|sid scyldas , 
 rondas regnhearde , wiþ|wið se recedes wealh , 
 bugan þu|þa|se toh|to bence . byrnan hringan , 
 guðsearo guma ; gar standan , 
 sæmann searo , samod ætgædere , 
 æscholt ufan græg ; wesan|seon|beon se irenþreat 
 wæpn|wæpen gewurþad . þu|þa|se þær wlonc hæleð 
 oretmecgas æfter æþelu|æþele|æþel frægn|frignan|fregnan : 
 "hwanon ferigeað ge fætt scyldas , 
 græg syrcan and grimhelm , 
 heresceafta heap gewinnan|geblandan ic wesan|seon|eoh hroðgares 
 ar and ombiht . nesan|neh|ne sugan|seon ic elþeodig 
 þus manig|manian mann modiglicran . 
 wenan|wen ic þæt|se ge for|faran wlenco , nalles for|faran wræcsiðum , 
 acan|ac for|faran higeþrymmum hroðgar sœ̄сan|seсan|secan ." 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se ellenrof andswarian , 
 wlanc wedera leodan|leod , word æfter sprecan , 
 heard under helm : "we synt higelaces 
 beodgeneatas ; beowulf wesan|seon|is min|ic nama . 
 willan ic asecgan sunu healfdenes , 
 mære þeodne , min|ic ærende|ærend , 
 ald þin , gif he we|us geunnan willan|wil 
 þæt|se we he swa god gretan motan ." 
 wulfgar maþelian (þæt wesan|seon|beon wendla leodan|leod ; 
 wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he modsefa manig gecyðed , 
 wigan|wig and wisdom) : "ic se wine|win deniga , 
 frea scildinga , frinan willan , 
 beah|beagian|beag brytta , swa þu bena|ben wesan|seon , 
 þeon|þeodan mære , ymb þinne|þin sið , 
 and þu|þe|se þu|þa|se ondsware ædre gecyðan 
 þu|þe|ðe me|ic se god agifan þenceð ." 
 hwerfan|hweorfan þu|þa|se hrædlice þær hroðgar sæt|sittan 
 eald and anhar mid hit|his|he eorl gedriht ; 
 gan|eadan ellenrof , þæt|se he for|faran eaxl gestandan 
 deniga frea ; cuþ|cunnan he duguðe þeaw . 
 wulfgar maðelode toh|to hit|his|he winedrihtne : 
 "her syndon geferede , feorran|feorr|feor cumene 
 ofer geofenes begangan|begang geata leode|leodan|leod ; 
 se yldestan oretmecgas 
 beowulf nemnað . hi bena synt 
 þæt|se hi|heo , þeon|þeodan min|ic , wiþ|wið þu|þe|se motan 
 word wrixlan . no þu him|hi|he wearn geteon 
 ðinra gegncwide , glædman hroðgar . 
 hi on|an wiggetawum weorþ þinceað 
 eorl geæhtle ; huru se aldor dugan|deah , 
 se þæm|se heaðorincum hider wisade ." 
 hroðgar maþelian , helm scyldinga : 
 "ic he cuðe cnihtwesende . 
 wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he ealdfæder ecgþeo hatan , 
 þæm|se toh|to ham forgifan|forgiefan hreþel geata 
 ange dohtor ; wesan|seon|is hit|his|he eafora nu 
 heard heran|her cuman , sœ̄сan|seсan|secan hold wine|win . 
 þonne sægan|seсgan|secgan þæt|se sæliþend , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe gifsceattas geata fyredon 
 þider toh|to þance , þæt|se he xxxtiges 
 mannian|mann mægencræft on|an hit|his|he mundgripe 
 heaþorof habban . he halig god 
 for|faran arstafas we|us onsendan , 
 toh|to westdenum , se ic wenan|wen habban , 
 wiþ|wið grendles gryre . ic þæm|se god sculan 
 for|faran hit|his|he modþræce madmas beodan . 
 beon|beo þu on|an ofeste , hatan|hat in gan 
 seon|seo sibbegedriht samod ætgædere ; 
 gesaga him|hi|he eacan|eac word þæt|se hi|heo wesan|seon wilcuman 
 deniga leode|leoda|leod ." 
 word inne abeodan : 
 "eow hettan|het|hedan|hatan secgan sigedrihten min|ic , 
 aldor eastdena , þæt|se he ge|eower æþelu|æþele сinan|cunnan , 
 and ge him|hi|he syndon ofer sæwylmas 
 heardhicgende hider wilcuman . 
 nu ge motan gangan in eowrum guðgeatawum 
 under heregrima hroðgar geseon ; 
 lætað hildebord heran|her onbidan , 
 wudu , wælsceaftas , word geþing ." 
 arisan|ar þu|þa|se se rice|ric , ymb he rinc manig , 
 þryðlic þegnian|þegn|þegen heap ; sum þær bidan , 
 heaðoreaf healdan , swa him|hi|he se heardian|heard bebeodan . 
 snyredon ætsomne , þu|þa|se secg wisian , 
 under heorot hrof 
 heard under helm , þæt|se he on|an heoðe gestandan . 
 beowulf maðelode (on him|hi|he byrne scinan , 
 searonet seowed smiþ orþancum) : 
 "wæs þu , hroðgar , hal ! ic wesan|seon|eoh higelaces 
 mæg|magan and magoðegn ; habban ic mærþu fela 
 onginnan on|an geogoþe . me|ic wearð grendles þingan|þing 
 on|an minre|min eþelturf undyrne cuð ; 
 secgað sæliðend þæt|se se sellan|sele|sel standan|stand , 
 reced selesta , rinc gehwylc 
 idel and unnyt , siððan æfenleoht 
 under heofenes hador beholen weorþeð . 
 þu|þa|se me|ic þæt|se gelæran leode|leodan|leod min 
 þu|þa|se selestan , snotere ceorlas , 
 þeon|þeodan hroðgar , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 forðam hi|heo mægenes cræftan|cræft min cunnan , 
 self oferseon , þe|þa|ða|se ic of searu cuman , 
 fah from|fram feond , þær ic fife gebindan , 
 yðde eoten cyn and on|an yðum slean 
 niceras niht , nearoþearfe dreogan , 
 wræc|wrecan wedera nið (wean ahsodon) , 
 forgrand grama|gram , and nu wiþ|wið grendel sculan , 
 wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se aglæca , ana|an gehegan 
 ðing wiþ|wið þyrs . ic þu|þe|se nu þe|þa|ða|se , 
 breogo|brego beorhtdena , biddan willan , 
 eodor scyldinga , an ben , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic nesan|neh|ne forwyrne , wigendra hleo , 
 freowine folc , nu ic þus feorran|feorr|feor cuman , 
 þæt|se ic motan|mot ana|an and min eorl gedryht , 
 þes heardian|heard heap , heorot fælsian . 
 habban ic eacan|eac geahsod þæt|se se æglæca 
 for|faran hit|his|he wonhydum wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen nesan|neh|ne recceð . 
 ic þæt|se þonne|se forhicge (swa me|ic higelac wesan|seon|nesan , 
 min|ic mondrihten , mod bliðe) , 
 þæt|se ic sweord bere|beran|ber oþðe sid scyld , 
 geolorand toh|to guþ , acan|ac ic mid grap sculan 
 fon wiþ|wið feond and ymb feorh sacan , 
 lað wiþ|wið laþu|laþ ; þær gelyfan sculan 
 dryhten dom se þu|þe|se he deað nimeð . 
 wenan|wen ic þæt|se he willan , gif he wealdan motan|mot , 
 in þæm|se guðsele geotena leode|leodan|leod 
 etan unforht , swa he oft dydan|don , 
 mægen|magan hreðmanna . na þu min þurfan 
 hafalan hydan , acan|ac he me|ic habban willan|wil 
 dreor fahne , gif mec deað nimeð . 
 byreð blodig wæl|wel , byrgean þenceð , 
 eteð angenga unmurnlice , 
 mearcað morhopu ; no þu ymb min nesan|neh|ne þurfan 
 lices feorm lengan|leng|lange sorgian . 
 onsendan higelace , gif mec hild niman , 
 beaduscruda wel|betan , þæt|se min breost wereð , 
 hrægla sellan ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is hrædlan laf , 
 welandes geweorc . gæð wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wyrdan|wyrd swa hio scel ." 
 hroðgar maþelian , helm scyldinga : 
 "for gewyrhtum þu , wine|win min|ic beowulf , 
 and for|faran arstafas usic sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . 
 geslean þu|þin fæder fæhðe micel ; 
 weorþan he heaþolafe toh|to handbonan 
 mid wilfingum ; þe|þa|ða|se he wedera cyn 
 for|faran herebrogan habban nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan . 
 þanan he geseсan|gesecan suðdena folc 
 ofer yða gewealcan|gewealc , arscyldinga . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic furþum wealdan folc deniga 
 and on|an geogoðe healdan ginne romana , 
 hordburh hæleþ|hæle ; þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon heregar dead , 
 min|ic yldra mæg|magan unlifigende , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn healfdenes ; se wesan|seon|beon beterian|betera þonne ic . 
 siððan þu|þa|se fæhðe feoh þingian ; 
 sendan ic wylfingum ofer wæter hrycg 
 eald madmas ; he me|ic aþ swerian . 
 sorh wesan|seon|is me|ic toh|to secganne on|an sefa minum|min 
 guma ængum hwæt#2 me|ic grendel hafað 
 hynðo on|an heorot mid hit|his|he heteþancum , 
 færniða fremman . wesan|seon|is min|ic fletwerod , 
 wigheap wanian|gewanian ; hi|heo wyrdan|wyrd forsweop 
 on|an grendles gryre . god eaþe|eaþ mæg|magan 
 se dolsceaðan dæd getwæfan . 
 ful oft gebeotedon beore druncen 
 ofer ealowæge oretmecgas 
 þæt|se hi|heo in beorsele bidan willan 
 grendles guþ mid gryre ecga . 
 þonne wesan|seon|beon þes|þeoh|se medoheal on|an morgentid , 
 drihtsele dreorfah , þonne|se dæg lixan , 
 eal bencþelu blod bestyman , 
 heall heorudreore ; agan ic hold þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan , 
 deore duguðe , þu|þe|se þu|þa|se deað forniman . 
 sittan nu toh|to simble and onsæl meoto , 
 sigehreð secg , swa þu|þin sefa hwettan ." 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon geatmæcgum geador ætsomne 
 on|an beorsele benc ryman ; 
 þær swiðferhþe sittan gan|eadan , 
 þryðum dealle . þegn nytt behealdan , 
 se þu|þe|se on|an hand bær|beran hreodan ealowæge , 
 scencte scir|defena werian . scieppan hwilum|hwil singan|sang 
 hador on|an heorot . þær wesan|seon|beon hæleða dream , 
 duguð unlytel denu|dene and wedera . 
 unferð maþelian , ecglafes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 þu|þe|se æt|etan fot sæt|sittan frea scyldinga , 
 onbindan beadurune (wæs him|hi|he beowulfes sið , 
 modig merefaran , micel æfþunca , 
 forðam þu|þe|se he nesan|neh|ne unnan þæt|se ænig oðer munan|mann|man 
 æfre mærþu þon|se micel middangeard 
 gehedde under heofenum þonne|se he sylfa) : 
 "eart þu se beowulf , se þu|þe|se wiþ|wið brecan winnan , 
 on|an sid sæ ymb sund flitan , 
 þær git|gietan for|faran wlencu|wlencan wæd|wad cunnedon 
 and for|faran dolgilpe on|an deop wæter 
 aldrum neþan gewinnan|geblandan nesan|neh|ne git ænig mann|man , 
 nesan|neh|ne leof nesan|neh|ne lað , belean miht|meaht|magan 
 sorhfullne sið , þu|þa|se git|gietan on|an sund rowan . 
 þær git|gietan eagorstream earm þehton , 
 metan merestræta , mund bregdan , 
 glidan ofer garsecg ; geofon yþ weol , 
 wintrys wylmum . git|gietan on|an wæter æht 
 seofon niht|neaht swincan ; he þu|þe|se æt|etan sunde|sund oferflitan , 
 habban micel|mare|mara mægen|magan . þu|þa|se he on|an morgentid 
 on|an heaþoræmas holm up ætberan ; 
 ðonon he geseсan|gesecan swæs ᛟ , 
 leof hit|his|he leode|leoda|leod , land brondinga , 
 freoðoburh fæger , þær he folc agan , 
 burh and beah|beag . beatan eal wiþ|wið þu|þe|se 
 sunu beanstanes soð gelæstan . 
 þonne wennan|wenan|wen ic toh|to þu|þe|se wyrsa geþingea , 
 þeah þu heaðoræsa gehwær dugan , 
 grimm|grim guðe , gif þu grendles durran 
 nihtlongne fyrst neah bidan ." 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgþeowes : 
 "hwæt ! þu worn fela , wine|win min|ic unferð , 
 beore druncen|drincan ymb brecan sprecan , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan from|fram hit|his|he siþ . soð ic talian , 
 þæt|se ic merestrengo micel|mare|mara agan , 
 earfeþo on|an yþ , þonne ænig oþer|oðer munan|mann|man . 
 witan þæt|se gecweþan cnihtwesende 
 and gebeotedon (wæron begen þu|þa|se git|gietan 
 on|an geogoðfeore) þæt|se witan on|an garsecg ut 
 aldrum neðdon , and þæt|se geæfndon swa . 
 habban swurd nacod|nacian , þu|þa|se witan on|an sund rowan , 
 heard on|an hand ; witan wit wiþ|wið hronfixas 
 werian þenсean|þenсan|þencan . no he wiht fram me|ic 
 flodyþ feor fleotan magan , 
 hraþor on|an holm ; no ic fram him|hi|he willan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se witan ætsomne on|an sæ wesan|seon|beon 
 fif nihtian|niht|neaht fyrst , oþþæt wit flod todrifan , 
 wado weallan , wedera cealdost , 
 nipan niht|neaht , and norþanwind 
 heaðogrim ondhwearf ; hreo wesan|seon|beon yþian|yþ . 
 wesan|seon|beon merefixa mod onhreran ; 
 þær me|ic wiþ|wið laðum licsyrce min|ic , 
 heard , hondlocen , helpan gefremian , 
 beadohrægl broden on|an breost liсgan|licgan 
 gold gyrwan|gegyrwan . me|ic toh|to grund|grindan teon 
 fah feondscaða , fæstan|fæst habban 
 grim on|an grap ; hwæþre me|ic gyfeþe wearð 
 þæt|se ic aglæca ord geræhte , 
 hildebille ; heaþoræs forniman 
 mihtig meredeor þurh min hand . 
 swa mec gelome|gelom laðgeteonan 
 þreatedon þearle . ic him|hi|he þenian 
 deore sweord , swa hit gedefe wesan|seon|beon . 
 næs|nesan hi|heo se fyllu|fyllan gefea habban , 
 manfordædla , þæt|se hi|heo me|ic þicgan , 
 symbel ymbsittan sægrund neah ; 
 acan|ac on|an mergenne mecum wund|windan 
 be yðlafe uppe liсgan|licgan , 
 sweord aswebban , þæt|se siððan na 
 ymb brontne ford brimliðende 
 lad nesan|neh|ne lettan . sunnan|leoht eastan|east cuman , 
 beorht beacen god ; brim swaþrian , 
 þæt|se ic sænæssas geseon miht|meaht|magan , 
 windig weall . wyrdan|wyrd oft nereð 
 unfægne eorl , þonne|se hit|his|he ellen dugan|deah . 
 hwæþere me|ic gesælan þæt|se ic mid sweord ofslean 
 niceras nigene . no ic on|an niht|neaht gefrignan 
 under heofon hwealf heardran feohtan , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an egstreamum earmran mannon ; 
 hwaþere ic faru|fah fon feorh gedigan , 
 siþ werig . þe|þa|ða|se mec sæ oþbær , 
 flod æfter faroðe on|an finn land|finna , 
 wæd weallendu . no ic wiht fram þu|þe|se 
 swylcra searoniða secgan hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 bil broga . breca næfre git|gietan 
 æt|etan heaðolace , nesan|neh|ne gehwæþer incer , 
 swa deorlice dæd gefremian 
 fah sweord (no ic se fela gylpe) , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu þin broðrum toh|to bana weorþan , 
 heafodmæg ; se þu in hell|hel sculan 
 werhðo dreogan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þin witan dugan . 
 secg ic þu|þe|se toh|to soð , sunu ecglafes , 
 þæt|se næfre grendel swa fela gryre gefremian , 
 atol æglæca , ealdor|eald þin , 
 hynðo on|an heorot , gif þu|þin hige wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 sefa swa searogrim , swa þu self talian . 
 acan|ac he hafað onfindan þæt|se he þu|þa|se fæhðe nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf , 
 atol ecgþræce ge|eower leode|leodan|leod 
 swiðe|swiðan onsittan , sigescyldinga ; 
 nymeð nydbade , nænig arað 
 leode|leodan|leod deniga , acan|ac he lust wigeð , 
 swefeð and sendan , secce nesan|neh|ne wennan|wenan 
 toh|to gardenum . acan|ac ic him|hi|he geata sculan 
 eafoð and ellen ungeara nu , 
 guþ gebeodan . gan eft se þu|þe|se motan|mot 
 toh|to medo modig , siððan morgenleoht 
 ofer yld birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn oþer|oðer dogores , 
 sunne|sinnan sweglwered suþan|suþ scineð ." 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon on|an sal sinc brytta , 
 gamolfeax and guðrof ; geoc gelyfan|gelifan 
 breogo|brego beorhtdena , gehyrdan|gehyran on|an beowulfe 
 folc hyrdan|hyran|hirde fæstrædne þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon hæleþ|hæle hleahtor , hlyn swynsode , 
 word wesan|seon|beon wynsum . gan|eadan wealhþeow forþ|forð , 
 cwen hroðgares , cynn gemyndig , 
 gretan goldhroden guma on|an heall , 
 and þu|þa|se freolic wif ful gesellan 
 ærest|ær eastdena eþelweard , 
 bædan|biddan he bliðne æt|etan þære|se beorþege , 
 leode|leoda|leod leof . he on|an lust geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon 
 symbel and seleful , sigerof kyning . 
 ymbgan þu|þa|se ides helminga 
 duguþ and geogoþe dælan|dæl æghwylс , 
 sincfato sellan , oþþæt sælan|sæl alimpan 
 þæt|se hio beowulfe , beaghroden cwen 
 mod þeon|geþingan|geþeon , medoful ætberan ; 
 gretan geata leodan|leod , god þancian 
 wisfæst word se þu|þe|ðe hire|heo se willian|willa gelimpan 
 þæt|se heo on|an ænig eorl gelyfan|gelifan 
 fyren frofor . he þæt|se ful geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon , 
 wælreow wiga|wig , æt|etan wealhþeon , 
 and þu|þa|se gyddode guþ fysan ; 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgþeowes : 
 "ic þæt|se hycgan , þu|þa|se ic on|an holm gestigan , 
 sæbat gesittan mid min secg gedriht , 
 þæt|se ic anunga eowra leode|leoda|leod 
 willan|willa gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan oþðe on|an wæl|wel crinсgan|cringan|crincgan , 
 feondgrapum fæstan|fæst . ic gefremman sculan 
 eorlic ellen , oþðe endedæg 
 on|an þes meoduhealle min gebidan ." 
 ðam|se wif þu|þa|se word wel lician , 
 gilpcwide geat ; gan|eadan goldhroden 
 freolicu folccwen toh|to hire|heo frea sittan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eft swa ær inne on|an heall 
 þryðword sprecan|gesprecan , ðeod on|an sæl , 
 sigefolca swegan|sweg , oþþæt semninga 
 sunu healfdenes secean willan 
 æfenræste ; witan|wist þæm|se ahlæcan 
 toh|to þæm|se heahsele hild þingan|geþingan , 
 siððan hi|heo sunne|sunnan|sunna sunnan|leoht geseon nesan|neh|ne magan , 
 oþðe nipan niht|neaht ofer ealle|eall|eal , 
 scaduhelma gesceapu scriðan cwoman , 
 wan under wolcn|wolcen . werod eall|eal arisan|ar . 
 gegretan þu|þa|se guma oþer|oðer , 
 hroðgar beowulf , and him|hi|he hælan|helan abeodan , 
 winærnes geweald , and þæt|se word acwæð : 
 "næfre ic ænig mann ær alyfan , 
 siþðan ic hond and rond hebban miht|meaht|magan , 
 ðryþærn denu|dene butan þu|þe|se nu þe|þa|ða|se . 
 hafian|habban nu and gehealdan husian|hus sellan , 
 gemunan mærþo , mægenellen cyðan , 
 wacian|wac wiþ|wið wraþ . nesan|neh|ne bið þu|þe|se wilnian gad , 
 gif þu þæt|se ellenweorc ald gedigan ." 
 þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he hroþgar gewitan mid hit|his|he hæleþ|hæle gedryht , 
 eodur scyldinga , ut of heall ; 
 willan wigfruma wealhþeo sec , 
 cwen toh|to gebedda . habban kyningwuldor 
 grendle togeanes , swa guma gefrungon , 
 seleweard asettan ; sundornytte behealdan 
 ymb aldor denu|dene , eotonweard abeodan . 
 huru geata leodan|leod georne|geornan|georn truwian 
 modig mægen , metod hyldo . 
 þe|þa|ða|se he him|hi|he of dydan|don isernbyrnan , 
 helm of hafela , sellan hit|his|he hyrstan sweord , 
 irena cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , ombihtþegne , 
 and gehealdan hettan|het|hedan|hatan hildegeatwe . 
 gesprecan þu|þa|se se god gylpword sum|su , 
 beowulf geata , ær he on|an bed stigan|stig : 
 "no ic me|ic on|an herewæsmun hnagran talian , 
 guþgeweorca , þonne|se grendel he ; 
 forðam ic he sweord swebban nelle , 
 ald beneotan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic eal mæge|mæg|magan . 
 nytan he þær|se god þæt|se he me|ic ongeagn slean , 
 rand geheawe , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he rof wesan|seon|nesan 
 niþgeweorca ; acan|ac witan on|an niht|neaht sculan 
 secg ofersittan , gif he gesecean durran 
 wigan|wig ofer wæpen , and siþðan witig god 
 on|an swa hwæþere hond , halig dryhten , 
 mærðo deman , swa him|hi|he gemetan|gemet þince ." 
 hyldu|hyldo he þu|þa|se heaþodeor , hleorbolster onfon 
 eorles andwlitan|andwlita , and he ymb manig 
 snellic særinc selereste gebugan . 
 nænig hira|hi|heore þenсean|þenсan|þencan þæt|se he þanan sculan 
 eft eardlufan æfre gesecean , 
 folc oþðe freoburh , þær he afeded wesan|seon|beon ; 
 acan|ac hi|heo habban frinan þæt|se hi|heo ær toh|to fela micles 
 in þæm|se winsele wældeað forniman , 
 denigea leode|leodan|leod . acan|ac him|hi|he dryhten forgifan|forgiefan 
 wigspeda gewiofu , wedera leode|leoda|leod , 
 frofor and fultuman|fultum , þæt|se hi|heo feond hira|hi|heore 
 þurh|ðurh an cræftan|cræft ealle|eall|eal ofercuman , 
 selfes miht . soð wesan|seon|is gecyþan|cyþan 
 þæt|se mihtig god mannian|mann cynn|cyn 
 wealdan wideferhð . cuman on|an wann niht|neaht 
 scriðan sceadugenga . sceotend swefan , 
 þu|þa|se þæt|se hornreced healdan|heald sculan , 
 ealle|eall|eal butan an . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon yld cuþ|cunnan 
 þæt|se hi|heo nesan|neh|ne motan , þu|þa|se metod nyllan|nillan , 
 se scynscaþa under sceadu bregdan ; 
 acan|ac he wæccende wraþ on|an anda 
 bidan bolgenmod beadu geþing . 
 þe|þa|ða|se cuman of moru|more|mor under misthleoþum 
 grendel gongan , god yrre|irre bær|beran ; 
 myntan se manscaða mannian|mann cynn|cyn 
 sum besyrwan in sellan|sele|sel þæm|þam|se hean|heah . 
 wod|wadan under wolcn|wolcen toh|to se þu|þe|se he winreced , 
 goldsele guma , gearwost witan , 
 fætt fahne . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæt|se forma sið 
 þæt|se he hroþgares ham geseсan|gesecan ; 
 næfre he on|an aldordagum ær nesan|neh|ne siþðan 
 heardran hæle|hælan|helan , healðegnas findan . 
 cuman þu|þa|se toh|to recede rinc siðian , 
 dream bedælan . duru sona onirnan , 
 fyrbendum fæstan|fæst , syþðan he hire|heo folm æthrinan ; 
 onbræd þu|þa|se bealohydig , þe|þa|ða|se he gebelgan|belgan wesan|seon|beon , 
 recedes muþa . raþe æfter þon|se 
 on|an fah flor feond treddode , 
 gan|eadan yrremod ; him|hi|he of eage standan 
 ligge gelicost sunnan|leoht unfæger . 
 geseon he in recede rinc manig|manian , 
 swefan sibbegedriht samod ætgædere , 
 magorinca heap . þu|þa|se hit|his|he mod ahliehhan|ahlehhan ; 
 myntan þæt|se he gedælan , ærþon dæg cuman , 
 atol aglæca , an gehwilc 
 lif wiþ|wið lice , þu|þa|se him|hi|he alimpan wesan|seon|beon 
 wistfylle wenan|wen . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæt|se wyrdan|wyrd þu|þa|se gen 
 þæt|se he micel motan mannian|mann cynn|cyn 
 ðicgean ofer þu|þa|se niht|neaht . þryðswyð behealdan 
 mæg|magan higelaces , hu se manscaða 
 under færgripe gefaran willan . 
 nesan|neh|ne þæt|se se aglæca yldan þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 acan|ac he gefon|gefeng hraðe forma siþ 
 slæpendne rinc , slitan unwearnum , 
 bitan|bat banlocan , blod edrum drincan , 
 synsnædum swelgan ; sona habban 
 unlyfigendes eal feormian , 
 fot|fedan and folm . forþ|forð near ætstop , 
 niman þu|þa|se mid hand higeþihtigne 
 rinc on|an ræste , ræсan|ræcan ongeagn 
 feond mid folm ; he onfon hræþ 
 inwitþancum and wiþ|wið earm gesittan . 
 sona þæt|se onfindan fyren hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne metan middangeard , 
 eorþe|eorþ sceat , on|an elran mann 
 mundgripe micel|mare|mara . he on|an mod wearð 
 forht on|an ferhðe ; no þywan|þy|þe|se ær fram magan . 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he hinfus , willan on|an heolster fleon , 
 sec deofol gedræg ; nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he drohtoð þær 
 swilce he on|an ealderdagum ær gemetan . 
 gemunan þu|þa|se se god , mæg|magan higelaces , 
 æfenspræce , uplang astandan 
 and him|hi|he fæstan|fæst wiðfeng ; finger berstan . 
 eoten wesan|seon|beon utweard ; eorl furþur stæppan|steppan . 
 myntan se mære , þær he magan swa , 
 wid gewindan and on|an wegan|weg þanan 
 fleon on|an fenhopu ; witan|wist hit|his|he finger geweald 
 on|an gram grap . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon geocor sið 
 þæt|se se hearmscaþa toh|to heorute ateon . 
 dryhtsele dynnan|dynian ; denu|dene eall|eal wearð , 
 ceasterbuendum , cene gehwylc , 
 eorlum ealuscerwen . yrre|irre wesan|seon|beon begen , 
 reþe|reðe renweardas . reced hlynsian . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon wundor micel þæt|se se winsele 
 wiðhæfde heaþodeorum , þæt|se he on|an hruse nesan|neh|ne feolan , 
 fæger foldbold ; acan|ac he se fæstan|fæst wesan|seon|beon 
 innan and utan irenbendum 
 searoþoncum besmiþod . þær fram syll abugan 
 medubenc manig , min gefræge , 
 gold geregnad , þær þu|þa|se grama|gram winnan . 
 se nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan ær witan|wita scyldinga 
 þæt|se hit wifcynn|hosp|flet|a mid gemetan|gemet mannian|mann ænig , 
 betlic and banfag , tobrecan magan , 
 list tolucan , nymþe liges fæþm 
 swelgan on|an swaþule . swegan|sweg up astag 
 niwe geneahhe ; norðdenum standan 
 atelic egesian|egesa , an gehwylc 
 þær|se þu|þe|se of weallan|weall wop gehyrdan|gehyran , 
 gryreleoð galan|gal god ondsacan , 
 sigeleasne singan|sang , sar wanigean 
 hell|hel hæftan . healdan he fæstan|fæst 
 se þu|þe|se mannian|mann wesan|seon|beon mægene strengest 
 on|an þæm|se dæge|dæg þysses lifes|lif . 
 nyllan|nillan eorl hleo ænig þingian|þing 
 se cwealmcuman cwic forlætan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he lifdagas leode|leoda|leod ænigum 
 nytt tellan . þær genehost bregdan 
 eorl beowulfes eald laf , 
 willan freadrihtnes feorh ealgian , 
 mære þeodnes , þær hi|heo magan swa . 
 hi|heo þæt|se nesan|neh|ne witan , þu|þa|se hi|heo gewin dreogan , 
 heardhicgende hildemecgas , 
 and on|an healf gehwone heawan þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 sawol|sawel sec , se synscaðan 
 ænig ofer eorþe|eorþ irenna cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , 
 guðbilla nan , gretan nyllan|nillan , 
 acan|ac he sigewæpnum forswerian habban , 
 ecga gehwylcre . sculan hit|his|he aldorgedal 
 on|an þæm|se dæge|dæg þysses lifes|lif 
 earmlic wurðan , and se ellorgast 
 on|an feond geweald feor siðian . 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se onfindan se þu|þe|se fela æror 
 mod myrðe mannian|mann cynn , 
 fyren gefremian (he wesan|seon|beon fag wiþ|wið god) , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he se lichoma læstan|læst nyllan|nillan , 
 acan|ac he se modega mæg|magan hygelaces 
 habban be honda ; wesan|seon|beon gehwæþer oðer 
 lifian lað . licsar gebidan 
 atol æglæca ; him|hi|he on|an eaxl wearð 
 syndolh sweotol , seonowe onsprungon , 
 berstan banlocan . beowulfe wearð 
 guðhreð gyfeþe ; sculan grendel þanan 
 feorhseoc fleon under fenhleoðu , 
 secean wynleas wiс|wican|wic ; witan|wist þu|þe|se geornor 
 þæt|se hit|his|he aldres wesan|seon|beon ende gegongen , 
 dogera dægrim . denu|dene eall|eal wearð 
 æfter þæm|þam|se wælræse willian|willa limpan|gelimpan . 
 habban þu|þa|se fælsian se þu|þe|se ær feorran|feorr|feor cuman , 
 snotor and swyðferhð , sellan|sele|sel hroðgares , 
 nerian|generian wiþ|wið niðe ; nihtweorce gefeh , 
 ellenmærþum . habban eastdenum 
 geatmecga leodan|leod gilp læstan|gelæstan , 
 swilce oncyþðe ealle|eall|eal gebetan , 
 inwidsorge , þu|þe|se hi|heo ær dreogan 
 and for|faran þreanyd þolian sculan , 
 torn unlytel . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon tacn|tacen|tacan sweotol , 
 syþðan hildedeor hond aleсgan|alecgan , 
 earm and eaxl (þær wesan|seon|beon eal geador 
 grendles grape) under geap hrof . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon on|an morgen min gefræge 
 ymb þu|þa|se gifhealle guðrinc manig ; 
 feran folctogan feorran|feorr|feor and neah 
 geond widwegas wundor sceawian , 
 laþ last . no hit|his|he lifgedal 
 sarlic þynсan|þyncan secg ænig 
 þær|se þu|þe|se tirleases trode sceawian , 
 hu he werigmod on|an wegan|weg þanan , 
 niða ofercuman , on|an nicera merian|mere 
 fæge|fægan and geflymed feorhlastas bær|beran . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon on|an blod brim weallan , 
 atol yða geswing eal mengan|gemengan 
 haton heolfre , heorodreore weol . 
 deaðfæge deog , siððan dream leas 
 in fenfreoðo feorh aleсgan|alecgan , 
 hæþen|hæðen sawol|sawel ; þær him|hi|he helan onfon . 
 þanan eft gewitan ealdgesiðas , 
 swilce geong|gangan manig of gomenwaþe 
 fram merian|mere modig mearh ridan|rida , 
 beorn on|an blanca|blanc . þær wesan|seon|beon beowulfes 
 mærðo mænan ; manig oft cweðan 
 se suþ nesan|neh|ne norð be sæ tweonum 
 ofer eormengrund oþer|oðer nænig 
 under swegl|swegel begong sel nesan 
 rondhæbbendra , rices wyrðra . 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo huru winedrihten wiht nesan|neh|ne lean , 
 glæd hroðgar , acan|ac þæt|se wesan|seon|beon god cyning . 
 hwilum|hwil heaþorofe hleapan lætan , 
 on|an geflit faran fealu mearh 
 þær him|hi|he foldwegas fæger þynсan|þyncan , 
 cyst cuðe . hwilum|hwil cyning þegn , 
 guma gilphlæden , gidda gemyndig , 
 se þu|þe|ðe ealfela ealdgesegena 
 worn gemunan , word oþer|oðer findan 
 soð gebunden|gebindan|bindan ; secg eft onginnan 
 sið beowulfes snyttrum styrian|styria 
 and on|an spedan|sped wrecan spel gerad , 
 word wrixlan . welhwylc cweðan 
 þæt|se he fram sigemundes secgan hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 ellendædum , uncuþ fela , 
 wælsinges gewin , wid siþ , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se guma birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gearu nesan|neh|ne witan , 
 fæhðe and fyren , butan fitela mid he , 
 þonne|se he swulces hwæt#2 secgan willan , 
 eam|ea hit|his|he nefa , swa hi|heo wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wesan|seon|beon 
 æt|etan niða gehwa nydgesteallan ; 
 habban ealfela eoten cynn|cyn 
 sweord sægan . sigemunde gesprong 
 æfter deaðdæge don|dom unlytel , 
 syþðan wig heard wyrm acwellan , 
 hordes hyrdan|hyran|hirde . he under har stan , 
 æþeling birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , ana|an geneðde 
 frecne|frecen|frec dæd , nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he fitela mid . 
 hwæþre him|hi|he gesælan þæt|ðæt|se þæt|se swurd þurhwadan 
 wrætliс wyrm , þæt|se hit on|an weallan|weall ætstandan , 
 dryhtlic iren ; draca morðre sweltan . 
 habban aglæca ellen gegongen 
 þæt|se he beahhordes brucan motan 
 selfes dom ; sæbat gehleod , 
 bær|beran on|an bearm scip beorht frætwa , 
 wælses eafera . wyrm hatan|hat gemealt . 
 se wesan|seon|beon wreccena wid mærost 
 ofer werþeode , wigendra hleo , 
 ellendædum (he se ær onðah) , 
 siððan heremodes hild sweðrode , 
 eafoð and ellen . he mid eoten wearð 
 on|an feond geweald forþ|forð forlacen , 
 snude forsendan . he sorhwylmas 
 lemede toh|to lange|lang ; he hit|his|he leode|leoda|leod wearð , 
 eall|eal æþellingum toh|to aldorceare ; 
 swilce oft bemurnan ær mæl 
 swiðferhþes sið snotor ceorl manig , 
 se þu|þe|se him|hi|he bealu|bealo toh|to bot gelyfan|gelifan , 
 þæt|se þæt|se ðeodnes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn geþeon sculan , 
 fæderæþelum onfon , folc gehealdan , 
 hord and hleoburh , hæleþ|hæle romana , 
 ᛟ scyldinga . he þær eall|eal wearð , 
 mæg|magan higelaces , mannian|mann cynn , 
 freond gefægra ; he fyren onwadan . 
 hwilum|hwil flitan fealu stræte|stræt 
 mearh metan . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon morgenleoht 
 scufan|scafan and scynded . gan|eadan scealc manig 
 swiðhicgende toh|to sellan|sele|sel þæm|þam|se hean|heah 
 searowundor seon|seo ; swilce self cyning 
 of brydbure , beahhorda weard , 
 tryddode tirfæst getrume micel , 
 cyst gecyþan|cyþan , and hit|his|he cwen mid him|hi|he 
 medostigge mætan|metan mægþ hose|hos . 
 hroðgar maþelian (he toh|to heall geong|gangan , 
 standan on|an stapol , geseon steap hrof , 
 gold fahne , and grendles hond) : 
 "ðisse ansyn alwealdan þanc 
 lungre gelimpan|gelimp ! fela ic laþ gebidan , 
 grynna æt|etan grendle ; wifcynn|hosp|flet|a mæg|magan god wyrcan 
 wunder æfter wundor|wund , wuldor hyrdan|hyran|hirde . 
 þæt|ðæt|se wesan|seon|beon ungeara þæt|se ic ænigra me|ic 
 wea nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan toh|to wid feorh 
 bot gebidan , þonne|se blod fah 
 husian|hus sellan heorodreorig standan , 
 wea widscofen wita gehwylc 
 se þu|þe|se nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan þæt|se hi|heo wideferhð 
 leode|leoda|leod landgeweorc laþu|laþ beweredon 
 scuccum and scinnum . nu scealc hafað 
 þurh drihten miht dæd gefremian 
 þu|þe|ðe we ealle|eall|eal ær nesan|neh|ne magan 
 snyttrum besyrwan . hwæt#2 , þæt|se secgan mæg|magan 
 efne|efnan|efen swa hwylc|hwilc mægþ swa se magan|maga cennan 
 æfter gumcynnum , gif heo git lyfað , 
 þæt|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo ealdmetod est wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 bearngebyrdo . nu ic , beowulf , þec , 
 secg god , me|ic for|faran sunu wylle 
 freogan on|an ferhþ ; healdan|heald forþ|forð tela 
 niwe sibb|sib . nesan|neh|ne bið þu|þe|se nænig gad 
 worolde wilnian , þu|þe|se ic geweald habban . 
 ful oft ic for|faran læssa lean teohhode , 
 hordweorþunge hnahran rinc , 
 sæmra æt|etan sæcce . þu þu|þe|se self hafian|habban 
 dæd fremman þæt|se þu|þin don|dom lyfað 
 awa toh|to ald . alwalda þec 
 god forgylde , swa he nu git dydan|don !" 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecþeowes : 
 "we þæt|se ellenweorc est micel , 
 feohtan fremman , frecne|frecen|frec geneðdon 
 eafoð uncuþ . unnan ic swiðe 
 þæt|se þu he selfne geseon motan , 
 feond on|an frætewum fylwerigne . 
 ic he hrædlice heard clammum 
 on|an wælbedde wriþan þenсean|þenсan|þencan , 
 þæt|se he for|faran mundgripe minum|min sculan 
 licgean lifbysig , butan hit|his|he liс|lic swican . 
 ic he nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan , þu|þa|se metod nyllan|nillan , 
 gang getwæman , no ic him|hi|he se georne|geornan|georn ætfealh , 
 feorhgeniðlan ; wesan|seon|beon toh|to foremihtig 
 feond on|an feþe . hwæþere he hit|his|he folm forlætan 
 toh|to lifwraþe last weardian , 
 earm and eaxl . no þær ænig swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 feasceaft guma frofor gebycgan ; 
 no þywan|þy|þe|se lengan|leng|lange leofað laðgeteona , 
 synn geswenced , acan|ac he sar hafað 
 mid nydgripe nearu|nearo befongen , 
 balwon bend . þær abidan sculan 
 mæg|mecgan|magian|maga mane fah micel dom , 
 hu him|hi|he scir|defena metod scrifan willan ." 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon swige secg , sunu eclafes , 
 on|an gylpspræce guðgeweorca , 
 siþðan æþeling eorles cræftan|cræft 
 ofer hean|heah hrof hand sceawedon , 
 feond finger . foran æghwylc wesan|seon|beon , 
 stiðra næglian|nægl gehwylc , style gelicost , 
 hæþen handsporu hilderinces , 
 egl , unheoru . æghwylc cweðan 
 þæt|se him|hi|he heard nan hrinan willan 
 iren ærgod , þæt|se se ahlæcan 
 blodig beadufolme onberan willan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon hatan hreþe heort innanweard 
 folm gefrætwian|gefrætewian . fela se wesan|seon|beon , 
 wer and wifian|wif , þu|þe|se þæt|se winreced , 
 gestsele gyrwan . goldfag scinan 
 web æfter wag , wundorsiona fela 
 secg gehwylc þær|se þu|þe|se on|an swylc starað . 
 wesan|seon|beon þæt|se beorht bold tobrecan swiðe|swiðan , 
 eal inneweard irenbendum fæstan|fæst , 
 heorras tohlidene . hrof ana|an genesan , 
 eall|eal ansund , þu|þe|se se aglæca , 
 fyrendædum fag , on|an fleam gewindan , 
 aldres orwena . no þæt|se yðe byð 
 toh|to befleon , fremman se þu|þe|se willan , 
 acan|ac gesecan sculan sawlberendra , 
 nyde genedan , niþða bearn , 
 grundbuendra gearu stow , 
 þær hit|his|he lichoma legerbedde fæstan|fæst 
 swebban æfter simble . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon sælan|sæl and mælan|mæl 
 þæt|se toh|to heall gangan|gang healfdenes sunu ; 
 willan self cyning symbel þicgan . 
 nesan|neh|ne gefrægen ic þu|þa|se mægþ micel|mare|mara weorod 
 ymb hyra|hyr|hira|hi sincgyfan sel gebæran . 
 bugan þu|þa|se toh|to bence blædagande , 
 fyllu|fyllan gefeon ; fæger geþiсgan|geþicgan 
 medoful manig mæg|maga þær|se 
 swiðhicgende on|an sellan|sele|sel þæm|þam|se hean|heah , 
 hroðgar and hroþulf . heorot innan wesan|seon|beon 
 freond afyllan ; nalles facenstafas 
 þeodscyldingas þenden fremman . 
 forgifan|forgiefan þu|þa|se beowulfe birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn healfdenes 
 seon gylden|gyldan sigor toh|to lean ; 
 hreodan hildecumbor , helm and byrnan , 
 mære|mæran maðþumsweord manig|manian geseon 
 beforan beornan|beorn|beirnan beran|bera . beowulf geþiсgan|geþicgan|geþeon 
 ful on|an flett ; no he þære|se feohgyfte 
 for|faran sceotend scamigan ðorfte . 
 nesan|neh|ne gefrignan ic freondlicor feower madmas 
 gold gegyrwan gummanna fela 
 in ealobence oðer gesellan . 
 ymb se helm hrof heafodbeorge 
 wirum bewindan wæl utan healdan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he fela laf frecne|frecen|frec nesan|neh|ne magan 
 scurheard sceþðan , þonne|se scyldfreca 
 ongeagn grama|gram gangan sculan . 
 hatan þe|þa|ða|se eorl hleo eahtian|eahta mearh 
 fætedhleore on|an flet teon , 
 in under eoderas . þær|se an standan 
 sadol searu fah , sincan|sinc gewurþad ; 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon hildesetl heahcyninges , 
 þonne sweord gelacan sunu healfdenes 
 efnan|efen willan . næfre on|an ore liсgan|licgan 
 widcuþes wigan|wig , þonne wæl feollan|feallan . 
 and þe|þa|ða|se beowulfe began gehwæþres 
 eodor ingwina onweald geteon , 
 wicga and wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen , hettan|het|hedan|hatan he wel brucan . 
 swa manlice mære|mæran þeon|þeodan , 
 hordweard hæleþ|hæle , heaþoræsas gyldan|gieldan 
 mearh and madmum , swa hi næfre munan|mann|man lyhð , 
 se þu|þe|se secgan willan|wil soð æfter rihte|rihtan|riht . 
 þe|þa|ða|se git æghwylcum eorl drihten 
 þær|se þu|þe|se mid beowulfe brimlade teon 
 on|an þære|se medubence maþðum gesellan , 
 yrfelafe , and se an hatan 
 gold forgyldan , se þu|þe|ðe grendel ær 
 mane acwellan , swa he hyra|hyr|hira|hi micel willan , 
 nefne him|hi|he witig god wyrdan|wyrd forstandan 
 and se mann mod . metod eall|eal wealdan 
 guma cynn|cyn , swa he nu git|gietan deð . 
 forðam bið andgit æghwær sellan , 
 ferhðes foreþanc . fela sculan gebidan 
 leof and laþ se þu|þe|se long|lange heran|her 
 on|an ðyssum windagum worolde bruceð . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon singan|sang and swegan|sweg samod ætgædere 
 for|faran healfdenes hildewisan , 
 gomenwudu gretan , gid oft wrecan , 
 þonne healgamen hroþgares scieppan 
 æfter medobence mæne|mænan sculan 
 be finn eaferum , þe|þa|ða|se hi|heo se fær begietan|begeotan , 
 hæleð healfdena , hnæf scyldinga , 
 in freswæle fealle|feallan sculan . 
 nesan|neh|ne huru hildeburh herian þurfan 
 eoten treowe|treow ; unsynnum wearð 
 beloren leof æt|etan þæm|þam|se lindplegan , 
 bearn and broðrum ; hi|heo on|an gebyrd hreosan , 
 gar wund|windan . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon geomuru ides ! 
 nalles holinga hoc dohtor 
 meotodsceaft bemurnan , syþðan morgen cuman , 
 þe|þa|ða|se heo under swegl|swegel geseon magan 
 morþorbealo mæg|mecgan|magian|maga , þær heo ær micel healdan 
 worolde wynn . wigan|wig ealle|eall|eal forniman 
 finn þegn|þegen nemnan feaum an , 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne magan on|an þæm|se meðelstede 
 wigan|wig hengest wiht gefeohtan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þa|se wealafe wigan|wig forþringan 
 þeodnes ðegna ; acan|ac hi|heo|heg him|hi|he geþingo buan|beodan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo him|hi|he oðer flet eal gerymdon , 
 heall and heahsetl , þæt|se hi|heo healf geweald 
 wiþ|wið eoten birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn aginnan|agan motan , 
 and æt|etan feohgyftum folcwaldan sunu 
 dogra gehwylc denu|dene weorþian , 
 hengest heap hring wennan 
 efne|efnan|efen swa swiðe|swiðan sincgestreonum 
 fætt gold , swa he fresena cyn 
 on|an beorsele byldan willan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se hi|heo getruwedon on|an twegen|twa healf 
 fæstan|fæst frioðuwære . fin hengest 
 ellen , unflitme aðum benemnan 
 þæt|se he þu|þa|se wealafe weotena dom 
 are|ar healdan , þæt|se þær ænig mann|man
