 word nesan|neh|ne worcum wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon nesan|neh|ne brecan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þurh inwitsearo æfre gemænden 
 þeah hi|heo hira|hi beaggyfan bana folgedon 
 ðeodenlease , þu|þa|se him|hi|he swa þearfian wesan|seon|beon ; 
 gif þonne|se frysna hwylc|hwilc frecne sprecan 
 se morþorhetes myndgiend wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 þonne|se hit sweord ecg seðan sculan . 
 ad wesan|seon|beon æfnan and icge gold 
 ahebban of horde . herescyldinga 
 wel|betan beadorinca wesan|seon|beon on|an bæl gearu . 
 æt|etan þæm|se ad wesan|seon|beon eþgesyne 
 swatfah syrce , swyn ealgylden , 
 eofer irenheard , æþeling manig 
 wund awyrded ; sum on|an wæl crinсgan|cringan|crincgan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se hildeburh æt|etan hnæfes ad 
 hire|heo selfre sunu sweoloðe befæstan , 
 banfatu bærnan and on|an bæl don 
 eam on|an eaxl . ides gnornian , 
 geomrian giddum . guðrinc astigan . 
 windan|wand toh|to wolcn|wolcen wælfyra micel , 
 hlynode for|faran hlawe ; hafela meltan , 
 bengeato berstan , þonne blod ætspranc , 
 laðbite lices . lig ealle|eall|eal forswelgan , 
 gæsta gifrost , þær|se þu|þe|ðe þær guð forniman 
 began folc ; wesan|seon|beon hira|hi blæd scacan . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se wigend wiс|wicu neosian , 
 freond befeallan , frysland geseon , 
 ham and heaburh . hengest þe|þa|ða|se git 
 wælfagne winter wunian mid finn 
 eal unhlitme . eard gemunan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he nesan|neh|ne magan on|an merian|mere drifan 
 hringedstefnan ; holm storm weol , 
 woh wiþ|wið windan|wind , winter yþan|yþ belucan 
 isgebinde , oþðæt oþer|oðer cuman 
 gear in geard , swa nu git deð , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe syngales sellan|sele|sel bewitiað , 
 wuldortorhtan weder . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon winter scacan , 
 fæger folde bearm . fundian wrecca , 
 gist of geard ; he toh|to gyrnwræce 
 swiðe þenсean|þenсan|þencan þonne|se toh|to sælade , 
 gif he torngemot þurhteon miht|meaht|magan 
 þæt|se he eoten birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn inne gemunan . 
 swa he nesan|neh|ne forwyrnan woroldrædenne , 
 þonne|se him|hi|he hunlafing hildeleoman , 
 bil sellan , on|an bearm dydan|don , 
 se wesan|seon|beon mid eoten ecge cuðe . 
 swilce ferhðfrecan fin eft begietan|begeotan 
 sweordbealo sliðen æt|etan hit|his|he selfes ham , 
 siþðan grimm|grim grippan|gripe|gripan guðlaf and oslaf 
 æfter sæsiðe , sorh|sorg , mænan , 
 ætwiton wea dælan|dæl ; nesan|neh|ne magan wæfre mod 
 forhabban in hreþer . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon healh roden 
 feond feorh , swilce fin slægen , 
 cyning on|an corþre , and seon|seo|se cwen niman . 
 sceotend scyldinga toh|to scypon ferian 
 eal ingesteald eorðcyninges , 
 swilce hi|heo æt|etan finn ham findan magan 
 sigla , searogimma . hi|heo on|an sælade 
 drihtlice wif toh|to denu|dene ferian , 
 lædan toh|to leode|leoda|leod . leoð wesan|seon|beon asungen , 
 gleomann gyd . gamen eft astigan , 
 beorhtian bencsweg ; byrelas sellan 
 win of wunderfatum . þu|þa|se cuman wealhþeo forþ|forð 
 gan under gylden beah|beag , þær þu|þa|se god twegen 
 sittan suhtergefæderan ; þu|þa|se git wesan|seon|beon hira|hi sib ætgædere , 
 æghwylc oðer trywe . swilce þær unferþ þyle 
 æt|etan fot sæt|sittan frea scyldinga ; gehwylc hira|hi hit|his|he ferhþ treowde , 
 þæt|se he habban mod micel , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he hit|his|he mæg|maga nesan 
 arfæst æt|etan ecga gelacum . sprecan þe|þa|ða|se ides scyldinga : 
 "onfoh þes full|ful , freodrihten min|ic , 
 sinc brytta ! þu on|an sæl wesan , 
 goldwine guma , and toh|to geatum sprecan 
 milde word , swa sculan munan|mann|man don . 
 beon|beo wiþ|wið geatas glæd , geofena gemyndig , 
 neah and feorran|feorr|feor þu nu hafian|habban . 
 me|ic munan|mann|man sægan|seсgan|secgan þæt|se þu þu|þe|ðe for|faran sunu willan 
 hererinc habban . heorot wesan|seon|is fælsian , 
 beahsele beorhtian|beorht ; brucan þenden þu motan|mot 
 manig medo , and þin mæg|maga læfan 
 folc and romana , þonne|se þu forþ|forð sculan 
 metodsceaft seon|seo . ic min сinan|cunnan 
 glæd hroþulf , þæt|se he þu|þa|se geogoðe willan|wil 
 are|ar healdan|heald , gif þu ær þonne|se he , 
 wine|win scildinga , worold oflætest ; 
 wennan|wenan|wen ic þæt|se he mid god gyldan willan 
 uncran eaferan , gif he þæt|se eal gemunan , 
 hwæt#2 witan toh|to willan|willa and toh|to worðmyndum 
 umborwesendum ær arna gefremedon ." 
 hwerfan|hweorfan þu|þa|se bi|be bence þær hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo byre wesan|seon|beon , 
 hreðric and hroðmund , and hæleþ|hæle birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 giogoð ætgædere ; þær se god sæt|sittan , 
 beowulf geata , be þæm|se gebroðrum twæman|twegen . 
 him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon ful beran and freondlaþu 
 word bewægnan , and windan gold 
 est geeawed , earmreade twegen|twa , 
 hrægl and hring , healsbeag micel 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ic on|an folde gefrægen habban . 
 nænig ic under swegl|swegel god hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 hordmaððum hæleþ|hæle , syþðan ham ætwegan 
 toh|to þære|se byrhtan burh|burg brosinga mene , 
 siglan and sincfæt ; searoniðas fleon|fleogan|flean 
 eormenrices , geceosan eсe rædan|ræd . 
 se hringan|hring habban higelac geata , 
 nefa swertinges , neah siþ , 
 siðþan he under segne sincan|sinc ealgian , 
 wælreaf werian|weorod ; he wyrdan|wyrd forniman , 
 syþðan he for|faran wlenco wea ahsode , 
 fæhðe toh|to frysum . he þu|þa|se frætwe wegan , 
 eorclanstanas ofer yða ful , 
 romana þeon|þeodan ; he under rande gecranc . 
 gehweorfan þu|þa|se in francna fæþm feorh cyning , 
 breostgewædu and se bugan|beah somod ; 
 wyrsa wigfrecan wæl|wel reafedon 
 æfter guðsceare , geata leode|leodan|leod , 
 hreawic healdan . healh swegan|sweg onfon . 
 wealhðeo maþelian , heo for|faran þæm|se werian|weorod sprecan : 
 "bruc ðisses beah|beag , beowulf libban|leof , 
 hyse , mid hæle|hælan|helan , and þes hrægles neotan , 
 þeodgestreona , and geþeon tela , 
 cen þec mid cræftan|cræft and þes cnyhtum wesan 
 lar liðe ; ic þu|þe|se se lean gemunan . 
 hafian|habban þu ferian|feran þæt|se þu|þe|ðe feor and neah 
 eall|eal wideferhþ wer ehtigað , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa side|sid swa sæ bebugeð , 
 windgeard , weall . wesan þenden þu lifian , 
 æþeling , eadig . ic þu|þe|se on|an tela 
 sincgestreona . beon|beo þu sunu minum|min 
 dæd gedefe , dreamhealdende . 
 heran|her wesan|seon|is æghwylc eorl oþrum|oþer|oðer getreowe , 
 mod milde , mandrihtne hold ; 
 þegn|þegen syndon geþweran , þeodan|þeod ealgearo , 
 druncen dryhtguman doð swa ic biddan ." 
 gan|eadan þu|þa|se toh|to setl . þær wesan|seon|beon symbla cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan ; 
 drincan win wer . wyrdan|wyrd nesan|neh|ne cunnan , 
 geosceaft grimman|grimm|grim , swa hit agangan wearð 
 eorl manig , syþðan æfen cuman 
 and him|hi|he hroþgar gewitan toh|to hofe|hof|hebban sin , 
 romana toh|to ræste . reced weardian 
 unrim eorl , swa hi|heo oft ær don . 
 bencþelu beredon ; hit geondbrædan wearð 
 bedd and bolster . beorscealca sum|su 
 fus and fæge|fægan fletræste gebugan . 
 settan him|hi|he toh|to heafdon hilderandas , 
 bordwudu beorht ; þær on|an bence wesan|seon|beon 
 ofer æþeling yþgesene 
 heaþosteapa helm , hringan byrne , 
 þrecwudu þrymlic . wesan|seon|beon þeaw hyra|hyr|hira|hi 
 þæt|se hi|heo oft wesan|seon|beon on|an wigan|wig gearu , 
 ge æt|etan ham ge on|an here , ge gehwæþer þær|se , 
 efne|efnan|efen swilce mæl swilce hira|hi mandryhtne 
 þurfan|þearf gesælan ; wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se þeodan|þeod til . 
 sigan|seon þu|þa|se toh|to slæpan|slæp . sum|su sar angeald 
 æfenræste , swa him|hi|he ful oft gelimpan , 
 siþðan goldsele grendel warian , 
 unriht æfnan , oþþæt ende becuman , 
 swylt æfter synn . þæt|se gesyne weorþan , 
 widcuþ wer , se wrecend þu|þa|se git 
 libban æfter laþu|laþ , lange|lang þrage , 
 æfter guðceare . grendles modor , 
 ides , aglæcwif , irmþ gemunan , 
 se þu|þe|se wæteregesan wunian sculan , 
 cealde stream , siþðan cain wearð 
 toh|to ecgbanan ange broþor , 
 fæderenmæge ; he þu|þa|se fag gewitan , 
 morþor mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian , mandream fleon , 
 westen|westan warian . þanan wæcnan|wacan fela 
 geosceaftgasta ; wesan|seon|beon se grendel sum|su , 
 heorowearh hetelic , se æt|etan heorot findan 
 wæccendne wer wig bidan . 
 þær him|hi|he aglæca ætgræpe wearð ; 
 hwæþre he gemunan mægenes streng , 
 gimfæste gifu|gifan þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he god sellan , 
 and him|hi|he toh|to anwaldan are|ar gelyfan|gelifan , 
 frofor and fultuman|fultum ; se he se feond ofercuman , 
 gehnægde hell|hel gast . þu|þa|se he hean|heah gewitan , 
 dream bedælan , deaþwic seon|seo , 
 mancynn feond , and hit|his|he modor þu|þa|se git , 
 gifre and galgmod , gegan|gan willan 
 sorhful sið , sunu deað wrecan . 
 cuman þu|þa|se toh|to heorot , þær hringdene 
 geond þæt|se sæld swæfun . þu|þa|se þær sona wearð 
 edhwyrft eorlum , siþðan inne feolan|fealh 
 grendles modor . wesan|seon|beon se gryre læssa 
 efne|efnan|efen swa micel swa bið mægþ cræftan|cræft , 
 wiggryre wif , be wæpnedmen , 
 þonne|se heoru|heore bindan , hamere geþuren , 
 sweord swat fah swin ofer helm 
 ecgum dyhttig andweard scireð . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon on|an heall heardecg teon 
 sweord ofer setl , sidrand manig 
 hebban hand fæstan|fæst ; helm nesan|neh|ne gemunan , 
 byrnan side|sid , þu|þa|se he se broga angeat . 
 heo wesan|seon|beon on|an ofost , willan ut þanan , 
 feorh beorgan , þu|þa|se heo onfindan wesan|seon|beon . 
 hraðe heo æþeling an habban 
 fæstan|fæst befon , þu|þa|se heo toh|to fenn gangan|gang . 
 se wesan|seon|beon hroþgare hæleþ|hæle leofost 
 on|an gesiðes had be sæ tweonum , 
 romana randwiga , se þu|þe|ðe heo on|an ræste abreat , 
 blædfæstne beornan|beorn|beirnan . næs|nesan beowulf þær , 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|beon oþer|oðer in ær geteohhod 
 æfter maþðumgife mære gietan|geatan|geat . 
 hream wearð in heorot ; heo under heolfre geniman 
 cuþ|cunnan folm ; cearu wesan|seon|beon niwian , 
 weorþan|geweorþan in wicun . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæt|se gewrixle til , 
 þæt|se hi|heo on|an ba healf bicgan sculan 
 freond feorh . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon frod cyning , 
 har hilderinc , on|an hreon mod , 
 siððan he aldorþegn unlyfigendne , 
 se deorestan dead witan . 
 hræþ wesan|seon|beon toh|to bur beowulf fetian , 
 sigoreadig secg . samod ærdæge 
 gan|eadan eorl sum|su , æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele cempa 
 self mid gesiðum þær se snotera bidan , 
 hwæðer him|hi|he alwalda æfre willan 
 æfter weaspelle wyrp gefremman . 
 gangan|gang þe|þa|ða|se æfter flor fyrdwyrðe munan|mann|man 
 mid hit|his|he handscale (healwudu dynede) , 
 þæt|se he se wise|wis word nægde 
 frea ingwina , frægn|frignan|fregnan gif him|hi|he wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 æfter neodlaðum niht|neaht getæsu . 
 hroðgar maþelian , helm scyldinga : 
 "ne frinan þu æfter sæl ! sorh wesan|seon|is niwian 
 denigea leode|leoda|leod . dead wesan|seon|is æschere , 
 yrmenlafes yldra broþor|broðor , 
 min|ic runwita and min|ic rædbora , 
 eaxlgestealla , þonne we on|an orlege 
 hafela werian , þonne|se hnitan feþan , 
 eoferas cnysedan . swylc sculan eorl wese|wesan , 
 æþeling ærgod , swylc æschere wesan|seon|beon ! 
 wearð him|hi|he on|an heorot toh|to handbanan 
 wælgæst wæfre ; ic nesan|neh|ne witan hwæder 
 atol æs wlanc eftsiðas teon , 
 fyllu|fyllan fægnian . heo þu|þa|se fæhðe wræc|wrecan 
 þu|þe|se þu gystran niht|neaht grendel cwellan 
 þurh hæst had heard clammum , 
 forðam he toh|to lange|lang leode|leodan|leod min 
 wanian and wyrdan|wyrd . he æt|etan wigan|wig gecrang 
 ealdor scyldig , and nu oþer|oðer cuman 
 mihtig manscaða , willan hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo mæg|magan wrecan , 
 ge feor hafað fæhðe stælan 
 (þæs þu|þe|se þincean mæg|magan þegn|þegen monegum , 
 se þu|þe|se æfter sincgyfan on|an sefa greoteþ) , 
 hreþerbealo heard ; nu seon|seo|se hand ligeð , 
 se þu|þe|se ge|eowan|eow welhwylcra wilnian dugan . 
 ic þæt|se londbuend , leode|leodan|leod min , 
 selerædende , secgan hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 þæt|se hi|heo geseon swilce twegen 
 micel mearcstapan mor healdan|heald , 
 ellorgæstas . ðæra oðer wesan|seon|beon , 
 se þu|þe|se hi|heo gewislicost gewitan|gewita magan , 
 ides onlicnæs ; oðer earmsceapen 
 on|an wer wæstm wræclast tredan , 
 næfne he wesan|seon|beon mara þonne|se ænig munan|mann|man oðer ; 
 se on|an geardagum grendel nemnan 
 foldbuend . no hi|heo fæder cunnan , 
 hwæðer him|hi|he ænig wesan|seon|beon ær acennan 
 dyrne gast . hi|heo dygel land 
 warigeað , wulfhleoþu , windig næssas , 
 frecne|frecen|frec fengelad , þær fyrgenstream 
 under næssa genip niþer gewiteð , 
 flod under folde . nesan þæt|se feor heonan 
 milgemearces þæt|se se merian|mere standeð ; 
 ofer þæm|se hongiað hrindan bearwas , 
 wudu wyrt fæstan|fæst wæter oferhelmað . 
 þær mæg|magan nihtian|niht|neaht gehwæm niðwundor seon|seo , 
 fyr on|an flod . no se frod leofað 
 guma bearn , þæt|se se grund wite|witan ; 
 þeah þu|þe|se hæðstapa hund geswenced , 
 heorot horn trum , holtwudu sec , 
 feorran|feorr|feor geflymed , ær he feorh seleð , 
 aldor on|an ofer , ær he in willan 
 hafela hydan . nesan þæt|se heoru|heore stow ! 
 þanan yðgeblond up astigeð 
 woh toh|to wolcn|wolcen , þonne|se windan|wind styrian|styran , 
 lað gewidru , oðþæt lyft drysmaþ , 
 roderas reotað . nu wesan|seon|is se rædan|ræd gelang 
 eft æt|etan þu|þe|se an . eard git|gietan nesan|neh|ne const , 
 frecne|frecen|frec stow , þær þu findan miht 
 felasinnigne secg ; sec gif þu durran . 
 ic þu|þe|se þu|þa|se fæhðe feoh leanige , 
 ealdgestreonum , swa ic ær dydan|don , 
 wundnum gold , gif þu on|an wegan|weg cuman ." 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgþeowes : 
 "ne sorh|sorgian|sorg , snotor guma ; sel bið æghwæm 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he freond wrecan , þonne|se he fela murnan . 
 ure|ur æghwylc sculan ende gebidan 
 worolde lifes|lif ; wyrce se þu|þe|se motan|mot 
 dom ær deaþ ; þæt|se bið drihtguman 
 unlifgendum æfter sellan . 
 arisan , rices weard , witon raþe feran 
 grendles magan|maga gangan|gang sceawigan . 
 ic hit þu|þe|se gehatan|gehat , no he on|an helm losian , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an folde fæþm , nesan|neh|ne on|an fyrgenholt , 
 nesan|neh|ne on|an gyfenes grund , gan þær he willan . 
 þes dogor þu geþyld hafian|habban 
 wea gehwilc , swa ic þu|þe|se wennan|wenan|wen toh|to ." 
 ahleop þe|þa|ða|se se gomela , god þancian , 
 mihtig drihten , se se munan|mann|man gesprecan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon hroðgare hors gebæted , 
 wicg wundenfeax . wisian|wis fengel 
 geatolic gende ; gumfeþa stæppan|steppan 
 lindhæbbendra . last wesan|seon|beon 
 æfter waldswaþum wid gesyne , 
 gangan|gang ofer grund , þær heo gegnum for|faran 
 ofer myrcan mor , magoþegna bær|beran 
 se selestan sawolleasne 
 þær|se þu|þe|se mid hroðgare ham eahtian . 
 ofergan þu|þa|se æþeling birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 steap stanhliðo , stigan|stig nearu|nearo , 
 enge anpaðas , uncuþ gelad , 
 neowle næssas , nicorhusa fela . 
 he fearh sum|su beforan gengan 
 wis mann wong sceawian , 
 oþþæt he færinga fyrgenbeamas 
 ofer har stan hleonian findan , 
 wynleas wudu ; wæter under standan 
 dreorig and gedrefan|drefan . denu|dene eall|eal wesan|seon|beon , 
 wine|win scyldinga , weorc on|an mod 
 toh|to geþolianne , ðegne monegum , 
 oncyð eorl gehwæm , siððan æscheres 
 on|an þæm|þam|se holmclife hafela metan . 
 flod blod weol (folc toh|to sægon) , 
 hatan|hat heolfre . horn stundum song 
 fuslic fyrdleoð . feþa eal gesittan . 
 geseon þe|þa|ða|se æfter wæter wyrmcynn fela , 
 sellice sædracan , sund cunnian , 
 swilce on|an næshleoðum nicras licgean , 
 þe|þa|ða|se on|an undernmæl oft bewitigað 
 sorhful sið on|an seglrade , 
 wyrm and wildeor ; hi|heo on|an wegan|weg hreosan , 
 biter and gebolgne , bearhtm ongietan , 
 guðhorn galan|gal . sum geata leodan|leod 
 of flanbogan feorh getwæfan , 
 yðgewinnes , þæt|se him|hi|he on|an ald standan 
 herestræl heardian|heard ; he on|an holm wesan|seon|beon 
 sund þu|þe|se sænra , þu|þe|ðe he swylt forniman . 
 hræþe wearð on|an yðum mid eoferspreotum 
 heorohocyhtum heard genearwod , 
 niða genæged , and on|an næs|nesan teon , 
 wundorlic wægbora ; wer sceawedon 
 gryrelicne gist . gyrwan he beowulf 
 eorlgewædum , nalles for|faran ealdor|eald murnan . 
 sculan herebyrne hondum gebroden , 
 sid and searofah , sund cunnian , 
 seon|seo|se þu|þe|ðe bancofan beorgan cuþ|cunnan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he hildegrap hreþer nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan , 
 eorres inwitfeng , ald gesceþðan ; 
 acan|ac se hwitian|hwit helm hafela werian|weorod , 
 se þu|þe|se meregrundas mengan sculan , 
 sec sundgebland sincan|sinc geweorðad , 
 befongen freawrasnum , swa he fyrndagum 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen smiþ , wundor teon , 
 besettan swinlicum , þæt|se he siððan no 
 brond nesan|neh|ne beadomecas bitan|bita nesan|neh|ne magan . 
 næs|nesan þæt|se þonne|se mætost mægenfultuma 
 þæt|se him|hi|he on|an ðearfe leon|lah ðyle hroðgares ; 
 wesan|seon|beon þæm|se hæftmece hrunting nama . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon on|an foran ealdgestreona ; 
 ecg wesan|seon|beon iren , atertanum fah , 
 ahyrdan heaþoswate ; næfre hit æt|etan hild nesan|neh|ne swican 
 mannian|mann ængum þær|se þu|þe|se hit mid mund bewindan , 
 se þu|þe|ðe gryresiðas gegan|gan durran , 
 folcstede faru|fah ; næs|nesan þæt|se forma sið 
 þæt|se hit ellenweorc æfnan sculan . 
 huru nesan|neh|ne gemunan mago ecglafes , 
 eafoþ cræftig , þæt|se he ær gesprecan 
 wine|win druncen|drincan , þu|þa|se he se wæpn|wæpen onlah 
 god sweordfrecan . selfa nesan|neh|ne durran 
 under yða gewin ald geneþan , 
 drihtscype dreogan ; þær he dom forleosan , 
 ellenmærðum . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæm|se oðer swa , 
 siððan he he toh|to guðe gyrwan|gegyrwan habban . 
 beowulf maðelode , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgþeowes : 
 "geþenc nu , se mære mæg|mecgan|magian|maga healfdenes , 
 snottra fengel , nu ic wesan|seon|eoh siðes fus , 
 goldwine guma , hwæt#2 witan geo sprecan , 
 gif ic æt|etan þearf þinne|þin sculan 
 ald linnan|linen , þæt|se þu me|ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 forðgewitenum on|an fæder stælan|stelan . 
 wesan þu mundbora minum|min magoþegnum , 
 hondgesellum , gif mec hild niman ; 
 swilce þu þe|þa|ða|se madmas þu|þe|se þu me|ic sellan , 
 hroðgar libban|leof , higelace onsendan . 
 mæg|magan þonne|se on|an þæm|se gold ongitan geata dryhten , 
 geseon sunu hrædles , þonne|se he on|an þæt|se sincan|sinc starað , 
 þæt|se ic gumcystum god findan 
 beah|beagian|beag brytta , brucan þonne|se motan . 
 and þu unferð lætan|læt|lædan eald laf , 
 wrætlic wægsweord , widcuðne munan|mann|man 
 heardecg habban ; ic me|ic mid hruntinge 
 don|dom gewyrce , oþðe mec deað nimeð ." 
 æfter þæm|se word wedergeata leodan|leod 
 efstan mid ellen , nalas ondsware 
 bidan willan ; brimwylm onfon 
 hilderince . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon hwil dæg 
 ær he se grundwong ongytan magan . 
 sona þæt|se onfindan se þu|þe|ðe flod begong 
 heorogifre behealdan hund|1000 missere , 
 grim and grædig , þæt|se þær guma sum|su 
 ælwihta eard ufan cunnian . 
 gripan|grap þu|þa|se togeanes , guðrinc gefon|gefeng 
 atol clommum . no þywan|þy|þe|se ær in gescod 
 hal lice ; hringan|hring utan ymbbearh , 
 þæt|se heo se fyrdhom ðurhfon nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan , 
 locene leoðosyrcan laþ finger . 
 bær|beran þu|þa|se seon|seo|se brimwylf , þu|þa|se heo toh|to botm cuman , 
 hring þengel toh|to hofe|hof|hebban sin , 
 swa he nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan , no he se modig wesan|seon|beon , 
 wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen gewealdan , acan|ac he wundrian|wundor|wund se fela 
 swenсan on|an sunde|sund , sædeor manig 
 hildetuxum heresyrcan brecan , 
 ehtan aglæca . þe|þa|ða|se se eorl ongitan|ongietan 
 þæt|se he in niðsele nathwylcum wesan|seon|beon , 
 þær him|hi|he nænig wæter wiht nesan|neh|ne sceþede , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he for|faran hrofsele hrinan nesan|neh|ne magan 
 færgripe flod ; fyrleoht geseon , 
 blac leoma , beorht scinan . 
 ongitan|ongietan þu|þa|se se god grundwyrgenne , 
 merewif mihtig ; mægenræs forgifan|forgiefan 
 hildebille , hond sweng nesan|neh|ne ofteon , 
 þæt|se hire|heo on|an hafela hringmæl agalan 
 grædig guðleoð . þe|þa|ða|se se gist onfindan 
 þæt|se se beadoleoma bitan|bita nyllan|nillan , 
 ald sceþðan , acan|ac seon|seo|se ecg geswican 
 ðeodne æt|etan þearf ; ðolode ær fela 
 hondgemota , helm oft gescær , 
 fæge fyrdhrægl ; þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon forma sið 
 deore|deor madme , þæt|se hit|his|he don|dom alæg . 
 eft wesan|seon|beon anræd , nalas ellen lætan|læt|lædan , 
 mærþu gemyndig mæg|magan hylaces . 
 weorpan þe|þa|ða|se wundenmæl wrætt gebunden|gebindan|bindan 
 yrre|irre oretta , þæt|se hit on|an eorþ|eorðe liсgan|licgan , 
 stið and stylecg ; streng getruwian , 
 mundgripe mægenes . swa sculan munan|mann|man don , 
 þonne|se he æt|etan guðe gegan|gan þenceð 
 longsum lof , na ymb hit|his|he lif cearað . 
 gefon|gefeng þu|þa|se be eaxl (nalas for|faran fæhðe mearn) 
 guðgeata leodan|leod grendles modor ; 
 bregdan þu|þa|se beadu heard , þu|þa|se he gebelgan|belgan wesan|seon|beon , 
 feorhgeniðlan , þæt|se heo on|an flet gebugan . 
 heo him|hi|he eft hræþ andlean forgieldan 
 grimman|grimm|grim grap and him|hi|he togeanes fon ; 
 oferweorpan þu|þa|se werigmod wiga strengest , 
 feþecempa , þæt|se he on|an fyllu|fyllan wearð . 
 ofsæt þu|þa|se se selegyst and hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo seax geteon , 
 brad and brunecg , willan hire|heo birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn wrecan , 
 ange eaferan . him|hi|he on|an eaxl liсgan|licgan 
 breostnet broden ; þæt|se gebearh feorh , 
 wiþ|wið ord and wiþ|wið ecge ingangan|ingang forstandan . 
 habban þe|þa|ða|se forsiðod sunu ecgþeowes 
 under gynne grund , geata cempa , 
 nemnan him|hi|he heaðobyrne helpan gefremian , 
 herenet heard , and halig god 
 geweold wigsigor ; witig drihten , 
 rodera rædend , hit on|an ryht gesced 
 yðelice , syþðan he eft astandan . 
 geseon þe|þa|ða|se on|an searu sigeeadig bil , 
 eald sweord eotenisc , ecgum þyhtig , 
 wiga weorðmynd ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , 
 butan hit wesan|seon|beon micel|mare|mara þonne ænig mann|man oðer 
 toh|to beadulace ætberan magan , 
 god and geatolic , giganta geweorc . 
 he gefon|gefeng þu|þa|se fetelhilt , frec scyldinga 
 hreoh and heorogrim hringmæl gebrægd , 
 aldres orwena , yrringa slean , 
 þæt|se hire|heo wiþ|wið halse heard grapian , 
 banhringas brecan . bil eal ðurhwod 
 fægen|fæge flæschoman ; heo on|an flet gecrong . 
 sweord wesan|seon|beon swatig , secg weorc gefeh . 
 lixan se leoma , sunnan|leoht inne standan , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa of hefene hadre scineð 
 rodor candel . he æfter recede wlitan ; 
 hwerfan|hweorfan þu|þa|se be weallan|weall , wæpen hafenade 
 heard be hiltum higelaces ðegn , 
 yrre|irre and anræd . næs|nesan seon|seo|se ecg fracod 
 hilderince , acan|ac he hræþ willan 
 grendle forgyldan guðræsa fela 
 se þu|þe|se he gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan toh|to westdenum 
 oft micel þonne on|an an sið , 
 þonne|se he hroðgares heorðgeneatas 
 slean on|an sweofote , slæpan fretan 
 folc denigea fyftyne mann 
 and oðer swylc ut offerede , 
 laðlicu lacan|lac . he him|hi|he se lean forgieldan , 
 reþe|reðe cempa , toh|to se þu|þe|se he on|an ræste geseon 
 guðwerigne grendel licgan 
 aldorleas , swa him|hi|he ær gescod 
 hild æt|etan heorot . hra wid sprong , 
 syþðan he æfter deaðe drepe|drepan þrowade , 
 heorosweng heard , and he þu|þa|se heafod becearf . 
 sona þæt|se geseon snottre ceorlas , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe mid hroðgare on|an holm wlitan , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon yðgeblond eal mengan|gemengan , 
 brim blod fah . blondenfeax , 
 gomele ymb god , ongeador sprecan 
 þæt|se hi|heo|heg se æðelinges eft nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan 
 þæt|se he sigehreðig secean cuman|come 
 mære þeon|þeodan ; þu|þa|se se manig gewearð 
 þæt|se he seon|seo|se brimwylf abroten habban . 
 þe|þa|ða|se cuman non dæg . næs|nesan ofgiefan 
 hwate scyldingas ; gewitan him|hi|he ham þanan 
 goldwine guma . gistas setan 
 mod seoc and on|an merian|mere staredon , 
 witan and nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan þæt|se hi|heo hira|hi|heore winedrihten 
 selfne geseon . þu|þa|se þæt|se sweord onginnan 
 æfter heaþoswate hildegicelum , 
 wigbil wanian . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon wundrian|wundor|wund sum|su , 
 þæt|se hit eal gemealt is gelicost , 
 þonne forst bendan|bend fæder onlæteð , 
 onwindeð wælrapas , se geweald hafað 
 sæl and mæl ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is soð metod . 
 nesan|neh|ne niman he in þæm|se wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic , wedergeata leodan|leod , 
 maðmæhta micel , þeah he þær manig geseon , 
 butan se hafela and þu|þa|se hilt somod 
 sincan|sinc fah . sweord ær gemealt , 
 forbirnan|forbiernan brodenmæl ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se blod toh|to se hatan|hat , 
 ættren ellorgæst se þær inne sweltan . 
 sona wesan|seon|beon on|an sunde|sund se þu|þe|se ær æt|etan sæcce gebidan 
 wighryre wrað , wæter up þurhdufan . 
 wesan|seon|beon yðgebland eal fælsian , 
 eacen eardas , þu|þa|se se ellorgast 
 oflet lifdagas and þes lænan gesceaft . 
 cuman þu|þa|se toh|to land|finna lidmanna helm 
 swiðmod swymman ; sælac gefeon , 
 mægenbyrþenne þær|se þu|þe|se he him|hi|he mid habban . 
 gan|eadan him|hi|he þu|þa|se togeanes , god þancian , 
 ðryðlic þegnian|þegn|þegen heap , þeodnes gefegon , 
 se þu|þe|se hi|heo he gesund geseon motan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon of þæm|se hror helm and byrne 
 lungre alysan . lah|lagu drusade , 
 wæter under wolcn|wolcen , wældreore fag . 
 feran forþ|forð þanan feþelastum 
 ferhþ fægen|fæge , foldweg metan , 
 cuþ|cunnan stræte|stræt . cyningbalde mann 
 from|fram þæm|se holmclife hafela beran 
 earfoþlice|earfoðlice hira|hi|heore æghwæþrum , 
 felamodigra ; feower sculan 
 on|an þæm|se wælstenge weorc geferian 
 toh|to þæm|se goldsele grendles heafod , 
 oþðæt semninga toh|to sellan|sele|sel cuman 
 from fyrdhwate feowertyne 
 geata gongan ; gumdryhten mid 
 modig on|an gemonge meodowongas tredan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se cuman in gan ealdor ðegna , 
 dædcene mann|man dom gewurþad , 
 hæle|hælan|helan hildedeor , hroðgar gretan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon be feax on|an flet beran 
 grendles heafod , þær guma drincan , 
 egeslic for|faran eorlum and þære|se ides mid , 
 wliteseon wrætlic ; wer on|an seon . 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgþeowes : 
 "hwæt ! we þu|þe|se þes sælac , sunu healfdenes , 
 leodan|leod scyldinga , lust bringan|brengan 
 tires toh|to tacn|tacen , þu|þe|se þu heran|her toh|to locian . 
 ic þæt|se unsofte ealdor|eald gedigan 
 wigge under wæter , weorc geneþde 
 earfoþlice|earfoðlice ; ætrihte wesan|seon|beon 
 guð getwæfan , nymðe mec god scylde . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan ic æt|etan hild mid hruntinge 
 wiht gewyrcan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þæt|se wæpen dugan ; 
 acan|ac me|ic geuðe yld waldend 
 þæt|se ic on|an wegan|wag geseon wlitig hangian 
 eald sweord eacen|eacan (oftost wisian 
 winigea leasum) , þæt|se ic se wæpn|wæpen gebredan . 
 ofslean þe|þa|ða|se æt|etan þære|se sæcce , þu|þa|se me|ic sælan|sæl ageald , 
 hus hyrdas . þu|þa|se þæt|se hildebil 
 forbirnan|forbiernan brogdenmæl , swa þæt|se blod gesprang , 
 hatost heaþoswata . ic þæt|se hilt þan 
 feond ætferede , fyrendæda wræc|wrecan , 
 deaðcwealm denigea , swa hit gedefe wesan|seon|beon . 
 ic hit þu|þe|se þonne|se gehatan|gehat , þæt|se þu on|an heorot motan 
 sorhleas swefan mid þinne|þin secg gedryht 
 and þegnian|þegn|þegen gehwylc þinne|þin leode|leoda|leod , 
 duguðe and iogoþe , þæt|se þu him|hi|he ondrædan nesan|neh|ne þurfan , 
 þeon|þeodan scyldinga , on|an þu|þa|se healf , 
 aldorbealu eorlum , swa þu ær dydan|don ." 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon gylden|gyldan hilt gamelum rinc , 
 hara|har hildfruman , on|an hand gyfen , 
 ent ærgeweorc ; hit on|an æht gehweorfan 
 æfter deofol hryre denigea frea , 
 wundorsmiþa geweorc , and þu|þa|se þes worold ofgiefan 
 gromheort guma , god ondsaca , 
 morðres scyldig , and hit|his|he modor eacan|eac , 
 on|an geweald gehweorfan woroldcyninga 
 þæm|se selestan be sæ tweonum 
 se þu|þe|se on|an scedenigge sceatt dælan . 
 hroðgar maðelode , hylt sceawian , 
 eald laf , on|an þæm|se wesan|seon|beon or writan 
 fyrngewinnes , siððan flod ofslean , 
 gifen geotan , giganta cyn 
 (frecne geferdon) ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon fremde þeodan|þeod 
 ecean dryhten ; him|hi|he se endelean 
 þurh wæter wylm waldend sellan . 
 swa wesan|seon|beon on|an þæm|se scennum sciran gold 
 þurh runstafas rihte|rihtan|riht mearcian|gemearcod|gemearcian , 
 settan|gesettan and gesecgan hwæt|hwa þæt|se sweord wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 irena cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , ærest|ær wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 wreoþenhilt and wyrmfah . þe|þa|ða|se se wisian|wis sprecan 
 sunu healfdenes (swigedon ealle) : 
 "þæt , la , mæg|magan secgan se þu|þe|se soð and rihtan|riht 
 fremeð on|an folc , feor eal gemunan , 
 eald ᛟweard , þæt|se þes eorl wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 geboren|geberan|beran beterian|betera ! blæd wesan|seon|is aræran 
 geond widwegas , wine|win min|ic beowulf , 
 þin ofer þeod gehwylc . eal þu hit geþyldum healdest , 
 mægen|magan mid mod snyttrum . ic þu|þe|se sculan min gelæstan 
 freogan|freod , swa witan furðum sprecan . þu sculan toh|to frofor weorþan|weorþ 
 eal langtwidig leode|leoda|leod þin , 
 hæleðum toh|to helpan . nesan|neh|ne wearð heremod swa 
 eafora ecgwelan , arscyldingum ; 
 nesan|neh|ne geweaxan he him|hi|he toh|to willan|willa , acan|ac toh|to wælfealle 
 and toh|to deaðcwalum deniga leode|leoda|leod ; 
 breotan bolgenmod beodgeneatas , 
 eaxlgesteallan , oþþæt he ana|an hwerfan|hweorfan , 
 mære|mæran þeon|þeodan , mondreamum from|fram . 
 þeah þu|þe|se he mihtig god mægenes wynn , 
 eafeþum stepte , ofer ealle|eall|eal mann 
 forþ|forð gefremian , hwæþere him|hi|he on|an ferhþ growan 
 breosthord blodreow . nallas beah|beag gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf 
 denu|dene æfter dom ; dreamleas gebidan 
 þæt|se he se gewinn weorc þrowade , 
 leodbealo longsum . þu þu|þe|se læran be þon|se , 
 gumcyste ongit ; ic þes gid be þu|þe|se 
 awrecan winter frod . wundor wesan|seon|is toh|to secganne 
 hu mihtig god mannian|mann cynn 
 þurh sid sefa snyttru bryttað , 
 eard and eorlscipe ; he agan|ac eall|eal geweald . 
 hwilum|hwil he on|an lufu|lufe læteð hworfan 
 monnes modgeþonc mære|mæran cynn|cyn , 
 seleð him|hi|he on|an eþel eorþe|eorþ wynn 
 toh|to healdanne , hleoburh wer , 
 gedeð him|hi|he swa gewealdene worolde dæl , 
 side|sid romana , þæt|se he hit|his|he selfa nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 for|faran hit|his|he unsnyttrum ende geþencean . 
 wunað he on|an witan|wist ; no he wiht dweleð 
 adl nesan|neh|ne ieldo , nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he inwitsorh 
 on|an sefa sweorceð , nesan|neh|ne gesacu ohwær 
 ecghete eoweð , acan|ac him|hi|he eal worold 
 wendeð on|an willan|willa (he þæt|se wyrsa nesan|neh|ne con) , 
 oðþæt him|hi|he on|an innan oferhygda dælan|dæl 
 weaxeð and wridað . þonne|se se weard swefeð , 
 sawele hyrdan|hyran|hirde ; bið se slæpan toh|to fæstan|fæst , 
 bisig gebunden|gebindan|bindan , bona swiðe|swiðan neah , 
 se þu|þe|se of flanbogan fyren sceoteð . 
 þonne|se bið on|an hreþer under helm drepan 
 biter stræle (him bebeorgan nesan|neh|ne con) , 
 wom|woh wundorbebodum werig gast ; 
 þinceð him|hi|he toh|to lytel þæt|se he lange|lang healdan , 
 gytsað gromhydig , nallas on|an gylp seleð 
 fædde beah|beag , and he þu|þa|se forðgesceaft 
 forgyteð and forgymeð , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he ær god sellan , 
 wuldor waldend , weorðmynda dælan|dæl . 
 hit on|an endestæf eft gelimpeð 
 þæt|se se lichoma lænan|læn gedreoseð , 
 fæge|fægan gefealleð ; fehð oþer|oðer toh|to , 
 se þu|þe|se unmurnlice madmas dælan , 
 eorles ærgestreon , egesa nesan|neh|ne gymeð . 
 bebeorh þu|þe|se se bealonið , beowulf libban|leof , 
 secg god , and þu|þe|se þæt|se sel geceos , 
 ece ræd ; oferhyda nesan|neh|ne gyman , 
 mære|mæran cempa . nu wesan|seon|is þin mægen blæd 
 an hwil . eft sona bið 
 þæt|se þec adl oððe ecg eafoþ getwæfeð , 
 oððe fyr fon , oððe flod wylm , 
 oððe grippan|gripe|gripan meces , oððe gar fliht , 
 oððe atol ieldo ; oððe eage bearhtm 
 forsiteð and forsworceð ; semninga bið 
 þæt|se ðec , dryhtguma , deað oferswyðeð . 
 swa ic hringdena hund|1000 missere 
 wealdan under wolcn|wolcen and hi|heo|heg wigge belucan 
 manig mægþ geond þes middangeard , 
 æsc and ecgum , þæt|se ic me|ic ænig 
 under swegl|swegel begong gesacan nesan|neh|ne tellan . 
 hwæt#2 , me|ic se on|an eþel edwendan cuman , 
 gyrn æfter gomene , seoþðan grendel wearð , 
 ealdgewinna , ingenga min|ic ; 
 ic þære|se socn singal wegan 
 modceare micel . se sigan metod þanc , 
 ecean dryhten , se þu|þe|ðe ic on|an ald gebidan 
 þæt|se ic on|an se hafela heorodreorigne 
 ofer ealdgewin eage starian ! 
 gan nu toh|to setl , symbelwynne dreogan 
 wigge weorþad ; wit sculan worn fela 
 maþum|maþm gemæne , siþðan morgen bið ." 
 gietan|geotan|geatan|geat wesan|seon|beon glædmod , geong|gangan sona toh|to 
 setl neosan , swa se snottra hatan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eft swa ær ellenrofum 
 fletsittendum fæger gereorded 
 niowan stefn . nihthelm geswearc 
 deorc ofer dryhtgumum . duguð eal arisan|ar . 
 willan blondenfeax bedd neosan , 
 gamela scylding . gietan|geotan|geatan|geat unigmetes wel , 
 rof randwigan , restan lyste ; 
 sona him|hi|he seleþegn siðes werig , 
 feorrancundum , forþ|forð wisade , 
 se for|faran andrysnum ealle|eall|eal beweotede 
 þegn|þegen þearf , swilce þywan|þy|þe|se dogore 
 heaþoliðende habban sculan . 
 restan he þu|þa|se rumheort ; reced hliuade 
 geap and goldfah ; gæstan|gan inne swefan 
 oþþæt hrefn blæc|blacian|blac heofon wynn 
 bliðheort bodian . þe|þa|ða|se cuman beorht scacan 
 scaþan onettan , 
 wesan|seon|beon æþeling eft toh|to leode|leoda|leod 
 fus toh|to faran ; willan feor þanan 
 cuma collenferhð ceoles neosan . 
 hatan þu|þa|se se heardian|heard hrunting beran|bera 
 sunu ecglafes , hatan hit|his|he sweord niman , 
 leoflic iren ; sægan|seсgan|secgan him|hi|he se lean þanc , 
 cweðan , he se guðwine god tellan , 
 wigcræftigne , nales word log|lean 
 meces ecge ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon modig secg . 
 and þu|þa|se siðfrome , searu gearu 
 wigend wesan|seon|beon ; gan|eadan weorð denu|dene 
 æþeling toh|to yppe|yppan , þær se oþer|oðer wesan|seon|beon , 
 hæle|hælan|helan hildedeor hroðgar gretan . 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgþeowes : 
 "nu we sæliðend secgan wyllað , 
 feorran|feorr|feor cumene , þæt|se we fundian 
 higelac sec . wesan|seon|beon heran|her tela 
 willum bewenede ; þu we|us wel dugan . 
 gif ic þonne|se on|an eorþe|eorþ owihte mæg|magan 
 þinne|þin modlufan micel|mare|mara tilian|tilia , 
 guma dryhten , þonne ic git dydan|don , 
 guðgeweorca , ic beon|beo gearu|gearo sona . 
 gif ic þæt|se gefricge ofer flod begangan|begang , 
 þæt|se þec ymbsittend egesa þywað , 
 swa þec hetende hwilum|hwil don , 
 ic þu|þe|ðe þusend þegnian|þegn|þegen bringan , 
 hæleþ|hæle toh|to helpan . ic on|an higelac witan , 
 geata dryhten , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he geong|gangan su , 
 folc hyrdan|hyran|hirde , þæt|se he mec fremman willan|wil 
 word and worcum , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se wel herian|here 
 and þu|þe|se toh|to geoc garholt bere|beran|ber , 
 mægenes fultuman|fultum , þær þu|þe|ðe bið mannian|mann þurfan|þearf . 
 gif him|hi|he þonne|se hreþric toh|to hofe|hof geata 
 geþingeð , þeodnes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , he mæg|magan þær fela 
 freond findan ; feorcyþðe beoð 
 god geseсan|gesecan þæm|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he selfa dugan|deah ." 
 hroðgar maþelian him|hi|he on|an ondsware : 
 "þe þu|þa|se wordcwydas wigtig drihten 
 on|an sefa sendan ; nesan|neh|ne hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic snotorlicor 
 on|an swa geonga|geong feorh guma þingian . 
 þu wesan|seon mægenes strang and on|an mod frod , 
 wis wordcwida . wenan|wen ic talian , 
 gif þæt|se gegangeð , þæt|se þu|þe|ðe gar nymeð , 
 hild heorugrimme , hreþles eaferan , 
 adl oþðe iren ealdor ðinne , 
 folc hyrdan|hyran|hirde , and þu þu|þin feorh hafian|habban , 
 þæt|se þu|þe|se sægeatas god nabban 
 toh|to geceosenne cyning ænig , 
 hordweard hæleþ|hæle , gif þu healdan|heald wylt 
 mæg|mecgan|magian|maga romana . me|ic þu|þin modsefa 
 lican lengan|leng|lange swa wel , libban|leof beowulf . 
 hafian|habban þu ferian|feran þæt|se þæm|þam|se folc sculan , 
 geata leode|leoda|leod and gardenum , 
 sib gemæne , and sacu restan , 
 inwitniþas , þu|þe|se hi|heo ær dreogan , 
 wese|wesan , þenden ic wealdan|weald wid rices , 
 maþum|maþm gemæne , manig oþer|oðer 
 god gegretan ofer ganot bæð ; 
 sculan hringnaca ofer heafu bringan 
 lacan|lac and luftacen . ic þu|þa|se leode|leodan|leod witan 
 ge wiþ|wið feond ge wiþ|wið freond fæstan|fæst gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 æghwæs untæle eald wise|wis ." 
 þe|þa|ða|se git|gietan him|hi|he eorl hleo inne gesellan , 
 mago healfdenes , maþum|maþm twelf ; 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan he mid þæm|se lacu|lac leode|leodan|leod swæs 
 secean on|an gesyntum , snude eft cuman|cuma . 
 gecyste þu|þa|se cyning æþelu|æþele|æþel god , 
 þeon|þeodan scyldinga , ðegn betstan 
 and be heals geniman ; hreosan him|hi|he tear , 
 blondenfeax . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon began wenan|wen , 
 eald infrodum , oþer|oðer swiðe , 
 þæt|se hi|heo seoððan no geseon motan , 
 modig on|an meþle . wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he se munan|mann|man toh|to þon|se leof 
 þæt|se he se breostwylm forberan nesan|neh|ne magan , 
 acan|ac him|hi|he on|an hreþer hygebendum fæstan|fæst 
 æfter deore|deor mann dyrne langað 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan wiþ|wið blod . him|hi|he beowulf þan , 
 guðrinc goldwlanc , græsmoldan tredan 
 sincan|sinc hremig ; sægenga bidan 
 agendfrean , se þu|þe|se on|an ancor ridan|rad . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon on|an gangan|gang gifu hroðgares 
 oft geæhted ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon on|an cyning , 
 æghwæs orleahter , oþþæt he ieldo beniman 
 mægenes wynn , se þu|þe|se oft manig scod . 
 cuman þu|þa|se toh|to flod felamodigra , 
 hægstealdra heap , hringnet beran , 
 locene leoðosyrcan . landweard onfindan 
 eftsið eorl , swa he ær dydan|don ; 
 no he mid hearme of hliðes nosan 
 gæstas gretan , acan|ac him|hi|he togeanes ridan|rad , 
 cweðan þæt|se wilcuman wedera leode|leoda|leod 
 scaþan scirhame toh|to scip faran . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon on|an sande sægeap nacian|naca 
 hladan herewædum , hringedstefna , 
 mearh and maðmum ; micel hlifade 
 ofer hroðgares hordgestreonum . 
 he þæm|se batweard bindan gold 
 swurd gesellan , þæt|se he siððan wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an meodubence maþum|maþm þywan|þy|þe|se weorþ , 
 yrfelafe . gewitan him|hi|he on|an nacian|naca 
 drefan deop wæter , denu|dene land|finna ofgiefan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon be micel merehrægla sum|su , 
 segl sal fæstan|fæst ; sundwudu þunede . 
 no þær wegflotan windan|wind ofer yðum 
 siðes getwæfan ; sægenga for|faran , 
 fleotan famigheals forþ|forð ofer yðe , 
 bundenstefna ofer brimstreamas , 
 þæt|se hi|heo geata clifu ongitan magan , 
 cuþ|cunnan næssas . ceol up geþringan 
 lyftgeswenced , on|an land|finna standan . 
 hræþ wesan|seon|beon æt|etan holm hyðweard gear , 
 se þu|þe|se ær lange|lang tidan|tid leof mannian|mann 
 fus æt|etan faroðe feor wlatian ; 
 sælan toh|to sande sidfæþme scip , 
 oncerbendum fæstan|fæst , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan he yþian|yþ ðrym 
 wudu wynsum forwrecan magan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se up beran|bera æþeling gestreon , 
 frætwe and fætgold ; næs|nesan him|hi|he feor þanan 
 toh|to gesecanne sinc brytta , 
 higelac hreþling , þær æt|etan ham wunað 
 selfa mid gesiðum sæwealle neah . 
 bold wesan|seon|beon betlic , bregorof cyning , 
 heah in heall , hygd swiðe|swiðan geong|gangan , 
 wis , welþungen , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe wintra|winter lutan 
 under burhlocan gebidan|bidan habban , 
 hæreþes dohtor ; næs|nesan hio hnigan|hnah swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah , 
 nesan|neh|ne toh|to gneað gifu geata leode|leoda|leod , 
 maþmgestreona . mod þryðo wegan , 
 freme folc cwen , firen ondrysne . 
 nænig þæt|se durran deor geneþan 
 swæs gesiða , nefne sinfrea , 
 þæt|se hire|heo on|an dæg eage starede , 
 acan|ac him|hi|he wælbende weotode tellan 
 handgewriþene ; hræþ seoþðan wesan|seon|beon 
 æfter mundgripe mece þingan|geþingan , 
 þæt|se hit sceadenmæl scyran motan , 
 cwealmbealu cyþan . nesan|neh|ne bið swylc cwenlic þeaw 
 ides toh|to efnanne , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe hio ænlicu su , 
 se freoðuwebbe feorh onsæce 
 æfter ligetorne leof mannan . 
 huru þæt|se onhohsnode hemminges mæg|magan ; 
 ealodrincende oðer sædan , 
 þæt|se hio leodbealewa læs|lesan gefremian , 
 inwitniða , siððan ærest|ær wearð 
 gyfen goldhroden geonga|geong cempa , 
 æðele diore , siððan hio offan flet 
 ofer fealu flod be fæder lar 
 siþ geseсan|gesecan ; þær hio siððan well|wel 
 in gumstole , god , mære|mæran , 
 lifgesceafta lifian brucan , 
 hiold heahlufan wiþ|wið hæleþ|hæle breogo|brego , 
 eall|eal moncynnes min gefræge 
 se selestan bi|be sæ tweonum , 
 eormencynnes . forðam offa wesan|seon|beon 
 geofum and guðum , garcene munan|mann|man , 
 wid geweorðod , wisdom healdan 
 eðel sinnan|sin ; þanan eomer wæcnan|wacan 
 hæleðum toh|to helpan , hemminges mæg|magan , 
 nefa garmundes , niða cræftig . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se se heardian|heard mid hit|his|he hondscole 
 self æfter sande sæwong tredan , 
 wid waroðas . woruldcandel scinan , 
 sigel suðan fus . hi|heo sið dreogan , 
 ellen gegan , toh|to se þu|þe|ðe eorl hleo , 
 bonan ongenþeoes burh|burg in innan , 
 geong guðcyning god gefrunon 
 hring dælan . higelace wesan|seon|beon 
 sið beowulfes snude gecyðed , 
 þæt|se þær on|an worðig wigendra hleo , 
 lindgestealla , lifian cuman , 
 heaðolaces hal toh|to hofe|hof|hebban gongan . 
 hraðe wesan|seon|beon ryman , swa se rice|ric bebeodan , 
 feðegestum flet innanweard . 
 gesittan þu|þa|se wiþ|wið silf|self se þe|þa|ða|se sæcce genesan , 
 mæg|magan wiþ|wið mæge|mæg|magan , siððan mandryhten 
 þurh hleoðorcwyde hold gegretan , 
 meaglum word . meoduscencum hwerfan|hweorfan 
 geond þæt|se healreced hæreðes dohtor , 
 lufian þe|þa|ða|se leode|leodan|leod , liðwæge bær|beran 
 hæleðum toh|to hand . higelac onginnan 
 sinnan|sin geseldan in sellan|sele|sel þæm|þam|se hean|heah 
 fæger|fæge fricgcean (hyne fyrwet brecan , 
 hwilc sægeata siþ wæron) : 
 "hu lomp ge|eowan|eow on|an lad , libban|leof biowulf , 
 þu|þa|se þu færinga feorran|feorr|feor gehogodest 
 sæcce secean ofer sealtan|sealt wæter , 
 hild toh|to hiorote gewinnan|geblandan acan|ac þu hroðgare 
 widcuðne wea wiht gebetan , 
 mære ðeodne gewinnan|geblandan ic se modceare 
 sorhwylmum seaþ , siþ nesan|neh|ne truwian 
 leof mann ; ic þu|þe|ðe lange|lang bædan|biddan 
 þæt|se þu se wælgæst wiht nesan|neh|ne gretan , 
 lætan|lettan suðdene self geweorðan 
 guðe wiþ|wið grendel . god ic þanc secg 
 se þu|þe|ðe ic þu|þe|ðe gesund geseon motan ." 
 biowulf maðelode , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgðioes : 
 "þæt wesan|seon|is undyrne , dryhten higelac , 
 micel gemeting , monegum firas , 
 hwylc|hwilc orleghwil uncer grendles 
 wearð on|an ðam|se wange|wang , þær he worna fela 
 sigescyldingum sorh|sorg gefremian , 
 irmþ toh|to ald . ic þæt|ðæt|se eall|eal gewrecan , 
 swa begylpan nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf grendeles mæg|mecgan|magian|maga 
 ænig ofer eorþ|eorðe uhthlem se , 
 se þu|þe|ðe lengest|lengan|lange leofað lað cynn|cyn , 
 facn|facen bifongen . ic þær furðum cuman 
 toh|to ðam|se hringsele hroðgar gretan ; 
 sona me|ic se mære mago healfdenes , 
 siððan he modsefa min cuðe , 
 wiþ|wið hit|his|he sylfes sunu setl getæhte . 
 weorod wesan|seon|beon on|an wynn ; nesan|neh|ne sugan|seon ic wid feorh 
 under heofon hwealf healsittendra 
 medudream micel|mare|mara . hwilum|hwil mære cwen , 
 friðusibb folc , flet eall|eal geondhweorfan , 
 bædan byre geong|gangan ; oft hio beahwriðan 
 secg sellan , ær hi|heo toh|to setl geong|gangan . 
 hwilum|hwil for|faran duguðe dohtor hroðgares 
 eorlum on|an ende ealuwæge bær|beran ; 
 þu|þa|se ic freaware fletsittende 
 nemnan hyrdan|hyran|hirde , þær hio nægled sincan|sinc 
 hæleðum sellan . se hatan|gehatan wesan|seon|is , 
 geong|gangan , goldhroden , glæd sunu frod ; 
 hafað se weorþan|geweorþan wine|win scyldinga , 
 rices hyrdan|hyran|hirde , and þæt|se rædan|ræd talað , 
 þæt|se he mid se wif wælfæhða dælan|dæl , 
 sæcca gesette|gesettan . oft seldan hwær 
 æfter leodhryre lytel hwil 
 bongar bugeð , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah seon|seo|se bryd dugan ! 
 mæg|magan se þonne|se ofþyncan ðeodne heaðobeardna 
 and þegnian|þegn|þegen gehwa þær|se leode|leoda|leod , 
 þonne|se he mid fæmne on|an flett gæð , 
 dryhtbearn denu|dene , duguða biwenede ; 
 on|an him|hi|he gladiað gomelra laf , 
 heard and hringmæl heaðabeardna gestreon 
 þenden hi|heo ðam|se wæpn|wæpen wealdan motan , 
 oððæt hi|heo forlæddan toh|to ðam|se lindplegan 
 swæs gesiðas and hyra|hyr|hira|hi sylfra feorh . 
 þonne|se cweðan æt|etan beore se þu|þe|ðe bugan|beah gesyhð , 
 eald æscwiga , se þu|þe|ðe eall|eal gemunan , 
 garcwealm guma (him bið grim sefa) , 
 onginneð geomormod geonga|geong cempa 
 þurh hreðra gehygd higes cunnian , 
 wigbealu weccean , and þæt|se word acwyð : 
 'meaht þu , min|ic wine|win , mece gecnawan 
 se þu|þin fæder toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht bær|beran 
 under heregrima hindeman siþ , 
 dyre iren , þær he denu|dene slean , 
 wealdan wælstow , siððan wiðergyld liсgan|licgan , 
 æfter hæleþ|hæle hryre , hwate scyldungas gewinnan|geblandan 
 nu heran|her þær|se bana byre nathwylces 
 frætwum hremig on|an flet gæð , 
 morðres gylpeð , and se maðþum byreð , 
 se þu|þe|se þu mid rihte|rihtan|riht ræde|rædan sculan .' 
 manað swa and myndgað mæl gehwylc 
 sar word , oððæt sælan|sæl cymeð 
 þæt|se se fæmne þegn for|faran fæder dæd 
 æfter bil bitan blodfag swefeð , 
 ealdor scyldig ; him|hi|he se oðer þanan 
 losað lifian , con him|hi|he land|finna geare|gear . 
 þonne|se bioð abrocene on|an ba healf 
 aðsweord eorl ; siððan ingelde 
 weallað wælniðas , and him|hi|he wiflufan 
 æfter cearwælmum colran weorðað . 
 þywan|þy|þe|se ic heaðobeardna hyldo nesan|neh|ne telg , 
 dryhtsibbe dælan|dæl denu|dene unfæcne , 
 freondscipe fæst . ic sculan forþ|forð sprecan 
 gen ymbe|ymb grendel , þæt|se þu geare|gear cunnan , 
 sinc brytta , toh|to hwinan siððan wearð 
 hondræs hæleða . siððan heofon gim 
 glidan ofer grund , gæstan|gan yrre|irre cuman , 
 eatol , æfengrom , user neosan , 
 þær we gesund sælan|sæl weardian . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon hondscio hild onsæge , 
 feorhbealu fæge ; he fyrmest|forma liсgan|licgan , 
 gyrdan cempa ; him|hi|he grendel wearð , 
 mære maguþegne toh|to muðbonan , 
 leof mann liс|lic eall|eal forswelgan . 
 no se ær ut þe|þa|ða|se gen idelhende 
 bona blodigtoð , bealewa gemyndig , 
 of ðam|se goldsele gongan willan , 
 acan|ac he mægen rof min|ic costian , 
 grapian gearofolm . glof hangian 
 sid and syllic , searobendum fæstan|fæst ; 
 se wesan|seon|beon orðonc eall|eal gyrwan|gegyrwan 
 deofol cræft and draca fel . 
 he mec þær on|an innan unsynnigne , 
 dior dædfruma , gedon|gedo|don willan 
 manig sum ; hydan|hit nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan swa , 
 siððan ic on|an yrre|irre uppriht astandan . 
 toh|to lang ys toh|to reccenne hu ic ðam|se leodsceaðan 
 yfel gehwilc ondlean forgieldan ; 
 þær ic , þeon|þeodan min|ic , þin leode|leodan|leod 
 weorðode weorc . he on|an wegan|weg losade , 
 lytel hwil lifwynna brucan ; 
 hwæþre him|hi|he se swiðre swaðe weardade 
 hand on|an hiorte , and he hean|heah ðonan 
 mod geomor meregrund gefeallan . 
 me|ic se wælræs wine|win scildunga 
 fætt gold fela leanode , 
 manig maðmum , siððan merigen cuman 
 and we toh|to simble sittan|gesittan habban . 
 þær wesan|seon|beon gidd and gleo . gomela scilding , 
 felafricgende , feorran|feorr|feor reссan|reht|reccan ; 
 hwilum|hwil hildedeor hearpe wynn , 
 gomenwudu gretan , hwilum|hwil gyd awrecan 
 soð and sarlic , hwilum|hwil syllic spell 
 reссan|reht|reccan æfter rihte|rihtan|riht rumheort cyning . 
 hwilum|hwil eft onginnan , eldo gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 gomel guðwiga gioguðe cwiðan , 
 hildestrengo ; hreðer inne weallan , 
 þonne|se he winter frod worn gemunan . 
 swa we þær inne ondlangne dæg 
 niode naman|nama , oððæt niht|neaht becuman 
 oðer toh|to yld . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eft hraðe 
 gearu|gearo gyrnwræce grendeles modor , 
 siðode sorhfull ; sunu deað forniman , 
 wighete weder . wif unhyre 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gewrecan , beornan|beorn|beirnan acwellan 
 ellenlice ; þær wesan|seon|beon æschere , 
 frod fyrnwitan , feorh uðgenge . 
 noðer hi he nesan|neh|ne motan , siððan merigen cuman , 
 deaðwerigne , denia leode|leodan|leod , 
 bronde forbærnan , nesan|neh|ne on|an bæl hladan 
 leof mannan ; hio þæt|se liс|lic ætberan 
 feond fæðmum under firgenstream . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon hroðgare hreow tornost 
 þær|se þu|þe|se leodfruman lange|lang begietan . 
 þu|þa|se se ðeoden mec þin lif 
 healsode hreohmod , þæt|se ic on|an holm geþringan 
 eorlscipe efnan , ealdor|eald geneðde , 
 mærðo fremman|fremede ; he me|ic med hettan|gehatan . 
 ic þe|þa|ða|se se wælmes , þu|þe|se wesan|seon|is wid cuð , 
 grimm|grim gryrelicne grundhyrde fond ; 
 þær wit hwil wesan|seon|beon hand gemæne , 
 holm heolfre weallan , and ic heafod becearf 
 in ðam|se guðsele grendeles modor 
 eacen ecgum , unsofte þanan 
 feorh oðferede . næs|nesan ic fæge|fægan þu|þa|se git , 
 acan|ac me|ic eorl hleo eft gesellan 
 maðma menigu , mæg|mecgan|magian|maga healfdenes . 
 swa se ðeodkyning þeaw lifan . 
 nealles ic ðam|se lean forloren|forleosan habban , 
 mægen med , acan|ac he me|ic maðmas gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 sunu healfdenes , on|an min sylfes don|dom ; 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic þu|þe|ðe , beorncyning , bringan wylle , 
 est geywan . gen wesan|seon|is eall|eal æt|etan þu|þe|ðe 
 lissa gelong ; ic lutan hafo 
 heafodmæg nefne , hygelac , ðec ." 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se in beran|bera eaforheafodsegn , 
 heaðosteapne helm , har byrnan , 
 guðsweord geatolic , gyd æfter wræc|wrecan : 
 "me þes hildesceorp hroðgar sellan , 
 snotra fengel , sum word hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 þæt|se ic hit|his|he ærest|ær þu|þe|ðe est gesægde ; 
 cweðan þæt|se hydan|hit habban hiorogar cyning , 
 leodan|leod scyldunga lange|lang hwil ; 
 no se ær sunu sin syllan willan , 
 hwatum heorowearde , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he him|hi|he hold wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 breostgewædu . brucan eall|eal well|wel !" 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic þæt|se þæm|þam|se frætwum feower mearh 
 lungre , gelice , last weardian , 
 æppelfealuwe ; he him|hi|he est geteon 
 mearh and maðma . swa sculan mæg|magan don , 
 nealles inwitnet oðer bregdon 
 dyrne cræftan|cræft , deað renian 
 hondgesteallan . hygelace wesan|seon|beon , 
 niða heard , nefa swiðe hold , 
 and gehwæðer oðer hroþra gemyndig . 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde ic þæt|se he se healsbeah hygde gesellan , 
 wrætliс wundurmaððum , se þu|þe|se him|hi|he wealhðeo gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 ðeodnes dohtor , þrio wicg somod 
 swancor and sadolbeorht ; hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo siððan wesan|seon|beon 
 æfter beahðege breost geweorðod . 
 swa bealdode birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgðeowes , 
 guma guðum cuð , god dæd , 
 dreogan æfter dom , nealles druncen slean 
 heorðgeneatas ; næs|nesan him|hi|he hreoh sefa , 
 acan|ac he mancynn micel cræftan|cræft 
 ginfæstan gifu|gifan , þu|þe|se him|hi|he god sellan , 
 healdan hildedeor . hean|heah wesan|seon|beon lange|lang , 
 swa he geata birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god nesan|neh|ne tellan , 
 nesan|neh|ne he on|an medobence micles wyrðne 
 drihten wedera gedon|gedo|don willan ; 
 swiðe wendan|wenan þæt|se he sleac wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 æðeling unfrom . edwendan cuman 
 tireadigum mann torn gehwilc . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se eorl hleo in gefetian , 
 heaðorof cyning , hreðles laf 
 gold gegyrwan ; næs|nesan mid geatum þe|þa|ða|se 
 sincmaðþum sel on|an sweord had ; 
 þæt|se he on|an biowulfes bearm aleсgan|alecgan 
 and him|hi|he gesellan seofon|seofa þusend , 
 bold and bregostol . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon begen samod 
 on|an ðam|se leodscipe land gecynde|gecynd , 
 eard , eðelriht , oðer swiðe 
 side|sid romana þæm|þam|se þær sel wesan|seon|beon . 
 eft þæt|se geiode ufaran dogrum 
 hildehlæmmum , siððan hygelac liсgan|licgan 
 and heardrede hildemeceas 
 under bordhreoðan toh|to bonan wurdon|weorþan , 
 þe|þa|ða|se he gesohtan on|an sigeþeode 
 heard hildefrecan , heaðoscilfingas , 
 niða genægdan nefa hererices , 
 siððan beowulfe brad romana 
 on|an hand gehweorfan ; he gehealdan tela 
 fiftig wintra|winter (wæs þe|þa|ða|se frod cyning , 
 eald eþelweard) , oððæt on|an onginnan 
 deorc niht|neaht draca ricsian , 
 se þu|þe|ðe on|an heah hofe|hof|hebban hord beweotode , 
 stanbeorh steap ; stigan|stig under liсgan|licgan , 
 eldum uncuþ . þær on|an innan giong 
 niða nathwylc , se þu|þe|ðe neh gefon|gefeng 
 hæðnum horde , hond . . . . . . , 
 sincan|sinc fahne . he þæt|se siððan . . . . . . , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he slæpan besyrwan weorþan 
 þeof cræftan|cræft ; þæt|se wesan|seon|nesan ðiod onfindan , 
 bufolc beorn , þæt|se he gebelgan|belgan wesan|seon|beon . 
 nealles mid geweald wyrmhord abrecan 
 sylfes willum , se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he sar gesceod , 
 acan|ac for|faran þreanedlan þeowan|þeow nathwylces 
 hæleða bearn heteswengeas fleon|fleogan|flean , 
 ærnes þearfian|þearfa , and þær inne feolan|fealh , 
 secg synbysig , sona onfindan 
 þæt|se þær ðam|se gyste gryrebroga standan ; 
 hwæðre earmsceapen 
 . . .sceapen 
 þu|þa|se he se fær begietan|begeotan . 
 sincfæt . . . . . . ; þær wesan|seon|beon swylcra fela 
 in ðam|se eorðhuse ærgestreona , 
 swa hi on|an geardagum guma nathwylc , 
 eormenlafe æþele cynn|cyn , 
 þanchycgende þær gehydde , 
 deore|deor maðmas . ealle|eall|eal hi|heo deað forniman 
 ær mæl , and se on|an þe|þa|ða|se gen 
 leode|leoda|leod duguðe , se þær lengest|lengan|lange hwerfan|hweorfan , 
 weard winegeomor , wendan|wenan se ilca , 
 þæt|se he lytel fæc longgestreona 
 brucan motan . beorgan eallgearo 
 wunian on|an wonge wæteryðum neah , 
 niwe be næsse , nearocræftum fæstan|fæst . 
 þær on|an innan bær|beran eorlgestreona 
 hring hyrdan|hyran|hirde hordwyrðne dælan|dæl , 
 fætt gold , fea word cweðan : 
 "heald þu nu , hruse , nu hæleð nesan|neh|ne motan , 
 eorl æht ! hwæt#2 , hydan|hit ær on|an þu|þe|ðe 
 god begietan . guðdeað forniman , 
 feorhbealo frecne|frecen|frec , fyr gehwylcne 
 leode|leoda|leod min , þær|se þu|þe|ðe þes lif ofgiefan , 
 geseon seledream . ic nagan hwæt|hwa sweord weсgan|wegan|weg 
 oððe feormie fæted wegan , 
 dryncfæt deore|deor ; duguð ellor sceoc . 
 sculan se heardian|heard helm hyrstan gold 
 fætum befeallan ; feormynd swefað , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe beadogriman bywan sculan , 
 ge swilce seon|seo|se herepad , se æt|etan hild gebidan 
 ofer bord gebrecan bitan irena , 
 brosnað æfter beornan|beorn . nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan byrnan hringan|hring 
 æfter wigfruman wid feran , 
 hæleðum be healf . næs|nesan hearpe wyn , 
 gomen gleobeam , nesan|neh|ne god hafoc 
 geond sælan|sæl swingeð , nesan|neh|ne se swift mearh 
 burhstede beateð . bealocwealm hafað 
 fela feorhcynna forþ|forð onsendan !" 
 swa giomormod giohðo mænan 
 on|an æfter eall|eal , unbliðe hwerfan|hweorfan 
 dæg and niht , oððæt deaðes wylm 
 hrinan|hran æt|etan heorte . hordwynne fond 
 eald uhtsceaða open standan , 
 se þu|þe|ðe beornan biorgas seceð , 
 nacod|nacian niðdraca , niht fleogeð 
 fyr befon ; he foldbuend 
 swiðe|swiðan ondrædað . he gesecean sceall 
 hord on|an hruse , þær he hæðen gold 
 warað winter frod , nesan|neh|ne byð him|hi|he wiht se sel . 
 swa se ðeodsceaða þri hund|1000 wintra|winter 
 healdan on|an hruse hordærna sum|su , 
 eacencræftig , oððæt he on|an abealch 
 mann|man on|an mod ; mandryhtne bær|beran 
 fæted wegan , frioðowære bædan|biddan 
 hlaford sinnan|sin . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon hord rasian , 
 onboren beah|beagian|beag hord , ben getiðad 
 feasceaft mann . frea sceawian 
 firas fyrngeweorc forma siþ . 
 þu|þa|se se wyrm onwæcnan|onwacan , wroht wesan|seon|beon geniwad ; 
 stonc þe|þa|ða|se æfter stane|stan , stearcheort onfindan 
 feond fotlast ; he toh|to forþ|forð gestop 
 dyrne cræftan|cræft draca heafod neah . 
 swa mæg|magan unfæge eaðe gedigan 
 wea and wræcsið , se þu|þe|ðe waldendes 
 hyldo gehealdeþ ! hordweard sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 georne|geornan|georn æfter grund|grindan , willan guma findan , 
 se þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an sweofote sar geteon , 
 hatan|hat and hreohmod hlæw oft ymbehwearf 
 eall|eal utanweardne , nesan|neh|ne þær ænig mann|man 
 on|an þære|se westen|westan ; hwæðre wig gefeh , 
 beaduwe weorc , hwilum|hwil on|an beorgan æthweorfan , 
 sincfæt sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . he þæt|se sona onfindan 
 þæt|ðæt|se habban guma sum|su gold fandian , 
 heahgestreona . hordweard onbidan 
 earfoþlice|earfoðlice oððæt æfen cuman ; 
 wesan|seon|beon þe|þa|ða|se gebelgan|belgan beorg hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 willan se laða liсgan|leon forgyldan 
 drincfæt dyre . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon dæg sceacen 
 wyrm on|an willan|willa ; no on|an weallan|weall liсgan|licgan , 
 bidan willan , acan|ac mid bæle for|faran , 
 fyr fysan . wesan|seon|beon se fruma egeslic 
 leode|leoda|leod on|an land|finna , swa hydan|hit lungre wearð 
 on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi sincgifan sar geendian|endian . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se gæstan|gan onginnan gledum spiwan , 
 beorht hof bærnan ; bryneleoma standan 
 eldum on|an anda . no þær aht|agan cwic 
 lað lyftfloga læfan willan . 
 wesan|seon|beon se wyrm wigan|wig wid gesyne , 
 nearofages nið neah and feorran|feorr|feor , 
 hu se guðsceaða geata leode|leodan|leod 
 hatian and hynde ; hord eft gesceat , 
 dryhtsele dyrnne , ær dæg hwil . 
 habban landwara liсgan|leon befon , 
 bæle and bronde , beorg getruwian , 
 wig and weall ; him|hi|he seon|seo|se wenan|wen geleah . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon biowulfe broga gecyðed 
 snude toh|to soð , þæt|se hit|his|he sylfes ham , 
 bold sellan , brynewylmum meltan , 
 gifstol geata . þæt|se ðam|se god wesan|seon|beon 
 hreowan|hreow on|an hreðre , hygesorga micel ; 
 wendan|wenan se wisian|wis þæt|se he wealdende|wealdan 
 ofer eald rihtan|riht , ecean dryhten , 
 bitter|bitor|biter gebulge . breost innan weallan 
 þeostru geþoncum , swa him|hi|he geþywe nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon . 
 habban ligdraca leode|leoda|leod fæsten|fæstan , 
 ealond utan , eorðweard se 
 gledum forgrunden ; him|hi|he se guðkyning , 
 wedera þioden , wræc|wrecan leornian . 
 hatan him|hi|he þu|þa|se gewyrcean wigendra hleo 
 eallirenne , eorl dryhten , 
 wigbord wrætlic ; witan he gearu 
 þæt|se him|hi|he holtwudu helpan nesan|neh|ne magan , 
 lind wiþ|wið liсgan|leon . sculan lændaga 
 æþeling ærgod ende gebidan , 
 weorold lifes|lif , and se wyrm somod , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe hordwelan healdan lange|lang . 
 oferhogode þe|þa|ða|se hring fengel 
 þæt|se he se widflogan weorod geseсan|gesecan , 
 side|sid here ; no he him|hi|he þu|þa|se sæcce ondrædan , 
 nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he se wyrm wigan|wig for|faran wiht dydan|don , 
 eafoð and ellen , forðam he ær fela 
 nearu|nearo neðende niða gedigan , 
 hildehlemma , siððan he hroðgares , 
 sigoreadig secg , sellan|sele|sel fælsian 
 and æt|etan guðe forgripan grendeles mæg 
 lað cynn|cyn . no þæt|se læsest wesan|seon|beon 
 hondgemota , þær mann|man hygelac slean , 
 siððan geata cyning guðe ræs , 
 freawine folc freslondum on|an , 
 hreðles eafora hiorodryncum sweltan , 
 bil beatan . þanan biowulf cuman 
 sylfes cræftan|cræft , sundnytte dreogan ; 
 habban him|hi|he on|an earm ana|an xxx 
 hildegeatwa , þu|þa|se he toh|to holm bugan|beah|beag . 
 nealles hetware hremig þurfan 
 feðewiges , þu|þe|se him|hi|he foran ongeagn 
 linde beran ; lutan eft becuman 
 fram þæm|þam|se hildfrecan ham niosan . 
 oferswam þe|þa|ða|se sioleða bigong sunu ecgðeowes , 
 earm anhaga , eft toh|to leode|leoda|leod ; 
 þær him|hi|he hygd gebeodan hord and romana , 
 beah|beag and bregostol , bearn nesan|neh|ne truwian 
 þæt|se he wiþ|wið ælfylcum eþelstol 
 healdan|heald cuðe , þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon hygelac dead . 
 no se ær feasceaft findan magan 
 æt|etan ðam|se æðelinge ænig ðinga , 
 þæt|se he heardrede hlaford wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 oððe se cynedom ciosan willan ; 
 hwæðre he him|hi|he on|an folc freondlar healdan , 
 est mid are|ar , oððæt he yldra wearð , 
 wedergeatum wealdan . he wræcmæcgas 
 ofer sæ sohtan , sunu ohteres ; 
 habban hi forhealdan helm scylfinga , 
 se selestan sæcyninga 
 þær|se þu|þe|ðe in swiorice sincan|sinc brytnade , 
 mære þeon|þeodan . him|hi|he þæt|se toh|to mearc wearð ; 
 he þær for|faran feorm feorhwunde hleotan 
 sweord swengum , sunu hygelaces , 
 and him|hi|he eft gewitan ongenðioes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn 
 ham niosan , siððan heardred liсgan|licgan , 
 lætan|lettan se bregostol biowulf healdan|heald , 
 geatum wealdan . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon god cyning ! 
 se se leodhryre lean gemunan 
 uferan dogrum , eadgilse wearð 
 feasceaft freond , folc gestepte 
 ofer sæ side|sid sunu ohteres , 
 wiga|wig and wæpn|wæpen ; he gewrecan siððan 
 cealdum cearsiðum , cyning ealdor|eald bineat . 
 swa he niða gehwane nesan|genesan habban , 
 sliðra geslyhta , sunu ecgðiowes , 
 ellenweorca , oþ|oð se an dæg 
 þu|þe|se he wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se wyrm gewegan sculan . 
 gewitan þu|þa|se xiia sum|su torn gebelgan|belgan 
 dryhten geata draca sceawian . 
 habban þu|þa|se frinan hwanan se fæhð arisan|ar , 
 bealonið biorna ; him|hi|he toh|to bearm cuman 
 maðþumfæt mære|mæran þurh se melda hond . 
 se wesan|seon|beon on|an ðam|se ðreate þreotteoða secg , 
 se se orlege or onstellan , 
 hæftan hygegiomor , sculan hean|heah ðonon 
 wong wisian . he ofer willan|willa giong 
 toh|to se þu|þe|ðe he eorðsele an witan , 
 hlæw under hruse holmwylme neh , 
 yðgewinne ; se wesan|seon|beon innan full 
 wrætt and wira . weard unhiore , 
 gearu|gearo guðfreca , goldmaðmas healdan , 
 eald under eorþ|eorðe . næs|nesan þæt|se yðe ceap 
 toh|to gegangan guma ænigum ! 
 gesittan þe|þa|ða|se on|an næsse niðheard cyning , 
 þenden hælu abeodan heorðgeneatum , 
 goldwine geata . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon geomor sefa , 
 wæfre and wælfus , wyrdan|wyrd ungemete neah , 
 se se gomelan gretan sculan , 
 secean sawol|sawel hord , sundur gedælan 
 lif wiþ|wið lice , no þon|se lange|lang wesan|seon|beon 
 feorh æþeling flæsc bewindan . 
 biowulf maþelade , birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ecgðeowes : 
 "fela ic on|an giogoðe guðræsa genesan , 
 orleghwil ; ic þæt|se eall|eal gemunan . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon syfanwintre , þu|þa|se mec sinc baldor , 
 freawine folc , æt|etan minum|min fæder geniman ; 
 healdan mec and habban hreðel cyning , 
 gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf me|ic sincan|sinc and symbel , sibb|sib gemunan . 
 næs|nesan ic him|hi|he toh|to lif laðra owihte , 
 beornan|beorn|beirnan in burh|burg , þonne|se hit|his|he bearn hwylc|hwilc , 
 herebeald and hæðcyn oððe hygelac min|ic . 
 wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se yldestan ungedefelice 
 mæg dæd morþorbed stredan , 
 siððan he hæðcyn of hornbogan , 
 hit|his|he freawine , flan geswenсan , 
 mist|missan mercelses and hit|his|he mæg|magan ofscet , 
 broðor oðer blodig gar . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon feohleas gefeohtan|gefeoht , fyren gesyngad , 
 hreðre hygemeðe ; sculan hwæðre swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 æðeling unwrecen ealdor linnan|linen . 
 swa bið geomorlic gomelum ceorle 
 toh|to gebidanne , þæt|se hit|his|he byre ridan 
 giong on|an galgan , þonne|se he gyd wrecan , 
 sarig singan|sang , þonne|se hit|his|he sunu hangað 
 hrefne toh|to hroðre , and he him|hi|he helpan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , 
 eald and infrod , ænig gefremman . 
 simble bið gemyndgad morna gehwylc 
 eafora ellorsið ; oðres nesan|neh|ne gymeð 
 toh|to gebidanne burh|burg in innan 
 yrfeweardas , þonne|se se on|an hafað 
 þurh deaðes nyd dæd gefondad . 
 gesyhð sorhcearig on|an hit|his|he sunu bur 
 winsele westen|weste , windig restan 
 reotan berofene . ridend swefað , 
 hæleð in hoðman ; nesan þær hearpe swegan|sweg , 
 gomen in geard , swilce þær iu wesan|seon|beon . 
 gewiteð þonne|se on|an sealman , sorhleoð gæleð 
 on|an æfter an ; þynсan|þyncan him|hi|he eall|eal toh|to rum , 
 wongas and wicstede . swa weder helm 
 æfter herebealde heorte sorh|sorg 
 weallan wegan . wiht nesan|neh|ne magan 
 on|an ðam|se feorhbonan fæghðe gebetan ; 
 no se ær he se heaðorinc hatian nesan|neh|ne magan 
 laðum dæd , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah him|hi|he leof nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon . 
 he þe|þa|ða|se mid þære|se sorhge , þu|þe|se him|hi|he swa sar belimpan , 
 gumdream ofgiefan , god sunnan|leoht geceosan , 
 eaferum læfan , swa deð eadig mann|man , 
 land and leodbyrig , þu|þa|se he of lif gewitan . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon synn and sacu sweona and geata 
 ofer wid wæter , wroht gemæne , 
 herenið heardian|heard , siððan hreðel sweltan , 
 oððe him|hi|he ongenðeowes eaferan wær 
 from , fyrdhwate , freogan|freod nesan|neh|ne willan 
 ofer heafo healdan|heald , acan|ac ymb hreosnabeorh 
 eatolne inwitscear oft gefremedon . 
 þæt|se mægwine min gewræcan , 
 fæhðe and fyren , swa hydan|hit gefræge wesan|seon|beon , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe oðer hit|his|he ealdor|eald gebycgan , 
 heard ceap ; hæðcynne wearð , 
 geata dryhten , guð onsæge . 
 þu|þa|se ic on|an morgen gefrignan mæg|magan oðer 
 bil ecgum on|an bonan stælan , 
 þær ongenþeow eofores niosað . 
 guðhelm toglad , gomela scylfing 
 hreosan hildeblac ; hond gemunan 
 fæhðo genoh|genog , feorhsweng nesan|neh|ne ofteon . 
 ic him|hi|he þu|þa|se maðmas , þu|þe|se he me|ic sellan , 
 gyldan|gieldan æt|etan guðe , swa me|ic gifeðe wesan|seon|beon , 
 leoht sweord ; he me|ic land forgifan|forgiefan , 
 eard , eðelwyn . næs|nesan him|hi|he ænig þurfan|þearf 
 þæt|se he toh|to gifðum oððe toh|to gardenum 
 oððe in swiorice secean þurfan 
 wyrsa wigfrecan , weorðe gecypan . 
 simble ic him|hi|he on|an feþa beforan willan , 
 ana|an on|an ord , and swa toh|to ald sceall 
 sæcce fremman , þenden þes sweord þolað , 
 þæt|se mec ær and sið oft gelæstan . 
 siððan ic for|faran dugeðum dæghrefne wearð 
 toh|to handbonan , huga cempa ; 
 nalles he þe|þa|ða|se frætwe frescyninge , 
 breostweorðunge , bringan motan , 
 acan|ac in compe gecrong cumbles hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 æþeling on|an ellen ; nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon ecg bona , 
 acan|ac him|hi|he hildegrap heorte wylmas , 
 banhus gebrecan . nu sceall bil ecg , 
 hond and heard sweord , ymb hord wigan|wiga ." 
 beowulf maðelode , beotwordum sprecan 
 niehsta siþ : "ic geneðde fela 
 guða on|an geogoðe ; git ic wylle , 
 frod folc weard , fæhðe sec , 
 mærðu fremman , gif mec se mansceaða 
 of eorðsele ut geseceð ." 
 gegretan þe|þa|ða|se guma gehwylcne , 
 hwate helmberend , hindeman siþ , 
 swæs gesiðas : "nolde ic sweord beran|bera , 
 wæpen toh|to wyrm , gif ic witan|wist hu 
 wiþ|wið ðam|se aglæcean elles magan 
 gylpe wiðgripan , swa ic gio wiþ|wið grendle dydan|don . 
 acan|ac ic þær heaðufyres hat wennan|wenan|wen , 
 oreðes and attres ; forðam ic me|ic on|an hafu 
 bord and byrnan . nelle ic beorg weard 
 forfleon fot trem , acan|ac wit furður sculan 
 weorðan æt|etan weallan|weall , swa wit wyrdan|wyrd geteoð , 
 metod mannian|mann gehwæs . ic wesan|seon|eoh on|an mod from|fram 
 þæt|se ic wiþ|wið se guðflogan gylp ofersittan . 
 gebiddan|gebidan ge on|an beorgan|beorg byrnum werian|weorod , 
 secg on|an searu , hwæðer sel mæge|mæg|magan 
 æfter wælræse wund|windan gedygan 
 uncer twega . nesan þæt|se ge|eower sið 
 nesan|neh|ne gemetan|gemet mann , nefne min|ic an , 
 þæt|se he wiþ|wið aglæcean eofoðo dælan|dæl , 
 eorlscype efne|efnan|efen . ic mid ellen sceall 
 gold gegangan , oððe guð nimeð , 
 feorhbealu frecne|frecen|frec , frea eower !" 
 arisan|ar þe|þa|ða|se bi|be ronde rof oretta , 
 heard under helm , hiorosercean bær|beran 
 under stancleofu , strengo getruwian 
 an mann . nesan|neh|ne bið swylc earh|earg sið ! 
 geseon þe|þa|ða|se be weallan|weall se þu|þe|ðe worna fela , 
 gumcystum god , guða gedigan , 
 hildehlemma , þonne|se hnitan feþa , 
 stondan stanbogan , stream ut þanan 
 brecan of beorgan|beorg . wesan|seon|beon þære|se burna wælm 
 heaðofyrum hatan|hat ; nesan|neh|ne magan horde neah 
 unbyrnende ænig hwil 
 deop gedygan for|faran draca leсgan|lecgan . 
 lætan|lettan þe|þa|ða|se of breost , þe|þa|ða|se he gebelgan|belgan wesan|seon|beon , 
 wedergeata leodan|leod word ut faran , 
 stearcheort styrman ; stefn in becuman 
 heaðotorht hlynnan under har stan . 
 hettan|hatan wesan|seon|beon onhreran , hordweard oncniow 
 mann rædan|reord ; næs|nesan þær mara fyrst 
 freogan|freod toh|to friclan . from|fram ærest|ær cuman 
 oruð aglæcean ut of stane|stan , 
 hatan|hat hildeswat . hruse dynnan|dynian . 
 biorn under beorgan|beorg bordrand onswaf 
 wiþ|wið ðam|se gryregieste , geata dryhten ; 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon hringbogan heorte fysan 
 sæcce toh|to seceanne . sweord ær gebredan 
 god guðcyning , gomele laf , 
 ecgum unslaw ; æghwæðrum wesan|seon|beon 
 bealohycgendra broga fram oðer . 
 stiðmod gestandan wiþ|wið steap rond 
 winia bealdor , þe|þa|ða|se se wyrm gebugan 
 snude tosamne ; he on|an searu bidan . 
 gewitan þe|þa|ða|se beornan gebugan|bugan scriðan , 
 toh|to gescipe scyndan . scyld wel gebearg 
 lif and lice læssa hwil 
 mære þeodne þonne|se hit|his|he munan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 þær he þywan|þy|þe|se fyrst|first , forma dogore 
 wealdan motan swa him|hi|he wyrdan|wyrd nesan|neh|ne gescraf 
 hreð æt|etan hild . hond up abredan 
 geata dryhten , gryrefahne slean 
 incgelafe , þæt|se se ecg gewican 
 brun on|an ban , bitan|bat unswiðor 
 þonne|se hit|his|he ðiodcyning þearf habban , 
 bysig bædan . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon beorg weard 
 æfter heaðuswenge on|an hreoum mod , 
 weorpan wælfyre ; wid springan 
 hildeleoman . hreðsigora nesan|neh|ne gielpan|gelpan 
 goldwine geata ; guðbill geswican , 
 nacod|nacian æt|etan niðe , swa hydan|hit no sculan , 
 iren ærgod . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon þæt|se eðe sið , 
 þæt|se se mære mæg|mecgan|magian|maga ecgðeowes 
 grundwong se ofgyfan willan ; 
 sculan ofer willan|willa wiс|wican|wic eardian 
 elles hwergen , swa sculan æghwylc mann|man 
 alætan lændagas . næs|nesan þe|þa|ða|se long toh|to se 
 þæt|se þe|þa|ða|se aglæcean hi eft gemetan . 
 hyrte he hordweard (hreðer æðme weoll) 
 niwe stefn ; nearu|nearo ðrowode , 
 fyr befongen , se þu|þe|ðe ær folc wealdan . 
 nealles him|hi|he on|an heap handgesteallan , 
 æðelinga birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , ymbe|ymb gestandan 
 hildecystum , acan|ac hi on|an holt bugan , 
 ealdor|eald burgan . hira|hi in an weallan 
 sefa wiþ|wið sorh|sorg ; sibb æfre nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 wiht onwendan þæm|þam|se þu|þe|ðe wel þenceð . 
 wiglaf wesan|seon|beon hatan weoxstanes sunu , 
 leoflic lindwiga , leodan|leod scylfinga , 
 mæg|magan ælfheres ; geseon hit|his|he mondryhten 
 under heregrima hatan|hat þrowian . 
 gemunan þe|þa|ða|se þe|þa|ða|se are|ar þu|þe|se he him|hi|he ær forgifan|forgiefan , 
 wicstede welig wægmundinga , 
 folcrihta gehwylc , swa hit|his|he fæder agan . 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan þe|þa|ða|se forhabban ; hond rond gefon|gefeng , 
 geolu|geolo linde , gomel swyrd geteon , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon mid eldum eanmundes laf , 
 sunu ohteres . þæm|þam|se æt|etan sæcce wearð , 
 wræccan wineleasum , weohstan bana|ban 
 meces ecgum , and hit|his|he mæg|maga ætberan 
 brunfagne helm , hringan byrnan , 
 eald sweord etonisc ; þæt|se him|hi|he onela forgifan|forgiefan , 
 hit|his|he gædelinges guðgewædu , 
 fyrdsearo fuslic , no ymbe|ymb þe|þa|ða|se fæhðe sprecan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he hit|his|he broðor birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn abredwade . 
 he frætwe gehealdan fela missere , 
 bill and byrnan , oððæt hit|his|he byre miht|meaht|magan 
 eorlscipe efnan|efen swa hit|his|he ærfæder ; 
 gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se mid geatum guðgewæda , 
 æghwæs unrim , þu|þa|se he of ealdor|eald gewitan , 
 frod on|an forðweg . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon forma sið 
 geonga|geong cempa , þæt|se he guðe ræs 
 mid hit|his|he freodryhtne fremman sculan . 
 nesan|neh|ne gemealt him|hi|he se modsefa , nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he mæg laf 
 gewican æt|etan wigan|wig ; þæt|se se wyrm onfindan , 
 siððan hi|heo togædre gegan|gan habban . 
 wiglaf maðelode , wordrihta fela 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan gesiðum (him wesan|seon|beon sefa geomor) : 
 "ic þæt|ðæt|se mælan|mæl gemunan , þær we medu þegun , 
 þonne|se we gehatan ussum hlaford 
 in biorsele , þu|þe|ðe we|us þes|se beah|beag gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 þæt|se we him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se guðgetawa gyldan willan 
 gif him|hi|he þyslicu þurfan|þearf gelimpan , 
 helm and heard sweord . þu|þe|ðe he usic on|an here geceosan 
 toh|to ðyssum siðfate sylfes willum , 
 onmunan usic mærþu , and me|ic þes maðmas gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 þu|þe|se he usic garwigend god tellan , 
 hwate helmberend , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe hlaford we|us 
 þes ellenweorc ana|an aðohte 
 toh|to gefremmanne , folc hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 for|faran ðam|se he mannian|mann micel mærþu gefremian , 
 dæd dollicra . nu wesan|seon|is se dæg cuman 
 þæt|se ure|ur mandryhten mægenes behofað , 
 god guðrinca ; wutun gongan toh|to , 
 helpan hildfruman , þenden hydan|hit su , 
 gledegesa grim . god witan on|an mec 
 þæt|se me|ic wesan|seon|is micel leof þæt|se min lichama 
 mid min goldgyfan gled fæðmie . 
 nesan|neh|ne þynceð me|ic gerysne þæt|se we rondas beran 
 eft toh|to eard , nemnan we æror mægen|magan 
 fanu|fah gefyllan , feorh ealgian 
 weder ðeodnes . ic witan geare|gear 
 þæt|se nesan ealdgewyrht , þæt|se he ana|an sculan 
 geata duguðe gnorn þrowian , 
 gesigan æt|etan sæcce ; ure|ur sculan sweord and helm , 
 byrne and beaduscrud , begen gemæne ." 
 wod|wadan þu|þa|se þurh se wælrec , wigheafolan bær|beran 
 frea on|an fultuman|fultum , fea word cweðan : 
 "leofa biowulf , læstan|læst eall|eal tela , 
 swa þu on|an geoguðfeore gear gecweþan 
 þæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne alæte be þu|þe|ðe lifigendum 
 don|dom gedreosan . sculan nu dæd rof , 
 æðeling anhydig , ealle|eall|eal mægene 
 feorh ealgian ; ic þu|þe|ðe fullæstu ." 
 æfter ðam|se word wyrm yrre|irre cuman , 
 atol inwitgæst , oðer siþ 
 fyrwylmum fah fionda niosian , 
 laðra mannian|mann ; ligyðum for|faran . 
 birnan|biernan bord wiþ|wið rond , byrne nesan|neh|ne magan 
 geonga|geong garwigan geoc gefremman , 
 acan|ac se mæg|mecgan|magian|maga geonga|geong under hit|his|he mæg scyld 
 ellen gegan , þu|þa|se hit|his|he ongeagn|agen|agan wesan|seon|beon 
 gledum forgrunden . þu|þa|se gen guðcyning 
 mærþu gemunan , mægenstrengo slean 
 hildebille , þæt|se hydan|hit on|an heafola standan 
 niþ genyded ; nægling forberstan , 
 geswican æt|etan sæcce sweord biowulfes , 
 gomol and grægmæl . him|hi|he þæt|se gifeðe nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 þæt|se him|hi|he irenna ecge mihton 
 helpan æt|etan hild ; wesan|seon|beon se hond toh|to strong , 
 se þu|þe|ðe meca gehwane , min gefræge , 
 swenge ofersohte , þonne|se he toh|to sæcce bær|beran 
 wæpen wundor heard ; næs|nesan him|hi|he wiht þu|þe|ðe sel . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon þeodsceaða þridda siþ , 
 frecne|frecen|frec fyrdraca , fæhða gemyndig , 
 ræsde on|an se rof , þu|þa|se him|hi|he rum ageald , 
 hatan|hat and heaðogrim , heals eall|eal ymbefeng 
 biter bana|ban ; he geblodegod wearð 
 sawuldriore , swat yðum weallan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic æt|etan þearf gefrignan þeodcyninges 
 andlongne eorl ellen cyþan , 
 cræftan|cræft and cenðu , swa him|hi|he gecynde|gecynd wesan|seon|beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne hedan he se heafola , acan|ac se hand gebarn 
 modig mann , þær he hit|his|he mæg helpan , 
 þæt|se he se niðgæst nioðor hwene slean , 
 secg on|an searu , þæt|se þæt|ðæt|se sweord gedeaf , 
 fah and fæted , þæt|se þæt|ðæt|se fyr ongon 
 sweðrian siððan . þu|þa|se gen self cyning 
 geweold hit|his|he gewitt , wællseaxe gebredan 
 biter and beaduscearp , þæt|se he on|an byrnan wegan ; 
 forwritan weder helm wyrm on|an midde|midd . 
 feond gefyldan (ferh ellen wræc) , 
 and hi|heo he þu|þa|se begen abroten habban , 
 sibæðelingas . swylc sculan secg wese|wesan , 
 þegn æt|etan ðearfe ! þæt|se ðam|se þeodne wesan|seon|beon 
 siðast sigehwila sylfes dæd , 
 worlde geweorc . þe|þa|ða|se se wund ongon , 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he se eorðdraca ær gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 swelan and swellan ; he þæt|se sona onfindan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he on|an breost bealoniðe weallan 
 ator on|an innan . þe|þa|ða|se se æðeling giong 
 þæt|se he bi|be weallan|weall wishycgende 
 gesittan on|an sesse ; sugan|seon on|an ent geweorc , 
 hu þe|þa|ða|se stanbogan stapulum fæstan|fæst 
 ece eorðreced innan healdan|heald . 
 he þu|þa|se mid hand heorodreorigne , 
 þeon|þeodan mære , þegn ungemete till 
 winedryhten hit|his|he wæter gelafede , 
 hild sæd , and hit|his|he helm onspannan . 
 biowulf maþelian (he ofer benne sprecan , 
 wund|windan wælbleate ; witan he gearu 
 þæt|se he dæghwila dreogan habban , 
 eorþ|eorðe wynn ; þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon eall|eal sceacen 
 dogorgerimes , deað ungemete neah) : 
 "nu ic sunu minum|min syllan willan 
 guðgewædu , þær me|ic gifeðe swa 
 ænig yrfeweard æfter weorþan 
 lice gelenge . ic þes|se leode|leodan|leod healdan 
 fiftig wintra|winter ; næs|nesan se folccyning , 
 ymbesittendra ænig se , 
 þu|þe|se mec guðwinum gretan durran , 
 egesa ðeon . ic on|an eard bidan 
 mælgesceafta , healdan min|ic tela , 
 nesan|neh|ne sœ̄сan|seсan|secan searoniðas , nesan|neh|ne me|ic swerian fela 
 aða on|an unriht . ic se eall|eal mæg|magan 
 feorhbennum seoc gefea habban ; 
 for|faran ðam|se me|ic witan|wita nesan|neh|ne ðearf waldend firas 
 morðorbealo mæg|mecgan|magian|maga , þonne|se min|ic sceaceð 
 lif of lice . nu þu lungre geong|gangan 
 hord sceawian under har stan , 
 wiglaf libban|leof , nu se wyrm ligeð , 
 swefeð sar wund , sincan|sinc bereafian . 
 bio nu on|an ofoste , þæt|se ic ærwelan , 
 goldæht ongitan , gearu|gearo sceawian 
 swegl|swegel searogimmas , þæt|se ic se seft mæge|mæg|magan 
 æfter maððumwelan min|ic alætan 
 lif and leodscipe , se ic long|lange healdan ." 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic snude gefrignan sunu wihstanes 
 æfter wordcwydum wund dryhten 
 hyran heaðosiocum , hringnet beran|bera , 
 brogdne beadusercean under beorg hrof . 
 geseon þe|þa|ða|se sigehreðig , þu|þa|se he bi|be sesse geong|gangan , 
 magoþegn modig maððumsigla fealu , 
 gold glitinian grund|grindan getenge , 
 wundur on|an weallan|weall , and se wyrm denn , 
 eald uhtflogan , orcas stondan , 
 fyrnmanna fæt feormendlease , 
 hyrstum behrorene ; þær wesan|seon|beon helm manig 
 eald and omig , earmbeaga fela 
 searu sælan|gesælan . sincan|sinc eaðe mæg|magan , 
 gold on|an grund|grindan , gumcynnes gehwone 
 oferhigian , hydan|hyd se þu|þe|ðe wylle . 
 swilce he siomian geseon segn eallgylden 
 heah ofer horde , hondwundra micel , 
 lucan leoðocræftum ; of ðam|se leoma standan , 
 þæt|se he se grundwong ongitan magan , 
 wræte giondwlitan . næs|nesan se wyrm þær 
 onsyn ænig , acan|ac he ecg forniman . 
 þe|þa|ða|se ic on|an hlæw gefrignan hord reafian , 
 eald ent geweorc , an mannan , 
 him|hi|he on|an bearm hladon bunan and disс 
 sylfes dom ; segn eacan|eac geniman , 
 beacnian|beacn|beacen beorhtost . bill ær gescod 
 (ecg wesan|seon|beon iren) ealdhlafordes 
 þæm|þam|se se maðma mundbora wesan|seon|beon 
 long|lange hwil , ligegesan wegan 
 hat for|faran horde , hioroweallende 
 middelnihtum , oðþæt he morðre sweltan . 
 ar wesan|seon|beon on|an ofoste , eftsiðes geornan|georn , 
 frætwum gefyrðred ; he fyrwet brecan , 
 hwæðer collenferð cwic gemetan 
 in ðam|se wongstede weder þeon|þeodan 
 ellensiocne , þær he he ær forlætan . 
 he þe|þa|ða|se mid þæm|þam|se maðmum mære þioden , 
 dryhten sinnan|sin , driorigne findan 
 ealdor æt|etan ende ; he he eft ongon 
 wæter weorpan , oðþæt word ord 
 breosthord þurhbrecan . 
 gomel on|an giohðe (gold sceawode) : 
 "ic se frætwa frea eall|eal ðanc , 
 wuldurcyninge , word secg , 
 ecum dryhten , þu|þe|se ic heran|her on|an starian , 
 se þu|þe|ðe ic motan minum|min leode|leoda|leod 
 ær swyltdæge swylc gestrynan . 
 nu ic on|an maðma hord min bebyсgan|bebycgan 
 frod feorhlege , fremmað gena
