 leode|leoda|leod þearf ; nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan ic heran|her lengan|leng|lange wese|wesan . 
 hatað heaðomære hlæw gewyrcean 
 beorht æfter bæle æt|etan brim nosan ; 
 se scel toh|to gemynd minum|min leode|leoda|leod 
 heah hlifian on|an hronesnæsse , 
 þæt|se hit sæliðend siððan hatan|hat 
 biowulfes biorh , þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe brentingas 
 ofer flod genip feorran|feorr|feor drifað ." 
 dydan|don him|hi|he of heals hringan|hring gylden|gyldan 
 þioden þristhydig , þegn|þegen gesellan , 
 geonga|geong garwigan , goldfahne helm , 
 bugan|beah and byrnan , hettan|het|hedan|hatan he brucan well|wel : 
 "þu wesan|seon endelaf usses cynn|cyn , 
 wægmundinga . ealle|eall|eal wyrdan|wyrd forsweop 
 min mæg|maga toh|to metodsceafte , 
 eorl on|an ellen ; ic him|hi|he æfter sculan ." 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon þæm|þam|se gomelan gingæste word 
 breostgehygdum , ær he bæl сeosan|ceosan , 
 hatan|hat heaðowylmas ; him|hi|he of hreðre gewitan 
 sawol secean soðfæstra don|dom . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon gegongen guma unfrod 
 earfoþlice|earfoðlice , þæt|se he on|an eorþ|eorðe geseon 
 se leofestan lifes|lif æt|etan ende 
 bleat gebæran . bona swilce liсgan|licgan , 
 egeslic eorðdraca ealdor|eald bereafian , 
 bealu|bealo bædan . beahhordum lengan|leng|lange 
 wyrm wohbogen wealdan nesan|neh|ne motan , 
 acan|ac he irenna ecga forniman , 
 heard , heaðoscearde homera laf , 
 þæt|se se widfloga wund stille|stillan 
 hreosan on|an hruse hordærne neah . 
 nalles æfter lyft lacan hwerfan|hweorfan 
 middelnihtum , maðmæhta wlonc 
 ansyn ywde , acan|ac he eorþ|eorðe gefeallan 
 for|faran se hildfruman hondgeweorce . 
 huru þæt|se on|an land|finna lutan mannian|mann ðah , 
 mægenagendra , min gefræge , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe he dæd gehwæs dyrstig wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 þæt|se he wiþ|wið attorsceaðan oreðe geræsde , 
 oððe hringsele hondum styrian , 
 gif he wæccende weard onfindan 
 buon on|an beorgan|beorg . biowulfe wearð 
 dryhtmaðma dælan|dæl deaðe forgieldan ; 
 habban æghwæðer ende ferian|feran 
 lænan lifes|lif . næs|nesan þe|þa|ða|se lang toh|to se 
 þæt|se þe|þa|ða|se hildlatan holt ofgefan , 
 tydre treowlogan tynan|tin ætsomne . 
 þe|þa|ða|se nesan|neh|ne durran ær dareðum lacan 
 on|an hyra|hyr|hira|hi mandryhtnes micel þearf , 
 acan|ac hi scamian scyldas bæran , 
 guðgewædu , þær se gomela liсgan|licgan , 
 wlitan on|an wilaf . he gewergad sæt|sittan , 
 feðecempa , frea eaxl neah , 
 wehte he wæter|wæt ; him|hi|he wiht nesan|neh|ne spowan . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan he on|an eorþ|eorðe , þeah he uðe wel , 
 on|an ðam|se frumgare feorh gehealdan , 
 nesan|neh|ne se wealdende wiht oncirran ; 
 willan don|dom god dæd ræde|rædan 
 guma gehwylc , swa he nu gen deð . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon æt|etan ðam|se geonga|geong grim ondswaru 
 eðbegete þæm|þam|se þu|þe|ðe ær hit|his|he ellen forleosan . 
 wiglaf maðelode , weohstanes sunu , 
 sec , sarigferð (seah on|an unleofe) : 
 "þæt , la , mæg|magan secgan se þu|þe|ðe wyle soð specan 
 þæt|se se mondryhten se ge|eowan|eow þe|þa|ða|se maðmas gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 eoredgeatwe , þu|þe|se ge þær on|an standað , 
 þonne|se he on|an ealubence oft gesellan 
 healsittendum helm and byrnan , 
 þeon|þeodan hit|his|he þegn|þegen , swilce he þrydlicost 
 ower feor oððe neah findan magan , 
 þæt|se he genunga guðgewædu 
 wrað forweorpan , þe|þa|ða|se he wigan|wig beget . 
 nealles folccyning fyrdgesteallum 
 gylpan þurfan ; hwæðre him|hi|he god uðe , 
 sigorian|sigor waldend , þæt|se he he silf|self gewrecan 
 ana|an mid ecge , þu|þa|se him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon ellen þurfan|þearf . 
 ic him|hi|he lifwraðe lytel magan 
 ætgifan æt|etan guðe , and onginnan swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah 
 ofer min|ic gemetan|gemet mæg helpan ; 
 simble wesan|seon|beon þywan|þy|þe|se sæmra , þonne|se ic sweord drepan 
 ferhðgeniðlan , fyr unswiðor 
 weallan of gewitt . wergendra toh|to lutan 
 þrong ymbe|ymb þeon|þeodan , þu|þa|se he se þrag becuman . 
 nu sculan sincþego and swyrdgifu , 
 eall|eal eðelwyn eowrum cynn , 
 lufen alicgean ; londrihtes motan|mot 
 þære|se mægburge mann æghwylc 
 idel hweorfan , siððan æðelingas 
 feorran|feorr|feor gefricgean fleam eower , 
 domleas dæd . deað bið sella 
 eorl gehwylc þonne|se edwitlif !" 
 hatan þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se heaðoweorc toh|to hagan biodan 
 up ofer ecgclif , þær þæt|se eorlweorod 
 morgenlongne dæg modgiomor sæt|sittan , 
 bordhæbbende , began on|an wena|wen , 
 endedogores and eftcymes 
 leof monnes . lutan swigian 
 niwe spellian|spell|spel se þu|þe|ðe næs|nesan geridan|gerad , 
 acan|ac he soþlice|soðlice sægan|seсgan|secgan ofer ealle|eall|eal : 
 "nu wesan|seon|is wilgeofa weder leode|leoda|leod , 
 dryhten geata , deaðbedde fæstan|fæst , 
 wunað wælreste wyrm dæd . 
 him|hi|he on|an efn ligeð ealdorgewinna 
 sexbennum seoc ; sweord nesan|neh|ne magan 
 on|an ðam|se aglæcean ænig þingian|þing 
 wund|windan gewyrcean . wiglaf siteð 
 ofer biowulfe , byre wihstanes , 
 eorl ofer oðer unlifigendum , 
 healdeð higemæðum heafodwearde 
 leof and laðes . nu ys leode|leoda|leod wenan|wen 
 orleghwil , siððan underne 
 froncum and frysum fyllan cyning 
 wid weorðeð . wesan|seon|beon se wroht scepen 
 heard wiþ|wið hugas , siððan higelac cuman 
 faran flotherge on|an fresna land|finna , 
 þær he hetware hild genægdon , 
 ellen gegan mid ofermægene , 
 þæt|se se byrnwiga bugan sculan , 
 feallan on|an feþa , nalles frætwe gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf 
 ealdor dugoðe . we|us wesan|seon|beon wifcynn|hosp|flet|a siððan 
 merewioingas milts ungyfeðe . 
 nesan|neh|ne ic toh|to sweoðeode sibb|sib oððe treowe|treow 
 wiht nesan|neh|ne wennan|wenan|wen , acan|ac wesan|seon|beon wid cuð 
 se ongenðio ealdor|eald besnyðede 
 hæðcen hreþling wiþ|wið hrefnawudu , 
 þu|þa|se for|faran onmedlan ærest|ær geseсan|gesecan 
 geata leode|leodan|leod guðscilfingas . 
 sona him|hi|he se frod fæder ohtheres , 
 eald and egesfull , ondslyht agifan|agiefan , 
 abreot brimwisan , bryd ahreddan , 
 gomela iomeowlan gold berofene , 
 onelan modor and ohtheres , 
 and þe|þa|ða|se folgian feorhgeniðlan , 
 oððæt hi|heo oðeodon earfoþlice|earfoðlice 
 in hrefnesholt hlafordleas . 
 besittan þe|þa|ða|se sinherge sweord laf , 
 wund werig , wea oft hettan|gehatan 
 earm teohhe ondlonge niht|neaht , 
 cweðan , he on|an mergenne meces ecgum 
 getan willan , sum|su on|an galgtreowum 
 fugol toh|to gamen . frofor eft gelimpan 
 sarigmodum somod ærdæge , 
 siððan hi|heo hygelaces horn and byme , 
 gealdor ongietan , þu|þa|se se god cuman 
 leode|leoda|leod dugoðe on|an last faran . 
 wesan|seon|beon se swatswaðu sweona and geata , 
 wælræs weora wid gesyne , 
 hu þe|þa|ða|se folc mid him|hi|he fæhðe towehton . 
 gewitan him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se se god mid hit|his|he gædelingum , 
 frod , felageomor , fæsten|fæstan secean , 
 eorl ongenþio , ufor oncirde ; 
 habban higelaces hild frinan , 
 wlonces wigcræft , wiðres nesan|neh|ne truwian , 
 þæt|se he sæmann onsacan miht|meaht|magan , 
 heaðoliðendum hord forstandan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn and bryd ; bugan|beah eft þanan 
 eald under eorðweall . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon æht beodan 
 sweona leode|leoda|leod , segn higelaces 
 freoðowong se forþ|forð ofergan , 
 siððan hreðlingas toh|to hagan þringan . 
 þær wearð ongenðiow ecgum sweord , 
 blondenfexa , on|an bidan wrecan , 
 þæt|se se þeodcyning ðafian sculan 
 eafores an don|dom . he yrringa 
 wulf wonreding wæpn|wæpen geræhte , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he for|faran swenge swat ædre sprong 
 forþ|forð under fexe . næs|nesan he forht swa ðeh , 
 gomela scilfing , acan|ac forgieldan hraðe 
 wyrsa wrixlan wælhlem se , 
 siððan ðeodcyning þider oncirde . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan se snella sunu wonredes 
 eald ceorle ondslyht giofan , 
 acan|ac he him|hi|he on|an heafod helm ær gescer , 
 þæt|se he blod fah bugan sculan , 
 feallan on|an folde ; næs|nesan he fæge|fægan þu|þa|se git|gietan , 
 acan|ac he he gewyrpte , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he wund hrinan . 
 lætan|lettan se heardian|heard higelaces þegn 
 brad mece , þu|þa|se hit|his|he broðor liсgan|licgan , 
 eald sweord eotonisc , entisc helm 
 brecan ofer bordweal ; þe|þa|ða|se gebugan cyning , 
 folc hyrdan|hyran|hirde , wesan|seon|beon in feorh dreopan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon manig þu|þe|se hit|his|he mæg|magan wriðon , 
 ricone aræran , þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he ryman wearð 
 þæt|se hi|heo wælstow wealdan motan . 
 þenden reafian rinc oðer , 
 niman on|an ongenðio irenbyrnan , 
 heard swyrd hilted and hit|his|he helm somod , 
 har hyrstan higelace bær|beran . 
 he ðam|se frætwum fon and him|hi|he fæger|fæge hettan|gehatan 
 lean mid leode|leoda|leod , and gelæstan swa ; 
 gyldan|gieldan se guðræs geata dryhten , 
 hreðles eafora , þu|þa|se he toh|to ham becuman , 
 iofore and wulf mid ofermaðmum , 
 sellan hira|hi gehwæðrum hund|1000 þusend 
 land|finna and locenra beah|beagian|beag (ne ðorfte him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se lean oðwitan 
 mann|man on|an middangearde) , siððan hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se mærþu geslean , 
 and þe|þa|ða|se iofore forgifan|forgiefan ange dohtor , 
 hamweorðunge , hyldo toh|to wedd|wedan . 
 þæt|se ys se fæhðo and se feondscipe , 
 wælnið wer , se þu|þe|ðe ic wenan|wen hafo , 
 þu|þe|se we|us seceað toh|to sweona leode|leoda|leod , 
 siððan hi|heo gefricgeað frea userne 
 ealdorleas , se þu|þe|ðe ær gehealdan 
 wiþ|wið hettendum hord and romana 
 æfter hæleða hryre , hwate scildingas , 
 folcred fremman|fremede oððe furður gen 
 eorlscipe efnan . nu wesan|seon|is ofost betost 
 þæt|se we þeodcyning þær sceawian 
 and se gebringan , þu|þe|se we|us beah|beag gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 on|an adfære . nesan|neh|ne scel an hwæt#2 
 meltan mid þæm|þam|se modig , acan|ac þær wesan|seon|is maðma hord , 
 gold unrime grimman|grimm|grim geceapod , 
 and nu æt|etan siðestan sylfes feorh 
 beah|beag gebycgan . þu|þa|se sceall brond fretan , 
 æled|ælan þeccean , nalles eorl wegan 
 maððum toh|to gemynd , nesan|neh|ne mægþ scyne 
 habban on|an heals hringweorðunge , 
 acan|ac sculan geomormod , gold bereafian , 
 oft nalles æne elland tredan , 
 nu se herewisa hleahtor aleсgan|alecgan , 
 gamen and gleodream . forðam sceall gar wese|wesan 
 manig , morgenceald , mund bewindan , 
 hæfen on|an hand , nalles hearpe swegan|sweg 
 wigend weccean , acan|ac se wonna hrefn 
 fus ofer fæge fela reordian , 
 earn secgan hu him|hi|he æt|etan etan spowan , 
 þenden he wiþ|wið wulf wæl|wel reafian ." 
 swa se secg hwata secggende wesan|seon|beon 
 laðra spellian|spell|spel ; he nesan|neh|ne leogan fela 
 wyrd nesan|neh|ne word . weorod eall|eal arisan|ar ; 
 gan|eadan unbliðe under earnanæs , 
 wollenteare wundur sceawian . 
 findan þe|þa|ða|se on|an sande sawulleasne 
 hlimbed healdan|heald se þu|þe|se him|hi|he hring gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf 
 ær mæl ; þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon endedæg 
 god gegongen , þæt|se se guðcyning , 
 weder þeon|þeodan , wundordeaðe sweltan . 
 ær hi|heo þær gesegan syllicran wiht , 
 wyrm on|an wonge wiðerræhtes þær 
 laðne licgean ; wesan|seon|beon se legdraca 
 grimlic , gryrefah , gledum beswæled . 
 se wesan|seon|beon fiftig fotgemearces 
 lang on|an legere , lyftwynne healdan 
 niht hwilum|hwil , nyðer eft gewitan 
 denn niosian ; wesan|seon|beon þe|þa|ða|se deaðe fæstan|fæst , 
 habban eorðscrafa ende nyttian|genyttian . 
 him|hi|he big stodan bunan and orcas , 
 disс liсgan and dyre swyrd , 
 omige , þurhetone , swa hi|heo wiþ|wið eorþ|eorðe fæðm 
 þusend wintra|winter þær eardian . 
 þonne|se wesan|seon|beon þæt|se yrfe , eacencræftig , 
 iumonna gold galdre|galdor bewindan , 
 þæt|se ðam|se hringsele hrinan nesan|neh|ne motan 
 guma ænig , nefne god self , 
 sigorian|sigor soðcyning , sellan þæm|þam|se þu|þe|ðe he willan 
 (he wesan|seon|is mannian|mann gehyld) hord openian , 
 efne|efnan|efen swa hwylca|hwilc mannian|mann swa him|hi|he gemetan|gemet ðuhte . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon gesyne þæt|se se sið nesan|neh|ne ðah 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|ðe unriht inne gehydde 
 wræte under weallan|weall . weard ær ofslean 
 fearh sum ; þu|þa|se se fæhð gewearð 
 wrecan|gewrecan wraðlice . wundur hwær þonne|se 
 eorl ellenrof ende gefere|gefer 
 lifgesceafta , þonne|se lengan|leng|lange nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 mann|man mid hit|his|he mæg|maga meduseld buan . 
 swa wesan|seon|beon biowulfe , þu|þa|se he biorges weard 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , searoniðas ; seolfa nesan|neh|ne cuðe 
 þurh hwæt#2 hit|his|he weorold gedal weorðan sculan . 
 swa hit oþ|oð dom dæg diope benemnan 
 þeodnas mære|mæran , þu|þa|se þæt|ðæt|se þær don , 
 þæt|se se secg wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon synn scildig , 
 here geheaðerod , hellbendum fæstan|fæst , 
 womm gewitnad , se se wong strudan , 
 næs|nesan he goldhwæte gearwor habban 
 agend est ær sceawian . 
 wiglaf maðelode , wihstanes sunu : 
 "oft sceall eorl manig an willan|willa 
 wræc|wrecan adreogan , swa we|us weorþan|geweorþan wesan|seon|is . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan we gelæran|gelær leof þeon|þeodan , 
 rices hyrdan|hyran|hirde , rædan|ræd ænig , 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne gretan goldweard se , 
 lætan|lettan he licgean þær he long|lange wesan|seon|beon , 
 wiсe|wiс|wicu|wice|wic wunian oþ|oð woruldende ; 
 healdan on|an heahgesceap . hord ys sceawian , 
 grimman|grimm|grim gegongen ; wesan|seon|beon þæt|se gifeðe toh|to swiðan 
 þu|þe|se se þeodcyning þider ontyhte . 
 ic wesan|seon|beon þær inne and þæt|se eall|eal geondseh , 
 recedes geatwa , þu|þa|se me|ic ryman wesan|seon|beon , 
 nealles swæslice sið alyfan 
 inn under eorðweall . ic on|an ofoste gefon|gefeng 
 micel mid mund mægenbyrðenne 
 hordgestreona , hider ut ætberan 
 cyninge|cyning minum|min . cwic wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se gena , 
 wis and gewittig ; worn eall|eal gesprecan 
 gomol on|an gehðo and eowic gretan hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 bædan|biddan þæt|se ge gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan æfter wine|win dæd 
 in bælstede beorgan se hean|heah , 
 micelne|micel and mære , swa he mannian|mann wesan|seon|beon 
 wigend weorðfullost wid geond eorþ|eorðe , 
 þenden he burhwelan brucan motan . 
 witon nu efstan oðer siþ , 
 seon|seo and secean searogimma geþræc , 
 wundur under weallan|weall ; ic ge|eowan|eow wisian , 
 þæt|se ge genoh|genog neon sceawiað 
 beah|beag and brad gold . wesan|seon|nesan se bær|beran gearu|gearo , 
 ædre æfnan , þonne|se we ut cymen , 
 and þonne|se geferian frea userne , 
 leof mannan , þær he long|lange sculan 
 on|an se waldendes wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon geþolian ." 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se gebeodan byre wihstanes , 
 hæle|hælan|helan hildedior , hæleða monegum , 
 boldagendra , þæt|se hi|heo bælwudu 
 feorran|feorr|feor ferian , folcagende , 
 god togenes : "nu sculan gled fretan , 
 weaxan wonna leg wiga strengel , 
 se þu|þe|ðe oft gebidan isernscure , 
 þonne|se stræla storm streng bædan 
 scacan ofer scildweall , sceft nytt healdan , 
 feðergearwum fus flan fulleode ." 
 huru se snotra sunu wihstanes 
 acigde of corðre cyning þegn|þegen 
 syfone tosamne , þu|þa|se selestan , 
 gan|eadan eahtian|eahta sum|su under inwithrof 
 hilderinca ; sum|su on|an hand bær|beran 
 æledleoman , se þu|þe|ðe on|an ord geong|gangan . 
 næs|nesan þe|þa|ða|se on|an hlytme hwæt|hwa þæt|se hord strudan , 
 siððan orwearde ænig dælan|dæl 
 secg gesegon on|an sellan|sele|sel wunian , 
 lænan|læn licgan ; lutan ænig murnan 
 þæt|se hi|heo ofostlice ut geferedon 
 dyre maðmas . draca ec scufun , 
 wyrm ofer weallclif , lætan wegan|weg niman , 
 flod fæðmian frætwa hyrdan|hyran|hirde . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon windan gold on|an wæn hladan , 
 æghwæs unrim , æþeling beran , 
 har hilderinc toh|to hronesnæsse . 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se gegiredan geata leode|leodan|leod 
 ad on|an eorþ|eorðe unwaclicne , 
 helma|helm behongen , hildebord , 
 beorht byrnum , swa he bena|ben wesan|seon|beon ; 
 aleсgan|alecgan þe|þa|ða|se tomiddes mære þeon|þeodan 
 hæleð hiofende , hlaford leof . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se on|an beorgan|beorg bælfyra micel 
 wigend weccan ; wudurec astigan , 
 sweart ofer swioðole , swogan leg 
 wop bewindan (windblond gelæg) , 
 oðþæt he þe|þa|ða|se banhus gebrucan|gebrecan|brucan|brecan habban , 
 hatan|hat on|an hreðre . higum unrote 
 modceare mænan , mondryhtnes cwealm ; 
 swilce giomorgyd geatisc meowle 
 bundenheorde 
 song sorgcearig swiðe|swiðan geneahhe 
 þæt|se hio hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo heofungdagas heard ondrædan , 
 wælfylla worn , werudes egesa , 
 hynðo and hæftnyd . heofon recan swelgan . 
 gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan þe|þa|ða|se weder leode|leodan|leod 
 hleo on|an hoe , se wesan|seon|beon heah and brad , 
 wægliðendum wid gesyne , 
 and betimbredon on|an tynan|tin dæg|dah|dag 
 beadurofes becn , bronda laf 
 weallan|weall bewyrсan|bewyrcan , swa hydan|hit weorðlicost 
 foresnotre mann findan mihton . 
 hi|heo on|an beorgan|beorg don beg and siglu , 
 eall|eal swilce hyrsta , swilce on|an horde ær 
 niðhedige mann niman|geniman habban , 
 forlætan eorl gestreon eorþ|eorðe healdan|heald , 
 gold on|an greotan , þær hit nu gen lifað 
 eldum swa unnyt swa hit æror wesan|seon|beon . 
 þu|þa|se ymbe|ymb hlæw riodan hildediore , 
 æþeling birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , eall|eal twelfe|twelf , 
 willan cearu cwiðan and kyning mæne|mænan , 
 wordgyd wrecan and ymb wer sprecan ; 
 eahtodan eorlscipe and hit|his|he ellenweorc 
 duguðum deman , swa hit gedefe bið 
 þæt|se mann|man hit|his|he winedryhten word here , 
 ferhðum freogan , þonne|se he forþ|forð scile 
 of lichama lædan weorðan . 
 swa begnornodon geata leode|leodan|leod 
 hlaford hryre , heorðgeneatas , 
 cweþan|cweðan þæt|se he wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon wyruldcyninga 
 mannian|mann mildust and monðwærust , 
 leode|leoda|leod liðost and lofgeornost . 
 æl , drihten leof ! æl , dema god ! 
 gear me|ic , ece waldend . 
 ic witan min saule synn forwundian ; 
 gehælan þu hi , heofena drihten , 
 and gelacnian þu hi , lifes|lif ealdor , 
 forðam þu eðest miht eall|eal læca 
 ðæra þu|þe|se geweorþan side|sid oððe wyde . 
 æl , frea beorhtian|beorht , folkes scippend ! 
 gemilsa þyn mod me|ic toh|to god , 
 sile þin are|ar þynum earminge . 
 se byð earming þu|þe|se on|an eorþ|eorðe heran|her 
 dæiges and niht deofol campað 
 and his willan|willa wyrcð ; wa him|hi|he þære|se mirigðe , 
 þonne|se he þe|þa|ða|se handlean hafað and sceawað , 
 bute he se yfel ær geswyce . 
 se byð eadig , se þu|þe|se on|an eorþ|eorðe heran|her 
 dæiges and nyhtes drihten hyræð 
 and wifcynn|hosp|flet|a his willan|willa wyrcð ; wel he se geweorkes , 
 þonne he þe|þa|ða|se handlean hafað and sceawað , 
 gif he ealteawne ende gedreogeð . 
 æl , sunnan|leoht sunnan|leoht ! æl , lyfes wynn ! 
 getiþa me|ic , tireadig kyning , 
 þonne|se ic minre|min sawol|sawel swegl|swegel bydde , 
 ece are|ar . þu wesan|seon eaðe , god , 
 hæftan|habban and waldest 
 ana|an ofer ealle|eall|eal eorþ|eorðe and heofon 
 syddra gesceafta . þu wesan|seon soð meotod , 
 ana|an ofer ealle|eall|eal eorðbugende , 
 swilce on|an heofon up þu wesan|seon hælend god . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þu|þe|se aherian hæleða ænig ; 
 þeah we|us gesomnian geond sid grund , 
 mann ofer molde , geond eall|eal middaneard , 
 nesan|neh|ne maga we næfre asæcgan , nesan|neh|ne þæt|se soð witan|wita , 
 hu þu æðele wesan|seon , ece drihten . 
 nesan|neh|ne þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah engel werod up on|an heofenum 
 snotra tosamne sæcgan onginnan , 
 nesan|neh|ne magan hi næfre areccean , nesan|neh|ne þæt|se geriman|gerim wytan , 
 hu þu mære|mæran wesan|seon , mihtig drihten . 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|is wunder micel , wealdend engel , 
 gif þu hit self witan , sigor ealdor , 
 hu þu mære|mæran wesan|seon , mihtig and mægenstrang , 
 eall|eal kyning kyning , crist lifian|libban , 
 eall|eal weorold scippend , wealdend engel , 
 eall|eal dugeþa duguð , drihten hælend . 
 þu wesan|seon se æðele þu|þe|se on|an ærdagum 
 eall|eal femnena wyn fæger akende 
 on|an bethleem se burh|burg beorn toh|to frofor , 
 eall|eal toh|to are|ar yld bearn , 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se gelyfan|gelifan on|an lyfiendne god 
 and on|an þæt|se ece sunnan|leoht uppe on|an roderum . 
 ðyn mægen|magan ys swa mære|mæran , mihtig drihten , 
 swa þæt|se ænig nesan|neh|ne witan eorðbuende 
 þu|þa|se deopnes drihten miht|meaht , 
 nesan|neh|ne þæt|se ænig nesan|neh|ne witan engel had 
 þu|þa|se heahnisse heofena kyning . 
 ic þu|þe|se andettan , ælmihtig god , 
 þæt|se ic gelyfan on|an þu|þe|se , libban|leof hælend , 
 þæt|se þu wesan|seon se miccla and se mægenstranga 
 and se eadmoda eall|eal god 
 and se ece kyning eall|eal gesceafta , 
 and ic wesan|seon|eoh se litla for|faran þu|þe|se and se lyðra munan|mann|man , 
 se heran|her syngian swiðe|swiðan genehhe , 
 dæg and niht don , swa ic nesan|neh|ne sculan , 
 hwil mid weorc , hwil mid word , 
 hwil mid geþenсan|geþencan , þearle scyldi , 
 inwitniðas oft and gelome|gelom . 
 acan|ac ic þu|þe|se halsian nu , heofena drihten , 
 and gebiddan me|ic toh|to þu|þe|se , bearn selost , 
 þæt|se þu gemilsige me|ic , mihtig drihten , 
 heofena heahkyning and se halig|halgian|halga|haleg gast , 
 and gefylste me|ic , fæder ælmihtig , 
 þæt|se ic þinne|þin willan|willa gewyrcean mæge|mæg|magan , 
 ær ic of þes lænan lyfe gehweorfan . 
 nesan|neh|ne forweorn þu me|ic , wuldor drihten , 
 acan|ac getyþa me|ic , tyreadig kyning , 
 lætan|læt|lædan me|ic mid engel up siðian , 
 sittan on|an swegl|swegel , 
 herian heofon god halig rædan|reord 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a butan ende . amen . 
 
 þus frod fæder freobearn læran , 
 modsnottor mann|man , mæg|mecgan|magian|maga cyst eald , 
 word wisfæstum , þæt|se he wel þeon : 
 " don wifcynn|hosp|flet|a se dugan , dugan|deag þu|þin gewyrhtu ; 
 god þu|þe|se beon simble god gehwilc 
 frea and fultuman|fultum , feond þæm|þam|se oþrum|oþer|oðer 
 wyrsa gewyrhta . wennan|wenan|wen þec þywan|þy|þe|se betran , 
 efn ellen þes wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þenden þu lifge . 
 fæder and modor freoh|freogan|freo þu mid heorte , 
 mæg|mecgan|magian|maga gehwylcne , gif him|hi|he su meotud on|an lufu|lufe . 
 wesan þu þin yldrum arfæst simble , 
 fægerwyrde , and þu|þe|se in ferðe lætan|læt|lædan 
 þin lareow leof in mod , 
 þu|þa|se þec geornian toh|to god trymman . " 
 fæder eft hit|his|he sunu frod gegretan 
 oþer|oðer siþ : " healdan|heald ellen þes ! 
 nesan|neh|ne fremman|freme firen , nesan|neh|ne næfre freond þin , 
 mæge|mæg|magan munan|mann|man nesan|neh|ne geþafa , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan þec meotud oncunne , 
 þæt|se þu su womm gewita . he þu|þe|se mid wite|witan gieldeð , 
 swilce þæm|þam|se oþrum|oþer|oðer mid eadwelan . " 
 þridda syþe þoncsnottor guma 
 breostgehygdum hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn læran : 
 " nesan|neh|ne gewunian|gewuna wyrsa , wid feorh , 
 ængum eahtian|eahta , acan|ac þu þu|þe|se an geniman 
 toh|to gesprecan simble spellian|spell|spel and lar 
 rædhycgende . su ymb romana swa hit mæge|mæg|magan . " 
 feorþa siþ fæder eft læran 
 modleofne magan|maga , þæt|se he gemunan þes : 
 " nesan|neh|ne aswic sundorwine , acan|ac wifcynn|hosp|flet|a simble gehealdan 
 ryhtum gerisnum . ræfn ellen þes , 
 þæt|se þu næfre fæcne weorðe freond þin . " 
 fiftan siþ fæder eft ongon 
 breostgeþoncum hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn læran : 
 " druncen|drincan beorgan|beorg þu|þe|se and dollic word , 
 munan|mann|man on|an mod and in muþ lyge , 
 yrre|irre and æfest and ides lufu|lufe . 
 forðam sculan æwiscmod oft siþian , 
 se þu|þe|se gewiteð in wif lufu|lufe , 
 fremde meowle . þær bið wifcynn|hosp|flet|a firenian|firen wenan|wen , 
 laðlicre scome , long nið wiþ|wið god , 
 geotan gielpan|gielp . wesan þu wifcynn|hosp|flet|a gieddian|giedd wis , 
 wær wiþ|wið willan|willa , word hyrdan|hyran|hirde . " 
 siextan siþ swæs eft ongon 
 þurh bliðne þenсean|þenсan|þencan|geþenсan|geþencan hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn læran : 
 " ongietan georne|geornan|georn hwæt#2 su god oþþe|oððe yfel , 
 and tosceadan simble scearpe mod 
 in sefa þin and þu|þe|se wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þæt|se sellan geceos . 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a þu|þe|se bið gedælan|dælan ; gif þu|þe|se dugan|deah hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , 
 wunað wisdom in , and þu witan geare|gear 
 ondgit yfel , healdan|heald þu|þe|se ellen wiþ|wið , 
 feormian|feorm þu simble in þin ferðe god . " 
 seofeþan siþ hit|his|he sunu læran 
 fæder , frod guma , sægan|seсgan|secgan fela geonga|geong : 
 " seldan snottor guma sorgleas blissað , 
 swilce dol seldon drymeð sorgful 
 ymb hit|his|he forðgesceaft , nefne he fæhþu wite|witan . 
 wærwyrde sculan wisfæst hæle|hælan|helan 
 breost hycgan , nales breahtm hlud . " 
 eahtoþan siþ eald fæder ongon 
 hit|his|he mago monian milde word : 
 " leornian lar lærgedefe , 
 wennan|wenan|wen þec in wisdom , weoruda scyppend 
 hafian|habban þu|þe|se toh|to hyht , halig gemynd , 
 and wifcynn|hosp|flet|a soð toh|to syge , þonne|se þu secg hwæt#2 . " 
 nigeþan siþ nægde se gomola , 
 eald uðwita sægan|seсgan|secgan eafora worn : 
 " nesan nu fela folc se fyrngewritu 
 healdan|heald willan , acan|ac him|hi|he hyсgan|hyg|hycgan brosnað , 
 ellen colað , idlað þeodscype ; 
 nesan|neh|ne habbað wiht for|faran þæt|se , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hi|heo wom|woh don 
 ofer meotudes bibod . manig sculan ongieldan 
 sawelsusles . acan|ac lætan|læt|lædan þinne|þin sefa healdan|heald 
 forþ|forð fyrngewritu and frea dom , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se heran|her on|an mægþ gehwære mann forlætan 
 swiðe asigan , þonne|se him|hi|he su self ryht . " 
 teoða siþ tornsorgna ful , 
 eald eft ongon eafora læran : 
 " snyttra brucan þu|þe|se for|faran sawol|sawel lufu|lufe 
 warnað him|hi|he womm word and dæd 
 on|an sefa simble and soþ fremeð ; 
 bið him|hi|he geofon gehwylc god geyced , 
 meahtum spedig , þonne|se he mann|man flyhð . 
 yrre|irre nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þu|þe|se æfre gewealdan , 
 heah in hreþer , heoroworda grund 
 wylme bismitan , acan|ac him|hi|he warnað þæt|se 
 on|an geheortum hyсgan|hyg|hycgan . hæle|hælan|helan sculan wisfæst 
 and gemetlice , mod snottor , 
 gleaw in gehygd , geornan|georn wisdom , 
 swa he wiþ|wið æled mæg|magan ead hleotan . 
 nesan|neh|ne beon|beo þu no toh|to tælan , nesan|neh|ne toh|to tweospræce , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|se on|an mod lætan|læt|lædan mann toh|to fracoþe , 
 acan|ac beon|beo leofwende , sunnan|leoht on|an gehygd 
 beran|ber breostcofan . swa þu , min|ic birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , gemunan 
 frod fæder lar and þec wifcynn|hosp|flet|a wiþ|wið firen gehealdan . " 
 
 hyrdan|hyran|hirde he georne|geornan|georn : 
 " huru welande . . . worc nesan|neh|ne geswiceð 
 mann ænigum se þu|þe|ðe mimming сinan|cunnan 
 heard gehealdan . oft æt|etan hild gedreas 
 swatfag and sweordwund secg æfter oðer . 
 ætlan ordwyga , nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan þin ellen nu gy . . . 
 gedreosan toh|to dæge|dæg , dryhtscipe 
 wesan|seon|is se dæg cuman 
 þæt|se þu sculan aninga oðer twega , 
 lif forleosan oððe fiftig . . . . . .gne don|dom 
 aginnan|agan mid eldum , ælfheres sunu . 
 nalles ic þu|þe|ðe , wine|win min|ic , word cide , 
 se ic þu|þe|ðe geseon|gesawan æt|etan ðam|se sweordplegan 
 þurh|ðurh edwitscype ænig monnes 
 wigan|wig forbugan oððe on|an wealh fleon , 
 lice beorgan , þeah þu|þe|se laðra fela 
 ðinne byrnhomon bil heowun , 
 acan|ac þu simble furðor feohtan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 mælan|mæl ofer mearc ; se ic þu|þe|ðe metod ondrædan , 
 þæt|se þu toh|to fyrenlice feohtan sœ̄сan|seсan|secan 
 æt|etan ðam|se ætsteall oðres monnes , 
 wigrædenne . weorða þu|þe|ðe selfne 
 god dæd , ðenden þin god recce . 
 nesan|neh|ne murnan þu for|faran se mece ; þu|þe|ðe wearð maðma cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan 
 gifeðe toh|to geoc , mid se þu guðhere sculan 
 beatan forbigan , se þu|þe|ðe he þes|se beaduwe onginnan 
 . . .d unriht ærest|ær sec . 
 forsacan he ðam|se sweord and ðam|se syncfatum , 
 beah|beagian|beag mænigo , nu sculan began leas 
 hworfan from|fram ðisse hild , hlafurd sec 
 eald eðel oððe heran|her ær swefan , 
 gif he þe|þa|ða|se " 
 
 gefrignan ic hebreos eadig lifgean 
 in hierusalem , goldhord dælan , 
 cyningdom habban , swa him|hi|he gecynde|gecynd wesan|seon|beon , 
 siððan þurh metod mægen|magan on|an moyses hand 
 wearð wigan|wig gifen , wiga mænieo , 
 and hi|heo of egyptum ut afaran , 
 mægene micel . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon modig cyn ! 
 þenden hi|heo þywan|þy|þe|se romana ræde|rædan motan , 
 burh|burg wealdan , wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he beorht wela . 
 þenden þæt|se folc mid him|hi|he hira|hi fæder wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 healdan|heald willan , wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he hyrdan|hyran|hirde god , 
 heofonrices weard , halig drihten , 
 wuldor waldend . se ðam|se werude gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf 
 mod and miht|meaht|magan , metod alwihta , 
 þæt|se hi|heo oft fela folc feorh gesceodon , 
 here helma|helm , þær|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he hold nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon , 
 oðþæt hi|heo wlenco anwadan æt|etan winþege 
 deofoldædum , druncen geðohtas . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo æcræftas an forlætan , 
 metod mægenscipe , swa no munan|mann|man sculan 
 hit|his|he gast lufu|lufe wiþ|wið god dælan . 
 þu|þa|se geseon ic þu|þa|se gedriht in gedwola|gedwol hweorfan , 
 israhela cyn unriht don , 
 womm wyrcean . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon weorc god ! 
 oft he þæm|þam|se leode|leoda|leod toh|to lar sendan , 
 heofonrices weard , halig gast , 
 þu|þa|se þæm|þam|se werude wisdom buan|beodan . 
 hi|heo þære|se snytro soð gelyfan|gelifan 
 lytel hwil , oðþæt hi|heo langung beswican 
 eorþ|eorðe dream ece ræde|ræd , 
 þæt|se hi|heo æt|etan siðestan self forlætan 
 drihten dom , сeosan|ceosan deofol cræftan|cræft . 
 þu|þa|se wearð reðemod rices ðeoden , 
 unhold þeod þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se æht gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf . 
 wisde him|hi|he æt|etan frymþ , þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe on|an fruma ær se 
 wesan|seon|beon mancynn metod dyrust , 
 dugoða dyrust , drihten leofost ; 
 herepað tæсan|tæcan toh|to þære|se hean|heah burh|burg , 
 eorlum elðeodigum , on|an eðelland 
 þær salem standan searu afæstnod , 
 weall geweorðod . toh|to se wittig faran , 
 caldea cyn , toh|to ceaster forþ|forð , 
 þær israela æht wesan|seon|beon , 
 bewrigene mid weorc ; toh|to þæm|þam|se þæt|se werod gefaran , 
 mægenþreat mære|mæran , manbealwes geornan|georn . 
 awehte se wælnið wer aldorfrea , 
 babilones breogo|brego , on|an hit|his|he burhstede , 
 nabochodonossor , þurh niðhete , 
 þæt|se he sec onginnan sefa gehygd 
 hu he israelum eaðost magan 
 þurh gromra gangan|gang guma oðþringan . 
 gesamnian þu|þa|se suðan and norþan 
 wælhreow werod , and westan|west|wesan foran 
 herian|here hæðencyninga toh|to þære|se hean|heah burh|burg . 
 israela eðelweardas 
 habban lufu|lufe , lifwelan , þenden hi|heo lætan|lettan metod . 
 þu|þa|se ic eðan gefrignan ealdfeonda cyn 
 winburh wer . þu|þa|se wigan|wiga nesan|neh|ne gelyfan|gelifan , 
 bereafian þu|þa|se receda wuldor|seolh|bearm reada|read gold , 
 sincan|sinc and seolfor , salomones templ . 
 gestrudan gestreona under stanhliðum , 
 swilc eall|eal swa þu|þa|se eorl aginnan|agan sculan , 
 oðþæt hi|heo burh|burg gehwone abrecan habban , 
 þær|se þu|þe|se þæm|þam|se folc toh|to friðe standan . 
 gehlodon him|hi|he toh|to huðe hordwearda gestreon , 
 feoh and frætwa , swilc þær findan wesan|seon|beon , 
 and þu|þa|se mid þæm|þam|se æht eft siðedon , 
 and gelædan eacan|eac on|an lang sið 
 israela cyn , on|an eastwegas 
 toh|to babilonia , beorn unrim , 
 under hand hæleð hæðenum deman|dema . 
 nabochodonossor him|hi|he on|an nyd dydan|don 
 israela birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn ofer ealle|eall|eal lufen , 
 wæpnian|wæpn|wæpen laf toh|to weorcþeowum . 
 onsendan þu|þa|se sin þegnian|þegn|þegen 
 worn se werudes westan|west|wesan toferan , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he þær|se leode|leoda|leod land|finna gehealdan , 
 eðne eðel , æfter ebreum . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se sec sinnan|sin gerefa 
 geond israela earm laf , 
 hwilc þære|se geogoðe gleawost wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 bocian|boc bebodes , þu|þe|se þær bringan wesan|seon|beon . 
 willan þæt|se þu|þa|se cniht cræftan|cræft leornedon , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he snytro on|an sefa secgan miht|meaht|magan , 
 nales se þu|þe|se he þæt|se motan oððe gemunan willan 
 þæt|se he þær|se gifena god þancian 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he þær toh|to duguðe drihten scyrede . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo þær findan þri freagleawe 
 æðele cniht and æfæst , 
 ginge and god in godsæde ; 
 on|an wesan|seon|beon annanias , oðer azarias , 
 þridda misael , metod gecorene . 
 þu|þa|se þri cuman toh|to þeodne foran , 
 heard and higeþancle , þær se hæðena sæt|sittan , 
 cyning corðres geornan|georn , in caldea burh|burg . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo þæm|þam|se wlanc wisdom sculan , 
 wer ebrea , word cyþan , 
 higecræft hean|heah , þurh halig mod , 
 þu|þa|se se beornan|beorn|beirnan bebeodan , babilone weard , 
 swiðmod cyning , sin þegn|þegen , 
 þæt|se þu|þa|se frumgaras be feorh dæd , 
 þæt|se þæm|þam|se genga þri gad nesan|neh|ne wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 witan|wist nesan|neh|ne wæd in woruldlife . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon breme babilone weard , 
 mære|mæran and modig ofer middangeard , 
 egesful yld bearn . no he æ fremman|fremede , 
 acan|ac in oferhygde æghwæs libban . 
 þu|þa|se þæm|þam|se folctogan on|an frumslæpe , 
 siððan toh|to restan gehweorfan romana þeon|þeodan , 
 cuman on|an sefa hwurfan swefn woma|wom , 
 hu weorold wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon wundor teon|geteon , 
 ungelic yld oþ|oð edsceafte . 
 wearð him|hi|he on|an slæpan|slæp soð gecyðed , 
 se rices gehwæs reðe sculan gelimpan , 
 eorþ|eorðe dream , ende wurðan . 
 þu|þa|se onwæcnan|onwacan wulfheort , se ær wingal swefan , 
 babilone weard . næs|nesan him|hi|he bliðe hige , 
 acan|ac him|hi|he sorh astigan , swefn woma|wom . 
 no he gemunan þæt|se him|hi|he metan wesan|seon|beon . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se tosamne sin leode|leoda|leod 
 þu|þa|se wiccungdom widost beran , 
 frægn|frignan|fregnan þu|þa|se þe|þa|ða|se mænigeo hwæt#2 he gemætan , 
 þenden reordberend restan wunian . 
 wearð he on|an þæm|þam|se egesa acol worden , 
 þu|þa|se he nesan|neh|ne witan word nesan|neh|ne angin 
 swefn sin ; hettan|het|hedan|hatan him|hi|he secgan þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah . 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he unbliðe andswaredon 
 deofolwitgan ( næs|nesan him|hi|he don|dom gearu 
 toh|to asecganne swefan cyninge|cyning ) : 
 " hu magan we swa dygle , drihten , ahicgan 
 on|an sefa þinne|þin , hu þu|þe|ðe swefnede , 
 oððe wyrd gesceaft wisdom buan|beodan , 
 gif þu hit|his|he ærest|ær nesan|neh|ne magan or areccan gewinnan|geblandan " 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he unbliðe andswarian 
 wulfheort cyning , wittig sin : 
 " nesan ge swa eacen ofer ealle|eall|eal mann 
 modgeþances swa ge me|ic sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 and þæt|se gecweþan , þæt|se ge cuðon 
 min aldorlege , swa me|ic æfter wearð , 
 oððe ic furðor findan sculan . 
 nu ge mætinge min nesan|neh|ne cunnan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se me|ic for|faran werod|weorod wisdom berað . 
 ge sweltað deaðe , nymþe ic don|dom wite|witan 
 soð swefn , se min|ic sefa myndgað . " 
 nesan|neh|ne magan þu|þa|se seon|seo|se mænigeo on|an þæm|þam|se meðelstede 
 þurh witigdom wiht aþencean 
 nesan|neh|ne ahicgan , þu|þa|se hit forhabban gewearð 
 se hi|heo secgan swefn cyninge|cyning , 
 wyrd gerynu|geryne , oðþæt wittig cuman , 
 daniel toh|to dom , se wesan|seon|beon drihten сeosan|geсeosan|gecoren|geceosan|ceosan , 
 snotor and soþfæst , in þæt|se seld gangan . 
 se wesan|seon|beon ordfruma earm laf 
 þære|se þu|þe|se þæm|þam|se hæðena|hæðen hyran sculan . 
 him|hi|he god sellan gifu|gifan of heofnum 
 þurh hleoðorcwyde halig gast , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he engel god eall|eal aseсgan|asecgan 
 swa hit|his|he mandrihten mætan|gemætan wearð . 
 þe|þa|ða|se gan|eadan daniel , þu|þa|se dæg lyhte , 
 swefan reccan sin frea , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan him|hi|he wislice wereda gesceafte , 
 se sona ongitan|ongietan swiðmod cyning 
 ord and ende se þu|þe|se him|hi|he ywed wesan|seon|beon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se habban daniel don|dom micelne|micel , 
 blæd in babilonia mid bocere , 
 siððan he gesæde swefan cyninge|cyning , 
 þæt|se he ær for|faran fyren onfon nesan|neh|ne magan , 
 babilonie weard , in hit|his|he breostlocan . 
 no hwæðere þæt|se daniel gedon|gedo|don miht|meaht|magan 
 þæt|se he willan metod miht|meaht|magan gelyfan , 
 acan|ac he wyrcan onginnan weoh on|an feld 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se deormode diran hatan , 
 se wesan|seon|beon on|an se ðeode þu|þe|ðe swa hatan , 
 bresne babilonige . þære|se burh|burg|beorgan weard 
 an manlican ofer metod est , 
 gyldan of gold , guma aræran , 
 for|faran þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se gleaw nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon , gumrices weard , 
 reðe and rædleas , rihtan|riht . . . . . . 
 þu|þa|se wearð hæleða hlystan þu|þa|se hleoðor cuman 
 byme stefn ofer burhware . 
 þu|þa|se hi|heo for|faran þæm|þam|se cumble on|an cneow|cneo sittan , 
 onhnigon toh|to þæm|þam|se herian|here hæðne þeon|þeodan|þeod , 
 wurðedon wihgyld , nesan|neh|ne witan wræstran rædan|ræd , 
 efnan unrihtdom , swa hyra|hyr|hira|hi aldor dydan|don , 
 mane mengan|gemengan , mod frecnian . 
 fremde folcmægen , swa hyra|hyr|hira|hi frea ærest|ær , 
 unræd efnan , ( him|hi|he se æfter becuman 
 yfel endelean ) , unriht dydan|don . 
 þær þri wesan|seon|beon on|an se þeodnes burh|burg , 
 eorl israela , þæt|se hi|heo wifcynn|hosp|flet|a nyllan|nillan 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi þeodnes don|dom þafigan onginnan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo toh|to þæm|þam|se beacn|beacen gebed ræran , 
 þeah þu|þe|ðe þær on|an herian|here byme singan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon æðele god abrahames birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 wesan|seon|beon wærfæste , witan drihten 
 eсe uppe , ælmihtig . 
 cniht cynegode cuð gedon , 
 þæt|se hi|heo him|hi|he þæt|se gold toh|to god nyllan|nillan 
 habban nesan|neh|ne healdan|heald , acan|ac se hean|heah cyning , 
 gast hyrdan|hyran|hirde , þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he gifu|gifan sellan . 
 oft hi|heo toh|to bot bald gecweþan 
 þæt|se hi|heo se wig wiht nesan|neh|ne reссan|reccan|recan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo toh|to þæm|þam|se gebed miht|meaht|magan gebiddan 
 hæðen here wisian|wis , þæt|se hi|heo þider hweorfan willan , 
 guma toh|to þæm|þam|se gylden gyldan , þu|þe|se he him|hi|he toh|to god geteon . 
 þegn|þegen þeodne sægan|seсgan|secgan þæt|se hi|heo þære|se geþeaht wesan|seon|beon , 
 hæftas hearan , in þes hean|heah burh|burg , 
 þu|þa|se þes hegan nesan|neh|ne willað , nesan|neh|ne þes wigan|wig wurðigean , 
 þu|þe|se þu þu|þe|se toh|to wuldor wundor teon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se him|hi|he bolgenmod babilone weard 
 yrre|irre andswarian , eorlum onmælde 
 grimman|grimm|grim þæm|þam|se gingum , and geocre oncwæð , 
 þæt|se hi|heo gegnunga gyldan sculan 
 oððe þrowigean þreanied micel , 
 frecne|frecen|frec fyr wylm , nymðe hi|heo friðes willan 
 wilnian toh|to þæm|þam|se wyrrestan , wer ebrea , 
 guma toh|to þæm|þam|se gold , þu|þe|se he him|hi|he toh|to god teon . 
 nyllan|nillan þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þa|se hyssas hyran lar 
 in hige hæðnum . hogedon georne|geornan|georn 
 þæt|se æ god ealle|eall|eal gelæstan , 
 and nesan|neh|ne awacodon wereda drihten , 
 nesan|neh|ne þan|se mæ gehweorfan in hæðendom , 
 nesan|neh|ne hi|heo toh|to facn|facen freoðo wilnedan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se him|hi|he se biter deað gebeodan|beodan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 þu|þa|se wearð yrre|irre anmod cyning , hettan|het|hedan|hatan he ofn onhætan 
 toh|to cwalu cniht feorh forðam þu|þe|se hi|heo hit|his|he cræft onsocon . 
 þu|þa|se he wesan|seon|beon gegleded , swa he grimmost miht|meaht|magan , 
 frecne|frecen|frec fyr liсgan|leon , þu|þa|se he þider folc samnian , 
 and gebindan hettan|het|hedan|hatan , babilone weard , 
 grim and gealhmod , god spelbodan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se hit|his|he scealcas scufan þu|þa|se hyssas 
 in bælblyse , beorn geong|gangan . 
 gearu|gearo wesan|seon|beon se him|hi|he geoc gefremian ; þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se hi|heo swa grome nidan 
 in fæðm fyr liсgan|leon , hwæðere hira|hi|heore feorh generian 
 mihtig metod weard . swa þæt|se mænige gefrunon , 
 halig him|hi|he þær helpan geteon , sendan him|hi|he of hean|heah rodor 
 god , guma weard , gast se halig|halga|haleg . 
 engel in se ofn innan becuman þær hi|heo þæt|se aglac dreogan , 
 freobearn fæðmum beþeссan|beþeccan under þæm|þam|se fyren hrofe . 
 nesan|neh|ne miht|meaht|magan þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah hira|hi|heore wlite|wlitan gewemman owiht 
 wylm se wæfran liges , þu|þa|se hi|heo se waldend nerian . 
 hreohmod wesan|seon|beon se hæðena þeon|þeodan , hettan|het|hedan|hatan hi|heo hraðe bærnan . 
 æled|ælan wesan|seon|beon ungescead micel . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon se ofen onhæted , 
 isen eall|eal ðurhgleded . he þær esnas mænige 
 weorpan wudu on|an innan , swa him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon on|an word deman ; 
 beran brand on|an bryne blæc|blac fyr , 
 ( willan wulfheort cyning wall onsteallan , 
 isern ymb æfæst ) , oðþæt up gewitan 
 lig ofer leof and þurh lust geslean 
 micel micel|mare|mara þonne|se gemetan|gemet wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se lig gewindan on|an laðe mann , 
 hæðne of halig|halga|haleg . hyssas wesan|seon|beon 
 bliðemode , birnan|biernan|beornan scealcas 
 ymb ofn utan , alet gehweorfan 
 teonfullum on|an teso . þær toh|to geseon 
 babilone breogo|brego . bliðe wesan|seon|beon 
 eorl ebrea , ofestum herian|heredon 
 drihten on|an dream , don swa hi|heo cuðon 
 ofn on|an innan , ald generian . 
 guma glædmode god wurðedon , 
 under se fæðme þu|þe|se geflymed wearð 
 frecne|frecen|frec fyr hæto . freobearn wurdon|weorþan 
 alæten liges gangan|gang , nesan|neh|ne hi|heo him|hi|he þær lað gedon . 
 næs|nesan him|hi|he se swegan|sweg toh|to sorh|sorg se micel þu|þe|se sunne|sunnan|sunna scima , 
 nesan|neh|ne se bryne beatan mæcgum þu|þe|se in þæm|þam|se beatan wesan|seon|beon , 
 acan|ac þæt|se fyr fyr scyan toh|to ðam|se þu|þe|se þe|þa|ða|se scylde wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 hwerfan|hweorfan on|an þu|þa|se hæðena|hæðen hæftas fram þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg cnihton , 
 werig wlite|wlitan minsian , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe se worce gefeon . 
 geseon þe|þa|ða|se swiðmod cyning , þe|þa|ða|se he hit|his|he sefa ontreowde , 
 wundor on|an wite|witan agangan ; him|hi|he þæt|se wræclic þynсan|þyncan . 
 hyssas hal hweorfan in þæm|þam|se hatan|hat ofn , 
 ealle|eall|eal æfæst þri ; him|hi|he eacan|eac þær wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an on|an gesiht , engel ælmihtig . 
 him|hi|he þær on|an ofn owiht nesan|neh|ne derian , 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|beon þær inne eall|eal gelicost 
 efne|efnan|efen þonne|se on|an sumer sunne|sinnan scineð , 
 and deaw dryge|drygan on|an dæge|dæg weorðeð , 
 windan|wind geondseon|geondsawan . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon wuldor god 
 þu|þe|se hi|heo generian wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se niðhete . 
 þe|þa|ða|se azarias ingeþanc 
 hleoðrade halig þurh hat lig , 
 dreogan dæd geornan|georn , drihten herian , 
 wer womm leas , and þu|þa|se word acwæð : 
 " metod alwihta , hwæt#2 ! þu wesan|seon miht swiðan 
 niðas toh|to nergenne . wesan|seon|is þu|þin nama mære|mæran , 
 wlitig and wuldorfæst ofer werðeode . 
 siendon þin dom in dæg|dah|dagian|dag gehwa 
 soð and geswiðde and gesigefæste , 
 swa þu eacan|eac self wesan|seon . 
 syndon þin willan|willa on|an woruldspedum 
 rihte|rihtan|riht and gerum , rodor waldend . 
 geoc user georne|geornan|georn nu , gast scyppend , 
 and þurh hyldo helpan , halig drihten , 
 nu we þec for|faran þreaum and for|faran ðeonydum 
 and for|faran eaðmedum arna biddað , 
 liсgan|leon beleсgan|belecgan . we se lifgende 
 wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan on|an weorold , eacan|eac se wom|woh dydan|don 
 user yldran ; for|faran oferhygdum 
 brecan bebodo burhsittende , 
 had oferhogedon halig|halga|haleg lifes|lif . 
 siendon we towrecene geond wid grund , 
 heap tohworfene , hyldelease ; 
 wesan|seon|is user lif geond land|finna fela 
 fracoð and gefræge folc manig , 
 þu|þa|se usic bewrecan toh|to se wyrrestan 
 eorðcyninga æht geweald , 
 on|an hæftan heorugrimra , and we nu hæðen 
 þeowned þoliað . se þu|þe|se þanc wesan|seon|nesan , 
 wereda wuldorcyning , þæt|se þu we|us þes wracu teon . 
 nesan|neh|ne forlætan þu usic an , ece drihten , 
 for|faran ðam|se milts þu|þe|ðe ðec mann hligað , 
 and for|faran ðam|se treowe|treow þu|þe|se þu , tirum fæstan|fæst , 
 niða nergend , niman|geniman habban 
 toh|to abrahame and toh|to isaace 
 and toh|to iacobe , gast scyppend . 
 þu him|hi|he þæt|se gehatan þurh hleoðorcwyde , 
 þæt|se þu hyra|hyr|hira|hi frumcyn in fyrndagum 
 ican willan , se æfter him|hi|he 
 on|an cneoris cennan weorþan , 
 and seon|seo|se mænigeo mære|mæran wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 had toh|to hebbanne swa heofonsteorran 
 bebugað brad hwyrft , oððe brimfaroþes , 
 sæfaroða sand , geond sealten|sealt wegan 
 in eare|ear gryndeð , þæt|se hit|his|he unrim wifcynn|hosp|flet|a 
 in wintra|winter worn wurðan sculan . 
 fyllan|fylan nu frumspræce , þeah hira|hi|heore fea lifian ! 
 wlitig þinne|þin wordcwyde and þu|þin wuldor|seolh|bearm on|an we|us ! 
 gecyð cræftan|cræft and miht þæt|se þu|þa|se caldeas 
 and folc fela friсgan habbað , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|se under heofenum hæðen lifigeað , 
 and þæt|se þu ana|an wesan|seon ece drihten , 
 werod waldend , woruldgesceafta , 
 sigorian|sigor settend , soþfæst metod ! " 
 swa se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer hergende wesan|seon|beon 
 metod milts and hit|his|he miht|meaht spedan|sped 
 reссan|reht|reccan þurh rædan|reord . þe|þa|ða|se of roderum wesan|seon|beon 
 engel ælbeorht ufan onsendan , 
 wlitescyne wer on|an hit|his|he wuldorhama , 
 se him|hi|he cuman toh|to frofor and toh|to feorhnere 
 mid lufu|lufe and mid lisse . se se lig tosceaf , 
 halig and heofonbeorht , hatan|hat fyr , 
 tosweop he and toswende þurh þu|þa|se swiðan miht , 
 ligges leoma , þæt|se hyra|hyr|hira|hi lice nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 owiht eglan , acan|ac he on|an anda slean 
 fyr on|an feond for|faran fyrendædum . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon on|an þæm|þam|se ofn , þær se engel becuman , 
 windig and wynsum , wedere gelicost 
 þonne|se hit on|an sumer tidan|tid sendan weorðeð 
 dropa drearung on|an dæg hwil , 
 wearmlic wolcn|wolcen scur . swylc bið wedera cyþan|cystan|cyst|cyssan , 
 swylc wesan|seon|beon on|an þæm|þam|se fyr frea miht 
 halig|halga|haleg toh|to helpan . wearð se hatian|hat lig 
 todrifan and todwæsced þær þu|þa|se dædhwatan 
 geond se ofen gan|eadan , and se engel mid , 
 feorh nerigende , se þær feorða wesan|seon|beon , 
 annanias and azarias 
 and misael . þær þu|þa|se modhwatan 
 þri on|an geðancum ðeoden herian|heredon , 
 biddan bletsian birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn israela 
 eall|eal landgesceaft eсe drihten , 
 ðeoda waldend . swa hi|heo þri cweþan|cweðan , 
 mod horsc , þurh gemæne word : 
 " þu|þe|ðe gebletsige , bylywit fæder , 
 woruldcræfta wlite|wlitan and weorc gehwilc ! 
 heofon and engel , and hluttor wæter , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe ofer roderum on|an riht gesceaft 
 wuniað in wuldor , þe|þa|ða|se þec wurðiað ! 
 and þec , ælmihtig , ealle|eall|eal gesceafte , 
 rodorbeorhtan tungol , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ryne healdað , 
 sunna and mona , sundor an gehwilc 
 herian|here in had ! and heofonsteorran , 
 deaw and deor scur , þe|þa|ða|se ðec domige ! 
 and þec , mihtig god , gast lofian ! 
 beornan fyr and beorht sumor|sumer 
 nergend hergaþ ! niht|neaht somod and dæg , 
 and þec land|finna gehwilc , sunnan|leoht and þeostro , 
 herian|here on|an had , somod hatan|hat and ceald ! 
 and þec , frea mihtig , forst and snaw , 
 winterbiter weder and wolcenfaru , 
 lofian on|an lyft ! and þec ligetu , 
 blæc|blac , berhtmhwate , þu|þa|se þec bletsian ! 
 eall|eal eorþ|eorðe grund , ece drihten , 
 hyll and hruse and heah beorg , 
 sealtan|sealt sæwægas , soþfæst metod , 
 eastream yða and upcyme , 
 wætersprync wylla , þe|þa|ða|se ðec wurðiað ! 
 hwæl ðec herigað , and hefonfugolas , 
 lyftlacende , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe lagostreamas , 
 wæterscipe wecgað ! and wilde deor 
 and neat gehwilc naman|nama bletsian ! 
 and mannian|mann birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn mod lufiað , 
 and þec israela , æht scyppend , 
 herigað in had , herran sinnan|sin ! 
 and þec halig heorte cræft , 
 soðfæstra gehwæs sawol|sawel and gast , 
 lofiað liffrea , lean sellend|sellan 
 eall|eal eadmodum , ece drihten ! 
 annanias ðec and adzarias 
 and misael metod domige 
 breostgeðancum ! we þec bletsiað , 
 frea folc gehwæs , fæder ælmihtig , 
 soð sunu metod , sawol|sawlian|sawel nergend , 
 hæleða helpend , and þec , halig gast , 
 wurðiað in wuldor , witig drihten ! 
 we ðec herigað , halig drihten , 
 and gebed bremað ! þu gebletsad wesan|seon , 
 gewurðad wideferhð ofer weorold hrof , 
 heahcyning heofon , halig|halga|haleg miht , 
 lifes|lif leohtfruma , ofer land|finna gehwilc ! " 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se ehtode ealdor þeon|þeodan|þeod , 
 nabochodonossor , wiþ|wið þæm|þam|se nehstum 
 folcgesiðum : " þæt|se ge|eower fela geseon , 
 þeon|þeodan|þeod min , þæt|se we þri sendan , 
 gebeodan|beodan toh|to bæle in beornan 
 fyr leoma . nu ic þær feower mann 
 geseon toh|to soð , nales me|ic sefa leogeð . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se cweðan se þu|þe|ðe wesan|seon|beon cyning ræswian|ræswa|ræs , 
 wis and wordgleaw : " þæt|se wesan|seon|is wundrian|wundor|wund sum|su 
 þæt|se we þær eage on|an lociað . 
 geðenc , ðeoden min|ic , þin gerysna ! 
 ongyt georne|geornan|georn hwæt|hwa þu|þa|se gyfe sellan 
 gingum gædelingum ! hi|heo god herigað , 
 an eсe , and eall|eal him|hi|he 
 be naman|nama gehwa on|an neod sprecað , 
 þanciað þrymm þriste word , 
 cweðað he wesan|seon|nesan ana|an ælmihtig god , 
 witig wuldorcyning , worlde and heofon . 
 aban þu þu|þa|se beorn , breogo|brego caldea , 
 ut of ofn . nesan hit owihtes god 
 þæt|se hi|heo wesan|sien|seon|nesan on|an þæm|þam|se laðe lengan|leng|lange þonne|se þu þurfan . " 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se se cyning toh|to him|hi|he cniht gangan . 
 hyssas heard hyrdan|hyran lar , 
 cyrdon cynegode swa hi|heo gecyðde wesan|seon|beon , 
 hweorfan hæleð geong|gangan toh|to þæm|þam|se hæðena|hæðen foran . 
 wesan|seon|beon þu|þa|se bendan forburnene þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an bana|ban liсgan , 
 laðsearo leode|leoda|leod cyning , and hyra|hyr|hira|hi lice beorgan . 
 næs|nesan hyra|hyr|hira|hi wlite|wlitan wemman|gewemman , nesan|neh|ne nænig wroht on|an hrægle , 
 nesan|neh|ne feax fyr beswæled , acan|ac hi|heo on|an friðe drihten 
 of ðam|se grimman|grimm|grim gryre glæd treddedon , 
 gleawmode guma , on|an gast hyld . 
 þe|þa|ða|se gewitan se engel up sec him|hi|he ece dream 
 on|an hean|heah hrof heofon rices , 
 heh þegn and hold halig|halga|haleg metod . 
 habban on|an þæm|þam|se wundor|wund gewurðod þu|þe|ðe þu|þa|se gewyrhto agan . 
 hyssas herian|heredon drihten for|faran þæm|þam|se hæðena|hæðen folc , 
 sepan hi|heo soðcwidum and him|hi|he secgan fela 
 soð tacnian|tacn|tacen , oðþæt he self gelyfan|gelifan 
 þæt|se se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon miht|meaht waldend se þu|þe|ðe hi|heo of ðam|se mirce generian . 
 gebeodan þu|þa|se se bræsna babilone weard 
 swiðmod sin leode|leoda|leod , þæt|se se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he ald scyldig , 
 se se onsoce se soð wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon 
 mære|mæran miht|meaht waldend , se hi|heo of þæm|þam|se morðre alysan . 
 agæf him|hi|he þu|þa|se hit|his|he leode|leoda|leod laf þu|þe|se þær gelædan wesan|seon|beon 
 on|an æht ealdfeondum , þæt|se hi|heo are|ar habban . 
 wesan|seon|beon hira|hi|heore blæd in babilone , siððan hi|heo se bryne fandedon , 
 don|dom wearð æfter duguðe gecyðed , siððan hi|heo drihten gehyrdan|gehyran . 
 wesan|seon|beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi ræd romana , siððan hi|heo rodera waldend , 
 halig heofonrices weard , wiþ|wið se hearm gescylde . 
 þu|þa|se ic sec gefrignan soð word , 
 siððan he wundor ongitan , 
 babilone weard , þurh fyr bryne , 
 hu þu|þa|se hyssas þri hatan|hat ofn , 
 færgryre fyr , oferfaran habban . 
 wylm þurhwadan , swa him|hi|he wiht nesan|neh|ne sceþþan|sceon|sceadan 
 grim gleda nið , god spelbodan , 
 frecne fyr , acan|ac him|hi|he frið drihten 
 wiþ|wið se egesa gryre aldor gescylde . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se ðeoden onginnan geðinges wyrcan ; 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se tosamne sinnan|sin leode|leodan|leod , 
 and þu|þa|se on|an þæm|þam|se meðle ofer menigo bebeodan 
 wyrdan|wyrd gewordene and wundor god , 
 se on|an þæm|þam|se cniht gecyðed wesan|seon|beon : 
 " onhicgað nu halig miht|meaht|magan , 
 wise|wis wundor god ! we geseon 
 þæt|se he wiþ|wið cwealm gebearh cniht on|an ofn , 
 lacan lig , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hit|his|he lof beran ; 
 forðam he wesan|seon|is ana|an ece drihten , 
 dema ælmihtig , se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he don|dom forgifan|forgiefan , 
 spowan spedan|sped , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se hit|his|he spel berað . 
 forðam witigað þurh wundor manig 
 halig|halga|haleg gast þu|þe|se hit|his|he hyld сeosan|ceosan . 
 cuð wesan|seon|is þæt|se me|ic daniel dyglan swefn 
 soð gesæde , þæt|se ær swiðe|swiðan oðstod 
 manig on|an mod min leode|leoda|leod , 
 forðam ælmihtig eacen|eacan gast 
 in sefa sendan , snytro cræft . " 
 swa word sprecan werod ræswian|ræswa|ræs , 
 babilone weard , siððan he beacen ongitan , 
 swutol tacn|tacen|tacan god . no þywan|þy|þe|se sel dydan|don , 
 acan|ac þæm|þam|se æðelinge oferhygd gesceod , 
 wearð him|hi|he hyrra hyсgan|hyg|hycgan and on|an heorte geðanc 
 mara on|an modsefa þonne|se gemetan|gemet wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 oðþæt he mid nyde nyðor asettan 
 metod ælmihtig , swa he manig deð 
 þær|se þu|þe|se þurh oferhyd up astigeð . 
 þu|þa|se him|hi|he wearð on|an slæpan|slæp swefan ætywan , 
 nabochodonossor ; him|hi|he þæt|se neh gewearð . 
 þynсan|þyncan him|hi|he þæt|se on|an folde fæger|fæge standan 
 wudubeam wlitig , se wesan|seon|beon wyrt fæstan|fæst , 
 beorht on|an blæd . næs|nesan he bearwe gelic , 
 acan|ac he hlifian toh|to heofontunglum , 
 swilce he oferfæðmde folde sceat , 
 eall|eal middangeard , oþ|oð merestreamas , 
 twig and telga|telg . þær he toh|to geseon , 
 þynсan|þyncan him|hi|he þæt|se se wudubeam wilddeor scylde , 
 an etan eall|eal healdan , 
 swilce fugol eacan|eac hira|hi|heore feorhnere 
 on|an se beam bled niman . 
 ðuhte him|hi|he þæt|se engel ufan of roderum 
 stigan cuman and stefn abeodan , 
 torht rædan|reord . hettan|het|hedan|hatan þæt|se treow ceorfan 
 and þu|þa|se wilde deor on|an wegan|weg fleon , 
 swilce eacan|eac þu|þa|se fugolas , þonne|se hit|his|he fyllan cuman|come . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þonne|se besnædan seolfes blæd , 
 twig and telga|telg , and þeah tacn|tacen|tacan wese|wesan , 
 wunian wyrttruma|wyrtruma se wudubeames 
 eorþ|eorðe fæst , oðþæt eft cyme 
 grene bled , þonne|se god syll . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan eacan|eac gebindan beam se micel 
 ærenum clammum and isern , 
 and gesæledne in susl don , 
 þæt|se hit|his|he mod wite|witan þæt|se migtigra 
 wite|witan wealdeð þonne|se he him|hi|he wiþ|wið mæge|mæg|magan . 
 þu|þa|se of slæpan|slæp onwæcnan|onwacan , ( swefn wesan|seon|beon æt|etan ende ) , 
 eorðlic æðeling , him|hi|he se egesian|egesa standan , 
 gryre fram ðam|se gast þu|þe|ðe þider god sendan . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se tosamne sinnan|sin leode|leodan|leod , 
 folctogan feran , frægn|frignan|fregnan ofer ealle|eall|eal 
 swiðmod cyning hwæt#2 þæt|se swefan buan|beodan , 
 nalles þywan|þy|þe|se he wendan|wenan þæt|se hi|heo hit witan , 
 acan|ac he cunnian hu hi|heo cweðan willan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon toh|to ðam|se dom daniel hatan , 
 god spelboda . him|hi|he wesan|seon|beon gæstan|gan sellan|gesellan|geseald , 
 halig of heofon , se hit|his|he hyсgan|hyg|hycgan trymman . 
 on|an þæm|þam|se drihtenweard deop witan 
 sefa sid geþanc and snytro cræftan|cræft , 
 wis wordcwide . oft he wundor manig , 
 metod miht|meaht , for|faran mann ætberan . 
 þu|þa|se he secgan onginnan swefn woma , 
 heahheort and hæðen here wisian|wis , 
 eall|eal se egesa þu|þe|se him|hi|he eowan wesan|seon|beon . 
 bædan|biddan he areccan hwæt#2 seon|seo|se run buan|beodan , 
 hofe|hof|hebban halig word and in hige findan 
 toh|to gesecganne soð word 
 hwæt#2 se beam buan|beodan þu|þe|se he blican geseon , 
 and him|hi|he witgode wyrd geþingu . 
 he þe|þa|ða|se swigian , hwæðere soð ongitan|ongietan , 
 daniel æt|etan þæm|þam|se dom , þæt|se hit|his|he drihten wesan|seon|beon , 
 guma aldor , wiþ|wið god scyldig . 
 wandian se wisian|wis , hwæðre he word cweðan , 
 æcræftig ar , toh|to þæm|þam|se æðelinge : 
 " þæt|se wesan|seon|is , weredes weard , wundor unlytel , 
 þæt|se þu geseon|gesawan þurh swefan cuman|cuma , 
 heofonheane beam and þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg word , 
 yrre|irre and egeslicu , þu|þa|se se engel cweðan , 
 þæt|se þæt|se treow sculan , telga|telg besnæded , 
 foran afeallan , þæt|se ær fæstan|fæst standan , 
 and þonne|se mid deore|deor dreamleas beon|beo|bannan , 
 westen|westan wunian , and hit|his|he wyrttruma|wyrtruma 
 folde befeolan , fyrstmearc wese|wesan 
 stille|stillan on|an staðole , swa seon|seo|se stefn cweðan , 
 ymb seofon tid sæd|secgan eft onfon . 
 swa þu|þin blæd lið . swa se beam geweaxan , 
 heah toh|to heofon , swa þu hæleðum wesan|seon 
 ana|an eall|eal eorðbuendum 
 weard and wisian|wis . nesan þu|þe|se wiðerbreca , 
 munan|mann|man on|an molde , nymðe metod ana|an . 
 se ðec aceorfeð of cyningdom , 
 and ðec wineleasne on|an wræc|wrecan sendeð , 
 and þonne|se onhweorfeð heorte þin , 
 þæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne gemyndgast æfter mandreame , 
 nesan|neh|ne gewitt witan butan wildeora þeaw , 
 acan|ac þu lifgende lange|lang þrage 
 heorta hlypum geond holt wunian . 
 nesan|neh|ne bið þec mælmete nymþe mor græs , 
 nesan|neh|ne restan witod , acan|ac þec regnian|regn scur 
 weceð and wreceð swa wilde deor , 
 oðþæt þu ymb seofon winter soð gelyfan , 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|nesan on|an metod eall|eal mann , 
 reccend and romana , se on|an roderum wesan|seon|is . 
 wesan|seon|is me|ic swa þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah willian|willa þæt|se se wyrtruma 
 stille|stillan wesan|seon|beon on|an staðole , swa seon|seo|se stefn cweðan , 
 and ymbe|ymb seofon|seofa tidan|tid sæd|secgan onfon . 
 swa þu|þin romana restan bið , 
 anwalh for|faran eorlum , oðþæt þu eft cuman . 
 gehyсgan|gehycgan þu , frea min|ic , fæstlicne rædan|ræd . 
 syl|sellan ælmyssan , wesan earm hleo , 
 þingian|þing for|faran ðeodne , ær ðam|se seon|seo|se þrah cyme 
 þæt|se he þec aworpe of woruldrice . 
 oft metod alædan manig ðeode 
 wyrcan bot , þonne|se hi|heo willan self , 
 fyren fæstan|fæst , ær him|hi|he fær god 
 þurh egesa gryre ald gescogan . " 
 no se fela daniel toh|to hit|his|he drihten gesprecan 
 soð word þurh snytro cræftan|cræft , 
 þæt|se se wifcynn|hosp|flet|a se rice|ric reccan willan , 
 middangeard weard , acan|ac hit|his|he mod astigan , 
 heah fram heorte ; he se heard ongeald . 
 onginnan þe|þa|ða|se gyddigan þurh gylp micel 
 caldea cyning þu|þa|se he ceastergeweorc , 
 babilone burh , on|an hit|his|he blæd geseon , 
 sennera feld sid bewindan , 
 heah hlifigan ; þæt|se se heretyma 
 werian|weorod gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan þurh wundor micel , 
 wearð þe|þa|ða|se anhydig ofer ealle|eall|eal mann , 
 swiðmod in sefa , for|faran se sundorgife 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he god sellan , guma romana , 
 world toh|to geweald in wer lif : 
 " þu wesan|seon seon|seo|se micel and min|ic seon|seo|se mære|mæran burh 
 þu|þe|se ic gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan toh|to wurðmyndum , 
 rum romana . ic restan on|an þu|þe|se , 
 eard and eðel , aginnan|agan willan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se for|faran ðam|se gylpe guma drihten 
 forfon wearð and on|an fleam gewitan , 
 ana|an on|an oferhyd ofer ealle|eall|eal mann . 
 swa wod|wadan wer on|an gewindagum 
 geocrostne sið in god wite|witan , 
 se þu|þe|se eft lifian leode|leodan|leod begete , 
 nabochodonossor , siððan him|hi|he nið god , 
 hreð of heofon , hettan|hatan gescogan . 
 seofon winter samod susl þrowian , 
 wildeora westen|westan , winburge cyning . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se earfoðmæcg up locian , 
 wilddeor gewita , þurh wolcn|wolcen gangan|gang . 
 gemunan þu|þa|se on|an mod þæt|se metod wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 heofon heahcyning , hæleða bearn 
 ana|an ece gast . þu|þa|se he eft onhweorfan 
 woda|wod gewitt , þær þu|þe|se he ær wid bær|beran 
 herewosan hige , heorte getenge . 
 þu|þa|se hit|his|he gast ahweorfan in god gemynd , 
 mod toh|to mann , siððan he metod ongitan . 
 gewitan þu|þa|se earmsceapen eft siðian , 
 nacod|nacian nydgenga , nið geðafian , 
 wundorlic wræcca and wæda leas , 
 mætra on|an modgeðanc , toh|to mancynn , 
 þonne guma weard in gylpe wesan|seon|beon . 
 standan middangeard æfter mandrihtne , 
 eard and eðel æfter þæm|þam|se æðelinge , 
 seofon winter samod , swa no swiðrode 
 romana under roderum oðþæt se ræswian|ræswa|ræs cuman . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon eft settan|gesettan in aldordom 
 babilone weard , habban betera ðeaw , 
 leohtran geleafa in liffruman , 
 se god sellan guma gehwilcum 
 wela swa wite|witan , swa he willan self . 
 nesan|neh|ne lengan þu|þa|se leode|leoda|leod aldor 
 witegena wordcwyde , acan|ac he wid beodan 
 metod miht|meaht|magan þær he meld agan , 
 siþfæt sægan|seсgan|secgan sin leode|leoda|leod , 
 wid waðe þu|þe|se he mid wilddeor ateon , 
 oðþæt him|hi|he frea god in gast becuman 
 rædfæst sefa , þe|þa|ða|se he toh|to roderum beseon . 
 wyrdan|wyrd wesan|seon|beon weorþan|geweorþan , wundor gecyðed , 
 swefn geseðed , susl awunnen , 
 don|dom deman , swa ær daniel cweðan , 
 þæt|se se folctoga findan sculan 
 earfoðsiðas for|faran hit|his|he ofermedlan . 
 swa he ofstlice godspellian 
 metod miht for|faran mancynn , 
 siððan in babilone burhsittendum 
 lange|lang hwil lar sægan|seсgan|secgan , 
 daniel dom . siððan deore|deor gesið , 
 wilde wærgenga , of waðe cuman , 
 nabochodonossor of niðwracum , 
 siððan weardian wid romana , 
 healdan hæleða gestreon and þu|þa|se hean|heah burh , 
 frod , foremihtig folc ræswian|ræswa|ræs , 
 caldea cyning , oðþæt him|hi|he cwelm gesceod , 
 swa him|hi|he ofer eorþ|eorðe andsaca nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon 
 guma ænig oðþæt him|hi|he god willan 
 þurh hryre hreddan heah romana . 
 siððan þær hit|his|he aferan eadan|ead bryttedon , 
 wela , windan gold , in þære|se wid burh|burg , 
 ealhstede eorl , unwaclice , 
 heah hordmægen , þu|þa|se hyra|hyr|hira|hi hlaford liсgan|licgan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se in se ðeode awacan hit|his|he þæt|se þridde cneow|cneo|cnawan . 
 wesan|seon|beon baldazar burh|burg aldor , 
 wealdan wer rices , oðþæt him|hi|he wlenco gesceod , 
 oferhyd egle|eglan . þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon endedæg 
 se þu|þe|ðe caldeas cyningdom agan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se metod onlah med and persum 
 aldordomes ymb lytel fæc , 
 lætan|lettan babilone blæd swiðrian , 
 se þu|þa|se hæleð healdan|heald sculan . 
 witan|wist he ealdorman in unriht , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe se romana ræde|rædan sculan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæt|se gehogode hamsittende , 
 med aldor , þæt|se ær munan|mann|man nesan|neh|ne onginnan , 
 þæt|se he babilone abrecan willan , 
 alhstede eorl , þær æðelingas 
 under weallian|weall hleo wela brytnedon . 
 þæt|se wesan|seon|beon þær|se fæstnian folc cuðost , 
 micel and mærost þær|se þu|þe|se mann bun , 
 babilon burh|burg , oðþæt baldazar 
 þurh gylp grome god frasade . 
 sittan him|hi|he æt|etan wine|win weallan|weall belucan , 
 nesan|neh|ne onegdon na orlegra nið , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|ðe feond folc feran cuman 
 herega geræde toh|to þære|se heahbyrig 
 þæt|se hi|heo babilone abrecan mihton . 
 gesittan þu|þa|se toh|to simble siðestan dæge|dæg 
 caldea cyning mid cneomagum , 
 þær medugal wearð mægenes wisian|wis . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þæm|þam|se æðele beran|bera israela gestreon , 
 huslfatu haleg , on|an hand wer , 
 þu|þa|se ær caldeas mid cyneðrymme , 
 cempa in ceaster , clæne geniman , 
 gold in gerusalem , þe|þa|ða|se hi|heo iudea 
 blæd forbrecan bil ecgum , 
 and þurh hleoðorcyme , herian|here geniman 
 beorht frætwe . þe|þa|ða|se hi|heo templ|tempel strudan , 
 salomanes seld , swiðe|swiðan gielpan|gelpan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð bliðemod burh|burg aldor , 
 gielpan|gelpan gramlice god on|an anda , 
 cweðan þæt|se hit|his|he here hyrran wesan|seon|beon 
 and mihtigran mann toh|to friðe 
 þonne|se israela ece drihten . 
 him|hi|he þæt|se tacn|tacen|tacan wearð þær he toh|to starude , 
 egeslic for|faran eorlum innan heall , 
 þæt|se he for|faran leode|leoda|leod ligeword cweðan , 
 þu|þa|se þær in egesa engel drihten 
 lætan|lettan hit|his|he hand cuman|cuma in þæt|se heah seld , 
 writan þu|þa|se in wegan|wag word gerynu|geryne , 
 basu bocstæf , burhsittendum . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð folctoga forht on|an mod , 
 acul for|faran þæm|þam|se egesa . geseon he engel hand 
 in sellan|sele|sel writan sennera wite|witan . 
 þæt|se gyddedon guma mænigeo , 
 hæleð in heall , hwæt#2 seon|seo|se hand writan|writ 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se beacn|beacen burhsittendum . 
 werian|weorod cuman on|an þæt|se wundor seon|seo . 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan þu|þa|se swiðe|swiðan in sefa gehydum , 
 hwæt#2 seon|seo|se hand writan|writ halig gast . 
 nesan|neh|ne mihton arædan runcræftige mann 
 engel ærendbec , æðelinga cyn , 
 oðþæt daniel cuman , drihten сeosan|geсeosan|gecoren|geceosan|ceosan , 
 snotor and soþfæst , in þæt|se seld gangan . 
 ðam|se wesan|seon|beon on|an gast god cræftan|cræft micel , 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se ic georne|geornan|georn gefrignan gyfum ceapian 
 burhge weard þæt|se he him|hi|he bocstæf 
 arædan and arecan , hwæt#2 seon|seo|se run buan|beodan . 
 him|hi|he æcræftig andswarian , 
 god spelboda , gleaw geðances : 
 " no ic wiþ|wið feohsceattum ofer folc bere|beran|ber 
 drihten dom , nesan|neh|ne þu|þe|ðe dugeðe сinan|cunnan , 
 acan|ac þu|þe|se unceapunga orlæg secg , 
 word gerynu|geryne , þu|þa|se þu wendan nesan|neh|ne miht . 
 þu for|faran anmedlan in æht bere|beran|ber 
 huslfatu haleg , on|an hand wer . 
 on|an þæm|þam|se ge deofol drincan onginnan , 
 þe|þa|ða|se ær israela in æ habban 
 æt|etan god earce , oðþæt hi|heo gylp beswican , 
 windruncen gewitan , swa þu|þe|se wurðan sculan . 
 no þæt|se þu|þin aldor æfre willan 
 god goldfatu in gylp beran|bera , 
 nesan|neh|ne se hraðor hreman , þeah þu|þe|ðe herian|here|heran bringan|brengan 
 israela gestreon in hit|his|he æht geweald , 
 acan|ac þæt|se oft cweðan aldor ðeoda 
 soð word ofer sinnan|sin mægen|magan , 
 siððan him|hi|he wuldor weard wundor gecyðde , 
 þæt|se he wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ana|an eall|eal gesceafta 
 drihten and waldend , se him|hi|he don|dom forgifan|forgiefan , 
 unscyndne blæd eorþ|eorðe rices , 
 and þu lignan nu þæt|se wesan|seon|nesan lifgende , 
 se ofer deofol dugeþum wealdeð . " 
 
 dauid wesan|seon|beon hatan diormod hæleð , 
 israela bræga , æðelæ and romana , 
 cyning cynost , criste liofost . 
 wesan|seon|beon he under hiofenum hearpere mærost 
 se we on|an folc friсgan habban . 
 sangere he wesan|seon|beon soðfæstest , swiðe|swiðan geðancol 
 toh|to ðingienne þiodum sin 
 wiþ|wið þan mildostan mannian|mann sceppend . 
 wesan|seon|beon se dryhten ðiowa dauid æt|etan wigan|wig 
 soð sigecempa , searocyne munan|mann|man , 
 casere|caser creaftig , þonne|se cumbulgebrec 
 on|an gewinndagum weorðan scoldan . 
 hwæðere him|hi|he geiode , swa ful oft gedeð 
 se godferhte gyldan gefræmmað 
 þurh lichama lene geðohtas . 
 gelimpan þæt|se him|hi|he mann|man ansende saula neriend , 
 wittig mid word , weorada dominus , 
 and secgan hettan|het|hedan|hatan , self gecyðan 
 ymb hit|his|he womdeda waldendes doom , 
 þæt|se se fruma wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he feorh sceldig , 
 for|faran ðam|se þu|þe|se he uriam hettan|het|hedan|hatan ald beneman , 
 from ferdrinc ferian|feran beserode , 
 and him|hi|he bezabe bringan|brengan toh|to wif 
 for|faran gitsunga , þu|þe|se he god eorre 
 þurh hit|his|he selfes weorc sona anfunde . 
 him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se ðingode þioda aldor , 
 dauid georne|geornan|georn , and toh|to dryhten gebiddan , 
 and hit|his|he synn|syn hord selfa ontende , 
 gyltas georne|geornan|georn god andhette , 
 weoruda dryhten , and þus word specan : 
 miserere mei deus secundum magnam misericordiam tuam . 
 " miltsian|milts þu me|ic , meahta walden , nu þu witan mannian|mann geðohtas , 
 helpan þu , hælend min|ic , handgeweorc 
 þin an , ælmehtig god , 
 efter þinne|þin se micel mildhiortnesse . 
 etan|et secundum multitudinem miserationem tuarum delu iniquitatem meam . 
 and eacan|eac efter menio miltsian|milts ðinra , 
 dryhten weoruda , adilgian min|ic unriht 
 toh|to forgefenesse gast minum|min . 
 amplius laua me|ic ab iniustitia mea etan|et wifcynn|hosp|flet|a delicta mea mundian|mund mæ . 
 aðweah me|ic of sennum , saule fram wammum , 
 gast sceppend , geltas geclansa , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe ic on|an ald æfre gefremian 
 þurh|ðurh lichama leðer geðohtas . 
 quoniam iniquitatem meam ego agnosco etan|et delictum meum coram me|ic est semper . 
 forðam ic unriht min|ic eal oncnawan , 
 and eacan|eac synn|syn gehwær self æt|etan eage , 
 firendeda geðrec beforan standeð , 
 scelda scinað ; forgifan me|ic , sceppen min|ic , 
 lifes|lif liohtfruma , þin lufu|lufe bliss|blis . 
 tibi soli peccaui etan|et mal coram te feci ut iustificeris in sermonibus tuis etan|et uincas dum iudicaris . 
 nu ic an þu|þe|ðe oft syngian , 
 and yfel feola eacan|eac gefræmede , 
 gelta gramhegdig , ic þu|þe|ðe , gast breogo , 
 helan crist , helpan biddan , 
 þæt|ðæt|se me|ic forgefene gast wund|windan 
 on|an forðgesceaft feran motan|mot , 
 þywan|þy|þe|se þin wordcwidas weorðan gefelan , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne wilnian weora ænig deað ; 
 acan|ac þu synfull|synful simble lærdes 
 þæt|ðæt|se hio cerrende criste heran 
 and hiom lif mid þu|þe|ðe langsum begæton , 
 swilce þu æt|etan dom , dryhten , oferswiðdest 
 eall|eal synn|syn cynn , saula neriend . 
 ecce enim iniquitatibus . 
 ic on|an unriht eacan|eac ðan in synn 
 geeacnod wesan|seon|beon . þu þæt|ðæt|se ana|an witan , 
 mæhtig dryhten , hu me|ic modor geberan 
 in sceamu|scamu and in sceldum ; forgifan me|ic , sceppend min|ic , 
 þæt|ðæt|se ic fram þæm|se synn selfa gecerre , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe min ældran ær geworhtan 
 and ic selfa eacan|eac sioððan began . 
 ecce enim ueritatem . 
 acan|ac þu , selua god , soð on|an lufian ; 
 þywan|þy|þe|se ic þu|þe|ðe mid bena|ben biddan willan 
 lifes|lif and lisse , liohtes aldor , 
 forðam þu me|ic uncuðe eacan|eac ðan derne 
 þinne|þin snetera hord selfa ontendes . 
 asperies me|ic ysopo etan|et mundabor . 
 þu me|ic , meahtig god , milde and bliðe 
 þurh ysopon eall|eal ahluttra , 
 þonne|se ic geclænsian|clænsian criste hero , 
 and eacan|eac ofer snaw self scinan 
 þinne|þin sibb|sib lufu|lufe sona gemetan|gemet . 
 auditui meo dabis gaudium . 
 ontynan nu , elmehtig , earnian|earn hleoðor , 
 þæt|se min|ic gehernes hehtful weorðe 
 on|an gefea bliðse forðweard toh|to þu|þe|ðe ; 
 ðanne bioð on|an wennan|wenn , waldend , simble 
 þu|þa|se gebrocenan ban , bilwit dominus , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|se on|an hænðum ær hwil wesan|seon|beon . 
 auerte faciem tuam wifcynn|hosp|flet|a peccatis meis etan|et omnes . 
 ahwerf nu fram synn , saula neriend , 
 and fram misdedum min gylta 
 þin ansione , ælmeahtig god , 
 and þurh|ðurh miltsunga meahta þinne|þin 
 þu unriht min|ic eall|eal adilgian . 
 cor mund crea in me|ic deus etan|et spiritum rectum . 
 æc þu , dryhten crist , clæne hiortan 
 in me|ic , mehtig god , modswiðne geðanc 
 toh|to ðolienne ðinne willan|willa 
 and toh|to healdan halig dom , 
 and þu riht gast , rodera waldend , 
 in ferðe minum|min feste geniowa . 
 nesan|neh|ne proicias me|ic wifcynn|hosp|flet|a facie tuae etan|et spiritum sanct tuum . 
 nesan|neh|ne aweorpan þu me|ic , weoruda dryhten , 
 fram ansione eall|eal þinne|þin miltsian|milts , 
 nesan|neh|ne ðane god fram me|ic gast halig 
 aferre , domine , frea ælmeahtig , 
 þinne|þin arna me|ic eal nesan|neh|ne bescerwe . 
 redde mihi letitiam . 
 sælan|sæl nu bliðse me|ic , bilewit dominus , 
 þinne|þin hælu hatan , helm alwihta , 
 and me|ic , lifgende liohtes hiorde , 
 gast þin , god selfa , getreme , 
 þæt|ðæt|se ic aldorlice wifcynn|hosp|flet|a forþ|forð sioððan 
 toh|to þin willan|willa weorðan motan|mot . 
 doceam iniquos uias tuas etan|et impii ad te . 
 simble ic þin weogas wanhogan læran , 
 þæt|ðæt|se hio arleas eft gecerdan 
 toh|to hira|hi selfra saula hiorde , 
 god selfa , toh|to þu|þe|ðe gast mundberd 
 þurh|ðurh sibb|sib lufu|lufe seoc scoldan . 
 libera me|ic de sanguinibus . 
 befreogan me|ic on|an ferðe , fæder mancynn , 
 fram blodgete and bealaniðum , 
 god lifian , gylta geclansa , 
 helo and helpend , hiofenrices weard ; 
 ðanne tunge min|ic triowfest blissað 
 for|faran ðines selfes soðfestnesse . 
 domine labia mea aperies etan|et os meum adnuntiauit . 
 ontynan nu , waldend god , weoloras min ; 
 swa min|ic muð sioððan mæhte þin 
 and lof georne|geornan|georn liodum toh|to bliðse , 
 soð sigedryhten , secgende wesan|seon|beon . 
 quoniam seon uoluisses . 
 ic þu|þe|ðe onsegednesse sona bringan|brengan , 
 weoruda dryhten , ðer þu willan swa , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu þæt|se nesan|neh|ne lufedest , lifes|lif bretta , 
 þæt|ðæt|se ic þu|þe|ðe bernelac brengan motan 
 dead neat , dryhten toh|to willan|willa . 
 sacrificium deon spiritus contribulatus . 
 acan|ac þu|þe|ðe micel micel , mehtig dryhten , 
 lifian|libban crist , liicwerðe bið 
 se gehnysta gast , hiorte geclansod 
 and geeadmeded ingeþanc ; 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu , ælmæhtig , æfre nesan|neh|ne æwan . 
 benigne fact domine in bona uoluntate . 
 gedoo nu fræmsume frofor þin 
 toh|to þin god gast willan|willa , 
 ðætte sione dun sigefest weorðe , 
 and weall sion wynfæst getremed , 
 hierusolimæ , god lifian|libban . 
 tunc acceptabis sacrificium . 
 swa þu , frea meahtig , anfehst siþðan 
 liofwende lacan|lac lioda þinne|þin , 
 hælend mannian|mann ; hio þæt|ðæt|se halig cealf 
 on|an wigbed þu|þin willum asettað , 
 liohtes aldor . forgifan me|ic , lifian 
 meotod mancynn , mæhtig dominus , 
 þæt|ðæt|se þe|þa|ða|se sorhful saule wund|windan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe ic on|an æled|ælan uel on|an giogeðe 
 in flæschaman gefræmed habban 
 leahtra hegeleasra , mid lufu|lufe þinne|þin 
 gastæ forgeofene glidan|glida motan|mot . " 
 swæ þingian þiode aldor , 
 dauid toh|to dryhten , ded gemyndig , 
 þæt|se he mæhtig god mann toh|to frofor 
 se cynedomes , crist nerian , 
 waldende god , weorðne mund|munan . 
 forðam he gebetan balaniða hord 
 mid eaðmede ingeþanc , 
 þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe he on|an ferðe gefræmed habban , 
 gast wund|windan . forgifan we|us , god mæahtig , 
 þæt|se we synn|syn hord simble oferwinnan 
 and we|us geearnian æce dream 
 on|an lifigendra land|finna wennan|wenn . 
 amen . 
 
 tweogan 
 gifena in þes ginnan grund|grindan . heo þær þe|þa|ða|se gearu findan 
 mundbyrd æt|etan ðam|se mære|mæran þeodne , þu|þa|se heo agan micel þearf , 
 hyldo se hehstan deman|dema , þæt|se he hi|heo wiþ|wið se hehstan broga 
 gefriðode , fyrmþ waldend . hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo se fæder on|an roderum 
 torhtmod tiðe gefremian , þu|þe|se heo agan trum geleafa 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to ðam|se ælmihtig|eallmihtig . gefrægen ic þe|þa|ða|se holofernus 
 winhate wyrcean georne|geornan|georn and eall|eal wundor þrymlic 
 girwan up swæsendo . toh|to ðam|se hettan|het|hedan|hatan se guma baldor 
 ealle|eall|eal þe|þa|ða|se yldestan ðegnas ; hi|heo þæt|ðæt|se ofost micel 
 ræfndon , rondwiggende , cuman toh|to ðam|se rican þeodne 
 feran , folc ræswan|ræswa . þæt|se wesan|seon|beon þywan|þy|þe|se feorðan dogore 
 se þu|þe|ðe iudith he , gleaw on|an geðonce , 
 ides ælfscinu , ærest|ær geseсan|gesecan . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se toh|to ðam|se simble sittan gan|eadan , 
 wlanc toh|to wingedrince , ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he weagesiðas , 
 beald byrnwiggende . þær wesan|seon|beon bolle|bolla steap 
 beran æfter bencum gelome|gelom , swilce eacan|eac bunan and orcas 
 full|ful fletsittendum ; hi|heo þæt|se fæge|fægan þicgan , 
 rof rondwiggende , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah se se rice|ric nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan , 
 egesful eorl dryhten . þe|þa|ða|se wearð holofernus , 
 goldwine guma , on|an gytesalum , 
 hlihhan|hliehhan|hlehhan and hlydan , hlynede and dynnan|dynian , 
 þæt|se magan firas birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn feorran|feorr|feor gehyran 
 hu se stiðmoda styrman and gylede , 
 modig and medugal , manian geneahhe 
 bencsittende þæt|se hi|heo gebærdon wel . 
 swa se inwidda ofer eall|eal dæg 
 dryhtguman sinnan|sin drenсan|drencan mid wine|win , 
 swiðmod sinc brytta , oðþæt hi|heo on|an swiman liсgan , 
 oferdrencte hit|his|he duguðe ealle|eall|eal , swilce hi|heo wesan|seon|beon deaðe geslean , 
 agotene god gehwilc . swa hettan|het|hedan|hatan se guma aldor 
 fylgan fletsittendum , oðþæt firas bearn 
 nealæсan|nealæcan niht|neaht seon|seo|se þystru|þystre . hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se niða geblonden 
 þu|þa|se eadig mægþ ofost fetigan 
 toh|to hit|his|he bedreste beah|beag gehlæste , 
 hring gehrodene . hi|heo hraðe fremman , 
 anbyhtscealcas , swa him|hi|he hira|hi|heore ealdor bebeodan , 
 byrnwigena breogo|brego , bearhtme stæppan|steppan 
 toh|to ðam|se gysterne , þær hi|heo iudithðe 
 findan ferhðgleawe , and þe|þa|ða|se fromlice 
 lindwiggende lædan onginnan 
 þu|þa|se torht mægþ toh|to træfe þæm|þam|se hean|heah , 
 þær se rice|ric he restan on|an symbel 
 niht inne , nergende lað , 
 holofernus . þær wesan|seon|beon eallgylden 
 fleohnet fæger ymbe|ymb se folctogan 
 bed ahongen , þæt|se se bealofulla 
 miht|meaht|magan wlitan þurh , wiga baldor , 
 on|an æghwylс þu|þe|se þær inne cuman 
 hæleða bearn , and on|an he nænig 
 mann cynn|cyn , nymðe se modig hwæne 
 niðe rof him|hi|he þu|þe|se near hettan|hatan 
 rinc toh|to run gegangan . hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se on|an restan gebrengan 
 snude þe|þa|ða|se snoteran ides ; gan|eadan þe|þa|ða|se stercedferhðe , 
 hæleð hira|hi|heore hearra cyþan þæt|se wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se halig meowle 
 gebrengan|bringan|brengan on|an hit|his|he burgetelde . þu|þa|se wearð se breme on|an mod 
 bliðe , burh|burg ealdor , þenсean|þenсan|þencan þe|þa|ða|se beorht ides 
 mid widle and mid womm besmitan . nesan|neh|ne willan þæt|se wuldor dema 
 geðafian , þrymm hyrdan|hyran|hirde , acan|ac he him|hi|he se ðinges gestyrde , 
 dryhten , dugeða waldend . gewitan þe|þa|ða|se se deofulcunda , 
 galferhð guma ðreate 
 bealofull hit|his|he bedd neosan , þær he sculan hit|his|he blæd forleosan 
 ædre binnan an niht|neaht ; habban þe|þa|ða|se hit|his|he ende gebidan 
 on|an eorþ|eorðe unswæslicne , swylcne he ær æfter wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan , 
 þearlmod ðeoden guma , þenden he on|an ðysse weorold 
 wunian under wolcn|wolcen hrofe . gefeallan þe|þa|ða|se wine|win swa druncen|drincan 
 se rice|ric on|an hit|his|he restan midde|midd , swa he nytan ræde|ræd nan 
 on|an gewitlocan . wiggend stæppan|steppan 
 ut of ðam|se inne ofost micel , 
 wer winsade , þu|þe|se se wærloga , 
 laðne leodhatan , lædan toh|to bedd|bed 
 nihsta siþ . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon nergendes 
 þeowen|þeowan þrymful , þearle gemyndig 
 hu heo se atol eaðost miht|meaht|magan 
 ealdor|eald benæman ær se unsyfre , 
 womfull , onwæcnan|onwacan . geniman þe|þa|ða|se wundenlocc 
 scyppendes mægþ scearpne mece , 
 scurum heard , and of sceaðe abredan 
 swiðran folm . onginnan þe|þa|ða|se swegl|swegel weard 
 be naman|nama nemnan , nergend eall|eal 
 woruldbuendra , and þæt|se word acwæð : 
 " ic þu|þe|ðe , fyrmþ god and frofor gæstan|gan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn alwaldan , biddan wylle 
 milts þinne|þin me|ic þearfendre , 
 ðrynesse ðrym . þearle ys me|ic nu þe|þa|ða|se 
 heorte onhæted and hige geomor , 
 swiðe mid sorh|sorg gedrefan|drefan . forgif me|ic , swegl|swegel ealdor , 
 sigor and soð geleafa , þæt|se ic mid þis sweord motan|mot 
 geheawan þes morðres brytta . geunnan me|ic min gesynta , 
 þearlmod þeon|þeodan guma . nagan ic þinne|þin næfre 
 milts þon|se micel|mare|mara þearf . gewrecan nu , mihtig dryhten , 
 torhtmod tires brytta , þæt|se me|ic ys þus torn on|an mod , 
 hatan|hat on|an hreðre minum|min . " hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se se hehsta dema 
 ædre mid ellen onbryrde , swa he deð an gehwylcne 
 herbuendra þu|þe|se he him|hi|he toh|to helpan seceð 
 mid ræde|rædan|ræd and mid rihte|rihtan|riht geleafa . þu|þa|se wearð hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo rum on|an mod , 
 halig hyht niwian . geniman þe|þa|ða|se se hæðena|hæðen mannan 
 fæstan|fæst be feax sin , teon he folm wiþ|wið hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo weard 
 bysmerlice , and se bealofullan 
 list alede , laðne mannan , 
 swa heo se unlæd eaðost miht|meaht|magan
