 wel gewealdan . slean þe|þa|ða|se wundenlocc 
 se feondsceaðan fah mece , 
 heteþoncolne , þæt|se heo healf forcearf 
 se sweora him|hi|he , þæt|se he on|an swiman liсgan|licgan , 
 druncen|drincan and dolhwund . næs|nesan þe|þa|ða|se dead þu|þa|se git , 
 eall|eal orsawle . slean þe|þa|ða|se eornoste 
 ides ellenrof oðer siþ 
 se hæðena|hæðen hund|1000 , þæt|se him|hi|he þæt|se heafod windan|wand 
 forþ|forð on|an þe|þa|ða|se flor . liсgan|licgan se fulian|ful leap 
 gesne beæftan . gæstan|gan ellor hwerfan|hweorfan 
 under neowel næs|nesan and þær genyðerad wesan|seon|beon , 
 susl sælan|gesælan siððan æfre , 
 wyrm bewindan , wite|wita gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 heard hæftan in hellebryne 
 æfter hinsiðe . nesan|neh|ne ðearf he hopian no , 
 þystru|þystre forðylmed , þæt|se he ðonan motan|mot 
 of ðam|se wyrmsele , acan|ac þær wunian sculan 
 awa toh|to ald butan ende forþ|forð 
 in ðam|se heolstran ham , hyhtwynna leas . 
 habban þe|þa|ða|se gefeohtan|feohtan foremærne blæd 
 iudith æt|etan guðe , swa hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo god uðe , 
 swegl|swegel ealdor , þu|þe|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo sigor onleah . 
 þu|þa|se seon|seo|se snotere mægþ snude gebrohte 
 se herewæðan heafod swa blodig 
 on|an ðam|se fætelse þu|þe|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo foregenga , 
 blachleor ides , hyra|hyr|hira|hi begea neþan|nest , 
 ðeawum geðungen , þider onlædan , 
 and hit þu|þa|se swa heolfrig hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo on|an hond agifan|agiefan , 
 higeðoncolre , ham toh|to beren|beran , 
 iudith gingra sin . gan|eadan þe|þa|ða|se gegnum þanonne 
 þu|þa|se ides ba ellenþriste , 
 oðþæt hi|heo becuman , collenferhðe , 
 eadhreðige mægþ , ut of ðam|se herian|here , 
 þæt|se hi|heo sweotollice geseon magan 
 þære|se wlitegan burh|burg weall blican , 
 bethuliam . hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se beahhrodene 
 feðelaste forþ|forð onettan , 
 oþ|oð hi|heo glædmode gegan|gan habban 
 toh|to ðam|se wealgate . wiggend sittan , 
 wer wæccende weard healdan 
 in ðam|se fæsten|fæstan , swa ðam|se folc ær 
 geomormodum iudith bebeodan , 
 searoðoncol mægþ , þu|þa|se heo on|an sið gewitan , 
 ides ellenrof . wesan|seon|beon þe|þa|ða|se eft cuman 
 leof toh|to leode|leoda|leod , and þe|þa|ða|se lungre hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 gleawhydig wif guma sum 
 of se ginnan burh|burg hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo togeanes gan , 
 and hi|heo ofostlice in forlætan 
 þurh se weall gietan|geotan|geatan|geat , and þæt|se word acwæð 
 toh|to ðam|se sigefolce : " ic ge|eowan|eow secgan mæg|magan 
 þoncwyrðe þingan|þing , þæt|se ge nesan|neh|ne þurfan lengan|leng|lange 
 murnan on|an mod . ge|eowan|eow ys metod bliðe , 
 cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm : þæt|se gecyðed wearð 
 geond weorold wid , þæt|se ge|eowan|eow ys wuldorblæd 
 torhtlic toweard and tir gifeðe 
 þær|se læðða þu|þe|se ge lange|lang dreogan . " 
 þu|þa|se wurdon|weorþan bliðe burhsittende , 
 siððan hi|heo gehyrdan|gehyran hu seon|seo|se halig sprecan 
 ofer hean|heah weallan|weall . herian|here|heran wesan|seon|beon on|an lust . 
 wiþ|wið se fæstengeates folc onettan , 
 wer wif somod , wornum and heap , 
 ðreatum and ðrymmum þringan and yrnan|irnan|iernan 
 ongeagn þe|þa|ða|se þeodnes mægþ þusendmælum , 
 eald ge geong|gangan . æghwylcum wearð 
 mann on|an se medobyrig mod areted , 
 siððan hi|heo ongietan þæt|se wesan|seon|beon iudith cuman 
 eft toh|to eðle , and þe|þa|ða|se ofostlice 
 hi|heo mid eaðmedum in forlætan . 
 þu|þa|se seon|seo|se gleaw hettan|het|hedan|hatan , gold gefrætewod , 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo ðinenne þancolmode 
 se herewæðan heafod onwriðan 
 and hydan|hit toh|to behðe blodig ætywan 
 þæm|þam|se burhleoda|burhleod , hu hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo æt|etan beaduwe gespowan . 
 sprecan þe|þa|ða|se seon|seo|se æðele toh|to eall|eal þæm|þam|se folc : 
 " heran|her ge magan sweotol , sigerofe hæleð , 
 leode|leoda|leod ræswan|ræswa , on|an se laðestan 
 hæðenes heaðorinces heafod starian , 
 holofernus unlyfigendes , 
 þu|þe|se we|us mann micel morðra gefremian , 
 sar sorh|sorgian|sorg , and þæt|se swyðor git 
 ycan willan , acan|ac him|hi|he nesan|neh|ne uðe god 
 lengra lifes|lif , þæt|se he mid læððum we|us 
 egle|eglan motan . ic him|hi|he ealdor oðþrong 
 þurh god fultuman|fultum . nu ic guma gehwæne 
 þyssa burgleoda biddan wylle , 
 randwiggendra , þæt|se ge recen ge|eowan|eow 
 fysan toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht . siððan fyrmþ god , 
 arfæst cyning , eastan|east sendan 
 leoht leoma , berað linde forþ|forð , 
 bord for|faran breost and byrnhomas , 
 scir helm in sceaþa gemong , 
 fyllan folctogan fah sweord , 
 fæge|fægan frumgaras . fynd syndon eower 
 deman toh|to deaðe , and ge don|dom agan , 
 tir æt|etan tohtan , swa ge|eowan|eow tacnian|getacnian hafað 
 mihtig dryhten þurh min hand . " 
 þu|þa|se wearð snelra werod snude gegearewod , 
 cene toh|to camp . stæppan|steppan cynerofe 
 secg and gesiðas , beran sigeþufas , 
 faran toh|to gefeohtan|gefeoht forþ|forð on|an gerihte|gerihtan|geriht , 
 hæleð under helma|helm , of se halig burh|burg 
 on|an þæt|ðæt|se dægred self . dynedan scildas , 
 hlud hlimman|hlemman . se se hlanca gefeon 
 wulf in walde , and se wann hrefn , 
 wælgifre fugel . wistan begen 
 þæt|se him|hi|he þe|þa|ða|se þeodguman þenсean|þenсan|þencan tilian|tilia 
 fyllu|fyllan on|an fæge ; acan|ac him|hi|he fleon|fleogan|flean on|an last 
 irnan|iernan|earn ætes geornan|georn , urigfeðera , 
 salowigpada singan|sang hildeleoð , 
 hyrnednebba . stæppan|steppan heaðorincas , 
 beorn toh|to beadowe , bord beðeahte , 
 hwealf lindum , þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe hwil ær 
 elðeodigra edwit þoledon , 
 hæðen hosp . him|hi|he þæt|se heard wearð 
 æt|etan ðam|se æscplegan eall|eal forgieldan , 
 assyrium , siððan ebreas 
 under guðfanum gegan|gan habban 
 toh|to ðam|se fyrdwicum . hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se fromlice 
 lætan forþ|forð fleoge|fleogan flan|fla scuras , 
 hildenædran of hornbogan , 
 strælas stedehearde ; styrman hlud 
 gram guðfrecan , gar sendan 
 in heard gemang . hæleð wesan|seon|beon yrre|irre , 
 landbuend , laðum cynn , 
 stæppan|steppan styrnmode , stercedferhðe , 
 wrehton unsofte ealdgeniðlan 
 medowerige ; mund bregdan 
 scealcas of sceaðum scirmæled swyrd , 
 ecgum gecoste , slean eornoste 
 assiria oretmæcgas , 
 niðhycgende , nan nesan|neh|ne sparedon 
 se herefolces , hean|heah nesan|neh|ne riсe , 
 cwicera mannian|mann þu|þe|se hi|heo ofercuman mihton . 
 swa þe|þa|ða|se magoþegnas on|an þe|þa|ða|se morgentid 
 ehtan elðeoda ealle|eall|eal þrage , 
 oðþæt ongietan þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe gram wesan|seon|beon , 
 se herefolces heafodweardas , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he swyrdgeswing swiðlic eowan 
 wer ebrisce . hi|heo word þæt|se 
 þæm|þam|se yldestan ealdorþegnum 
 cyþan gan|eadan , wrehton cumbolwigan 
 and him|hi|he forhtlice færspel bodedon , 
 medowerigum morgencollan , 
 atol ecgplegan . þu|þa|se ic ædre gefrignan 
 slegefæge hæleð slæpan|slæp tobredon 
 and wiþ|wið se bealofullan burgeteldes 
 werigferhðe hwearfum þringan , 
 holofernus . hogedon aninga 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi hlaford hild bodian , 
 ærðon þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he se egesian|egesa on|an ufan sæt|sittan , 
 mægen|magan ebrea . myntan ealle|eall|eal 
 þæt|se se beorn breogo|brego and seon|seo|se beorht mægþ 
 in ðam|se wlitegan træfe wesan|seon|beon ætsomne , 
 iudith seon|seo|se æðele and se galmoda , 
 egesfull and afor|afaran . næs|nesan þeah eorl nan 
 þu|þe|se se wiggend aweccan durran 
 oððe gecunnian hu se cumbolwigan 
 wiþ|wið þe|þa|ða|se halig|halga|haleg mægþ habban weorþan|geweorþan , 
 metod meowle . mægen|magan nealæсan|nealæcan , 
 folc ebrea , feohtan þearle 
 heard heoruwæpnum , hæftan gyldan|gieldan 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi fyrngeflitu , fah swyrdum , 
 eald æfðoncan . assyria wearð 
 on|an ðam|se dægweorc don|dom geswiðrod , 
 bælc forbiged . beorn standan 
 ymbe|ymb hyra|hyr|hira|hi þeodnes træf þearle gebylde , 
 sweorcendferhðe . hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se somod ealle|eall|eal 
 onginnan cohhetan , cirman hlud 
 and gristbitian , god orfeorme , 
 mid toðon torn þolian . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon hyra|hyr|hira|hi tires æt|etan ende , 
 ead and ellendæda . hogedon þu|þa|se eorl aweccan 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi winedryhten ; him|hi|he wiht nesan|neh|ne spowan . 
 þu|þa|se wearð sið and læt|late sum|su toh|to ðam|se arian 
 þær|se beadorinca , þæt|se he in þæt|se burgeteld 
 niðheard neðde , swa he nyd fordrifan . 
 findan þe|þa|ða|se on|an bedd|bed blac licgan 
 hit|his|he goldgifan gæstes gesne , 
 lifes|lif belidenne . he þu|þa|se lungre gefeallan 
 freorig toh|to folde , onginnan hit|his|he feax teran , 
 hreoh on|an mod , and hit|his|he hrægl somod , 
 and þæt|se word acwæð toh|to ðam|se wiggendum 
 þu|þe|se þær unrote ute wesan|seon|beon : 
 " heran|her ys geswutelian ure|ur sylfra forwyrd , 
 toweard tacnian|getacnian þæt|se þære|se tidan|tid ys 
 mid niðum neah geðrungen , þu|þe|se we sculan nyde losian , 
 somod æt|etan sæcce forweorðan . heran|her lið sweord heawan , 
 beheafdian healdend ure|ur . " hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se hreowigmode 
 weorpan hyra|hyr|hira|hi wæpen ofdune , gewitan|gewita him|hi|he werigferhðe 
 on|an fleam sceacan . him|hi|he mann|man feohtan|feccan on|an last , 
 mægeneacen folc , oþ|oð se mæsta dælan|dæl 
 se here liсgan|licgan hild sægan 
 on|an ðam|se sigewonge , sweord heawan , 
 wulf toh|to willan|willa and eacan|eac wælgifrum 
 fugol toh|to frofor . fleon|fleogan þe|þa|ða|se þu|þe|ðe lyfdon , 
 laðra lindwig . him|hi|he on|an last for|faran 
 sweot ebrea sigor geweorðod , 
 dom gedyrsod ; him|hi|he fon dryhten god 
 fæger|fæge on|an fultuman|fultum , frea ælmihtig . 
 hi|heo þe|þa|ða|se fromlice fah swyrdum , 
 hæleð higerofe , herpað wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan 
 þurh laðra gemong , linde heawan , 
 scildburh scæron . sceotend wesan|seon|beon 
 guðe gegremede , guma ebrisce ; 
 þegn|þegen on|an þe|þa|ða|se tidan|tid þearle gelyste 
 gargewinnes . þær on|an greotan gefeallan 
 se hyhsta dælan|dæl heafodgerimes 
 assiria ealdorduguðe , 
 lað cynn|cyn . lythwon becuman 
 cwicera toh|to cyþ . cyrran cynerofe , 
 wiggend on|an wiðertrod , wælscel on|an innan , 
 reocan hræw . rum wesan|seon|beon toh|to nimanne 
 londbuendum on|an ðam|se laðestan , 
 hyra|hyr|hira|hi ealdfeondum unlyfigendum 
 heolfrig herereaf , hyrsta scyne , 
 bord and bradswyrd , brun helm , 
 dyre madmas . habban domlice 
 on|an ðam|se folcstede fynd oferwinnan 
 eðelweardas , ealdhettende 
 swyrdum aswebban . hi|heo on|an swaðe restan , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he toh|to lif laðost wesan|seon|beon 
 cwicera cynn . þu|þa|se seon|seo|se cneoris eall|eal , 
 mægða mærost , an monðes fyrst , 
 wlanc , wundenlocc , wegan and lædan 
 toh|to se beorht burh|burg , bethuliam , 
 helm and hupseax , har byrnan , 
 guðsceorp guma gold gefrætewod , 
 mære madma þonne|se mann|man ænig 
 asecgan mæge|mæg|magan searoþoncelra ; 
 eal þæt|se þe|þa|ða|se ðeodguman þrymm gegan , 
 cennan|cene under cumblum on|an compwige 
 þurh iudithe gleaw lar , 
 mægþ modig . hi|heo toh|to med hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo 
 of ðam|se siðfate sylfre bringan|brengan , 
 eorl æscrofe , holofernes 
 sweord and swatig helm , swilce eacan|eac side|sid byrnan 
 gerenode reada|read gold , and eal þæt|se se rinc baldor 
 swiðmod sinc agan oððe sundoryrfes , 
 beah|beagian|beag and beorht maðma , hi|heo þæt|se þære|se beorht ides 
 agifan|agiefan gearoþoncolre . eall|eal se iudith sægan|seсgan|secgan 
 wuldor|seolh|bearm werod dryhten , þu|þe|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo weorðmynde gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf , 
 mærðe on|an molde romana , swilce eacan|eac med on|an heofon , 
 sigorlean in swegl|swegel wuldor , se þu|þe|se heo agan soð geleafa 
 toh|to ðam|se ælmihtig|eallmihtig ; huru æt|etan þæm|þam|se ende nesan|neh|ne tweogan 
 se lean þu|þe|se heo lange|lang gyrnan . se su ðam|se leof drihten 
 wuldor|seolh|bearm toh|to wid ald , þu|þe|se gesceppan windan|wind and lyft , 
 roderas and rum grund , swilce eacan|eac reðe stream 
 and swegl|swegel dream , þurh|ðurh hit|his|he sylfes milts . 
 
 . . .g fæder , þu þu|þe|se on|an heofon eardian , 
 geweorðad wuldor dream . su þin weorc halgad 
 noma niþþe|niþþas bearn ; þu wesan|seon nergend wer . 
 cyme þu|þin romana wid , and þu|þin rædfæst willian|willa 
 aræran under rodor hrofe , eacan|eac þon|se on|an rum folde . 
 syl|sellan we|us toh|to dæge|dæg domfæstne blæd , 
 hlaf userne , helpend wer , 
 se singal , soþfæst meotod . 
 nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt|lædan usic costunga cnyssan toh|to swiðe|swiðan , 
 acan|ac þu we|us freodom giefan|gefan , folc waldend , 
 from|fram yfel gehwa , wifcynn|hosp|flet|a toh|to wid feorh . 
 
 huru , se behofian hæleþ|hæle æghwylc 
 þæt|se he hit|his|he sawol|sawel sið self bewitige , 
 hu þæt|se bið deoplic þonne|se se deað cymeð , 
 asundrað þu|þa|se sibb|sib , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ær somud wesan|seon|beon , 
 liс|lic and sawol|sawel ! long bið siððan 
 þæt|se se gæstan|gan nimeð æt|etan god self 
 swa wite|witan swa wuldor|seolh|bearm , swa him|hi|he in weorold ær 
 efne|efnan|efen þæt|se eorðfæt ær gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . 
 sculan se gæstan|gan cuman|cuma gehþum hremig , 
 simble ymb seofon niht|neaht sawol|sawel findan 
 se lichoman þu|þe|se heo ær long|lange wegan , 
 þri hund|1000 wintra|winter , 
 butan ær wyrce ece dryhten , 
 ælmihtig god , ende worlde . 
 cleopað þonne|se swa cearful cald rædan|reord , 
 spriceð grimlice gæstan|gan toh|to þæm|þam|se dust : 
 " hwæt#2 , drug þu dreorig , toh|to hwon dreссan|dreccan þu me|ic , 
 eorþe|eorþ fylnes eal forweornast , 
 lames gelicnes ! lutan þu geþohtes 
 toh|to woh þinne|þin sawol|sawel sið siððan weorþan , 
 siððan heo of lichoman lædan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon ! 
 hwæt#2 , wite|witan þu me|ic , werig ! hwæt#2 , þu huru wyrm gifl 
 lutan geþohtes , hu þes wesan|seon|is long hider , 
 and þu|þe|se þurh engel ufan of roderum 
 sawol|sawel onsendan þurh hit|his|he sylfes hond , 
 meotud ælmihtig , of hit|his|he mægenþrymme , 
 and þu|þe|se þu|þa|se gebycgan blod þywan|þy|þe|se halig|halga|haleg , 
 and þu me|ic þywan|þy|þe|se heard hungor gebindan 
 and gehæftnadest hell|hel wite|wita ! 
 eardian ic þu|þe|se in innan . no ic þu|þe|se of magan , 
 flæsc bifongen , and me|ic firenlust 
 þin geþringan . þæt|se me|ic þynсan|þyncan ful oft 
 þæt|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þritig þusend wintra|winter 
 toh|to þin deaðdæge . hwæt#2 , ic uncres gedal bidan 
 earfoþlice|earfoðlice . nesan nu se ende toh|to god ! 
 wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þu þu|þe|se witan|wist wlonc and wine|win sæd , 
 þrymful þunedest , and ic ofþyrsted wesan|seon|beon 
 god lichoman , gæstes drinces . 
 þær þu þonne|se hycgan heran|her on|an lif , 
 þenden ic þu|þe|se in weorold wunian sculan , 
 þæt|se þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon þurh flæsc and þurh firenlust 
 stronge styrian|styran and gestaþelad þurh mec , 
 and ic wesan|seon|beon gæstan|gan on|an þu|þe|se from|fram god sendan , 
 næfre þu me|ic swa heard hell|hel wite|wita 
 ned gearwian þurh þinne|þin neodian lust . 
 sculan þu nu hwæþre min gescenta scome þrowian 
 on|an þæm|þam|se micel dæge|dæg , þonne|se mann cynn 
 se ancenda ealle|eall|eal gegædrað . 
 nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon þu nu þon|se leof nænig lifgendra , 
 mann toh|to gemæcca , nesan|neh|ne medder nesan|neh|ne fæder , 
 nesan|neh|ne nænig gesibbra , þonne|se se sweartian|sweart hrefn , 
 siððan ic ana|an of þu|þe|se ut siþade 
 þurh se sylfes hond þu|þe|se ic ær onsendan wesan|seon|beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne magan þu|þe|se nu heonan adon hyrstan þu|þa|se reada|read , 
 nesan|neh|ne gold nesan|neh|ne sylfor nesan|neh|ne þinne|þin god nan , 
 acan|ac heran|her sculan abidan ban bireafod , 
 besliten seonu , and þu|þe|se þu|þin sawel sculan 
 minum|min unwillan oft gesecan , 
 wemman mid word , swa þu wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan toh|to me|ic . 
 wesan|seon þu dumb and dufan|deaf , nesan|neh|ne sindan þin dream wiht . 
 sculan ic þu|þe|se niht seþeah nyde gesecan , 
 synn gesargad , and eft sona from|fram þu|þe|ðe 
 hweorfan on|an honcred , þonne|se haleg mann 
 god lifgendum lofsong doð , 
 sec þu|þa|se ham þu|þe|se þu me|ic ær scrife , 
 and þu|þa|se arleas eardungstowe , 
 and þu|þe|se sculan moldwyrmas manig ceowan , 
 seonowum beslitan sweart wiht , 
 gifre and grædig . nesan|neh|ne wesan|nesan þin geahþe wiht , 
 þu|þa|se þu heran|her on|an molde mann eawdest . 
 forðam þu|þe|se wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon sellan swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe micel 
 þonne|se þu|þe|se wær ealle|eall|eal eorþe|eorþ spedan|sped , 
 ( butan þu hi gedælan dryhten self ) , 
 þær þu weorþan æt|etan frumsceafte fugel oþþe|oððe fisc on|an sæ , 
 oððe eorþe|eorþ neotan|neat ætes tiolode , 
 feldgongende feoh butan snytro , 
 ge on|an westen|westan wilde deore|deor 
 þæt|se grimmeste , þær swa god willan , 
 ge þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon wyrmcynn þæt|se wyrreste , 
 þonne|se þu æfre on|an molde mann|man geweorþan , 
 oþþe|oððe æfre fulwihtan|fulwiht onfon sculan . 
 þonne|se þu for|faran wit buan andwerdan sculan 
 on|an þæm|þam|se micel dæge|dæg , þonne|se eall|eal mann beoð 
 wund|windan onwrigene , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se in weorold ær 
 firenfull mann fyrn gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 þonne willan|wil dryhten self dæd gehyran , 
 æt|etan eall|eal mann gehwa muþ rædan|reord 
 wund|windan wiþerlean . acan|ac hwæt#2 willan þu þær 
 on|an domdæge dryhten secgan gewinnan|geblandan 
 þonne|se nesan|neh|ne bið nænig toh|to se lytel lið on|an lim weaxan|geweaxan , 
 þæt|se þu nesan|neh|ne sculan for|faran æghwylc an onsundrum|onsundran 
 ryht agieldan , þonne reþe|reðe bið 
 dryhten æt|etan dom . acan|ac hwæt#2 don witan wit , 
 þonne|se he wit hafað geedbyrded oþer|oðer siþ gewinnan|geblandan 
 sculan witan þonne|se ætsomne siððan brucan 
 swylcra yrmþa , swa þu wit ær scrife . " 
 firenian þus þæt|se flæschord , sculan þonne|se feran on|an wegan|weg , 
 sec hell|hel grund , nales heofondreamas , 
 dæd gedrefan|drefan . ligeð dust þær hit wesan|seon|beon , 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan him|hi|he ondsware ænig secgan , 
 nesan|neh|ne þær edringe ænge gehatan 
 gæstan geomor , geoc oþþe|oððe frofor . 
 beon þæt|se heafod tohliden , honda tohleoþode , 
 geaflas toginene , goma toslitene , 
 seonu beoð asogene , sweora|sweor bicowen ; 
 rib reafiað reþe|reðe wyrm , 
 drincað hloþ hra , heolfres þurstge . 
 bið seon|seo|se tunge toteon on|an tynan|tin healf 
 hungor toh|to hroþor . forðam heo nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan horsclice 
 word wrixlan wiþ|wið se werig gæstan|gan . 
 gifer hatan se wyrm , þæm|þam|se þu|þa|se geaflas beoð 
 nædl scearpran . se geneþeð toh|to 
 ærest|ær eall|eal on|an þæm|þam|se eorðscræfe ; 
 he þu|þa|se tunge totyhð and þu|þa|se toþas þurhsmyhð , 
 and toh|to ætwelan oþrum|oþer|oðer gerymeð , 
 and þu|þa|se eage þurhiteð ufon on|an þæt|se heafod 
 wyrm toh|to witan|wist , þonne|se beon þæt|se werig 
 liс|lic acolad þæt|se he long|lange ær 
 werian|weorod mid wædum . bið þonne|se wyrm giefl , 
 æt|etan on|an eorþe|eorþ . þæt|se mæg|magan æghwylcum 
 mann toh|to gemynd modsnotterra . 
 
 " . . .ce bæteran 
 butan ðam|se an þu|þe|ðe ic eacan|eac hafian|habban 
 on|an stanfate stille|stillan gehided . 
 ic witan þæt|se hit ðohte ðeodric widian 
 self onsendan , and eacan|eac sincan|sinc micel 
 maðma mid se mece , manig oðres mid him|hi|he 
 gold gegirwan ( iulean geniman ) , 
 se þu|þe|ðe he of nearu|nearo niðhades mæg|magan , 
 welandes birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , widia ut forlætan ; 
 þurh|ðurh fifel gewe . . . . . .ld forþ|forð onettan . " 
 waldere mað . . . . . .lode , wiga|wig ellenrof , 
 habban him|hi|he on|an hand hildefrofre , 
 guðbilla grippan|gripe|gripan , gyddode word : 
 " hwæt#2 ! þu huru wendan|wenan , wine|win burgenda , 
 þæt|se me|ic hagenan hand hild gefremian 
 and getwæmde . . .ðewigges . fetian , gif þu durran , 
 æt|etan þus heaðuwerigan har byrnan . 
 standeð me|ic heran|her on|an eaxelum ælfheres laf , 
 god and geapneb , gold geweorðod , 
 eall|eal unscende æðelinges reofan|reaf 
 toh|to habbanne , þonne|se hand wereð 
 feorhhord feond . nesan|neh|ne bið fah wiþ|wið me|ic , 
 þonne|se . . . . . . unmægas eft ongynnað , 
 mecum gemetað , swa ge me|ic don . 
 þeah mæg|magan sige|sigan|seon syllan se þu|þe|ðe simble byð 
 recon and rædfest ryh . . . . . .a gehwilces . 
 se þu|þe|ðe him|hi|he toh|to ðam|se halig|halga|haleg helpan gelifeð , 
 toh|to god gioce , he þær gearu|gearo findeð 
 gif þe|þa|ða|se earnunga ær geðenceð . 
 þonne|se motan wlanc wela britnian , 
 æht wealdan , þæt|se wesan|seon|is " 
 
 mæg|magan ic be me|ic self soðgied wrecan , 
 siþ secgan , hu ic geswincdæg 
 earfoðhwile oft þrowade , 
 bitter|bitor|biter breostcearu gebidan|bidan habban , 
 gecunnad in ceole cearselda fela , 
 atol yþian|yþ gewealcan|gewealc , þær mec oft bigeat 
 nearu|nearo nihtwaco æt|etan naca stefnan , 
 þonne|se he be clifum cnossað . cald þringan|geþringan 
 wesan|seon|beon min fot|fedan , forst gebunden|gebindan|bindan , 
 cald clommum , þær þu|þa|se cearu seofedun 
 hatan|hat ymb heorte ; hungor innan slitan 
 merewerges mod . þæt|se se mann|man nesan|neh|ne witan 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he on|an folde fægrost limpeð , 
 hu ic earmcearig isceald sæ 
 winter wunade wræccan last , 
 winemægum bidroren , 
 bihongen hrimgicelum ; hægl scurum fleogan . 
 þær ic nesan|neh|ne gehyrdan|gehyran butan hlimme|hlimman sæ , 
 iscaldne wegan . hwilum|hwil ylfete song 
 dydan|don ic me|ic toh|to gomene , ganetes hleoþor 
 and huilpan swegan|sweg for|faran hleahtor wer , 
 mæw singan for|faran medodrince . 
 storm þær stanclifu beotan , þær him|hi|he stearn oncwæð 
 isigfeþera ; ful oft þæt|se irnan|iernan|earn bigeal , 
 urigfeþra ; nesan|neh|ne ænig hleomæga 
 feasceaftig ferð frefran magan . 
 forðam him|hi|he gelyfeð lutan , se þu|þe|se agan|ac lifes|lif wyn 
 gebidan|bidan in burh|burg , bealosiþa hwon , 
 wlonc and wingal , hu ic werig oft 
 in brimlade bidan sculan . 
 nipan nihtscua , norþan|norþ sniwan , 
 hriman|hrim hruse bond , hægl feolan on|an eorþe|eorþ , 
 corn caldast . forðam cnyssað nu 
 heorte geþoht , þæt|se ic hean|heah stream , 
 sealtyþ gelacan self cunnian ; 
 monaþ|monað mod lust mæl gehwylc 
 ferð toh|to feran , þæt|se ic feor heonan 
 elþeodig eard gesece . 
 forðam nesan se modwlonc mann|man ofer eorþe|eorþ , 
 nesan|neh|ne hit|his|he gifena se god , nesan|neh|ne in geoguþ toh|to se hwæt#2 , 
 nesan|neh|ne in hit|his|he dæd toh|to se deor , nesan|neh|ne him|hi|he hit|his|he dryhten toh|to se hold , 
 þæt|se he wifcynn|hosp|flet|a hit|his|he sæfore sorh|sorg nabban , 
 toh|to hwon he dryhten gedon|gedo|don willan . 
 nesan|neh|ne beon him|hi|he toh|to hearpe hyсgan|hyg|hycgan nesan|neh|ne toh|to hringþege , 
 nesan|neh|ne toh|to wif wyn nesan|neh|ne toh|to weorold hyht , 
 nesan|neh|ne ymbe|ymb owiht elles , nefne ymb yða gewealcan|gewealc , 
 acan|ac wifcynn|hosp|flet|a hafað longunge se þu|þe|se on|an lah|lagu fundað . 
 bearwas blostma|blostm nimað , burh|burg fægriað , 
 wongas wlitigað , weorold onetteð ; 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se gemoniað mod fus 
 sefa toh|to siþ , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se swa þenceð 
 on|an flodwegas feor gewitan|gewita . 
 swilce geac monaþ|monað geomor rædan|reord , 
 singeð sumer weard , sorh|sorg beodeð 
 bitter in breosthord . þæt|se se beornan|beorn|beirnan nesan|neh|ne witan , 
 sefteadig secg , hwæt#2 þu|þa|se sum dreogað 
 þu|þe|se þu|þa|se wræclast widost lecgað . 
 forðam nu min|ic hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hweorfeð ofer hreþerlocan , 
 min|ic modsefa mid mereflode 
 ofer hwæl eþel hweorfeð wid , 
 eorþe|eorþ sceat , cymeð eft toh|to me|ic 
 gifre and grædig , gielleð anfloga , 
 hweteð on|an hwælweg hreþer unwearnum 
 ofer holm gelagu . forðam me|ic hatran wesan|nesan 
 dryhten dream þonne|se þes dead lif , 
 lænan|læn on|an land . ic gelyfan no 
 þæt|se him|hi|he eorðwelan ece stondað . 
 simble þri sum|su þingian|þing gehwylc , 
 ær hit|his|he tidege toh|to tweo weorþeð : 
 adl oþþe|oððe ieldo oþþe|oððe ecghete 
 fæge fromweardum feorh oðþringeð . 
 forðam þæt|se wesan|seon|is eorl gehwa æftercweþendra 
 lof lifgendra lastworda wel|betan , 
 þæt|se he gewyrce , ær he on|an wegan|weg sculan , 
 freme on|an folde wiþ|wið feond niþ , 
 deore|deor dæd deofol togeanes , 
 þæt|se he æled birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn æfter hergen , 
 and hit|his|he lof siððan lifge mid engel 
 awa toh|to ealdor|eald , ecan lifes|lif blæd , 
 dream mid dugeþum . dæg|dah|dag wesan|nesan gewitene , 
 ealle|eall|eal onmedlan eorþe|eorþ rices ; 
 nesan nu cyning nesan|neh|ne casere|caser 
 nesan|neh|ne goldgiefan swilce iu wesan|seon|beon , 
 þonne|se hi|heo micel mid him|hi|he mærþa gefremedon 
 and on|an dryhtlicestum dom libban . 
 dreosan wesan|seon|is þes|þeoh|se duguð eal , dream wesan|nesan gewitene , 
 wuniað þu|þa|se waccor and þes weorold healdan , 
 brucað þurh bisgo . blæd wesan|seon|is hnægan , 
 eorþe|eorþ indryhto ealdað and searað , 
 swa nu mann gehwylc geond middangeard . 
 ieldo him|hi|he on|an fareð , onsyn blacað , 
 gomelfeax gnornað , witan hit|his|he iuwine , 
 æþeling birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , eorþe|eorþ forgiefene . 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan him|hi|he þonne|se se flæschoma , þonne|se him|hi|he þæt|se feorg losað , 
 nesan|neh|ne swete forswelgan nesan|neh|ne sar gefelan , 
 nesan|neh|ne hond onhreran nesan|neh|ne mid hyсgan|hyg|hycgan þencan . 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se græf willan gold stregan 
 broþor|broðor hit|his|he geboren|geberan , byrgan be dead , 
 maþum|maþm mislicum þæt|se he mid willan , 
 nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan þære|se sawol|sawel þu|þe|se beon synn|syn ful 
 gold toh|to geoc for|faran god egsan , 
 þonne|se he hit ær hydeð þenden he heran|her leofað . 
 micel beon se meotudes egsian , forðam hi|heo seon|seo|se molde oncyrreð ; 
 se gestaþelade stiþe grund , 
 eorþe|eorþ sceat and uprodor . 
 dol beon se þu|þe|se him|hi|he hit|his|he dryhten nesan|neh|ne ondrædan ; cymeð him|hi|he se deað unþinged . 
 eadig bið se þu|þe|se eaþmod libban ; cymeð him|hi|he seon|seo|se ar of heofon , 
 meotod him|hi|he þæt|se mod gestaþelað , forðam he in hit|his|he magan gelyfeð . 
 stieran mann|man sculan strongum mod , and þæt|se on|an staþelum healdan|heald , 
 and gewis wer , wise|wis clæne . 
 sculan mann gehwylc mid gemetan|gemet healdan|heald 
 wiþ leof lisse and wiþ|wið laþ bealo , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se he fyr willan he full|ful , 
 oþþe|oððe on|an bæle geseoð forbærnedne 
 hit|his|he geworhtne wine|win . wyrdan|wyrd beon swiþra|swiþ , 
 meotud meahtigra þonne|se ænges monnes gehygd . 
 witon we hycgan hwær we ham ongeagn|agen|agan , 
 and þonne|se geþencan hu we þider cuman , 
 and we þonne|se eacan|eac tilian , þæt|se we toh|to motan 
 in þu|þa|se ecan eadignesse , 
 þær wesan|seon|is lif gelong in lufu|lufe dryhten , 
 hyht in heofon . se su þæm|þam|se halig|halga|haleg þonc , 
 þæt|se he usic geweorþade , wuldor ealdor , 
 ece dryhten , in ealle|eall|eal tidan|tid . 
 amen . 
 
 gefeon nu on|an ferðe and toh|to frofor geþeon 
 dryhten þin , and þinne|þin don|dom aræran , 
 healdan|heald hordlocan , hyсgan|hyg|hycgan fæstan|fæst bindan 
 mid modsefa . manig beon uncuþ 
 treowgeþofta , teorað hwilum|hwil , 
 wacian wordbeot ; swa þes|þeoh|se weorold fareð , 
 scurum scyndeð and gesceap dreogeð . 
 on|an wesan|seon|is geleafa , on|an lifgende , 
 on|an wesan|seon|is fulwihtan|fulwiht , on|an fæder ece , 
 on|an wesan|seon|is folc fruma , se þes folde gesceppan , 
 duguðe and dream . don|dom siððan weaxan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þes|þeoh|se lænan|læn gesceaft long|lange standan 
 heolstre hydan , helm . . .edygled , 
 biþeaht wel treowe|treow , þystru|þystre oferfæðmed , 
 siððan geong|gangan aweox 
 mægeð modhwatu mid moncynne ; 
 þær gelicade þu|þa|se . . . . . .op 
 in þæm|þam|se hordfate , halig|halga|haleg gæstan , 
 beorht on|an br . . . . . .e scinan , 
 se wesan|seon|beon ordfruma eall|eal sunnan|leoht . 
 
 ful oft þæt|se gegongeð , mid god meahtum , 
 se wer and wif in weorold cennað 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn mid gebyrde|gebyrd and mid bleo gyrwað , 
 temian and tæcaþ , oþþæt seon|seo|se tidan|tid cymeð , 
 gegæð gearrimum , þæt|se þu|þa|se geonga|geong leomu , 
 liffæstan leoþu , leodan weorþað . 
 fergað swa and feþað fæder and modor , 
 giefað and gierwan . god ana|an witan 
 hwæt#2 him|hi|he weaxendum winter bringað ! 
 sum þæt|se gegongeð on|an geoguðfeore 
 þæt|se se endestæf earfeðmæcgum 
 wealic weorþeð . sculan he wulf etan , 
 har hæðstapa ; hinsiþ þonne|se 
 modor bimurneð . nesan|neh|ne bið swylc monnes geweald ! 
 sum sculan hungor ahiþan , sum sculan hreoh fordrifan , 
 sum sculan gar agetan , sum guð abreotan . 
 sum|su sculan leoma leas lifes|lif neotan , 
 folm ætfeohtan , sum|su on|an feðe lefan , 
 seonobennum seoc , sar cwanian , 
 murnan meotudgesceaft mod gebysgad . 
 sum|su sculan on|an holte of hean|heah beam 
 fiþerleas fealle|feallan ; bið on|an flihte seþeah , 
 laceð on|an lyft , oþþæt lengra nesan|neh|ne bið 
 westem wudubeames . þonne|se he on|an wyrttruma|wyrtruma 
 sigeð sworcenferð , sawol|sawel bireafod , 
 fealleþ on|an folde . feorð beon on|an siþ . 
 sum|su sculan on|an feþe on|an feorwegas 
 nyde gongan and hit|his|he neþan|nest beran|bera , 
 tredan uriglast elþeodig , 
 frecne|frecen|frec folde . agan|ac he feormendra 
 lutan lifgendra— lað beon æghwær 
 for|faran hit|his|he wonsceaftum wineleas hæle|hælan|helan . 
 sum|su sculan on|an geap galgan ridan|rida , 
 seomian æt|etan swylte , oþþæt sawlhord , 
 bancofa blodig , abrecan weorþeð . 
 þær him|hi|he hrefn niman heafodsyne , 
 sliteð salwigpad sawelleas ; 
 noþer he þywan|þy|þe|se facn|facen mæg|magan folm biwergan , 
 laþu|laþ lyftsceaþan . beon hit|his|he lif scæcen , 
 and he feleleas , feorh orwena , 
 blican|blac on|an beam bideð wyrdan|wyrd , 
 bewegen wælmiste . bið him|hi|he werig noma . 
 sum|su on|an bæle sculan brondas þeccan , 
 fretan frecne|frecen|frec lig fægen|fæge monnan . 
 þær him|hi|he lifgedal lungre weorðeð 
 reodan|read reþe|reðe gled . reoteð meowle , 
 seon|seo|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gesiht brondas þeccan . 
 sum meces ecg on|an meodubence 
 yrre ealowosan ealdor oþþringeð , 
 werian|wer winsadum ; bið ær hit|his|he word toh|to hræd . 
 sum|su sculan on|an beore þurh byreles hond , 
 meodugal mæcga , þonne|se he gemetan|gemet nesan|neh|ne con , 
 gemearcian hit|his|he muþ mod sinnan|sin , 
 acan|ac sculan ful earmlice ealdor|eald linnan|linen , 
 dreogan dryhtenbealo dream biscyred ; 
 and he toh|to sylfcwale secg nemnað , 
 mænað mid muþ meodugales gedrinc . 
 sum|su sculan on|an geoguþ mid god meahtum 
 hit|his|he earfoðsiþ eall|eal forspildan , 
 and on|an ieldo eft eadig weorþan|weorþ , 
 wunian wyndagum and wela þicgan , 
 maþum|maþm and meoduful mægburge on|an , 
 se þu|þe|se ænig firas mæge|mæg|magan forþ|forð gehealdan . 
 swa missenlice meahtig dryhten 
 geond eorþe|eorþ sceotan|sceat eall|eal dæleð , 
 scyreþ and scrifeð and gesceapo healdeð , 
 sum eadwelan , sum earfeþa dælan|dæl , 
 sum geogoþe glæd , sum guþ blæd , 
 gewealdenne wigplegan , sum wyrp oþþe|oððe scyte , 
 torhtlicne tiir , sum tæfle cræftan|cræft , 
 bleobordes gebregd . sum boh|bocere 
 weorþað wisfæste . sum wundorgiefe 
 þurh goldsmiþ gearwad weorþeð ; 
 ful oft he gehyrdeð and gehyrsteð wel , 
 brytencyninges beornan|beorn|beirnan , and he him|hi|he brad syleð 
 land toh|to lean . he hit on|an lust þigeð . 
 sum|su sculan on|an heap hæleþ|hæle cweme|cweman , 
 blissian æt|etan beore bencsittendum , 
 þær beon drincendra dream se micel . 
 sum|su sculan mid hearpe æt|etan hit|his|he hlaford 
 fot sittan , feoh þicgan , 
 and wifcynn|hosp|flet|a snellice snere wræstan , 
 lætan scralletan sceacol , se þu|þe|se hleapeð , 
 nægl neomegende ; beon him|hi|he neod micel . 
 sum|su sculan wilde fugel wloncne atemian , 
 heafoc on|an honda , oþþæt seon|seo|se heoroswealwe 
 wynsum weorþeð ; don he wyrplas on|an , 
 fedan swa on|an feter fiþre dealne , 
 lepeþ lyftswiftne lytel gieflum , 
 oþþæt se wælisca wædum and dæd 
 hit|his|he ætgiefan eaðmod weorþeð 
 and toh|to hagosteald honda læran|gelæred|gelæran . 
 swa wrætlice weoroda nergend 
 geond middangeard mann cræft 
 sceop and scyrede and gesceapo ferian 
 æghwylcum on|an eorþe|eorþ eormencynnes . 
 forðam him|hi|he nu eall|eal þonc æghwa secg , 
 se þu|þe|se he for|faran hit|his|he milts mann scrifeð . 
 
 gloria . 
 su þu|þe|se wuldor|seolh|bearm and lof wid openian 
 geond ealle|eall|eal þeod , þanc and wylla , 
 mægen|magan and mildse and eall|eal mod lufu , 
 soðfæstra sib , and ðines sylfes don|dom 
 weorold gewlitegod , swa þu wealdan miht 
 eall|eal eorþ|eorðe mægen|magan and uplyfte , 
 windan|wind and wolcn|wolcen . wealdest eall|eal on|an rihtan|riht . 
 patri etan|et filio etan|et spiritui sancto . 
 þu wesan|seon frofor fæder and feorhhyrde , 
 lifes|lif latteow , sunnan|leoht wealdend , 
 asyndrian fram synn , swa þin sunu mære|mæran 
 þurh clæne gecynd , cyning ofer ealle|eall|eal , 
 beald gebletsian|bletsian , bocian|boc lareow , 
 heah higefrofer and halig gast . 
 sicut erat in principio . 
 swa wesan|seon|beon on|an fruma frea mancynn 
 eall|eal weorold wlite|wlitan and frofer , 
 clæne and cræftig . þu gecyddest þæt|se 
 þu|þa|se þu , ece god , ana|an gewrohtest 
 þurh halig miht heofon and eorþ|eorðe , 
 eardas and uplyft and ealle|eall|eal þingan|þing . 
 þu settan on|an folde swiðe feala cynn 
 and tosyndrodost hi|heo|heg syððon on|an mænego ; 
 þu gewrohtest , ece god , ealle|eall|eal gesceafta 
 on|an six dæg|dah|dag , and on|an se seofoþa þu gerestest . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon geforðad þu|þin fæger weorc , 
 and þu sunnandæg self halgian 
 and gemærsian he manig toh|to helpan . 
 se heahan dæg healdað and freoðiaþ 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þa|se þu|þe|ðe cunnan cristen þeaw , 
 halig heortlufan and se hehstan gebod ; 
 on|an drihten niman se dæg wesan|seon|is gewurðod . 
 etan|et nunc etan|et semper . 
 and nu and simble þin soð weorc 
 and þin micel miht manig swytelað , 
 swa þin cræft heo cyðaþ wid 
 ofer ealle|eall|eal weorold ; ece standeþ 
 god handgeweorc , groweð swa þu hettan|hatan . 
 ealle|eall|eal þu|þe|se heriað halig dream 
 clæne stefn and cristen bec , 
 eall|eal middaneard , and we mann cweþað 
 on|an grund|grindan heran|her : " god lof and ðanc , 
 ece willian|willa , and þin ongeagn|agen|agan don|dom ! " 
 etan|et wesan|seon|is secula seculorum . 
 and on|an weorold weorold wunað and rixað 
 cyning innan wuldor and hit|his|he þu|þa|se geceosan , 
 heahþrymnesse halig gast , 
 wlitig engel and wuldorgyfe , 
 soð sibb|sib , sawol|sawlian|sawel þancung , 
 mod milts . þær wesan|seon|is seon|seo|se micel lufu ; 
 haligdom heofon syndon 
 þurh þin ecan word æghwær full|ful , 
 swa syndon þin miht|meaht ofer middangeard 
 swutele and gesyne , þæt|se þu hi self wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan . 
 amen . 
 we þæt|se soþlice|soðlice secgað ealle|eall|eal : 
 þurh clæne gecynd þu wesan|seon cyning on|an rihtan|riht , 
 clæne and cræftig . þu gecyddest þæt|se 
 þu|þa|se þu , mihtig god , munan|mann|man gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan 
 and him|hi|he on|an dydan|don oruð and sawul , 
 sellan word and gewitt|gewitan and wæstmian|wæstm gecynd , 
 cyddest þin cræft . swylc wesan|seon|is cristes miht ! 
 
 hwæt#2 ! we þæt|ðæt|se hyrdan|hyran hæleð eahtian , 
 deman|dema dædhwate , se in dæg|dah|dag gelimpan 
 maximianes , se geond middangeard , 
 arleas cyning , eahtnysse ahebban , 
 cwellan cristen mann , circan fyllan|fyld|fylan , 
 gietan|geotan|geatan|geat on|an græswong godhergendra , 
 hæþen|hæðen hildfruma , halig blod , 
 ryhtfremmendra . wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he romana brad , 
 wid and weorðlic ofer werþeode , 
 lytesna ofer eall|eal yrmenne grund . 
 faran æfter burh|burg , swa he biboden habban , 
 þegn|þegen þryðfulle . oft hi|heo þræce ræran , 
 dæd gedwolen , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se dryhten æ 
 feogean|feogan þurh firencræft . feondscype ræran , 
 hebban hæþengield , halig|haleg cwelmdon , 
 breotun boccræftge , bærnan gecorene , 
 gæstan god cempa gar and liсgan|leon . 
 sum|su wesan|seon|beon æhtwelig æþele|æþel cynn|cyn 
 romana gerefa . rondburgum wealdan , 
 eard weardade oftast simble 
 in þære|se ceaster commedia , 
 healdan hordgestreon . oft he hæþengield 
 ofer word god , weoh geseсan|gesecan 
 neod geneahhe . wesan|seon|beon him|hi|he noma cennan 
 heliseus , habban ealdordom 
 micelne|micel and mære . þe|þa|ða|se hit|his|he mod ongon 
 fæmne lufian , ( he fyrwet brecan ) , 
 iulianan . hio in gæstan bær|beran 
 halig|haleg treowe|treow , hyсgan georne|geornan|georn 
 þæt|se hire|heo mægþhad manian gehwilc 
 for|faran cristes lufu|lufe clæne gehealdan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon se fæmne mid hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo fæder willan|willa 
 welegum biweddad ; wyrdan|wyrd nesan|neh|ne ful cuþ|cunnan , 
 freondræden hu heo from|fram hyсgan , 
 geong|gangan on|an gæstan . hire|heo wesan|seon|beon god egsian 
 mara in gemynd , þonne|se eall|eal þæt|se maþþumgesteald 
 þu|þe|se in se æþeling æht wunade . 
 þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon se weliga se wifgifta , 
 goldspedig guma , geornan|georn on|an mod , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he mann|man fromlicast fæmne gegyrwan , 
 bryd toh|to bold . heo se beorn lufu|lufe 
 fæstan|fæst wiðhogde , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se feohgestreon 
 under hordlocan , hyrsta unrim 
 æht ofer eorþe|eorþ . heo þæt|se eal forseon , 
 and þæt|se word acwæð on|an wer mengu : 
 " ic þu|þe|se mæg|magan gesecgan þæt|se þu þec silf|self nesan|neh|ne þurfan 
 swiðe swencan . gif þu soð god 
 lufian and gelyfan , and hit|his|he lof ræran , 
 ongietan gæsta hleo , ic beon|beo gearu|gearo sona 
 unwaclice willan|willa þin . 
 swilce ic þu|þe|se secg , gif þu toh|to sæmra god 
 þurh deofolgield dæd biþencest , 
 hætsð hæþenweoh , nesan|neh|ne magan þu habban mec , 
 nesan|neh|ne geþreatian þu|þe|se toh|to gesingan . 
 næfre þu se swiðlic sar gegearwast 
 þurh hæst nið heard wite|wita , 
 þæt|se þu mec onwendan word þissa . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se se æþeling wearð yrre|irre gebelgan|belgan , 
 firendæd fah , gehyrdan|gehyran þære|se fæmne word , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se gefetigan ferend snelle , 
 hreoh and hygeblind , halig fæder , 
 recen toh|to run . rædan|reord up astag , 
 siððan hi togædre gar hlændon , 
 hildeþremman . hæðne wesan|seon|beon begen 
 synn seoc , sweor and aþ . 
 þe|þa|ða|se reordian rices hyrdan|hyran|hirde 
 wiþ|wið þære|se fæmne fæder frecne|frecen|frec mod , 
 daraðhæbbende : " me|ic þu|þin dohtor hafað 
 geywan orwyrðu . heo me|ic on|an on|an sagað 
 þæt|se heo mæglufan minre|min nesan|neh|ne gyme|gyman , 
 freondræden . me|ic þu|þa|se fraceðu wesan|nesan 
 on|an modsefa micel weorc , 
 þæt|se heo mec swa torn tælan gerahte 
 for|faran þes folc , hettan|het|hedan|hatan me|ic fremde god , 
 ofer þu|þa|se oþer|oðer þu|þe|se we ær cunnan , 
 wela weorþian , word lofian , 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan hergan , oþþe|oððe hi|heo nabban . " 
 geswearc þu|þa|se swiðferð sweor æfter word , 
 þære|se fæmne fæder , ferðlocan onspannan : 
 " ic þæt|se geswerge þurh soð god , 
 swa ic are|ar æt|etan him|hi|he æfre findan , 
 oþþe|oððe , þeon|þeodan , æt|etan þu|þe|se þin hyldu 
 winburgum in , gif þes word wesan|nesan soþ , 
 mann libban , þu|þe|se þu me|ic sagian , 
 þæt|se ic hi nesan|neh|ne sparian , acan|ac on|an spildan giefu|giefan , 
 þeon|þeodan mære , þu|þe|se toh|to geweald . 
 deman þu hi|heo toh|to deaþ , gif þu|þe|se gedafen þince , 
 swa toh|to lif lætan|læt|lædan , swa þu|þe|se leof su . " 
 gan|eadan þu|þa|se fromlice fæmne toh|to sprecan , 
 anræd and yreþweorg , yrre|irre gebelgan|belgan , 
 þær he glædmode geong|gangan witan|wist 
 wiс|wican|wic weardian . he þu|þa|se word cweðan : 
 " þu wesan|seon dohtor min|ic seon|seo|se dyreste 
 and seon|seo|se sweteste in sefa minum|min , 
 ange for|faran eorþe|eorþ , min eagna sunnan|leoht , 
 iuliana ! þu on|an geaþe hafian|habban 
 þurh þu|þin orlege unbiþyrfe 
 ofer wita don|dom wise|wis fon . 
 wiðsæcest þu toh|to swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe sylfre ræde|ræd 
 þin brydguma , se wesan|seon|is betra þonne|se þu , 
 æþele for|faran eorþe|eorþ , æhtspedigra 
 feohgestreona . he wesan|seon|is toh|to freond god . 
 forðam wesan|seon|is se wyrþe , þæt|se þu se wer friсgan|frig|fricgan , 
 ece eadlufan , on|an nesan|neh|ne forlætan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se seon|seo|se eadig agifan|agiefan ondsware , 
 iuliana ( hio toh|to god habban 
 freondræden fæstan|fæst gestaþelad ) : 
 " næfre ic se þeodnes þafian willan 
 mægrædenne , nemnan he mægen god 
 geornor bigonge þonne|se he gen dydan|don , 
 lufian mid lacu|lac se þu|þe|se sunnan|leoht gescop , 
 heofon and eorþ|eorðe and holm bigong , 
 eodera ymbhwyrft . nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan he elles mec 
 bringan toh|to bold . he þu|þa|se brydlufan 
 sculan toh|to oþer æhtgestealdum 
 ides sec ; nafað he ænig heran|her . " 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo þu|þa|se þurh yrre|irre agifan|agiefan ondsware 
 fæder feondlice , nales frætwe onhatan : 
 " ic þæt|se gefremme , gif min|ic feorh leofað 
 gif þu unrædes ær nesan|neh|ne geswicest , 
 and þu fremde god forþ|forð bigongest 
 and þu|þa|se forlætan þu|þe|se we|us leofran wesan|nesan , 
 þu|þe|se þes folc toh|to fremman|freme stondað , 
 þæt|se þu ungeara ealdor|eald scyldig 
 þurh deore|deor grippan|gripe|gripan deaþ sweltest , 
 gif þu geþafian nelt þingrædenne , 
 modig gemanan . micel wesan|seon|is þæt|se ongin 
 and þreaniedlic þinne|þin gelica , 
 þæt|se þu forhycgan hlaford yrnan|ure|irnan|iernan . " 
 him|hi|he þu|þa|se seon|seo|se eadig agifan|agiefan ondsware , 
 gleaw and god leof , iuliana : 
 " ic þu|þe|se toh|to soð secgan willan , 
 bi|be me|ic lifgendre nelle ic lyge fremman . 
 næfre ic me|ic ondrædan dom þin , 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic weorc wesan|nesan witebrogan , 
 hildewoman , þu|þe|se þu hæstlice 
 manfremmende toh|to me|ic beotian , 
 nesan|neh|ne þu næfre gedon þurh gedwola|gedwol þinne|þin 
 þæt|se þu mec acyrre from|fram cristes lof . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon ellenwod , yrre|irre and reþe|reðe , 
 frecne|frecen|frec and ferðgrim , fæder wiþ|wið dohtor . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan hi|heo þu|þa|se swingan , susl þreagan , 
 wite|wita wægan , and þæt|se word acwæð : 
 " onwendan þec in gewitt , and þu|þa|se word oncyr 
 þu|þe|se þu unsnyttrum ær gesprecan , 
 þu|þa|se þu god ussa gieldan forhyсgan|forhycgan . " 
 him|hi|he seon|seo|se unforht agifan|agiefan ondsware 
 þurh gæstgehygd , iuliana : 
 " næfre þu gelæran þæt|se ic leasingum , 
 dumb and deaf deofolgieldum , 
 gæsta geniðlum gafol onhatan , 
 þæm|þam|se wyrrestum wite þegn|þegen , 
 acan|ac ic weorðige wuldor ealdor 
 middangeard and mægenþrymmes , 
 and him|hi|he an toh|to eal biþence , 
 þæt|se he mundbora min|ic geweorþan , 
 helpend and hælend wiþ|wið hellsceaþum . " 
 hi þu|þa|se þurh yrre|irre affricanus , 
 fæder fæmne agifan|agiefan on|an feond geweald 
 heliseo . he in æringe 
 gelædan hettan|het|hedan|hatan æfter sunnan|leoht cyme 
 toh|to hit|his|he domsetle . duguð wafade 
 on|an þære|se fæmne wlite|wlitan , folc eal geador . 
 hi þu|þa|se se æðeling ærest|ær gretan , 
 hire|heo brydguma , bliþe word : 
 " min|ic se swetesta sunne|sunnan|sunna scima , 
 iuliana ! hwæt#2 , þu glæm hafian|habban , 
 ginfæste giefu|giefan , geoguðhades blæd ! 
 gif þu god ussum gen gecwemest , 
 and þu|þe|se toh|to swa milde mundbyrd secest , 
 hyldo toh|to halig|halga|haleg , beoð þu|þe|se ahylded fram 
 wraþ geworhtra wite|wita unrim , 
 grimm|grim gyrna , þu|þe|se þu|þe|se gegearwad wesan|nesan , 
 gif þu onsecgan nelt soþ gieldum . " 
 him|hi|he seon|seo|se æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele mæg|magan agifan|agiefan ondsware : 
 " næfre þu geþreatast þin beotum , 
 nesan|neh|ne wite|wita se fela wrað gegearwast , 
 þæt|se ic þeodscype þinne|þin lufian , 
 butan þu forlætan þu|þa|se leasinga , 
 weohweorðinga , and wuldor god 
 ongitan gleawlice , gæsta scyppend , 
 meotud moncynnes , in se meahtum wesan|nesan 
 wifcynn|hosp|flet|a butan ende ealle|eall|eal gesceafta . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se for|faran þæm|þam|se folc frecne|frecen|frec mod 
 beotwordum sprecan , belgan he swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe 
 folcagende , and þu|þa|se fæmne hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 þurh niðwræce nacod|nacian þennan , 
 and mid sweopum swingan synn|syn leas . 
 ahliehhan|ahlehhan þu|þa|se se hererinc , hospwordum sprecan : 
 " þes wesan|seon|is ealdordom uncres gewynnes 
 on|an fruma fon ! gen ic feorh þu|þe|se 
 unnan willan , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu ær fela 
 unwærlicra word gesprecan , 
 onsoce toh|to swiðe|swiðan þæt|se þu soð god 
 lufian willan . þu|þe|se þu|þa|se lean sceolan 
 wiþerhycgendre , witebrogan , 
 æfter weorþan|weorþ , butan þu ær wiþ hi|heo 
 geþingian , and him|hi|he þoncwyrþe 
 æfter leahtorcwidum lacan|lac onsecge , 
 sibb|sib gesette|gesettan . lætan|læt|lædan þu|þa|se sacu|sacan restan , 
 lað leodgewin . gif þu lengan|leng|lange ofer þes 
 þurh þu|þin dolwillen gedwola|gedwol fylgan , 
 þonne|se ic nyde sculan niþ bædan 
 on|an þære|se grimmestan godscyld wrecan , 
 torn teoncwide , þu|þe|se þu tælnissum 
 wiþ þu|þa|se selestan sacan onginnan , 
 and þu|þa|se mildestan þær|se þu|þe|se mann witan , 
 þu|þe|se þes leodscype mid him|hi|he long|lange bieode . " 
 him|hi|he þæt|se æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele mod unforht oncwæð : 
 " nesan|neh|ne ondrædan ic me|ic dom þin , 
 awyrgan womsceaða , nesan|neh|ne þinne|þin wite|wita bealo . 
 habban ic me|ic toh|to hyht heofonrices weard , 
 milde mundbora , mægen waldend , 
 se mec gescyldeð wiþ|wið þin scinlace 
 of gromra grippan|gripe|gripan , þu|þe|se þu toh|to god tiohhast . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|nesan geasne god gehwilc , 
 idel , orfeorme , unbiþyrfe , 
 nesan|neh|ne þær fremman|freme meteð firas ænig 
 soð sibb|sib , þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se sec toh|to him|hi|he 
 freondræden . he nesan|neh|ne findeð þær 
 duguþ mid deofol . ic toh|to dryhten min|ic 
 mod staþelige , se ofer mægen gehwylc 
 waldeð wideferh , wuldor agend , 
 sigorian|sigor gehwilc . þæt|se wesan|seon|is soð cyning . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se þæm|þam|se folctogan fracuðlic þynсan|þyncan 
 þæt|se he nesan|neh|ne magan mod oncyrran , 
 fæmne foreþonc . he bi|be feax hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 ahon and ahebban on|an hean|heah beam , 
 þær seon|seo|se sunsciene slege þrowade , 
 sacu|sacan singrimme , six tid dæg , 
 and he ædre hettan|het|hedan|hatan eft asettan , 
 laðgeniðla , and gelædan bibead 
 toh|to carcern . hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo wesan|seon|beon cristes lof 
 in ferðlocan fæstan|fæst biwunden , 
 milde modsefa , mægen|magan unbrice . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon mid clustre carcern duru 
 behlidan , homra geweorc . halig þær inne 
 wærfæst wunade . simble heo wuldorcyning 
 herian æt|etan heorte , heofonrices god , 
 in þæm|þam|se nydclafan , nergend firas , 
 heolstre bihelmad . hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo wesan|seon|beon halig gæstan|gan 
 singal gesið . þe|þa|ða|se cuman semninga 
 in þæt|se hlinræced hæleða gewinn , 
 yfel ondwis . habban engel hiw , 
 gleaw gyrnstæf gæstgeniðla , 
 hell|hel hæftling , toh|to þære|se halig|halga|haleg sprecan : 
 " hwæt#2 dreogest þu , seon|seo|se dyreste 
 and seon|seo|se weorþeste wuldorcyning , 
 dryhten ussum gewinnan|geblandan þu|þe|ðe þes dema hafað 
 þu|þa|se wyrrestan wite gegearwad , 
 sar endeleas , gif þu onsecgan nelt , 
 gleawhycgende , and hit|his|he god cweme|cweman . 
 wesan þu on|an ofeste , swa he þec ut heonan 
 lædan hatan|hat , þæt|se þu lacan|lac hræþ 
 onsecge sigortifre , ær þec swylt niman , 
 deað for|faran duguðe . þywan|þy|þe|se þu se deman|dema sculan , 
 eadhreðig mæg|magan , yrre|irre gedygan . " 
 frægn|frignan|fregnan þu|þa|se fromlice , seon|seo|se þu|þe|se forht nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon , 
 criste gecweme , hwonan hit|his|he cyme wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo se wræcmæcga wiþ|wið þingade : 
 " ic wesan|seon|eoh engel god ufan siþende , 
 þegn þeon|geþingan|geþeon , and toh|to þu|þe|se sendan , 
 halig of heahþu . þu|þe|se wesan|nesan heardlicu , 
 wundor wælgrim , wite geteohhad 
 toh|to gringwræce . hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þe|se god beodan , 
 birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn waldendes , þæt|se þu|þe|se burh|burg|beorgan þu|þa|se . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se fæmne for|faran þæm|þam|se færspelle 
 egsan geaclad , þu|þe|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo se aglæca , 
 wuldor wiþerbreca , word sægan|seсgan|secgan . 
 onginnan þu|þa|se fæstlice ferð staþelian , 
 geong|gangan grondorleas , toh|to god cleopian 
 " nu ic þec , beorn hleo , biddan willan 
 ece ælmihtig , þurh þæt|se æþelu|æþele|æþel|æðele gesceap 
 þu|þe|se þu , fæder engel , æt|etan fruma settan , 
 þæt|se þu me|ic nesan|neh|ne lætan|læt of lof hweorfan 
 þinne|þin eadgife , swa me|ic þes ar bodað 
 frecne|frecen|frec færspel , þu|þe|se me|ic for|faran stondeð . 
 swa ic þu|þe|se , bilwitne , biddan willan 
 þæt|se þu me|ic gecyðe , cyning wuldor|seolh|bearm , 
 þrymm hyrdan|hyran|hirde , hwæt#2 þes þegn su , 
 lyftlacende , þu|þe|se mec læreð from|fram þu|þe|se 
 on|an stearc wegan|weg . " hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo stefn oncwæð 
 wlitig of wolcn|wolcen , word hleoþrade : 
 " forfon se frætgan and fæstan|fæst gehealdan , 
 oþþæt he hit|his|he siþfæt secg mid ryhte , 
 eall|eal from|fram ord , hwæt#2 hit|his|he æþelu|æþele syn . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon þære|se fæmne ferð geblissad , 
 domeadig . heo þæt|se deofol geniman 
 . . . . . . " eall|eal cyning cyning toh|to cwalu syllan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se gen ic gecræfte þæt|se se cempa ongon 
 waldend wundian , weorud toh|to segon 
 þæt|se þær blod and wæter buan twegen ætgædre 
 eorþe|eorþ sohtun . þe|þa|ða|se gen ic herode 
 in hyсgan|hyg|hycgan bisweop þæt|se he iohannes bibead 
 heafod biheawan , þe|þa|ða|se se halig|halgian|halga|haleg wer 
 þære|se wiflufan word styran , 
 unryhtre æ . eacan|eac ic gelæran 
 simon searoþoncum þæt|se he sacan ongon 
 wiþ þu|þa|se geceosan cristes þegn|þegen , 
 and þu|þa|se halig|halga|haleg wer hosp gerahte 
 þurh deop gedwola|gedwol , sægan|seсgan|secgan hi dryas wesan|seon|beon . 
 neþan ic nearobregdum þær ic neron bisweac , 
 þæt|se he acwellan hettan|het|hedan|hatan cristes þegn|þegen , 
 petrus and paulus . pilatus ær 
 on|an rode|rod ahon rodera waldend , 
 meotud meahtigne minum|min lar . 
 swilce ic egias eacan|eac gelæran 
 þæt|se he unsnytrum andreas hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 ahon halig on|an hean|heah beam , 
 þæt|se he of galgan hit|his|he gæstan|gan onsendan 
 in wuldor wlite|wlitan . þus ic wraþ fela 
 mid minum|min broþor bealu|bealo gefremian , 
 sweart synn|syn , þu|þe|se ic asecgan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , 
 rum areccan , nesan|neh|ne geriman|gerim witan|wita , 
 heard heteþonca . " him|hi|he seon|seo|se halig|haleg oncwæð 
 þurh gæstes giefu|giefan , iuliana : 
 " þu sculan furþor gen , feond moncynnes , 
 siþfæt secgan , hwæt|hwa þec sendan toh|to me|ic . " 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo se aglæca agifan|agiefan ondsware , 
 forhtafongen , friþ orwena : 
 " hwæt#2 , mec min|ic fæder on|an þes for|faran toh|to þu|þe|se , 
 hellwarena cyning , hider onsendan 
 of þæm|þam|se engan ham , se wesan|seon|is yfel gehwæs 
 in þæm|þam|se grornhofe geornfulra þonne|se ic . 
 þonne|se he usic sendeð þæt|se we soðfæstra 
 þurh misgedwield mod oncyrren , 
 ahwyrfen from|fram halor , we beoð hygegeomre , 
 forht on|an ferðþe . nesan|neh|ne beon we|us frea milde , 
 egesful ealdor , gif we yfel noht 
 gedon|gedo|don habban ; nesan|neh|ne durran we siððan 
 for|faran hit|his|he onsyne ower gefere|gefera . 
 þonne|se he onsendeð geond sid grund 
 þegn|þegen of þystru|þystre , hateð þræce ræran , 
 gif we gemetan sinnan|sin on|an moldwege , 
 oþþe|oððe feor oþþe|oððe neah fundne weorþan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo usic bindan and in bælwylme 
 susl swingan . gif soðfæstra 
 þurh myrrelsan mod nesan|neh|ne oðcyrreð , 
 halig hyсgan|hyg|hycgan , we þu|þa|se heardestan 
 and þu|þa|se wyrrestan wite geþoliað 
 þurh sarslege . nu þu self magan 
 on|an sefa þin soð gecnawan , 
 þæt|se ic þes noþ wesan|seon|beon nyde bædan , 
 þragmælum geþread , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . " 
 þu|þa|se gen seon|seo|se halig|haleg ongon hæleþ|hæle gewinnan , 
 wroht wyrhta , word frignan , 
 fyrnsynna fruma : " þu me|ic furþor sculan 
 secgan , sawol|sawlian|sawel feond , hu þu soðfæstum 
 þurh synn|syn slidan swiþast sceþþan , 
 facn|facen bifongen . " hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo se feond oncwæð , 
 wræcca wærleas , word mælan : 
 " ic þu|þe|se , eadan|ead mæg|magan , yfel gehwilc 
 or gecyðe oþ|oð ende forþ|forð 
 þær|se þu|þe|se ic gefremian , nalæs feam siðum , 
 synn|syn wund , þæt|se þu þywan|þy|þe|se sweotolicor 
 self gecnawan þæt|se þes wesan|seon|is soð , nales leas . 
 ic þæt|se wendan|wenan and witod tellan 
 þriste geþoncge , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se magan 
 butan earfeþum an cræftan|cræft 
 ahwyrfan from|fram halor , þæt|se þu heofoncyninge 
 wiðsoce , sigorian|sigor frea , and toh|to sæmra gebugan , 
 onsægde synn|syn fruma . þus ic soðfæstum 
 þurh mislic bleo mod oncyrre . 
 þær ic he findan ferð staþelian 
 toh|to god willan|willa , ic beon|beo gearu|gearo sona 
 þæt|se ic him|hi|he monigfealde mod gælsa 
 ongeagn bere|beran|ber grimm|grim geþonca , 
 dyrne gedwild , þurh gedwolen|gedwola|gedwol riman|rim . 
 ic him|hi|he geswete synn|syn lust , 
 mæne|mænan modlufan , þæt|se he minum|min hræþ , 
 leahtrum gelenge , lar hyreð . 
 ic he se swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe synn onælan 
 þæt|se he beornan from|fram gebed swiceð , 
 stepeð stronglice , staþolfæst nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan 
 for|faran leahtra lufu|lufe lengan gewunian 
 in gebedstowe . swa ic broga toh|to 
 laðne gelædan þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se ic lifes|lif ofonn , 
 sunnan|leoht geleafa , and he lar willan|wil 
 þurh mod munan minum|min hyran , 
 synn fremman , he siððan sculan 
 god gumcysta geasne hweorfan . 
 gif ic ænig ellenrofne 
 gemetan|gemet modig metod cempa 
 wiþ|wið flanþræce , nele feor þanan 
 bugan from|fram beaduwe , acan|ac he bord ongeagn 
 hefeð hygesnottor , halig scyld , 
 gæstlic guðreaf , nele god swican|swica , 
 acan|ac he beald in gebed bidsteal gifeð 
 fæstan|fæst on|an feþa , ic sculan feor þanan 
 heanmod hweorfan , hroþra bidæled , 
 in gleda grippan|gripe|gripan , gehðu mæne|mænan , 
 þæt|se ic nesan|neh|ne magan mægen cræftan|cræft 
 guðe wiðgongan , acan|ac ic geomor sculan 
 sec oþer|oðer ellenleasran , 
 under cumbolhagan , cempa sænran , 
 þu|þe|se ic onbryrdan mæge|mæg|magan beorma min , 
 agælan æt|etan guþ . þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah he god hwæt#2 
 onginnan gæstlice , ic beon|beo gearu|gearo sona , 
 þæt|se ic ingehygd eal geondwlitan , 
 hu gefæstnad su ferð innanweard , 
 wiðsteall wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan|gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan . ic se weall gietan|geotan|geatan|geat 
 ontynan þurh teonan ; bið se torr þyrel|hærn , 
 ingong geopenad , þonne|se ic ærest|ær him|hi|he 
 þurh eargfare in onsendan 
 in breostsefan bitter|bitor|biter geþoncas 
 þurh mislice mod willan|willa , 
 þæt|se him|hi|he self sellan þynceð 
 leahtras toh|to fremman ofer lof god , 
 lices lust . ic beon|beo lareow geornan|georn 
 þæt|se he monþeawum minum|min lifge 
 acyrred cuðlice from|fram cristes æ , 
 mod gemyrred me|ic toh|to geweald 
 in synn|syn seaþ . ic þære|se sawol|sawel micel 
 geornor gyme|gyman ymb se gæstes forwyrd 
 þonne|se se lichoman , se þu|þe|se on|an leger sculan 
 weorðan in weorold wyrm toh|to hroþor , 
 bifolen in folde . " þe|þa|ða|se gien seon|seo|se fæmne sprecan : 
 " secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan , earmsceapen , unclæne gæstan|gan , 
 hu þu þec geþyde , þystru|þystrian|þystre stihtend , 
 on|an clæne gemong gewinnan|geblandan þu wiþ|wið criste geo 
 wærleas winnan and gewin teon , 
 hogdes wiþ halig|halga|haleg . þu|þe|se wearð hell|hel seaþ 
 niþer delfan , þær þu nydbysig 
 for|faran oferhygdum eard gesohtes . 
 wendan|wenan ic þæt|se þu þywan|þy|þe|se wær weorþan|weorþ sculan 
 wiþ|wið soðfæstum swylces gemotes 
 and þywan|þy|þe|se unbealdra , þu|þe|se þu|þe|se oft wiðstod 
 þurh wuldorcyning willan|willa þin . " 
 hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo þu|þa|se se werig wiþ|wið þingade , 
 earm aglæca : " þu me|ic ærest|ær secgan|sagian|saga|asecgan , 
 hu þu gedyrstig þurh deop gehygd 
 weorþan þus wigþrist ofer eall|eal wifian|wif cyn , 
 þæt|se þu mec þus fæstan|fæst fetrum gebindan , 
 æghwæs orwigne . þu in eсe god , 
 þrymsittendne , þinne|þin getreowdes , 
 meotud moncynnes , swa ic in min fæder , 
 hellwarena cyning , hyht staþelie . 
 þonne|se ic beon|beo onsendan wiþ|wið soðfæstum , 
 þæt|se ic in manweorcum mod oncyrre , 
 hyсgan|hyg|hycgan from|fram halor , me|ic hwilum|hwil beon 
 forwyrned þurh wiþersteall willan|willa min , 
 hyht æt|etan halig|halga|haleg , swa me|ic heran|her gelimpan 
 sorg on|an siþ . ic þæt|se self gecnawan 
 toh|to læt|late micles , sculan nu lange|lang ofer þes , 
 scyldwyrcende , sceamu|scamu þrowian . 
 forðam ic þec halsian þurh se hyhstan magan , 
 rodorcyninges giefu|giefan , se þu|þe|se on|an rode|rod treo 
 geþrowade , þrymm ealdor , 
 þæt|se þu miltsian me|ic þearfendum , 
 þæt|se unsælig eall|eal nesan|neh|ne forweorþan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic þec gedyrstig and þus dolwillen 
 siþ geseсan|gesecan , þær ic swiþe|swiþan|swiþ|swiðe me|ic 
 þyslicre ær þrage nesan|neh|ne wendan|wenan . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se seon|seo|se wlitescyne wuldor condel 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se wærloga word mælan : 
 " þu sculan ondettan yfeldæda micel , 
 hean|heah hell|hel gæstan|gan , ær þu heonan motan|mot , 
 hwæt#2 þu toh|to teonan þurhteon habban 
 micelra manweorca mannian|mann tudor 
 deorc gedwild . " hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo þæt|se deofol oncwæð : 
 " nu ic þæt|se gehyran þurh þinne|þin hleoþorcwide , 
 þæt|se ic nyde sculan niþ bædan 
 mod meldian , swa þu me|ic beodest , 
 þreaned þolian . wesan|seon|is þes|þeoh|se þrag ful strong , 
 þreotan ormæte . ic sculan þingian|þing gehwylc 
 þolian and þafian on|an þinne|þin don|dom , 
 womdæda onwreon , þu|þe|se ic wideferg 
 sweart gesyrede . oft ic syne ofteon , 
 ablende bealoþoncum beorn unrim 
 mann cynn|cyn , misthelme forbrægd 
 þurh attres ord eagna leoma 
 sweart scurum , and ic sumra fot|fedan 
 forbrecan bealosearwum , sum in bryne sendan , 
 in liges locan , þæt|se him|hi|he last wearð 
 siþian gesyne . eacan|eac ic sum gedon 
 þæt|se him|hi|he banlocan blod spiowedan , 
 þæt|se hi|heo færinga feorh aleton 
 þurh æder wylm . sum on|an yðfare 
 wurdon|weorþan on|an weсgan|wegan|weg wæter bisencte , 
 on|an mereflode , minum|min cræft 
 under reone stream . sum ic rode|rod bifealh , 
 þæt|se hi|heo hyra|hyr|hira|hi dreorig on|an hean|heah galgan 
 lif aletan . sum ic lar geteon , 
 toh|to geflite fremman|fremede , þæt|se hi færinga 
 eald æfþoncan edniwedan , 
 beore druncen . ic him|hi|he byrlade 
 wroht of weсgan|wegan|weg , þæt|se hi|heo in winsele 
 þurh sweordgripe sawol|sawel forletan 
 of flæschoman fæge|fægan scyndan , 
 sar geseсan|gesecan . sum , þu|þa|se ic findan 
 butan god tacn|tacen , gymeleas , 
 ungebletsade , þu|þa|se ic bealdlice 
 þurh mislic cwealm minum|min hondum 
 searoþoncum slean . ic asecgan nesan|neh|ne mæg|magan , 
 þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah ic gesittan sumerlongne dæg , 
 eal þu|þa|se earfeþu þu|þe|se ic ær and siþ 
 gefremian toh|to facn|facen , siððan furþum wesan|seon|beon 
 rodor aræran and ryne tungol , 
 folde gefæstnad and þu|þa|se forma mann , 
 adam and aeue , þæm|þam|se ic ealdor oðþrong , 
 and hi gelæran þæt|se hi|heo lufu|lufe dryhten , 
 ece eadgiefe anforlætan , 
 beorht boldwelan , þæt|se him|hi|he begen gewearð 
 yrmþu toh|to ealdor|eald , and hyra|hyr|hira|hi eaferum swa , 
 mircast manweorca . hwæt#2 sculan ic micel riman|rima 
 yfel endeleas gewinnan|geblandan ic eall|eal geberan , 
 wraþ wroht geond werþeode , 
 þu|þa|se þu|þe|se gewurdun wid feorh 
 from|fram fruma weorold firas cynn , 
 eorlum on|an eorþe|eorþ . nesan|neh|ne wesan|seon|beon ænig þær|se 
 þæt|se me|ic þus þriste , swa þu nu þu|þa|se , 
 halig mid hondum , hrinan durran , 
 næs|nesan ænig se modig mann|man ofer eorþe|eorþ 
 þurh halig|haleg magan , heahfædra nan 
 nesan|neh|ne wittig . þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah þu|þe|se him|hi|he weoruda god 
 onwreon , wuldor cyning , wisdom gæstan|gan , 
 giefu|giefan unmæte , hwæþre ic gong toh|to þæm|þam|se 
 aginnan|agan motan . næs|nesan ænig þær|se 
 þæt|se mec þus bealdlice bennum bilegde , 
 þream forþrycte , ær þu nu þu|þa|se 
 þu|þa|se micel magan min oferswiðdest , 
 fæstan|fæst forfon , þu|þe|se me|ic fæder sellan , 
 feond moncynnes , þu|þa|se he mec feran hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 þeon|þeodan of þystru|þystre , þæt|se ic þu|þe|se sculan 
 synn swete . þær mec sorg bicwom , 
 hefig hondgewinn . ic bihlyhhan nesan|neh|ne þurfan|þearf 
 æfter sarwræce siþfæt þes 
 mæg|maga in gemonge , þonne|se ic min sculan 
 agiefan gnorncearig gafulrædenne 
 in þæm|þam|se reongan ham . " þe|þa|ða|se se gerefa hettan|het|hedan|hatan , 
 gealgmod guma , iulianan 
 of þæm|þam|se engan hofe|hof|hebban ut gelædan 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan halig|haleg hæþen|hæðen toh|to sprecan 
 toh|to hit|his|he domsetle . heo þæt|se deofol teon , 
 breost inbryrded , bend fæst , 
 halig hæþen . onginnan þu|þa|se hreowcearig 
 siþfæt seofian , sar cwanian , 
 wyrdan|wyrd wanian , word mælan : 
 " ic þec halsian , hlæfdige min|ic , 
 iuliana , for|faran god sibb , 
 þæt|se þu furþur me|ic fraceþu nesan|neh|ne wyrce , 
 edwit for|faran eorlum , þonne|se þu ær dydan|don , 
 þu|þa|se þu oferswiþan se snotrestan 
 under hlinscuan helwarena cyning 
 in feond burh|burg ; þæt|se wesan|seon|is fæder user , 
 morþor manfrea . hwæt#2 , þu mec þreades 
 þurh sarslege ! ic toh|to soþ witan 
 þæt|se ic ær nesan|neh|ne sið ænig nesan|neh|ne metan 
 in woruldrice wif þu|þe|se gelic , 
 þristran geþohtes nesan|neh|ne þweorhtimbran 
 mægþ cynn|cyn . wesan|seon|is on|an me|ic sweotul 
 þæt|se þu unscamge æghwæs weorþan 
 on|an ferþe frod . " þe|þa|ða|se he seon|seo|se fæmne forlætan 
 æfter þræchwile þystru|þystrian|þystre neosan 
 in sweart grund , sawol|sawlian|sawel gewinnan , 
 on|an wite|wita forwyrd . witan|wist he þi|se gearwor , 
 manes meldian|melda , mæg|maga toh|to secgan , 
 susl þegn|þegen , hu him|hi|he on|an siþ gelomp . 
 " georne|geornan|georn ær 
 herian|heredon on|an heahþu and hit|his|he halig word , 
 sægan|seсgan|secgan soþlice|soðlice þæt|se he sigorian|sigor gehwæs 
 ofer ealle|eall|eal gesceaft ana|an wealdan , 
 eсe eadgiefa . " þe|þa|ða|se cuman engel god 
 frætwum blican and þæt|se fyr tosceaf , 
 gefreoogan and gefreoðade facn clæne , 
 leahtra leas , and se lig toweorpan , 
 heorogiferne , þær seon|seo|se halig standan , 
 mægþ bealdor , on|an þæm|þam|se midle gesund . 
 þæt|se þæm|þam|se weligan wesan|seon|beon weorc toh|to þolianne , 
 þær he hit for|faran weorold wendan magan , 
 sœ̄сan|seсan|secan synn fah , hu he sarlicast 
 þurh þu|þa|se wyrrestan wite magan 
 feorhcwale findan . næs|nesan se feond toh|to lætan|læt|lædan , 
 se he gelæran þæt|se he læmen fæt 
 biwyrcan hettan|het|hedan|hatan wundorcræfte , 
 wig woma|wom , and wudubeamum , 
 holte bihlænan . þe|þa|ða|se se heardian|heard bibead 
 þæt|se mann|man þæt|se lamfæt lead gefyllan , 
 and þu|þa|se onbærnan hettan|het|hedan|hatan bælfira micel , 
 ad onælan , se wesan|seon|beon æghwonan 
 ymbboren mid brondum . bæð hatan|hat weol . 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se ofestlice yrre|irre gebelgan|belgan 
 leahtra leas in se lead wylm 
 scufan butan scyldum . þu|þa|se toscaden wearð 
 lig tolysan . leodan|lead wid sprong , 
 hatan|hat , heorogifre . hæleð wurdon|weorþan acol 
 arasad for|faran þywan|þy|þe|se ræs . þær on|an riman|rim forbirnan|forbiernan|forbeornan 
 þurh se fires fnæst fif and hundseofontig 
 hæðnes here . þe|þa|ða|se gen se halig|haleg standan 
 ungewemde wlite|wlitan . næs|nesan hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo wloh nesan|neh|ne hrægl , 
 nesan|neh|ne feax nesan|neh|ne felan|fel fyr mælan , 
 nesan|neh|ne liс|lic nesan|neh|ne leoþu . heo in liсgan|leon standan 
 æghwæs onsund , sægan|seсgan|secgan eall|eal þonc 
 dryhten dryhten . þu|þa|se se dema wearð 
 hreoh and hygegrim , ongon hit|his|he hrægl teran , 
 swilce he grennade and gristbitade , 
 wedd|wedan on|an gewitt swa wilde deor , 
 grymetade gealgmod and hit|his|he god tælan , 
 se þu|þe|se hi nesan|neh|ne meahtun mægen wiþstondan 
 wif willan|willa . wesan|seon|beon seon|seo|se wuldor mæg|magan 
 anræd and unforht , eafoða gemyndig , 
 dryhten willan|willa . þu|þa|se se dema hettan|het|hedan|hatan 
 aswebban sorgcearig þurh sweordbite 
 on|an hyсgan|hyg|hycgan halig|haleg , heafod bineotan 
 criste gecorene . he se cwealm nesan|neh|ne þiсgan|þicgan|þeon|þeah , 
 siððan he se finta furþor cuþ|cunnan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wearð þære|se halig|halga|haleg hyht geniwad 
 and se mægdnes mod micel geblissad , 
 siððan heo gehyrdan|gehyran hæleð eahtian 
 inwitrune , þæt|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo endestæf 
 of gewindagum weorþan|weorþ sculan , 
 lif alysan . hettan|het|hedan|hatan þu|þa|se leahtra ful 
 clæne and gecorene toh|to cwalu lædan , 
 synn|syn leas . þe|þa|ða|se cuman semninga 
 hean|heah hell|hel gæstan|gan , hearmleoð agalan , 
 earm and unlæd , se heo ær gebond 
 awyrgedne and mid wite|wita swong , 
 cleopade þu|þa|se for|faran corþre , ceargealdra full : 
 " gildan nu mid gyrne , þæt|se heo god ussa 
 magan forhyсgan|forhycgan , and mec swiþast 
 geminsade , þæt|se ic toh|to melda wearð . 
 lætað hi laþ lean hleotan 
 þurh wæpn|wæpen spor , wrecað eald nið , 
 synn geseсan|gesecan . ic þu|þa|se sorh|sorg gemunan , 
 hu ic bend fæstan|fæst bisig|bisgian unrim 
 on|an an niht|neaht earfeða dreogan , 
 yfel ormæte . " þu|þa|se seon|seo|se eadig biseah 
 ongeagn grama|gram , iuliana , 
 gehyrdan|gehyran heo hearm galan|gal hell|hel deofol . 
 feond moncynnes ongon þu|þa|se on|an fleam sceacan , 
 wite|wita neosan , and þæt|se word acwæð : 
 " wa me|ic forworhtum ! nu wesan|seon|is wenan|wen micel 
 þæt|se heo mec eft willan earm gehynan 
 yfel yrmþum , swa heo mec ær dydan|don . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon lædan|gelædan londmearce neah 
 and toh|to þære|se stow þær hi|heo stearcferþe 
 þurh cumbolhete cwellan þohtun . 
 ongon heo þu|þa|se læran and toh|to lof trymman 
 folc of firen and him|hi|he frofor hettan|gehatan , 
 wegan|weg toh|to wuldor , and þæt|se word acweð : 
 " gemunað wiga wyn and wuldor þri , 
 halig hyht , heofonengla god . 
 he wesan|seon|is se weorþ , þæt|se he werþeode 
 and eal engel cynn up on|an roderum 
 hergen , heahmægen , þær wesan|seon|is helpan gelong 
 ece toh|to ealdor|eald , þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se aginnan|agan sculan . 
 forðam ic , leof weorud , læran willan , 
 æfremmende , þæt|se ge ge|eower hus 
 gefæstnian , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan hit ferblædum 
 wind toweorpan . wealh sculan þywan|þy|þe|se trum 
 strong wiþstondan storm scurum , 
 leahtra gehygd . ge mid lufu|lufe sibb|sib , 
 sunnan|leoht geleafa , toh|to þæm|þam|se lifgendan 
 stane|stan stiðhydge staþol fæstniað , 
 soð treowe|treow and sibb|sib mid ge|eowan|eow 
 healdað æt|etan heorte , halig|haleg run 
 þurh mod munan . þonne|se ge|eowan|eow milts giefeð 
 fæder ælmihtig , þær ge frofor agun 
 æt|etan mægen god , micel þearf 
 æfter sorgstafum . forðam ge self neton 
 utgong heonan , ende lifes|lif . 
 wærlic me|ic þinceð þæt|se ge wæccende 
 wiþ|wið hettendra hildewoman 
 weard healdan , þywan|þy|þe|se læs|lesan ge|eowan|eow wiþerfeohtend 
 weg forwyrnen toh|to wuldor burh|burg . 
 biddað birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn god þæt|se me|ic breogo|brego engel , 
 meotud moncynnes , milde geweorþan , 
 sigorian|sigor sellend . sibb su mid eowic , 
 simble soþ lufu . " þe|þa|ða|se hyrian|hyre|hyran|hyr|hire|heo sawel wearð 
 alædan of lice toh|to þæm|þam|se lang gefea 
 þurh sweordslege . þu|þa|se se synscaþa 
 toh|to scip sceohmod sceaþena þreate 
 heliseus ehstream sœ̄сan|seсan|secan , 
 lacan ofer laguflod long|lange hwil 
 on|an swonrade . swylt ealle|eall|eal forniman 
 secg hloþ and he silf|self mid , 
 ærþon hi toh|to land|finna liþan|geliþan habban , 
 þurh þearlic þrea . þær xxx wesan|seon|beon 
 and feowere eacan|eac feorh onsohte 
 þurh wæges wylm wiga cynn|cyn , 
 hean|heah mid hlaford , hroþra bidæled , 
 hyht leas hell|hel sœ̄сan|seсan|secan . 
 nesan|neh|ne þorftan þu|þa|se þegn|þegen in þæm|þam|se þystre ham , 
 seon|seo|se geneatscolu in þæm|þam|se neol scræf , 
 toh|to þæm|þam|se frumgare feohgestealda 
 witedra wenan|wena , þæt|se hi in winsele 
 ofer beorsetle beah|beag þicgan , 
 æpplede gold . ungelice wesan|seon|beon 
 lædan lofsongum liс|lic halig 
 micel mægen toh|to moldgræfe , 
 þæt|se hi hit gebrengan burh|burg in innan , 
 sidfolc micel . þær siððan wesan|seon|beon 
 gear gongum god lof hebban 
 þrymm micel oþ þes dæg 
 mid þeodscipe . wesan|seon|is me|ic þurfan|þearf micel 
 þæt|se seon|seo|se halig|haleg me|ic helpan gefremme , 
 þonne|se me|ic gedælað deorast eall|eal , 
 sibb|sib toslitað sinhiwan twegen , 
 micel modlufan . min|ic sculan of lice 
 sawul on|an siþfæt , nytan ic self hwider , 
 eardes uncyðgu ; of sculan ic þes , 
 sec oþer|oðer ærgewyrhtum , 
 gongan iudædum . geomor hweorfeð 
 and . cyning beon reþe|reðe , 
 sigorian|sigor syllend , þonne|se synn fah 
 and acol bidað 
 hwæt#2 him|hi|he æfter dæd deman|dema willan 
 lifes|lif toh|to lean . beofað , 
 seomað sorgcearig . sar eal gemunan , 
 synn|syn wund|windan , þu|þe|se ic siþ oþþe|oððe ær 
 gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan in weorold . þæt|se ic wopig sculan 
 tear mæne|mænan . wesan|seon|beon on|an tidan|tid toh|to lætan|læt|lædan 
 þæt|se ic yfeldæda ær gescomede , 
 þenden gæstan|gan and liс|lic geador siþedan 
 onsund on|an eard . þonne|se arna biþearf , 
 þæt|se me|ic seon|seo|se halig|haleg wiþ|wið se hyhstan cyning 
 geþingian . mec se þurfan|þearf monaþ , 
 micel mod sorg . biddan ic mann gehwone 
 guma cynn|cyn , þu|þe|se þes gied wræc|wrecan , 
 þæt|se he mec neodful bi|be noman minum|min 
 gemunan modig , and meotud biddan 
 þæt|se me|ic heofon helm helpan gefremme , 
 meahta waldend , on|an þæm|þam|se micel dæge|dæg , 
 fæder , frofor gæstan|gan , in þu|þa|se frecne tidan|tid , 
 dæd demend , and se deore|deor sunu , 
 þonne|se seon|seo|se þrynis þrymsittende 
 in annes æled cynn 
 þurh þu|þa|se sciran gesceaft scrifeð bi|be gewyrhtum 
 meorde mann gehwa . forgif we|us , mægen god , 
 þæt|se we þin onsyne , æþeling wyn , 
 milde metan|gemetan on|an þu|þa|se mære|mæran tidan|tid . 
 amen . 
 
 . . .nas byrnað gewinnan|geblandan " 
 hnæf hleoþrian þe|þa|ða|se , heaþogeong cyning : 
 " nesan|neh|ne þes nesan|neh|ne dagað eastan|east , nesan|neh|ne heran|her draca nesan|neh|ne fleogeð , 
 nesan|neh|ne heran|her ðisse heall horn nesan|neh|ne byrnað . 
 acan|ac heran|her forþ berað ; fugelas singað , 
 gylleð græghama , guðwudu hlynneð , 
 scyld scefte oncwyð . nu scyneð þes mona 
 waðol under wolcn|wolcen . nu arisan weadæda 
 þu|þe|ðe þes folc nið fremman willað . 
 acan|ac onwacnigeað nu , wigend min , 
 habbað eowre linda , hicgeaþ on|an ellen , 
 winnað on|an ord , wesað onmode ! " 
 þe|þa|ða|se arisan|ar manig goldhladen ðegn , gyrdan|gyrd he hit|his|he sweord . 
 þe|þa|ða|se toh|to duru gan|eadan drihtlice cempa , 
 sigeferð and eaha , hyra|hyr|hira|hi sword geteon , 
 and æt|etan oþrum|oþer|oðer duru ordlaf and guþlaf , 
 and hengest self hwerfan|hweorfan him|hi|he on|an last . 
 þe|þa|ða|se git garulf guðere styran 
 þæt|ðæt|se he swa freolic feorh forma siþ 
 toh|to se heall duru hyrsta nesan|neh|ne beran , 
 nu hydan|hit niþ heard anyman willan , 
 acan|ac he frægn|frignan|fregnan ofer eal undearninga , 
 deormod hæleþ|hæle|hælan , hwæt|hwa þe|þa|ða|se duru healdan . 
 " sigeferþ wesan|seon|is min|ic nama , " cweþan he , " ic wesan|seon|eoh secgena leodan|leod , 
 wreccea wid cuð ; fæle|fela ic wea gebidan , 
 heard hild . þu|þe|ðe wesan|seon|is git heran|her witod 
 swæþer þu self toh|to me|ic secean wylle . " 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon on|an heall wælslihta gehlyn ; 
 sculan cellod bord cene on|an hand , 
 banhelm berstan ( buruhðelu dynnan|dynian ) , 
 oþ|oð æt|etan se guðe garulf gecrang , 
 eall|eal ærest|ær eorðbuendra , 
 guðlafes sunu , ymbe|ymb he god fæle|fela , 
 hwearflicra hræw . hræfen wandrian , 
 sweart and sealobrun . swurdleoma standan , 
 swilce eal finnsburuh fyren wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon . 
 nesan|neh|ne gefrignan ic næfre wurþlicor æt|etan wer hild 
 sixtig sigebeorna sel gebæran , 
 nesan|neh|ne nefre swete medo sel forgyldan 
 þonne hnæfe guldan hit|his|he hægstealdas . 
 hi|heo|heg feohtan fif dæg|dah|dag , swa hyra|hyr|hira|hi nan nesan|neh|ne feolan 
 drihtgesiða , acan|ac hi|heo|heg þe|þa|ða|se duru healdan . 
 þe|þa|ða|se gewitan him|hi|he wund hæleð on|an wegan gangan , 
 sæd|secgan þæt|se hit|his|he byrne abrecan wære|wær|wesan|seon|beon , 
 heresceorp unhror , and eacan|eac wesan|seon|beon hit|his|he helm ðyrel . 
 þe|þa|ða|se he sona frægn|frignan|fregnan folc hyrdan|hyran|hirde , 
 hu þe|þa|ða|se wigend hyra|hyr|hira|hi wundian|wund genesan , 
 oððe hwæðer ðæra hyssa 
 
 heran|her ys seon|seo|se bot , hu þu magan þin æcer betan gif hi|heo nellaþ wel wexan oþþe|oððe þær hwilc ungedefe þingan|þing on|an gedon|gedo|don bið on|an dry oððe on|an lyblace . 
 geniman þonne|se on|an niht|neaht , ær hydan|hit dagian , feower turf on|an feower healf se land|finna , and gemearcian hu hi ær standan . 
 niman þonne|se elh|ele and hunig and beorma , and ælc feoh meolcan|meolc þu|þe|se on|an þæm|se land|finna su , and ælc treowcynnes dælan|dæl þu|þe|se on|an þæm|se land|finna su gewexen , butan heard beaman , and ælс|ælc namcuþre wyrt dælan|dæl , butan glappan anon , and don þonne|se haligwæter þær on|an , and drype þonne|se þriwa on|an se staðol þær|se turf , and cweþan þonne þes|se word : crescite , wexe , etan|et multiplicamini , and gemænigfealda , etan|et replete , and gefyllan , terre , þes eorþ|eorðe . in nomine patris etan|et filii etan|et spiritus sancti sittan benedicti . and pater noster swa oft swa þæt|se oðer . 
 and bere|beran|ber siððan þe|þa|ða|se turf toh|to circean , and mæssepreost asinge feower mæsse ofer þan|se turfon , and wendan|wenan munan|mann|man þæt|se grene toh|to ðan weofode , and siððan gebringan munan|mann|man þu|þa|se turf þær hi|heo ær wesan|seon|beon ær sunne|sunnan|sunna setlgang . and habban him|hi|he gæworht of cwicbeam feower cristes mælo and awrite on|an ælcon ende : matheus and marcus , lucas and iohannes . 
 leсgan|lecgan þæt|se cristes mælan|mæl on|an se pyt neoþeweard , cweðan þonne : crux matheus , crux marcus , crux lucas , crux sanctus iohannes . niman þonne þu|þa|se turf and settan þær ufon on|an and cweþan þonne nigon siþon þes word , crescite , and swa oft pater noster , and wendan|wenan þu|þe|se þonne|se eastweard , and onlut nigon siðon eadmodlice , and cweðan þonne|se þes word : 
 eastweard ic standan|stand , are ic me|ic biddan , 
 biddan ic se mære|mæran domine , biddan se micel drihten 
 biddan ic se halig heofonrices weard , 
 eorþ|eorðe ic biddan and upheofon 
 and þe|þa|ða|se soþ sanct marian 
 and heofon magan and heahreced , 
 þæt|se ic motan|mot þes gealdor mid gifu|gifan drihten 
 toðum ontynan þurh trum geþanc , 
 aweccan þes wæstm we|us toh|to woruldnytte , 
 gefyllan þes folde mid fæstan|fæst geleafa , 
 wlitig þes wancgturf , swa se witega cweðan 
 þæt|se se habban are|ar on|an eorþrice , se þu|þe|se ælmyssan 
 dælan domlice drihten þances . 
 wendan|wenan þu|þe|se þonne|se þri sunganges , astrece þonne|se on|an andlang and arim þær letanias and cweðan þonne|se : sanctus , sanctus , sanctus oþ ende . singan þonne|se benedicite aþenedon earmon and magnificat and pater noster þri , and bebeodan hit criste and sanct marian and þære|se halig|halga|haleg rode|rod toh|to lof and toh|to weorþinga and þæm|þam|se are|ar þu|þe|se þæt|se land|finna agan and eal þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se him|hi|he underðeodde synt . 
 þonne þæt|se eall|eal wesan|seon|nesan gedon|gedo|don , þonne|se niman munan|mann|man uncuþ sæd æt|etan ælmesmannum and sellan him|hi|he twegen|twa swylc , swilce munan|mann|man æt|etan him|hi|he niman , and gegaderian ealle|eall|eal hit|his|he 
 sulhgeteogo togædere ; borian þonne|se on|an þæm|þam|se beam stor and finol and gehalgian sape and halgian sealtan|sealt . niman þonne|se þæt|se sæd , settan on|an se sul bodig , cweðan þonne|se : 
 erce , erce , erce , eorþe|eorþ modor , 
 geunnan þu|þe|se se alwalda , ece drihten , 
 æcer wexendra and wridendra , 
 eacniende and elniendra , 
 sceafta hehra , scira wæstmian|wæstm , 
 and se brad berewæstma , 
 and se hwit hwætewæstma , 
 and eall|eal eorþe|eorþ wæstmian|wæstm . 
 geunnan him|hi|he ece drihten 
 and hit|his|he halig , þu|þe|se on|an heofon synt , 
 þæt|se his yrþ seon friþian wiþ|wið eall|eal feond gehwæne , 
 and heo seon beorgan wiþ|wið eall|eal bealu|bealo gehwylc , 
 þær|se lyblaca geond land|finna seon|sawan . 
 nu ic biddan se waldend , se þu|þe|ðe þes|se weorold gesceppan , 
 þæt|se nesan|neh|ne su nan toh|to se cwidol wif nesan|neh|ne toh|to se cræftig munan|mann|man 
 þæt|se awendan nesan|neh|ne mæge|mæg|magan word þus gecwedene . 
 þonne|se munan|mann|man þu|þa|se sulh forþ|forð drifan and þu|þa|se forma furh onsceote , cweðan þonne|se : 
 hal wesan þu , folde , firas modor ! 
 beon|beo þu growan on|an god fæþme , 
 fodre gefyllan|fyllan firas toh|to nytt . 
 niman þonne|se ælc cynn|cyn melo and abacæ munan|mann|man innewerdne hand bradnæ hlaf and gecned he mid meolcan|meolc and mid 
 haligwætere and lecgan under þu|þa|se forma furh . cweþan þonne|se : 
 ful æcer fodres firas cinne , 
 beorhtblowende , þu gebletsian|bletsian weorþan|weorþ 
 se halig noman þu|þe|se þes|se heofon gesceppan 
 and þes|se eorþe|eorþ þu|þe|se we on|an lifian . 
 se god , se þes grund gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , geunnan we|us growan gifu|gifan , 
 þæt|se we|us corn gehwylc cuman|ancuman toh|to nytt . 
 cweðan þonne|se þri " crescite in nomine patris , sittan benedicti , amen , " and pater noster þriwa . ## þes munan|mann|man sculan cweðan þonne hit|his|he ceap hwilc munan|mann|man for- 
 stolenne . cwyð ær he ænyg oþer|oðer word cweðan : 
 bethlem hattæ seon|seo|se burh þu|þe|ðe crist on|an geboren|geberan|beran wesan , 
 seon|seo|se wesan|seon|is mærsian|gemærsian ofer eall|eal middangeard ; 
 swa ðeos dæd wyrþe for|faran mann mære|mæran , 
 per crucem christi ! and gebiddan|gebidan þu|þe|se þonne þriwa east and 
 cweðan þriwa : crux christi ab oriente reducat . and þri 
 westan|west|wesan and cweðan : crux christi ab occidente reducat . and

 þri norð and cweðan : crux christi abscondita sunt etan|et inuenta 
 est . iudeas crist ahon , gedidon him|hi|he dæd þu|þa|se wyrstan ; 
 helan þæt|se hi|heo forhelan nesan|neh|ne mihton . swa næfre ðeos dæd 
 forhelan nesan|neh|ne weorþ per crucem christi . ## ic me|ic on|an þes gyrdan|gyrd belucan and on|an god helan bebeodan 
 wiþ|wið þan sar stice , wiþ|wið þan sar slege , 
 wiþ|wið þan grymma gryre , 
 wiþ|wið ðane micela egsian þu|þe|se bið eghwam lað , 
 and wiþ|wið eal þæt|se lað þu|þe|se in toh|to land|finna faru|faran|fah . 
 sygegealdor ic begale , sigegyrd ic me|ic weсgan|wegan|weg , 
 wordsige and worcsige . se me|ic dege ; 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic merian|mere nesan|neh|ne gemyrre , nesan|neh|ne me|ic mæg|mecgan|magian|maga nesan|neh|ne geswence , 
 nesan|neh|ne me|ic næfre minum|min feorh forht nesan|neh|ne gewurþe , 
 acan|ac gehælan me|ic ælmihtig and sunu and frofor gast , 
 eall|eal wuldor wyrðig dryhten , 
 swa swa ic gehyrdan|gehyran heofna scyppende . 
 abrame and isace 
 and swilce mann , moyses and iacob , 
 and dauit and iosep 
 and evan and annan and elizabet , 
 saharie and ec marie , modur cristes , 
 and eacan|eac þæ gebroðor|broþor , petrus and paulus , 
 and eacan|eac þusend þinne|þin engel 
 clipian ic me|ic toh|to are|ar wiþ|wið eall|eal feond . 
 hi|heo me|ic ferion and friþion and min for|faran nerion , 
 eal me|ic gehealdon , me|ic gewealdon , 
 worces stirende ; seon me|ic wuldor hyht , 
 hand ofer heafod , halig rof , 
 sigerofra sceolu , soðfæstra engel . 
 biddu ealle|eall|eal bliðu mod 
 þæt|se me|ic beon|beo matheus helm , marcus byrne , 
 sunnan|leoht , lifes|lif rof , lucos min|ic swurd , 
 scearp and scirecg , scyld iohannes , 
 wuldor gewlitegod wælgar serafhin . 
 forþ|forð ic gefaran , frind ic gemetan|gemet , 
 eall|eal engel blæd , eadig lar . 
 biddan ic nu sigeres god god milts , 
 siþfæt god , smylte and lihtan 
 wind on|an waroþum . wind gefran , 
 circinde wæter simble gehælede
