 eripe me|ic de operantibus iniquitatem , etan|et de uiris sanguinum salua me|ic . 
 generian|gener me|ic fram niðe nahtfremmendra 
 þu|þe|se heran|her unriht ealle|eall|eal wyrceað , 
 and me|ic wiþ|wið blodhreowes wer bealuwe gehælan . ## sican psalmum dicam nomini tuo , deus , in seculum seculi , ut reddam uota mea de die in diem . 
 swa ic naman|nama þin neod singan , 
 þæt|se ic min|ic gehatan|gehat heran|her agylde 
 of dæge|dæg on|an dæg , swa hit gedefe wese|wesan . ## exaudi nos , deus salutaris noster , spes omnium finium terre etan|et in mari long|lange . 
 gehyran we|us , hælend god , þu wesan|seon hyht eall|eal 
 þu|þe|se on|an ðisse eorþ|eorðe utan syndon 
 oððe feor on|an sæ folde wuniað . ## deus , in adiutorium meum intende ; domine , ad adiuuandum me|ic festina . 
 wesan , drihten god , deore|deor fultuman|fultum ; 
 behealdan , drihten , me|ic , and me|ic hraðe siððan 
 gefultuma æt|etan feorhþearfe . ## repleatur os meum laude twiwa , ut possim cantare gloriam tuam , tota die magnificentiam tuam . 
 su min|ic muð and min|ic mod mægen gefyllan|fyllan , 
 þæt|se ic þu|þin lof mæge|mæg|magan lust singan 
 and wuldor|seolh|bearm þin wid mærsian 
 and þu|þe|ðe eall|eal dæg æghwær herian . ## domine deus uirtutum , conuerte nos etan|et ostende faciem tuam , etan|et salui erimus . 
 gehweorfan we|us , mægen god , and we|us milde æteow 
 þinne|þin andwlitan|andwlita ; ealle|eall|eal we beoð hal . ## conuerte nos , deus salutaris noster , etan|et auerte iram tuam wifcynn|hosp|flet|a nobis . 
 gehweorfan we|us hraðe , hælend drihten , 
 and þin yrre|irre fram we|us eacan|eac oncyrre . ## etan|et ego ad te , domine , clamaui , etan|et mane oratio mea preueniet te . 
 ic me|ic toh|to þu|þe|ðe , ece drihten , 
 mid modgehygd mægen clypian , 
 and min|ic gebed morgen gehwylc 
 for|faran silf|self þu|þe|ðe soþfæst becuman . ## conuertere , domine , aliquantulum , etan|et deprecabilis esto super seruos tuos . 
 gehweorfan we|us hwæthwygu , halig drihten ; 
 wesan þin scealcum wel eaðbene . 
 respice in seruos tuos etan|et in opera twiwa , domine , etan|et dirige filios eorum . 
 geseon þin scealcas swæs eage , 
 and on|an þu|þin ongeagn|agen|agan weorc , ece drihten , 
 and hira|hi|heore birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn gerec bliðe mod . 
 etan|et sittan splendor domini dei nostri super nos , etan|et opera manuum nostrarum dirige super nos , etan|et opus manuum nostrarum dirige . 
 wese|wesan we|us beorhtnys ofer bliðan drihten , 
 ure|ur se god god georne|geornan|georn ofer ealle|eall|eal ; 
 gerec ure|ur handgeweorc heah ofer usic . 
 
 credo in deum patrem omnipotentem . 
 ælmihtig fæder up on|an rodor , 
 þu|þe|se þe|þa|ða|se sciran gesceaft sceope and wyrсean|wyrсan|wyrcan 
 and eorþ|eorðe wang eall|eal gesettan , 
 ic þu|þe|se eсe god an gecennan , 
 lust gelyfan . þu wesan|seon lifes|lif frea , 
 engel ordfruma , eorþ|eorðe wealdend , 
 and þu garsecges grund gewyrсean|gewyrсan|gewyrcan , 
 and þu þe|þa|ða|se menigu cunnan mære tungol . 
 etan|et in iesum christum filium eius unicum , dominum nostrum . 
 ic on|an sunu þinne|þin soð gelyfan , 
 hælendne cyning , hider asendne 
 of ðam|se uplican engel romana , 
 se gabriel , god ærendraca , 
 sanctan marian sylfre gebodian . 
 ides unmæne , heo þæt|se ærende|ærend 
 onfon freolice , and þu|þe|ðe fæder silf|self 
 under breostcofan birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn acennan|acan . 
 næs|nesan þær gefremmed firen æt|etan gifta|gift , 
 acan|ac þær halig gast handgyft sellan , 
 þære|se fæmne bosm fyllan|fyld|fylan mid bliss|blis , 
 and heo cuðlice cennan swa mære 
 eorðbuendum engel scyppend , 
 se toh|to frofor gewearð foldbuend , 
 and ymbe|ymb bethleem bodedan engel 
 þæt|se acennan wesan|seon|beon crist on|an eorþ|eorðe . 
 passus sub pontio pilato . 
 þe|þa|ða|se se pontisca pilatus wealdan 
 under romwarum rices and dom , 
 þu|þa|se se deore|deor frea deað þrowade , 
 on|an gealga stigan , guma drihten , 
 se geomormod iosep byrigde , 
 and he of hell|hel huðe gefette , 
 of þæm|þam|se suslhofe , sawol|sawlian|sawel manig|manega , 
 hettan|het|hedan|hatan þe|þa|ða|se uplicne eþel sec . 
 tertia die resurrexit wifcynn|hosp|flet|a mortuis . 
 se þywan|þy|þe|se þridda dæge|dæg þeod wealdend 
 arisan|ar , rices frea , recen of molde , 
 and he feowertig dæg|dah|dagian|dag folgere sinnan|sin 
 run arette , and þe|þa|ða|se hit|his|he romana beginnan|began , 
 se uplican eðel sec , 
 cweðan þæt|se he nyllan|nillan nan forlætan 
 þu|þe|se him|hi|he forþ|forð ofer þæt|se fylian willan 
 and mid fæst sefa freogan|freod gelæstan . 
 credo in spiritum sanct . 
 ic halig gast hihte belucan , 
 emn swa eсe swa wesan|seon|is aðor gecweþan|cweþan|cweðan , 
 fæder oððe freobearn , folc gereordum . 
 nesan|neh|ne synd þæt|se þri gripe|god|ben , þriwa nemnan|genemnan , 
 acan|ac wesan|seon|is on|an god , se þu|þe|ðe ealle|eall|eal hafað 
 þu|þa|se þri naman|nama þingian|þing geryne , 
 soð and sigefæst ofer side|sid gesceaft , 
 wereda wuldorgyfa , wlanc and ece . 
 sanct æcclesiam catholicam . 
 eacan|eac ic gelyfan þæt|se syn leof god 
 þu|þe|se þurh an geþanc ealdor heriað , 
 heofon heahcyning heran|her for|faran lif , 
 sanctorum communionem . 
 and ic gemænscipe mære getreowe 
 þinne|þin halig heran|her for|faran lif . 
 remissionem peccatorum . 
 lisse ic gelyfan leahtra gehwilc , 
 carnis resurrectionem . 
 and ic se ærest|ær eall|eal getreowe , 
 flæsces on|an folde on|an þu|þa|se forhtan tidan|tid , 
 etan|et uitam æternam . 
 þær þu ece lif eall|eal dælan , 
 swa heran|her mannian|mann gehwylc metod gecwemað . 
 
 heran|her geendian eorþ|eorðe dream 
 eadgar , engel cyning , ceas him|hi|he oðer sunnan|leoht , 
 wlitig and wynsum , and þes wacan|wac forlætan , 
 lif þes lænan|læn . nemnað leode|leoda|leod birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn , 
 mann on|an molde , se monaþ|monað gehwær 
 in ðisse eðeltyrf , þu|þa|se þu|þe|se ær wær 
 on|an rimcræft rihte|rihtan|riht getogene , 
 iulius monoð , þær se geonga|geong gewitan 
 on|an se eahteðan dæg eadgar of lif , 
 beorn beahgyfa . fon hit|his|he birnan|biernan|beornan|beirnan|bearn siððan 
 toh|to cynerice , cild unweaxen , 
 eorl ealdor , þæm|þam|se wesan|seon|beon eadweard nama . 
 and him|hi|he tirfæst hæleð tynan|tin niht|neaht ær 
 of brytene gewitan , bisceop se god , 
 þurh gecynde cræftan|cræft , ðam|se wesan|seon|beon cyneweard nama . 
 þe|þa|ða|se wesan|seon|beon on|an myrceon , min gefræge , 
 wid and welhwær waldendes lof 
 afyllan on|an folde . fela wearð todræfed 
 gleaw god þeow ; þæt|se wesan|seon|beon gnornung micel 
 þæm|þam|se þu|þe|se on|an breost wegan beornan lufu|lufe 
 metod on|an mod . þu|þa|se wesan|seon|beon mærþu fruma 
 toh|to swiðe|swiðan forseon , sigorian|sigor waldend , 
 rodera rædend , þu|þa|se munan|mann|man hit|his|he rihtan|riht tobrecan . 
 and þu|þa|se wearð eacan|eac adræfed deormod hæleð , 
 oslac , of eard ofer yða gewealcan|gewealc , 
 ofer ganot bæð , gamolfeax hæleð , 
 wis and wordsnotor , ofer wæterian|wæter geðring , 
 ofer hwæl eðel , ham bereafian . 
 and þu|þa|se wearð ætywan uppe on|an roderum 
 steorra on|an staðole , se stiðferhþe , 
 hæleð higegleawe , hatað wid 
 cometa be naman|nama , cræftgleawe mann , 
 wise|wis woðboran . wesan|seon|beon geond werðeode 
 waldendes wræc|wracu wid gefrege , 
 hungor ofer hruse ; þæt|se eft heofon weard 
 gebetan , breogo|brego engel , gifan|giefan|gefan|geaf eft bliss|blis gehwæm 
 egbuendra þurh eorþ|eorðe westm .
